40001001	Raa inɗe maamiraaɓe Yeesu Almasiifu, ɓii Ibraahim ɓii Dawda~:
40001002	Ibraahim rimi Iciyaaku, Iciyaaku rimi Yaakuubu, Yaakuubu rimi Yahuuda e rimdaaɓe muuɗum,
40001003	Yahuuda rimi Faares e Jaara, Tamar woni inna maɓɓe. Faares rimi Hesruuna, Hesruuna rimi Aram,
40001004	Aram rimi Aminadabu, Aminadabu rimi Naasuna, Naasuna rimi Salmuuna,
40001005	Salmuuna rimi Bo'es, Rahab woni inna ma'ako, Bo'es rimi Obida, Ruut woni inna ma'ako, Obida rimi Jesse,
40001006	Jesse rimi laamiiɗo Dawda. Dawda rimi Suleymaanu, mo o rimdi e koree Uuriyano,
40001007	Suleymaanu rimi Rehobowam, Rehobowam rimi Abiya, Abiya rimi Aaca,
40001008	Aaca rimi Yehosafat, Yehosafat rimi Yoram, Yoram rimi Ajaariya,
40001009	Ajaariya rimi Yotam, Yotam rimi Ahas, Ahas rimi Hejekiya,
40001010	Hejekiya rimi Manasa, Manasa rimi Amon, Amon rimi Yoosiya,
40001011	Yoosiya rimi Yekooniya e rimdaaɓe muuɗum. Nder wakkaci ma'ajum Isiraa'iila'en konaa njaharaa lesdi Babiila.
40001012	Ɓaawo jahareeki maɓɓe Babiila, Yekooniya rimi Salaatiyel, Salaatiyel rimi Jarubabel,
40001013	Jarubabel rimi Abihudu, Abihudu rimi Eliyaakim, Eliyaakim rimi Ajoora,
40001014	Ajoora rimi Saduku, Saduku rimi Akim, Akim rimi Eliyuda,
40001015	Eliyuda rimi Eliyaajaru, Eliyaajaru rimi Mattan, Mattan rimi Yaakuubu.
40001016	Yaakuubu rimi Yusufu, koree Maryaama. Maryaama kam woni inna Yeesu bi'eteeɗo Almasiifu.
40001017	To noon, gada Ibraahim faa wargo Dawda ɗum jaamanuuji sappo e nayi, gada Dawda faa wargo nde Yahuudu'en konaa njaharaa Babiila ɗum jaamanuuji sappo e nayi, gada jahareeki Yahuudu'en Babiila faa wargo e Almasiifu boo, ɗum jaamanuuji sappo e nayi.
40001018	Raa no danyeeki Yeesu Almasiifu laatorii. Maryaama inna ma'ako no ɗaɓɓaaɗo Yusufu, ammaa ila Yusufu hewtaay mo, sey ɗum tawi o caawɗo gada e baawɗe Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
40001019	Yusufu ɗaɓɓuɗo mo no neɗɗo kulo Allah, mo gikku mbooɗngu. Gam ma'ajum o nyumii seedgo e Maryaama nder suuɗeefi, gam o yiɗaa semtingo ɗum.
40001020	Emo nder nyumooji ɗiin, sey malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo wari to ma'ako nder koyɗol, vi'i mo~: — Aan Yusufu taan Dawda, ta'a hul hoovaago Maryaama, gam ɓinngel ngel o saawi ivii gada e baawɗe Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
40001021	O danyey ɓiɗɗo gorko, a tokaney mo Yeesu, gam kanko hisnata yimɓe ma'ako gada e hakkeeji mu''en.
40001022	Ɗum fuu ɗum waɗii gam ɗum hebbina ko Allah volvi gada e honnduko annabiijo biiɗo~:
40001023	~Surbaajo mo anndaa gorko no heɓey reedu, o danya ɓiɗɗo gorko. O tokanee Imaanuwel. Ma'ana innde ndeen woni~: Allah e wondi e meeɗen.
40001024	Nde Yusufu fini gada ɗoyngol, o waɗii noon no malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo vi'i mo. O hooƴi Maryaama laatii koree ma'ako,
40001025	ammaa o hawtaay e ma'ako faa o danyi ɓiyiiko gorko. Yusufu tokani mo Yeesu.
40002001	Yeesu danyaama si'ire Baytilaama nder lesdi Yahuudiya jaamanu laamu Hiruudus. Ɓaawo danyeeki ma'ako, sey woɓɓe annduɓe koode ngari Urusaliima gada fu'unaange.
40002002	Nde ɓe ngari, ɓe ƴami ɓe mbi'i~: — Toye ɓinngel danyaangel laatotoongel laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en woni~? Min ngi'ii hoodere ma'agel vanngii gada fu'una, min ngarii gam min cujjidana ngel.
40002003	Nde laamiiɗo Hiruudus nani habaru ɗuum o waannake korey, kanko e yimɓe Urusaliima fuu.
40002004	Sey o noddi mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta fuu, o ƴami ɓe toye Almasiifu rimetee.
40002005	Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Si'ire Baytilaama nder lesdi Yahuudiya. Gam raa ko annabiijo vinndi, o vi'i~:
40002006	~Aan Baytilaama, nder lesdi Yahuudiya, wanaa aan ɓuri famɗugo nder ci'e Yahuuda sam, gam gada nder maaɗa ɗum danyata goɗɗo laamiiɗo, aardotooɗo yimɓe am Isiraa'iila'en kama no gaynaako aardortoo baali muuɗum.
40002007	Sey Hiruudus noddi annduɓe koode ɓeen nder suuɗeefi, o ƴami ɓe deydey ɗume wakkaci hoodere ndeen vanngi.
40002008	Ndeen o lili ɓe Baytilaama, o vi'i ɓe~: — Njahee, njillee e hakkiilo to ɓinngel ngeel woni. To on ngi'ii ngel, ngaree anndinee yam, gam miin boo mi yaha mi sujjidana ngel.
40002009	Nde ɓe nani ko laamiiɗo vi'i, ɓe ndilli. Hoodere nde ɓe ngi'inoo gada fu'unaange ndeen, nde aardii ɓe faa nde wari to ɓinngel woni, nde dari.
40002010	Ɓesdugo yi'igo hoodere ndeen velii ɓe korey.
40002011	Nde ɓe natti nder wuro, ɓe ngi'ii ɓinngel ngeel e inna ma'agel Maryaama. Ɓe ndiccii, ɓe cujjidani ngel, ɓe piɓti boorooji maɓɓe, ɓe kokki ngel jiinaariya e urdi mbelndi e ɗacce ɗe luuɓngol belngol bi'eteeɗe miir.
40002012	Allah holli ɓe nder koyɗol to' ɓe mbittu to Hiruudus. Gam ma'ajum ɓe tokki laawol feere, ɓe kooti lesdi maɓɓe.
40002013	Ɓaawo dillol annduɓe koode ɓeen, sey malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo wari to Yusufu nder koyɗol, vi'i mo~: — Umma hooy ɓinngel e inna ma'agel paayron lesdi Misira. Njooɗooɗon toon faa nde mbi'eymaami ngarton, gam Hiruudus no yilloto wargo ɓinngel ngeel.
40002014	Yusufu boo ummii caka jemma, hooƴi ɓinngel ngeel e inna ma'agel faayri Misira.
40002015	Ɓe njooɗii toon faa Hiruudus maayi, gam ɗum hebbina ko Allah volvi gada e honnduko annabiijo biiɗo~: Gada Misira noddoymi ɓiyam.
40002016	Nde Hiruudus annditi annduɓe koode pijirii ɗum, o huunƴi korey. O vi'i ɓikkon ngoron ngonkon Baytilaama e takkol muuɗum fuu mbaree, gada keccon faa yahago kon duuɓi ɗiɗi, deydey e bannguki hoodere ko annduɓe koode ɓeen ngeccinoo mo.
40002017	Kanjum hebbini ko annabi Yeremiya vi'inoo nde o vi'i~:
40002018	Yaayaare nanaama nder si'ire Raama, ɗum bojji e ƴokayeeji jurminiiɗi~: Rahiila voyata ɓikkon muuɗum. O jaɓaay de''ineego gam kon cooyti.
40002019	Ɓaawo maayde Hiruudus, malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo vannganii Yusufu nder koyɗol toon lesdi Misira,
40002020	o vi'i mo~: — Umma hooy ɓinngel e inna ma'agel co''oɗaa lesdi Isiraa'iila, gam ɓeen yillotonooɓe wargo ngel maayii.
40002021	Sey Yusufu ummii hooƴi ɓinngel e inna ma'agel hooti lesdi Isiraa'iila.
40002022	Ammaa nde o nani Arkilayus ronii laamu baaba muuɗum Hiruudus dow lesdi Yahuudiya, o hulii yottoyaago lesdi ndiin. Ɓaawo o heɓii vagginoore Allah nder koyɗol, o yahii lesdi Gaaliili,
40002023	o jooɗii si'ire vi'eteende Najaratu. Noon ɗum hebbiniri ko annabo'en mbi'inoo, nde ɓe mbi'i~: «~O noddirte Najaratunkeejo.~»
40003001	Nder balɗe ɗeen, goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma vanngii nder ladde Yahuudiya, emo waɗa ka wooyya, emo vi'a~:
40003002	— Tuubee, gam laamu Allah ɓadake~!
40003003	Kanko woni mo annabi Ecaaya volvunoo dow muuɗum, o vi'i~: — Goɗɗo e waɗa ka wooyya nder ladde, e vi'a~: Mo''inee ɗatal gam Jawmiraawo, poortee laawol gam garol ma'ako~!
40003004	Yahayya e ɓornii kolte leeɓe geelooɗi, emo taadii taadorde laral. Nyaamdu ma'ako woni baɓɓatti e njuumri ladde.
40003005	Yimɓe ivoyi Urusaliima e lesdi Yahuudiya e jaaje piliiɗe maayo Urdun fuu ngari to ma'ako.
40003006	Ɓe mbanngini hakkeeji maɓɓe ɗi ɓe mbaɗi fuu, Yahayya boo waɗani ɓe baptisma nder maayo Urdun.
40003007	Nde Yahayya yi'i Fariisa'en e Saduuki'en ɗuuɗɓe e ngara gam mbaɗanee baptisma, sey o vi'i ɓe~: — Onon ɓiɓɓe bo'ole~! Moye vi'i on paayon huunƴere wareynde~?
40003008	Kuwee kuuɗe kolleyɗe on tuubii.
40003009	To' on tammo on kisey halkere gam on taaniraaɓe Ibraahim. Emi vi'a on~: Allah e waawi waylitgo ɗe'e kaaƴe laatina ɗe ɓiɓɓe Ibraahim~!
40003010	Ila jo'oni jammbere aagaama gam fe''ugo leɗɗe gada e ɗaɗi ma'aje. Lekki ki rimataa ɓikkon mbooɗkon fuu, ki fe''ete ki feree nder yiite.
40003011	Miin, emi wa'arana on baptisma e ndiyam gam hollugo on tuubii. Ammaa gareyɗo ɓaawo am ɓurii yam baawɗe. Mi fotaay fiɓtugo koo ɓoggi paɗe ma'ako. Kanko o wa'araney on baptisma e Ruhu Ceniiɗo e yiite.
40003012	Emo jogii jaartirɗum e junngo ma'ako, gam o sennda gawri e nyaande. O hawrita gawri nder beembal ma'ako, ammaa o wulda nyaande ndeen e yiite nge nyifataa.
40003013	E wakkaci ɗuum Yeesu ivi lesdi Gaaliili wari maayo Urdun to Yahayya, gam Yahayya waɗana mo baptisma.
40003014	Ammaa Yahayya jaɓaay, vi'i mo~: — Miin haani mbaɗanaa baptisma, ee noye ngardataa to am~?
40003015	Yeesu toontii mo, vi'i~: — Jaɓ ɗum laatoo noon jo'oni, gam noon haani mba'aren ko Allah yiɗi. Ndeen Yahayya jaɓi.
40003016	Nde Yeesu waɗanaa baptisma, o vurti ndiyam tan, sey dow omtii o yi'i Ruhu Allah e jippoyoo nder nanndi foondu e wara dow ma'ako.
40003017	Sey ɗum nani voliinde ivoynde gada dow e vi'a~: — O'o woni Ɓiyam giɗaaɗo, emi nana belɗum ma'ako.
40004001	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, sey Ruhu Ceniiɗo yahari Yeesu nder ladde, gam Ceyɗaan jarraboo mo.
40004002	Yeesu waɗi balɗe arba'iin (40), emo suumii jemma e nyalawma. Sey veelo nanngi mo.
40004003	Ndeen Jarrabotooɗo wari vi'i mo~: — To a Ɓiɗɗo Allah kam, vi' ɗe'e kaaƴe laatoo nyaamdu.
40004004	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Ɗum vinndaama~: «~Naa e nyaamdu tan neɗɗo foofrata, ammaa gada e koo ndeye voliinde ivoynde to Allah.~»
40004005	Ndeen Ceyɗaan yahari mo si'ire Urusaliima seniinde, darni mo dow hoore Wuro Seniingo,
40004006	vi'i mo~: — To a Ɓiɗɗo Allah kam, diw gada ɗo'o faa lesdi, gam ɗum vinndaama~: «~Allah no vi'ey malaa'ika'en muuɗum taɓɓo ma, gam to' kosngal maaɗa fii haayre.~»
40004007	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Deftere boo ɓesdii vi'igo~: «~Ta'a godo Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa.~»
40004008	Kadimaa Ceyɗaan yahari mo dow vaamnde townde korey, holli mo laamuuji duuniyaaru fuu e darajja ma'aji,
40004009	vi'i mo~: — Ɗum fuu mi hokkete ɗum, kul a diccake, a sujjidanii yam.
40004010	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Sottu ɗo'o, aan Ceyɗaan~! Gam ɗum vinndaama~: «~Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa tan cujjidantaa, kanko tan haani njagganoɗaa.~»
40004011	Wakkaci ma'ajum Ceyɗaan woori mo, ndeen malaa'ika'en ngari to ma'ako kuwani mo.
40004012	Nde Yeesu nani Yahayya omndaama nder kaso, o vitti lesdi Gaaliili.
40004013	O woori si'ire Najaratu, o yahi o jooɗii si'ire Kafarnahum wonnde fonngo maayo Gaaliili nder senndere lesdi Jaabulon e Naftalim,
40004014	gam ɗum hebbina voliinde nde Allah volvi gada e honnduko annabi Ecaaya biiɗo~:
40004015	«~Onon lesɗe Jaabulon e Naftalim lesɗe gonɗe dow laawol jahoowol maayo manngo, hiirna maayo Urdun, Gaaliili, lesdi yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en~:
40004016	Jooɗiiɓe nder niɓre ngi'ii jayngol manngol. Jooɗiiɓe nder lesdi maayde niɓɓundi, jayngol yaynanii ɓe.~»
40004017	Gada wakkaci ma'ajum, Yeesu fuɗɗi wa'ajingo e vi'a~: — Tuubee, gam laamu Allah ɓadake.
40004018	Yeesu e tokkiti regorde maayo Gaaliili, sey o yi'i worɓe ɗiɗo rimdaaɓe, Simon noddirteeɗo Biiturus e minyum Anndaraawus. Eɓe pera nanngirɗum maɓɓe nder maayo, gam ɓe nanngooɓe liƴƴi.
40004019	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Tokkee yam, mi waɗa on waddeyɓe yimɓe to am.
40004020	Ɗoon e ɗoon ɓe ngoori nanngirɗum liƴƴi maɓɓe, ɓe tokki mo.
40004021	Kadimaa o yahi yeeso, o tawi woɓɓe rimdaaɓe ɗiɗo, ɓiɓɓe Jabadi, Yaakuubu e minyum Yahayya nder akali ndiyam. Kamɓe e baaba maɓɓe Jabadi, eɓe mo''ina nanngirɗum liƴƴi maɓɓe. Sey Yeesu noddi ɓe.
40004022	Ɗoon e ɗoon ɓe ngoori akali kiin faa e baaba maɓɓe fuu, ɓe tokki mo.
40004023	Yeesu yiilii nder lesdi Gaaliili fuu, emo wa'ajina nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi maɓɓe, emo anndina habaru laamu Allah, emo yamɗitina koo iri nguye nyawu e liddaari.
40004024	Habaru ma'ako sankitii nder lesdi Siiriya fuu. Ɗum waɗi ga waddango mo woonɓe nyawuuji feere-feere, ɓe nyawu paɗɗe e ɓe ginnaaji e voosɓe. Ɓe fuu o yamɗitini ɓe.
40004025	Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe gada lesdi Gaaliili e bi'eteeɗum ci'e sappo e Urusaliima e Yahuudiya e yimɓe lesdi ngonndi fu'una maayo Urdun fuu tokki mo.
40005001	Nde Yeesu yi'i yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe e kawrita, o ƴeenti dow vaamnde, o jooɗii. Almaajiri'en boo ngari to ma'ako.
40005002	Sey o fuɗɗi wa'ajingo ɓe, o vi'i~:
40005003	— Barkaa laatanto ɓeen annduɓe no tampuɓe yeeso Allah, gam kamɓe ndonata Laamu ma'ako.
40005004	Barkaa laatanto voyooɓe, gam Allah no de'itiney ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
40005005	Barkaa laatanto leestinɓe ko'e mu''en, gam Allah no hokkey ɓe lesdi ndi o waɗani ɓe alkawal.
40005006	Barkaa laatanto nanooɓe veelo e ɗomka waɗgo aadilaaku, gam Allah no haarney ɓe.
40005007	Barkaa laatanto yurmeteeɓe yimɓe, gam Allah no yurmoto ɓe.
40005008	Barkaa laatanto laaɓa ɓerɗe'en, gam ɓe ngi'ey Allah.
40005009	Barkaa laatanto fotnooɓe yimɓe, gam ɓe noddirte ɓiɓɓe Allah~!
40005010	Barkaa laatanto ɓeen torraaɓe gam huugo goonga, sabu ɓe ndonii laamu Allah.
40005011	Barkaa laatanto on to yimɓe kuɗii on, torrii on, kaadii on kaadooje kalluɗe gam am.
40005012	Nanee belɗum, ngamee, sabu laada ɗuuɗka e reenti on toon dow, gam noon ɓe torrirnoo annabo'en aartuɓe on.
40005013	— Onon ngoni lamɗam duuniyaaru. Ammaa to ndakam ma'ajam ittake, noye ɗam vo'inirtee~? Ɗam nafataa koo ɗume~! Sey nii ɗam rufee tan, yimɓe njaaɓa ɗam.
40005014	Onon ngoni jayngol duuniyaaru. Ay, si'ire nyiɓaande dow ƴoolde suuɗataako.
40005015	Fitila huɓɓataake ka hippiree tummude, sey nii ka resee dow jo'inirde fitilaaji, gam ka yaynanoo yimɓe wonɓe nder wuro fuu.
40005016	Noon haani jayngol mooɗon yaynira yeeso yimɓe, faa ɓe ngi'a kuuɗe booɗɗe ɗe kuwoton, ɓe teddina Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo toon dow asama.
40005017	— To' on nyum mi warii fiirtugo dookaaji binndaaɗi nder Tawreeta e defte annabo'en. Mi waraay gam fiirtugo ɗi, ammaa mi warii gam hebbitgo ɗi.
40005018	Emi vi'a on goonga~: to faa dow e lees re'aay fuu, koo toɓɓel e diidel ɓurngel famɗugo ittataake nder Tawreeta, sey to ɗum fuu ɗum heevii.
40005019	Gam ma'ajum, koo moye huulti dooka ɓurka famɗugo nder ɗi'i dookaaji, o ekkitini woɓɓe waɗgo noon, kanko laatotoo ɓurɗo famɗugo nder laamu Allah. Ammaa koo moye jogii ko dookaaji ɗiin mbi'i, o ekkitini woɓɓe waɗgo noon, kanko laatotoo mawɗo nder laamu Allah.
40005020	Emi vi'a on~: to aadilaaku mooɗon ɓuraay ngu moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e Fariisa'en, on nattataa nder laamu Allah sam.
40005021	— On nanii ko ɗum vi'inoo maamiraaɓe meeɗen~: «~To' neɗɗo waɗ war-hoore. Baɗɗo war-hoore fuu no sernante.~»
40005022	Ammaa miin, emi vi'a on~: kuunƴanɗo banndum fuu, fotii sernaneego. Kuɗɗo banndum fuu, vi'i mo~: «~Mehereejo~» fotii darneego yeeso cernoowo ɓurɗo mawnugo. Biiɗo banndum~: «~Bemmbo~» boo, fotii nattineego yiite jahannama.
40005023	Gam ma'ajum, to a waddii sadaka maaɗa yeeso Allah dow sakkirde, ndeen kiimtiɗaa e woodi ciya potal hakkunde maaɗa e bannda,
40005024	sey ndesaa sadaka maaɗa tawo, njahaa nja'afootiroyaa e bannda, ndeen mbittoya cakkaa sadaka maaɗa.
40005025	To goɗɗo wullake ma, yawɗa siryootir e ma'ako ila on njottaaki to cernoowo. To naa noon, o yaharete to cernoowo, cernoowo boo waɗ maa nder juuɗe poliis, ɓe omndu maa nder kaso.
40005026	Emi vi'i maa goonga~: a vurtataako toon sam, sey to a biyake ko pe''aneɗaa fuu.
40005027	— On nanii ko vi'ano~: «~Ta'a waɗ njeenu~!~»
40005028	Ammaa miin emi vi'a on~: daarɗo debbo e daarɗe suuno fuu, o waɗii njeenu nder ɓernde ma'ako.
40005029	Gam ma'ajum, to yitere maaɗa nde nyaamo waɗey maa e waɗgo hakke, ɗoof nde, fer to woɗɗi~! Igga cooyaa jokko wo'oto nder ɓanndu maaɗa e nattidaa e jokkule ɓanndu maaɗa fuu nder yiite jahannama.
40005030	To junngo maaɗa nyaamo waɗey maa e waɗgo hakke, tay ngo, fer to woɗɗi. Igga cooyaa jokko wo'oto nder ɓanndu maaɗa e nattidaa e jokkule ɓanndu maaɗa fuu nder yiite jahannama.
40005031	— Ɗum vi'anooma boo~: «~Ceerɗo debbo muuɗum fuu, sey hokka mo ɗereewol ceergal.~»
40005032	Ammaa miin emi vi'a on~: ceerɗo debbo muuɗum to naa nder njeenu nanngi mo, waɗii mo nder njeenu. Kooviiɗo ceeraaɗo boo waɗii njeenu.
40005033	— On nanii ko maamiraaɓe meeɗen mbi'ano~: «~Ta'a huno dow fewre, ammaa hebbin alkawal ngal mbaɗɗaa yeeso Jawmiraawo.~»
40005034	Ammaa miin, emi vi'a on~: to' on kuno sam. To' on kunoro asama, gam ɗum jooɗorde Allah,
40005035	koo lesdi, gam ɗum jaaɓruɗum kosɗe ma'ako, koo Urusaliima, gam ɗum si'ire Laamiiɗo mawɗo.
40005036	Ta'a hunoro koo laasol hoore maaɗa, gam a waawataa raningo ngol koo ɓalingo ngol.
40005037	E haani bolle mooɗon laatoo «~ee~» koo «~a'aa~», ɗum heƴii. To ɗum ɓurii ɗoon, ɗum ivii gada e Ceyɗaan.
40005038	— On nanii ɗum vi'anooma~: «~Yitere biyoree yitere, nyiinde biyoree nyiinde.~»
40005039	Ammaa miin, emi vi'a on~: to' on mba'ato baɗanɗo on ko halli. To goɗɗo menngake ma haɓawo nyaamo, hokku mo nano maa o menngo.
40005040	To goɗɗo yaharii ma yeeso ceri'a gam te'etu maa toggoore, wooran mo faa e ngapaleewol maaɗa boo.
40005041	To goɗɗo doolii ma roondanaago ɗum donngal yahago kiloomeetir go'otel, roondana mo ngal faa yahago kiloomeetirji ɗiɗi.
40005042	Hokku toriiɗo ma. To goɗɗo ƴamii ma nyamaande, ta'a haɗ mo.
40005043	— On nanii ɗum vi'anooma~: «~Ngiɗee banndiraaɓe mooɗon, nganyee wanyɓe on.~»
40005044	Ammaa miin emi vi'a on~: ngiɗee wanywanyɓe mooɗon, ndo'anee torreyɓe on.
40005045	To on mbaɗii noon, on laatoto ɓiɓɓe Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo dow asama, puɗneyɗo naange muuɗum dow vooɗɓe e halluɓe, toɓneyɗo iyoonde dow aadali'en e ɓe ngalaa aadilaaku.
40005046	To yiɗɓe on tan ngiɗɗon, kaye laada keɓoton~? Koo jaɓooɓe janngal maa e ngiɗi yiɗɓe ɗum'en~!
40005047	To banndiraaɓe mooɗon tan kinnoton, goɗɗum geetum mbaɗɗon naa~? Ay koo heeferɓe maa noon mbaɗata~!
40005048	Onon, laatee on timmuɓe kama no Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo toon dow asama laatorii timmuɗo.
40006001	— Kakkilee e huugo kuuɗe mooɗon booɗɗe gam woɓɓe ngi'a, mana on. To on mbaɗii noon, on keɓataa laada yeeso Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo toon dow asama.
40006002	Gam ma'ajum, to eɗa hokka sadaka, ta'a jaɓ goɗɗo yi'a, kama no munaafuki'en mbaɗata nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi e dow ɗate, gam yimɓe ngi'a, mana ɓe. Emi vi'a on goonga~: ɓeen waɗooɓe noon ɓe aartii ɓe keɓii laada maɓɓe ɗo'o e duuniyaaru.
40006003	Ammaa aan, to eɗa hokka sadaka, to' nano maaɗa anndu ko nyaamo maaɗa hokkata,
40006004	sadaka maaɗa laatoo nder suuɗeefi. Ndeen Baabiraawo maaɗa gi'oowo ko mbaɗata nder suuɗeefi, no biyete.
40006005	— To eɗon mbaɗa do'aare, to' on mbaɗ kama no munaafuki'en mbaɗata. Kamɓe eɓe ngiɗi do'oraago darnde nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi e dow ɗate, gam yimɓe fuu ngi'a ɓe. Emi vi'a on goonga~: kamɓe ɓe aartii ɓe keɓii laada maɓɓe.
40006006	Ammaa aan, nde mbaɗataa do'aare fuu, nattu nder suudu maaɗa, omndaa dammugal, toroɗaa Baabiraawo maaɗa nder suuɗeefi. Ndeen Baabiraawo maaɗa, gi'oowo ko suuɗii no biyete.
40006007	To eɗon mbaɗa do'aare, to' on ɗuɗɗin bolle mehereeje, kama no heeferɓe mbaɗata. Eɓe tammii Allah no toontoto ɓe to ɓe ɗuɗɗinii bolle.
40006008	To' on ngemmin ɓe, gam Baabiraawo mooɗon e anndi ko ngiɗɗon ila on toraaki mo.
40006009	To eɗon mbaɗa do'aare, mbi'ee~: Yaa Baabiraawo amin gonɗo toon dow asama, innde maaɗa seniinde teddinee.
40006010	Laamu maaɗa wara. Ko ngiɗɗaa ɗum waɗee nder duuniyaaru kama noon no ɗum wa'aretee toon dow asama.
40006011	Hokku min nyaamannde heƴeynde min hannde.
40006012	Ya'afana min hakkeeji amin, kama noon no min nja'aforantoo waɗaneyɓe min hakkeeji.
40006013	Ta'a woor min, min ndo''oo nder teppinirgol hakke, ammaa hisnu min e junngo Ganyo. [Gam aan jeyi laamu e baawɗe e manngu fuu faa abadaa. Aamiin.]
40006014	Gam to on nja'afanake waɗanɓe on layfi, Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo toon dow boo no ya'afanto on.
40006015	Ammaa to on nja'afanaaki waɗanɓe on layfi, Baabiraawo mooɗon boo ya'afantaako on hakkeeji mooɗon.
40006016	— To eɗon cuumoo, to' on nyor geese mooɗon kama no munaafuki'en mbaɗata. Kamɓe eɓe nyora geese maɓɓe gam yimɓe annda ɓe suumiiɓe. Emi vi'a on goonga~: ɓe aartii ɓe keɓii laada maɓɓe ɗo'o e duuniyaaru, timmi.
40006017	Ammaa aan, to eɗa suumoo, sulmu yeeso maaɗa, molmitoɗaa nebbam,
40006018	gam to' yimɓe anndu a cuumiiɗo. Baabiraawo maaɗa mo yi'ataake tan anndi. Baabiraawo gi'oowo ko mbaɗɗaa nder suuɗeefi oon no biyete.
40006019	— To' on ndesan ko'e mooɗon jawdi nder duuniyaaru, to mooƴu e puunndi mbonnata ndi, to wuyɓe njevata dammuɗe natta ngujja ndi.
40006020	Ammaa ndesanee ko'e mooɗon jawdi toon dow asama, to mooƴu e puunndi mbonnataa ndi, to wuyɓe boo mbaawataa natta ngujja ndi.
40006021	Gam to jawdi maaɗa woni fuu, toon ɓernde maaɗa wonata.
40006022	— Gite neɗɗo ngoni fitila ɓanndu muuɗum. To gite maaɗa e njamɗi, ɓanndu maaɗa fuu no woney nder jayngol.
40006023	Ammaa to gite maaɗa njamɗaa, ɓanndu maaɗa fuu no woney nder niɓre. To ɗuum ko hokkata ɓanndu maaɗa jayngol laatake niɓre, ndeen kam niɓre ndeen nde niɓɓi~!
40006024	— Walaa baawɗo jagganaago jawmiraaɓe ɗiɗo. Sey nii o wanya go'oto, o yiɗa go'oto, koo boo o mawnina go'oto, o yavoo go'oto. On mbaawataa jagganaago Allah e jawdi nder wakkaci go'otum.
40006025	Gam ma'ajum, emi vi'a on~: to' on ngaanno dow ko nyaamoton, koo ko njaroton, koo ko ɓornotooɗon. Gam yonki ɓurii nyaamdu, ɓanndu boo ɓurii kolte, koo naa noon~?
40006026	Ndaaree colli~: ɗi aawataa, ɗi taƴataa, ɗi ngalaa beembe, ammaa Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo toon dow asama e nyaamna ɗi. Onon, on ɓuraay colli darajja naa~?
40006027	Moye nder mooɗon gam waannaare muuɗum, waawi ɓesdango hoore muuɗum koo valnde wo'ore~?
40006028	To noon, ko jeyi kolte ngaannirta on~? Ndaaree no pihindi ladde mawnirta, ndi huwataa, ndi sanyataa.
40006029	Ammaa emi vi'a on~: koo Suleymaanu nder ɗuuɗal risku muuɗum fuu meeɗaay ɓornaago kolte booɗruɗe kama pihindi.
40006030	To Allah e ɓornira huɗo ladde nihi, taweteeko hannde, jahango ko wulee, ko haɗata o sinngita on faa ko ɓuri noon, onon famɗa goonɗinki'en~!
40006031	Gam ma'ajum, to on ngaanno mbi'on~: Ɗume nyaameten~? koo Ɗume njareten~? koo Ɗume ɓornotooɗen~?
40006032	Ɗum fuu, heeferɓe maa e ngilloo ɗum. Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo toon dow asama e anndi on ngoodi bukaata ku'uje ɗeen fuu.
40006033	Ammaa aartee yillaago laamu Allah e aadilaaku muuɗum tawo, ndeen o hokkey on ko horii fuu.
40006034	Gam ma'ajum, to' on ngaanno dow jahango, gam jahango no waannoto dow hoore muuɗum. Nyanndeere fuu, torra muuɗum e heƴi ɗum.
40007001	— To' on njowan woɓɓe layfi, cernanon ɓe, gam to' Allah sernan on.
40007002	Gam noon no cerniranɗon woɓɓe, noon Allah boo serniranta on. Kadimaa e etergel ngel etranɗon woɓɓe, e ma'agel ɗum etranta on.
40007003	Gam ɗume ndaarataa celɓol gonngol nder yitere bannda, ammaa a yi'ataa lekki makki gonki nder yitere maaɗa~?
40007004	Koo boo noye mbi'irataa bannda~: «~Banndam, woor mi ittane celɓol gonngol nder yitere maaɗa~», ammaa aan, lekki makki e nder nde maaɗa~?
40007005	Aan munaafukiijo, aartu ittu lekki gonki nder yitere maaɗa tawo, ndeen a yi'ey booɗɗum, gam keɓa no ittirɗaa celɓol gonngol nder yitere bannda.
40007006	To' on kokku kareeji ku'uje ceniiɗe, gam ɗi co''oo ɗi ŋata on. To' on peran aladeeji kaaƴe mooɗon dime, gam ɗi njaaɓey ɗe.
40007007	— Toree on kokkete, njillee on keɓey, cilminee on omtante.
40007008	Gam toriiɗo fuu no hokkete, jilliiɗo no heɓey, cilminiiɗo boo no omtante.
40007009	Moye nder mooɗon hokkata ɓiyum haayre to o torake ɗum buroodi~?
40007010	Koo boo to o torake ɗum liyngu, ndeen hokka mo mbo'odi~?
40007011	Onon maa halluɓe eɗon anndi no kokkirton ɓiɓɓe mooɗon ku'uje booɗɗe, hakko Baabiraawo mooɗon mo dow. O ɓurataa hokkugo toriiɗo mo fuu ku'uje booɗɗe naa~?
40007012	Mbaɗanee yimɓe ko ngiɗɗon ɓe mbaɗana on, gam kanjum woni ekkitinol Tawreeta Muusa e defte annabo'en.
40007013	— Nattiree dammugal paaɗngal~! Gam dammugal aaftiingal ɗum dammugal yahago halkere. Tokkugo laawol ma'agal boo e hoyi, tokkuɓe ngol e ɗuuɗi.
40007014	Ammaa dammugal yahago yonki e faaɗi. Tokkugo laawol ma'agal boo e saɗi, heɓteyɓe ngol no seɗɗa'en.
40007015	— Kakkilee e annabo'en fevooɓe warooɓe to mooɗon e nanndi e baali, ammaa nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɓe cayaakiije beelaaɗe.
40007016	On annditirey ɓe gada e kuuɗe maɓɓe, noon no lekki annditirtee gada e ɓiɓɓe muuɗum. Cilluki rimataa innabooje, jaaɓi boo rimataa tanne.
40007017	Lekki booɗki no rimey ɓikkon mbooɗkon, lekki ki vooɗaa boo no rimey ɓikkon kon mbooɗaa.
40007018	Noon boo, lekki booɗki rimataa ɓikkon kon mbooɗaa, lekki ki vooɗaa boo rimataa ɓikkon mbooɗkon.
40007019	Lekki ki rimataa ɓikkon mbooɗkon fuu no fe''ete feree nder yiite.
40007020	Noon boo annditirton annabo'en fevooɓe gada e kuuɗe maɓɓe.
40007021	— Wanaa vi'ooɓe yam~: «~Jawmiraawo, Jawmiraawo~» fuu nattata laamu Allah, sey waɗooɓe ko Baaba am gonɗo toon dow asama yiɗi.
40007022	Nyannde-darngal, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe no mbi'ey~: «~Jawmiraawo, Jawmiraawo~! Min nga'ajinii e innde maaɗa~! Min laggirii ginnaaji e innde maaɗa~! Min kuwii alaamaaji kaayniiɗi e innde maaɗa~!~»
40007023	Ndeen mi vi'a ɓe~: «~Mi anndaa on sam. Ndillanee yam ɗo'o, onon halluɓe~!~»
40007024	— Gam ma'ajum, neɗɗo fuu nanɗo ɗe'e bolle am tokki ɗe, o nanndii e neɗɗo ƴoyɗo mahaɗo wuro muuɗum dow haayre.
40007025	Nde iyoonde toɓi, geebeeji ngaddoyi ndiyam, keni cemmbiɗɗi mbisi piyi ngo, ammaa e noon fuu ngo yibbaay, gam ngo mahaama dow haayre.
40007026	Ammaa neɗɗo fuu nanɗo bolle am tokkaay ɗe, e nanndi e mo walaa ƴoyre, mahaɗo wuro muuɗum dow njaareendi.
40007027	Nde iyoonde toɓi, geebeeji ngaddoyi ndiyam, keni cemmbiɗɗi mbisi piyi ngo, sey ngo yibbi, ngo sankitii ngo fuu.
40007028	Nde Yeesu yottini ka vi'ata, yimɓe fuu kaayɗini e ekkitinol ma'ako,
40007029	gam o ekkitinii ɓe e baawɗe, wanaa kama no moodiɓɓe Tawreeta ekkitinirta.
40008001	Nde Yeesu jippii vaamnde, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe tokki mo.
40008002	Sey goɗɗo mo kuturta wari diccii yeeso ma'ako, vi'i~: — Moodibbo, to a jaɓii, a waawi yamɗitingo yam.
40008003	Yeesu foorti junngo muuɗum, meemi mo vi'i~: — Mi jaɓii, yamɗit~! Ɗoon e ɗoon, gorko oon yamɗiti gada e kuturta muuɗum.
40008004	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Yewa booɗɗum~! Ta'a yecco koo moye ko waɗi, ammaa yah hollu hoore maaɗa to aardiiɗo diina, mbaɗaa sadaka ka Muusa vi'inoo, gam anndinaa yimɓe a yamɗitii.
40008005	Nde Yeesu natti si'ire Kafarnahum, sey mawɗo soojeeji Rooma wari to ma'ako, torii mo, vi'i~:
40008006	— Moodibbo, kuwoowo am e toon waalii wuro, o waawataa koo dimmbaago, o torriiɗo korey~!
40008007	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Mi yahey mi yamɗitina mo.
40008008	Ammaa mawɗo soojeeji oon toontii mo, vi'i~: — Moodibbo, miin mi fotaay njahaa wuro am, ammaa volvu tan, kuwoowo am no yamɗitey.
40008009	Miin e hoore am e woodi darvanooɓe yam, emi woodi boo ɓe ndarvaneymi. To mi vi'ii goɗɗo maɓɓe yaha, o yahey, to mi vi'ii goɗɗo boo wara, o warey, to mi vi'ii maccuɗo am waɗ ɗu'um, o waɗey.
40008010	Nde Yeesu nani ko o vi'i, ɗum haaynake ɗum korey, sey o vi'i tokkuɓe mo~: — Emi vi'a on goonga~: koo nder Isiraa'iila'en mi meeɗaay yi'igo goonɗinki iri ki o'o neɗɗo.
40008011	Emi vi'a on, ɗuuɗɓe woonɓe goonɗinki iri ki o'o neɗɗo no ngarey gada fu'una e hiirna, ɓe njooɗodoo e Ibraahim e Iciyaaku e Yaakuubu, ɓe nyaamda nder laamu Allah.
40008012	Ammaa ɓiɓɓe Laamu no mburtinte peree nder niɓre ɓaleere kurum, to ɗum voyata, e ɗum nyerƴindira nyiiƴe.
40008013	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o vi'i mawɗo soojeeji oon~: — Hoot wuro maaɗa~! Ɗum laatorano maa kama noon no ngoonɗinirɗaa. Ɗoon e ɗoon, kuwaneyɗo mawɗo soojeeji oon yamɗiti.
40008014	Yeesu yahi wuro Biiturus, o tawi esoo Biiturus debbo e waalii no jontaaɗo.
40008015	Yeesu meemi junngo ma'ako. Ɗoon e ɗoon yontere ndeen yoofi mo, o ummii o veerni ɓe.
40008016	Nde hiiri, Yeesu waddanaa yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɓe ginnaaji. Yeesu vurtiniri ginnaaji gonɗi nder maɓɓe e voliinde muuɗum tan, o yamɗitini nyawɓe fuu.
40008017	O waɗii noon gam ɗum hebbina ko Allah vi'inoo gada e annabi Ecaaya, nde o vi'i~: O ittii nyawuuji meeɗen, o yamɗitinii en.
40008018	Nde Yeesu yi'i yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe e pilii ɗum, o vi'i almaajiri'en ma'ako~: — Punngitemma yahago fonngo maayo gaɗawo.
40008019	Sey goɗɗo moodibbo Tawreeta wari to ma'ako, vi'i mo~: — Moodibbo, mi tokkete to njahataa fuu.
40008020	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Dilaaji e ngoodi gasɗe, colli boo e ngoodi caɓɓe, ammaa Ɓii-Neɗɗo walaa koo to wallinta hoore muuɗum foofta.
40008021	Goɗɗo gada nder tokkuɓe mo vi'i~: — Moodibbo, woor mi yaha mi uvoya baaba am tawo.
40008022	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Tokkam, woor maayɓe uva maayɓe mu''en.
40008023	Yeesu natti akali ndiyam, almaajiri'en ma'ako tokki mo.
40008024	Sey iyoonde e henndu semmbiɗndu ummii dow maayo manngo, faa ɓoggi ndiyam mbaɗi ga falkitgo e semmbee e natta nder akali kiin. Yeesu boo e ɗaani.
40008025	Almaajiri'en ɓaditii, pindini mo, mbi'i~: — Moodibbo, hisnu en~! En ɓadake halkugo~!
40008026	O toontii ɓe, o vi'i~: — Gam ɗume kultorton, onon famɗa goonɗinki'en~? Ndeen o ummii, o falmani henndu e ɓoggi ndiyam. Sey koo ɗume fuu de''iti~!
40008027	Ɗum haaynii almaajiri'en ɓeen, ɓe mbi'i~: — O'o ɗum iri moye neɗɗo, mo faa e henndu e maayo ɗowtantoo ɗum~?
40008028	Nde Yeesu yottii fonngo maayo lesdi Garaasankoo'en, worɓe ɗiɗo ɓe ginnaaji mburtii nder genaale taɓɓii mo. Ɓe laatake hulniiɓe korey, faa walaa baawɗo tokkugo laawol ngool, gam kulol maɓɓe.
40008029	Ɓe ngulli, ɓe mbi'i~: — Yeesu Ɓiɗɗo Allah, ɗume hawti en~? A warii torrugo min ila wakkaci waɗaay naa~?
40008030	Faro ɗoon e woodi sefre aladeeji ɗuuɗɗi e dura.
40008031	Ginnaaji ɗiin torii mo mbi'i~: — To a laggii min, woor min, min natta nder aladeeji ɗin ɗaa'e.
40008032	Yeesu vi'i ginnaaji ɗiin~: — Njahee~! Ɗi mburtii nder yimɓe ɓeen, ɗi natti nder aladeeji. Ɗoon e ɗoon, sefre ndeen fuu riggii, moortii vaamnde, yoolii nder maayo, ngo moɗi ɗi.
40008033	Waynaaɓe aladeeji ɗiin nyaari kooti si'ire, ngeccii yimɓe ko waɗi, faa e ko laatanii ɓeen woonnooɓe ginnaaji.
40008034	Sey yimɓe si'ire ndeen fuu mburtii taɓɓii Yeesu. Nde ɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe torii mo o vurtanoo ɓe lesdi.
40009001	Yeesu natti akali, funngiti maayo, hooti si'ire muuɗum.
40009002	Sey woɓɓe ngaddani mo goɗɗo buusaaɗo, emo wallinaa dow be'itum ma'ako. Nde Yeesu yi'i goonɗinki yimɓe ɓeen, o vi'i buusaaɗo oon~: — Ɓinngel am, tiɗɗin ɓernde maaɗa~! Hakkeeji maaɗa nja'afaama~!
40009003	Nde woɓɓe moodiɓɓe Tawreeta nani ɗum, ɓe nyumi nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe~: — O'o gorko o moye, potneyɗo hoore muuɗum e Allah~!
40009004	Ammaa Yeesu e anndi nyumooji maɓɓe, sey o vi'i ɓe~: — Gam ɗume nyumoton ɗi'i nyumooji kalluɗi nder ɓerɗe mooɗon~?
40009005	Ɗume ɓuri hoygo, vi'igo~: «~Hakkeeji maaɗa nja'afaama~» na vi'igo~: «~Umma dillu~»~?
40009006	Ammaa gam anndon Ɓii-Neɗɗo e woodi baawɗe ya'afaago hakkeeji nder duuniyaaru. Sey o vi'i buusaaɗo oon~: — Umma hooy be'itum maaɗa hoot~!
40009007	Ɗoon e ɗoon gorko oon ummii hooti.
40009008	Nde jama'aare yi'i ɗum, ɓe kuli, ɓe maalti Allah, gam o hokkii ɓiɓɓe-aadama iri ɗe'e baawɗe.
40009009	Nde Yeesu ɓesdi yahago yeeso, o yi'i goɗɗo gorko jaɓoowo janngal bi'eteeɗo Matta, e jooɗii nder suudu to jaɓata janngal. Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Tokkam. Sey Matta ummii tokki mo.
40009010	Ɓaawo ɗoon, Yeesu yahi wuro Matta jooɗii e nyaama nyaamdu. Jaɓooɓe janngal ɗuuɗɓe e waɗooɓe hakke ngari njooɗii e nyaamda e ma'ako, kanko e almaajiri'en ma'ako.
40009011	Nde Fariisa'en ngi'i ɗum, sey ɓe mbi'i almaajiri'en ma'ako~: — Ko jeyi moodibbo mooɗon nyaamdata e jaɓooɓe janngal e waɗooɓe hakke~?
40009012	Nde Yeesu nani ka, o vi'i ɓe~: — Yamɓe ngalaa bukaata nyawtoowo, sey nyawɓe.
40009013	Njillee pahamon ko saawi nder nde'e voliinde~: «~ Yurmeende ngiɗmi, wanaa kirseteeɗi.~» Mi waraay noddugo tammiiɓe no goonga'en, ammaa mi warii noddugo annduɓe no hakke'en.
40009014	Wakkaci ɗuum, almaajiri'en Yahayya ngari to Yeesu, ƴami mo mbi'i~: — Ko jeyi minon e Fariisa'en emin cuumoo, ammaa almaajiri'en maaɗa cuumataako~?
40009015	O toontii ɓe, o vi'i~: — Koo on tammii ma'atinaaɓe koobgal no naney mettuɗum wakkaci kooviiɗo wondi e maɓɓe naa~? Ammaa wakkaci no warey nde kooviiɗo oon hooƴetee nder maɓɓe. Wakkaci ɗuum, ɓe cuumoto.
40009016	Walaa pitreyɗo koltal kihingal e lefel kesel, gam lefel kesel ngeel no seekey koltal kihingal, ceekol ngool boo no ɓurey aranol.
40009017	Noon boo, walaa looveyɗo innaboojam kesam nder saaɗkiwu kihingu. To o waɗii noon, innaboojam ɗaam no seekey saaɗkiwu nguun, ɗam rufa, saaɗkiwu nguun boo no boney. Gam ma'ajum, sey innaboojam kesam loovee nder saaɗkiwu kesu, ndeen walaa ko bonata.
40009018	Yeesu e nder volididgo e maɓɓe, sey goɗɗo mawɗo Yahuudu'en wari diccii yeeso ma'ako, vi'i~: — Ɓinngel am dewel maayi jo'oni-jo'oni. Ammaa war yow junngo maaɗa dow ma'agel, ngel finta.
40009019	Yeesu ummodii e almaajiri'en muuɗum, ɓe njahadi e mawɗo oon.
40009020	Ila eɓe dow laawol, sey raa goɗɗo debbo baɗɗo duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi lohonol muuɗum taƴaay. Debbo oon ivoyi ɓaawo Yeesu, o meemi belloogal toggoore muuɗum.
40009021	Gam o nyumii nder ɓernde ma'ako~: — To mi heɓii mi meemii koo belloogal toggoore ma'ako tan, mi yamɗitey.
40009022	Yeesu yeeƴii yi'i debbo oon, vi'i mo~: — Banndam debbo, tiɗɗin ɓernde maaɗa~! Goonɗinki maaɗa yamɗitinii ma. Ɗoon e ɗoon debbo oon yamɗiti.
40009023	Nde Yeesu yottii wuro mawɗo Yahuudu'en oon, o tawii duudanooɓe maayde, e jama'aare e ndoondii juuɗe mboya,
40009024	sey o vi'i ɓe~: — Ummee mburtee ɗo'o, gam surbayel ngeel maayaay, ngel ɗaani tan. Sey ɓe njali mo jalniiɗum yavaare.
40009025	Nde o vurtini yimɓe fuu yaasi, o natti nder suudu, o nanngi junngo surbayel ngeel, ngel ummi.
40009026	Habaru ma'ajum sankitii koo toye nder lesdi ndiin fuu.
40009027	Yeesu e ƴaɓɓoo, sey woɓɓe vumɓe ɗiɗo tokki mo e nodda e semmbee e mbi'a~: — Yeesu ɓii-Dawda, nan jurumɗum amin~!
40009028	Nde Yeesu natti wuro, sey vumɓe ɓeen ngari to ma'ako. O vi'i ɓe~: — On ngoonɗinii emi waawi vumtingo on naa~? Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Moodibbo, min ngoonɗinii.
40009029	Ndeen o meemi gite maɓɓe, o vi'i~: — Ɗum laatoranoo on noon no ngoonɗinirɗon.
40009030	Ɗoon e ɗoon ɓe mbumti. Sey Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — To' on njaɓ vi'igo ka goɗɗo.
40009031	Ammaa nde ɓe mburtii, ɓe cankitii habaru ma'ako koo toye nder lesdi ndiin fuu.
40009032	Nde vumtinaaɓe ɓeen mburtii, Yeesu waddanaama goɗɗo mo waawataa volvugo, gam emo woodi ginnol.
40009033	Yeesu vurtini ginnol ngool, sey kurmaajo oon fuɗɗi volvugo. Jama'aare haayɗini, mbi'i~: — Iri ɗu'um meeɗaay yi'eego nder lesdi Isiraa'iila abadaa~!
40009034	Ammaa Fariisa'en mbi'i~: — Mawɗo ginnaaji kam hokki mo baawɗe vurtingo ginnaaji ɗiin~!
40009035	Yeesu yiilake nder ci'e e jaaje fuu, emo wa'ajina nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi Yahuudu'en, emo anndina Habaru Belɗum ɗum laamu Allah, emo yamɗitina koo iri nguye nyawu e liddaari.
40009036	Nde o yi'i jama'aare hawritii, sey o nani jurumɗum maɓɓe, gam ɓe tampuɓe, ɓilliiɓe kama baali ɗi ngalaa gaynaako.
40009037	Sey o vi'i almaajiri'en ma'ako~: — Ko taƴetee e ɗuuɗi, ammaa taƴooɓe ɗuuɗaa.
40009038	Gam ma'ajum, toree Jawmu ko taƴetee oon liloya taƴooɓe nder ma'ajum.
40010001	Yeesu noddi almaajiri'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo, o hokki ɓe baawɗe vurtingo ginnaaji e yamɗitingo koo iri nguye nyawu e liddaari.
40010002	Raa inɗe almaajiri'en sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen~: arano maɓɓe ɗum Simon noddirteeɗo Biiturus, e minyum Anndaraawus, e Yaakuubu ɓii Jabadi, e minyum Yahayya,
40010003	e Filibus, e Bartalamaawus, e Tooma, e Matta jaɓoowo ceede janngal, e Yaakuubu ɓii Alfaa, e Taddiyus,
40010004	e Simon kaɓaneyɗo rimɗingo lenyol muuɗum, e Yahuuda Iskariyooti nyaameyɗo amaana Yeesu.
40010005	Yeesu lili sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, o vi'i ɓe~: — To' on njah to yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, to' on nattu ci'e Samaariya boo.
40010006	Ammaa njahee to Isiraa'iila'en nannduɓe e baali kalkuɗi.
40010007	To njahaɗon fuu, nga'ajinee ɓe mbi'on~: «~Laamu Allah ɓadake~!~»
40010008	Njamɗitinee ɓe njamɗaa, ummitinee maayɓe, njamɗitinee ɓe kuturta, mburtinanee yimɓe ginnaaji. Caahu kokkaaɗon, kokkee caahu.
40010009	To' on kooy jiinaariya, koo ajurfaari, koo ceede nder jiibaaji mooɗon.
40010010	To' koo moye mooɗon hooy jikaare koo toggooje ɗiɗi koo paɗe ɗiɗi koo sawru, gam kuwoowo fotii heɓgo nyaamdu muuɗum.
40010011	To on ngarii si'ire koo wuro, ndaaree jaɓɗo veernugo on, mbeeron wuro ma'ako faa nde ndilluɗon.
40010012	To on ngarii nattugo wuro, cilminee, mbi'on~: «~Jam wondu e mooɗon.~»
40010013	To wuro ngoon jaɓɓake on, jam mooɗon no laatoto dow maɓɓe. Ammaa to ɓe njaɓɓaaki on, jam mooɗon no so''oyto to mooɗon.
40010014	To wonɓe si'ire ndeen koo wuro ngoon njaɓɓaaki on, koo calii yewanaago ka mbiiɗon, mburtee si'ire ndeen koo wuro ngoon, piɗɗon faa e sollaare kosɗe mooɗon.
40010015	Emi vi'a on goonga~: nyannde-darngal, ceri'a si'ire ndeen no ɓurey ka Sodoma e Gomora naawgo.
40010016	— Ngewee nanon~! Mi lilii on kama baali nder cayaakiije. Gam ma'ajum, sey laatooɗon hakkilɓe kama bo'ole, e ɓe ngalaa layfi kama pooli.
40010017	Kakkilee e yimɓe, gam ɓe njaharey on yeeso sernooɓe, ɓe piyey on nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi maɓɓe.
40010018	Ɓe njaharey on yeeso mawɓe lesdi e laamiiɓe sabu am, gam faa caaydanooɗon yam yeeso maɓɓe e yeeso ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en.
40010019	To ɓe njaharii on yeeso sernooɓe, to' on ngaanno dow ko mbi'oton, gam wakkaci ɗuum Allah no hokkey on ka mbi'oton.
40010020	Ka mbi'oton kaan ivataa nder mooɗon, ammaa Ruhu Baabiraawo mooɗon kam volvata nder konnduɗe mooɗon.
40010021	Banndiraawo no hokkitirey banndum gam waree, baaba boo no hokkitirey ɓiyum kama noon. Ɓiɓɓe no ummanto danyooɓe mu''en faa mbaɗa ɓe mbaree.
40010022	Yimɓe fuu no nganyey on gam am. Ammaa munyɗo faa timmoode no hisnete.
40010023	To on torraama nder woɗnde si'ire, nyaardee si'ire feere. Emi vi'a on goonga~: ko hokka ngiilodooɗon nder ci'e Isiraa'iila fuu Ɓii-Neɗɗo no vittoyey.
40010024	Janngoowo ɓurataa moodibbo muuɗum manngu, maccuɗo boo ɓurataa jawmu wuro muuɗum.
40010025	Ɗum belɗum to janngoowo laatake kama moodibbo muuɗum, maccuɗo boo kama jawmu wuro muuɗum. To ɓe noddirii jawmu wuro Ba'aljabul, ndeen noye ɓe noddirta ɓiɓɓe ma'ako~?
40010026	— Gam ma'ajum, to' on kul yimɓe, sabu ko suuɗii fuu no suuɗtoto, sirrijum boo no anndete.
40010027	Ko mbi'imi on nder niɓre, mbannginee ɗum nder jayngol. Ko metanaaɗon e noppi, anndinee ɗum dow ƴellel gure.
40010028	To' on kul baawɗo wargo ɓanndu neɗɗo, ammaa o waawataa wargo yonki muuɗum. Sey nii kulon Allah baawɗo halkugo ɓanndu e yonki fuu nder yiite jahannama.
40010029	Naa e ɗum soorra colon ɗiɗon hoboore wo'ore naa~? Ammaa koo go'otel ma'akon waatataa, sey e anndaangal Baabiraawo mooɗon.
40010030	Onon faa e gaasa ko'e mooɗon no limaaka.
40010031	Gam ma'ajum, to' on kul, sabu on ɓurii colli ɗuuɗɗi darajja.
40010032	Koo moye jaɓi yam yeeso yimɓe, miin boo mi jaɓey mo yeeso Baaba am gonɗo toon dow asama.
40010033	Ammaa koo moye vi'i anndaa yam yeeso yimɓe, miin boo mi vi'ey mi anndaa mo yeeso Baaba am gonɗo toon dow asama.
40010034	— To' on tammo jo'onde jam ngaddumi nder duuniyaaru. Wanaa jo'onde jam ngaddumi, ammaa haɓre.
40010035	Mi warii gam mi sennda ɓiɗɗo gorko e baaba muuɗum, ɓiɗɗo debbo boo e inna muuɗum, mi sennda debbo e esum debbo.
40010036	Rimdaaɓe neɗɗo no laatoto wanywanyɓe ma'ako.
40010037	Ɓurɗo yiɗgo inna muuɗum koo baaba muuɗum dow e am, fotaay laataago almaajiriijo am. Noon boo, ɓurɗo yiɗgo ɓiyum gorko koo debbo dow e am, fotaay laataago almaajiriijo am.
40010038	Mo wanyaay hoore muuɗum, vakkii gaafagal muuɗum tokki yam fuu, fotaay laataago almaajiriijo am.
40010039	Giɗɗo hisnugo yonki muuɗum fuu, no dulley ki. Ammaa dulluɗo yonki muuɗum gam am fuu, no hisney ki.
40010040	— Jaɓɓiiɗo on fuu jaɓɓake yam, jaɓɓiiɗo yam boo jaɓɓake liloyɗo yam.
40010041	Koo moye jaɓɓii annabiijo gam o annabiijo, no heɓey laada baka annabiijo oon. Jaɓɓiiɗo goongaajo boo gam o goongaajo, no heɓey laada baka goongaajo oon.
40010042	Emi vi'a on goonga~: koo moye hokki go'oto nder ɓurɓe famɗugo ɓe'e jardugel ndiyam peewɗam gam o almaajiriijo am, o heppataa laada ma'ako.
40011001	Nde Yeesu timmini volvango almaajiri'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo, o ummii ɗoon o yahi wa'ajingo e ekkitingo nder ci'e piliiɗe to ɓadii.
40011002	E wakkaci ɗuum Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma e omndii nder kaso. Nde o nani habaru kuuɗe ɗe Almasiifu waɗata, sey o liloyi almaajiri'en ma'ako to Yeesu
40011003	gam ɓe ƴama mo, ɓe mbi'a~: — Aan woni Almasiifu bi'anooɗo no warey, na min ndeenta goɗɗo~?
40011004	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Njahee ngeccee Yahayya ko ngiiɗon e ko nanɗon~:
40011005	vumɓe e mbumta, voosɓe e njaaɓa, ɓe kuturta e njamɗitinee, fahaɓe e nana, maayɓe e ummitinee, sooyɓe boo e nga'ajinee Habaru Belɗum.
40011006	Barkaa laatanto mo yoofaay goonɗinki muuɗum gam am.
40011007	Nde lilaaɓe Yahayya ndilli, Yeesu fuɗɗi volvango jama'aare habaru Yahayya, o vi'i~: — Ɗume njahaɗon yi'igo toon nder ladde~? Geenol ngol henndu dimmbata naa~?
40011008	Too, ɗume njahaɗon yi'oygo~? Neɗɗo ɓorniiɗo kolte booɗɗe naa~? Ammaa ɓornotooɓe kolte booɗɗe nder laamoorde tawetee.
40011009	To noon, ɗume ndaaroyɗon~? Annabiijo naa~? Emi vi'a on goonga~: o ɓurii annabiijo.
40011010	Kanko woni mo Allah volvi dow muuɗum nder Deftere Seniinde, o vi'i~: Rah, mi liloyey lilaaɗo am yeeso maaɗa, o vo''inan maa laawol.
40011011	Emi vi'a on goonga~: nder ɓiɓɓe-aadama ɗum meeɗaay danygo ɓurɗo Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma manngu. Ammaa e noon fuu, ɓurɗo famɗugo nder laamu Allah ɓurii mo manngu.
40011012	Gada ko Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma fuɗɗi wa'ajingo faa wargo hannde, laamu Allah e yaha yeeso nder caɗeele, wanywanyɓe ma'agu e ngiɗi te'etugo ngu e semmbee.
40011013	Ko hokka Yahayya wara, Tawreeta Muusa e defte annabo'en fuu mbaɗii annabaaku dow laamu nguun.
40011014	To on njaɓii ko ɓe mbi'i, Yahayya kam woni Iliya mo Deftere anndinnoo garol muuɗum ilaa.
40011015	Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana~!
40011016	E ɗume nanndineymi yimɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru~? Eɓe nanndi e ɓikkon njooɗiikon nder luumo, noddeykon higooɓe mu''en e mbi'a~:
40011017	«~Min nduudanii on duudaali, on ngamaay, min ngimanii on gimi jurminiiɗi, on mboyaay.~»
40011018	Yahayya warii nyaamataa goɗɗi nyaamduuji, o yarataa innaboojam, yimɓe mbi'ii o kaaŋaaɗo.
40011019	Ɓii-Neɗɗo boo warii e nyaama e yara, yimɓe mbi'ii~: «~Cutee o'o nyaamtaro, jaroowo, higoo jaɓooɓe janngal e waɗooɓe hakke~!~» Ammaa hikima Allah e vanngina goonga nder kuuɗe muuɗum.
40011020	Ndeen Yeesu fuɗɗi felgo ci'e ɗe o ɓuri huugo kuuɗe kaayniiɗe nder mu''en, gam yimɓe ci'e ɗeen tuubaay. O vi'i~:
40011021	— On bonii, onon yimɓe Korasin~! On bonii, onon yimɓe Baytisayda~! Gam to kuuɗe kaayniiɗe kuwanooɗe nder mooɗon no kuwano nder ci'e Tiir e Sidon, daa jooɗiiɓe toon no ɓornoto buhuuji, ɓe ndufa ndo'oka dow ko'e maɓɓe gam hollugo ɓe tuubi.
40011022	Gam ma'ajum, emi vi'a on~: nyannde-darngal, ceri'a mooɗon no ɓurey ka yimɓe Tiir e Sidon naawgo.
40011023	Onon boo yimɓe si'ire Kafarnahum, on tammii on ɓantete dow naa~? Ayyaa, naa noon sam~! On leestinte lees, nder jooɗorde maayɓe. Gam kul kuuɗe kaayniiɗe kuwanooɗe nder mooɗon no kuwano nde Sodoma, daa si'ire ndeen no taweteno e woodi faa hannde.
40011024	Gam ma'ajum, emi vi'a on~: nyannde-darngal ceri'a mooɗon no ɓurey ka yimɓe Sodoma naawgo.
40011025	Wakkaci ɗuum, Yeesu vi'i~: — Yaa Baabiraawo, Jawmu dow e lees, mi yettii ma, gam a vannginanii ɓikkon pamaron ko cuuɗɗaa woonɓe anndal e fahamu.
40011026	Ee Baabiraawo, a waɗii ɗum gam kanjum vel maa.
40011027	Baaba am waɗii koo ɗume fuu nder junngo am. Walaa annduɗo Ɓiɗɗo to naa Baabiraawo, walaa annduɗo Baabiraawo boo to naa Ɓiɗɗo, e oon mo Ɓiɗɗo yiɗi vannginango ɗum.
40011028	Ngaree to am, onon somɓe, roondiiɓe dowle tedduɗe, mi fooftina on.
40011029	Nanee ko mbi'eymi on, ekkitee to am, gam mi belɗo jo'onde, mi leestinɗo hoore. Yonkiiji mooɗon boo no pooftey.
40011030	Ɗuum ko mbi'imi on mbaɗon, ɗum saɗaa waɗaago, ko ndoondeymi on boo teddantaa on.
40012001	Nyannde-fooftiinde feere, Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum ndaacii nder gese alkamaari. Almaajiri'en ma'ako e nana dolo, sey ɓe puɗɗi ɓorgo butaali eɓe murjoo eɓe ƴakka.
40012002	Ammaa nde Fariisa'en ngi'i ɗum, ɓe mbi'i Yeesu~: — A yi'ii, almaajiri'en maaɗa e mbaɗa ko haɗaa waɗeego nyannde-fooftiinde~!
40012003	O toontii ɓe, o vi'i~: — On njanngaay ko Dawda waɗi nde o nani dolo, kanko e yahadiɗɗaaɓe ma'ako naa~?
40012004	O natti Wuro Allah Seniingo, kanko e yahadiɗɗaaɓe ma'ako, ɓe nyaami buroodi desanaaɗum Allah, ɗum neɗɗo fuu hokkaaka laawol nyaamgo, sey aardiiɓe diina tan.
40012005	Nakay on njanngaay nder Tawreeta Muusa, no aardiiɓe diina kuurata nder Wuro Allah Seniingo, faa e nyannde-fooftiinde. Koo nde eɓe kuulta dooka nyannde-fooftiinde ndeen, e noon fuu ɗum laatanaaki ɓe feloore.
40012006	Emi vi'a on~: raa ɓurɗo Wuro Allah Seniingo teddungal ɗo'o.
40012007	To on pahamuno ma'ana nde'e voliinde vi'inde~: «~Yurmeende ngiɗmi, wanaa kirseteeɗi~», daa on layfataano yimɓe ɓe ngalaa layfi.
40012008	Gam Ɓii-Neɗɗo woni jawmu nyannde-fooftiinde.
40012009	Yeesu dilli ɗoon yahi natti suudu-wa'ajordu Yahuudu'en.
40012010	Nder suudu-wa'ajordu nduun e woodi goɗɗo gorko mo junngo muuɗum waati. Wonɓe ɗoon ƴami Yeesu, ɓe mbi'i~: — Koo Tawreeta meeɗen hokkii en yamɗitingo goɗɗo nyannde-fooftiinde naa~? Ɓe ƴamii mo ƴamƴamre ndeen gam ɓe keɓa ko ɓe ngullorii mo.
40012011	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — To goɗɗo nder mooɗon e woodi mbaalu ngo'otu, ndeen ngu yoolake nder waawru nyannde-fooftiinde, o yahataa o vurtina ngu naa~?
40012012	Daahir neɗɗo ɓurii mbaalu darajja to woɗɗi~! Gam ma'ajum, huwango neɗɗo ko vooɗi nyannde-fooftiinde haɗaaka.
40012013	Ndeen o vi'i gorko oon~: — Foortu junngo maaɗa. O foorti ngo, ngo yamɗiti kama ngoon yamo.
40012014	Sey Fariisa'en ɓeen mburtii, ndarvi no mbardata Yeesu.
40012015	Nde Yeesu annditi dabaree maɓɓe, o ɗali yaayre ndeen, o dilli. Sey jama'aare tokki mo, o yamɗitini nyawɓe maɓɓe fuu.
40012016	Ammaa o vaggini ɓe o vi'i, to' ɓe njaɓ yeccaago koo moye habaru ma'ako.
40012017	Ɗum ɗoon fuu waɗii gam ɗum hebbina ko annabi Ecaaya vi'i, nde o vi'inoo~:
40012018	Raa kuwoowo am giɗaaɗo, mo cuɓmi. Emi nana belɗum ma'ako korey. Mi hebbiney mo Ruhu am, o anndiney leƴƴi duuniyaaru habaru aadilaaku.
40012019	O jokkirtaake, o ɗemɗataa, voliinde ma'ako nanataake dow ɗate.
40012020	O yevataa ƴommbel baggel, o nyifataa pe'etel yiite, gam faa o waɗa aadilaaku heɓa jaalorgal dow halleende.
40012021	Leƴƴi duuniyaaru boo, no ndesey tammunde mu''en dow innde ma'ako.
40012022	Sey ɗum waddani Yeesu goɗɗo mo ginnol vumni fahaɗini. Yeesu yamɗitini mo, faa o hooti e volvugo e yi'igo.
40012023	Ɗum haaynii yimɓe fuu, ɓe mbi'i~: — Woy, o'o naa kam woni ɓii-Dawda naa~?
40012024	Ammaa nde Fariisa'en nani ɗum, ɓe mbi'i~: — O'o neɗɗo e baawɗe Ba'aljabul mawɗo ginnaaji o vurtinirta ginnaaji ɗiin.
40012025	Yeesu e anndi nyumooji maɓɓe, gam ma'ajum o vi'i ɓe~: — Laamu fuu sennditii e haɓa hakkunde muuɗum ngu do''oto. Noon boo, si'ire koo wuro ngo yimɓe muuɗum narraay hakkunde mu''en fuu, no sankitoto.
40012026	To Ceyɗaan e vurtina Ceyɗaan, ndeen o senndake nde ɗiɗi, emo hona hoore ma'ako. To o waɗii noon, noye laamu ma'ako darorto~?
40012027	On mbi'ii e baawɗe Ba'aljabul laamiiɗo ginnaaji mburtinireymi ginnaaji. To ɗum laatake noon, tokkuɓe on e baawɗe moye mburtinirta ɗi~? Gam ma'ajum ɓe laatoto sernaneyɓe on dow ma'ajum~!
40012028	Ammaa miin, to e baawɗe Ruhu Allah mburtinireymi ginnaaji, ndeen e ɗum holla laamu Allah warii to mooɗon.
40012029	Yeesu ɓesdi vi'igo~: — Walaa baawɗo nattugo wuro neɗɗo cemmbiɗɗo te'eta jawdi ma'ako, to naa o aarti o haɓɓi mo tawo. Ammaa to o aartii o haɓɓii mo, ndeen emo waawi hooygo ko woni nder wuro ma'ako fuu.
40012030	Mo waldaa e am fuu, no ganyo am. Mo vallaay yam hawritgo fuu, no cankitoowo.
40012031	Gam ma'ajum, emi vi'a on~: yimɓe e mbaawi ya'afaneego hakkeeji e haalaaji yavaare ɗi mbolvi dow Allah fuu, ammaa bolvuɗo haala yavaare dow Ruhu Ceniiɗo ya'afantaake sam.
40012032	Koo moye huɗi Ɓii-Neɗɗo no heɓey ya'afaneego, ammaa kuɗɗo Ruhu Ceniiɗo fuu ya'afantaake, gada e duuniyaaru faa nyannde-darngal.
40012033	— Lekki booɗki no rimey ɓikkon mbooɗkon, lekki ki vooɗaa boo no rimey ɓikkon kon mbooɗaa, gam lekki e annditiree ɓikkon muuɗum.
40012034	Onon ɓiɓɓe bo'ole kalluɗe~! Noye mbaawroton volvugo ko vooɗi, nde laatii on halluɓe~? Gam ko woni nder ɓernde, kanjum vurtotoo e honnduko.
40012035	Neɗɗo mo ɓernde vooɗnde no vurtiney ko vooɗi nder ndesaari muuɗum. Neɗɗo kalluɗo boo, no vurtiney ko halli nder ndesaari ɓernde muuɗum.
40012036	Emi vi'a on~: nyannde-darngal yimɓe no toontanto ko'e mu''en dow e bolle kalluɗe ɗe mbolvunoo fuu.
40012037	Gam dow e bolle maaɗa cernanteɗaa, koo ko mbiiɗaa nanngu ma, koo ɗum vurtin ma.
40012038	Sey woɓɓe nder moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e Fariisa'en mbi'i Yeesu~: — Moodibbo, emin ngiɗi mbaɗanaa min goɗɗum kaayniiɗum, kolleyɗum min Allah liloyi ma.
40012039	O toontii ɓe, o vi'i~: — Yimɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru ɓe halluɓe, ɓe kulataa Allah, eɓe ngiɗi yi'igo kaayniiɗum, ammaa walaa kaayniiɗum ɗum ɓe kolletee, to naa ɗum annabi Yuunaana.
40012040	Gam kama no Yuunaana wa'ari nyalawmaaje tati e jemmaaje tati nder reedu liyngu manngu, noon Ɓii-Neɗɗo wa'arata nyalawmaaje tati e jemmaaje tati nder lesdi.
40012041	Nyannde-darngal, yimɓe Niniwe no ummodoto e yimɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru, ɓe ngulloo ɓe. Gam yimɓe Niniwe tuubii nde nani wa'aji annabi Yuunaana. Raa ɓurɗo Yuunaana manngu ɗo'o~!
40012042	Nyannde-darngal, laamiiɗo debbo mo lesdi foombina no ummanto yimɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru, o wulloo ɓe. Gam gada keerol duuniyaaru o ivoyi, o wari gam o nana bolle Suleymaanu keeɓɗe hikima. Too, raa ɓurɗo Suleymaanu manngu ɗo'o~!
40012043	— To ginnol vurtake neɗɗo, ngol yiiloyto nder jaaje ɗe ngalaa ndiyam, ngol yilloo to ngol foofti. Ammaa kul ngol heɓaay to ngol foofti,
40012044	ndeen ngol vi'ey~: «~Mi vittey suudu ndu mburtoyinoomi.~» To ngol vittii ngol tawii suudu nduun vuuvaama siryaama, walaa gonɗo nder.
40012045	Sey ngol yaha, ngol hooƴoya ginnaaji joveeɗiɗi ɓurɗi ngol hallugo, ɗi natta nder suudu nduun, ɗi njooɗoo. Ndeen timmoode neɗɗo oon no ɓurey fuɗɗoode ma'ako hallugo. Noon ɗum laatantoo yimɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru hallundu.
40012046	Yeesu e nder volidgo e jama'aare, sey inna ma'ako e minyiraaɓe ma'ako worɓe ngarii. Ɓe ndarii yaasi, eɓe ngiɗi volididgo e ma'ako.
40012047	Sey goɗɗo vi'i mo~: — Raa inna maaɗa e minyiraaɓe maaɗa ɗoon ndarii yaasi e ngiɗi yi'igo ma.
40012048	O toontii neɗɗo oon, o vi'i mo~: — Moye woni inna am~? Ɓeye ngoni minyiraaɓe am~?
40012049	O sappii almaajiri'en ma'ako, o vi'i~: — Raa inna am e minyiraaɓe am.
40012050	Gam inna am e minyiraaɓe am worɓe e rewɓe ngoni ɓeen huuɓe ko Baaba am gonɗo toon dow asama yiɗi.
40013001	Nyalaande ndeen Yeesu vurtii wuro, o yahi o jooɗii e fonngo maayo.
40013002	Jama'aare ɗuuɗnde wari hawriti to ma'ako, ndeen o ummii o natti akali ndiyam o jooɗii. Jama'aare ndeen darii e fonngo maayo.
40013003	O volvani ɓe bolle ɗuuɗɗe nder balndi. O vi'i~: — Goɗɗo aawoowo yahi ngesaa gam aawa aawdi.
40013004	Emo saaka aawdi, sey ngoɗndi aawdi yani dow laawol, colli ngari cuɓti ndi.
40013005	Ngoɗndi boo yani nder korokaaƴe to lesdi ɗuuɗaa. Ɗoon e ɗoon ndi fuɗi gam lesdi ndiin luggaa.
40013006	Ammaa nde naange wuli, sey ndi yo'ori gam ndi walaa ɗaɗi.
40013007	Ngoɗndi yani to kebbe puɗata. Ndi fuɗdi e ma'aje ɗe kaɗi ndi mawnugo.
40013008	Ngoɗndi boo yani dow lesdi mbooɗndi, ndi fuɗi ndi waɗi butaali, goɗɗi hemre (100), goɗɗi settiin (60), goɗɗi boo talaatiin (30).
40013009	Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana~!
40013010	Sey almaajiri'en ma'ako ɓaditii mo, mbi'i~: — Gam ɗume ekkitinirtaa yimɓe e balndi~?
40013011	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Onon on kokkaama anndugo sirri laamu Allah, ammaa kamɓe ɓe kokkaaka.
40013012	Gam goonɗo no ɓesdante, faa heytina. Ammaa mo walaa, koo seɗɗa ko woodi maa no jaɓtete ɗum.
40013013	Kanjum waɗi emi ekkitinira ɓe e balndi, gam faa ɓe ndaara, ammaa ɓe ngi'ataa, ɓe ngewoo, ammaa ɓe nanataa ɓe pahamataa.
40013014	Noon ko Allah volvi gada e honnduko annabi Ecaaya tabbitiri nder maɓɓe, nde o vi'i~: On ngewoto faa ngunnyinon noppi, ammaa on pahamataa sam. On ndaarey faa gite mooɗon puttino, ammaa on ngi'ataa sam.
40013015	Gam ɓerɗe yimɓe ngo'ol lenyol njo'orii~: Ɓe cumɓii noppi maɓɓe, ɓe muuɓnii gite maɓɓe, gam to' gite maɓɓe ngi', to' noppi maɓɓe nan, to' ɓerɗe maɓɓe pahamu, faa ɓe tuuba, mi heɓa yamɗitingo ɓe.
40013016	Ammaa onon on barkiɗinaaɓe, gam gite mooɗon e ngi'a, noppi mooɗon boo e nana~!
40013017	Emi vi'a on goonga~: annabo'en e goonga'en ɗuuɗɓe e ngiɗnoo yi'igo ko ngi'oton, ammaa ɓe ngi'aay. Eɓe ngiɗnoo nango ko nanoton, ammaa ɓe nanaay.
40013018	— Too, raa ma'ana balndol dow aawre.
40013019	Aawdi njanndi dow laawol woni nanɗo habaru laamu Allah fahamaay ɗum, Ceyɗaan no warey ɗoofa ko aawaa nder ɓerɗe ma'ako.
40013020	Aawdi njanndi nder korokaaƴe woni nanɗo voliinde Allah, ɗoon e ɗoon o jaɓi nde e velvelo,
40013021	ammaa o woorataa nde, nde waɗa ɗaɗi nder ma'ako, o jogoto nde wakkaci seɗɗa tan. To caɗeele koo torra waranii mo gam ma'are, o yoofey nde jaawɗum.
40013022	Aawdi njanndi nder gi'e woni nanɗo voliinde ndeen, ammaa belɗum duuniyaaru e yiɗde jawdi ɓiɗɗi voliinde ndeen, kaɗi nde waɗgo nafuuda.
40013023	Ammaa aawdi njanndi dow lesdi mbooɗndi woni nanɗo voliinde Allah fahami nde, huutiniri ko nde vi'i, faa o hokki nafri~: goɗɗo hemre-hemre (100-100), goɗɗo settiin-settiin (60-60), goɗɗo boo talaatiin-talaatiin (30-30).
40013024	Yeesu valndani ɓe balndol feere, o vi'i~: — Raa ko laamu Allah nanndi~: ngu nanndii e goɗɗo gorko aawɗo aawdi mbooɗndi nder ngesaa muuɗum.
40013025	Nder jemma, nde koo moye ɗaanii, ganyo ma'ako wari, aawi huɗo halluko nder alkamaari ma'ako, dilli.
40013026	Nde alkamaari ndiin fuɗi, faa fuɗɗi saawtugo, sey huɗo koon boo vanngii.
40013027	Sey maccuɓe njahi mbi'oyi ka jawmu ngesaa, ɓe mbi'i~: «~Jawmu wuro, wanaa aawdi alkamaari aawɗaa nder ngesaa maaɗa naa~? Ee, toye ko'o huɗo ivoyi~?~»
40013028	O toontii ɓe, o vi'i~: «~Ɗum ganyo waɗi ɗum.~» Maccuɓe ƴami mo, mbi'i~: «~A yiɗi min njaha min ɗoofa huɗo koon~?~»
40013029	O toontii ɓe, o vi'i~: «~A'aa, gam to eɗon ɗoofa huɗo koon, to on kakkilaay on ɗoofdey ko e alkamaari.
40013030	Ngooree huɗo koon mawnida e alkamaari faa ƴaava. Ndeen, mi vi'a taƴooɓe aarta ɗoofgo huɗo koon tawo, ɓe kaɓɓa ko ɓe ngula ko. To ɓe mbaɗii ɗum fuu, ndeen ɓe taƴa alkamaari, ɓe mba'ata ndi nder beembal am.~»
40013031	Yeesu valndani ɓe balndol feere, vi'i~: — Laamu Allah e nanndi e gabbel mutardi ngel neɗɗo hooƴi, aawi nder ngesaa muuɗum.
40013032	Kangel ɓuri ngabbon fuu famɗugo, ammaa to ngel fuɗii, ngel laatoto lekki makki korey faa colli ngara nyiɓa caɓɓe mu''en dow licce ma'aki.
40013033	Yeesu valndani ɓe balndol feere, vi'i~: — Laamu Allah nanndii e ƴuufnirɗum seɗɗa ɗum debbo jiiɓi nder conndi alkamaari eterɗe tati, ndi fuu ndi ƴuufi.
40013034	Yeesu ekkitinii ɓe ɗum, ɗum fuu e balndol. O volvanaay ɓe to naa e balndol,
40013035	gam faa ɗum hebbina ko Allah volvunoo gada e annabiijo nde o vi'i~: «~Mi voliraney yimɓe e balndi, mi vannginaney ɓe ku'uje cuuɗinooɗe ila duuniyaaru tagaaka.~»
40013036	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, Yeesu accootiri e jama'aare, o natti wuro. Almaajiri'en ma'ako ɓaditii mo, mbi'i~: — Yecca min ma'ana huɗo nder alkamaari.
40013037	O toontii ɓe, o vi'i~: — Aawɗo alkamaari woni Ɓii-Neɗɗo.
40013038	Ngesaa boo ɗum duuniyaaru. Alkamaari ɗum ɓiɓɓe laamu Allah, huɗo woni ɓiɓɓe Ceyɗaan.
40013039	Ganyo aawɗo huɗo ɗum Ceyɗaan, ƴaavol woni timmoode duuniyaaru, taƴooɓe boo ɗum malaa'ika'en.
40013040	Noon no huɗo ɗoofretee feree nder yiite, noon ɗum laatotoo timmoode duuniyaaru.
40013041	Ɓii-Neɗɗo no liley malaa'ika'en muuɗum, ɓe itta koo ɗume ko waɗata yimɓe e waɗgo hakke e halluɓe fuu nder laamu ma'ako,
40013042	ɓe pera ɓe nder yiite jahannama, to ɗum voyata, e ɗum nyerƴindira nyiiƴe.
40013043	Ammaa wakkaci ɗuum, aadali'en no njaynoto kama naange nder laamu Baabiraawo mu''en. Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana~!
40013044	— Laamu Allah nanndii e jawdi cuuɗiindi nder ngesaa. Nde goɗɗo tawi ndi, o ɓesdi suuɗgo ndi. Nder velvelo ma'ako ngoon o yahi o soorri ko o woodi fuu, o soodi ngesaa kaan.
40013045	Laamu Allah nanndii e goɗɗo mo luumaaku daareyɗo kaaƴe dime.
40013046	Nde o yi'i haayre rimre vooɗnde, o yahi o soorri ko o woodi fuu o soodi nde.
40013047	— Kadin laamu Allah nanndii e nanngirɗum liƴƴi peraaɗum nder maayo, ɗum nanngoyi liƴƴi feere-feere.
40013048	Nde ɗum heevi, ɓe pooɗoyi ɗum e fonngo maayo, ndeen ɓe njooɗii ɓe cenndindiri liƴƴi ɗiin. Ɓe loovi liƴƴi geeti nder compooje maɓɓe, ɓe kibini ɗiin ɗi ngeheɗaa.
40013049	Noon ɗum laatortoo timmoode duuniyaaru. Malaa'ika'en no ngarey cennda halluɓe e aadali'en,
40013050	ɓe pera halluɓe nder yiite jahannama, to ɗum voyata, e ɗum nyerƴindira nyiiƴe.
40013051	Yeesu ƴami almaajiri'en muuɗum, o vi'i~: — On pahamii ko mbi'imi on fuu naa~? Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Ee, min pahami.
40013052	Ndeen o vi'i ɓe~: — Jannginoowo Tawreeta fuu annduɗo laamu Allah, nanndii e jawmu wuro burtinɗo ku'uje kese e ku'uje kihiɗe gada nder ndesaari muuɗum.
40013053	Nde Yeesu heyni ekkitingo ɓe e balndi, o dilli ɗoon,
40013054	o hooti si'ire to o mawni, o fuɗɗi ekkitingo yimɓe nder suudu-wa'ajordu Yahuudu'en. Yimɓe yewaniiɓe mo kaayɗini korey, ɓe mbi'i~: — Toye o heɓi ngu'u fahamu e baawɗe huugo ɗi'i kaayniiɗumji~?
40013055	Wanaa kanko woni ɓii cehoowo naa~? Wanaa Maryaama woni inna ma'ako~? Wanaa Yaakuubu e Yusufu e Simon e Yahuuda ngoni minyiraaɓe ma'ako naa~?
40013056	Wanaa en ngondi e minyiraaɓe ma'ako rewɓe naa~? To noon, toye o heɓi ngu'u fahamu e ɗe'e baawɗe fuu~?
40013057	Kanjum haɗi ɓe goonɗingo mo. Ndeen Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Annabiijo e teddinee to yahi fuu, baanda si'ire muuɗum e wuro muuɗum.
40013058	Ciya goonɗinki maɓɓe haɗi Yeesu huugo kuuɗe kaayniiɗe ɗuuɗɗe nder maɓɓe.
40014001	Wakkaci ɗuum, Hiruudus mawɗo lesdi Gaaliili nanii habaru Yeesu.
40014002	Sey o vi'i maccuɓe ma'ako~: — Ɗum Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma ummitii nder maayde. Kanjum waɗi o heɓi baawɗe huugo kuuɗe kaayniiɗe.
40014003	Hiruudus oon vi'inoo Yahayya nanngee, omndee nder kaso, sabu Hiruudiya koree mawniiko Filibus.
40014004	Gam Yahayya feliino Hiruudus, vi'ii mo~: — Dooka hokkaay ma te'etugo Hiruudiya, koree mawna, koovoɗaa mo.
40014005	Ndeenno maa, Hiruudus e yiɗnoo wargo Yahayya, ammaa emo hula Yahuudu'en, gam ɓe fuu ɓe ngoonɗinii Yahayya no annabiijo.
40014006	Too, nde nyalaande hiimtaago danyeeki Hiruudus yaalti, o waɗii humto. Ɓii Hiruudiya debbo wami yeeso ma'atinaaɓe ma'ako. Gamol ngool velii Hiruudus korey,
40014007	faa o hunii o vi'i o hokkey mo ko o torii fuu.
40014008	Surbaajo oon jaɓi caawara inna muuɗum, o vi'i Hiruudus~: — Waddanam hoore Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma nder le'al~!
40014009	Tornde ndeen mettinii ɓernde Hiruudus korey, ammaa nde laatii o aartii o hunake yeeso ma'atinaaɓe ma'ako, sey o vi'i surbaajo oon hokkee ɗuum ko torii.
40014010	O lili goɗɗo yaha toon kaso, taƴoya hoore Yahayya.
40014011	Hoore ndeen taƴaa tummbaa e le'al, hokkaa surbaajo oon. Kanko boo o hokki nde inna ma'ako.
40014012	Almaajiri'en Yahayya ngari kooƴi ɓanndu ma'ako, uvoyi ndu. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, ɓe njahi ɓe ngeccoyii Yeesu ɗuum ko laatii.
40014013	Nde Yeesu nani habaru maayde Yahayya, o natti akali o dilli ɗoon o yahi nder ladde kanko tan. Ammaa nde jama'aare nani Yeesu dilli, ɓe mburtii ci'e maɓɓe ɓe ɓaggii fonngo maayo ɓe tokki mo.
40014014	Nde Yeesu vurtii nder akali kiin, o yi'i jama'aare, o nani jurumɗum maɓɓe, o yamɗitini nyawɓe wonɓe nder maɓɓe.
40014015	Nde naange muti, almaajiri'en ɓaditii Yeesu, mbi'i mo~: — Jo'oni hiiri, yaayre nde'e boo ɗum ladde. Jaɓɓita jama'aare, ɓe njaha nder ci'e ɓe coodana ko'e maɓɓe nyaamdu.
40014016	Yeesu toontii ɓe, vi'i~: — Naa ɗum doole ɓe ndilla. Onon e ko'e mooɗon kokkee ɓe ko ɓe nyaami~!
40014017	Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Buroodiiji jovi e liƴƴi ɗiɗi tan min ngoodi.
40014018	O vi'i ɓe~: — Ngaddanee yam ɗum ɗo'o.
40014019	O vi'i jama'aare njooɗoo dow huɗo. O hooƴi buroodiiji jovi e liƴƴi ɗiɗi ɗiin, o tiggii dow, o yetti Allah. O senndi buroodiiji ɗiin, o hokki almaajiri'en nge'eda jama'aare.
40014020	Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami faa ɓe kaari. Almaajiri'en kawriti ko horii, ɓe kebbini compooje sappo e ɗiɗi.
40014021	Nyaamɓe nyaamdu nduun njaharii worɓe dubuuje njovo (5~000), yayri'en e ɓikkon limaaka.
40014022	Jaawɗum ɓaawo ma'ajum, Yeesu waɗi almaajiri'en muuɗum natta akali, ɓe aarta mo funngitgo maayo, ko hokka o accootira e jama'aare.
40014023	Ɓaawo o accootirii e jama'aare, o ƴeenti dow vaamnde gam o waɗa do'aare kanko tan. Faa jemma, emo toon feere ma'ako.
40014024	E wakkaci ɗuum akali aartii woɗɗinoyii caka maayo, ɓoggi ndiyam e piya ki, gam eki luhura e henndu.
40014025	Fajiri Yeesu wari to almaajiri'en ɓeen, emo ruugii dow ndiyam.
40014026	Ammaa nde ɓe ngi'i emo ruugii dow ndiyam, ɓe kultori korey, ɓe mbi'i~: — Ɗum mbeelu maayɗo~! Ɓe kalɓi gam kulol.
40014027	Ɗoon e ɗoon Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Mbaaltinee hakkiilooji mooɗon~! To' on kul, ɗum miin~!
40014028	Biiturus toontii mo, vi'i~: — Moodibbo, kul ɗum aan, vi' am mi ruugoo dow ndiyam mi wara to maaɗa.
40014029	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — War~! Sey Biiturus vurtii akali kiin, fuɗɗi yaaɓgo dow ndiyam yahago to Yeesu.
40014030	Ammaa nde o yi'i no henndu nduun semmbiɗiri, o huli, o fuɗɗi nucaago, o halɓi o vi'i~: — Moodibbo, hisnam~!
40014031	Ɗoon e ɗoon, Yeesu foorti junngo muuɗum nanngi mo, vi'i~: — Hey~! Aan famɗa goonɗinkeejo~! Ko jeyi mbaɗanɗaa ɓerɗe ɗiɗi~?
40014032	Ɓe nattu nder akali kiin tan, sey henndu nduun de''iti.
40014033	Almaajiri'en wonɓe nder akali kiin ndiccanii mo, mbi'i~: — Daahir a Ɓiɗɗo Allah~!
40014034	Nde ɓe punngiti maayo ngoon, ɓe njottii lesdi Genesaret.
40014035	Yimɓe yaayre ndeen annditi Yeesu, ɓe njaharani yimɓe lesdi ndiin fuu habaru garol ma'ako. Nyawɓe fuu ngaddaama to ma'ako.
40014036	Ɓe torii mo o woora nyawɓe ɓeen meema koo baŋargal toggoore ma'ako tan. Meemɗo ngal fuu yamɗiti.
40015001	Fariisa'en e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta ivi Urusaliima, ngari to Yeesu ƴami mo, mbi'i~:
40015002	— Ko jeyi almaajiri'en maaɗa tokkataa finaatawaaji maamiraaɓe meeɗen~? Gam ɓe lootataa juuɗe maɓɓe ko hokka ɓe nyaama.
40015003	O toontii ɓe o vi'i~: — Onon fa, ko jeyi kuultanton dooka Allah, eɗon tokka finaatawaaji mooɗon~?
40015004	Gam Allah vi'i~: «~Teddin baaba maaɗa e inna maaɗa. Koo moye huɗi baaba muuɗum koo inna muuɗum fotii wareego.~»
40015005	Ammaa onon, eɗon ekkitina to neɗɗo vi'ii baaba muuɗum e inna muuɗum~: «~Ɗuum ko haani mi vallira on, ɗum laatake geɗal Allah~».
40015006	Kanjum e ɗum waɗa neɗɗo woora teddingo danyooɓe muuɗum. Kama noon eɗon tooskina voliinde Allah gam tokkon finaatawaaji mooɗon~!
40015007	Onon munaafuki'en~! Annabi Ecaaya vi'ii goonga nde o waɗi annabaaku dow mooɗon, o vi'i~:
40015008	«~Allah vi'i~: Ngo'ol lenyol e konnduɗe tan teddinirta yam, ammaa ɓerɗe maɓɓe e ngoɗɗii yam.
40015009	E mehere ɓe cujjidanta yam, gam ko ɓe ekkitinta yimɓe ɗum dookaaji ɗi ɓe mbaɗani ko'e maɓɓe tan.~»
40015010	Yeesu noddi jama'aare vi'i~: — Ngewee pahamon ɗu'um~:
40015011	Wanaa ko nattata honnduko neɗɗo nyiddinta mo yeeso Allah, ammaa ko vurtotoo nder honnduko ma'ako, kam nyiddinta mo.
40015012	Ndeen almaajiri'en ɓaditii mo, mbi'i~: — Koo a anndi haala ka mbiiɗaa mettinii ɓerɗe Fariisa'en naa~?
40015013	O toontii ɓe, o vi'i~: — Aawre nde Baaba am gonɗo dow asama aawaay fuu, nde ɗoofeteende.
40015014	Ngooree ɓe~! Ɓe nanndi e vumɓe ɗowooɓe vumɓe. To bumɗo ɗowii bumɗo, ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe njooloto nder ngaska.
40015015	Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Fassitiran min balndol ngool.
40015016	Sey Yeesu vi'i~: — Faa jo'oni, onon maa, on pahamaay naa~?
40015017	On anndi ko natti nder honnduko neɗɗo fuu nder reedu ɗum fa'i, ndeen ɗum vurtoo.
40015018	Ammaa ko vurtotoo nder honnduko fuu, nder ɓernde ɗum ivoyi, kanjum nyiddinta neɗɗo yeeso Jawmiraawo.
40015019	Gam nder ɓernde neɗɗo nyumooji kalluɗi mburtoytoo ɗi mbaɗa mo e war-hoore e waɗgo njeenu e nguyka e saaydaago fewre e haalaaji bonnooji innde Allah.
40015020	Kanjum nyiddinta neɗɗo, ammaa nyaamgo lootaay juuɗe muuɗum deydey e finaatawaaji maamiraaɓe nyiddintaa neɗɗo.
40015021	Yeesu dilli ɗoon yahi ha'ade ci'e Tiir e Sidon.
40015022	Sey goɗɗo debbo Kana'aanankeejo jooɗiiɗo nder lesdi ndiin wari to ma'ako, wulli e semmbee vi'i~: — Moodibbo, ɓii-Dawda, yi' yurmeende am~! Ginnol e torra ɓinngel am dewel korey~!
40015023	Ammaa Yeesu toontaaki mo koo voliinde wo'ore. Almaajiri'en ma'ako torii mo, mbi'i~: — Laggu mo~! Emo tokki en, waanniri en bojji.
40015024	Yeesu toontii vi'i~: — Miin to yimɓe Isiraa'iila nannduɓe e baali majjuɗi tan lilaami.
40015025	Ammaa debbo oon diccii yeeso ma'ako vi'i~: — Emi toro maa Moodibbo, vallam~!
40015026	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Haanaa neɗɗo hooƴa nyaamdu ɓikkon ferana kareeji.
40015027	Debbo oon vi'i~: — Ee, ɗum goonga Moodibbo, ammaa koo kareeji boo e nyaama ko saami gada e le'e jawmiraaɓe mu''en.
40015028	Ndeen Yeesu toontii mo, vi'i~: — Hey debbo, goonɗinki maaɗa e mawni~! Woor ɗum laatano maa kama no ngiɗruɗaa. Ɗoon e ɗoon, ɓiyiiko yamɗiti.
40015029	Yeesu ɗali ɗoon dilli, tokki fonngo maayo Gaaliili, o ƴeenyi vaamnde, o jooɗii toon.
40015030	Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngari to ma'ako, ngaddi laƴooɓe e vumɓe e vuusɓe e fahaɓe e woɓɓe nyawɓe ɗuuɗɓe. Ɓe ngaddi ɓe yeeso ma'ako, o yamɗitini ɓe.
40015031	Ɗum haaynii yimɓe korey nde ɓe ngi'i fahaɗunooɓe e mbolva, laƴooɓe njamɗiti, vuusɓe e nduugii, vumnooɓe boo e ngi'a. Sey ɓe fuu ɓe maalti Allah mo Isiraa'iila.
40015032	Yeesu noddi almaajiri'en muuɗum vi'i ɓe~: — Mi nanii jurumɗum nde'e jama'aare, gam hannde balɗe tati eɓe ngondi e am, ɓe ngalaa nyaamdu. Mi yiɗaa jaɓɓidotaago ɓe e veelo, gam emi hula ngo do''a ɓe dow laawol.
40015033	Almaajiri'en ma'ako mbi'i mo~: — Toye keɓeten nyaamdu nyaamneyndu ɓe'e yimɓe ɗuuɗruɓe nihini nder nde'e ladde~?
40015034	Yeesu ƴami ɓe vi'i~: — Buroodiiji noye njogiiɗon~? Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Buroodiiji joveeɗiɗi e liykon seɗɗa.
40015035	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i jama'aare ndeen jooɗoo.
40015036	O hooƴi buroodiiji joveeɗiɗi ɗiin e liykon koon, o yetti Allah, o senndi ɗum, o hokki almaajiri'en nge'eda jama'aare.
40015037	Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami faa ɓe kaari. Almaajiri'en kawriti ɗuum ko hori, ɓe kebbini compooje joveeɗiɗi.
40015038	Nyaamɓe ɓeen mbaɗii worɓe dubuuje nayo (4~000), rewɓe e ɓikkon limaaka.
40015039	Ɓaawo Yeesu jaɓɓitake yimɓe, o natti akali o dilliri lesdi Magadan.
40016001	Fariisa'en e Saduuki'en ngari to Yeesu gam ɓe nanngira mo haala, ɓe ƴami mo o waɗana ɓe goɗɗum kaayniiɗum kolleyɗum Allah lili mo.
40016002	Yeesu toontii ɓe, vi'i~: — To naange warii mutgo, on ngi'ii dow e vo'oji, on mbi'ey~: «~Jahango no vooɗey.~»
40016003	To bimbi veeti, on ngi'ii duule e kawriti, on mbi'ey~: «~Hannde iyoonde no toɓey.~» On mbaawi senndindirgo alaamaaji gonɗi dow, ammaa on mbaawataa senndindirgo alaamaaji ndu'u jaamaniiru~!
40016004	Yimɓe jaamaniiru hannde ɓe halluɓe, nyaamooɓe amaana Allah, eɓe ngiɗi holleego goɗɗum kaayniiɗum, ammaa walaa kaayniiɗum ɗum ɓe kolletee, to naa ɗum annabi Yuunaana. Ndeen o ɗali ɓe ɗoon o dilli.
40016005	Nde almaajiri'en punngitnoo maayo, ɓe njeggitii yooɓaago buroodi.
40016006	Sey Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Kakkilee, ndeenee ko'e mooɗon gada e ƴuufnirɗum Fariisa'en e Saduuki'en.
40016007	Almaajiri'en puɗɗi volvugo hakkunde mu''en e mbi'a~: — Hala gam en njooɓaaki buroodi o vi'iri en ka.
40016008	Yeesu fahamii ko ɓe mbi'ata, o vi'i ɓe~: — Onon famɗa goonɗinki'en~! Ko jeyi mbi'anton on ngalaa buroodi~?
40016009	Faa jo'oni on pahamaay~? On njeggitii no nyaamnirmi worɓe dubuuje njovo (5~000) e buroodiiji jovi~? Wakkaci ɗuum, compooje noye kebbinɗon ɗuum ko hornaa~?
40016010	Nakay on kiimtaaki worɓe dubuuje nayo (4~000) ɓe nje'edammi buroodiiji joveeɗiɗi. Compooje noye kebbinɗon ɗuum ko hornaa~?
40016011	Ko jeyi on pahamaay wanaa haala buroodi mbaɗaneymi on~? Kakkilee e ƴuufnirɗum Fariisa'en e Saduuki'en.
40016012	Ndeen almaajiri'en annditi wanaa dow ƴuufnirɗum buroodi o volvata, ammaa ɓe ndeena ko'e maɓɓe e ekkitinol Fariisa'en e Saduuki'en.
40016013	Nde Yeesu yahi lesdi Kaysaariya-Filipi, o ƴami almaajiri'en ma'ako, o vi'i~: — Yimɓe e mbi'a Ɓii-Neɗɗo o moye~?
40016014	Ɓe toontii mo ɓe mbi'i~: — Woɓɓe e mbi'a a Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma, woɓɓe boo e mbi'a a annabi Iliya, woɓɓe e mbi'a a annabi Yeremiya koo boo annabiijo feere.
40016015	O vi'i ɓe~: — Onon fa, moye mbi'oton yam~?
40016016	Simon Biiturus toontii mo vi'i~: — Aan woni Almasiifu, Ɓiɗɗo Allah mo yonki.
40016017	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i mo~: — A barkiɗinaaɗo, aan Simon ɓii Yuunaana, gam wanaa neɗɗo vannginan ma goonga kaan, ammaa Baaba am gonɗo dow asama.
40016018	Miin emi vi'i ma, aan woni Biiturus, waato haayre. Dow haayre ndeen tiggeymi ikiliisiya am. Koo maayde e hoore muuɗum waawataa jaalaago ka.
40016019	Mi hokkete omtirɗum dammugal laamu Allah~: ko kaɓɓuɗaa nder duuniyaaru fuu, ɗum haɓɓake toon dow. Ko njoofɗaa nder duuniyaaru fuu, ɗum yoofake toon dow.
40016020	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i almaajiri'en muuɗum to' ɓe njaɓ ɓe mbi'a koo moye o Almasiifu.
40016021	Ila wakkaci ma'ajum Yeesu fuɗɗi anndingo almaajiri'en muuɗum vi'i, doole o yaha Urusaliima. Toon arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en e mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta torrata mo, mbara mo. Ammaa ɓaawo balɗe tati o ummitoto.
40016022	Sey Biiturus noddi mo feere ma'ako feli mo vi'i~: — Moodibbo, Allah haɗ ɗum ɗoon laatano ma~!
40016023	Yeesu yeeƴii Biiturus, vi'i mo~: — Selam, aan Ceyɗaan~! A laatii kaɗeyɗo yam waɗgo ko Allah yiɗi, gam nyumo maaɗa ivaay to Allah, to yimɓe ngo ivi~!
40016024	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o vi'i almaajiri'en ma'ako~: — Giɗɗo tokkugo yam fuu, sey wanya hoore muuɗum, vakkoo gaafagal muuɗum tokka yam.
40016025	Gam giɗɗo hisnugo yonki muuɗum, no dulley ki. Ammaa dulluɗo yonki muuɗum gam am fuu, no hisney ki.
40016026	Ɗume ɗum nafata neɗɗo, to heɓii risku duuniyaaru fuu, ammaa dullii yonki muuɗum~? Koo e woodi ko neɗɗo waawi hokkugo gam soottaago yonki muuɗum naa~?
40016027	Ɓii-Neɗɗo no wardey e malaa'ika'en muuɗum e teddungal Allah Baabiraawo. Wakkaci ma'ajum, o biyoto koo moye deydey e kuugal muuɗum ngal huwi.
40016028	Emi vi'a on goonga~: woɓɓe dariiɓe ɗo'o nder mooɗon maayataa sam, sey to ɓe ngi'ii bittoyki Ɓii-Neɗɗo e laamu muuɗum.
40017001	Balɗe joveego'o ɓaawo ma'ajum, sey Yeesu hooƴi Biiturus e Yaakuubu e minyum Yahayya, o yahadi e maɓɓe dow vaamnde townde, kamɓe tan.
40017002	Nanndi ma'ako waylitii yeeso maɓɓe. Yeeso ma'ako jalbitii kama naange, kolte ma'ako ndanni tar kama jayngol.
40017003	Sey raa Muusa e Iliya mbanngi e mbolida e Yeesu.
40017004	Biiturus vi'i Yeesu~: — Moodibbo, gonki amin ɗo'o e vooɗi. To a yiɗii, min nyiɓey bukkaaji tati~: wo'oru gam maaɗa, wo'oru gam Muusa, wo'oru boo gam Iliya.
40017005	Emo nder volvugo, sey ruulde ɗelkoore suddi ɓe. Voliinde ivoyi nder ruulde ndeen vi'i~: — O'o woni Ɓiyam giɗaaɗo, emi nana belɗum ma'ako korey. Ngewanee mo~!
40017006	Nde almaajiri'en nani voliinde ndeen, ɓe kultori kulol manngol faa ɓe ndo''ii ɓe njani eɓe kippii.
40017007	Yeesu ɓattii meemi ɓe, vi'i~: — Ummee, to' on kul.
40017008	Nde ɓe ƴefti gite, ɓe ngi'aay koo moye, sey Yeesu tan.
40017009	Nde eɓe njippoyoo vaamnde ndeen, Yeesu vaggini ɓe vi'i~: — To' on ngecco koo moye ko ngiiɗon, faa nde ɗum ummitini Ɓii-Neɗɗo nder maayde.
40017010	Ndeen almaajiri'en ƴami mo mbi'i~: — Gam ɗume moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e mbi'a annabi Iliya haani aarta Almasiifu wargo~?
40017011	O toontii ɓe, o vi'i~: — Goonga, Iliya no aartey wargo, gam o mo''ina koo ɗume.
40017012	Ammaa miin emi vi'a on~: Iliya wariino, yimɓe annditaay mo, faa maa ɓe mbaɗanii mo ko ɓe ngiɗi waɗango mo fuu. Kama noon ɓe torrirta Ɓii-Neɗɗo boo.
40017013	Ndeen almaajiri'en pahami dow Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma o volvanta ɓe.
40017014	Nde ɓe njottii to jama'aare hawri, sey goɗɗo gorko ɓaditii Yeesu, diccii yeeso ma'ako,
40017015	vi'i~: — Moodibbo, nan jurumɗum ɓiyam gorko~! Gam emo woodi nyawu paɗɗe, eɗe torra mo korey, to go'o eɗe ndo''a mo nder yiite koo nder ndiyam.
40017016	Mi yaharii mo to almaajiri'en maaɗa, ammaa ɓe mbaawaay yamɗitingo mo.
40017017	Ndeen Yeesu toontii vi'i~: — Onon yimɓe hannde halluɓe, ɓe ngalaa goonɗinki~! Faa ndeye ngondeymi e mooɗon, emi munyana on~? Ngaddanee yam ɓiɗɗo oon ɗo'o~!
40017018	Sey Yeesu nyaaɗani ginnol ngool, ngol vurtii ɓiɗɗo oon. Ɗoon e ɗoon o yamɗiti.
40017019	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, almaajiri'en ngari to ma'ako, kamɓe tan, ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Ko jeyi min mbaawaay vurtingo ginnol ngool~?
40017020	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Gam goonɗinki mooɗon famɗi. Emi vi'a on goonga~: kul on ngoonno goonɗinki potki koo ba gabbel mutardi, daa on mbaawey vi'igo nde'e vaamnde~: «~Sottu ɗo'o, yaha nih,~» daahir nde sottey. Walaa ko salorta on sam~! [
40017021	]
40017022	Nyannde feere nde Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum kawriti lesdi Gaaliili, sey Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Ɓii-Neɗɗo no hokkitirte nder juuɗe yimɓe,
40017023	ɓe mbara mo, ammaa nyannde tataɓre o ummitoto. Haala kaan mettini ɓerɗe almaajiri'en ma'ako korey.
40017024	Nde Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum ngari si'ire Kafarnahum, jaɓooɓe ceede janngal Wuro Allah Seniingo ɓaditii Biiturus, mbi'i mo~: — Koo moodibbo mooɗon biyataako ceede janngal gam Wuro Seniingo naa~?
40017025	Biiturus toontii, vi'i~: — Emo biyoo. Nde Biiturus natti wuro, Yeesu aarti volvani mo, vi'i~: — Simon, ɗume nyumɗaa~? Ɓeye mbiyotoo laamiiɓe duuniyaaru ceede janngal, ɓiɓɓe lesdi na jananɓe~?
40017026	Biiturus toontii mo, vi'i~: — Jananɓe. Yeesu vi'i mo~: — To noon, ɓiɓɓe lesdi mbiyataako.
40017027	Ammaa gam to' en mettinan ɓe ɓerɗe, yah maayo, peraa nanngirɗum liƴƴi nder ndiyam. Liyngu ngu aartuɗaa nanngugo fuu, omtu honnduko ma'agu, a tawey ceede ajurfaari. Ittaa ɗe mbiyanoɗaa en, enen ɗiɗo.
40018001	Wakkaci ɗuum almaajiri'en ɓaditii Yeesu, ƴami mo mbi'i~: — Moye laatotoo ɓurɗo manngu nder laamu Allah~?
40018002	Sey Yeesu noddi ɓinngel pamarel, darni ngel caka maɓɓe
40018003	o vi'i~: — Emi vi'a on goonga~: to on ngaylitaaki faa laatiiɗon kama ɓikkon pamaron, on nattataa laamu Allah sam.
40018004	Leestinɗo hoore muuɗum faa nanndi e ɓinngel pamarel, kam laatotoo ɓurɗo manngu nder laamu Allah.
40018005	Koo moye jaɓɓii ɓinngel pamarel kama nge'el gam am, miin o jaɓɓii.
40018006	— Ammaa neɗɗo fuu selni go'otel nder ɓe'e bilki'en goonɗinɓe yam, ɗum ɓuraneyno mo o haɓɓanee haayre teddunde e daande, o feree nder maayo.
40018007	Kayco ndu'u duuniyaaru, gam e woodi ko yaharata yimɓe e waɗgo hakke~! Ku'uje ɗeen doole ɗe ngara, ammaa kayco jahareyɗo woɓɓe e waɗgo ɗe.
40018008	To junngo maaɗa koo kosngal maaɗa yaharey maa e waɗgo hakke, tay fer ɗum to woɗɗi. Gam ɗum ɓurante vooɗgo nattidaa aljanna e liddaari, e nattaa nder yiite jahannama e juuɗe maaɗa ɗiɗi e kosɗe maaɗa ɗiɗi.
40018009	To yitere maaɗa waɗey maa e waɗgo hakke, ɗoof nde, fer nde to woɗɗi. Gam ɗum ɓurante nattaa aljanna a ɗokko, dow e perdeɗaa e gite maaɗa ɗiɗi nder yiite jahannama.
40018010	— Kakkilee, gam to' on njavo koo go'otel nder ko'on ɓikkon pamaron. Emi vi'a on~: malaa'ika'en ma'akon e ɗoon ndarii dum yeeso Baaba am gonɗo toon dow asama. [
40018011	]
40018012	Ɗume ngiiɗon~? To neɗɗo e woodi baali hemre, ngo'otu nder ma'aji soylake, o woorataa tasa'iin e joveenayi (99) ɗiin ndura nder baamle, o yilloyoo coyliingu nguun naa~?
40018013	Emi vi'a on goonga~: to o heɓtoyii ngu, belɗum ɗum o nanata gam ma'agu no ɓurey ɗum baali tasa'iin e joveenayi (99) ɗi coylaaki.
40018014	Noon Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo toon dow oon yiɗaa koo go'otel nder ko'on ɓikkon pamaron halka.
40018015	— To banndiraawo maaɗa waɗii ma layfi, yah to ma'ako kollaa mo layfi ɗum o waɗan ma, onon ɗiɗo tan. To o jaɓii, ndeen on narrii woni noon.
40018016	Ammaa to o jaɓaay, yahadu e neɗɗo go'oto koo ɗiɗo gam ɗum tabbitina koo ɗume gada e caaydu'en ɗiɗo koo tato kama ko vinndaa.
40018017	Ammaa, to o nananaay on, sey mbi'aa ka ikiliisiya. To o salake nanango ikiliisiya boo, sey o laatanoo on kama keefeero koo jaɓoowo ceede janngal.
40018018	Emi vi'a on goonga~: ko kaɓɓuɗon nder duuniyaaru fuu, ɗum haɓɓake toon dow. Ko njoofɗon nder duuniyaaru fuu, ɗum yoofake toon dow.
40018019	Emi vi'a on boo~: to ɗiɗo mooɗon kawtii ko'e nder duuniyaaru, ko ɓe torii Allah fuu, Baaba am gonɗo toon dow no hokkey ɓe ɗuum ko ɓe torii.
40018020	Gam to yimɓe ɗiɗo koo tato kawriti dow innde am fuu, emi hakkunde maɓɓe.
40018021	Ndeen Biiturus ɓaditii Yeesu, ƴami mo vi'i~: — Moodibbo, nde noye haani mi ya'afanoo banndam baɗɗo yam layfi~? Nde joveeɗiɗi naa~?
40018022	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Naa nde joveeɗiɗi tan mbi'imaami, ammaa nde joveeɗiɗi faa nde saba'iin (70).
40018023	Yeesu ɓesdi vi'igo~: — Laamu Allah nanndii e goɗɗo laamiiɗo giɗɗo limgo jawdi muuɗum ngonndi nder juuɗe huwooɓe muuɗum.
40018024	Nde o fuɗɗi limgo, o waddanaa goɗɗo kuwoowo mo o tokkata nyamaande miliyooji ɗuuɗɗi.
40018025	Nde laatii gorko oon walaa ko biyortoo nyamaande ndeen, laamiiɗo vi'i o soorree, kanko e debbo ma'ako e ɓikkon ma'ako e ko o woodi fuu, gam nyamaande ndeen biyee.
40018026	Sey kuwoowo oon diccii yeeso ma'ako, torii mo, vi'i~: «~Jawmam, munyanam, mi biyete ko tefataa yam fuu~!~»
40018027	Laamiiɗo oon nani jurumɗum ma'ako, ya'afanii mo nyamaande ndeen fuu, woori mo o dilli.
40018028	Kuwoowo oon no vurti tan, sey fotti e kuudiɗɗaawo muuɗum mo tokkata nyamaande ceede seɗɗa. O teɓɓi mo, o nanngi daande ma'ako o ɗeɗɗi mo, o vi'i~: «~Biyam ceede am~!~»
40018029	Kuudiɗɗaawo ma'ako oon diccii, torii mo vi'i~: «~Useni munyanam, mi biyete~!~»
40018030	Ammaa o jaɓaay. O omndi mo nder kaso, faa nde o biyii nyamaande ndeen fuu.
40018031	Nde huwooɓe horiiɓe ngi'i ɗum, ɓerɗe maɓɓe mettii korey, ɓe njahi ɓe mbi'oyi ka laamiiɗo oon.
40018032	Sey laamiiɗo noddi oon mo ya'afaninoo nyamaande, vi'i mo~: «~Aan a kuwoowo kalluɗo~! Nde toriɗaa yam, mi ya'afano maa ko tefeymaami, mi ya'afanake ma.
40018033	Aan, a haanaa njurmoɗaa kuudiɗɗaawo maaɗa kama no njurmorimaami~?~»
40018034	Laamiiɗo oon huunƴi korey, o waɗi ɗum nanngi mo, ɗum hokki mo kalluɗum, faa nde o biyii nyamaande nde o tefetee fuu. Yeesu ɓesdi vi'igo~:
40018035	— Noon Baaba am gonɗo toon dow asama waɗanta on, kul on nja'afanaaki banndiraaɓe mooɗon e ɓernde wo'ore.
40019001	Nde Yeesu heyni ko ekkitinta fuu, o dilli lesdi Gaaliili, o yahi lesdi Yahuudiya e fu'una maayo Urdun.
40019002	Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe tokki mo, o yamɗitini nyawɓe maɓɓe.
40019003	Sey woɓɓe Fariisa'en ngari to Yeesu gam ɓe nanngira mo haala, ɓe ƴami mo ɓe mbi'i~: — Koo gorko e woodi laawol seera debbo muuɗum, gam koo kaye daliila naa~?
40019004	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Asee, on meeɗaay janngugo ko vinndaa nder Deftere Seniinde naa~? «~Ila fuɗɗam Allah tagii gorko e debbo.~»
40019005	Ndeen o vi'i~: «~Gam ma'ajum gorko no seedey e baaba muuɗum e inna muuɗum, takkootira e debbo muuɗum, kamɓe ɗiɗo ɓe laatoo ɓanndu wo'oru.~»
40019006	Ɗo'o yeeso ɓe laatataako yimɓe ɗiɗo kadin, ammaa ɓe neɗɗo go'oto. Gam ma'ajum, to' neɗɗo senndu ko Allah hawti.
40019007	Sey Fariisa'en ƴami mo mbi'i~: — To noon, gam ɗume Muusa vi'i to gorko seeri debbo hokka mo ɗereewol ceergal~?
40019008	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Muusa hokkii on laawol seergo rewɓe mooɗon gam jo'oral ɓerɗe mooɗon, ammaa ɗum laataaki noon ila fuɗɗam.
40019009	Emi vi'a on~: ceerɗo debbo muuɗum, to naa nder njeenu nanngi mo, ndeen hoovii goɗɗo debbo, o waɗii njeenu.
40019010	Almaajiri'en ma'ako mbi'i mo~: — To nihini ɗum laatii hakkunde gorko e debbo, ndeen ciya koobgal maa ɓuri.
40019011	Yeesu toontii ɓe, vi'i~: — Wanaa yimɓe fuu mbaawi jaɓgo haala kaan, sey ɓe Allah hokki baawal jaɓgo ka.
40019012	E woodi daliilaaji feere-feere kaɗeyɗi yimɓe hoovaago. Woɓɓe gam ndimaama no waharaaɓe, woɓɓe no jaagaaɓe, woɓɓe boo mbaɗii anniya koovataako gam huwango laamu Allah. Baawɗo jaɓgo haala kaan fuu, sey jaɓa~!
40019013	Yimɓe ngaddani Yeesu ɓikkon gam o yowa juuɗe ma'ako dow ma'akon o waɗana kon do'aare, ammaa almaajiri'en peli ɓe.
40019014	Sey Yeesu vi'i~: — Ngooree ɓikkon ngara to am, to' on kaɗ kon, gam vaaɓe ba ma'akon njeyi laamu Allah.
40019015	O yowani kon juuɗe ma'ako, o barkiɗini kon. Ndeen o dilli.
40019016	Goɗɗo kayeejo wari to Yeesu, ƴami mo vi'i~: — Moodibbo, kuuɗe booɗɗe ɗeye kuweymi gam faa mi heɓa yonki ɗum faa abadaa~?
40019017	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Ko jeyi ƴamataa yam ko woni booɗɗum~? Booɗɗo walaa, sey Allah tan~! To a yiɗi heɓgo yonki ɗum faa abadaa, ti'ina tokkugo dookaaji Tawreeta.
40019018	Sey kayeejo oon ƴami Yeesu, vi'i~: — Ɗum ɗiye dookaaji~? Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: «~Ta'a waɗ war-hoore, ta'a waɗ njeenu, ta'a wujju, ta'a saaydo fewre,
40019019	teddin baaba maaɗa e inna maaɗa, yiɗ ko'odiɗɗaawo maaɗa noon no ngiɗruɗaa hoore maaɗa.~»
40019020	Gorko oon vi'i mo~: — Ɗum ɗoon fuu mi waɗii ɗum. Ee ɗume horanii yam~?
40019021	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — To a yiɗi laataago keeɓɗo, yah soorru ko ngoonɗaa fuu, kokkaa ceede ɗeen sooyɓe, a heɓey risku toon dow. Ndeen ngaraa tokkaa yam.
40019022	Nde kayeejo oon nani bolle ɗeen, o dillidi e mettam ɓeram, gam o diskuɗo korey.
40019023	Sey Yeesu vi'i almaajiri'en muuɗum~: — Emi vi'a on goonga~: caɗɗum diskuɗo natta laamu Allah~!
40019024	Emi vi'a on boo~: ngeelooba nattira vuroode laynal no ɓurey hoygo, dow e diskuɗo natta laamu Allah.
40019025	Nde almaajiri'en nani bolle ɗeen, ɗum haaynake ɓe. Ɓe mbi'i~: — To ɗum noon, moye hisata~?
40019026	O raari ɓe, o vi'i~: — To yimɓe kam ɗum waɗataako, ammaa to Allah koo ɗume fuu no baɗotooɗum.
40019027	Ndeen Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Minon, min ngoorii koo ɗume ko min ngoodi, min tokkii ma. Ee, ɗume min keɓata~?
40019028	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Emi vi'a on goonga~: wakkaci Ɓii-Neɗɗo jooɗii dow jooɗorgal teddungal muuɗum nder duuniyaaru hesru, onon sappo e ɗiɗo tokkuɓe yam, on njooɗoto dow jooɗorɗe laamu sappo e ɗiɗi, gam cernanon leƴƴi Isiraa'iila sappo e ɗiɗi.
40019029	Koo moye woori wuro muuɗum, koo rimdaaɓe muuɗum worɓe e rewɓe, koo danyooɓe muuɗum e ɓikkon muuɗum, koo gese muuɗum gam daliila am, o heɓey ko ɓuri ɗum nde covi hemre (100), o heɓey boo yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
40019030	Ammaa yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe aramɓe no laatoto sakitiiɓe, sakitiiɓe boo no laatoto aramɓe.
40020001	— Laamu Allah nanndii e goɗɗo mo ngesaa innabooje burtiiɗo ila bimbi, gam yilloo huwaneyɓe ɗum nder ngesaa.
40020002	Nde o heɓi huwooɓe, o siryootiri e maɓɓe o biyoto ɓe diinaari go'otel nder yinto. O yahari ɓe ngesaa ma'ako.
40020003	Nde o vurtii faro njamndi joveenayi, o tawi woɓɓe e njooɗii nder luumo e mehere.
