40020004	Sey o vi'i ɓe~: «~Onon maa, njahee kuwee nder ngesaa am, mi biyoto on ko haani.~»
40020005	Ɓeen boo njahi natti kuugal. Jawmu ngesaa ɓesdi vurtaago njamndi sappo e ɗiɗi e njamndi tati, o hooƴi woɓɓe huwooɓe.
40020006	Ɓaawo ma'ajum kadimaa, o vurtii alaasara, o tawi woɓɓe e ndarii, o vi'i ɓe~: «~Ko jeyi nyalluɗon e mehere, on kuwaay koo ngale~?~»
40020007	Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: «~Walaa kooyɗo min kuugal.~» O vi'i ɓe~: «~Onon maa, njahee ngesaa am, kuwanee yam.~»
40020008	Nde futuro waɗi, jawmu ngesaa oon vi'i aardiiɗo huwooɓe muuɗum~: «~Noddu huwooɓe mbiyoɗaa ɓe kuugal maɓɓe. Fuɗɗir sakitiiɓe, njottiniraa aramɓe.~»
40020009	Hooƴaaɓe alaasara njamndi jovi ngari, koo moye maɓɓe fuu hokkaa diinaari go'otel.
40020010	Aartuɓe kooƴaa ngari, e tammii no mbiyete ko ɓuri noon. Ammaa koo moye maɓɓe fuu biyaa diinaari go'otel-go'otel.
40020011	Nde ɓe njaɓi biya maɓɓe, ɓe peli jawmu ngesaa oon,
40020012	ɓe mbi'i~: «~Ɓe'e huwooɓe, awaa go'otum tan ɓe kuuri, ammaa a biyake ɓe kama no mbiyiɗaa min, minon nyalluɓe huugo gada subaka faa alaasara caka naange wulnge~!~»
40020013	Ndeen jawmu ngesaa oon toontii go'oto maɓɓe, vi'i~: «~Higoo am, mi jammbaaki ma. Wanaa dow diinaari go'otel ciryootirɗen yiniire naa~?
40020014	Jaɓ biya maaɗa dillu. Ɗum yiɗde am mi biyoo cakitiiɗo oon noon no mbiyimaami.
40020015	Asee, mi waawataa huutinirgo ceede am kama no ngiɗmi~? Nakay a nanii monee booɗɗum ko mbaɗmi~?~»
40020016	Yeesu vi'i~: — Noon boo, sakitiiɓe no laatoto aramɓe, aramɓe boo no laatoto sakitiiɓe.
40020017	Yeesu e dow laawol yahago si'ire Urusaliima, sey o noddi almaajiri'en ma'ako sappo e ɗiɗo, kamɓe tan, o vi'i ɓe~:
40020018	— Rah, en njahey Urusaliima. Toon Ɓii-Neɗɗo hokkitirtee nder juuɗe mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta. Ɓe taƴana mo ceri'a maayde,
40020019	ɓe kokkey mo nder juuɗe yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, ɓe njaltinira mo, ɓe piira mo looci, ɓe mbara mo dow gaafagal. Ndeen nyanndeere tataɓre o ummitoto.
40020020	Ndeen inna ɓiɓɓe Jabadi wardi e ɓiɓɓe muuɗum to Yeesu, o diccii yeeso ma'ako, gam o toroo mo goɗɗum.
40020021	Sey Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Ɗume ngiɗɗaa~? Debbo oon toontii mo, vi'i~: — To a laamake, emi yiɗi njo''inaa ɓiɓɓe am ɓe'e ɗiɗo, go'oto e junngo maaɗa nyaamo, go'oto boo e nano.
40020022	Yeesu toontii vi'i~: — On anndaa ko torotooɗon. Koo on mbaawa yargo torraa ka torreteemi naa~? Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Ee, emin mbaawi.
40020023	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Daahir on njarey ka. Ammaa wanaa miin suɓata jooɗotooɗo junngo am nyaamo koo nano, jaaje ɗeen eɗe laatii gam ɓeen ɓe Baaba am suɓani ɗe.
40020024	Nde almaajiri'en sappo horiiɓe nani ko ɗiɗo ɓeen mbi'i, ɓe nanii monee maɓɓe.
40020025	Ndeen Yeesu noddi almaajiri'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen fuu, o vi'i ɓe~: — On anndi laamiiɓe leƴƴi ɗi laataaki Yahuudu'en e laamanoo yimɓe e semmbee, aardiiɓe boo e kolla ɓe baawɗe mu''en.
40020026	Ammaa onon, to' ɗum laato noon hakkunde mooɗon. To e woodi giɗɗo laataago mawɗo nder mooɗon, doole o laatoo jaggantooɗo on.
40020027	Giɗɗo aardaago on boo, doole o laatoo maccuɗo mooɗon.
40020028	Noon boo, Ɓii-Neɗɗo waraay gam yimɓe kuwana ɗum, ammaa o warii gam o huwana ɓe, o hokka yonki ma'ako gam soottaago yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
40020029	Nde Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum mburtii si'ire Jeriiko, jama'aare ɗuuɗnde tokki mo.
40020030	Vumɓe ɗiɗo e njooɗii ha'ade laawol. Nde ɓe nani Yeesu e wutoo, sey ɓe puɗɗi wullugo eɓe mbi'a~: — Yeesu ɓii-Dawda, nan jurumɗum amin~!
40020031	Yimɓe nyaaɗani ɓe, mbi'i ɓe nde''a, ammaa ɓe ɓesdi wullugo eɓe mbi'a~: — Moodibbo ɓii-Dawda, nan jurumɗum amin~!
40020032	Yeesu darii noddi ɓe, vi'i~: — Ɗume ngiɗɗon mi waɗana on~?
40020033	Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Moodibbo, emin ngiɗi mbumtinaa min.
40020034	Yeesu nani jurumɗum maɓɓe, meemi gite maɓɓe. Ɗoon e ɗoon ɓe mbumti, ɓe tokki mo.
40021001	Nde Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum ɓadii Urusaliima, ɓe njottii ci'el Baytifaaji takkol vaamnde Jaytunje. O lili almaajiri'en ma'ako ɗiɗo,
40021002	o vi'i ɓe~: — Njahee nattee ci'el gonngel yeeso mooɗon. Ɗoon to nattuɗon, on tawey njaakiwa e mola muuɗum e kaɓɓii. Kaɓɓitoyee ɗi ngaddanee yam.
40021003	To goɗɗo volvanii on, mbi'ee mo~: «~Moodibbo yiɗi ɗi.~» Jaawɗum o wooraney on ɗi.
40021004	Ɗum laatake noon gam ɗum hebbina ko annabiijo vi'inoo, nde o vi'i~:
40021005	«~Mbi'ee yimɓe Siyoona~: Raa laamiiɗo mooɗon ɗoon wara to mooɗon, o leestinɗo hoore ma'ako, emo waɗɗii njaakiwa, e mola muuɗum.~»
40021006	Sey almaajiri'en ɗiɗo ɓeen njahi mbaɗi ko Yeesu vi'i ɓe.
40021007	Ɓe ngaddi njaakiwa ngaan e mola muuɗum, ɓe caɓɓani mo kolte maɓɓe, o waɗɗii.
40021008	Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe mbe''itani mo kolte mu''en dow laawol, woɓɓe boo itti haakooji leɗɗe, mbe'iti ɗe dow laawol gam taɓɓaago mo.
40021009	Yimɓe aardiiɓe Yeesu e tokkuɓe ɓaawo ma'ako ƴefti gimol mbi'i~: — Maaltoore laatanoo Ɓii-Dawda~! Barkaa laatanoo gareyɗo nder innde Jawmiraawo~! Maaltoore laatanoo Allah Mo Dow~!
40021010	Nde Yeesu natti si'ire Urusaliima, hakkiilo yimɓe fuu ummi, ɓe ƴamƴamtiri~: — O'o gorko o moye~?
40021011	Woɓɓe toontii mbi'i~: — Ɗum annabi Yeesu iɓɗo Najaratu nder lesdi Gaaliili.
40021012	Yeesu natti Wuro Allah Seniingo, o tuufi soorrooɓe e soodooɓe wonɓe nder ma'ago fuu, o talli teeburji cannjotooɓe ceede e jooɗorɗe soorrooɓe pooli.
40021013	O vi'i ɓe~: — Allah vi'ii nder Deftere muuɗum~: «~Wuro am no noddirte wuro do'aare.~» Ammaa onon, on ngartirii ngo «~suuɗorde wuyɓe~!~»
40021014	Sey vumɓe e voosɓe ngari to ma'ako nder Wuro Seniingo, o yamɗitini ɓe.
40021015	Ammaa nde mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta ngi'i kuuɗe kaayniiɗe ɗe o waɗata, e nde ɓe nani ɓikkon e ngulla nder Wuro Seniingo e mbi'a~: — Yettoore laatanoo ɓii-Dawda~! Ɓe kuunƴi,
40021016	ɓe mbi'i Yeesu~: — Koo a nana ko ɓikkon ko'on mbi'ata~? Sey Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Ee, mi nanii. Onon on meeɗaay janngugo ko vinndaa nder Deftere, vi'igo~: «~Aan siryii ɓikkon pamaron e musinoohon maalta innde maaɗa.~»
40021017	Sey o ɗali ɓe, o vurtii si'ire, o dilliri Baytaaniya, o waaloyi toon.
40021018	Nde veeti, Yeesu e warta nder si'ire, sey kooƴe nanngi mo.
40021019	O holliri goɗki ƴibbi faro laawol o yaali ki, ammaa o tawi ki walaa ɓikkon, sey haakooji tan. Ndeen o vi'i ki~: — Ta'a ɓesdu rimgo ɓikkon faa abadaa~! Ɗoon e ɗoon ki yo'ori.
40021020	Nde almaajiri'en ma'ako ngi'i ɗum, ɓe kaayɗini, ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Noye ɗum waɗi ki'i ƴibbi yo'oriri nihi jaawɗum~?
40021021	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Emi vi'a on goonga~: to on ngoodi goonɗinki, on mbaɗaay cekkaa, on mbaɗey ko ɓuri ko mbaɗanmi ki'i ƴibbi. On mbaawey vi'igo faa e nde'e vaamnde~: «~Ɗoofa ɗo'o, yoola nder maayo~», ɗum waɗa.
40021022	Kul on ngoodi goonɗinki, koo ɗume ko toriiɗon Allah on keɓey ɗum.
40021023	Yeesu natti Wuro Allah Seniingo, o fuɗɗi wa'ajingo, sey mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en ɓaditii mo, ƴami mo mbi'i~: — E ɗeye baawɗe kuurataa ɗe'e kuuɗe~? Moye hokku maa baawɗe ɗeen~?
40021024	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Miin boo e woodi fii go'otum ko ƴameymi on. To on toontake yam, miin boo mi yeccoto on e ɗeye baawɗe kuureymi kuuɗe ɗeen.
40021025	Moye liloyi Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma, Allah na yimɓe~? Ɓe mbaɗi caawara hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe mbi'i~: — To en mbi'ii~: «~Allah lili mo~», ndeen o vi'ey en~: «~Gam ɗume on ngoonɗinaay mo~?~».
40021026	Ammaa to en mbi'ii~: «~Yimɓe lili mo~», ndeen en kuley ko jama'aare waɗanta en, gam koo moye goonɗinii Yahayya o annabiijo.
40021027	Ɓe toontii Yeesu, ɓe mbi'i~: — Min anndaa. Ndeen Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Miin boo mi yeccataako on e ɗeye baawɗe kuureymi kuuɗe ɗeen.
40021028	Yeesu ɓesdi vi'igo~: — Ɗume nyumɗon dow ngo'ol balndol~: Goɗɗo gorko e woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe ɗiɗo. O yahi to arano, o vi'i mo~: «~Ɓinngel am, yah ngesaa innabooje kuwoyaa hannde.~»
40021029	Ɓiɗɗo oon toontii vi'i~: «~Mi yahataa.~» Ammaa ɓaawo ɗoon, o nyumti o yahii ngesaa.
40021030	Baaba yahi to ɗiɗaɓo, vi'i mo ka vi'inoo arano. Oon toontii mo, vi'i~: «~Too Baaba, mi yahey,~» ammaa o yahaay.
40021031	Nder ɓiɓɓe ɓeen ɗiɗo, moye waɗi ko baaba muuɗum yiɗi~? Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Arano. Ndeen Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Emi vi'a on goonga~: jaɓooɓe ceede janngal e rewɓe yeenooɓe no aartey on nattugo laamu Allah.
40021032	Gam Yahayya warii to mooɗon, hollii on laawol goonga, on ngoonɗinaay mo. Ammaa jaɓooɓe ceede janngal e rewɓe yeenooɓe ngoonɗinii mo. E noon fuu, koo nde ngiiɗon ɗum, on tuubaay ngoonɗinɗon mo.
40021033	— Too, raa goɗngol balndol feere~: goɗɗo neɗɗo aawi ngesaa innabooje, o howani ka, o wasi ngaska to ɗum ɓiɗata ɓikkon innabooje, o nyiɓi suudu towndu gam reenooɓe. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o reenni ka woɓɓe remooɓe, o dilli jahaangal.
40021034	Nde wakkaci teɓol ɓikkon innabooje wari, o liloyi maccuɓe ma'ako to remooɓe ɓeen, ɓe njaɓana mo geɗal ma'ako nder ɓikkon innabooje.
40021035	Ammaa remooɓe ɓeen nanngi maccuɓe ma'ako, ɓe piyi go'oto, ɓe mbari go'oto, ɓe perdi tataɓo boo kaaƴe.
40021036	Jawmu ngesaa oon liloyi woɓɓe maccuɓe ɓurɓe aramɓe ɗuuɗgo. Remooɓe ɓeen mbaɗani ɓe kama no ɓe mbaɗannoo aramɓe.
40021037	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o lili ɓiyiiko to maɓɓe, o nyumi~: «~Daahir ɓe teddiney ɓiyam.~»
40021038	Ammaa nde remooɓe ngi'i ɓiyiiko oon, ɓe mbolvi hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe mbi'i~: «~O'o woni donoowo ngesaa. Ngaree mbaren mo, ndonen ngesaa kaan~!~»
40021039	Sey ɓe nanngi mo, ɓe mburtini mo yaasi ngesaa, ɓe mbari mo.
40021040	Yeesu ƴami ɓe vi'i~: — Too, to jawmu ngesaa oon warii, noye o waɗanta remooɓe ɓeen~?
40021041	Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — O warey halluɓe ɓeen barki kalluki, o reenna ngesaa kaan e juuɗe woɓɓe remooɓe hokkeyɓe mo geɗal ngesaa ma'ako wakkaci teɓol innabooje.
40021042	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Asee, on meeɗaay janngugo ko vinndaa nder Deftere naa~? «~Haayre nde mahooɓe kibini, kayre laatii ɓurnde jogaago mahadi. Kanjum ɗum kuugal Jawmiraawo, e giiɗe meeɗen ɗum kaayniiɗum~!~»
40021043	Gam ma'ajum, emi vi'a on~: on te'etete laamu Allah, ngu hokkee yimɓe huutinirooɓe ngu no Allah yiɗiri. [
40021044	]
40021045	Nde mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e Fariisa'en nani balndi ma'ako ɗiin, sey ɓe pahami dow maɓɓe o volvi.
40021046	Eɓe ngiɗi nanngugo mo, ammaa ɓe kulii jama'aare, gam yimɓe fuu njaɓii Yeesu o annabiijo.
40022001	Yeesu ɓesdi valndango ɓe balndol feere, o vi'i~:
40022002	— Laamu Allah nanndii e goɗɗo laamiiɗo ciryiiɗo nyaamdu gam koobgal ɓiyum gorko.
40022003	O lili maccuɓe ma'ako noddoya ma'atinaaɓe juulɗe koobgal, ammaa ɓe calii wargo.
40022004	Ndeen o ɓesdi lilgo woɓɓe maccuɓe ma'ako, o vi'i ɓe~: Mbi'ee ma'atinaaɓe~: «~Nyaamdu vo'inaama faa vooɗi, mi hirsii ga'i e biggi payɗi, koo ɗume fuu siryaama. Ngaree mana.~»
40022005	Ammaa ma'atinaaɓe ɓeen njaɓaay yahago, koo moye natti gonngal yeeso muuɗum~: woɓɓe njahi gese mu''en, woɓɓe njahi luumaaku mu''en.
40022006	Horiiɓe boo nanngi maccuɓe ɓeen, piyi ɓe, mbari ɓe.
40022007	Laamiiɗo oon huunƴi, o lili soojeeji ma'ako mbaroyi warooɓe ko'e ɓeen, ɓe nguli si'ire maɓɓe.
40022008	Ndeen o vi'i maccuɓe ma'ako~: «~Nyaamdu koobgal siryaama, ammaa ma'atinanooɓe ɓeen keƴaay wargo.
40022009	Gam ma'ajum, njahee dow ɗate mawɗe noddon koo moye mo ngiiɗon, wara nyaama nyaamdu koobgal nduun.~»
40022010	Maccuɓe ɓeen njahi dow ɗate, noddoyi yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, halluɓe e moƴƴuɓe fuu, faa wuro ma'ako heevi yimɓe tep.
40022011	Nde laamiiɗo oon natti gam yi'a ma'atinaaɓe, o yi'i gorko go'o mo sinngitanaaki koobgal.
40022012	O vi'i mo~: «~Higoo, noye ɗum waɗi nattoyɗaa ɗo'o, a sinngitanaaki koobgal~?~» Ammaa oon majji ka toontotoo mo.
40022013	Sey laamiiɗo oon vi'i maccuɓe muuɗum~: «~Kaɓɓee mo juuɗe e kosɗe, peron mo yaasi nder niɓre, to ɗum voyata, e ɗum nyerƴindira nyiiƴe.~»
40022014	Yeesu tokki vi'igo~: — Noddaaɓe e ɗuuɗi, ammaa suɓaaɓe no seɗɗa.
40022015	Fariisa'en njahi ndarvi no nanngirta Yeesu nder bolle muuɗum.
40022016	Ɓe lili woɓɓe almaajiri'en maɓɓe e woɓɓe yimɓe Hiruudus. Lilaaɓe ɓeen mbi'i Yeesu~: — Moodibbo, emin anndi a goongaajo, eɗa ekkitinira ko Allah vi'i e goonga, a hulataa koo moye, a ɓurdindirtaa yimɓe.
40022017	Too, e giiɗe maaɗa~: koo e haani min mbiyoo Kaysar ceede janngal, na ɗum haanaa~?
40022018	Ammaa Yeesu annditii nyumooji maɓɓe kalluɗi. Sey o vi'i ɓe~: — Onon munaafuki'en~! Ko jeyi ndaaroton godaago yam~?
40022019	Kollee yam ceede ɗe ɗum biyortoo janngal. Ɓe ngaddani mo ceedel ajurfaari go'otel.
40022020	Yeesu ƴami ɓe vi'i~: — Footo moye e innde moye woni ɗo'o~?
40022021	Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Ɗum Kaysar. O vi'i ɓe~: — To noon, kokkee Kaysar ko woni ɗum Kaysar, kokkon Allah boo ko woni ɗum Allah.
40022022	Nde ɓe nani toontol ngool, ɗum haaynake ɓe. Sey ɓe ndilli ɓe ɗali mo.
40022023	Nder nyalaande ndeen, sey woɓɓe Saduuki'en ngari to Yeesu. Kamɓe eɓe mbi'a maayɓe ummitataako.
40022024	Ɓe ƴami Yeesu, ɓe mbi'i~: — Moodibbo, Muusa vi'i~: To gorko hoovake maayii rimaay, sey minyiiko koo mawniiko wa'ata debbo ma'ako, gam o rimana maayɗo oon ɓiɓɓe.
40022025	Too, nder amin e woodi worɓe njoveeɗiɗo rimdaaɓe. Arano oon hoovake, faa maayi rimaay. Minyiiko wa'ati debbo ma'ako,
40022026	kanko boo, o maayi o rimaay. Tataɓo maa waɗi noon, faa ɗum yahari e njoveeɗiɗaɓo.
40022027	Ɓaawo maɓɓe, debbo oon maayi.
40022028	Too, nyannde ummitineeki maayɓe, nder worɓe njoveeɗiɗo ɓeen, koree moye debbo oon laatotoo~? Gam ɓe fuu ɓe koovakeno mo.
40022029	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — On mboofi, gam on pahamaay ko Deftere Seniinde vi'i, kadi boo on anndaa baawɗe ma'ako.
40022030	Gam to maayɓe ummitake, worɓe koovataako, rewɓe boo koovataake, ammaa ɓe laatoto kama malaa'ika'en Allah wonɓe toon dow asama.
40022031	On meeɗaay janngugo ko Allah vi'i dow ummitineeki maayɓe naa~? O vi'i~:
40022032	«~Miin woni Allah mo Ibraahim, Allah mo Iciyaaku, Allah mo Yaakuubu.~» Allah o Allah foofooɓe, naa o Allah maayɓe.
40022033	Ekkitinol ma'ako ngool haaynii yimɓe yewaniiɓe mo fuu.
40022034	Nde Fariisa'en nani Yeesu hannyirii Saduuki'en bolle, sey ɓe kawriti.
40022035	Go'oto maɓɓe moodibbo Tawreeta ƴami Yeesu, gam o nanngira mo haala, o vi'i~:
40022036	— Moodibbo, kaye dooka ɓuri mawnugo nder Tawreeta~?
40022037	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — «~Yiɗ Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa e ɓernde maaɗa fuu, e yonki maaɗa fuu, e hakkiilo maaɗa fuu.~»
40022038	Kanka woni dooka arana, ɓurka manngu nder Tawreeta.
40022039	Raa ɗiɗaɓa potka e arana~: «~Yiɗ ko'odiɗɗaawo maaɗa noon no ngiɗruɗaa hoore maaɗa.~»
40022040	Tawreeta Muusa e defte annabo'en fuu e ɗoon ndarii dow ɗi'i dookaaji ɗiɗi.
40022041	Nde Fariisa'en kawriti ɗoon, Yeesu ƴami ɓe vi'i~:
40022042	— Ɗume nyumoton dow Almasiifu~? O ɓii moye~? Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — O ɓii-Dawda.
40022043	O vi'i ɓe~: — To noon, noye ɗum waɗi Dawda noddiri mo Jawmiraawo nde o volviri e baawɗe Ruhu Allah, o vi'i~:
40022044	Jawmiraawo vi'i Jawmiraawo am~: Jooɗa e junngo am nyaamo, faa mi waɗa wanywanyɓe maaɗa laatoo jaaɓruɗum kosɗe maaɗa.
40022045	To Dawda noddirii mo «~Jawmiraawo~», ndeen noye o laatorii ɓiyiiko~?
40022046	Ɓe fuu ɓe mbaawaay toontaago mo koo voliinde wo'ore. Gada nyannde ndeen, koo moye fuu huli ƴamgo mo ƴamol feere.
40023001	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i almaajiri'en muuɗum e jama'aare hawrunde ɗoon~:
40023002	— Moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e Fariisa'en kalfinaa kuugal janngingo Tawreeta Muusa.
40023003	Gam ma'ajum, kuwee ko ɓe ekkitini on fuu, tokkee ɗum, ammaa to' on ngemmin kuuɗe maɓɓe, gam ɓe kuwataa ɗuum ko ɓe njannginta.
40023004	Eɓe kaɓɓa dowle tedduɗe, ɓe ndoonda ɗe yimɓe, ammaa kamɓe ɓe meemataa ɗe koo e hoore feɗeengo gam ɓe mballa yimɓe.
40023005	Eɓe mbaɗa koo ɗume fuu gam yimɓe ngi'a ɓe. Eɓe kaɓɓa laayaaji mawɗi e tihiɗe maɓɓe e juuɗe maɓɓe, eɓe njimmbita baŋarɗe kolte maɓɓe faa ɗe ndasoo.
40023006	Nder kumti e nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi, eɓe ngiɗi jo'ole mawɗe.
40023007	Eɓe ngiɗi hinneego nder luuɓe e vi'eego~: «~Allah sabbinane, Moodibbo.~»
40023008	Ammaa onon, to' on njaɓ noddireego «~Moodiɓɓe~», gam on fuu on banndiraaɓe. Moodibbo go'oto tan ngoonɗon.
40023009	To' on noddir koo moye «~Baabiraawo~» nder ndu'u duuniyaaru, gam Baabiraawo go'oto tan ngoonɗon, kanko woni gonɗo toon dow asama.
40023010	To' on njaɓ noddireego «~Aardiiɓe~», gam Aardiiɗo go'oto tan ngoonɗon, kanko woni Almasiifu.
40023011	Ɓurɗo manngu nder mooɗon laatoo maccuɗo mooɗon.
40023012	Mawninɗo hoore muuɗum fuu, no famɗintee, pamɗinɗo hoore muuɗum boo no mawnintee.
40023013	Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e Fariisa'en, munaafuki'en~! Eɗon omndana yimɓe dammugal laamu Allah. Onon e ko'e mooɗon on nattaay, yiɗɓe nattugo maa, on ngooraay ɗum'en natti. [
40023014	]
40023015	Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e Fariisa'en, munaafuki'en~! Gam on ɗoon njiiloo nder lesɗe fuu, on ɗoon kuulta maayooji gam keɓon neɗɗo go'oto tokkuɗo on. To on keɓii mo boo, on ɗoon laatina mo ɓii jahannama, faa o ɓura on covi ɗiɗi.
40023016	Bone laatanto on, onon vumɓe ɗowooɓe vumɓe~! Eɗon mbi'a~: «~To neɗɗo hunorake Wuro Seniingo hunayeere ndeen nanngataa ɗum, ammaa to hunorake jiinaariya ngondi nder Wuro Seniingo, hunayeere ndeen no nanngey ɗum.~»
40023017	Onon vumɓe mehere'en~! Ɗume ɓuri darajja~: jiinaariya, na wuro seneyngo jiinaariya gonɗum nder ma'ago~?
40023018	Kadimaa on mbi'a~: «~To neɗɗo hunorake sakkirde, hunayeere ndeen nanngataa ɗum, ammaa to hunorake sadaka ngonka dow ma'are, hunayeere ndeen no nanngey ɗum.~»
40023019	Onon vumɓe~! Ɗume ɓuri darajja~: sadaka na sakkirde seneynde sadaka kaan~?
40023020	Gam ma'ajum, neɗɗo fuu kunoriiɗo sakkirde, hunorake nde, kayre e ko woni dow ma'are fuu.
40023021	Neɗɗo kunoriiɗo Wuro Allah Seniingo, o hunorake ngo, kango e Allah jooɗiiɗo nder ma'ago.
40023022	To neɗɗo hunorake dow, o hunorake jooɗorgal laamu Allah e Allah jooɗiiɗo dow ma'agal.
40023023	Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e Fariisa'en, munaafuki'en~! On ɗoon ittana Allah jakka annagana e haakooji goɗɗi, ammaa on ɗoon njeeboo dookaaji ɓurɗi darajja nder Tawreeta, kama aadilaaku e yurmeende e tokkugo Allah. Kanjum haannoo mbaɗon, tawee on njeebaaki ɗuum ko hori.
40023024	Onon vumɓe ɗowooɓe vumɓe~! To bu'ubel saami nder njaram mooɗon on ciivey itton ngel, ammaa on ɗoon moɗa ngeelooba~!
40023025	Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e Fariisa'en, munaafuki'en~! On ɗoon layɓa ɓaawo tummuɗe e le'e, ammaa nder ma'aje e heevi ko heɓraa nguyka e yiɗde hoore.
40023026	Aan Fariisaajo bumɗo~! To a layɓa tummude, aartu layɓu nder, ndeen ɓaawo ma'are.
40023027	Bone no laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e Fariisa'en, munaafuki'en~! On ɗoon nanndi e genaale daninaaɗe. Dow ma'aje e vooɗi raaraago, ammaa nder ma'aje e heevi ƴi'e e koo iri ɗume nyolɗum.
40023028	Noon onon boo mbaaɗon~: e giiɗe gite eɗon nanndi e goonga'en, ammaa ɓerɗe mooɗon e keevi munaafukaaku e halleende.
40023029	Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e Fariisa'en, munaafuki'en~! On ɗoon nyiɓa cuuɗi dow genaale annabo'en, eɗon mbo''ina genaale goonga'en.
40023030	On mbi'a~: «~Kul min ngoonno nder jaamaniiru maamiraaɓe amin, daa min kawtataano e maɓɓe gam wargo annabo'en.~»
40023031	Noon kollirɗon onon ngoni ɓiɓɓe warnooɓe annabo'en ɓeen.
40023032	Kadi, njottinee kuuɗe kalluɗe ɗe maamiraaɓe mooɗon puɗɗuno~!
40023033	Onon bo'ole, ɓiɓɓe poosooje~! Noye kisnirton ko'e mooɗon yiite jahannama~?
40023034	Gam ma'ajum mi lildey on annabo'en e hakkilɓe e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta. On mbarey woɓɓe maɓɓe, ɓilon woɓɓe dow gaafaaɗe faa ɓe maaya, piiron woɓɓe looci nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi mooɗon, tokkon si'ire-si'ire on torra ɓe.
40023035	Hakke ƴiiƴam goonga'en fuu waraaɓe nder duuniyaaru no ƴamete dow ko'e mooɗon, ila ƴiiƴam Habiila goongaajo, faa yahago e ɗam Jakariya ɓii Baraakiya, mo mbarɗon hakkunde Suudu Seniindu e sakkirde.
40023036	Emi vi'a on goonga~: mba'ataari waranooɓe ɓeen fuu no yaney dow yimɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru~!
40023037	— Wayyoo, yimɓe Urusaliima, on mbarii annabo'en, on perdii lilaaɓe Allah kaaƴe~! Nde noye ngiɗmi hawritgo ɓiɓɓe mooɗon kama no geroogal hawritirta cofon lees biyeeli muuɗum, ammaa on njaɓaay.
40023038	Rah, Wuro Allah mooɗon Seniingo no laatoto vinnde.
40023039	Emi vi'a on~: gada hannde on ɓesdataa yi'igo yam, faa yahago nyalaande nde mbi'oton~: «~Maaltoore laatanoo gareyɗo nder innde Jawmiraawo~!~»
40024001	Nde Yeesu vurtii Wuro Allah Seniingo dilli, sey almaajiri'en ma'ako ɓaditii mo, kolli mo no ngo maharaa.
40024002	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — On ngi'ii ɗum ɗoon fuu ko ngiiɗon~? Emi vi'a on goonga~: haayre horataako dow haayre, ɗum fuu ɗum yibbintee.
40024003	Yeesu yahi jooɗii dow vaamnde Jaytunje, sey almaajiri'en ma'ako ngari to ma'ako kamɓe tan, ɓe mbi'i mo~: — Yecca min ndeye ku'uje ɗeen laatoto. Kaye alaama hollata bittoyki maaɗa e timmoode duuniyaaru ɓadake~?
40024004	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Kakkilee, to' on njaɓ goɗɗo majjina on,
40024005	gam yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe no ngarey e innde am, ɓe mbi'a~: «~Miin woni Almasiifu.~» Ɓe majjiney yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
40024006	On naney habaru konuuji ɓadiiɗi e goɗɗuɗi, ammaa to' on kul~! Gam doole ɗum fuu ɗum waɗa, ammaa naa ɗum timmoode duuniyaaru tawo.
40024007	Lenyol no ummanto lenyol, laamu no ummanto laamu, veelooji e dimmbaaki lesdi no mbadey nder jaaje feere-feere.
40024008	Ammaa ɗum fuu ɗum fuɗɗam torraa tan, kama fuɗɗam ŋatawre danyeyɗo.
40024009	Ndeen yimɓe no njaharey on yeeso sernooɓe, gam ɓe torra on, ɓe mbara on. Yimɓe fuu no nganyey on gam am.
40024010	Wakkaci ɗuum ɗuuɗɓe no njoofey goonɗinki mu''en, ɓe nyaamnyaamtira amaana, ɓe nganynganytira.
40024011	Annabo'en fevooɓe ɗuuɗɓe no ummoto majjina yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
40024012	Halleende no ɗuuɗey, faa yiɗde yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ustoo.
40024013	Ammaa munyɗo faa timmoode no hisnete.
40024014	Habaru Belɗum ɗum laamu Allah no wa'ajinte nder duuniyaaru fuu, gam faa leƴƴi fuu ɗi anndaa Allah nana. Ndeen timmoode duuniyaaru wara.
40024015	— To on ngi'ii «~fii nyidduɗum kulniiɗum~» ɗum annabi Daaniyel vi'inoo e darii nder yaayre seniinde. (Sey jannguɗo ɗum fuu fahama.)
40024016	Ndeen wonɓe nder lesdi Yahuudiya fuu, sey nyaara cuuɗoyoo nder baamle.
40024017	Gonɗo dow suudu boo, to' o jippo gam hooygo goɗɗum ko woni nder ma'aru.
40024018	Gonɗo ngesaa, to' hoot wuro vi'a no hooƴey koltal muuɗum.
40024019	Kayco rewɓe saawɓe e bambuɓe nder balɗe ɗeen~!
40024020	Toree Allah to' nyaardu mooɗon laato nder dabbunde koo nyannde-fooftiinde.
40024021	Wakkaci ɗuum torraa makka no waɗey, ka iri muuɗum meeɗaay waɗgo ila fuɗɗoode duuniyaaru faa wargo hannde. Iri ma'aka boo ɓesdataa waɗgo faa abadaa.
40024022	Kul Allah ustaayno balɗe ɗeen, daa koo neɗɗo go'oto hisataano. Ammaa Allah ustii balɗe ɗeen gam daliila suɓaaɓe muuɗum.
40024023	Wakkaci ɗuum to goɗɗo vi'ii on~: «~Raa Almasiifu ɗo'o~», koo «~Rammo ɗaa'e~», to' on njaɓ.
40024024	Gam almasiifu'en fewre'en e annabo'en fewre'en no ngarey, ɓe mbaɗa alaamaaji e kuuɗe kaayniiɗe mawɗe gam ɓe majjina yimɓe, faa e suɓaaɓe Allah, to ɗum waɗoto.
40024025	Pahamee booɗɗum. Mi vi'ii on ɗum ɗum fuu ila ɗum waraay.
40024026	To goɗɗo vi'ii on~: «~Rammo nih nder ladde~», to' on njah. Koo boo, to goɗɗo vi'ii on~: «~Rammo ɗaa'e suuɗi~», to' on njaɓ.
40024027	Noon no maƴƴere maƴƴirta fu'unaange faa yahago hiirnaange, noon bittoyki Ɓii-Neɗɗo laatorto.
40024028	To gaawaare woni fuu, toon dute kawritata.
40024029	— Ɗoon e ɗoon ɓaawo balɗe torraa ɗeen, naange no niɓɓey, lewru no woorey yaynaago, koode no njaney, baawɗeeji gonɗi dow fuu no ndimmboto.
40024030	Wakkaci ɗuum, alaama Ɓii-Neɗɗo no vanngey toon dow, leƴƴi duuniyaaru fuu no mboyey. Ɓe ngi'ey Ɓii-Neɗɗo e jippoo nder duule, e warda e baawɗe e teddungal manngal.
40024031	Luwal manngal no fuufetee. Ndeen o liloyey malaa'ika'en ma'ako buttulli duuniyaaru nayi fuu, gam ɓe kawrita suɓaaɓe ma'ako.
40024032	Pahamee ko ƴibbi ekkitinta~: to licce ma'aki kesɗitii, haakooji ma'aki boo mbillitii, on anndi ndunngu ɓadake.
40024033	Noon boo, to on ngi'ii ku'uje ɗeen fuu, anndee o ɓadake wargo, emo ha'ade dammugal.
40024034	Emi vi'a on goonga~: ku'uje ɗeen fuu no laatoto ko hokka yimɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru timma.
40024035	Dow e lees no timmey, ammaa bolle am timmataa faa abadaa.
40024036	— Walaa annduɗo nyalaande koo wakkaci nde ku'uje ɗeen laatoto. Koo malaa'ika'en wonɓe dow, koo Ɓiɗɗo boo anndaa, sey Baabiraawo tan anndi ɗum.
40024037	Ɗuum ko laatinoo nder jaamaniiru annabi Nuhu, ɗum laatoto wakkaci bittoyki Ɓii-Neɗɗo.
40024038	Nder balɗe ɗeen ko hokka ndiyam ƴufaana wara, yimɓe e nyaama e njara e koovoo e koova, faa nyanndeere nde Nuhu natti akali.
40024039	Ɓe pahamaay sam, faa ndiyam ƴufaana wari moɗi ɓe ɓe fuu. Noon bittoyki Ɓii-Neɗɗo boo laatorto.
40024040	Nder wakkaci ɗuum, worɓe ɗiɗo no tawdete nder ngesaa ngo'ota, ɗum hooƴa go'oto, ɗum ɗala go'oto.
40024041	Rewɓe ɗiɗo no tawdete e unda, ɗum hooƴa go'oto, ɗum ɗala go'oto.
40024042	Gam ma'ajum ciryee, sabu on anndaa nyalaande nde Jawmiraawo mooɗon vittoyta.
40024043	Pahamee ɗu'um~: kul jawmu wuro e anndunoo wakkaci gujjo warata nder jemma, daa o ɗaanataako o woora gujjo natta wuro ma'ako.
40024044	Gam ma'ajum, onon boo ciryee, gam Ɓii-Neɗɗo no warey nder wakkaci ɗum on tammaaki.
40024045	— Too, moye woni kuwoowo kakkilɗo, koolaaɗo~? Kanko woni mo jawmu wuro muuɗum reenni huwooɓe muuɗum gam o hokka ɓe nyaamdu wakkaci kaanduɗum.
40024046	Barkaa laatanto kuwoowo mo jawmu wuro muuɗum warti tawi e huwa kuugal ngal hokkaa.
40024047	Emi vi'a on goonga~: jawmu wuro oon no reenney mo jawdi muuɗum fuu.
40024048	Ammaa to kuwoowo oon no kalluɗo, vi'ii hoore muuɗum «~Jawmu wuro am no neeɓey wartaay~»,
40024049	o fuɗɗii halleende, emo fiya huwooɓe ɓe o reennaa, emo nyaama, emo yarda e yarooɓe.
40024050	Ndeen jawmu wuro no wartey nyalaande nde kuwoowo oon anndaa, e wakkaci ɗum o tammaaki,
40024051	o fiya mo piiki kalluki, o fera mo nder munaafuki'en, to ɗum voyata, eɗum nyerƴindira nyiiƴe.
40025001	— Laamu Allah nanndii e surba'en sappo hooyɓe fitilaaji mu''en njahi taɓɓoyaago kooviiɗo.
40025002	Njovo maɓɓe ƴoƴaa, njovo boo e ngoodi ƴoyre.
40025003	Ɓeen ɓe ƴoƴaa kooƴi fitilaaji, ammaa ɓe njooɓaaki nebbam feere ɗam ɓe ɓesdata.
40025004	Ɓe ƴoyre boo njooɓake nebbam ɗam ɓesdanta fitilaaji mu''en.
40025005	Nde kooviiɗo oon neeɓi waraay, surba'en ɓeen fuu ŋonyi ɗaanii.
40025006	Toon caka jemma, sey ɗum nani noddaango e vi'a~: «~Kooviiɗo oon warii~! Mburtee~! Taɓɓoyee mo~!~»
40025007	Ndeen surba'en ɓeen fuu pini, ɓe mbaɗi ga vo''ingo fitilaaji maɓɓe.
40025008	Surba'en ɓe ƴoƴaa mbi'i ɓeen ɓe ƴoyre~: «~Kokkoree min nebbam seɗɗa, gam fitilaaji amin e nyifa.~»
40025009	Ammaa ɓe ƴoyre mbi'i ɓe~: «~A'aa, min mbaawataa, gam ko min njogii heƴataa en en fuu. Igga njahon to soorrooɓe, coodoyon~!~»
40025010	Ɗoon to ɓe ndilli soodoygo nebbam, sey kooviiɗo yottii. Ɓeen siryiiɓe nattidi e ma'ako nder suudu, dammugal omnda.
40025011	Nde yaawtii seɗɗa, surba'en soodoynooɓe nebbam mbittoyii. Ɓe mbi'i e semmbee~: «~Jawmu wuro, jawmu wuro, omtan min~!~»
40025012	Ammaa kooviiɗo toontii ɓe vi'i~: «~Emi vi'a on goonga~: mi anndaa on sam.~»
40025013	Yeesu ɓesdi vi'igo~: — Ciryee, gam on anndaa nyalaande koo wakkaci ɗum Ɓii-Neɗɗo warata.
40025014	— Laamu Allah e nanndi e goɗɗo gorko ciryiiɗo waɗgo jahaangal, nodduɗo huwooɓe muuɗum, o senndani ɓe jawdi muuɗum.
40025015	O hokki go'oto maɓɓe ceede jiinaariya dubuuje jovi, goɗɗo dubuuje ɗiɗi, tataɓo dubuu, koo moye fuu deydey e semmbee muuɗum. Ndeen o dilli.
40025016	Ɗoon e ɗoon keɓɗo dubuuje jovi yahi wa'ari ɗe luumaaku, heɓoyi riiba dubuuje jovi goɗɗe.
40025017	Kokkaaɗo dubuuje ɗiɗi, kanyum boo waɗi noon, heɓi riiba dubuuje ɗiɗi goɗɗe.
40025018	Ammaa kokkaaɗo dubuu yahi wasi ngaska, uvi ceede jawmu wuro muuɗum toon.
40025019	Too, nde ɗum neeɓi, jawmu wuro huwooɓe ɓeen warti. Sey o noddi ɓe, gam o yi'a ko koo moye maɓɓe heɓi e ceede ɗe o hokki ɓe.
40025020	Kokkaaɗo dubuuje jovi wari, waddi dubuuje jovi goɗɗe, vi'i~: «~Jawmu wuro, dubuuje jovi kokkuɗaa yam. Raa riiba dubuuje jovi ɗe keɓmi.~»
40025021	Jawmu wuro ma'ako vi'i mo~: «~Booɗɗum, aan kuwoowo goongaajo, koolaaɗo. A laatake koolaaɗo dow fii pamarum, gam ma'ajum mi kokkete ɓurɗum mawnugo. War jooɗa ha'ade am, nanden belɗum~!~»
40025022	Kuwoowo kokkaaɗo dubuuje ɗiɗi kanyum boo wari vi'i~: «~Jawmu wuro dubuuje ɗiɗi kokkuɗaa yam. Raa riiba dubuuje ɗiɗi ɗe keɓmi.~»
40025023	Jawmu wuro ma'ako vi'i mo~: «~Booɗɗum, aan kuwoowo goongaajo, koolaaɗo. A laatake koolaaɗo dow fii pamarum, gam ma'ajum mi hokkete ɓurɗum mawnugo. War jooɗa ha'ade am nanden belɗum~!~»
40025024	Ndeen kokkaaɗo dubuu wari vi'i~: «~Jawmu wuro, emi anndi a gorko ca'atuɗo, taƴeyɗo ko aawaay, giɗɗo mehere.
40025025	Kulol maaɗa waɗi njahami uɓmi ceede maaɗa ɗeen. Gam ma'ajum jaɓ ceede maaɗa~!~»
40025026	Jawmu wuro ma'ako toontii mo vi'i~: «~Aan a kuwoowo kalluɗo, jamniiɗo~! Eɗa anndi mi giɗɗo taygo ko mi aawaay e giɗɗo mehere.
40025027	To noon, e haannoo ndesaa ceede am banki to ɗe ɓesdoto. To mi wartii mi hooƴa ceede am, faa e ɓesdaari ma'aje.
40025028	Jo'oni, te'etee mo dubuu, ɓesdanon oon jogiiɗo dubuuje sappo.
40025029	Gam goonɗo fuu no ɓesdante, faa o heɓa ko ɗuuɗi. Ammaa mo walaa, koo seɗɗa ko woodi maa no jaɓtete ɗum.
40025030	Ammaa kuwoowo mehereejo o'o, peree mo yaasi nder niɓre, to ɗum voyata, eɗum nyerƴindira nyiiƴe.~»
40025031	— To Ɓii-Neɗɗo warii e teddungal muuɗum, kanko e malaa'ika'en fuu, o jooɗoto dow jooɗorgal laamu ma'ako.
40025032	Yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu no mooɓtete yeeso ma'ako, o senndey ɓe kama no gaynaako senndirta baali e be'i,
40025033	o hettina baali e junngo ma'ako nyaamo, o hettina be'i boo e junngo ma'ako nano.
40025034	Ndeen Laamiiɗo oon no vi'ey wonɓe junngo muuɗum nyaamo~: «~Ngaree, onon barkiɗinaaɓe Baaba am, nattee laamu ngu Allah siryanii on ila duuniyaaru tagaaka.
40025035	Gam mi nanii veelo on nyaamnii yam, mi ɗomɗii on njarnii yam, mi waɗii koɗaaku on mbeernii yam,
40025036	mi holii on koltinii yam, mi nyawii on nyawtii yam, mi omndaama nder kaso on ndaaroyii yam.~»
40025037	Ndeen aadali'en no ƴamey mo mbi'a~: «~Jawmiraawo, ndeye min ngi'i maa a beelaaɗo min nyaamnu ma, koo a ɗomɗuɗo min njarnu maa~?
40025038	Koo boo, ndeye min ngi'i maa a koɗo min mbeernu ma, koo a kolɗo min koltin maa~?
40025039	Ndeye min ngi'i maa a nyawɗo koo a omndaaɗo nder kaso, min ngari raargo ma~?~»
40025040	Ndeen Laamiiɗo oon toontoo ɓe vi'a~: «~Emi vi'a on goonga~: ko mbaɗanɗon go'oto ɓurɗo famɗugo nder ɓe'e goonɗinɓe yam, ɗum miin mbaɗanɗon.~»
40025041	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o vi'ey wonɓe junngo ma'ako nano~: «~Ngoɗɗee yam, onon la'anaaɓe Allah~! Njahee nattee nder yiite tabbitnge nge Allah resani Ceyɗaan e malaa'ika'en muuɗum~!
40025042	Gam mi veelaama on nyaamnaay yam, mi ɗomɗii on njarnaay yam,
40025043	mi waɗii koɗaaku on mbeernaay yam, mi holii on koltinaay yam, mi nyawii, mi omndaama nder kaso, on njahaay raargo yam.~»
40025044	Ndeen kamɓe maa, ɓe ƴamey mo ɓe mbi'a~: «~Jawmiraawo, ndeye min ngi'i maa a beelaaɗo, koo a ɗomɗuɗo, koo a koɗo, koo a kolɗo, koo a nyawɗo, koo a omndaaɗo nder kaso, min mballaay ma~?~»
40025045	O toontoo ɓe o vi'a~: «~Emi vi'a on goonga~: ko on mbaɗanaay go'oto ɓurɗo famɗugo nder ɓe'e, miin woni on mbaɗanaay.~»
40025046	Kamɓe ɓe nattey nder halkere tabbitnde, ammaa aadali'en no keɓey yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
40026001	Nde Yeesu timmini wa'aju muuɗum fuu, o vi'i almaajiri'en ma'ako~:
40026002	— On anndi balɗe ɗiɗi tan korii juulɗe Kuultol mbaɗa, ndeen ɗum hokkitirey Ɓii-Neɗɗo o waree dow gaafagal.
40026003	Wakkaci ɗuum mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en boo kawritii wuro Kayafas aardiiɗo diina mawɗo.
40026004	Ɓe fuu ɓe ndarvii no ɓe nanngirta Yeesu nder ƴoyre, ɓe mbara ɗum.
40026005	Ammaa ɓe mbi'i~: — To' en mbaɗ ɗum nder juulɗe, gam to' yimɓe umminan en haɓre.
40026006	Wakkaci ko Yeesu wonnoo si'ire Baytaaniya wuro Simon kuturuujo,
40026007	sey goɗɗo debbo wari to ma'ako, e jogii paalel haayre vi'eteende albaatir, engel heevi nebbam caɗɗam, luuɓoojam belɗum. O tawi Yeesu e nyaama, o rufi ɗam dow hoore muuɗum.
40026008	Nde almaajiri'en ngi'i ɗum, ɓe nanii monee, ɓe mbi'i~: — Nde'e na vonnere~?
40026009	Nebbam ɗaam soorreeno ceede ɗuuɗɗe ɗe kokkee sooyɓe.
40026010	Yeesu fahami ko ɓe mbi'i hakkunde maɓɓe, sey o vi'i ɓe~: — Gam ɗume torroton o'o debbo~? Ko o waɗani yam no booɗɗum.
40026011	Gam on ngondi e sooyɓe koo ndeye, ammaa miin naa koo ndeye ngondumi e mooɗon.
40026012	O rufii nebbam luuɓoojam dow ɓanndu am gam siryaago uveeki am.
40026013	Emi vi'a on goonga~: koo toye to Habaru Belɗum wa'ajinaa nder duuniyaaru fuu, ɗum volvey habaru ko o'o debbo waɗi gam hiimtaago mo.
40026014	Sey Yahuuda Iskariyooti, go'oto nder almaajiri'en sappo e ɗiɗo, yahi to mawɓe aardiiɓe diina,
40026015	o vi'i ɓe~: — Ɗume kokkoton yam to mi hollii on no nanngirton Yeesu~? Ndeen ɓe limi ceede ajurfaari talaatiin (30), ɓe kokki mo.
40026016	Gada wakkaci ma'ajum, Yahuuda fuɗɗi yillaago laawol no nyaamrata amaana Yeesu.
40026017	Nyalaande arande nde juulɗe Buroodi ɗum walaa ƴuufnirɗum, almaajiri'en ngari ƴami Yeesu mbi'i mo~: — Toye ngiɗɗaa min ciryano maa kiirtaari juulɗe Kuultol~?
40026018	O toontii ɓe, o vi'i~: — Njahee si'ire, natton wuro waane, mbi'on mo~: «~Moodibbo vi'i wakkaci muuɗum wari, nder wuro maaɗa o nyaamata nyaamdu juulɗe Kuultol, kanko e almaajiri'en ma'ako.~»
40026019	Almaajiri'en ɓeen mbaɗi ko Yeesu vi'i ɓe, ɓe ciryii kiirtaari ndiin.
40026020	Nde futuro waɗi, o jooɗodii e almaajiri'en ma'ako sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen gam ɓe kiirtoo.
40026021	Eɓe nder hiirtaago, sey Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Emi vi'a on goonga~: go'oto nder mooɗon no nyaamey amaana am.
40026022	Ɗum metti ɓerɗe maɓɓe korey, ɓe mbaɗi ga ƴamrugo mo go'oto-go'oto, koo moye fuu e vi'a~: — Jawmiraawo, inji naa ɗum miin~?
40026023	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Nyaamdeyɗo e am nder le'al go'otal, kanko nyaamata amaana am.
40026024	Doole Ɓii-Neɗɗo maaya kama ko vinndaa nder Deftere Seniinde, ammaa kayco nyaameyɗo amaana ma'ako~! Daa o rimaakano, no ɓuraneyno mo.
40026025	Sey Yahuuda nyaameyɗo amaana ma'ako ƴami mo, vi'i~: — Moodibbo, inji naa ɗum miin~? Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Aan vi'i ka e honnduko maaɗa.
40026026	Eɓe nyaama, sey Yeesu hooƴi buroodi yetti Allah, o fecci ndi o hokki almaajiri'en ma'ako, o vi'i~: — Njaɓee ɗum nyaamee, ɗum ɓanndu am.
40026027	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o hooƴi jardugel innaboojam, o yetti Allah o hokki ɓe, o vi'i~: — On fuu njaree,
40026028	gam ɗum, ɗum ƴiiƴam am, ƴiiƴam tabbitinoojam alkawal Allah, ndufeteeɗam gam ya'afuye hakkeeji yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
40026029	Emi vi'a on~: mi ɓesdataa yargo innaboojam faa nyanndeere nde njardeten ngoɗɗam kesam nder laamu Baaba am.
40026030	Nde ɓe njimi gimol juulɗe, sey ɓe mburtii, ɓe ndilliri vaamnde Jaytunje.
40026031	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i almaajiri'en muuɗum~: — Nder nde'e jemmaare, on fuu on nyaarey kibinon yam, gam Deftere vi'i~: Mi warey gaynaako, sefre baali sankitoo. Yeesu ɓesdi vi'igo~:
40026032	— Ammaa ɓaawo mi ummitake, mi aartey on yahago Gaaliili.
40026033	Ndeen Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Koo to ɓe fuu ɓe kibinii ma, miin kam mi hibintaa ma sam.
40026034	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Emi vi'i maa goonga~: nder nde'e jemmaare, ko hokka njakaraari kurkita, a vi'ey a anndaa yam faa nde tati.
40026035	Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Koo to ɗum doole mi maayda e maaɗa, mi vi'ataa mi anndaa ma sam. Almaajiri'en horiiɓe fuu mbi'i kama noon.
40026036	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, Yeesu yahadi e almaajiri'en muuɗum yaayre vi'eteende Gecemane, vi'i ɓe~: — Njooɗee ɗo'o, faa mi yaha ɗaa'e mi waɗoya do'aare.
40026037	O yahadi e Biiturus e ɓiɓɓe Jabadi ɗiɗo. Ɓernde ma'ako fuɗɗi nango torraa e mettuɗum.
40026038	Ndeen o vi'i ɓe~: — Ɓernde am mettii korey, faa ɗum yiɗii wargo yam. Ndaree ɗo'o ndeenee, to' on ɗaano.
40026039	O yahi yeeso seɗɗa, o diccii o waɗi do'aare, o vi'i~: — Baaba am, to ɗum waɗoto, sottinanam ka'a torraa. E noon fuu, to' ɗum laato no ngiɗmi, ammaa ɗum laatoo no ngiɗɗaa aan.
40026040	O vittoyi, o tawi eɓe ɗaanii. O vi'i Biiturus~: — On mbaawaay haɗgo gite mooɗon ɗoyngol, ngeewtiron yam, koo awaa go'otum naa~?
40026041	Kakkilee, mbaɗee do'aare, gam to' on njan nder jarrabeeki. Ɓernde ɓii-aadama e yiɗi waɗgo ko vooɗi, ammaa ɓanndu muuɗum tampi.
40026042	O vitti ɗiɗaɓre o waɗi do'aare, o vi'i~: — Baabiraawo, to laatake ka'a torraa hisataako sey to mi yarii ka, woor ɗuum ko ngiɗɗaa laato~!
40026043	O vittoyi to almaajiri'en kadimaa, o tawi ɓe ɗaantake, gam ɗoyngol teddungol nyo'ii gite maɓɓe.
40026044	O yahi tataɓre o waɗi do'aare kama no o waɗno.
40026045	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o vittoyi to almaajiri'en, o vi'i ɓe~: — Faa jo'oni on ɗo'o ɗaanii poofta~? Rah, wakkaci warii nde Ɓii-Neɗɗo hokketee nder juuɗe waɗooɓe hakke.
40026046	Ummee ndillen~! Raa nyaameyɗo amaana am ɗoon wara~!
40026047	Ila Yeesu timminaay volvugo, sey Yahuuda, go'oto nder almaajiri'en sappo e ɗiɗo, wardi e yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe jogiiɓe kaafaaje e cabbi. Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en liloyi ɓe.
40026048	Yahuuda nyaamoowo amaana oon hokki ɓe alaama, vi'i~: — Neɗɗo mo kinneymi kama higoo am, ɗum kanko. Nanngee mo.
40026049	Ɗoon e ɗoon Yahuuda ɓaditii Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Fooma'a Moodibbo~! Yahuuda taarii e ma'ako.
40026050	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Higoo am, timmin ko waddu maa. Ndeen ɓeen warduɓe e ma'ako fuu mbukkii e Yeesu, nanngi mo.
40026051	Go'oto nder wonduɓe e Yeesu saafti kaafahi muuɗum, fe''i nofru maccuɗo aardiiɗo diina mawɗo.
40026052	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Wa'atu kaafahi maaɗa nder hoolgo muuɗum, gam jogotooɗo kaafahi fuu, kaafahi warata ɗum.
40026053	Na a anndaa to mi torake Baaba am no lildoyey yam ko ɓuri cefe honooɓe sappo e ɗiɗi ɗe malaa'ika'en~?
40026054	Ammaa to ɗum laatake noon, noye ko vinndaa nder Deftere goonɗirta~? Gam noon nde vi'i ɗum laatoro.
40026055	Yeesu vi'i yimɓe ɓeen~: — Ko jeyi ngarduɗon e kaafaaje e cabbi gam nanngugo yam, mi pasoowo naa~? Dum emi nder Wuro Allah Seniingo wa'ajina, on nanngaay yam.
40026056	Ammaa ɗum fuu ɗum waɗii gam hebbingo ko annabo'en mbinndi nder Deftere Seniinde. Ndeen almaajiri'en ɓeen fuu nyaari kibini mo.
40026057	Nannguɓe Yeesu ɓeen njaharii mo to Kayafas aardiiɗo diina mawɗo, toon to moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en fuu kawriti.
40026058	Biiturus tokkiri Yeesu kosngel gulngel, faa ɓe njottii wuro aardiiɗo diina mawɗo. O natti nder wuro o jooɗodii e reenooɓe, gam o yi'a no ɗum heyrata.
40026059	Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e Kawtal Sernooɓe Yahuudu'en fuu ngillake caaydaaku fewre dow Yeesu, gam ɓe keɓa daliila wargo mo.
40026060	Ammaa ɓe keɓaay, koo nde yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngaddi caaydaakuuji fewre dow ma'ako. Ndeen worɓe ɗiɗo ummii,
40026061	mbi'i~: — O'o neɗɗo vi'iino e waawi yibbingo Wuro Allah Seniingo, ndeen nyiɓtoo ngo nder balɗe tati.
40026062	Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo ummii, vi'i Yeesu~: — A walaa ka toontotoɗaa dow ko ɓe'e yimɓe caaydii dow maaɗa naa~?
40026063	Ammaa Yeesu de''iti. Sey aardiiɗo diina mawɗo oon vi'i mo~: — Mi ƴamrii ma e innde Allah mo yonki, yecca min kul aan woni Almasiifu Ɓiɗɗo Allah.
40026064	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Aan vi'i ka e honnduko maaɗa. Kadimaa emi vi'a on~: yeeso ɗo'o on ngi'ey Ɓii-Neɗɗo e jooɗii e junngo Jawmu Baawɗe nyaamo, emo wara nder duule asama.
40026065	Ndeen aardiiɗo diina mawɗo huunƴi, seeki koltal muuɗum vi'i~: — O famɗinii Allah~! En ngalaa bukaata caaydu'en feere~! On nanii e noppi mooɗon o famɗinii Allah.
40026066	Noye mbiiɗon~? Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — O fotii wareego.
40026067	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, ɓe tuutani mo joode e yeeso, ɓe lukki mo. Woɓɓe maɓɓe menngii mo,
40026068	ɓe mbi'i~: — Aan Almasiifu, to a annabiijo, yecca min piiɗo ma.
40026069	Wakkaci ɗuum Biiturus e jooɗii nder fiiliire wuro ngoon. Sey go'oto nder horɓe aardiiɗo diina ɓaditii mo vi'i~: — Aan maa, a wondunoo e Yeesu mo Gaaliili.
40026070	Ammaa Biiturus yeddi mo yeeso yimɓe fuu, vi'i~: — Mi fahamaay ɗuum ko mbiiɗaa.
40026071	Ndeen Biiturus ummii yahi dammugal wuro. Korɗo feere yi'i mo, vi'i ɓeen wonɓe ɗoon~: — O'o gorko e wondunoo e Yeesu mo Najaratu.
40026072	Biiturus kadimaa yeddi, hunii vi'i~: — Mi anndaa gorko oon.
40026073	Nde yaawtii seɗɗa, ɓeen wonɓe ɗoon ɓaditii Biiturus, mbi'i mo~: — Daahir a go'oto maɓɓe, gam bolle maaɗa e kolla to iɓɗaa.
40026074	Ndeen Biiturus yeddi ɓe, hunii vi'i~: — Kul emi anndi gorko oon, yala mi maay~! E wakkaci ɗuum, njakaraari kurkiti.
40026075	Ndeen Biiturus hiimtii ko Yeesu vi'inoo ɗum~: — Ko hokka njakaraari kurkita, a yeddey anndugo yam nde tati. Sey Biiturus vurtii yaasi, o voyi korey.
40027001	Ila fajiri mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en kawriti ndarvi no mbardata Yeesu.
40027002	Ndeen ɓe kaɓɓi mo, ɓe njahari mo to Bilaatus gomnaajo.
40027003	Nde Yahuuda nyaamɗo amaana Yeesu oon yi'i ɓe taƴanii Yeesu ceri'a maayde, o voytii ɗum, o wartirani mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e arɓe leƴƴi ceede ajurfaari talaatiin (30).
40027004	O vi'i ɓe~: — Mi waɗii hakke nde kokkitirmi mo vi'aay waɗaay, gam waree~! Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Minon ko waanni min~? Aan anndi~!
40027005	Yahuuda feri ceede ɗeen nder Wuro Seniingo, hooƴi ɓoggol ɓiltii wari hoore muuɗum.
40027006	Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina kooƴi ceede ɗeen, mbi'i~: — Ceri'a meeɗen haɗii en resgo iri ɗe'e ceede nder ndesaari Wuro Seniingo, gam ɗum ceede war-hoore.
40027007	Ɓaawo ɓe mbaɗii caawara, ɓe kooƴi ceede ɗeen, ɓe coodi ɗe ngesaa mahoowo gaheeje, gam ɓe uvata maayɓe jananɓe toon.
40027008	Kanjum waɗi, gada ndeen faa wargo hannde, ngesaa kaan e noddiree «~Ngesaa Ƴiiƴam~».
40027009	Noon ko Allah vi'inoo gada e honnduko annabi Yeremiya goonɗiri, nde o vi'i~: «~Ɓe kooƴii ceede ajurfaari talaatiin (30), coggu ngu yimɓe Isiraa'iila taƴani mo,
40027010	ɓe coodi ɗe ngesaa mahoowo gaheeje, kama noon no Jawmiraawo vi'inoo yam.~»
40027011	Yeesu darii yeeso Bilaatus. Sey Bilaatus ƴami mo vi'i~: — Aan woni laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en naa~? Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Aan vi'i ka e honnduko maaɗa.
40027012	Ammaa nde mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en mbaɗi ga wullaago mo, o toontaaki ɓe koo ɗume.
40027013	Kanjum waɗi Bilaatus vi'i mo~: — A nanaay wullaandu ndu ɓe ngullori maa naa~?
40027014	Ammaa Yeesu toontaaki mo koo voliinde wo'ore. Ɗum haaynii Bilaatus korey.
40027015	Nde juulɗe Kuultol njaalti fuu, gomnaajo e voovi yoofango yimɓe ɓeen kaɓɓaaɗo kaso go'oto, mo ɓe ngiɗi.
40027016	Wakkaci ɗuum, e woodi goɗɗo kaɓɓaaɗo kalluɗo anndanaaɗo, bi'eteeɗo Yeesu Barabas.
40027017	Bilaatus ƴami yimɓe hawritɓe ɓeen vi'i~: — Moye ngiɗɗon mi yoofana on~: Yeesu Barabas, nakay Yeesu bi'eteeɗo Almasiifu~?
40027018	Bilaatus e anndi nalwiiru tan waɗi Yahuudu'en ngullorii Yeesu to muuɗum.
40027019	Nde Bilaatus jooɗii yaayre to waɗata ceri'a, sey debbo ma'ako liloyi to ma'ako, vi'i~: — Woor on ɗoon gorko mo waɗaay ko halli, gam hanki mi torrake korey nde koyɗumoomi.
40027020	Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en igii jama'aare ndeen toroo Bilaatus yoofana ɓe Barabas, wara Yeesu.
40027021	Bilaatus ƴamtii ɓe vi'i~: — Moye ngiɗɗon mi yoofana on nder ɓe'e worɓe ɗiɗo~? Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Barabas~!
40027022	Bilaatus ƴamtii ɓe vi'i~: — To noon, noye ngiɗɗon mi waɗana Yeesu bi'eteeɗo Almasiifu~? Ɓe fuu ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Ɓil mo dow gaafagal~!
40027023	O ƴamtii ɓe, o vi'i~: — Ndeye halleende o waɗi~? Sey ɓe ɓesdi wullugo e semmbee, ɓe mbi'i~: — Ɓil mo dow gaafagal~!
40027024	Nde Bilaatus yi'i waawataa fahamindirgo e maɓɓe, eɓe ngiɗi ummingo haɓre boo, sey o hooƴi ndiyam, o looti juuɗe ma'ako yeeso jama'aare fuu, o vi'i ɓe~: — Miin kam, walaa ko waanni yam, mi hooƴataa hakke wargo mo walaa layfi. Onon ɗum horani.
40027025	Ɓe fuu ɓe toontii mo ɓe mbi'i~: — Hakke ƴiiƴam ma'ako yana dow ko'e amin e ɓiɓɓe amin~!
40027026	Ndeen Bilaatus yoofani ɓe Barabas, o vi'i Yeesu fiiree looci. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o hokkitiri Yeesu ɓiloyee dow gaafagal.
40027027	Ndeen soojeeji njahari Yeesu nder wuro Bilaatus, ɓe fuu ɓe kowi mo.
40027028	Ɓe ɓorti mo kolte ma'ako, ɓe ɓorni mo burnus boɗeejum.
40027029	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, ɓe mbami gi'e, ɓe ngiifi mo. Ɓe kokki mo sawru laamu e junngo ma'ako nyaamo. Ɓe ndiccii yeeso ma'ako, eɓe njaltinira mo eɓe mbi'a~: — Allah sabbinane laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en~!
40027030	Ɓe tuutani mo joode, ɓe njaɓi sawru nduun, ɓe piiri mo ndu dow hoore.
40027031	Nde ɓe keyni jaltinirgo mo, ɓe ɓorti mo burnus ɗuum, ɓe ɓorni mo kolte ma'ako. Ndeen ɓe mburtini mo, ɓe aardini mo, gam ɓe ɓiloya mo dow gaafagal.
40027032	Nde ɓe mburtotoo si'ire ndeen, ɓe potti e goɗɗo gorko ivoyɗo si'ire Sireene bi'eteeɗo Simon. Soojeeji ndooli mo o vakkoo gaafagal Yeesu.
40027033	Ɓe njottii yaayre vi'eteende Golgota, waato Gumbal Hoore.
40027034	Ɓe kokki Yeesu innaboojam njillindiraaɗam e goɗɗum kaaɗɗum gam o yara, ammaa nde o vooɓi ɗam o salii yargo.
40027035	Nde ɓe ɓili mo dow gaafagal, ɓe cenndiri kolte ma'ako e waɗgo cuɓol.
40027036	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, ɓe njooɗii ɗoon ɓe ndeeni mo.
40027037	Ɓe mbinndi dow alluwaawal daliila ko ɓili mo, ɓe takki ɗum dow hoore gaafagal ma'ako. Raa ko ɓe mbinndi~: «~O'o kam woni Yeesu laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.~»
40027038	Ɓe ɓildi mo e wuyɓe ɗiɗo, go'oto e junngo ma'ako nyaamo, go'oto boo e nano.
40027039	Yimɓe wutotooɓe ɗoon ndimmbi ko'e mu''en e kuɗa mo,
40027040	e mbi'a~: — Aan biiɗo no yibbiney Wuro Allah Seniingo, nyiɓtoo ngo nder balɗe tati, hisnu hoore maaɗa mana. To a Ɓiɗɗo Allah, jippoya dow gaafagal~!
40027041	Noon boo mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en fuu njaltiniri mo, mbi'i~:
40027042	— O hisniino woɓɓe, ammaa o waawaay hisnugo hoore ma'ako. To kanko o laamiiɗo Isiraa'iila, woor o jippoyoo dow gaafagal, gam faa ngoonɗinen mo.
40027043	O hokkii hoore ma'ako e Allah. Kul Allah e yiɗi mo, no hisnu mo jo'oni ngi'en, gam o vi'ii o Ɓiɗɗo Allah.
40027044	Wuyɓe ɓildaaɓe e ma'ako boo, mbaɗi ga huɗrugo mo kama noon.
40027045	Ila caka nyalawma niɓre suddi lesdi fuu, faa yahago njamndi tati ndi alaasara.
40027046	Faro njamndi tati ndi alaasara, Yeesu towni voliinde vi'i~: — Eloy, Eloy, lama sabaktani~? Waato~: «~Allah am, Allah am~! Gam ɗume kibinirɗaa yam~?~»
40027047	Nde woɓɓe nder dariiɓe toon nani ɗum, ɓe mbi'i~: — Emo nodda annabi Iliya~!
40027048	Ɗoon e ɗoon, goɗɗo nyaari hooƴoyi sooso, suuvi ɗum nder innaboojam lammuɗam, haɓɓi ɗum e loosol, o takki ɗum e honnduko Yeesu, gam musina ɗum.
40027049	Ammaa horiiɓe mbi'i~: — Munyee ngi'en koo maa Iliya e wara hisna mo.
40027050	Yeesu ɓesdi wullugo e semmbee, ndeen o maayi.
40027051	E wakkaci ɗuum, wudere wonnde nder Wuro Allah Seniingo seeki gada dow faa lees, nde waɗi cende ɗiɗi. Lesdi dimmbii, kaaƴe pusi,
40027052	genaale omti, seniiɓe ɗuuɗɓe maaynooɓe ummitii,
40027053	ɓe mburtii nder genaale. Ɓaawo ummitaaki Yeesu ɓe natti si'ire seniinde, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngi'i ɓe.
40027054	Mawɗo soojeeji e darodiiɓe e muuɗum gam reengo Yeesu, nde ɓe ngi'i no lesdi dimmborii e ko laatii fuu, sey ɓe kultori ɓe mbi'i~: — Goonga, o'o neɗɗo o Ɓiɗɗo Allah~!
40027055	Rewɓe ɗuuɗɓe warduɓe e Yeesu gada Gaaliili e kuwana mo, ɓe ndarii to woɗɗi eɓe kollira ko laatotoo.
40027056	Nder rewɓe ɓeen e woodi Maryaama mo Magadaaliya, e Maryaama inna Yaakuubu e Yusufu, e inna ɓiɓɓe Jabadi.
40027057	Nde alaasara waɗi, goɗɗo diskuɗo mo si'ire Aramaatiya bi'eteeɗo Yusufu wari. Kanko boo o tokkuɗo Yeesu.
40027058	O yahi to Bilaatus, o torii ɗum ɓanndu Yeesu. Bilaatus jaɓi o hokkee ɓanndu nduun.
40027059	Sey Yusufu hooƴi ɓanndu nduun, taardi ndu wudere raneere,
40027060	o wallini ndu nder yenaande hesre nde o wasannoo hoore ma'ako nder haayre. Ndeen o talliti haayre teddunde, o omndi honnduko yenaande, o dilli.
40027061	Maryaama mo Magadaaliya e goɗɗo Maryaama e njooɗii ha'ade ku'uci e yenaande ndeen.
40027062	Jonto ma'ajum, waato nyannde-fooftiinde, mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e Fariisa'en kawriti to Bilaatus,
40027063	ɓe mbi'i mo~: — Laamiiɗo, min kiimtake nde majjinoowo yimɓe oon foofeynoo, o vi'ii to o maayii, ɓaawo balɗe tati o ummitoto.
40027064	Gam ma'ajum, igga mbi'aa ɗum reena yenaande ndeen faa balɗe tati ɗeen nguto, gam to' almaajiri'en ma'ako ngar ngujja ɓanndu ma'ako, mbi'a yimɓe o ummitake nder maayɓe. Ndeen majjinki yimɓe cakitiiki no ɓurey arani hallugo.
40027065	Bilaatus vi'i ɓe~: — Too, raa soojeeji reenooɓe, njahee ndeennee ɓe yenaande ndeen keerol no mbaawɗon fuu~!
40027066	Ɓe njahi yenaande, ɓe takki lammba laamiiɗo dow kaaƴa omndiraanga yenaande ndeen, ɓe ndarni soojeeji ndeena nde booɗɗum.
40028001	Nde nyannde-fooftiinde ndeen wuti, nyannde alat ila fajiri cuɓ, Maryaama mo Magadaaliya e goɗɗo Maryaama njahi yi'igo yenaande.
40028002	Ɗoon e ɗoon lesdi dimmbii dimmbaaki cemmbiɗki. Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo jippoyii gada dow talli kaaƴa omndiraanga yenaande ndeen, o jooɗii dow ma'aga.
40028003	Emo ɗelkitoo kama maƴƴere, kolte ma'ako ndanni tar kama hottollo.
40028004	Reenooɓe ɓeen kuli korey, faa ɓe mbaɗi ga diwnugo, ɓe ndo''ii e lesdi, ɓe laatii kama maayɓe.
40028005	Malaa'ikaajo vi'i rewɓe ɓeen~: — To' on kul~! Emi anndi Yeesu baraaɗo dow gaafagal ndaaroton.
40028006	O walaa ɗo'o, o ummitake kama no o vi'inoo. Ngaree ngi'on to o wallinano.
40028007	Njaawnee njahee ngeccooɗon almaajiri'en ma'ako o ummitake nder maayde. Jo'oni o aartey on yahago lesdi Gaaliili. Toon ngi'oton mo. Kanka ngiɗmi vi'igo on.
40028008	Rewɓe ɓeen ndilli ɗoon e yawɗaare, eɓe keevi kulol e velvelo. Ɓe nyaari gam ɓe ngeccoyoo almaajiri'en ma'ako habaru ɗuum.
40028009	Ɗoon e ɗoon Yeesu fotti e maɓɓe, vi'i~: — Salaama aleekum~! Ɓe ɓaditii mo ɓe nanngi kosɗe ma'ako ɓe cujjidani mo.
40028010	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — To' on kul~! Njahee mbi'ee banndiraaɓe am njaha Gaaliili. Toon ɓe ngi'ata yam.
40028011	Ila rewɓe ɓeen e dow laawol, sey woɓɓe nder soojeeji reennooɓe yenaande njahi si'ire, ngeccii mawɓe aardiiɓe diina ko laatii fuu.
40028012	Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina kawriti e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en, ɓe mbaɗi caawara ɓe kokki soojeeji reenɓe yenaande ndeen ceede ɗuuɗɗe,
40028013	ɓe mbi'i ɓe~: — Mbi'ee yimɓe~: «~Almaajiri'en ma'ako ngari jemma tawi on ɗaanii, ngujji mo.~»
40028014	To Bilaatus nanii ka, min mbaɗey dabaree de''itingo mo, min kisna on torraa fuu.
40028015	Soojeeji ɓeen njaɓi ceede ɗeen, ɓe mbaɗi kama no ɓe mbi'aa. Noon habaru ɗuum sankitorii nder Yahuudu'en faa wargo hannde.
40028016	Almaajiri'en sappo e go'o njahi Gaaliili dow vaamnde nde Yeesu tindinnoo ɓe.
40028017	Nde ɓe ngi'i mo ɓe cujjidani mo, ammaa woɓɓe maɓɓe cekkii naa ɗum kanko.
40028018	Yeesu ɓaditii ɓe, vi'i~: — Mi hokkaama baawɗe dow asama e lesdi fuu.
40028019	Gam ma'ajum, njahee laatinee leƴƴi duuniyaaru fuu almaajiri'en am, mbaɗanee ɓe baptisma nder innde Baabiraawo e Ɓiɗɗo e Ruhu Ceniiɗo,
40028020	ekkitinee ɓe, ɓe tokka ɗuum ko mbi'imi on fuu. Anndee emi wondi e mooɗon koo ndeye, faa timmoode duuniyaaru.
41001001	Ɗu'um woni fuɗɗoode Habaru Belɗum dow Yeesu Almasiifu Ɓiɗɗo Allah.
41001002	Ɗum fuɗɗiri noon no ɗum vinndiraa nder deftere annabi Ecaaya vi'igo~: Allah vi'i~: Mi liloyey lilaaɗo am o aardoo yeeso maaɗa, o mo''inan maa laawol.
41001003	Goɗɗo e waɗa ka wooyya nder ladde e vi'a~: Mo''inee ɗatal gam Jawmiraawo, poortee laawol gam garol ma'ako.
41001004	Lilaaɗo oon woni Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma. O vanngii nder ladde, emo wa'ajina yimɓe, emo vi'a~: — Tuubee, ɗum waɗana on baptisma, keɓon ya'afuye hakkeeji mooɗon.
41001005	Yimɓe lesdi Yahuudiya e yimɓe si'ire Urusaliima fuu ngari to ma'ako, e ngeccoo hakkeeji mu''en, Yahayya boo e waɗana ɓe baptisma nder maayo Urdun.
41001006	Yahayya e ɓornii koltal leeɓe geelooɗi, emo taadii taadorde laral, emo nyaama baɓɓatti e njuumri ladde.
41001007	Emo wa'ajina, emo vi'a~: — Goɗɗo e wara ɓaawo am, o ɓurii yam baawɗe, koo ɓoggi paɗe ma'ako mi fotaay turaago mi fiɓta.
41001008	Mi waɗanii on baptisma e ndiyam, ammaa kanko o waɗaney on baptisma e Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
41001009	Nder balɗe ɗeen Yeesu ummii si'ire Najaratu nder lesdi Gaaliili, o wari to Yahayya. Yahayya waɗani mo baptisma nder maayo Urdun.
41001010	Ɗoon to Yeesu vurtii ndiyam, o yi'i dow e omtii, Ruhu Allah e jippoyoo dow ma'ako nder nanndi foondu.
41001011	Voliinde ivoyi dow vi'i~: «~Aan a Ɓiyam mo ngiɗmi. Emi nana belɗum maaɗa.~»
41001012	Ɗoon e ɗoon Ruhu Allah yahari mo nder ladde.
41001013	Toon o waɗi balɗe arba'iin (40), Ceyɗaan e jarraboo mo. Emo nder diiwe ladde, malaa'ika'en e kuwana mo.
41001014	Too, ɓaawo omndeeki Yahayya nder kaso, Yeesu yahi Gaaliili e wa'ajina Habaru Belɗum ivoyɗum to Allah.
41001015	Emo vi'a~: — Wakkaci waɗi, laamu Allah ɓadake. Tuubee, njaɓon Habaru Belɗum.
41001016	Yeesu e tokkiti regorde maayo Gaaliili, sey o yi'i Simon e minyum Anndaraawus nanngooɓe liƴƴi, e pera nanngirɗum liƴƴi nder ndiyam.
41001017	Sey Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Tokkee yam, mi waɗa on waddeyɓe yimɓe to am.
41001018	Ɗoon e ɗoon ɓe ngoori nanngirɗum liƴƴi maɓɓe, ɓe tokki mo.
41001019	Nde o yahi yeeso seɗɗa, o yi'i Yaakuubu ɓii Jabadi e minyum Yahayya nder akali mu''en, eɓe mo''ina nanngirɗum liƴƴi maɓɓe.
41001020	Ɗoon e ɗoon o noddi ɓe, ɓe ngoori baaba maɓɓe Jabadi e huwooɓe maɓɓe nder akali, ɓe tokki Yeesu.
41001021	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum njahi si'ire Kafarnahum. Nyannde-fooftiinde o natti suudu-wa'ajordu, o fuɗɗi ekkitingo.
41001022	Ekkitinol ma'ako haaynii ɓe, gam o ekkitiniraay ɓe noon no moodiɓɓe Tawreeta ekkitinirta, ammaa o ekkitinii ɓe e baawɗe ɗe ngeddataako.
41001023	Nder suudu-wa'ajordu nduun, e woodi goɗɗo mo ginnol. Ɗoon e ɗoon o wulli e semmbee,
41001024	o vi'i~: — Ko waannu maa e amin Yeesu mo Najaratu~? A warii gam halkugo min naa~? Emi anndi a moye~: a Ceniiɗo ivoyɗo to Allah.
41001025	Yeesu nyaaɗani ngol vi'i~: — De''u~! Vurta nder ma'ako.
41001026	Sey ginnol ngool giggigii mo e semmbee, ngol halɓi, ngol vurtii mo.
41001027	Jama'aare ndeen fuu haayɗini, ɓe mbaɗi ga ƴamƴamtirgo, eɓe mbi'a~: — Ɗu'um maa ɗum ɗume~? Ngo'ol ekkitinol no kesol~! O'o neɗɗo e woodi baawɗe, faa e ginnaaji e mbaɗa ko o vi'i.
41001028	Nder wakkaci seɗɗa habaru Yeesu sankitii koo toye nder lesdi Gaaliili.
41001029	Ɗoon e ɗoon Yeesu e Yaakuubu e Yahayya mburtii nder suudu-wa'ajordu nduun, ɓe njahi wuro Simon e Anndaraawus.
41001030	Esoo Simon debbo e waalii haɓda e jonte. E jottaaki Yeesu ɓe kokki ɗum habaru ma'ako.
41001031	Sey Yeesu yahi to ma'ako nanngi mo junngo ummini mo. Ɗoon e ɗoon yontere ndeen yoofi mo, o ummii o veerni ɓe.
41001032	Futuro, ɓaawo mutki naange, yimɓe ngaddani Yeesu nyawɓe, e woonɓe ginnaaji ɗuuɗɓe.
41001033	Sey yimɓe si'ire fuu kawriti e dammugal wuro ngoon.
41001034	Yeesu yamɗitini nyawɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɓe nyawuuji feere-feere. Kadimaa o tuufi ginnaaji ɗuuɗɗi, o wooraay ɗi, ɗi mbolvi, gam eɗi anndi o moye.
41001035	Jonto ma'ajum Yeesu davi ila fajiri, o yahi woɗnde yaayre to walaa koo moye, o waɗi do'aare.
41001036	Sey Simon e wonduɓe e muuɗum ndilli yillaago mo.
41001037	Nde ɓe keɓti mo, ɓe mbi'i mo~: — Yimɓe fuu e ngillo maa~!
41001038	Sey Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — En njah ci'e gonɗe ɗo'o ha'ade, mi wa'ajina toon maa, gam kanjum waddi yam.
41001039	O yahi koo toye nder lesdi Gaaliili, emo wa'ajina nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi maɓɓe, emo vurtinana yimɓe ginnaaji.
41001040	Goɗɗo mo kuturta wari to Yeesu, diccii torii mo vi'i~: — To a jaɓii, a waawi yamɗitingo yam.
41001041	Jurumɗum nanngi Yeesu, o foorti junngo, o meemi mo, o vi'i~: — Mi jaɓii, yamɗit~!
41001042	Ɗoon e ɗoon nyawu nguun yoofi mo, o yamɗiti.
41001043	Sey Yeesu sallamii mo, ammaa fooɗi noppi ma'ako vi'i~:
41001044	— Hakkil, ta'a vi'i ka koo moye, ammaa yah kollaa hoore maaɗa to aardiiɗo diina, mbaɗaa sadaka ka Muusa vi'i ɗum waɗa, gam a laɓɓinaama. Waɗ ɗum, gam anndingo yimɓe a yamɗitii.
41001045	Ammaa kanko o dilli o fuɗɗi sankitgo habaru ɗuum koo toye, faa Yeesu waawaay nattugo si'ire. O jooɗii nder ladde. Yimɓe mbaɗi ga wargo to ma'ako gada koo toye.
41002001	Ɓaawo balɗe seɗɗa Yeesu hooti Kafarnahum. Yimɓe nani habaru o wartii emo wuro.
41002002	Jama'aare ɗuuɗnde hawriti e wuro ngoon, ngo heevi tep, koo to neɗɗo tuuta joode walaa. Yeesu wa'ajini ɓe voliinde Allah.
41002003	Sey woɓɓe ngari, ngaddani mo goɗɗo buusaaɗo, worɓe nayo e ndoondii mo.
41002004	Ammaa ɓe keɓaay nattingo mo to Yeesu woni, gam yimɓe ɗuuɗii. Sey ɓe ƴeenti dow suudu nduun, ɓe njuli ndu deydey to Yeesu woni, ɓe njippiniri mo yulannde ndeen dow be'itum ma'ako.
41002005	Nde Yeesu yi'i goonɗinki maɓɓe, o vi'i buusaaɗo oon~: — Higoo, hakkeeji maaɗa nja'afaama.
41002006	Woɓɓe moodiɓɓe Tawreeta jooɗiiɓe ɗoon puɗɗi nyumgo nder ɓerɗe mu''en,
41002007	ɓe mbi'i~: — Ɗum iri kaye o'o gorko vi'ata~? Emo fotna hoore ma'ako e Allah~! Moye waawata ya'afaago hakke to naa Allah~?
41002008	Ɗoon e ɗoon Yeesu fahami ko ɓe nyumata nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, o vi'i ɓe~: — Gam ɗume nyumoton iri ɗi'i nyumooji nder ɓerɗe mooɗon~?
41002009	Ɗume ɓuri hoygo, vi'igo o'o buusaaɗo hakkeeji ma'ako nja'afaama, na vi'igo mo o ummoo o daroo o hooƴa be'itum ma'ako~?
41002010	Ammaa gam anndon Ɓii-Neɗɗo e woodi baawɗe ya'afaago hakkeeji nder duuniyaaru. Sey o vi'i buusaaɗo oon~:
41002011	— Emi vi'i maa~: «~Umma hooy be'itum maaɗa hoot.~»
41002012	Ɗoon e ɗoon o ummii o hooƴi be'itum ma'ako, o vurtii yeeso koo moye. Fii ɗuum haaynii wonɓe ɗoon fuu, ɓe maalti Allah, ɓe mbi'i~: — Min meeɗaay yi'igo iri ɗu'um abadaa~!
41002013	Yeesu so''ii regorde maayo Gaaliili. Jama'aare ɗuuɗnde wari to ma'ako, o ekkitini ɓe.
41002014	Emo ƴaɓɓoo, o yi'i Leewi ɓii Alfaa e jooɗii to ɗum jaɓata ceede janngal, sey Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Tokkam. Leewi ummii tokki mo.
41002015	Woɗnde nyanndeere Yeesu e tokkuɓe ɗum e njooɗii kiirtoo nder wuro Leewi. Jaɓooɓe janngal ɗuuɗɓe e waɗooɓe hakke e kiirtodoo e Yeesu, kam e tokkuɓe ɗum, gam ɗuuɗma nder tokkuɓe mo ɗum iri maɓɓe.
41002016	Nde moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e Fariisa'en ngi'i Yeesu e nyaamda e waɗooɓe hakke e jaɓooɓe janngal, ɓe mbi'i tokkuɓe mo~: — Ko jeyi o nyaamdata e jaɓooɓe janngal e waɗooɓe hakke~?
41002017	Nde Yeesu nani ka, o vi'i ɓe~: — Yamɓe ngalaa bukaata nyawtoowo, sey nyawɓe. Mi waraay gam noddugo tammiiɓe no goonga'en, ammaa mi warii noddugo annduɓe no waɗooɓe hakke.
41002018	Almaajiri'en Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma e ɓe Fariisa'en e cuumoo. Sey woɓɓe ngari ƴami Yeesu~: — Gam ɗume almaajiri'en Yahayya e ɓe Fariisa'en e cuumoo, ammaa ɓe maaɗa cuumataako~?
41002019	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — E giiɗe mooɗon, warɓe koobgal e cuumoo wakkaci ɗum kooviiɗo wondi e maɓɓe naa~? To faa eɓe ngondi e kooviiɗo, ɓe cuumataako.
41002020	Ammaa wakkaci e wara nde kooviiɗo oon hooƴetee nder maɓɓe, wakkaci ɗuum ɓe cuumoto.
41002021	Walaa pitreyɗo koltal kihingal e lefel kesel. To o waɗii noon, lefel kesel no seekey koltal kihingal, ndeen ceekol ngool no ɓurey ngol naane.
41002022	Noon boo, walaa looveyɗo innaboojam kesam nder saaɗkiwu kihingu. To o waɗii noon, ɗam ƴuufey, ɗam fusa saaɗkiwu nguun, ndeen ɗum heppey innaboojam faa e saaɗkiwu. Ammaa innaboojam kesam e haani loovee nder saaɗkiwu kesu.
41002023	Nyannde-fooftiinde feere, Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum ndaacii nder gese alkamaari. Sey almaajiri'en puɗɗi ɓorgo butaali e murjoo e ƴakka.
41002024	Ndeen Fariisa'en mbi'i mo~: — Hina ko almaajiri'en maaɗa mbaɗata. Ko jeyi ɓe mbaɗanta ko Tawreeta haɗi waɗeego nyannde-fooftiinde~?
41002025	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — On meeɗaay janngugo ko Dawda waɗi, kam e yahadiɗɗaaɓe muuɗum wakkaci nde dolo e cooyal nanngi ɓe naa~?
41002026	Nder jaamaniiru ndu Abiyatar laatii aardiiɗo diina mawɗo, Dawda natti Wuro Allah Seniingo nyaami buroodi desanaaɗum Allah, ɗum Tawreeta haɗi koo moye nyaamgo, sey aardiiɓe diina tan. Ammaa Dawda nyaami ɗum, faa maa o hokkori yahadiɗɗaaɓe ma'ako.
41002027	Sey Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Nyannde-fooftiinde waɗaama gam neɗɗo, naa neɗɗo waɗaa gam nyannde-fooftiinde.
41002028	Gam ma'ajum, Ɓii-Neɗɗo woni jawmu koo ɗume, faa e nyannde-fooftiinde.
41003001	Wakkaci feere Yeesu natti suudu-wa'ajordu. Nder ma'aru e woodi goɗɗo mo junngo muuɗum waati.
41003002	Woɓɓe nder ma'aru e kora mo, ngi'a kul o yamɗitiney neɗɗo oon nyannde-fooftiinde, gam ɓe keɓa ko ɓe ngullorii mo.
41003003	Sey Yeesu vi'i mo junngo waatngo oon~: — Umma dara ɗo'o hakkunde maɓɓe.
41003004	Ndeen Yeesu ƴami ɓe vi'i~: — Ɗume Tawreeta vi'i waɗee nyannde-fooftiinde~? Ko vooɗi nakay ko halli~? Hisnugo yonki na wargo ki~? Ammaa ɓe fuu ɓe nde''iti.
41003005	Yeesu raari ɓe nder huunƴere, ca'atal ɓerɗe maɓɓe naawi mo. O vi'i mo junngo waatngo oon~: — Foortu junngo maaɗa. O foorti ngo, ngo yamɗiti.
41003006	Ɗoon e ɗoon Fariisa'en mburtii wa'ajordu nduun, ɓe puɗɗi wa'adugo e yimɓe Hiruudus caawara dow no ɓe mbardata Yeesu.
41003007	-
41003008	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, Yeesu dillidi e almaajiri'en muuɗum yahago maayo Gaaliili. Jama'aare ɗuuɗnde gada Gaaliili e Yahuudiya e Urusaliima e Idumiya e fu'una maayo Urdun e ci'e Tiir e Sidon tokki mo. Jama'aare ndeen fuu wari to ma'ako, gam ɓe nanii habaru kuuɗe ɗe o waɗata.
41003009	Yeesu vi'i almaajiri'en muuɗum ngaddana ɗum akali, gam to' jama'aare hawritnde ɓiɗɗu mo.
41003010	O waɗii noon, gam o hoynii yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, kanjum waɗi nyawɓe fuu mbaɗi ga nyo'indirgo gam meema mo.
41003011	Wakkaci nde woonɓe ginnaaji ngi'i mo fuu, sey ɓe kippoo yeeso ma'ako eɓe mbi'a e semmbee~: — Aan, a Ɓiɗɗo Allah~!
41003012	Ammaa o nyaaɗani ɗi to' ɗi mbanngin o moye.
41003013	Yeesu ƴeenti vaamnde, o noddi ɓe o yiɗi ngara to ma'ako. Ɓe ngari.
41003014	O suɓi sappo e ɗiɗo nder maɓɓe, gam ɓe ngonda e ma'ako, o lila ɓe wa'ajinoygo,
41003015	o hokki ɓe baawɗe tuufgo ginnaaji.
41003016	Raa inɗe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen ɓe o suɓi~: Simon mo o hokki innde Biiturus,
41003017	e Yaakuubu ɓii Jabadi, e minyum Yahayya ɓe o hokki innde Bowanerges, waato Ɓiɓɓe Riggaango,
41003018	e Anndaraawus, e Filibus, e Bartalamaawus, e Matta, e Tooma, e Yaakuubu ɓii Alfaa, e Taddiyus, e Simon kaɓaneyɗo rimɗingo lenyol muuɗum,
41003019	e Yahuuda Iskariyooti nyaameyɗo amaana Yeesu.
41003020	Ndeen Yeesu warti wuro. Kadimaa yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe kawriti to ma'ako, faa kanko e almaajiri'en ma'ako ɓe mbaawaay nyaamgo nyaamdu.
41003021	Nde banndiraaɓe ma'ako nani ɗum, ɓe ngari ɓe kooƴa mo, gam ɓe mbi'aama o haaŋaama.
41003022	Moodiɓɓe Tawreeta warɓe gada Urusaliima mbi'i~: — Ba'aljabul laamiiɗo ginnaaji nanngi mo, e baawɗe muuɗum o vurtinirta ginnaaji.
41003023	Ndeen Yeesu noddi ɓe valndani ɓe, vi'i~: — Noye Ceyɗaan waawrata vurtingo Ceyɗaan~?
41003024	To laamu sennditake e honhontira, ngu waawataa daraago.
41003025	Noon boo, to wuro sennditake e honhontira, wuro ngoon darataako.
41003026	To Ceyɗaan ummake e hona hoore muuɗum, to o sennditake, ndeen laamu ma'ako waawataa daraago. To noon, timmoode ma'agu warii.
41003027	Yeesu tokki vi'igo~: — Walaa baaweyɗo nattugo wuro neɗɗo cemmbiɗɗo, te'eta mo areeji ma'ako, to naa o aartu o haɓɓi mo tawo, ndeen emo waawi hooygo ko woni nder wuro ngoon fuu.
41003028	Emi vi'a on goonga~: yimɓe e mbaawi ya'afaneego hakkeeji mu''en e koo iri ɗiye haalaaji yavaare ɗi ɓe mbolvi dow Allah.
41003029	Ammaa koo moye volvi haala yavaare dow Ruhu Ceniiɗo, o ya'afantaake sam. Hakke ɗuum e dow hoore ma'ako faa abadaa.
41003030	Yeesu vi'ii noon gam ɓe mbi'ii ginnol o woodi.
41003031	Minyiraaɓe Yeesu e inna mu''en ngari ndarii yaasi, ɓe lili goɗɗo noddoya Yeesu.
41003032	Jama'aare ɗuuɗnde e jooɗii filii Yeesu, sey lilaaɗo vi'i mo~: — Inna maaɗa e minyiraaɓe maaɗa e toon yaasi, eɓe ngiɗi yi'igo ma.
41003033	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Moye woni inna am~? Ɓeye ngoni minyiraaɓe am~?
41003034	O raari jooɗiiɓe filiiɓe mo, o vi'i~: — Onon ngoni inna am e minyiraaɓe am~!
41003035	Gam baɗoowo ko Allah yiɗi, kam woni minyam e inna am.
41004001	Kadimaa Yeesu ɓesdi ekkitingo e regorde maayo Gaaliili. Jama'aare ɗuuɗnde hawriti to ma'ako, sey nde o natti akali ndiyam o jooɗii. Hawritɓe boo njooɗii e jaarengol regorde maayo.
41004002	O ekkitini ɓe ku'uje feere-feere e balndi. O vi'i ɓe~:
41004003	— Ngewee nanon~! Aawoowo yahii ngesaa gam aawa aawdi.
41004004	Emo nder aawgo aawdi ndiin, sey ngoɗndi yani dow laawol, colli ngari cuɓti ndi.
41004005	Ngoɗndi boo yani nder korokaaƴe to lesdi ɗuuɗaa. Ndi fuɗi jaawɗum, gam lesdi ndiin luggaa.
41004006	Ammaa nde naange fuɗoyi fiyi ndi, sey ndi yo'ori, gam ndi walaa ɗaɗi.
41004007	Aawdi feere yani nder gi'e, sey gi'e ɗeen mawni ɗeɗɗi ndi, ndi rimaay.
41004008	Ngoɗndi boo yani dow lesdi mbooɗndi, ndi fuɗi, ndi mawni, ndi waɗi butaali. Ngoɗndi waɗi butaali talaatiin (30), ngoɗndi waɗi butaali settiin (60), ngoɗndi faa e hemre (100).
41004009	Nde Yeesu heyni valndango ɓe balndol ngool, sey o vi'i~: — Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana~!
41004010	Wakkaci nde Yeesu jooɗii feere muuɗum, almaajiri'en ma'ako sappo e ɗiɗo e woɓɓe tokkuɓe mo njahi to ma'ako, ɓe ƴami mo o fahamina ɓe ma'ana balndol ngool.
41004011	Sey o vi'i ɓe~: — Onon on kokkaama fahamugo sirri laamu Allah, ammaa yimɓe ɓe ngalaa nder mooɗon, koo ɗume sey e balndi.
41004012	Kanjum waɗi ɗum vi'ii~: «~Eɓe ndaara, ammaa ɓe ngi'ataa. Eɓe nana, ammaa ɓe pahamataa. Gam to naa noon, ɗum baɗoojum ɓe nana, ɓe tuuba, ɗum ya'afanoo ɓe.~»
41004013	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — On pahamaay balndol ngool naa~? To noon, noye pahamirton balndi koriiɗi~?
41004014	Ko aawoowo oon aawi, ɗum voliinde Allah.
41004015	Aawdi njanndi dow laawol e laatii balndol nanɓe voliinde Allah, ammaa ɗoon to ɓe nani nde, ɗoon Ceyɗaan warata hooƴa nde nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
41004016	Aawdi njanndi nder korokaaƴe boo e laatii balndol nanɓe voliinde Allah, ɗoon e ɗoon ɓe njaɓi nde e velvelo.
41004017	Ammaa ɓe munyey wakkaci seɗɗa tan. To caɗeele e torraa warii sabu voliinde ndeen, ɗoon e ɗoon ɓe njoofata nde, gam ɓe ngalaa ɗaɗi.
41004018	Aawdi njanndi nder gi'e e laatii balndol nanɓe voliinde ndeen,
41004019	ammaa laruuraaji duuniyaaru e yiɗde jawdi e suunooji feere-feere natti ɓerɗe maɓɓe, ɓiɗɗi voliinde ndeen, kaɗi nde rimgo.
41004020	Aawdi njanndi dow lesdi mbooɗndi e laatii balndol nanɓe voliinde Allah, njaɓi nde, kuutiniri nde, faa ɓe mbaɗi nafri, woɓɓe talaatiin (30), woɓɓe settiin (60), woɓɓe faa e hemre (100).
41004021	Yeesu tokki vi'igo~: — Moye huɓɓata fitila ndeen hippira ka tummude, koo resa ka lees leeso~? Wanaa sey o ɓila ka naa~?
41004022	Walaa ko suuɗii ko suuɗtataake, noon boo walaa sirrijum ɗum vanngintaake.
41004023	Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana~!
41004024	O ɓesdi vi'igo ɓe~: — Kakkilanee ko nanoton~! E etergel ngel etroton, e ma'agel etranteeɗon, faa maa ɓesdaneeɗon.
41004025	Gam goonɗo kam ɓesdante, mo walaa, koo kaal kal woodi maa no jaɓtete kal.
41004026	Yeesu tokki vi'igo~: — Laamu Allah e nanndi e neɗɗo aawɗo aawdi nder ngesaa muuɗum.
41004027	Waala fina, aawdi ndiin no fuɗey mawna, o anndaa no ndi mawniri.
41004028	Lesdi e hoore muuɗum fuɗnata aawdi ndiin. Aran ndi waɗa ƴommbal, ndeen vutaandu, ɓaawo ma'ajum sey gite.
41004029	To gawri ndiin ɓenndii, sey o yahada e laɓi o taƴa ndi, gam wakkaci taygo ndi warii.
41004030	Kadimaa Yeesu vi'i~: — E ɗume nanndinireymi laamu Allah~? E ngole balndol nanndineymi ngu~?
41004031	Engu nanndi e gabbel mutardi ɓurngel koo ngele gabbel famɗugo.
41004032	E noon fuu to ngel aawaama, ngel mawney, ngel ɓura koo kiye lekki mawnugo, ngel waɗa licce mawɗe-mawɗe, faa colli nyiɓa caɓɓe mu''en dow ma'aje.
41004033	Yeesu huutinirii iri ɗi'i balndi ɗuuɗɗi gam wa'ajingo yimɓe voliinde Allah, deydey no ɓe mbaawi fahamirgo.
41004034	Walaa ko o volvani ɓe naa e balndi. Ammaa wakkaci o wondi e almaajiri'en ma'ako kamɓe tan, sey o yeccoo ɓe ma'ana balndi ɗiin.
41004035	Nyannaan ɗuum alaasara Yeesu vi'i almaajiri'en muuɗum~: — Punngitemma maayo.
41004036	Ɓe ɗali jama'aare hawritnde ɗoon, ɓe natti akali ki o woni nder muuɗum, ɓe ndillidi e ma'ako. Akale feere boo tokki ɓe.
41004037	Sey iyoonde e henndu semmbiɗndu ummoyi, ɓoggi ndiyam mbaɗi ga fiigo akali kiin, ndiyam natti nder ma'aki, faa ki ɓadii heeɓgo.
41004038	Yeesu boo e toon ɗaanii ɓokkorde akali kiin, emo waflii gaflel. Sey almaajiri'en ma'ako pindini mo mbi'i~: — Moodibbo, a waannaaka en kalkii naa~?
41004039	Sey o ummii o nyaaɗani henndu nduun, o vi'i ɓoggi ndiyam~: — De''it~! Daraa~! Sey henndu nduun darii, koo ɗume fuu de''iti.
41004040	O vi'i almaajiri'en ma'ako~: — Ko jeyi kuldanɗon nihinii~? Faa jo'oni on ngoonɗinaay naa~?
41004041	Ɓe kultori korey, ɓe ƴamƴamtiri, ɓe mbi'i~: — O'o no moye, mo faa e henndu e ɓoggi ndiyam ɗowtanto~?
41005001	Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum punngiti maayo, ɓe njottii lesdi Garaasankoo'en.
41005002	Nde Yeesu vurtii akali kiin, sey goɗɗo mo ginnol kallungol vurtii nder genaale taɓɓii mo.
41005003	Neɗɗo oon nder genaale o jooɗoto. Walaa baawɗo haɓɓugo mo, gam koo ɓoggi njamndi kaɓɓataa mo.
41005004	Emo haari haɓɓireego ɓoggi njamndi e juuɗe, o tonngoree geƴƴelle, ammaa o taƴa ɓoggi njamndi ɗiin, o yeva geƴƴelle baɗaaɗe e kosɗe ma'ako. Walaa cemmbiɗɗo baawɗo jogaago mo.
41005005	Jemma e nyalawma emo nder genaale e dow baamle, emo wulla e semmbee, emo ƴarda ɓanndu ma'ako kaaƴe.
41005006	Nde o teeyni Yeesu, o nyaaroyi o diccii yeeso muuɗum.
41005007	O wulli e semmbee o vi'i~: — Yeesu Ɓiɗɗo Allah Mawɗo, ɗume hawti en~? Emi toro ma, gam Allah, ta'a torram.
41005008	O vi'ii noon gam Yeesu vi'ii ginnol gonngol nder ma'ako~: — Aan ginnol kallungol, vurta nder o'o neɗɗo~!
41005009	Sey Yeesu ƴami ngol vi'i~: — Noye mbi'eteɗaa~? Ngol toontii ngol vi'i~: — Odomre, gam emin ɗuuɗi.
41005010	Sey ɗi mbaɗi ga toraago Yeesu to' o tuuf ɗi e lesdi ndiin.
41005011	Faro ɗoon e woodi sefre aladeeji ɗuuɗɗi e dura moortorde vaamnde.
41005012	Sey ginnaaji ɗiin torii Yeesu ɗi mbi'i~: — Woor min, min nattoya aladeeji ɗin nih.
41005013	Yeesu jaɓi, sey ginnaaji ɗiin mburtii nattoyi sefre aladeeji. Aladeeji ɗiin njaharii dubuuje ɗiɗi (2~000). Sefre ndeen fuu nyaari, moortii vaamnde, yoolii nder maayo. Ndiyam nyaami ɗi, ɗi fuu.
41005014	Waynaaɓe aladeeji ɗiin nyaari mbi'oyi ka yimɓe si'ire mawnde e ci'on piliikon. Yimɓe ɓeen njahi yi'igo ko waɗi.
41005015	Nde ɓe ngari to Yeesu woni, ɓe ngi'i neɗɗo goonnooɗo ginnaaji ɗuuɗɗi oon e jooɗii, ɓornii kolte muuɗum, emo nder hakkiilo ma'ako. Sey koo moye maɓɓe huli.
41005016	Yiiɓe ko waɗi ɓeen ngeccii horiiɓe ko heɓi goonnooɗo ginnaaji oon e aladeeji.
41005017	Sey yimɓe ɓeen puɗɗi toraago Yeesu, o ɗalana ɓe lesdi maɓɓe.
41005018	Wakkaci Yeesu nattata akali, sey goonnooɗo ginnaaji oon torii mo o woora ɗum ɓe ndillida.
41005019	Ammaa Yeesu jaɓaay ɓe ndillida, o vi'i mo~: — Yah wuro to banndiraaɓe maaɗa, ngeccoɗaa ɓe fii mawɗum ko Jawmiraawo waɗan maa, e no o narri jurumɗum maaɗa.
41005020	Sey neɗɗo oon dilliri lesdi mbi'eteendi Ci'e-Sappo, o fuɗɗi hokkugo habaru fii mawɗum ko Yeesu waɗani mo. Nanɓe ɗum fuu kaayɗini.
41005021	Nde Yeesu natti akali vittoyi fonngo maayo to o ummino, jama'aare ɗuuɗnde hawriti to ma'ako e fonngo maayo ngoon.
41005022	Sey goɗɗo nder aardiiɓe suudu-wa'ajordu bi'eteeɗo Jayrus wari. Nde o yi'i Yeesu, o diccii yeeso muuɗum,
41005023	o waɗi ga toraago ɗum emo vi'a~: — Ɓinngel am dewel yamɗaa, ngel ɓadake maaygo. Emi toro maa war meemaa ngel, ngel yamɗita, to' ngel maay.
41005024	Sey Yeesu yahadi e ma'ako. Jama'aare ɗuuɗnde tokki mo e ɓiɗɗa mo.
41005025	Ɗoon ɗuum e woodi debbo baɗɗo duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi lohonol muuɗum taƴaay.
41005026	Debbo oon yarii bone korey e juuɗe nyawtooɓe ɗuuɗɓe. O majjinii jawdi ma'ako fuu, ammaa o hoyaay, sey ko ɓesdi.
41005027	Ndeen maa o naniino habaru Yeesu, sey o ivi ɓaawo muuɗum nder jama'aare, o meemi toggoore muuɗum.
41005028	Gam o nyumii nder ɓernde ma'ako~: — Koo toggoore ma'ako tan keɓmi meemmi, mi hoyey.
41005029	Ɗoon e ɗoon lohonol ma'ako ngool darii, o nani nder ɓanndu ma'ako o yamɗitii.
41005030	Sey Yeesu nani baawɗe mburtake nder muuɗum. O waylitii nder jama'aare, o vi'i~: — Moye meemi toggoore am~?
41005031	Almaajiri'en ma'ako mbi'i mo~: — A yi'a jama'aare e ɓiɗɗu maa, ndeen ƴamaa moye meem maa~?
41005032	Ammaa Yeesu waɗi ga raargo nder jama'aare ndeen, gam heɓta moye meemi ɗum.
41005033	Nde debbo oon annditi ko laatii e ɓanndu muuɗum, o wari nder kulol emo diwna, o diccii yeeso Yeesu, o yeccii ɗum goonga dow ko waɗi fuu.
41005034	Sey Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Banndam debbo, goonɗinki maaɗa yamɗitinii ma. Yah jam, nyawu maaɗa hoyi.
41005035	Ila Yeesu e volva, sey woɓɓe gada wuro Jayrus aardiiɗo suudu-wa'ajordu ngari, ɓe mbi'i mo~: — Ɓiya maayii. Ta'a ɓesdu waannugo moodibbo.
41005036	Ammaa Yeesu yewanaaki ko ɓe mbi'i, o vi'i aardiiɗo suudu-wa'ajordu oon~: — Ta'a hul, goonɗin tan.
41005037	Walaa mo o woori yahadi e ma'ako, sey Yaakuubu e minyum Yahayya e Biiturus.
41005038	Nde ɓe njottii wuro Jayrus, Yeesu yi'i yimɓe nder waannaare, eɓe mboya eɓe ƴokoo.
41005039	Nde o natti, o vi'i~: — Ko jeyi ngaanniiɗon, on mboya~? Surbayel ngeel maayaay, ngel ɗaani tan.
41005040	Sey ɓe njali mo jalniiɗum yavaare. Ndeen o vurtini ɓe ɓe fuu yaasi, o hooƴi baaba surbayel ngeel e inna muuɗum e almaajiri'en ma'ako ɓe o wondi, ɓe natti suudu to surbayel woni.
41005041	Yeesu nanngi junngo surbayel ngeel vi'i~: — Taliita, kumi~! (Waato «~Surbaajo, umma.~»)
41005042	Ɗoon e ɗoon surbayel ngeel ummii fuɗɗi yahadu. Surbayel ngeel duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi ngel woodi. Fii ɗuum haaynii ɓe korey.
41005043	Yeesu vaggini ɓe vi'i, to' ɓe muro vi'igo ka koo moye. Ndeen o vi'i ɓe~: — Kokkee mo ko o nyaami.
41006001	Sey Yeesu ummii yaayre ndeen hooti si'ire to mawni, almaajiri'en ma'ako njahadi e ma'ako.
41006002	Nde nyannde-fooftiinde wari, o fuɗɗi ekkitingo nder suudu-wa'ajordu. Nanɓe ekkitinol ma'ako fuu kaayɗini, ɓe mbi'i~: — Toye o'o neɗɗo heɓi ɗe'e ku'uje fuu~? Toye o heɓi ngu'u fahamu~? Toye o heɓi baawɗe waɗgo iri ɗe'e kuuɗe kaayniiɗe~?
41006003	Naa ɗum o'o cehoowo, ɓii Maryaama, mawnu Yaakuubu e Yusufu e Yahuuda e Simon naa~? Wanaa en ngondi e minyiraaɓe ma'ako rewɓe naa~? Kanjum ɗuum haɗi ɓe goonɗingo mo.
41006004	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Annabiijo e teddinee to yahi fuu, baanda si'ire to rimaa, e banndiraaɓe muuɗum e yimɓe wuro muuɗum.
41006005	Yeesu heɓaay waɗgo alaama kaayniiɗum koo go'oto toon, sey nyawɓe seɗɗa tan ɓe o yowi juuɗe dow mu''en o yamɗitini ɗum'en.
41006006	Ciya goonɗinki maɓɓe haaynii mo. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, Yeesu yiilii nder ci'e piliiɗe ɗoon e ekkitina.
41006007	O noddi almaajiri'en ma'ako sappo e ɗiɗo, o lili ɓe ɗiɗo-ɗiɗo, o hokki ɓe baawɗe dow ginnaaji.
41006008	O vi'i ɓe~: — To' on kooy koo ɗume gam jahaangal mooɗon, koo nyaamdu, koo jikaare, koo ceede nder jiibaaji mooɗon, sey sawru tan.
41006009	Paɗɗee paɗe, ammaa to' on kooy toggooje ɗiɗi.
41006010	Wuro ngo njippiiɗon fuu, njooɗee e ma'ago, faa nde ndilluɗon si'ire ndeen.
41006011	To on ngarii yaayre nde yimɓe muuɗum njaɓɓaaki on, koo calii yewanaago on, ndillee yaayre ndeen, piɗɗon sollaare kosɗe mooɗon, gam hollugo ɓe, ɓe mbaɗii ko vooɗaa.
41006012	Almaajiri'en ɓeen ndilli e nga'ajina e mbi'a yimɓe tuuba.
41006013	Ɓe tuufi ginnaaji ɗuuɗɗi, ɓe moomani nyawɓe ɗuuɗɓe nebbam, nyawɓe ɓeen njamɗiti.
41006014	Laamiiɗo Hiruudus nani habaru Yeesu e volvee, gam innde Yeesu sankitake koo toye. Woɓɓe e mbi'a ɗum Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma ummitinaa nder maayde, kanjum waɗi emo woodi baawɗe waɗgo kuuɗe kaayniiɗe.
41006015	Woɓɓe mbi'i~: — Ɗum annabi Iliya. Woɓɓe boo e mbi'a o annabiijo kama annabo'en ndeenno.
41006016	Nde Hiruudus nani ɗum, o vi'i~: — Ɗum Yahayya mo ittanmi hoore ummitii nder maayde~!
41006017	O vi'ii noon gam kanko e hoore ma'ako waɗnoo Yahayya nanngaa, omndaa nder kaso. O waɗii ɗum sabu Hiruudiya koree mawniiko Filibus, mo o te'i.
41006018	Gam Yahayya vi'iino Hiruudus~: — Haanaa te'aa koree mawna.
41006019	Hiruudiya boo huunƴanii Yahayya, faa e yiɗi wargo mo, ammaa o heɓaay laawol,
41006020	sabu Hiruudus e hula Yahayya. Emo anndi Yahayya no neɗɗo goongaajo ceniiɗo, kanjum waɗi o reeni ɗum. Nde o volidata e Yahayya fuu, bolle Yahayya e ngaanno mo, ammaa e noon fuu emo yiɗi yewanaago mo.
41006021	Ammaa Hiruudiya heɓii laawol no wardata Yahayya nyannde juulɗe kiimtaaki danyeeki Hiruudus. Hiruudus siryake nyaamduuji gam mawɓe laamu muuɗum, e mawɓe soojeeji, e mawɓe lesdi Gaaliili.
41006022	Ɓii Hiruudiya debbo natti wami yeeso Hiruudus e ma'atinaaɓe muuɗum. Gamol ngool veli ɓe korey. Ndeen Hiruudus vi'i mo~: — Toram ko ngiɗɗaa fuu, mi hokkete ɗum.
41006023	O hunanii mo o vi'i~: — Ko toriɗaa yam fuu mi hokkete ɗum, koo to ɗum senndere laamu am.
41006024	Sey ɓiɗɗo debbo oon vurtii ƴami inna muuɗum~: — Ɗume haani mi toro~? Inna vi'i mo~: — Tora mo hoore Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma.
41006025	Ɗoon e ɗoon ɓiɗɗo debbo oon so''ii to laamiiɗo vi'i mo~: — Emi yiɗi kokkaa yam hoore Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma nder le'al jo'oni-jo'oni.
41006026	Ɓernde Hiruudus metti korey nde o nani haala kaan, ammaa nde laatii o aartii o hunanake mo yeeso ma'atinaaɓe, o yiɗaa sottingo haala ma'ako.
41006027	Ɗoon e ɗoon o lili soojeeru yaha waddoya hoore Yahayya. Soojeeru nduun yahi nder kaso taƴoyi hoore Yahayya,
41006028	waddi nde nder le'al, o hokki nde ɓiɗɗo debbo oon. Ɓiɗɗo debbo boo hokki nde inna muuɗum.
41006029	Nde almaajiri'en Yahayya nani ɗum, ɓe ngari ɓe kooƴi ɓanndu Yahayya ɓe mballini ndu nder yenaande wasaande nder haayre.
41006030	Lilaaɓe ɓe Yeesu lilnoo ngarti to muuɗum, ɓe ngeccii mo koo ɗume ko ɓe mbaɗi e ko ɓe ekkitini.
41006031	O vi'i ɓe~: — Ngaree njahen yaayre yeewnde keɓon poofton seɗɗa. O vi'ii noon gam yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe e ngara to ma'ako e co''o, faa ɓe keɓaay wakkaci ɓe nyaami nyaamdu.
41006032	Sey ɓe natti akali ndiyam, ɓe njahi to yeewi, kamɓe tan.
41006033	Ammaa wakkaci ɓe ndillata, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngi'ii ɓe, annditi to ɓe pa'i. Yimɓe ɓeen mburtoyii ci'e ɗuuɗɗe, ɓe nyaari e kosɗe, ɓe aarti ɓe yottaago.
41006034	E jippaaki Yeesu nder akali, o yi'i jama'aare ɗuuɗnde e hawriti, sey o nani jurumɗum maɓɓe, gam eɓe nanndi e baali ɗi ngalaa gaynaako. O fuɗɗi ekkitingo ɓe ku'uje ɗuuɗɗe.
41006035	Nde naange muti, sey almaajiri'en ngari to ma'ako mbi'i mo~: — Naange muti, kadimaa ɗo'o to ngonɗen ɗum ladde.
41006036	Vi' ɓe'e yimɓe njaha gure e ci'e ɓadiiɗe, ɓe coodana ko'e maɓɓe ko ɓe nyaamata.
41006037	Ammaa Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Onon e ko'e mooɗon kokkee ɓe ko ɓe nyaami~! Ɓe toontii mo ɓe mbi'i~: — To noon a yiɗi min kooƴa ceede ajurfaari keme ɗiɗi (200) min coodonoya ɓe ko ɓe nyaamata naa~?
41006038	O vi'i ɓe~: — Buroodiiji noye ngoonɗon~? Njahee ndaaron. Nde ɓe ndaari, ɓe mbi'i~: — Buroodiiji jovi e liƴƴi ɗiɗi min njogii.
41006039	Ndeen o vi'i ɓe ɓe mbi'a yimɓe njooɗoroo dese-dese dow huɗo.
41006040	Sey ɓe njooɗii, woɓɓe mbaɗi dese hemre-hemre (100-100), woɓɓe hamsiin-hamsiin (50-50).
41006041	Yeesu hooƴi buroodiiji jovi e liƴƴi ɗiɗi ɗiin, o tiggii dow, o yetti Allah, o senndi buroodiiji ɗiin, o hokki almaajiri'en ma'ako nge'eda yimɓe. Noon o waɗani liƴƴi ɗiɗi ɗiin boo.
41006042	Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami faa ɓe kaari.
41006043	Almaajiri'en ma'ako kawriti buroodi koriiɗum e liƴƴi koriiɗi, ɓe kebbini compooje sappo e ɗiɗi.
41006044	Nyaamɓe buroodi ɗuum njaharii worɓe dubuuje njovo (5~000).
41006045	Ɗoon e ɗoon Yeesu waɗi almaajiri'en muuɗum natta akali, ɓe aarta mo funngitgo maayo yahago Baytisayda, ko hokka o accootira e jama'aare.
41006046	Ɓaawo o accootirii e maɓɓe, o ƴeenti dow vaamnde gam o waɗa do'aare.
41006047	Nde futuro waɗi, akali kiin e caka maayo, Yeesu boo e dow vaamnde kanyum tan.
41006048	O yi'i almaajiri'en ma'ako e kaɓda e akali, gam henndu semmbiɗndu e haɗa ɓe yahadu. Fajiri o yahi to maɓɓe, emo ruugii dow ndiyam. O waɗi kama o ƴaɓɓoto ɓe,
41006049	ammaa nde ɓe ngi'i emo ruugii dow ndiyam, ɓe tammii ɗum mbeelu maayɗo, ɓe ƴoki,
41006050	gam ɓe fuu ɓe ngi'ii mo, ɓe kultori. Ammaa ɗoon e ɗoon Yeesu volvani ɓe vi'i~: — Mbaaltinee hakkiilooji mooɗon~! To' on kul, ɗum miin.
41006051	Ndeen o natti to maɓɓe nder akali, henndu nduun dari, sey ɓe kaayɗini korey.
41006052	Sabu jo'oral ɓerɗe maɓɓe, ɓe pahamaayno ma'ana kaayniiɗum nyaamnugo worɓe dubuuje njovo (5~000) ɗum o waɗi.
41006053	Nde ɓe njottii fonngo maayo, ɓe natti lesdi Genesaret, ɓe ndarii ɗoon.
41006054	Ɗoon to ɓe mburtii akali, ɗoon yimɓe annditi Yeesu,
41006055	ɓe nyaari ɓe njahi koo toye nder lesdi ndiin, eɓe kooƴoya nyawɓe maɓɓe dow mbe''itaari, eɓe ngadda ɓe to Yeesu woni.
41006056	Koo toye to Yeesu yahi, koo ɗum nder ci'e mawɗe e pamare, koo ɗum nder gure ladde, yimɓe e mballina nyawɓe nder luuɓe, eɓe toroo mo o woora nyawɓe ɓeen meema koo baŋargal toggoore ma'ako. Meemɗo ngal fuu njamɗiti.
41007001	Fariisa'en e woɓɓe moodiɓɓe Tawreeta warɓe gada Urusaliima kawriti to Yeesu.
41007002	Ɓe ngi'i woɓɓe nder almaajiri'en Yeesu e nyaama lootaay juuɗe mu''en kama no diina Yahuudu'en vi'i.
41007003	Fariisa'en e Yahuudu'en fuu nyaamataa nyaamdu sey to ɓe lootii juuɗe maɓɓe, gam noon ɓe pini ɓe tawi e maamiraaɓe maɓɓe.
41007004	To ɓe ngartii gada luumo, ɓe nyaamataa sey to ɓe lootake. Noon boo e woodi finaatawaaji ɗuuɗɗi ɗi ɓe njogii, kama no ɓe layɓirta njardukon maɓɓe e gaheeje e taasaaje njamndi mboɗeeri.
41007005	Sey Fariisa'en e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta ɓeen ƴami Yeesu mbi'i~: — Ko jeyi almaajiri'en maaɗa tokkaay finaatawaaji maamiraaɓe meeɗen, eɓe nyaamra juuɗe ɗe laaɓaa~?
41007006	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Annabi Ecaaya vi'ii goonga nde o waɗi annabaaku dow mooɗon, onon munaafuki'en. O vinndii~: «~Ɓe'e yimɓe e konnduɗe tan ɓe teddinirta yam, ammaa ɓerɗe maɓɓe e ngoɗɗii yam.
41007007	E mehere ɓe cujjidanta yam, gam ko ɓe ekkitinta ɗum dookaaji ɓiɓɓe-aadama tan.~»
41007008	On njoofii dokkaaji Allah, on njogake finaatawaaji yimɓe.
41007009	O ɓesdi vi'igo ɓe~: — On laatii goni'en e salaago dookaaji Allah, gam tokkon finaatawaaji mooɗon.
41007010	Muusa vi'i~: «~Teddin baaba maaɗa e inna maaɗa. O vi'ii boo~: Kuɗɗo baaba muuɗum koo inna muuɗum fotii wareego.~»
41007011	Ammaa onon, eɗon ekkitina to neɗɗo vi'ii baaba muuɗum koo inna muuɗum~: «~Ko haani mi vallir maa, ɗum laatake Korban, waato mi hokkii ɗum Allah.~»
41007012	Noon kaɗruɗon yimɓe mballa danyooɓe mu''en.
41007013	Noon laatinirɗon voliinde Allah mehere gada e finaatawaaji ɗi ekkitinɗon. On mbaɗii ku'uje ɗuuɗɗe ko nanndi e ma'ajum.
41007014	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, Yeesu ɓesdi noddi jama'aare vi'i~: — Ngewee on fuu, pahamon.
