41007015	Walaa goɗɗum ko woni yaasi ɓanndu neɗɗo, natteyɗum nder ma'ako laatina mo nyidduɗo yeeso Allah. Ammaa kalluɗum ko vurtoytoo nder ɓernde neɗɗo, kanjum laatinta mo nyidduɗo yeeso Allah. [
41007016	]
41007017	Nde o seedi e jama'aare, o natti wuro, almaajiri'en ma'ako ƴami mo ma'ana balndol ngool.
41007018	O toontii ɓe o vi'i~: — Onon maa, on pahamaay ma'ana ma'agol naa~? On anndaa walaa ko nattata neɗɗo gada yaasi laatina mo nyidduɗo yeeso Allah naa~?
41007019	Gam wanaa nder ɓernde ɗum nattata, ammaa nder reedu, ndeen ɗum vurtoo ɓanndu. Noon Yeesu holliri koo nduye nyaamdu no laaɓndu yeeso Allah.
41007020	O ɓesdi vi'igo~: — Ko vurtotoo nder ɓernde neɗɗo, kanjum waɗata neɗɗo laatoo nyidduɗo yeeso Allah.
41007021	Gam nder ɓernde neɗɗo nyumooji kalluɗi mburtotoo ɗi njahara mo e daartal, e nguyka, e war-hoore, e njeenu,
41007022	e koɗey, e halleende, e ƴoyre jammba, e ciya reengo hoore, e nalwiiru, e vonnugo innde neɗɗo, e manngu hoore, e vemmbere.
41007023	Ɗe'e kuuɗe kalluɗe fuu gada nder ɓernde neɗɗo ɗe mburtoytoo, ɗe laatina mo nyidduɗo yeeso Allah.
41007024	Gada toon Yeesu ummii yahi ci'e Tiir e Sidon. O natti woɗngo wuro, o yiɗaa koo moye annda emo ɗoon. Ammaa e noon fuu o waawaay suuɗaago yimɓe.
41007025	Ɗoon e ɗoon goɗɗo debbo mo ginnol nanngi ɓinngel muuɗum dewel nani habaru ma'ako. O wari o diccii yeeso ma'ako.
41007026	Debbo oon naa o Yahuuduujo, o danyaama Finiikiya nder lesdi Suuriya. O torii Yeesu vurtina ginnol nder ɓinngel ma'ako.
41007027	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Woor ɓikkon kaara tawo, gam haanaa ɗum hooƴa nyaamdu ɓikkon ɗum ferana kareeji.
41007028	Ammaa debbo oon vi'i mo~: — Ee, ɗum goonga Moodibbo, ammaa koo kareeji ɓaggiiɗi tummuɗe e nyaama ko ɓikkon koon ndufi.
41007029	Sey Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Gam ka'a ka mbiiɗaa hoot, ginnol vurtake surbayel maaɗa.
41007030	Debbo oon hooti tawi surbayel ngeel e waalii dow leeso, ginnol ngool vurtake nder ma'agel.
41007031	Yeesu dilli lesdi Tiir, o tokkiri Sidon, o yahi maayo Gaaliili, o natti lesdi mbi'eteendi Ci'e-Sappo.
41007032	Toon woɓɓe ngaddani mo goɗɗo paho mo bolle muuɗum mburtaaki booɗɗum. Ɓe torii Yeesu yowa juuɗe muuɗum dow ma'ako yamɗitina mo.
41007033	Sey Yeesu fooɗi paho oon vuttudu to fooɗtii e jama'aare, o waɗi koholi ma'ako nder noppi paho oon. O tuuti joode o meemi ɗemngal ma'ako.
41007034	Ndeen Yeesu tiggii dow resi ɓernde vi'i mo~: — Effata~! Waato «~Omta.~»
41007035	Ɗoon e ɗoon noppi neɗɗo oon omtii, ɗemngal ma'ako fiɓti, o fuɗɗi volvugo laaɓɗum.
41007036	Yeesu vi'i ɓe, to' ɓe mbi'i ka koo moye. Ammaa noon no o haɗri ɓe vi'igo ka, noon ɓe ɓesdiri sankitirgo ka.
41007037	Ɗum haaynii ɓe korey, ɓe mbi'i~: — Ko o waɗi fuu e vooɗi. Emo waɗa faa e fahaɓe e nana, nyonnduɓe boo e mbolva.
41008001	Nder balɗe ɗeen jama'aare ɗuuɗnde ɓesdi hawritgo to Yeesu. Nde laatii ɓe kororaaki nyaamdu, Yeesu noddi almaajiri'en muuɗum vi'i ɓe~:
41008002	— Mi nanii jurumɗum nde'e jama'aare, gam hannde balɗe tati eɓe ngondi e am, nyaamdu maɓɓe boo horaaki.
41008003	To mi woorii ɓe, ɓe koota ɓe nyaamaay, ɓe ngiiltoto dow laawol, gam woɓɓe maɓɓe ivoyii to woɗɗi.
41008004	Almaajiri'en toontii mo mbi'i~: — Toye keɓeten ko nyaamneten ɓe nder nde'e ladde~?
41008005	Yeesu ƴami ɓe vi'i~: — Buroodiiji noye ngoonɗon~? Ɓe mbi'i~: — Joveeɗiɗi.
41008006	Sey o vi'i jama'aare ndeen jooɗoo. O hooƴi buroodiiji joveeɗiɗi ɗiin, o yetti Allah, o senndi ɗi, o hokki almaajiri'en ma'ako nge'eda jama'aare, kamɓe boo ɓe nge'edi jama'aare ndeen.
41008007	Kadimaa eɓe ngoodi ngoɗkon liykon seɗɗa, sey o yetti Allah gam ma'akon, o vi'i almaajiri'en nge'eda kon kankon maa.
41008008	Jama'aare ndeen nyaami faa haari. Almaajiri'en kawriti ko hori, ɗum hebbini compooje joveeɗiɗi.
41008009	Yimɓe ɓeen njaharii faro dubuuje nayo (4~000). Ɓaawo ma'ajum o accootiri e maɓɓe.
41008010	Ɗoon e ɗoon o natti akali ndiyam, kanko e almaajiri'en ma'ako, ɓe ndilliri lesdi Dalmaatiya.
41008011	Fariisa'en ngari puɗɗi yeddootirgo e Yeesu. Eɓe ngiɗi godaago mo, sey ɓe torii mo o waɗana ɓe kaayniiɗum kolleyɗum to Allah o ivoyi.
41008012	Yeesu resi ɓernde vi'i~: — Gam ɗume onon yimɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru ngillotooɗon holleego kaayniiɗum~? Emi vi'a on goonga~: walaa kaayniiɗum ko ɗum hollata yimɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru.
41008013	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o woori ɓe, o natti akali, o funngitiri ngoya fonngo.
41008014	Almaajiri'en Yeesu njeggitii yooɓaago, buroodiiwol go'otol tan ɓe njogii nder akali maɓɓe.
41008015	Yeesu vaggini ɓe vi'i~: — Kakkilee, ndeenee ko'e mooɗon e ƴuufnirɗum Fariisa'en e ɗum Hiruudus.
41008016	Sey almaajiri'en puɗɗi volvugo hakkunde mu''en e mbi'a~: — Koo maa gam en njooɓaaki buroodi o vi'ata ka~?
41008017	Nde Yeesu annditi ko ɓe mbi'ata, sey o vi'i ɓe~: — Ko jeyi mbolvoton haala ciya buroodi~? Faa jo'oni on keɓtaay~? On pahamaay~? Ɓerɗe mooɗon no bumɗe naa~?
41008018	Ko jeyi on ngoodi gite, ammaa on ngi'iraay ɗe, on ngoodi noppi, ammaa on narraay ɗi~? On kiimtaaki naa~?
41008019	Wakkaci ko nyaamnumi yimɓe dubuuje njovo (5~000) e buroodiiji jovi, compooje noye kawritɗon ko hornaa~? Ɓe mbi'i~: — Sappo e ɗiɗi.
41008020	— Ee, wakkaci nde nyaamnumi yimɓe dubuuje nayo (4~000) e buroodiiji joveeɗiɗi fa, compooje noye kawritɗon ko hornaa~? Ɓe mbi'i~: — Joveeɗiɗi.
41008021	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Ee faa jo'oni on pahamaay naa~?
41008022	Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum njottii si'ire Baytisayda. Sey woɓɓe ngaddi bumɗo, ɓe torii Yeesu meema mo.
41008023	Yeesu nanngi junngo bumɗo oon, yahari mo yaasi si'ire, tuuti joode e gite bumɗo oon, yowi juuɗe dow ma'ako, ƴami mo vi'i~: — E woodi ko ngiiɗaa naa~?
41008024	Bumɗo oon feeri gite vi'i~: — Emi yi'a yimɓe kama leɗɗe, eɓe ngiilo.
41008025	Sey Yeesu ɓesdi meemgo gite bumɗo oon. Bumɗo oon futtini gite muuɗum yamɗiti, o yi'i koo ɗume deydey.
41008026	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Hoot wuro, ta'a vittu ngel ɗaa'e ci'el.
41008027	Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum ndilliri ci'on ngonkon ha'ade si'ire Kaysaariya-Filipi. Dow laawol o ƴami ɓe, o vi'i~: — Moye yimɓe mbi'ata yam~?
41008028	Ɓe toontii mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Woɓɓe e mbi'a a Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma. Woɓɓe e mbi'a a annabi Iliya. Woɓɓe boo e mbi'a a go'oto nder annabo'en.
41008029	O ƴami ɓe o vi'i~: — Onon fa, moye mbi'oton yam~? Biiturus toontii mo vi'i~: — Aan woni Almasiifu.
41008030	Yeesu ma'i ɓe korey, to' ɓe mbi'i ka koo moye.
41008031	Sey Yeesu fuɗɗi fahamingo ɓe, o vi'i~: — Doole Ɓii-Neɗɗo torree torraaji ɗuuɗɗi, arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en e mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta kibina mo. O waree, ɓaawo balɗe tati o ummitoo nder maayde.
41008032	Yeesu vi'ii ɓe haala kaan e njaayri. Biiturus noddi mo vuttudu, fuɗɗi felgo mo.
41008033	Ammaa Yeesu waylitii raari almaajiri'en horiiɓe, o nyaaɗani Biiturus o vi'i~: — Woɗɗam, aan Ceyɗaan~! Gam nyumo maaɗa ivoyaay to Allah, to yimɓe ngo ivi.
41008034	Ndeen o noddi jama'aare e almaajiri'en ma'ako, o vi'i ɓe~: — Giɗɗo tokkugo yam fuu, sey wanya hoore muuɗum, vakkoo gaafagal muuɗum tokka yam.
41008035	Gam giɗɗo hisnugo yonki muuɗum, no dulley ki. Ammaa dulluɗo yonki muuɗum gam am, e gam Habaru Belɗum, no hisney ki.
41008036	Ɗume ɗum nafata neɗɗo, to heɓii risku duuniyaaru fuu, ammaa dullii yonki muuɗum~?
41008037	Koo boo ɗume neɗɗo waawi hokkugo gam soottaago yonki muuɗum~?
41008038	Koo moye semti yam, miin e bolle am nder ndu'u jaamaniiru ndu hakke e ciya goonga, miin Ɓii-Neɗɗo, to mi vittidoyii e malaa'ika'en seniiɓe e teddungal Baaba am, mi semtey mo.
41009001	O vi'i ɓe~: — Emi vi'a on goonga~: e woodi woɓɓe nder dariiɓe ɗo'o ɓe maayataa, sey to ɓe ngi'ii laamu Allah e warda e baawɗe.
41009002	Ɓaawo balɗe joveego'o, Yeesu hooƴi Biiturus e Yaakuubu e Yahayya, o yahari ɓe dow woɗnde vaamnde townde, kamɓe tan. Sey nanndi ma'ako waylitii yeeso maɓɓe.
41009003	Kolte ma'ako ndanni tar, iri daneewol ngol walaa baawɗo raninirgo kolte noon nder ndu'u duuniyaaru.
41009004	Sey raa annabi Iliya e Muusa mbanngani ɓe, e mbolida e Yeesu.
41009005	Ndeen Biiturus vi'i Yeesu~: — Moodibbo, gonki amin ɗo'o e vooɗi. Woor min nyiɓa bukkaaji tati, wo'oru gam maaɗa, wo'oru gam Muusa, wo'oru boo gam Iliya.
41009006	Biiturus anndaa ka vi'ata, gam ɓe fuu tato, kulol manngol nanngii ɓe.
41009007	Sey ruulde vanngi suddi ɓe. Woɗnde voliinde ivoyi nder ruulde ndeen vi'i~: — O'o woni Ɓiyam giɗaaɗo. Ngewanee mo~!
41009008	Ɗoon e ɗoon ɓe ndaari ɓe ngi'aay koo moye, sey Yeesu tan.
41009009	Nde ɓe njippotoo vaamnde ndeen, sey Yeesu ma'i ɓe, to' ɓe ngecco koo moye ko ɓe ngi'i, faa ɓaawo ummitaaki Ɓii-Neɗɗo nder maayde.
41009010	Ɓe njaɓi haala kaan, ammaa ɓe mbaɗi ga ƴamƴamtirgo hakkunde maɓɓe ma'ana «~ummitaaki nder maayde~».
41009011	Sey ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Gam ɗume moodiɓɓe Tawreeta mbi'ata e haani annabi Iliya aarta Almasiifu wargo~?
41009012	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Goonga, Iliya no aartey wargo, gam o mo''ina koo ɗume. Ee, gam ɗume Deftere vi'ani doole Ɓii-Neɗɗo yara torraa ɗuuɗka, o yavee~?
41009013	Emi vi'a on~: Iliya aartii warii, yimɓe mbaɗanii mo ko ngiɗi fuu, noon no ɗum vinndiraa dow ma'ako.
41009014	Nde ɓe mbittoyi to almaajiri'en horiiɓe, sey ɓe ngi'i jama'aare ɗuuɗnde e filii ɓe. Moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e ngeddootira e maɓɓe.
41009015	Ɗoon to jama'aare ndeen yi'i Yeesu, ɓe kaayɗini korey, ɓe nyaari ɓe njahi to ma'ako ɓe kinni mo.
41009016	Yeesu ƴami ɓe vi'i~: — Dow ɗume ngeddootirton e maɓɓe~?
41009017	Sey go'oto nder jama'aare ndeen toontii mo vi'i~: — Moodibbo, mi waddanii ma ɓiyam gorko mo ginnol haɗi bolle.
41009018	Nde ginnol ngool ummanii mo fuu, sey ngol do''a mo, guufɗe mbaɗa ga vurtaago nder honnduko ma'ako, emo nyerƴindira nyiiƴe, ɓanndu ma'ako yo'orita kolon. Mi torake almaajiri'en maaɗa mburtina ngol, ammaa ɓe mbaawaay.
41009019	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Onon yimɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru ndu walaa goonɗinki, faa ndeye ngondeymi e mooɗon, emi munyana on~? Ngaddanee yam ɓiɗɗo oon.
41009020	Sey ɓe ngaddi mo. Nde ginnol ngool yi'i Yeesu, ɗoon e ɗoon ngol yiili ɓiɗɗo oon, ngol do''i mo, o waɗi ga diwnugo, emo tallito, honnduko ma'ako e vurtina guufɗe.
41009021	Yeesu ƴami baaba ɓiɗɗo oon vi'i~: — Ila ndeye ɗum heɓi mo~? Baaba oon vi'i~: — Ila o pamaro.
41009022	Nde ɗuuɗɗum engol do''a mo nder yiite koo nder ndiyam, gam ngol wara mo. Ammaa to a waawi waɗgo goɗɗum, nan jurumɗum amin, vallu min.
41009023	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Ko jeyi mbiiɗaa yam «~to a waawi~»~? Koo ɗume no baɗoojum to goonɗinɗo.
41009024	Ɗoon e ɗoon baaba ɓiɗɗo oon towni voliinde vi'i~: — Mi goonɗinii, vallam mi jaaloo ciya goonɗinki am~!
41009025	Nde Yeesu yi'i jama'aare e nyaaroya e wara, sey o nyaaɗani ginnol ngool, o vi'i~: — Aan ginnol kaɗngol o'o ɓiɗɗo volvugo e nango, emi vi'i maa vurta nder ma'ako~! Ta'a fuɗɗit nattugo mo~!
41009026	Sey ginnol ngool wulli, ngol yiili ɓiɗɗo oon e semmbee, ndeen ngol vurtii. Ɓiɗɗo oon laatii kama maayɗo, faa maa yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe mbi'i o maayii.
41009027	Ammaa Yeesu nanngi junngo ma'ako ummini mo, o darii.
41009028	Nde Yeesu natti wuro, almaajiri'en ma'ako ngari to ma'ako kamɓe tan, ɓe ƴami mo ɓe mbi'i~: — Ko jeyi min mbaawaay vurtingo ginnol ngool~?
41009029	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Iri ngol ɗoon ginnol vurtataako sey e do'aare.
41009030	Sey Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum ummii ɗoon ɓe ndaacii lesdi Gaaliili. Yeesu yiɗaa koo go'oto annda to ɓe ngoni,
41009031	gam emo ekkitina almaajiri'en ma'ako. Nder ekkitinol ma'ako, o vi'i ɓe~: — Ɓii-Neɗɗo no hokkitirte nder juuɗe yimɓe, ɓe mbara mo. Ndeen balɗe tati ɓaawo maayde ma'ako, o ummitoto.
41009032	E noon fuu almaajiri'en pahamaay ko o vi'i ɓe, ammaa ɓe kulii ƴamgo mo.
41009033	Ɓe njottii Kafarnahum. Ɓaawo Yeesu nattii wuro, o ƴami almaajiri'en ma'ako, o vi'i~: — Dow ɗume ngeddootireynooɗon dow laawol~?
41009034	Ammaa ɓe nde''iti, gam dow laawol ɓe ngeddootirii dow moye ɓuri manngu nder maɓɓe.
41009035	Ndeen Yeesu jooɗii, noddi almaajiri'en sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, o vi'i ɓe~: — Giɗɗo laataago mawɗo fuu, sey heeda ɓaawo horiiɓe, laatoo jaggantooɗo ɓe.
41009036	Ndeen o hooƴi ɓinngel pamarel, o darni ngel caka maɓɓe, o wuundii ngel, o vi'i ɓe~:
41009037	— Jaɓɓiiɗo ɓinngel pamarel kama nge'el fuu e innde am, miin o jaɓɓii. Jaɓɓiiɗo yam fuu, naa miin tan jaɓɓii, ammaa o jaɓɓake faa e liloyɗo yam.
41009038	Sey Yahayya vi'i mo~: — Moodibbo, min ngi'ii goɗɗo e vurtinira ginnaaji e innde maaɗa, min kaɗii mo, gam o tokkaay en.
41009039	Ammaa Yeesu vi'i~: — To' on kaɗ mo, gam walaa kuweyɗo kaayniiɗum nder innde am, ndeen ɓaawo ɗoon so''oo hallina nde.
41009040	Gam mo wanyaay en fuu e wondi e meeɗen.
41009041	Emi vi'a on goonga~: koo moye hokki on ndiyam e korel gam on ɓe Almasiifu, daahir o heppataa heɓgo laada ma'ajum.
41009042	Koo moye waɗi go'oto nder ɓe'e bilki'en goonɗinɓe yam e waɗgo hakke, ɗum ɓuraneyno mo o haɓɓanee haayre teddunde e daande, o feree nder maayo.
41009043	To junngo maaɗa waɗey maa e waɗgo hakke, tay ngo. Nattidaa aljanna e junngo wo'oto, no ɓurante dow e pereɗaa e juuɗe maaɗa ɗiɗi nder jahannama, to yiite nge nyifataa. [
41009044	]
41009045	To kosngal maaɗa waɗey maa e waɗgo hakke, tay ngal. Nattidaa aljanna e kosngal go'otal, no ɓurante dow e pereɗaa e kosɗe maaɗa ɗiɗi nder jahannama. [
41009046	]
41009047	Kadimaa to yitere maaɗa waɗey maa e waɗgo hakke, ɗoof nde. Nattidaa aljanna e yitere wo'ore no ɓurante, dow e pereɗaa e gite maaɗa ɗiɗi nder jahannama.
41009048	Toon «~gilɗi muuɗum mbaatataa, yiite ma'ajum boo nyifataa.~»
41009049	Koo moye no velnirte e yiite torraa, noon no lamɗam velnirta nyaamdu.
41009050	Lamɗam no fii booɗɗum, ammaa to ndakam ma'ajam ittake, ɗume so''ata ndakam ɗaam~? Laatee ɓe lamɗam nder mu''en, njooɗee jam hakkunde mooɗon.
41010001	Yeesu ummii Kafarnahum, o yahi lesdi Yahuudiya e fu'una maayo Urdun. Jama'aare ɓesdi hawritgo to ma'ako, o ekkitini ɓe, noon no o voovi waɗgo.
41010002	Sey woɓɓe Fariisa'en ngari to ma'ako, gam ɓe nanngira mo haala, ɓe ƴami mo ɓe mbi'i~: — E giiɗe maaɗa, Tawreeta hokkii neɗɗo laawol seergo debbo muuɗum naa~?
41010003	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Kaye dooka Muusa hokki on~?
41010004	Ɓe mbi'i~: — Muusa vi'ii to neɗɗo seerii debbo muuɗum, sey hokka mo ɗereewol ceergal.
41010005	Sey Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Gam jo'oral ɓerɗe mooɗon waɗi Muusa vinndani on dooka kaan.
41010006	Ammaa ila fuɗɗam, Allah tagii ɓe, waɗii ɓe gorko e debbo.
41010007	Gam ma'ajum gorko no seedey e baaba muuɗum e inna muuɗum, takkootira e debbo muuɗum,
41010008	ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe laatoo ɓanndu wo'oru. Faa abadaa ɓe laatataako ɗiɗo kadi, ammaa ɓe laatoto go'oto.
41010009	Gam ma'ajum, to' neɗɗo senndu ko Allah hawti.
41010010	Nde ɓe mbitti wuro, almaajiri'en ƴami mo dow haala kaan.
41010011	Sey o vi'i ɓe~: — Koo moye seeri debbo muuɗum hoovii goɗɗo, njeenu o waɗata.
41010012	To debbo seedii e gorko muuɗum hoovake goɗɗo, kanko maa njeenu o waɗata.
41010013	Yimɓe e ngadda ɓikkon to Yeesu gam o barkiɗina kon, ammaa almaajiri'en ma'ako peli ɓe.
41010014	Nde Yeesu yi'i ɗum, ɓernde ma'ako metti, o vi'i ɓe~: — Ngooree ɓikkon ngara to am. To' on kaɗ kon, gam woonɓe ɓerɗe iri ɗe ma'akon njeyi laamu Allah.
41010015	Emi vi'a on goonga~: mo jaɓaay laamu Allah kama ɓinngel pamarel fuu, o nattataa ngu sam~!
41010016	Sey Yeesu wuundii kon go'otel-go'otel, o yowi juuɗe ma'ako dow ma'akon, o barkiɗini kon.
41010017	Nde Yeesu nanngi laawol, sey goɗɗo gorko nyaaroyi wari diccii yeeso ma'ako, ƴami mo vi'i~: — Moodibbo geeto, noye mbaɗeymi mi heɓa yonki ɗum faa abadaa~?
41010018	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Ko jeyi noddirɗaa yam geeto~? Geeto walaa, sey Allah tan.
41010019	A anndi ko Tawreeta vi'i~: «~Ta'a waɗ war-hoore. Ta'a waɗ njeenu. Ta'a wujju. Ta'a saaydo fewre. Ta'a ƴoynu goɗɗo njaɓaa jawdi ma'ako. Teddin baaba maaɗa e inna maaɗa.~»
41010020	Sey o vi'i Yeesu~: — Moodibbo, emi jogii ku'uje ɗeen fuu ila mi pamaro.
41010021	Yeesu raari mo, yiɗi mo, vi'i~: — Hu'unde wo'ore tan horani ma. Yah soorru ko ngoonɗaa fuu, kokkaa ceede ɗeen sooyɓe, a heɓey risku toon dow. Ndeen ngaraa tokkaa yam.
41010022	Nde neɗɗo oon nani ka, ɓernde ma'ako metti, o dilli emo nyorii, gam o diskuɗo korey.
41010023	Yeesu raari almaajiri'en muuɗum, vi'i ɓe~: — Eɗum saɗi diskuɗo natta laamu Allah~!
41010024	Almaajiri'en kaayɗini dow ko o vi'i, ammaa Yeesu ɓesdi vi'igo ɓe~: — Ɓikkon am, nattugo laamu Allah e saɗi~!
41010025	Ɗum ɓurey hoygo ngeelooba nattira vuroode laynal, dow e diskuɗo natta laamu Allah.
41010026	Almaajiri'en kaayɗini korey, ɓe mbi'i mo~: — Too, to ɗum noon, moye hisata~?
41010027	Yeesu raari ɓe vi'i~: — Ko saɗi e neɗɗo, saɗantaa Allah. Gam to ma'ako, koo ɗume fuu no baɗotooɗum.
41010028	Sey Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Rah, min ngoorii koo ɗume, min tokkii ma.
41010029	Yeesu vi'i~: — Emi vi'a on goonga~: koo moye woori wuro muuɗum, koo rimdaaɓe, koo danyooɓe muuɗum, koo ɓiɓɓe muuɗum, koo gese muuɗum, gam am e gam Habaru Belɗum,
41010030	o heɓey ko ɓuri ɗum covi hemre (100) nder ndu'u jaamaniiru. O heɓey gure e rimdaaɓe e danyooɓe e ɓiɓɓe e gese, o torrete boo. Nder wakkaci gareyɗum boo, o heɓey yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
41010031	Ammaa aramɓe ɗuuɗɓe no laatoto sakitiiɓe, sakitiiɓe boo no laatoto aramɓe.
41010032	Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo e tokkuɓe mo horiiɓe e dow laawol yahago Urusaliima, Yeesu e aardii ɓe. Almaajiri'en ma'ako sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen ngaannake, tokkuɓe mo horiiɓe boo kuli. Yeesu ɓesdi noddi almaajiri'en muuɗum ɓeen vuttudu, o fuɗɗi yeccaago ɓe ko heɓata mo,
41010033	o vi'i~: — Rah, en njahey Urusaliima, Ɓii-Neɗɗo no hokkitirte nder juuɗe mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta. Ɓe taƴana mo ceri'a maayde, ɓe kokka mo nder juuɗe yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en.
41010034	Ɓeen njaltinira mo, ɓe tuutana mo joode, ɓe piira mo looci, ɓe mbara mo. Ndeen ɓaawo balɗe tati o ummitoto nder maayde.
41010035	Sey Yaakuubu e Yahayya ɓiɓɓe Jabadi ɓattii Yeesu mbi'i~: — Moodibbo, emin ngiɗi mbaɗanaa min ko min tori maa fuu.
41010036	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Ɗume ngiɗɗon mi waɗana on~?
41010037	Ɓe mbi'i~: — To a jooɗake dow jooɗorgal laamu e teddungal maaɗa, emin ngiɗi go'oto amin jooɗoo e junngo maaɗa nyaamo, go'oto boo e nano.
41010038	Ammaa Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — On anndaa ko torotooɗon. On mbaawi yargo iri jardugel torraa ngel njareymi ɗo'o yeeso naa~? Nakay on mbaawi suuveego nder torraa iri ka cuuveteemi ɗo'o yeeso, noon no neɗɗo suuɓretee nder ndiyam baptisma~?
41010039	Ɓe mbi'i~: — Ee, emin mbaawi. Sey Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — On njarey iri jardugel torraa ngel njareymi, e waɗaneego baptisma iri ɗum mbaɗanteemi.
41010040	Ammaa jooɗaago e junngo am nyaamo koo nano, wanaa miin hokkata ɗum. Ɗe'e jaaje ɗum ɗe ɓeen ɓe ɗum siryanii ɗe.
41010041	Nde almaajiri'en sappo horiiɓe nani ɗum, ɓe kuunƴani Yaakuubu e Yahayya.
41010042	Sey Yeesu noddi ɓe vi'i~: — On anndi laamiiɓe leƴƴi ɗi laataaki Yahuudu'en e laamoranoo yimɓe mu''en e semmbee, mawɓe maɓɓe boo e kolla ɓe baawɗe.
41010043	Ammaa onon, to' ɗum laato noon nder mooɗon. Giɗɗo laataago mawɗo nder mooɗon fuu, e haani o laatoo jaggantooɗo on.
41010044	Kadimaa giɗɗo laatoo aardiiɗo nder mooɗon, e haani o laatoo maccuɗo koo moye.
41010045	Sabu Ɓii-Neɗɗo waraay gam jagganee, ammaa gam o jaggana yimɓe, o hokka yonki ma'ako gam soottaago yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
41010046	Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum njottii si'ire Jeriiko. Wakkaci kanko e almaajiri'en ma'ako e jama'aare ɓe mburtotoo Jeriiko, ɓe njaali goɗɗo bumɗo bi'eteeɗo Bartimaawus, waato ɓii Timaawus, e jooɗii ha'ade laawol toroo.
41010047	Nde o nani ɗum Yeesu mo Najaratu ƴaɓɓotoo, o fuɗɗi noddugo e semmbee, emo vi'a~: — Yeesu ɓii-Dawda, nan jurumɗum am~!
41010048	Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe nyaaɗani mo mbi'i o de''ita, ammaa o ɓesdi noddugo e semmbee, emo vi'a~: — Ɓii-Dawda, nan jurumɗum am~!
41010049	Yeesu darii vi'i~: — Noddanee yam mo. Ɓe noddi bumɗo oon, ɓe mbi'i mo~: — A veli~! Umma, emo noddu maa.
41010050	O rooptii, o ferti burnus ma'ako, o yahi to Yeesu.
41010051	Yeesu ƴami mo vi'i~: — Ɗume ngiɗɗaa mi waɗan maa~? Bumɗo oon toontii mo vi'i~: — Moodibbo, emi yiɗi mbumtinaa yam.
41010052	Sey Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Yah~! Goonɗinki maaɗa yamɗitinii ma. Ɗoon e ɗoon gite ma'ako mbumti, o tokki Yeesu, ɓe ndillidi.
41011001	Nde ɓe pa'andii Urusaliima, ɓe njottii ci'e Baytifaaji e Baytaaniya takkol vaamnde Jaytunje. Yeesu lili almaajiri'en muuɗum ɗiɗo,
41011002	o vi'i ɓe~: — Nattee ci'el gonngel yeeso mooɗon. Ɗoon to nattuɗon ngel, on tawey mola njaakiwa nga meeɗaay waɗɗeego e haɓɓii. Kaɓɓitoyee nga ngaddon nga.
41011003	To goɗɗo ƴamii on~: «~Ko jeyi njoofoton nga~?~» mbi'ee mo~: «~Moodibbo yiɗi huutinirgo nga, o waɗey nga wartiree jaawɗum.~»
41011004	Sey ɓe njahi ɓe tawi mola ngaan e haɓɓii ha'ade laawol e dammugal. Eɓe njoofa nga,
41011005	sey woɓɓe dariiɓe ɗoon ha'ade mbi'i ɓe~: — Ko jeyi njoofoton nga~?
41011006	Kamɓe boo ɓe mbi'i ko Yeesu vi'i ɓe, sey ɓeen ngoori ɓe ɓe ndillidi e ma'aga.
41011007	Ɓe njaharani nga Yeesu, ɓe caɓɓi kolte maɓɓe dow ma'aga, Yeesu waɗɗii.
41011008	Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe mbe'iti kolte mu''en dow laawol, woɓɓe boo mbe'iti haakooji leɗɗe ɗi ɓe keloyi faro ɗoon.
41011009	Yimɓe wonɓe yeeso ma'ako e ɓaawo ma'ako mbaɗi ga vi'igo e semmbee~: — Hoosaana~! «~Jawmiraawo barkiɗin gareyɗo e innde muuɗum.
41011010	Allah barkiɗin laamu maama meeɗen Dawda ngareyngu~! Maaltoore laatanoo Allah Mo Dow~!~»
41011011	Nde Yeesu natti si'ire Urusaliima, o natti Wuro Allah Seniingo, o raari ko waɗetee ɗoon fuu. Ammaa nde naange muti, o vurtii o dilliri Baytaaniya, kanko e almaajiri'en ma'ako sappo e ɗiɗo.
41011012	Nde veeti, eɓe mburtoo Baytaaniya, Yeesu nanii dolo.
41011013	O haynii ƴibbi bilitki, o yahi o yi'a koo emo heɓa ƴibbe e ma'aki. Nde o yottii e ma'aki, o tawaay koo ɗume sey haakooji tan, gam naa ɗum wakkaci ki rimata.
41011014	Sey o vi'i ki~: — To' koo moye ɓesdu nyaamgo ɓikkon e maaɗa~! Almaajiri'en nanii ko o vi'i.
41011015	Nde ɓe njottii Urusaliima, Yeesu natti Wuro Allah Seniingo, o fuɗɗi tuufgo soorrooɓe e soodooɓe nder ma'ago. O talli teeburji cannjotooɓe ceede e jooɗorɗe soorrooɓe pooli.
41011016	O haɗi koo moye nattida e donngal nder fiiliire Wuro Seniingo ngoon.
41011017	O vi'i ɓe~: — Wanaa ɗum vinndaama nder Deftere~: «~Wuro am no noddirte wuro to leƴƴi fuu mbaɗata do'aare,~» ammaa onon on ngartirii ngo «~suuɗorde wuyɓe.~»
41011018	Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta nani ko Yeesu waɗi, sey ɓe mbaɗi ga yillaago laawol no ɓe mbardata mo. Ɓe kulii mo, gam ekkitinol ma'ako nattii jama'aare korey.
41011019	Nde naange muti, kanko e almaajiri'en ma'ako, ɓe mburtii si'ire.
41011020	Jonto ma'ajum bimbi eɓe ƴaɓɓoo, ɓe ngi'i ƴibbi kiin yo'orii kolon faa e ɗaɗi.
41011021	Biiturus hiimtii, vi'i Yeesu~: — Moodibbo, rah~! Ƴibbi ki la'anunoɗaa yo'orii.
41011022	Yeesu toontii vi'i~: — Ngoonɗinee Allah.
41011023	Emi vi'a on goonga~: to neɗɗo vi'ii nde'e vaamnde~: «~Ɗoofa, yoola nder maayo~», to o waɗaay cekka nder ɓernde ma'ako, ammaa o goonɗini ko o vi'i no waɗey, o waɗante ɗum.
41011024	Gam ma'ajum emi vi'a on, koo ɗume ko toriiɗon nder do'aare, ngoonɗinee on keɓii ɗum, on mbaɗante ɗum.
41011025	Koo ndeye nde ndariiɗon mbaɗon do'aare, to e woodi mo njogitiiɗon nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, nja'afanee mo, gam Baabiraawo mooɗon mo dow maa, ya'afanoo on hakkeeji mooɗon. [
41011026	]
41011027	Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum mbitti Urusaliima. Yeesu e yiiloo nder Wuro Allah Seniingo, sey mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en ngari to ma'ako,
41011028	ɓe ƴami mo~: — E baawɗe moye mba'arataa ɗe'e kuuɗe~? Moye hokku maa baawɗe waɗgo ɗe~?
41011029	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Miin boo mi ƴamey on ƴamol go'otol tan. Toontee yam, ndeen mi yeccoo on e ɗeye baawɗe mba'areymi kuuɗe ɗeen.
41011030	Baptisma ɗum Yahayya waɗi, to Allah ɗum ivoyi, na to yimɓe~? Toontee yam~!
41011031	Sey ɓe caawootiri hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe mbi'i~: — To en mbi'ii to Allah ɗum ivoyi, o vi'ey~: «~Ko jeyi on ngoonɗinaay Yahayya~?~»
41011032	Ammaa en mbaawi vi'igo to yimɓe ɗum ivoyi~? Ɓe mbi'ii noon, sabu eɓe kula yimɓe, gam yimɓe fuu njaɓii Yahayya no annabiijo.
41011033	Sey ɓe toontii Yeesu, ɓe mbi'i~: — Min anndaa. Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Aahaa, miin boo mi yeccataako on e ɗeye baawɗe mba'areymi kuuɗe ɗeen.
41012001	Sey Yeesu fuɗɗi volirango ɓe e balndol, o vi'i~: — Goɗɗo neɗɗo aawi ngesaa innabooje, o howani ka, o wasi ngaska makka nder ma'aka gam ɓiɗgo ɓikkon innabooje. O mahi suudu towndu gam reenooɓe ngesaa kaan. Ndeen o hokki ka woɓɓe remooɓe mo''ina ka, o waɗi jahaangal.
41012002	Nde wakkaci ɓennduki innabooje ɗeen waɗi, o lili maccuɗo ma'ako to yimɓe ɓe o reenni ngesaa kaan, gam o jaɓonoya mo geɗal ma'ako nder ɓikkon innabooje ɗeen.
41012003	Ammaa reennaaɓe ɓeen nanngi maccuɗo oon, ɓe piyi mo, ɓe tuufi mo junngo mehere.
41012004	Sey jawmu ngesaa oon fuɗɗiti lili goɗɗo maccuɗo to maɓɓe. Kanko maa ɓe kuɗi mo ɓe eli mo.
41012005	Sey o ɓesdi o lili goɗɗo maccuɗo, kanko maa ɓe mbari mo. O lili maccuɓe ɗuuɗɓe. Ɓe piyi woɓɓe, ɓe mbari woɓɓe.
41012006	Jo'oni jawmu ngesaa kaan e hororii go'oto mo o lilaay, waato ɓiyiiko mo o yiɗi. Timmoode ma'ajum o lili ɓiɗɗo oon to maɓɓe, o vi'i~: «~Ɓe teddiney ɓiyam.~»
41012007	Ammaa reennaaɓe ngesaa ɓeen mbi'i hakkunde mu''en~: «~Too, raa donoowo ngesaa kaan. Ngaree mbaren mo, ndonu ngesaa kaan laatoo ngu meeɗen.~»
41012008	Sey ɓe nanngi mo, ɓe mbari mo, ɓe peri mo yaasi ngesaa kaan.
41012009	Too, noye jawmu ngesaa kaan waɗata~? O warey o halka ɓe, o reenna ngesaa kaan woɓɓe.
41012010	On meeɗaay janngugo ko woɗnde aayaare vi'i naa~? Nde vi'i~: Haayre nde mahooɓe kibini, kayre laatii ɓurnde jogaago mahadi.
41012011	Kanjum, ɗum kuugal Jawmiraawo, ngal kaayniingal e giiɗe meeɗen.
41012012	Aardiiɓe ɓeen ndaari laawol no nanngirta mo, gam eɓe anndi dow maɓɓe o waɗi balndol ngool, ammaa eɓe kula yimɓe. Gam ma'ajum ɓe ngoori mo, ɓe ndilli.
41012013	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, ɓe lili woɓɓe Fariisa'en e woɓɓe yimɓe Hiruudus to Yeesu, gam ɓe keɓa ko ɓe nanngirta mo nder bolle ma'ako.
41012014	Ɓe ngari to Yeesu, ɓe mbi'i ɗum~: — Moodibbo, emin anndi ko mbi'ataa e ko mbaɗataa ɗum goonga. A hollataa yimɓe peerootiral, a hooƴii yimɓe fuu e poti. Kadimaa a ekkitina laawol Allah e goonga. Too, yecca min, e haani min mbiyoo Kaysar ceede janngal, na ɗum haanaa~?
41012015	Min mbiyoo ceede janngal, na to' min mbiyo~? Ammaa Yeesu e anndi eɓe ngiɗi ƴoynugo ɗum, o vi'i ɓe~: — Ko jeyi ndaaroton godaago yam~? Ngaddanee yam ceedel ajurfaari mi yi'a ngel.
41012016	Ɓe ngaddani mo ceedel ngeel. O ƴami ɓe~: — Footo moye e innde moye woni dow ma'agel~? Ɓe toontii mo ɓe mbi'i~: — Ɗum Kaysar.
41012017	O vi'i ɓe~: — Too, kokkee Kaysar ko woni ɗum Kaysar, kokkee Allah boo ko woni ɗum Allah. Toontol ma'ako haaynii ɓe korey.
41012018	Saduuki'en e mbi'a maayɓe ummitataako. Woɓɓe maɓɓe ngari to Yeesu, ɓe ƴami mo ɓe mbi'i~:
41012019	— Moodibbo, Muusa vi'ii to neɗɗo hoovake debbo, maayii rimdaay e ma'ako, sey minyum koo mawnum wa'ata mo, gam heɓana dimdaaɗo muuɗum maayɗo ɓiɓɓe.
41012020	Too, ndeenno e woodi woɓɓe rimdaaɓe worɓe njoveeɗiɗo. Afo hoovi debbo, maayi rimdaay e ma'ako.
41012021	Ɗiɗaɓo wa'ati debbo oon. Kanko maa o maayi, o rimdaay e ma'ako. Tataɓo maa noon.
41012022	Ɓe fuu njoveeɗiɗo ɓe koovake debbo oon, ɓe maayi ɓe ndimdaay e ma'ako. Ɓaawo ɗoon debbo oon maayi.
41012023	Too, nyannde maayɓe ummitinte, debbo oon, koree moye o laatotoo nder maɓɓe~? Gam ɓe fuu njoveeɗiɗo ɓe koovakeno mo.
41012024	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — On mboofi, gam on anndaa Deftere, on anndaa baawɗe Allah boo.
41012025	To maayɓe ummitake nder maayde, worɓe koovataako, rewɓe boo koovataake, ammaa ɓe laatoto kama malaa'ika'en.
41012026	Dow ummitaaki maayɓe, on njanngaay Deftere Muusa dow habaru vaafre huɓɓunde yiite naa~? Allah vi'ii mo~: «~Miin woni Allah mo Ibraahim, Allah mo Iciyaaku, Allah mo Yaakuubu.~»
41012027	Kanko naa o Allah maayɓe, ammaa o Allah foofooɓe. On majjii korey~!
41012028	Go'oto nder moodiɓɓe Tawreeta ɓadii nani geddi ɗi Yeesu wa'adi e Saduuki'en. Nde o nani Yeesu toontake ɓe booɗɗum, sey o ƴami ɗum, o vi'i~: — Nder dookaaji Tawreeta, kaye ɓuri manngu~?
41012029	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Ɓurka manngu woni~: «~Nanee, onon yimɓe Isiraa'iila~: Allah Jawmiraawo meeɗen, o go'oto.
41012030	Yiɗ Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa e ɓernde maaɗa fuu, e yonki maaɗa fuu, e hakkiilo maaɗa fuu, e semmbee maaɗa fuu.~»
41012031	Ɗiɗaɓa woni~: «~Yiɗ ko'odiɗɗaawo maaɗa noon no ngiɗruɗaa hoore maaɗa.~» Nder dookaaji Allah fuu, ɓurɗi ɗi'i ɗiɗi semmbee ngalaa.
41012032	Sey moodibbo Tawreeta oon vi'i~: — Moodibbo, a vi'ii goonga nde mbiiɗaa Allah o go'oto, walaa goɗɗo sey kanko tan.
41012033	Neɗɗo yiɗa mo e ɓernde muuɗum fuu, e hakkiilo muuɗum fuu, e semmbee muuɗum fuu, yiɗa mo wondi noon no yiɗiri hoore muuɗum, kanjum, ɗum ɓurii sadakaaji guleteeɗi e sadakaaji koriiɗi fuu.
41012034	Nde Yeesu yi'i o toontorake e hakkiilo, sey vi'i mo~: — Goonga, a woɗɗidaa e laamu Allah. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, koo moye huli ƴamgo mo ƴamol feere.
41012035	Wakkaci Yeesu ekkitinta nder fiiliire Wuro Allah Seniingo, o ƴami o vi'i~: — Ko jeyi moodiɓɓe Tawreeta mbi'anta Almasiifu o ɓii-Dawda~?
41012036	Gam Dawda e hoore muuɗum vi'ii e Ruhu Ceniiɗo~: «~Jawmiraawo vi'ii Jawmiraawo am~: Jooɗa e junngo am nyaamo, faa mi waɗa wanywanyɓe maaɗa laatoo jaaɓruɗum kosɗe maaɗa.~»
41012037	To Dawda e hoore muuɗum noddirii mo «~Jawmiraawo~», ndeen noye Almasiifu laatortoo ɓiyiiko~? Jama'aare ɗuuɗnde yewanii Yeesu e velvelo.
41012038	Nder ekkitinol ma'ako o vi'i~: — Kakkilee e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta, yiɗɓe yiilaago e ɓornii ngapaleeji juutɗi, yiɗɓe hinneego nder luuɓe.
41012039	Eɓe ngiɗi jooɗaago njaayri mawɓe nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi, e nyannde juulɗe~!
41012040	Kamɓe nyaamata jawdi rewɓe ɓe worɓe mu''en maayi, ɓe te'eta cuuɗi mu''en, eɓe njuttina do'aare, gam ɓe ngi'ee. Kamɓe ɓe cernante ceri'a ɓurka hallugo.
41012041	Yeesu jooɗii nder Wuro Allah Seniingo ha'ade to ɗum resata ceede gam Wuro ngoon. Emo raara no yimɓe mba'atirta ceede mu''en. Riskuɓe ɗuuɗɓe mba'ati ceede ɗuuɗɗe nder.
41012042	Sey goɗɗo yayriijo cooyɗo mo gorko muuɗum maayi wari wa'ati tammahon ɗiɗon, ɗum ceedon seɗɗa tan.
41012043	Sey Yeesu noddi almaajiri'en muuɗum vi'i ɓe~: — Emi vi'a on goonga~: ko o'o yayriijon cooyɗo hokki e ɓuri ko horiiɓe fuu kokki.
41012044	Gam kamɓe ɓe kokkii seɗɗa gada nder ɗuuɗal risku maɓɓe. Ammaa kanko nder cooyndam ma'ako, o hokkii ko o marortoo fuu nder foofaango ma'ako.
41013001	Yeesu e vurtoo Wuro Allah Seniingo, sey go'oto nder almaajiri'en ma'ako vi'i mo~: — Moodibbo, hina ɗe'e kaaƴe mawɗe ɗe ɗum mahari ngo'o wuro~! Rah no ngo vooɗri.
41013002	Sey Yeesu vi'i mo~: — A yi'ii ndi'i mahadi mawndi naa~? Walaa haayre ɗaletee dow woɗnde, ɗe fuu ɗum yibbiney ɗe.
41013003	Yeesu jooɗii dow vaamnde Jaytunje, o hu'uci e Wuro Allah Seniingo, sey Biiturus e Yaakuubu e Yahayya e Anndaraawus njahi to ma'ako kamɓe tan, ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i~:
41013004	— Yecca min, ndeye ku'uje ɗeen laatoto~? Kaye alaama hollata ɗum ɓadake waɗgo~?
41013005	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Kakkilee, to' goɗɗo majjin on.
41013006	Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe no ngarey e innde am, ɓe mbi'a~: «~Miin woni Almasiifu~», ɓe majjina yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
41013007	To on nanii habaru konuuji ɓadiiɗi e goɗɗuɗi, to' on kul, gam doole ɗum waɗa, ammaa naa ɗum timmoode duuniyaaru tawo.
41013008	Lenyol no ummanto lenyol, laamu no ummanto laamu. Veelooji e dimmbaaki lesdi no mbaɗey nder jaaje feere-feere. Ɗum ɗoon fuu, ɗum kama fuɗɗoode ŋatawre danygol tan.
41013009	Ndeenee ko'e mooɗon, gam yimɓe no kokkey on nder juuɗe mawɓe ceri'a, ɗum fiya on nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi, ɗum ndarna on yeeso aardiiɓe lesdi e laamɓe sabu innde am, gam laatanooɗon yam caaydu'en yeeso maɓɓe.
41013010	Doole leƴƴi duuniyaaru fuu nga'ajinee Habaru Belɗum tawo.
41013011	To ɗum nanngii on, ɗum yaharii on yeeso laamu, to' on ngaanno dow ko mbi'oton. To wakkaci ɗuum warii, on keɓey ka mbiiɗon, gam naa ɗum onon mbolvata, ammaa ɗum Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
41013012	Neɗɗo no hokkitirey dimdaaɗo muuɗum waree, baaba maa no hokkitirey ɓiyum. Ɓiɓɓe no ummanto danyooɓe mu''en, ɓe mbaɗa ɗum wara ɓe.
41013013	Yimɓe fuu no nganyey on, gam on tokkuɓe yam. Ammaa munyɗo faa timmoode no hisnete.
41013014	— Wakkaci e wara nde ngi'oton «~fii nyidduɗum kulniiɗum~» e darii yaayre to haanaa ɗum daroo. Jannguɗo ɗum fuu sey fahama ma'ana ma'ajum. Ndeen ɓe ɗum tawi nder lesdi Yahuudiya fuu, sey nyaarda baamle.
41013015	Mo ɗum tawi dow suudu fuu, to' jippoyo, koo vi'a no nattey nder ma'aru hooƴa goɗɗum.
41013016	Mo ɗum tawi nder ngesaa, to' so''o hooƴa koltal muuɗum.
41013017	Kayco rewɓe saawɓe e bambuɓe nder balɗe ɗeen~!
41013018	Mbaɗee do'aare to' fii ɗuum waɗ nder dabbunde.
41013019	Gam nder balɗe ɗeen ɗum waɗey torraa kalluka, iri ka ɗum meeɗaay waɗgo gada duuniyaaru tagaa faa jo'oni, ka fuɗɗitataa boo waɗgo faa abadaa.
41013020	To Allah ustaayno balɗe ɗeen, daa walaa kiseynooɗo. Ammaa gam ɓeen suɓaaɓe ma'ako, o ustiri balɗe ɗeen.
41013021	Wakkaci ɗuum, to goɗɗo vi'ii on~: «~Raa Almasiifu ɗo'o~», koo~: «~Rammo ɗaa'e~», to' on njaɓ.
41013022	Gam almasiifu'en fewre'en e annabo'en fewre'en no mburtoyto, ɓe mbaɗa alaamaaji e kuuɗe kaayniiɗe, gam ɓe majjina yimɓe, faa e suɓaaɓe, to ɗum waɗoto.
41013023	Kakkilee, ndeenee ko'e mooɗon~! Mi yeccake on ɗum, ɗum fuu ila ɗum waraay tawo.
41013024	Ammaa nder balɗe ɗeen ɓaawo kan ɗoon torraa kalluka, naange no niɓɓey, lewru boo no woorey yaynaago.
41013025	Koode no njanoyey gada dow, baawɗeeji gonɗi dow fuu no ndimmboto.
41013026	Wakkaci ɗuum, ɗum yi'ey Ɓii-Neɗɗo e wara nder duule. O wardey e baawɗe mawɗe e teddungal.
41013027	O liloyey malaa'ika'en ma'ako buttulli duuniyaaru nayi fuu, ɓe kawrita suɓaaɓe ma'ako, gada to duuniyaaru fuɗɗiri faa to ndu heyri.
41013028	Pahamee ko ƴibbi hollata~: to licce ma'aki puɗɗii vilitgo, on anndi ndunngu ɓadake.
41013029	Noon boo to on ngi'ii ku'uje ɗeen e mbaɗa, anndee Ɓii-Neɗɗo ɓadake vittoygo, emo ɗoon ha'ade dammugal.
41013030	Emi vi'a on goonga~: ndu'u jaamaniiru timmataa, sey to ku'uje ɗeen fuu mbaɗii.
41013031	Dow e lees no timmey, ammaa bolle am timmataa faa abadaa.
41013032	Ammaa walaa annduɗo nyalaande koo wakkaci nde fii ɗuum waɗata, koo malaa'ika'en wonɓe dow, koo Ɓiɗɗo boo anndaa, Baabiraawo mo dow tan anndi.
41013033	Kakkilee, ndeenee, gam on anndaa wakkaci nde o warata.
41013034	Ɗum nanndii e neɗɗo baɗeyɗo jahaangal. Wakkaci o ɗalata wuro, o reenni ngo maccuɓe ma'ako, o hokki koo moye kuugal muuɗum, o vi'i deenoowo dammugal daroo reena.
41013035	Gam ma'ajum, njooɗee ndeenee, sabu on anndaa wakkaci nde jawmu wuro oon wartoyta, koo ɗum futuro, koo caka jemma, koo fajiri, koo subaka.
41013036	To' o wartu o juha on, o tawa on ɗaani.
41013037	Ka mbi'imi on, kanka mbi'eymi koo moye~: njooɗee, to' on ɗaano~!
41014001	Horii balɗe ɗiɗi ɗum waɗa juulɗe Kuultol e juulɗe Buroodi ɗum walaa Ƴuufnirɗum. Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta ndaari laawol no nanngirta Yeesu e suuɗeefi, ɓe mbara mo.
41014002	Ɓe mbi'i~: — To' en mbaɗ ɗum wakkaci juulɗe Kuultol, gam ɗum baɗoojum yimɓe ummina haɓre.
41014003	Yeesu e nder si'ire Baytaaniya wuro Simon kuturuujo, emo nyaama nyaamdu. Sey goɗɗo debbo wari e jogii paalel haayre vi'eteende albaatir, ngel nebbam caɗɗam, luuɓoojam belɗum mba'araaɗam nardi. O helti ngel, o rufi nebbam ɗaam dow hoore Yeesu.
41014004	Woɓɓe wonɓe ɗoon kuunƴi, ɓe mbi'i hakkunde maɓɓe~: — Ko jeyi o bonniri ɗa'am nebbam nihini~?
41014005	Kul ɗam soorranoo, daa ɗum heɓiino ceede ko ɓuri biya kuwoowo hitaande wo'ore, ɗum hokka ɗe sooyɓe. Ɓe peli debbo oon korey.
41014006	Ammaa Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Ngooree mo. Ko jeyi ngaannoton mo~? Ko o waɗani yam no booɗɗum.
41014007	Wakkaci fuu on ngondi e sooyɓe, on mbaawi vallugo ɓe nde ngiɗɗon fuu. Ammaa miin naa wakkaci fuu ngondumi e mooɗon.
41014008	O'o debbo waɗii ko waawi waɗgo. O moomanii ɓanndu am nebbam luuɓoojam, gam siryaago uveeki am, ko hokka wakkaci ɗuum waɗa.
41014009	Emi vi'a on goonga~: to ɗum wa'ajini Habaru Belɗum nder duuniyaaru fuu, ɗum hokkey habaru ko o'o debbo waɗi, gam hiimtaago mo.
41014010	Sey go'oto nder almaajiri'en Yeesu sappo e ɗiɗo bi'eteeɗo Yahuuda Iskariyooti yahi to mawɓe aardiiɓe diina, gam o hokkitira Yeesu nder juuɗe maɓɓe.
41014011	Nango ɗum velii ɓe korey, ɓe mbaɗi alkawal hokkugo mo ceede. Ila wakkaci ɗuum Yahuuda fuɗɗi yillaago laawol no nyaamrata amaana Yeesu.
41014012	Nyannde arande nde juulɗe Buroodi ɗum walaa ƴuufnirɗum, nde ɗum hirsata jawɗi gam juulɗe Kuultol, almaajiri'en ƴami Yeesu mbi'i~: — Toye ngiɗɗaa min njaha min ciryano maa nyaamdu juulɗe Kuultol~?
41014013	O lili almaajiri'en ɗiɗo, o vi'i ɓe~: — Nattee si'ire, on pottey e gorko e roondii ƴoogirde ndiyam. Tokkee mo,
41014014	wuro ngo o natti fuu, mbi'on jawmu wuro ngoon~: «~Moodibbo vi'i min ƴam maa~: toye suudu ndu o nyaamata nyaamdu juulɗe Kuultol, kanko e almaajiri'en ma'ako~?~»
41014015	O holley on suudu mawndu ndu dow, siryaandu, mo''inaa. Ciryanee en koo ɗume ɗoon, gam nyaamen nyaamdu juulɗe Kuultol.
41014016	Sey almaajiri'en ɓeen nanngi laawol natti si'ire ndeen, ɓe tawi koo ɗume noon no Yeesu vi'iri ɓe. Ɗoon ɓe ciryii koo ɗume gam juulɗe Kuultol.
41014017	Nde futuro waɗi, Yeesu e almaajiri'en sappo e ɗiɗo ngari wuro ngoon.
41014018	Eɓe njooɗii nyaama, sey Yeesu vi'i~: — Emi vi'a on goonga~: go'oto nder mooɗon nyaamdeyɗo e am no nyaamey amaana am.
41014019	Ɗum metti ɓerɗe maɓɓe, ɓe puɗɗi vi'igo mo go'oto-go'oto~: — Naa ɗum miin naa~?
41014020	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Ɗum go'oto nder mooɗon, onon sappo e ɗiɗo ɓe cuɓmi, nyaamdeyɗo e am nder le'al go'otal.
41014021	Ɓii-Neɗɗo no maayrey noon no ɗum vinndiraa dow muuɗum, ammaa kayco nyaameyɗo amaana ma'ako~! To o rimaakano, no ɓuraneyno mo.
41014022	Eɓe nder nyaamgo, sey Yeesu hooƴi buroodi yetti Allah, o senndi ndi, o hokki almaajiri'en, o vi'i~: — Njaɓee. Ɗu'um ɗum ɓanndu am.
41014023	Ndeen o hooƴi jardugel innaboojam o yetti Allah o hokki ɓe ɗam, ɓe fuu ɓe njari ɗam.
41014024	O vi'i ɓe~: — Ɗa'am woni ƴiiƴam am tabbitineyɗam alkawal Allah, ndufeteeɗam gam yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
41014025	Emi vi'a on goonga~: mi ɓesdataa yargo innaboojam, sey nyannde nde njareymi ngoɗɗam kesam nder laamu Allah.
41014026	Ɓaawo ɓe ngimii gimol maaltugo Allah, ɓe ndilliri vaamnde Jaytunje.
41014027	Yeesu vi'i almaajiri'en muuɗum~: — On fuu on nyaarey kibinon yam, noon no ɗum vinndiraa~: «~Mi warey gaynaako, baali ɗiin cankitoo.~»
41014028	Ammaa ɓaawo mi ummitake, mi aartey on yahago Gaaliili.
41014029	Sey Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Koo to ɓe fuu ɓe kibinii ma, miin mi hibintaa ma.
41014030	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Emi vi'i maa goonga~: hannde nder nde'e jemmaare, ko hokka njakaraari kurkita nde ɗiɗi, a vi'ey a anndaa yam nde tati.
41014031	Ammaa Biiturus jaɓaay, o vi'i e semmbee~: — Koo to ɗum wardey yam e maaɗa, mi vi'ataa mi anndaa ma. Horiiɓe maa mbi'i kama noon.
41014032	Ɓe njahi yaayre vi'eteende Gecemane, Yeesu vi'i almaajiri'en muuɗum~: — Njooɗee ɗo'o, mi yaha mi waɗa do'aare.
41014033	O hooƴi Biiturus e Yaakuubu e Yahayya. Ɓernde ma'ako fuɗɗi nango torraa e mettuɗum korey.
41014034	O vi'i ɓe~: — Mettam ɓeram ɗuuɗanii yam, faa e yiɗi wargo yam. Njooɗee ɗo'o, to' on ɗaano.
41014035	-
41014036	O yahi yeeso seɗɗa, o diccii o waɗi do'aare, o vi'i~: — Baaba am, to ɗum baɗotooɗum, sottinanam wakkaci torraa ngonka yeeso am. Koo ɗume no baɗotooɗum to maaɗa. To a jaɓii, sottinanam jardugel ka'a torraa. E noon fuu, naa ko ngiɗmi waɗete, ammaa ko ngiɗɗaa.
41014037	Ndeen o so''ii to maɓɓe, o tawi eɓe ɗaanii, sey o vi'i Biiturus~: — Biiturus, a ɗaani naa~? A waawaay reengo koo daa awaa go'otum naa~?
41014038	Ummee mbaɗee do'aare, to' on ɗaano, gam to' on njan nder jarrabeeki. Ɓernde e yiɗi ɗowtaago, ammaa ɓanndu tampi.
41014039	Kadimaa o vitti o waɗi do'aare, o vi'i ka o vi'inoo.
41014040	O vittoyi to maɓɓe, o tawi ɓe ɗaantake, gam eɓe nana ɗoyngol teddungol. Ɓe ndulli ka ɓe mbi'ata mo.
41014041	O vittoyi tataɓre, o vi'i ɓe~: — Faa jo'oni on ɗo'o ɗaanii poofta~? Ɗum heƴi~! Wakkaci warii. Jo'oni Ɓii-Neɗɗo no hokkete nder juuɗe waɗooɓe hakke.
41014042	Ummee ndillen~! Raa nyaameyɗo amaana am ɗoon wara.
41014043	Yeesu e nder bolle, sey Yahuuda go'oto nder almaajiri'en sappo e ɗiɗo wari. O wardi e yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe jogiiɓe kaafaaje e cabbi. Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e arɗuɓe liloyi ɓe.
41014044	Ndeen maa Yahuuda nyaameyɗo amaana Yeesu aartii yeccake ɓe no hollirta ɓe Yeesu, o vi'i~: — Neɗɗo mo kinnireymi hinnoore higaaku, ɗum kanko. Nanngee mo, mbaɗon reenooɓe njogoo mo booɗɗum, ndillida e ma'ako.
41014045	Nde Yahuuda yottii to ɓe ngoni, ɗoon e ɗoon o ƴaɓɓii to Yeesu o vi'i ɗum~: — Moodibbo~! Ndeen o hinniri mo hinnoore higaaku.
41014046	Yimɓe ɓeen nanngi Yeesu, njogii mo booɗɗum.
41014047	Ammaa go'oto nder almaajiri'en Yeesu dariiɗo ha'ade ɗoon saafti kaafahi fe''i nofru maccuɗo aardiiɗo diina mawɗo, o itti ndu.
41014048	Sey Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Ko jeyi ngarduɗon e kaafaaje e cabbi gam nanngugo yam, mi pasoowo naa~?
41014049	Koo ndeye emi wondi e mooɗon, emi ekkitina nder Wuro Allah Seniingo, on nanngaay yam. Ammaa ɗum waɗii gam hebbingo ko Deftere vi'i.
41014050	Sey almaajiri'en ɓeen fuu nyaari kibini mo.
41014051	Goɗɗo kayeejo tokki Yeesu e vahanii wudere tan. Nde ɓe parmii mo,
41014052	o nyoostani ɓe wudere ndeen, o nyaari o suhuraaki.
41014053	Ɓe njahari Yeesu to aardiiɗo diina mawɗo. Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta fuu kawriti ɗoon.
41014054	Biiturus tokkiri mo kosngel gulngel, faa yahago nder fiiliire wuro aardiiɗo diina mawɗo. O jooɗodii e reenooɓe Wuro Allah Seniingo, emo aytinoo.
41014055	Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e Kawtal Sernooɓe fuu e ngilloo caaydaaku dow layfi ɗum Yeesu waɗi, gam ɓe keɓa daliila wargo mo, ammaa ɓe keɓaay.
41014056	Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe mbolvi haalaaji fewre dow ma'ako, ammaa ko ɓe mbi'i luhuri.
41014057	Sey woɓɓe ummii mbi'i ɗi'i haalaaji fewre dow ma'ako~:
41014058	— Min nanii o vi'ii o yibbiney ngo'o Wuro Allah Seniingo ngo yimɓe mahi, ndeen ɓaawo balɗe tati o maha woɗngo, naa e juuɗe yimɓe.
41014059	Ammaa e noon fuu, ko ɓe mbi'i luhuri.
41014060	Sey aardiiɗo diina mawɗo ummii darii yeeso maɓɓe, o ƴami Yeesu o vi'i~: — A walaa ka mbi'ataa naa~? Ko ɓe mbi'i dow maaɗa no goonga naa~?
41014061	Ammaa Yeesu de''iti, o toontaaki mo. Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo oon ɓesdi ƴami Yeesu vi'i~: — Aan a Almasiifu Ɓiɗɗo Allah mo barkaa naa~?
41014062	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Ee, ɗum miin. On ngi'ey Ɓii-Neɗɗo e jooɗii e junngo Jawmu Baawɗe nyaamo, emo wara nder duule asama.
41014063	Sey aardiiɗo diina mawɗo oon seeki kolte muuɗum vi'i~: — Kaye caayda ngillotooɗen kadi~?
41014064	On nanii nii haala kalluka ka o volvi dow Allah. Ɗume ngiiɗon~? Sey yimɓe fuu mbi'i e haani o waree.
41014065	Woɓɓe maɓɓe puɗɗi tuutango mo joode, ɓe kuumani mo gite, ɓe mbaɗi ga fiigo mo, eɓe mbi'a mo~: — Kay annabiijo~! Yecca min piiɗo ma. Reenooɓe boo mbaɗi ga menngaago mo.
41014066	Biiturus e nder fiiliire wuro ngoon, sey go'oto nder horɓe aardiiɗo diina mawɗo wari yaayre ndeen.
41014067	Nde o yi'i Biiturus e aytinii, o sutii ɗum o vi'i~: — Aan maa, a wondi e Yeesu mo Najaratu.
41014068	Ammaa Biiturus yeddi vi'i~: — Miin, mi anndaa mo, mi fahamaay ko mbiiɗaa. Biiturus vurtii yahi dammugal wuro, sey njakaraari kurkiti.
41014069	Nde korɗo oon yi'itii Biiturus ɗoon, o vi'i dariiɓe ɗoon~: — O'o neɗɗo o go'oto maɓɓe~!
41014070	Ammaa Biiturus ɓesdi yeddugo. Ɓaawo ɗoon seɗɗa, dariiɓe ɗoon mbi'i Biiturus~: — Daahir a go'oto nder almaajiri'en ma'ako, gam a Gaaliilankeejo.
41014071	Biiturus fuɗɗi hunaago, vi'i~: — Mi anndaa o'o neɗɗo mo mbaɗoton haala muuɗum.
41014072	Ɗoon e ɗoon njakaraari kurkiti ɗiɗaɓum. Sey Biiturus hiimtii ko Yeesu vi'inoo ɗum~: «~Ko hokka njakaraari kurkita nde ɗiɗi, a vi'ey a anndaa yam faa nde tati.~» Ndeen Biiturus vurtii fuɗɗi voygo.
41015001	Ila fajiri mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e Kawtal Sernooɓe Diina fuu, ɓe kawti ɓe mbaɗi caawara. Ɓe kaɓɓi Yeesu ɓe njahari ɗum to Bilaatus gomnaajo.
41015002	Bilaatus ƴami mo vi'i~: — Aan woni laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en naa~? Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Ee, noon no mbiiɗaa.
41015003	Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina ngullorii mo ku'uje ɗuuɗɗe.
41015004	Sey Bilaatus ɓesdi ƴami mo vi'i~: — A walaa ka mbi'ataa naa~? A nanaay ko ɓe ngullori maa fuu naa~?
41015005	Ammaa Yeesu vi'aay koo kaye, faa ɗum haaynii Bilaatus.
41015006	Wakkaci juulɗe Kuultol fuu, Bilaatus e voovi yoofango Yahuudu'en kaɓɓaaɗo go'oto, mo ɓe ngiɗi yoofaneego.
41015007	E woodi goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Barabas, kaɓɓidaaɗo e woɓɓe nder kaso, gam ɓe kaɓdii e laamu, faa ɓe mbari goɗɗo nder haɓre ndeen.
41015008	Sey jama'aare ɗuuɗnde wari, torii Bilaatus waɗana ɓe ko o voovi waɗango ɓe.
41015009	Bilaatus ƴami ɓe vi'i~: — On ngiɗi mi yoofana on laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en naa~?
41015010	Bilaatus fahamii nalwiiru tan waɗi mawɓe aardiiɓe diina ngaddiri Yeesu to muuɗum.
41015011	Ammaa mawɓe aardiiɓe diina puufi jama'aare toroo Bilaatus yoofana ɓe Barabas, naa Yeesu.
41015012	Bilaatus ƴami ɓe vi'i~: — Ee, noye ngiɗɗon mi waɗana o'o mo mbi'oton laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en~?
41015013	Ɓe mbi'i e semmbee~: — War mo dow gaafagal~!
41015014	Bilaatus ƴami ɓe vi'i~: — Ndeye halleende o waɗi~? Ammaa ɓe ɓesdi vi'igo e semmbee~: — War mo dow gaafagal~!
41015015	Nde laatii Bilaatus e yiɗi velgo jama'aare ndeen, o yoofani ɓe Barabas. O waɗi ɗum fiiri Yeesu looci, ndeen o waɗi mo nder juuɗe soojeeji Rooma, gam ɓe mbaroya mo dow gaafagal.
41015016	Soojeeji njahari Yeesu fiiliire laamorde vi'eteende Firtoriyum, ɓe noddi soojeeji koriiɗi fuu ɓe kawriti ɗi.
41015017	Ɓe ɓorni mo burnus bo'ojiteyɗum, ɓe mbami giifol gi'e, ɓe ngiifi mo ngol.
41015018	Ndeen ɓe puɗɗi hinnugo mo, eɓe mbi'a~: — Allah sabbinane laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.
41015019	Ɓe piiri mo sawru dow hoore, ɓe tuutani mo joode, ɓe ndiccii yeeso ma'ako, ɓe cujjidani mo.
41015020	Ɓaawo ɓe njaltinirii mo, ɓe ɓorti mo burnus bo'ojiteyɗum ɗuum, ɓe ɓorni mo kolte ma'ako. Ndeen ɓe mburtini mo, ɓe njahari mo yaasi, gam ɓe ɓiloya mo dow gaafagal.
41015021	Dow laawol ɓe potti e gorko bi'eteeɗo Simon, mo si'ire Sireene, baaba Aleksandir e Rufus, e warta gada ladde. Soojeeji ndooli mo o vakkoo gaafagal Yeesu.
41015022	Ɓe njahari Yeesu woɗnde yaayre vi'eteende Golgota, waato Gumbal Hoore.
41015023	Ɓe kokki mo innaboojam njillindiraaɗam e miir o yara, ammaa o yaraay ɗam.
41015024	Ɓe ɓili mo dow gaafagal, ɓe cenndiri kolte ma'ako e waɗgo cuɓol, gam ɓe ngi'a ko koo moye maɓɓe heɓata.
41015025	Wakkaci ɓe ɓili mo dow gaafagal, ɗum njamndi joveenayi ndi subaka.
41015026	Ɓe takki alluwaawal dow hoore gaafagal ngaal, ɓe mbinndi ko ɗum wullorii mo dow ma'agal vi'igo~: «~Laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en~».
41015027	-
41015028	Kadimaa ɓe ɓili wuyɓe ɗiɗo dow gaafaaɗe ha'ade Yeesu, go'oto e junngo ma'ako nyaamo, go'oto e nano.
41015029	Yimɓe ƴaɓɓotooɓe e kuɗa Yeesu, e ndimmba ko'e e mbi'a~: — Too, aan biiɗo no yibbiney Wuro Allah Seniingo, nyiɓtoo ngo nder balɗe tati,
41015030	jippoya dow gaafagal, kisnaa hoore maaɗa~!
41015031	Noon boo mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta njaltiniri mo hakkunde mu''en, ɓe mbi'i~: — O hisnii woɓɓe, ammaa o waawaay hisnugo hoore ma'ako.
41015032	Woor kanko biiɗo no Almasiifu laamiiɗo Isiraa'iila o jippoyoo jo'oni dow gaafagal, gam ngi'en ngoonɗinen mo. Wuyɓe ɓe ɗum ɓili vuttudu ma'ako boo kuɗi mo.
41015033	Caka nyalawma, sey niɓre suddi lesdi fuu, faa yahago njamndi tati ndi alaasara.
41015034	Njamndi tati ndiin, sey Yeesu towni voliinde vi'i~: — Eloy, Eloy, lama sabaktani~? Waato~: «~Yaa Allah am, yaa Allah am, gam ɗume kibinirɗaa yam~?~»
41015035	Nde woɓɓe nder dariiɓe yaayre ndeen nani ɗum, ɓe mbi'i~: — Nanee, emo nodda annabi Iliya.
41015036	Sey go'oto maɓɓe nyaari soofni sooso nder innaboojam lammuɗam, o haɓɓi ɗum e loosol, o ɓattini ɗum e honnduko Yeesu, gam o musina, o vi'i~: — Ngooree ngi'en kul Iliya no warey jippina mo.
41015037	Yeesu wulli e semmbee, ndeen o maayi.
41015038	Sey wudere wonnde nder Wuro Allah Seniingo seeki gada dow faa lees, nde waɗi cende ɗiɗi.
41015039	Nde mawɗo soojeeji dariiɗo yeeso ma'ako yi'i no o maayri, o vi'i~: — Goonga, o'o neɗɗo o Ɓiɗɗo Allah~!
41015040	Woɓɓe rewɓe e ndarii to woɗɗi e ndaara. Nder maɓɓe e woodi Maryaama mo Magadaaliya, e Saloomi, e Maryaama inna Yaakuubu pamaro e Yusufu.
41015041	Kamɓe tokkunoo Yeesu, e kuwana mo nde o wonnoo lesdi Gaaliili. E woodi rewɓe feere ɗuuɗɓe wardoyɓe e ma'ako Urusaliima, kamɓe maa eɓe ɗoon.
41015042	Ɗum alaasara siryanaago nyannde-fooftiinde.
41015043	Gam ma'ajum, Yusufu mo si'ire Aramaatiya semmbiɗini ɓernde muuɗum, o yahi to Bilaatus o torii ɗum hokka mo ɓanndu Yeesu. Yusufu no neɗɗo teddinaaɗo nder Kawtal Sernooɓe Diina, kanko maa emo haaɓi o yi'a garol laamu Allah.
41015044	Nde Bilaatus nani Yeesu aartii maayi, ɗum haaynii mo. O noddi mawɗo soojeeji o ƴami ɗum, kul ɗum goonga Yeesu aartii maayi.
41015045	Nde o nani ka e honnduko mawɗo soojeeji oon, o woori Yusufu hooƴa ɓanndu nduun.
41015046	Sey Yusufu soodoyi wudere saɗnde, o waɗi ɗum jippini ɓanndu Yeesu, o taardi ndu wudere ndeen, o wallini ndu nder yenaande wasaande nder haayre. O talliti kaaƴa o omndi honnduko yenaande ndeen.
41015047	Maryaama mo Magadaaliya e Maryaama inna Yusufu ngi'ii to ɗum wallini ɓanndu Yeesu.
41016001	Nde nyannde-fooftiinde ƴaɓɓii, Maryaama mo Magadaaliya e Saloomi e Maryaama inna Yaakuubu coodi nebbam mbelɗam luuɓngol, gam ɓe njaha ɓe molmana ɓanndu Yeesu.
41016002	Nyannde alat ɓe ummii ila fajiri, ɓe njottii yenaande ndeen puɗoyki naange.
41016003	Dow laawol ɓe mbaɗi ga vi'igo hakkunde maɓɓe~: — Moye tallitanta en kaaƴa nga ɗum omndiri honnduko yenaande ndeen~?
41016004	Ammaa nde ɓe ɓanti gite, ɓe ngi'i kaaƴa ngaan tallitaama.
41016005	Nde ɓe natti yenaande ndeen, ɓe ngi'i goɗɗo kayeejo e jooɗii vuttudu nyaamru, emo ɓornii kolte daneeje tar, ɓe kultori.
41016006	Kayeejo oon vi'i ɓe~: — To' on kul~! Eɗon ndaara Yeesu mo Najaratu baraaɗo dow gaafagal. O ummitinaama nder maayde~! O walaa ɗo'o. Raa to o wallinano.
41016007	Jo'oni, njahee mbi'on almaajiri'en ma'ako e Biiturus, o aartey on yahago lesdi Gaaliili. Toon ngi'oton mo, noon no o vi'inoo on.
41016008	Rewɓe ɓeen mburtii yenaande, ɓe nyaari, eɓe ndiwna sabu kulol. Kulol haɗi ɓe vi'igo ka koo moye. [
41016009	Nyannde alat fajiri, Yeesu ummitii nder maayde. Ɓaawo o ummitake o aartii vanngango Maryaama mo Magadaaliya, mo o vurtinannoo ginnaaji joveeɗiɗi.
41016010	Maryaama oon yahi vi'i ka wondunooɓe e Yeesu. Wakkaci ɗuum eɓe nder ɓillaare, eɓe mboya.
41016011	Nde ɓe nani Yeesu e foofa, Maryaama boo yi'ii mo, ɓe njaɓaay ka.
41016012	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, woɓɓe goonɗinɓe mo ɗiɗo e dow laawol nder ladde yahago goɗngel ci'el, sey Yeesu vanngani ɓe nder nanndi feere.
41016013	Ɓe co''ii ɓe mbi'i ka horiiɓe, ammaa ɓe njaɓaay ka ɓe'e maa mbi'i.
41016014	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, Yeesu vanngani almaajiri'en muuɗum sappo e go'o, wakkaci ɓe nyaamata. O feli ɓe, sabu ciya goonɗinki maɓɓe e ca'atal ɓerɗe maɓɓe, gam ɓe njaɓaay ko yiiɓe mo ngeccii ɓe ɓaawo o ummitake.
41016015	O vi'i ɓe~: — Njahee koo toye nder duuniyaaru, nga'ajinon koo moye Habaru Belɗum.
41016016	Goonɗinɗo yam waɗanaa baptisma no hisey, ammaa mo goonɗinaay yam no sernante.
41016017	Goonɗinɓe yam fuu no mbaɗey ɗi'i alaamaaji kaayniiɗi~: ɓe mburtiney ginnaaji e innde am, ɓe mbolvey ɗemle kese,
41016018	ɓe nanngey bo'ole e juuɗe maɓɓe, to ɓe njarii tooke, ɗe mbaɗantaa ɓe koo ɗume, ɓe njowaney nyawɓe juuɗe njamɗita.
41016019	Ɓaawo Yeesu Jawmiraawo volvanii ɓe, o ƴeftiraama dow, o jooɗii e junngo Allah nyaamo.
41016020	Sey almaajiri'en ma'ako ndilli, nga'ajinoyi Habaru Belɗum koo toye. Jawmiraawo boo valli ɓe, hokki ɓe baawɗe waɗgo kuuɗe kaayniiɗe, gam tabbitingo ko ɓe mbi'ata, to ma'ako ɗum ivoyi.]
42001001	Yaa Tiyofilus mawɗo, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ti'inake mbinndii habaru ku'uje ko waɗi nder amin.
42001002	Ɓe mbinndii habaru ɗum nanɗen gada e konnduɗe ɓeen yiiɓe ɗuum ko waɗi e gite mu''en ila fuɗɗoode. Kamɓe ɓeen kalfinaa anndingo habaru ɗuum.
42001003	Miin boo mi liinyii e hakkiilo no ku'uje ɗeen fuu mba'ari ila fuɗɗam. Gam ma'ajum, aan Tiyofilus Mawɗo, mi yi'ii ɗum booɗɗum miin boo mi vinndan maa e tokkindirki no habaru ɗuum fuu wa'ari,
42001004	gam tabbitinaa goonga habaru ko ɗum ekkitin maa.
42001005	Too, nder jaamaniiru ndu Hiruudus laamii dow lesdi Yahuudiya, e woodi aardiiɗo diina bi'eteeɗo Jakariya, gonɗo nder yeɓre aardiiɓe diina lenyol Abiya. Innde debbo ma'ako Alisabaatu mo lenyol Haruuna.
42001006	Ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe goonga'en yeeso Allah, eɓe tokki dookaaji ma'ako booɗɗum, ɓe ngalaa feloore fuu.
42001007	Ammaa ɓe keɓaayno ɓinngel, gam Alisabaatu no dimaro, kadimaa ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe naywi.
42001008	Nyannde feere Jakariya e waɗa kuugal muuɗum ngal aardiiɗo diina nder Wuro Allah Seniingo, gam ɗum wakkaci kuugal yeɓre ma'ako.
42001009	Aardiiɓe diina e mbaɗa cuɓol gam senndugo kuugal hakkunde mu''en. Nyanndeere ndeen Jakariya suɓaa, gam o natta nder yaayre seniinde o wula urdi.
42001010	Wakkaci o wulata urdi, jama'aare fuu e darii yaasi e waɗa do'aare.
42001011	Sey malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo vanngani mo, darii vuttudu to ɗum wulata urdi ndu nyaamo.
42001012	Nde Jakariya yi'i mo, ɓernde muuɗum taƴi, kulol nanngi ɗum.
42001013	Ammaa malaa'ikaajo oon vi'i mo~: — Ta'a hul Jakariya, Jawmiraawo jaɓii do'aare maaɗa. Debbo maaɗa Alisabaatu no danyante ɓiɗɗo gorko, a tokaney mo Yahayya.
42001014	A naney belɗum korey, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe boo no mbelmbeltey, sabu danyeeki ɓiɗɗo oon,
42001015	gam o laatoto mawɗo yeeso Jawmiraawo. O yarataa innaboojam koo yare-yare ko sottinta hakkiilo, ammaa o heevey Ruhu Ceniiɗo ila emo nder reedu inna ma'ako.
42001016	O vittinoyey ɓiɓɓe Isiraa'iila ɗuuɗɓe to Allah Jawmiraawo maɓɓe.
42001017	O aartey Almasiifu wargo nder baawɗe Ruhu Allah ɗe annabi Iliya heɓno, gam o narrina danyooɓe e ɓiɓɓe mu''en, o vittinoya saliiɓe ɗowtanaago Jawmiraawo dow laawol goonga'en. O siryoo yimɓe gam garol Jawmiraawo.
42001018	Jakariya ƴami malaa'ikaajo oon vi'i~: — Noye anndireymi ko mbiiɗaa ɗum goonga~? Gam miin mi naywi, debbo am boo duuɓi muuɗum ɗuuɗi.
42001019	Malaa'ikaajo toontii mo vi'i~: — Miin woni Jibiraa'iilu darotooɗo yeeso Allah dum gam huwango mo. Mi lilaama to maaɗa gam mi hokku maa ɗu'um Habaru Belɗum.
42001020	Ammaa jo'oni a waawataa volvugo, faa nyannde nde hu'unde ɗuum laatii, gam a goonɗinaay haala am laatotooka to wakkaci muuɗum warii.
42001021	Wakkaci ɗuum yimɓe e ndeenti Jakariya, neeɓoyki ma'ako nder Suudu Jawmiraawo haaynake ɓe.
42001022	Nde o vurtoyii, o waawaay volvango ɓe. Ɓe pahami e woodi kaayniiɗum ko o yi'i toon nder Suudu Jawmiraawo. O darii o volirani ɓe juuɗe, ammaa o jooɗorii noon o volvataa.
42001023	Nde balɗe kuugal ma'ako keƴi, o hootii.
42001024	Balɗe seɗɗa ɓaawo ma'ajum, debbo ma'ako Alisabaatu heɓi reedu, o suuɗii nder wuro lebbi jovi. O vi'i~:
42001025	— Ndaaree ko Jawmiraawo waɗani yam. Nder wakkaci pottanɗum mo, o yi'ii jurumɗum am, o ittanii yam cemtuɗum yeeso yimɓe.
42001026	Nder lewru Alisabaatu joveego'ooru ɓaawo o heɓii reedu, Allah lili malaa'ikaajo Jibiraa'iilu si'ire vi'eteende Najaratu nder lesdi Gaaliili.
42001027	O lili mo to goɗɗo surbaajo, nannganaaɗo gorko bi'eteeɗo Yusufu, mo lenyol Dawda. Surbaajo oon e vi'ee Maryaama
42001028	Malaa'ikaajo oon wari to ma'ako vi'i mo~: — Salaama aleekum, aan barkiɗinaaɗo Jawmiraawo~! Jawmiraawo e wondi e maaɗa~!
42001029	Hinnoore ndeen waanni Maryaama korey. O vi'i nder ɓernde ma'ako~: — Ɗume nde'e hinnoore yiɗi vi'igo~?
42001030	Ammaa malaa'ikaajo oon vi'i mo~: — Ta'a hul Maryaama, gam barkaa Allah futtanii ma.
42001031	A heɓey reedu, ndanyaa ɓiɗɗo gorko, tokanaa mo Yeesu.
42001032	O laatoto mawɗo, o noddirte Ɓiɗɗo Allah Jawmu Manngu. Allah Jawmiraawo no hokkey mo jooɗorgal laamu maama ma'ako Dawda.
42001033	O laamoto dow ɓiɓɓe Isiraa'iila faa abadaa. Laamu ma'ako re'ataa.
42001034	Maryaama vi'i malaa'ikaajo oon~: — Noye ɗum waɗorto~? Gam mi anndaa gorko.
42001035	Malaa'ikaajo oon toontii mo vi'i~: — Ruhu Ceniiɗo no jippoto dow maaɗa, baawɗe Allah Jawmu Manngu no suddete kama ɗowdi. Gam ma'ajum, danyeteeɗo oon no noddirte Ceniiɗo e Ɓiɗɗo Allah.
42001036	Rah, bannda Alisabaatu heɓii reedu ɓiɗɗo gorko nder nayeewu muuɗum, koo nde yimɓe mbi'inoo o dimaro. Jo'oni emo woodi reedu ndu lebbi joveego'o.
42001037	Gam walaa ko salori Allah.
42001038	Ndeen Maryaama vi'i~: — Miin mi korɗo Jawmiraawo, ɗum laatanoo yam noon no mbiiɗaa. Ndeen malaa'ikaajo oon dilli woori mo.
42001039	Nder balɗe ɗeen, Maryaama ummii jaawɗum, yahi si'ire wonnde nder baamle Yahuudiya.
42001040	Nde o yottii toon, o natti wuro Jakariya o hinni Alisabaatu.
42001041	Wakkaci ko Alisabaatu nani hinnoore Maryaama, ɓiɗɗo gonɗo nder reedu muuɗum dimmbii. Alisabaatu hebbinaa Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
42001042	O volvi e semmbee, o vi'i Maryaama~: — A barkiɗinaaɗo nder rewɓe fuu~! Ɓiɗɗo mo caawɗaa boo o barkiɗinaaɗo.
42001043	Miin, mi moye mo inna Jawmiraawo am warata to muuɗum~?
42001044	Gam nde nanmi hinnoore maaɗa, ɓiɗɗo gonɗo nder reedu am dimmbake sabu belɗum.
42001045	A barkiɗinaaɗo, gam a goonɗinii ko Jawmiraawo vi'i mbi'eɗaa no waɗey daahir.
42001046	Ndeen Maryaama vi'i~: — Ɓernde am e maalta Jawmiraawo.
42001047	Yonki am heevii belɗum sabu Allah Kisnoowo yam,
42001048	gam o raarii yamnaare korɗo ma'ako. Gada jo'oni yimɓe jaamanuuji fuu no noddirey yam barkiɗinaaɗo,
42001049	gam Allah Jawmu Baawɗe waɗanii yam ku'uje mawɗe. Innde ma'ako no seniinde.
42001050	Yurmeende ma'ako dow hulooɓe mo re'ataa faa abadaa.
42001051	O huwii kuuɗe mawɗe e junngo ma'ako semmbiɗngo. O sankitii yimɓe ɓe ɓerɗe mu''en keevi mawnitaare.
42001052	O jippinii laamiiɓe dow laamu mu''en, ammaa o mawninii yavaaɓe.
42001053	O haarnirii nanooɓe veelo e ku'uje booɗɗe, ammaa o yoofii riskuɓe e juuɗe mehere.
42001054	-
42001055	O vallii yimɓe Isiraa'iila huwanooɓe mo, gam o yeggitaay alkawal ngal o waɗannoo maamiraaɓe meeɗen, ngal nango jurumɗum Ibraahim e lenyol muuɗum faa abadaa.
42001056	Maryaama jooɗodii e Alisabaatu faro lebbi tati, ndeen o so''ii wuro ma'ako.
42001057	Nde wakkaci danyki Alisabaatu waɗi, o danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko.
42001058	Nde ho'odiɗɗaaɓe e banndiraaɓe ma'ako nani barkaa makka ka Jawmiraawo hokki mo, ɓe mbelmbelditii e ma'ako.
42001059	Nde ɓinngel ngeel waɗi balɗe joveetati, ɓe ngari naadugo ngel. Ɓe ngiɗiino tokango ngel innde baaba ma'agel Jakariya.
42001060	Ammaa inna ma'agel salii vi'i~: — A'aa, tokanee ngel Yahayya.
42001061	Ɓe mbi'i mo~: — Nder lenyol maaɗa walaa goonɗo nden ɗoon innde.
42001062	Sey ɓe mbolvirani baaba ma'agel juuɗe, gam ɓe annda innde nde o yiɗi ɗum tokana ngel.
42001063	Jakariya ƴami ɓe alluwaawal, o vinndi dow ma'agal~: — Innde ma'agel Yahayya. Fii ɗuum haaynii yimɓe fuu wonɓe ɗoon.
42001064	Ɗoon e ɗoon, honnduko ma'ako omtii, ɗemngal ma'ako haɓɓiti. O fuɗɗi volvugo, emo maalta Allah.
42001065	Kulol nanngi ho'odiɗɗaaɓe maɓɓe fuu. Habaru ɗuum sankitii koo toye nder baamle Yahuudiya.
42001066	Nanɗo ɗum fuu nyumi dow ma'ajum vi'i~: «~Ɗume ɓinngel ngeel laatotoo to ngel mawni~?~» Gam junngo Jawmiraawo e wondi e ma'agel.
42001067	Jakariya baaba ɓinngel ngeel heevi Ruhu Ceniiɗo, o waɗi annabaaku o vi'i~:
42001068	— Yettoore laatanoo Jawmiraawo, Allah mo Isiraa'iila, gam o vallii yimɓe ma'ako, o rimɗinii ɓe.
42001069	O waddanii en kisnoowo cemmbiɗɗo iɓɗo nder lenyol maccuɗo ma'ako Dawda,
42001070	O vi'iino ila ko neeɓi e konnduɗe annabo'en ma'ako seniiɓe~:
42001071	O hisney en gada e juuɗe halluɓe, e wanywanyɓe meeɗen.
42001072	O nanii jurumɗum maamiraaɓe meeɗen, o yeggitaay alkawal ma'ako ceniingal,
42001073	ngal o hunanii maama meeɗen Ibraahim.
42001074	O vi'i o hisney en gada e juuɗe wanywanyɓe meeɗen, gam kuwanen mo, naa e kulol,
42001075	njooɗooɗen en seniiɓe e goonga'en yeeso ma'ako faa keerol balɗe meeɗen fuu.
42001076	Aan ɓinngel am, a noddirte annabiijo Allah Jawmu Manngu, gam a aartey Jawmiraawo wargo faa mo''inanaa mo laawol,
42001077	anndinaa yimɓe ma'ako o hisney ɓe, o ya'afoto hakkeeji maɓɓe.
42001078	Gam Allah meeɗen o keeɓɗo yurmeende, O lildoyey en jayngol ma'ako manngol gada dow,
42001079	gam ngol yaynanoo wonɓe nder niɓre e kulol maayde, ngol tokkina kosɗe meeɗen dow laawol jam.
42001080	Yahayya mawni, fahamu ma'ako ɓesdii. O jooɗii nder ladde faa wakkaci nde o vanngani yimɓe Isiraa'iila.
42002001	E wakkaci danyeeki Yahayya, Agustus laamiiɗo Rooma vi'i ɗum lima yimɓe wonɓe nder laamu Rooma fuu.
42002002	Kangal woni limgal aranal ngal ɗum waɗi e wakkaci ko Kiriniyus laatii gomnaajo lesdi Siiriya.
42002003	Koo moye fuu yahi si'ire muuɗum gam limee.
42002004	Yusufu boo ummii si'ire Najaratu nder lesdi Gaaliili. O yahi si'ire to Dawda rimaa vi'eteende Baytilaama, wonnde nder lesdi Yahuudiya, gam kanko ɗum mo lenyol Dawda.
42002005	O yahi toon gam ɗum lima mo, kanko e Maryaama mo o nannganaa, gaamɗo.
42002006	Eɓe nder Baytilaama, sey wakkaci danygol Maryaama waɗi.
42002007	O danyi ɓinngel gorel afel ma'ako, o saawri ngel leppi wudere, o wallini ngel nder akali nyaamnirki bisaaji, gam ɓe keɓaay yaayre nder veerdude.
42002008	Nder lesdi ndiin e woodi waynaaɓe waaleyɓe e ndeeni bisaaji mu''en vuttudu si'ire.
42002009	Sey malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo vanngani ɓe, teddungal Jawmiraawo yaynanii ɓe, kulol manngol nanngi ɓe.
42002010	Ammaa malaa'ikaajo oon vi'i ɓe~: — To' on kul~! Gam mi waddanii on habaru belɗum, beleyɗum yimɓe fuu.
42002011	Hannde nder si'ire Dawda on ndanyanaama kisnoowo, kanko woni Almasiifu Jawmiraawo.
42002012	Raa no keɓtirton mo~: on tawey ɓinngel e saawaa nder leppi, engel wallinaa nder akali nyaamnirki bisaaji.
42002013	Ɗoon e ɗoon sey cefe malaa'ika'en gada asama mbanngi kawti e malaa'ikaajo oon, ɓe mbaɗi ga maaltugo Allah, eɓe mbi'a~:
42002014	— Teddungal laatanoo Allah toon dow, nder duuniyaaru boo, jam laatanoo yimɓe ɓe Allah nanata belɗum mu''en.
42002015	Nde malaa'ika'en ɓeen co''ii dow, sey waynaaɓe ɓeen mbi'i hakkunde mu''en~: — En njah Baytilaama ngi'en ɗu'um ko Jawmiraawo anndini en.
42002016	Sey ɓe njawɗii ɓe njahi toon, ɓe tawi Maryaama e Yusufu e ɓinngel ngeel, engel wallinaa nder nyaamnirɗum bisaaji.
42002017	Nde ɓe ngi'i ngel, ɓe ngeccii ko malaa'ikaajo vi'i ɓe dow ma'agel.
42002018	Ko waynaaɓe ɓeen mbi'i haaynake koo moye nanɗo ɗum fuu.
42002019	Maryaama boo jogii ko nani fuu nder ɓernde muuɗum, o waɗi ga nyumgo ɗum.
42002020	Ndeen waynaaɓe ɓeen co''ii, e mawnina Allah, e maalta mo gam koo ɗume ko ɓe nani e ko ɓe ngi'i, deydey e no malaa'ikaajo yeccorii ɓe.
42002021	Nde ɓinngel ngeel waɗi balɗe joveetati, ngel naadaa, ngel tokanaa Yeesu, innde nde malaa'ikaajo vi'inoo inna ma'agel hokka ngel ila o heɓaayno reedu.
42002022	Nde balɗe lootaaki maɓɓe keevi, kama no ɗum vinndiraa nder Tawreeta Muusa, Yusufu e Maryaama njahari Yeesu Urusaliima gam ɓe kolla mo yeeso Jawmiraawo.
42002023	Gam noon Jawmiraawo vi'i nder Tawreeta~: Ɓiɗɗo gorko afo fuu, Jawmiraawo jeyi mo.
42002024	Ɓe ngari boo gam ɓe mbaɗa sadaka, kama no ɗum vinndiraa nder Tawreeta~: pooli ɗiɗi koo uugahon ɗiɗon.
42002025	Wakkaci ɗuum e woodi goɗɗo neɗɗo nder Urusaliima bi'eteeɗo Simiyon. O neɗɗo goongaajo, kuloowo Allah, emo reenti o yi'a garol kisnoowo yimɓe Isiraa'iila. Ruhu Ceniiɗo e wondi e ma'ako,
42002026	anndinii mo o maayataa sey to o yi'ii Almasiifu mo Jawmiraawo.
42002027	Ruhu yahari mo nder Wuro Allah Seniingo. Wakkaci ɗuum Maryaama e Yusufu ngaddi Yeesu nder wuro ngoon, gam waɗango mo ko Tawreeta vi'i.
42002028	Simiyon jaɓi ɓinngel ngeel e juuɗe muuɗum, maalti Allah vi'i~;
42002029	— Yaa Jawmiraawo, a hebbinii alkawal maaɗa. Jo'oni woor maccuɗo maaɗa dilla jam.
42002030	Gam gite am ngi'ii kisndam maaɗa,
42002031	kisndam ɗam ciryiɗaa koo moye yi'a.
42002032	Kanjam woni jayngol kolleyngol leƴƴi duuniyaaru laawol maaɗa, kadimaa ɗam teddiney yimɓe maaɗa Isiraa'iila'en.
42002033	Baaba ɓinngel ngeel e inna ma'agel kaayɗini nde ɓe nani ko ɗum vi'i dow ma'agel.
42002034	Simiyon barkiɗini ɓe, o vi'i Maryaama, inna Yeesu~: — Allah suɓii nge'el ɓinngel gam ngel laatoto daliila do''ere ɗuuɗɓe e ummaaki ɗuuɗɓe nder Isiraa'iila. Ngel laatoto alaama gada Allah ka yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe nganyata.
42002035	Ngel vannginey nyumooji yimɓe cuuɗiiɗi. Aan boo inna ma'agel, naawɗum no tufey ɓernde maaɗa kama laɓi.
42002036	E woodi boo annabiijo debbo bi'eteeɗo Hannatu ɓii Fanuwel, mo lenyol Aaser. Debbo oon naywii korey. O hoovaanooma nder surbaangaaku ma'ako, o jooɗodii e gorko ma'ako duuɓi joveeɗiɗi, ndeen gorko oon maayii.
42002037	Ɓaawo maayde gorko ma'ako, o jooɗii o hoovaaki faa o waɗi duuɓi tamaaniin e nayi (84). Emo ɗoon nder Wuro Allah Seniingo dum, emo teddina Allah, emo suumoo, emo waɗa do'aare jemma e nyalawma.
42002038	E wakkaci ɗuum kanko boo o wari, emo yetta Allah emo yeccoo ɓeen reentuɓe yi'igo dimɗineeki Urusaliima habaru ɓinngel ngeel.
42002039	Nde Yusufu e Maryaama njottini ko Tawreeta vi'i fuu, ɓe kooti si'ire maɓɓe Najaratu nder lesdi Gaaliili.
42002040	Ɓinngel ngeel e mawna, e ɓesda semmbee e fahamu. Barkaa Allah boo e dow ma'agel.
42002041	Hitaande fuu danyooɓe Yeesu e njaha Urusaliima gam waɗgo juulɗe Kuultol.
42002042	Nde Yeesu waɗi duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi, ɓe njahadi e ma'ako juulɗe ɗeen kama ko voovaa.
42002043	Nde juulɗe ɗeen timmi, ɓe nanngi laawol hootgo, ammaa Yeesu darii Urusaliima, naa e anndaangal danyooɓe muuɗum.
42002044	Kamɓe eɓe tammii emo nder yahadiɗɗaaɓe maɓɓe. Nde ɓe mbaɗi jahaangal nyalawmaare fuu, ɓe puɗɗi yillaago mo nder banndiraaɓe maɓɓe e higooɓe maɓɓe.
42002045	Nde ɓe ngi'aay mo, ɓe co''ii Urusaliima gam yillaago mo.
42002046	Ɓaawo balɗe tati ɓe tawi mo nder Wuro Allah Seniingo. Emo jooɗii hakkunde moodiɓɓe, emo yewanii ɓe, kadimaa emo ƴama ɓe.
42002047	Nanɓe mo fuu kaayɗinii gam fahamu ma'ako e toonti ma'ako.
42002048	Nde danyooɓe ma'ako ngi'i mo, ɓe kaayɗini. Inna ma'ako vi'i mo~: — Ɓinngel am, ko jeyi mbaɗanɗaa min nihini~? Miin e baaba maaɗa min ngaannake gam yillaago maa.
42002049	O vi'i ɓe~: — Gam ɗume ngillotooɗon yam~? Asee on anndaa e haani mi jooɗoo nder wuro Baaba am naa~?
42002050	Ammaa ɓe pahamaay ko o yiɗi vi'igo ɓe.
42002051	Ndeen Yeesu hootdi e maɓɓe Najaratu, o waɗi ko ɓe mbi'i mo fuu. Inna ma'ako resi ku'uje ɗeen fuu nder ɓernde muuɗum.
42002052	Yeesu e mawna, fahamu ma'ako e ɓesdoo dum, o heɓi togu yeeso Allah e yimɓe fuu.
42003001	-
42003002	Voliinde Allah warani Yahayya, ɓii Jakariya nder ladde hitaande laamu Tiberiyas, laamiiɗo Rooma sappo e njovaɓu. Hitaande ndeen Pontus Bilaatus woni gomnaajo lesdi Yahuudiya, Hiruudus boo kam laamanii lesdi Gaaliili, mawniiko Filibus e laamanii lesdi Ituriya e Tarakunitus, Lisaaniya e laamanii lesdi Abiliya, Anas e Kayafas ngoni mawɓe aardiiɓe diina.
42003003	Yahayya yiilii nder jaaje gonɗe ha'ade maayo Urdun fuu, emo wa'ajina, emo vi'a~: — Tuubee mbaɗaneeɗon baptisma, keɓon ya'afuye hakkeeji mooɗon.
42003004	Ɗum laatii kama no annabi Ecaaya vinndunoo nder deftere muuɗum, vi'i~: — Voliinde nanaama nder ladde e vi'a~: Mo''inee ɗatal gam Jawmiraawo, poortee laawol gam garol ma'ako.
42003005	Jantanɗe fuu no uvetee, baamle e ƴoole fuu no nametee. Laabi leliiɗi fuu no poortetee, laabi bonɗi fuu no mbo''intee.
42003006	Yimɓe fuu no ngi'ey kisndam Allah.
42003007	Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngari to Yahayya gam o waɗana ɓe baptisma. O vi'i ɓe~: — Onon ɓiɓɓe bo'ole~! Moye vi'i on paayon huunƴere Allah wareynde~?
42003008	Kuwee kuuɗe kolleyɗe on tuubii. To' on mbi' nder ɓerɗe mooɗon~: «~Minon, min taaniraaɓe Ibraahim~!~» Gam emi vi'a on~: Allah e woodi baawɗe waɗgo ɗe'e kaaƴe ɗe laatoo taaniraaɓe Ibraahim.
42003009	Ila jo'oni jammbere aagaama gam fe''ugo leɗɗe gada e ɗaɗi ma'aje. Lekki ki rimataa ɓikkon mbooɗkon fuu, no fe''ete, feree nder yiite.
42003010	Yimɓe ƴami mo mbi'i~: — Noye haani min mbaɗa~?
42003011	O toontii ɓe, o vi'i~: — Mo toggooje ɗiɗi fuu sennda e mo walaa. Goonɗo nyaamdu boo hokkora mo walaa.
42003012	Jaɓooɓe janngal maa ngari gam ɓe mbaɗanee baptisma, ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Moodibbo, noye haani min mbaɗa~?
42003013	O vi'i ɓe~: — To' on ɓesdu dow ko mbi'aaɗon njaɓon.
42003014	Goɗɗi soojeeji ƴami mo mbi'i~: — Minon fa, noye haani min mbaɗa~? O vi'i ɓe~: — To' on te'etu jawdi yimɓe e semmbee. To' on njowan yimɓe ko mbaɗaay, gam njaɓton ɓe ceede. Ammaa keytoree e ko mbiyeteeɗon.
42003015	Yimɓe fuu e kaaɓi ngi'a Almasiifu. Koo moye maɓɓe e nyuma nder ɓernde muuɗum, koo maa Yahayya woni Almasiifu.
42003016	Sey Yahayya vi'i ɓe~: — Miin, emi wa'arana on baptisma e ndiyam, ammaa ɓurɗo yam baawɗe e wara. Mi fotaay fiɓtugo koo ɓoggi paɗe ma'ako. Kanko o wa'araney on baptisma e Ruhu Ceniiɗo e yiite.
42003017	Emo jogii jaartirɗum e junngo ma'ako, gam o sennda gawri e nyaande. O hawrita gawri, o waɗa ndi nder beembal ma'ako, ammaa o wuldey nyaande ndeen e yiite nge nyifataa.
42003018	Noon Yahayya vagginiri yimɓe e bolle ɗuuɗɗe, o wa'ajini ɓe Habaru Belɗum.
42003019	Ammaa Hiruudus gomnaajo, o felii ɗum gam te'itii Hiruudiya koree mawnum, e gam kuuɗe kalluɗe fuu ɗe o waɗi.
42003020	Sey Hiruudus ɓesdi waɗgo ko ɓuri noon hallugo, o waɗi Yahayya omndaa nder kaso.
42003021	Wakkaci yimɓe fuu mbaɗantee baptisma, Yeesu boo waɗanaama baptisma. Emo nder waɗgo do'aare, sey asama omtii.
42003022	Ruhu Ceniiɗo jippii dow ma'ako nder nanndi foondu. Voliinde ivoyi gada dow vi'i~: — Aan woni Ɓiɗɗo am giɗaaɗo. Emi nana belɗum maaɗa.
42003023	Yeesu waɗii faro duuɓi talaatiin (30), ko o fuɗɗi kuugal ma'ako. Yimɓe e nyuma Yeesu no ɓii Yusufu, Yusufu boo no ɓii Eeli,
42003024	Eeli ɓii Matat, Matat ɓii Leewi, Leewi ɓii Malki, Malki ɓii Yanna, Yanna ɓii Yusufu,
42003025	Yusufu ɓii Matatiya, Matatiya ɓii Amos, Amos ɓii Nahum, Nahum ɓii Esili, Esili ɓii Naggay,
42003026	Naggay ɓii Maata, Maata ɓii Matatiya, Matatiya ɓii Simeya, Simeya ɓii Yoosek, Yoosek ɓii Joda,
42003027	Joda ɓii Yowanan, Yowanan ɓii Resa, Resa ɓii Jarubabel, Jarubabel ɓii Ceyaltiyel, Ceyaltiyel ɓii Neri,
42003028	Neri ɓii Malki, Malki ɓii Addi, Addi ɓii Kosama, Kosama ɓii Elmadam, Elmadam ɓii Er,
42003029	Er ɓii Jocuwa, Jocuwa ɓii Eliyejer, Eliyejer ɓii Yorim, Yorim ɓii Matat, Matat ɓii Leewi,
42003030	Leewi ɓii Simiyon, Simiyon ɓii Yahuuda, Yahuuda ɓii Yusufu, Yusufu ɓii Yonam, Yonam ɓii Eliyaakim,
42003031	Eliyaakim ɓii Meleya, Meleya ɓii Menna, Menna ɓii Matata, Matata ɓii Naatan, Naatan ɓii Dawda,
42003032	Dawda ɓii Jesse, Jesse ɓii Obida, Obida ɓii Bo'es, Bo'es ɓii Salmon, Salmon ɓii Naasuna,
42003033	Naasuna ɓii Aminadabu, Aminadabu ɓii Adamin, Adamin ɓii Aram, Aram ɓii Hesruuna, Hesruuna ɓii Fares, Fares ɓii Yahuuda,
42003034	Yahuuda ɓii Yaakuubu, Yaakuubu ɓii Iciyaaku, Iciyaaku ɓii Ibraahim, Ibraahim ɓii Teera, Teera ɓii Nahor,
42003035	Nahor ɓii Seruku, Seruku ɓii Ragaw, Ragaw ɓii Falek, Falek ɓii Eber, Eber ɓii Sela,
42003036	Sela ɓii Kenan, Kenan ɓii Arfasada, Arfasada ɓii Cem, Cem ɓii Nuhu, Nuhu ɓii Lamek,
42003037	Lamek ɓii Metusela, Metusela ɓii Enok, Enok ɓii Yared, Yared ɓii Maleleyel, Maleleyel ɓii Kenan,
42003038	Kenan ɓii Enos, Enos ɓii Ciitu, Ciitu ɓii Aadamu, Aadamu mo Allah.
42004001	Yeesu ivoyi maayo Urdun e heevi Ruhu Ceniiɗo. Ruhu oon yahari mo nder ladde.
42004002	Toon Ceyɗaan jarrabii mo balɗe arba'iin (40). Nder balɗe ɗeen fuu o nyaamaay koo ɗume. Ɓaawo ma'ajum o dolii korey.
42004003	Ceyɗaan vi'i mo~: — To a Ɓiɗɗo Allah kam, vi' nde'e haayre laatoo nyaamdu.
42004004	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Ɗum vinndaama~: Naa e nyaamdu tan neɗɗo foofrata.
42004005	Sey Ceyɗaan yahari mo woɗnde yaayre townde, holli mo laamuuji duuniyaaru fuu nder maƴƴannde yitere,
42004006	vi'i mo~: — Mi hokkete baawɗe e risku ɗi'i laamuuji fuu, gam mi hokkaama ɗum. Miin boo, emi waawi hokkugo ɗum mo ngiɗanmi fuu.
42004007	Gam ma'ajum, kul a diccake a sujjidanii yam, ɗum fuu ɗum laatoto ɗum maaɗa.
42004008	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Ɗum vinndaama~: Sujjidan Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa. Kanko tan kaanɗaa jagganaago.
42004009	Ceyɗaan ɓesdi yahari mo Urusaliima, darni mo toon dow hoore Wuro Allah Seniingo, vi'i mo~: — To a Ɓiɗɗo Allah kam, diw gada ɗo'o
42004010	gam ɗum vinndaama~: Allah no vi'ey malaa'ika'en muuɗum ndeen maa.
42004011	Kadimaa Ɓe taɓɓo maa nder juuɗe maɓɓe gam to' kosngal maaɗa fii haayre.
42004012	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Ɗum vinndaama~: Ta'a godo Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa.
42004013	Nde Ceyɗaan heyni jarrabaago Yeesu, sey o dilli o woori mo faa goɗɗum wakkaci.
42004014	Yeesu vitti lesdi Gaaliili e heevi baawɗe Ruhu Ceniiɗo. Habaru ma'ako sankitii nder lesdi ndiin fuu.
42004015	Emo ekkitina nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi Yahuudu'en. Yimɓe fuu e mana mo.
42004016	Yeesu yahi Najaratu, si'ire to o mawni. Nyannde-fooftiinde o natti suudu-wa'ajordu Yahuudu'en, noon no o voovi waɗgo. Sey o ummii gam o jannga Deftere Seniinde.
42004017	O hokkaa deftere annabi Ecaaya, o omti nde, o janngi aayaaje to ɗum vi'i~:
42004018	«~Ruhu Jawmiraawo e dow am, gam o suɓii yam mi wa'ajina sooyɓe Habaru Belɗum. O lilii yam mi ma'atina honaaɓe habaru joofeeki mu''en, mi vumtina vumɓe, mi waɗa ɗum rimɗina torreteeɓe,
42004019	mi ma'atina duuniyaaru vi'igo hitan barkaa Jawmiraawo warii.~»
42004020	Ndeen o taggi deftere ndeen, o hokkiti nde kuwoowo ɗoon, o jooɗii. Wonɓe nder suudu-wa'ajordu nduun fuu e cutii mo.
42004021	Sey Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Ɗe'e aayaaje ɗe nanɗon, hannde ɗe keevii.
42004022	Ɓe fuu ɓe nani belɗum ma'ako. Ɓe kaayɗini e bolle booɗɗe burtiiɗe honnduko ma'ako. Ɓe mbi'i~: — Naa o ɓii Yusufu naa~?
42004023	O vi'i ɓe~: — Ɗum baɗoojum mbalndanon yam ngo'ol balndol bi'ingol~: Nyawtoowo, nyawtu hoore maaɗa~! On mbi'a kadimaa~: Ko min nani a waɗii nder Kafarnahum, waɗ ɗum ɗo'o nder si'ire maaɗa boo.
42004024	Kadimaa o vi'i ɓe~: — Emi vi'a on goonga~: daɗey annabiijo jaɓɓoraaka no haani nder si'ire muuɗum.
42004025	Emi vi'a on goonga~: e jaamaan annabi Iliya e woodi rewɓe ɗuuɗɓe nder lesdi Isiraa'iila ɓe worɓe mu''en maayi. E jaamaan ɗuum, iyoonde toɓaay duuɓi tati e lebbi joveego'o, veelo manngo waɗi nder lesdi ndiin fuu.
42004026	Ammaa Allah lilaay annabi Iliya to koo go'oto maɓɓe, sey to debbo mo si'ire Jarifat nder lesdi Sidon, mo gorko muuɗum maayi.
42004027	Kadimaa e jaamaan annabi Eliica e woodi ɓe nyawu kuturta ɗuuɗɓe nder Isiraa'iila, ammaa walaa jamɗitinaaɗo nder maɓɓe, sey Na'aaman neɗɗo lesdi Suuriya.
42004028	Nde yimɓe wonɓe nder suudu-wa'ajordu Yahuudu'en nduun nani bolle ɗeen, ɓe fuu ɓe kuunƴi korey.
42004029	Ɓe ummii, ɓe mburtini mo yaasi si'ire, ɓe njahari mo gaɓɓude baamngel to si'ire maɓɓe nyiɓaa, gam ɓe ndiirta mo,
42004030	ammaa sey o ivi hakkunde maɓɓe, o dilli.
42004031	Yeesu yahi si'ire Kafarnahum nder lesdi Gaaliili, emo ekkitina yimɓe nyannde-fooftiinde.
42004032	Ekkitinol ma'ako haaynii ɓe, gam emo volira e baawɗe.
42004033	E woodi goɗɗo mo ginnol nder suudu-wa'ajordu nduun, o wulli e semmbee, o vi'i~:
42004034	— Wayyoo~! Ɗume hawtu maa e amin, aan Yeesu mo Najaratu~? A warii gam halkugo min naa~? Emi anndi a moye~: a Ceniiɗo ivoyɗo to Allah~!
42004035	Yeesu nyaaɗani ngol vi'i~: — De''u~! Vurta nder ma'ako~! Sey ginnol ngool do''i neɗɗo oon yeeso yimɓe, ngol vurtii ngol nawnaay mo.
42004036	Ɓe fuu ɓe kaayɗini, ɓe mbaɗi ga volvugo hakkunde maɓɓe, eɓe mbi'a~: — Ɗum iri ɗeye, ɗe'e bolle~? Gam nder baawɗe e semmbee emo vi'a ginnaaji mburtee, ɗi mburtoo.
42004037	Habaru ko Yeesu waɗi sankitii nder lesdi ndiin fuu.
42004038	Ɓaawo Yeesu woorii suudu-wa'ajordu, o yahi wuro Simon. Esoo Simon debbo e wondi e yontere naawnde, ɓe torii Yeesu hoyna mo.
42004039	Yeesu ɓattii jontaaɗo oon, tuurnii dow ma'ako, o vi'i yontere ndeen yoofa mo, sey nde yoofi mo. Ɗoon e ɗoon debbo oon ummii veerni ɓe.
42004040	Nde futuro waɗi, yimɓe fuu woonɓe nyawɓe ɓe nyawuuji feere-feere ngaddi ɓe to Yeesu, o yowi juuɗe ma'ako dow go'oto-go'oto maɓɓe, o yamɗitini ɓe.
42004041	Ginnaaji maa mburtii nder yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, eɗi ngulla, eɗi mbi'a~: — Aan a Ɓiɗɗo Allah~! Ammaa o nyaaɗani ɗi, o haɗi ɗi volvugo, gam eɗi anndi kanko woni Almasiifu.
42004042	Nde veeti, Yeesu vurtii si'ire ndeen yahi woɗnde yaayre to walaa koo moye. Jama'aare waɗi ga yillaago mo. Nde ɓe keɓti mo, ɓe ngiɗaa o dilla o woora ɓe.
42004043	Ammaa o vi'i ɓe~: — Doole mi wa'ajina Habaru Belɗum ɗum laamu Allah nder ci'e goɗɗe boo, gam sabu ma'ajum liloyaami.
42004044	Ndeen o waɗi ga wa'ajingo nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi lesdi Yahuudiya.
42005001	Woɗnde nyanndeere Yeesu e darii regorde maayo Genesaret, yimɓe e nyo'indira gam nana voliinde Allah.
42005002	O yi'i akale ndiyam ɗiɗi e ndesii regorde maayo. Nanngooɓe liƴƴi vurtiiɓe nder ma'aje e lulla nanngirɗum liƴƴi mu''en.
42005003	Yeesu natti nder go'oti ma'aje, ɗum akali Simon, o torii mo o diirna ki seɗɗa nder ndiyam. O jooɗii nder ma'aki, o fuɗɗi ekkitingo yimɓe.
42005004	Nde o heyni ekkitingo, o vi'i Simon~: — Yaharu akali maaɗa toon to luggi, aan e huudiɗɗaaɓe maaɗa, peron nanngirɗum liƴƴi nder maayo gam nanngugo liƴƴi.
42005005	Simon vi'i~: — Moodibbo, min kuwii jemmaare fuu, min nanngaay koo ngo'otu. Ammaa nde aan vi'i noon, min perey.
42005006	Nde ɓe peri nanngirɗum maɓɓe, ɓe nanngoyi liƴƴi ɗuuɗɗi, faa ɗum fuɗɗi taygo.
42005007	Sey ɓe noddi higooɓe maɓɓe wonɓe nder akali feere, gam ɓe ngara ɓe mballa ɓe. Ɓeen ngari, ɓe kebbini akale ɗeen ɗiɗi fuu e liƴƴi, faa ɗe nesi nucaago nder ndiyam.
42005008	Nde Simon Biiturus yi'i ɗum, o diccii yeeso Yeesu, o vi'i~: — Jawmiraawo, woɗɗam, gam mi neɗɗo mo hakke~!
42005009	O vi'ii noon gam kanko e wondiɗɗaaɓe ma'ako ɓe kaayɗinii korey e ɗuuɗal liƴƴi ɗi ɓe nanngi.
42005010	Yaakuubu e Yahayya, ɓiɓɓe Jabadi, higooɓe kuugal Simon, kamɓe maa ɗum haaynii ɓe. Ammaa Yeesu vi'i Simon~: — Ta'a hul~! Gada jo'oni a laatoto gaddoowo yimɓe to am, naa liƴƴi.
42005011	Nde ɓe njahari akale maɓɓe e regorde maayo, ɓe ngoori koo ɗume ɓe tokki Yeesu.
42005012	Nyannde feere nde Yeesu e ɗoon nder woɗnde si'ire, sey goɗɗo mo kuturta nyaami ɓanndu muuɗum wari. Nde o yi'i Yeesu, o hippii yeeso muuɗum, o torii ɗum o vi'i~: — Moodibbo, to a jaɓii, a waawi yamɗitingo yam.
42005013	Yeesu foorti junngo muuɗum, meemi mo, vi'i~: — Mi jaɓii, yamɗit~! Ɗoon e ɗoon nyawu nguun yoofi mo.
42005014	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Ta'a yecco ɗum koo moye. Ammaa yah hollu hoore maaɗa to aardiiɗo diina, waɗan laɓɓineeki maaɗa sadaka ka Muusa vi'i, gam anndingo yimɓe a yamɗitii.
42005015	Koo nde Yeesu haɗi mo yeccaago ɗum, e noon fuu habaru ɗuum yahii yeeso e sankitaago. Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngari gam nango ekkitinol ma'ako e yamɗitineego gada nyawuuji mu''en.
42005016	Ammaa Yeesu e voovi yahago yaayre yeewnde gam waɗa do'aare.
42005017	Nyannde feere Yeesu e ekkitina. Fariisa'en e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta ivoyɓe ci'e lesdi Gaaliili e Yahuudiya e si'ire Urusaliima e njooɗii vuttudu ma'ako. Baawɗe Jawmiraawo e kuwa nder Yeesu gam yamɗitingo nyawɓe.
42005018	Sey woɓɓe ngaddi goɗɗo buusaaɗo, eɓe ƴefti mo dow be'itum ma'ako. Ɓe ndaari no ɓe nattinirta mo nder suudu to Yeesu woni, gam ɓe ndesa mo yeeso ma'ako.
42005019	Ammaa ɓe keɓaay to ɓe nattiniri mo, gam jama'aare ɗuuɗii. Sey ɓe ƴeenti dow suudu nduun, ɓe njuli ndu, ɓe njippidini mo e be'itum ma'ako yeeso Yeesu hakkunde jama'aare.
42005020	Nde Yeesu yi'i goonɗinki maɓɓe, o vi'i buusaaɗo oon~: — Higoo, hakkeeji maaɗa nja'afaama.
42005021	Fariisa'en e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta puɗɗi nyumgo e mbi'a~: — O'o ɗum moye potneyɗo hoore muuɗum e Allah~? Moye waawi ya'afaago hakke to naa Allah~?
42005022	Yeesu e anndi nyumooji maɓɓe, o vi'i ɓe~: — Gam ɗume nyumoton iri ɗi'i nyumooji nder ɓerɗe mooɗon~?
42005023	Ɗume ɓuri hoygo~? Vi'igo~: «~Hakkeeji maaɗa nja'afaama~», na vi'igo~: «~Umma dara~»~?
42005024	Ammaa gam anndon Ɓii-Neɗɗo e woodi baawɗe ya'afaago hakkeeji nder ndu'u duuniyaaru. Sey o vi'i buusaaɗo oon~: — Emi vi'i maa~: umma hooy be'itum maaɗa hoot~!
42005025	Ɗoon e ɗoon neɗɗo oon ummii yeeso yimɓe fuu, hooƴi be'itum muuɗum hooti e maalta Allah.
42005026	Yimɓe fuu kaayɗini, ɓe mawnini Allah, ɓe kultori korey, ɓe mbi'i~: — Hannde en ngi'ii ko haaynii~!
42005027	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, Yeesu vurtii yi'i jaɓoowo janngal bi'eteeɗo Leewi e jooɗii yaayre to jaɓata janngal. Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Tokkam.
42005028	O ummii o woori koo ɗume o tokki Yeesu.
42005029	Leewi noddi Yeesu wuro muuɗum defani mo nyaamduuji ɗuuɗɗi. Jaɓooɓe janngal ɗuuɗɓe e woɓɓe yimɓe nyaamdi e maɓɓe.
42005030	Ammaa Fariisa'en e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta mbaɗi ga feltaago, eɓe mbi'a almaajiri'en Yeesu~: — Ko jeyi nyaamdoton e jaɓooɓe janngal e waɗooɓe hakke~?
42005031	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Yamɓe ngalaa bukaata nyawtoowo, sey nyawɓe.
42005032	Mi waraay gam noddugo tammiiɓe no goonga'en, ammaa mi warii gam noddugo waɗooɓe hakke ɓe tuuba.
42005033	Woɓɓe mbi'i Yeesu~: — Almaajiri'en Yahayya baɗoowo baptisma e cuumoo e mbaɗa do'aare dum, almaajiri'en Fariisa'en boo e mbaɗa noon. Ammaa aan ɓe maaɗa e nyaama e njara dum.
42005034	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Koo on mbaawi doolgo ma'atinaaɓe humto koobgal cuumoo wakkaci kooviiɗo wondi e maɓɓe naa~? On mbaawataa~!
42005035	Ammaa wakkaci e wara nde ɗum hooƴata kooviiɗo oon to maɓɓe, wakkaci ɗuum ɓe cuumoto.
42005036	Yeesu valndani ɓe ngo'ol balndol. O vi'i~: — Walaa nokkeyɗo lefel e koltal kesal fitra ngel koltal kihingal. To o waɗii noon, o bonnii koltal kesal, lefel kesel boo fotataa e koltal kihingal.
42005037	Noon boo, walaa looveyɗo innaboojam kesam nder saaɗkiwu kihingu. To o waɗii noon, innaboojam ɗaam no ƴuufey seeka saaɗkiwu nguun, ɗam rufa.
42005038	Sey innaboojam kesam loovee nder saaɗkiwu kesu.
42005039	Jarɗo innaboojam kihiɗam yiɗataa kesam, gam o vi'ey~: kihiɗam e ɓuri kesam velgo.
42006001	Nyannde-fooftiinde feere, Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum ndaacii nder gese alkamaari. Sey almaajiri'en mbaɗi ga ɓorgo butaali e murjoo e ƴakka.
42006002	Ammaa woɓɓe Fariisa'en mbi'i ɓe~: — Ko jeyi mbaɗoton ko Tawreeta haɗi nyannde-fooftiinde~?
