43011008	Almaajiri'en toontii mo mbi'i~: — Moodibbo, neeɓaay ko Yahuudu'en ndaari ferdugo maa kaaƴe, ndeen kadimaa co''oɗaa toon~?
43011009	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Wanaa awaaji sappo e ɗiɗi ngoni nder nyalawma naa~? Jahoowo nyalawma fergataako, gam emo yi'a jayngol.
43011010	Ammaa jahoowo jemma no fergoto, gam jayngol walaa e ma'ako.
43011011	Ɓaawo o vi'ii bolle ɗeen, o ɓesdi vi'igo ɓe~: — Higoo meeɗen Li'aajaru ɗaanake, ammaa mi yahey mi findinoya mo.
43011012	Almaajiri'en mbi'i~: — Moodibbo, kul o ɗaani, ndeen o hoyey.
43011013	Kanko emo volva dow maayde Li'aajaru, ammaa kamɓe ɓe tammii bolle ɗoyngol o volvata.
43011014	Ndeen Yeesu yeccii ɓe laaɓɗum~: — Li'aajaru maayi~!
43011015	Gam daliila mooɗon mi nanii belɗum mi tawaaka toon, gam ngoonɗinon. Ammaa jo'oni njahemma to ma'ako.
43011016	Ndeen Tooma bi'eteeɗo Ciwtaaɗo vi'i almaajiri'en horiiɓe~: — Njahemma gam enen maa maayden e ma'ako.
43011017	Nde Yeesu yottii, o tawi Li'aajaru waɗii balɗe nayi nder yenaande.
43011018	Hakkunde Baytaaniya e Urusaliima ɗum ɓuraay kama kiloomeetir tati.
43011019	Gam ma'ajum Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe gada Urusaliima ngari to Maryaama e Marta, gam sa'anugo ɓe dow maayde Li'aajaru minyiraawo maɓɓe.
43011020	Nde Marta nani Yeesu e wara, o yahi taɓɓoyaago mo, ammaa Maryaama jooɗii wuro.
43011021	Marta vi'i Yeesu~: — Moodibbo, to a ɗo'ono, daa minyam gorko maayataano.
43011022	Ammaa koo jo'oni emi anndi ko toriɗaa Allah fuu no waɗante ɗum.
43011023	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Minya no fintey.
43011024	Marta vi'i~: — Emi anndi o fintey nyannde-darngal.
43011025	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Miin woni pintinoowo, miin woni yonki. Goonɗinɗo yam, koo to maayii no foofey.
43011026	Kadimaa goonɗo yonki fuu goonɗini yam, maayataa sam. A goonɗinii ɗum naa~?
43011027	Marta toontii mo vi'i~: — Ee Jawmam~! Mi goonɗinii aan woni Almasiifu Ɓiɗɗo Allah garoowo nder duuniyaaru.
43011028	Ɓaawo ma'ajum o yahi noddoygo minyiiko Maryaama. O vi'i ɗum e suuɗeefi~: — Moodibbo wari emo noddu maa.
43011029	Nde Maryaama nani ka, o ummii jaawɗum o no'otoyii.
43011030	Yeesu nattaay si'ire ndeen tawo. Emo toon to Marta taɓɓoynoo mo.
43011031	Yahuudu'en wonduɓe e Maryaama nder wuro gam de''itingo mo, ɓe ngi'i o vurtake jaawɗum. Ɓe tokki mo, ɓe tammii o voyoyey toon to yenaande.
43011032	Nde Maryaama yottii to Yeesu woni, yi'i mo, sey o diccii yeeso ma'ako o vi'i mo~: — Moodibbo, to a ɗo'ono daa minyam gorko maayataano.
43011033	Nde Yeesu yi'i Maryaama e Yahuudu'en wonduɓe e ma'ako e mboya, sey ɗum ummini ɓernde ma'ako, nde metti.
43011034	O vi'i~: — Toye ndesɗon mo~? Ɓe toontii mo ɓe mbi'i~: — Moodibbo, war ngi'a~!
43011035	Sey gonɗi Yeesu ndufi.
43011036	Yahuudu'en mbi'i~: — Ndaaree no o yiɗiri mo~!
43011037	Woɓɓe nder maɓɓe mbi'i~: — Bumtinɗo bumɗo waawataa haɗgo o'o neɗɗo maaygo naa~?
43011038	Ɓernde Yeesu ɓesdi mettugo, o yahi yenaande. Yenaande ndeen ɗum luuro omndiraango haayre mawnde.
43011039	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Ittee haayre ndeen~! Marta mawnu maayɗo oon, vi'i mo~: — Jawmam, jo'oni o hacci, gam o waɗii balɗe nayi nder yenaande.
43011040	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Mi vi'aay ma to a goonɗinii a yi'ey teddungal Allah naa~?
43011041	Ɓe itti haayre ndeen. Yeesu tiggii dow vi'i~: — Baabiraawo, emi ɗoon yettu maa gam a yewanake yam.
43011042	Miin boo, emi anndi eɗa yewanii yam dum. Ammaa mi vi'ii noon gam yimɓe dariiɓe ɗo'o ngoonɗina aan liloyi yam.
43011043	Ɓaawo bolle ɗeen o towni voliinde, o vi'i~: — Li'aajaru, vurta~!
43011044	Sey maayɗo oon vurtii. Juuɗe ma'ako e kosɗe ma'ako e taarorii leppi, yeeso ma'ako e suddi. Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Taartee mo, ngooree mo o yaha~!
43011045	Ɗuuɗɓe nder Yahuudu'en warnooɓe to Maryaama, ngi'i ko Yeesu waɗi, ɓe ngoonɗini mo.
43011046	Ammaa woɓɓe njahi to Fariisa'en ngeccii ɓe ko Yeesu waɗi.
43011047	Ndeen Fariisa'en e mawɓe aardiiɓe diina kawriti sernooɓe diina. Ɓe mbi'i~: — Neɗɗo oon e waɗa alaamaaji kaayniiɗi ɗuuɗɗi. Noye mbaɗanten mo~?
43011048	To en ɗaldii mo noon, yimɓe fuu no ngoonɗiney mo. Ndeen Roomankoo'en no ngarey kalka yaayre meeɗen seniinde, faa e lenyol meeɗen fuu.
43011049	Go'oto nder maɓɓe bi'eteeɗo Kayafas, laatiiɗo aardiiɗo diina mawɗo nder hitaande ndeen, vi'i ɓe~: — Onon, on anndaa koo ɗume.
43011050	On anndaa ɗum ɓurii vooɗgo neɗɗo go'oto maayana yimɓe fuu, dow e lenyol meeɗen fuu halka naa~?
43011051	(Wanaa e anndal hoore ma'ako o vi'ata bolle ɗeen, ammaa gam o mawɗo aardiiɓe diina hitaande ndeen, o waɗii annabaaku Yeesu no maayey gam lenyol maɓɓe.
43011052	Wanaa gam lenyol Yahuudu'en tan o maayata, ammaa gam o hawrita ɓiɓɓe Allah sankitiiɓe koo toye, ɓe laatoo go'o.)
43011053	Ila nyannaan ɓe mbaɗi caawara gam ɓe mbara mo.
43011054	Gam ma'ajum Yeesu fuɗɗitaay yiilaago nder Yahuudu'en. O ivoyi toon to o wonnoo, o yahi si'ire vi'eteende Efraayim heeddunde e ladde. Toon o jooɗodii e almaajiri'en ma'ako.
43011055	Juulɗe Yahuudu'en bi'eteeɗe juulɗe Kuultol ɓadake. Ɗuuɗɓe nder yimɓe lesdi ndiin njahi Urusaliima gam laɓɓingo ko'e mu''en ila juulɗe ngaraay.
43011056	Eɓe ngilloo Yeesu. Woɓɓe e ndarii nder Wuro Allah Seniingo, eɓe ƴamƴamtira, eɓe mbi'a~: — Noye tammiiɗon~? O wara juulɗe ɗeen, na o warataa~?
43011057	Gam mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e Fariisa'en mbaɗiino dooka~: neɗɗo fuu annduɗo to Yeesu woni yeccoo ɓe, gam ɓe nannga mo.
43012001	Balɗe joveego'o ila juulɗe Kuultol ngaraay, Yeesu yahi Baytaaniya toon to Li'aajaru woni, mo o fintini nder maayde.
43012002	Toon ɓe ndefani mo nyaamdu alaasara. Marta kam woni ge'edoowo nyaamdu, Li'aajaru boo e nder nyaamdooɓe e Yeesu.
43012003	Ndeen Maryaama hooƴi feccere liitarru nebbam luɓoojam belɗum mbi'eteeɗam nardi, ɗam ceede ɗuuɗɗe. O rufi ɗam dow kosɗe Yeesu, o molmiri ɗe gaasa ma'ako. Wuro ngoon fuu heevi luuɓngol nebbam ɗaam.
43012004	Ammaa go'oto nder almaajiri'en Yeesu bi'eteeɗo Yahuuda Iskariyooti nyaameyɗo amaana ma'ako vi'i~:
43012005	— Ko jeyi nebbam ɗaam soorraaka, ceede ma'ajam kokkee sooyɓe~? Gam ceede ma'ajam fotii e ceede ajurfaari keme tati (300).
43012006	O vi'irii noon gam o gujjo, naa gam o nanii yurmeende sooyɓe. Kanko woni jogotooɗo ceede maɓɓe, kadimaa emo voovi nokkugo ɗe.
43012007	Yeesu vi'i~: — Ngooree debbo oon. O resii ɗam gam nyannde uveeki am.
43012008	Sooyɓe e ngondi e mooɗon dum, ammaa miin naa dum ngondumi e mooɗon.
43012009	Hawriinde Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe nani Yeesu e toon Baytaaniya, sey ɓe njahi toon. Naa Yeesu tan waddi ɓe, ammaa gam ɓe ngi'a Li'aajaru pintinaaɗo oon.
43012010	Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina mbaɗii caawara wargo Li'aajaru boo,
43012011	gam Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe ɗalii tokkugo ɓe, ɓe ngoonɗinii Yeesu gam daliila Li'aajaru.
43012012	Jahango ma'ajum, jama'aare warnde gam juulɗe ɗeen nani Yeesu e wara Urusaliima.
43012013	Ɓe kooƴi licce dabiinooje, ɓe taɓɓoyii mo. Eɓe ngulla, eɓe mbi'a~: — Hoosaana~! Maaltoore laatanoo gareyɗo nder innde Jawmiraawo. Maaltoore laatanoo laamiiɗo Isiraa'iila~!
43012014	Yeesu heɓi molel njaakiwa waɗɗii, noon no Deftere vi'i. Nde vi'i~:
43012015	«~Yimɓe si'ire Urusaliima, to' on kul~! Ndaaree, raa laamiiɗo mooɗon ɗoon wara, emo waɗɗii molel njaakiwa.~»
43012016	Ila arande almaajiri'en ma'ako keɓtaay ɗum. Ammaa ɓaawo teddineeki ma'ako (waato ummitineeki Yeesu), ɓe kiimtake ko Deftere vi'i dow ma'ako, noon boo ɓe taɓɓorii mo.
43012017	Jama'aare wondunoonde e ma'ako nyannde o fintini Li'aajaru, o vurtini ɗum nder yenaande, kamɓe boo ɓe ngeccii ko ɓe ngi'i.
43012018	Kanjum waɗi yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe njahi taɓɓoyaago Yeesu, gam ɓe nanii o waɗii ɗu'um alaama kaayniiɗum.
43012019	Ndeen Fariisa'en mbolidi hakkunde mu''en, ɓe mbi'i~: — On ngi'i, ko mbaɗeten fuu nafaay, duuniyaaru fuu e tokki mo.
43012020	Nder juulɗe ɗeen e woodi woɓɓe Helenankoo'en warɓe Urusaliima gam sujjidango Allah.
43012021	Ɓe ngari to Filibus, neɗɗo si'ire Baytisayda nder lesdi Gaaliili, ɓe mbi'i mo~: — Moodibbo, emin ngiɗi yi'igo Yeesu.
43012022	Filibus yahi vi'oyi ka Anndaraawus. Kamɓe ngaddi haala kaan to Yeesu.
43012023	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Wakkaci teddineeki Ɓii-Neɗɗo wari.
43012024	Emi vi'a on goonga~: to gabbel gawri yanaay, natti nder lesdi waati, ngel daroto kangel tan. Ammaa to ngel waatii, ngel rimey gabbe ɗuuɗɗe.
43012025	Giɗɗo yonki muuɗum no dulley ki. Ammaa ganyɗo yonki muuɗum nder ndu'u duuniyaaru, no reeney ki, o heɓa yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
43012026	To e woodi giɗɗo jagganaago yam, sey o tokka yam. To ngonmi fuu, toon jaggantooɗo yam wonata. Baabiraawo boo no teddiney mo.
43012027	— Jo'oni ɓernde am metti. Noye mbi'eymi~? Mi vi'a~: Baaba, hisnam e ɗu'um wakkaci naa~? Mi vi'ataa noon, gam wakkaci ɗuum waddi yam.
43012028	Baaba am, teddin innde maaɗa. Ndeen voliinde ivoynde gada dow nanaa, nde vi'i~: — Mi teddinii nde, mi ɓesdey boo teddingo nde.
43012029	Nde yimɓe darinooɓe toon nani voliinde ndeen, woɓɓe mbi'i ɗum riggaango. Woɓɓe boo mbi'i~: — Malaa'ikaajo volidi e ma'ako~!
43012030	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Wanaa gam am voliinde ndeen wari, ammaa gam mooɗon nde wari.
43012031	Jo'oni woni nde Allah sernanta ndu'u duuniyaaru. Jo'oni laamiiɗo duuniyaaru kalluɗo tuufete.
43012032	Ammaa miin, to mi ƴeftaama nder duuniyaaru, mi fooɗey yimɓe fuu wargo to am.
43012033	E bolle ɗeen o tindiniri iri maayde nde o maayata.
43012034	Yimɓe toontii mo mbi'i~: — Min nanii nder Tawreeta, Almasiifu no tabbitoowo. Noye aan mbi'irataa Ɓii-Neɗɗo no ƴeftetee~? Moye woni Ɓii-Neɗɗo oon~?
43012035	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Jayngol e ɗoon wondi e mooɗon wakkaci seɗɗa tawo. Njahee nder jayngol ila engol wondi e mooɗon, gam to' niɓre hewto on. Gam jahoowo nder niɓre anndaa to yahata.
43012036	Ngoonɗinee jayngol ila engol wondi e mooɗon, gam laatooɗon ɓiɓɓe ma'agol. Nde Yeesu vi'i ka, o dilli o suuɗii ɓe.
43012037	Koo nde Yeesu waɗi alaamaaji kaayniiɗi yeeso Yahuudu'en, e noon fuu ɓe ngoonɗinaay mo.
43012038	Noon ɗum hebbiniri bolle annabi Ecaaya biiɗo~: Jawmiraawo, moye goonɗini bolle amin~? Ɓeye Jawmiraawo vannginani baawɗe muuɗum~?
43012039	Ɓe mbaawaay goonɗingo mo, kama ko annabi Ecaaya vi'inoo~:
43012040	«~Allah vumnii gite maɓɓe, o yo'orinii ɓerɗe maɓɓe, gam to' gite maɓɓe ngi', to' ɓerɗe maɓɓe pahamu, faa ɓe tuuba, o yamɗitina ɓe.~»
43012041	Ecaaya vi'ii noon gam o yi'ii teddungal Yeesu, o yeccii habaru ma'ako.
43012042	E noon fuu, mawɓe Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe ngoonɗinii Yeesu, ammaa ɓe mbannginaay ɗum, gam ɓe kulii to' Fariisa'en mburtin ɓe suudu-wa'ajordu Yahuudu'en.
43012043	Sabu ɓe ɓurii yiɗgo teddungal yimɓe dow e ngal Allah.
43012044	Yeesu towni voliinde vi'i~: — Goonɗinɗo yam, naa miin tan o goonɗini, ammaa faa e liloyɗo yam o goonɗini.
43012045	Giiɗo yam yi'ii liloyɗo yam.
43012046	Mi warii nder duuniyaaru gam laataago jayngol ma'aru, gam to' goonɗinɗo yam fuu jooɗo nder niɓre.
43012047	Nanɗo ekkitinol am, ammaa o goonɗinaay ngol, miin mi sernantaa mo. Gam mi waraay sernango duuniyaaru, ammaa mi warii gam hisnugo ndu.
43012048	Caliiɗo yam, mo jaɓaay ekkitinol am, e woodi cernaneyɗo mo. Voliinde nde mbi'imi on, kayre sernanta mo nyannde-darngal.
43012049	Ko mbolveymi ivaay e am, ammaa Baabiraawo liloyɗo yam, kam hokki yam bolle ɗe mbi'eymi on.
43012050	Emi anndi bolle ma'ako e kokka yonki ɗum faa abadaa. Walaa ko mbolvumi, sey ko Baabiraawo vi'i yam mi volva.
43013001	Ila e horii nyalaande wo'ore ko hokka juulɗe Kuultol ngara, Yeesu e anndi wakkaci warii nde o ɗalata duuniyaaru, o hoota to Baabiraawo. Emo yiɗi yimɓe ma'ako wonɓe nder duuniyaaru, jo'oni o holley ɓe manngu yiɗde ma'ako fuu.
43013002	Wakkaci nde ɓe kiirtotoo, Ceyɗaan aartii waɗi nyumooji nyaamgo amaana Yeesu nder ɓernde Yahuuda ɓii Simon Iskariyooti.
43013003	Yeesu e hoore muuɗum e anndi to Allah ivoyi, to Allah boo hootata. Emo anndi Allah waɗii koo ɗume fuu nder junngo ma'ako.
43013004	Gam ma'ajum o ummii to ɓe kiirtotoo, o ɓortii ngapaleewol ma'ako, o taadii gudel.
43013005	Ndeen o wayli ndiyam nder taasawo, o fuɗɗi lootgo kosɗe almaajiri'en ma'ako, emo molmira ɗe gudel ngel o taadii.
43013006	Nde o wari to Simon Biiturus, sey vi'i mo~: — Jawmam, aan lootata kosɗe am naa~?
43013007	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Jo'oni a heɓtaay ko mbaɗeymi, ammaa yeeso a heɓtey.
43013008	Biiturus vi'i mo~: — A lootataa kosɗe am abadaa~! Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Kul mi lootanaay ma kosɗe, a walaa geɗal fuu to am.
43013009	Simon Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Jawmam~! To ɗum noon, ta'a haaɗ e kosɗe tan, ammaa loot juuɗe e hoore fuu.
43013010	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Lootiiɗo yiɗaa looteego, sey lullaago tan, gam ɓanndu ma'ako fuu no laaɓndu. Onon on laaɓɓe, ammaa naa on fuu.
43013011	Emo anndi nyaameyɗo amaana ma'ako. Kanjum waɗi o vi'i~: «~Naa on fuu ngoni laaɓɓe.~»
43013012	Nde Yeesu heyni lootgo kosɗe maɓɓe, o hooƴi ngapaleewol ma'ako, o jooɗii o vi'i ɓe~: — On keɓtii ko mbaɗanmi on naa~?
43013013	Eɗon noddira yam «~Moodibbo~» e «~Jawmiraawo~». Noon ɗum deydey, gam miin woni mo.
43013014	To miin jawmiraawo mooɗon e moodibbo mooɗon, mi lootanii on kosɗe, e haani onon boo lootindiron kosɗe mooɗon.
43013015	Ɗum misaalu mbaɗanmi on, gam onon maa mbaɗon noon no mbaɗanmi on.
43013016	Emi vi'a on goonga~: maccuɗo ɓurataa jawmu wuro muuɗum, lilaaɗo boo ɓurataa liloyɗo ɗum.
43013017	Jo'oni on anndii ɗum, on barkiɗinaaɓe to on kuwii ɗum.
43013018	Naa on fuu mbolvanmi. Emi anndi ɓeen ɓe cuɓmi, ammaa e haani ko Deftere vi'i heeva~: «~ Mo nyaamdeymi no ummanto yam.~»
43013019	Emi vi'a on ka jo'oni, ila ɗum waraay, gam to ɗum warii ngoonɗinon miin woni mo ngonmi.
43013020	Emi vi'a on goonga~: jaɓɓiiɗo lilaaɗo am, jaɓɓake yam, jaɓɓiiɗo yam boo jaɓɓake liloyɗo yam.
43013021	Ɓaawo o volvii bolle ɗeen, ɓernde ma'ako mettii, o vi'i~: — Emi vi'a on goonga~: go'oto nder mooɗon no nyaamey amaana am.
43013022	Almaajiri'en ma'ako ndaarndaartiri. Ɓe anndaa dow moye o volvata.
43013023	Go'oto nder almaajiri'en, mo Yeesu ɓuri yiɗgo, e jooɗii takkol ma'ako.
43013024	Simon Biiturus ɓaaƴi mo, o ƴama Yeesu dow moye volvata bolle ɗeen.
43013025	Ndeen almaajiriijo oon lelii faro wabaare Yeesu, vi'i mo~: — Jawmam, ɗum moye~?
43013026	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Mo kokkeymi lonngere nde cuuɓmi nder li'o, ɗum kanko. O suuvi nde, o hokki nde Yahuuda ɓii Simon Iskariyooti.
43013027	Ɓaawo Yahuuda jaɓii lonngere ndeen, Ceyɗaan natti nder ɓernde ma'ako. Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Waɗ ko mbaɗataa jaawɗum~!
43013028	Walaa koo moye nder jooɗiiɓe toon heɓti gam ɗume Yeesu vi'i mo noon.
43013029	Yahuuda woni jogiiɗo ceede maɓɓe. Gam ma'ajum woɓɓe tammii Yeesu vi'ii mo o soodoya ko ɓe ngiɗi gam juulɗe, koo boo o hokka sooyɓe goɗɗum.
43013030	Nde Yahuuda jaɓi lonngere ndeen, o vurtii. Ɗum jemma.
43013031	Ɓaawo burtaaki Yahuuda, Yeesu vi'i~: — Jo'oni Ɓii-Neɗɗo no teddinte, Allah boo no teddinte nder ma'ako.
43013032	To Allah teddinaama nder ma'ako, Allah no teddiney mo e hoore muuɗum, o teddiney mo jaawɗum.
43013033	Ɓikkon am, emi ɗoon wondi e mooɗon wakkaci seɗɗa tawo. On ndaarey yam, ammaa jo'oni emi vi'a on noon no mbi'inoomi Yahuudu'en~: on mbaawataa yahago to njaheymi.
43013034	Jo'oni raa dooka kesa ka kokkeymi on~: ngiɗngiɗtiree~! Sey onon boo ngiɗngiɗtiron noon no ngiɗrumi on~!
43013035	To on ngiɗngiɗtirii, yimɓe fuu no anndey onon ngoni almaajiri'en am.
43013036	Simon Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Jawmam, toye paaɗa~? Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — To pa'ami jo'oni, a waawataa tokkugo yam tawo. Ammaa yeeso ɗo'o a tokkey yam.
43013037	Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Jawmam, gam ɗume mi waawataa tokkugo ma jo'oni~? Mi hokkey koo ɗum yonki am gam maaɗa.
43013038	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — A hokkey yonki maaɗa gam am naa~? Too, emi vi'i maa goonga~: hannde ko hokka njakaraari kurkita, a yeddey anndugo yam faa nde tati.
43014001	Yeesu vi'i almaajiri'en muuɗum~: — To' ɓerɗe mooɗon mettu. Ngoonɗinee Allah, ngoonɗinee yam miin boo.
43014002	E woodi cuuɗi ɗuuɗɗi nder wuro Baaba am. To naa ɗum noon, daa mi yeccataakono on ɗum. Mi yahey gam mi siryanoo on yaayre toon.
43014003	Ndeen to mi siryanake on yaayre, mi vittoyey mi yahara on to am, gam to njooɗiimi, onon boo njooɗooɗon toon.
43014004	Eɗon anndi laawol yahago to pa'ami.
43014005	Tooma vi'i mo~: — Jawmam, min anndaa to paaɗa, noye min anndirta laawol ngool~?
43014006	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Miin woni laawol, miin woni goonga, miin woni yonki. Walaa jaheyɗo to Baabiraawo e laawol feere, sey to ivii e am.
43014007	To eɗon anndunoo yam, daa on anndeyno Baaba am boo. Ila jo'oni on anndii mo, on ngi'ii mo.
43014008	Filibus vi'i mo~: — Jawmam, hollu min Baabiraawo, ɗum heƴii min.
43014009	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Mi neeɓii emi wondi e mooɗon. Faa hannde Filibus a anndaa yam naa~? Giiɗo yam yi'ii Baabiraawo. Noye mbi'irataa~: «~Hollu min Baabiraawo~?~»
43014010	A goonɗinaay emi nder Baabiraawo, Baabiraawo boo e nder am naa~? Bolle ɗe mbi'eymi on, mi volvaay ɗe e hoore am. Ammaa Baabiraawo gonɗo nder am, kanko huwata kuuɗe ma'ako.
43014011	Ngoonɗinee yam to mi vi'ii on emi nder Baabiraawo, Baabiraawo boo e nder am. To on ngoonɗinaay bolle am, ngoonɗinee gam ɗe'e kuuɗe am.
43014012	Emi vi'a on goonga~: goonɗinɗo yam no huwey kuuɗe ɗe kuumi, faa o huwa kuuɗe ɓurɗe ɗe kuumi, gam mi hootey to Baaba am.
43014013	Mi hokkey on koo ɗume ko toriiɗon Allah nder innde am. Mi waɗey ɗum, gam teddungal Baabiraawo yi'ee nder Ɓiɗɗo.
43014014	Koo ɗume ko toriiɗon yam nder innde am, mi waɗaney on ɗum.
43014015	— Kul on ngiɗi yam, on tokkey bolle am.
43014016	-
43014017	Mi toroto Baabiraawo hokka on goɗɗo Balloowo on, kanko woni Ruhu goonga, gam o wonda e mooɗon faa abadaa. Duuniyaaru waawataa jaɓgo mo, gam ndu yi'ataa mo, ndu anndaa mo boo. Ammaa onon, eɗon anndi mo, gam emo wondi e mooɗon, o jooɗoto nder mooɗon.
43014018	Mi ɗalataa on kama maraaya'en, mi vittoyey to mooɗon.
43014019	To yaawtake seɗɗa, duuniyaaru fuɗɗitataa yi'igo yam. Ammaa onon on ngi'ey yam. Gam miin emi foofa, onon boo on poofey.
43014020	Nyanndeere ndeen on annditey emi nder Baaba am, eɗon nder am, emi nder mooɗon.
43014021	Annduɗo dookaaji am, ɗowtanii ɗi, kanko woni giɗɗo yam. Giɗɗo yam boo, Baaba am no yiɗey mo. Miin boo mi yiɗey mo, mi vannginaney mo hoore am.
43014022	Yahuuda, wanaa Yahuuda Iskariyooti, ƴami mo~: — Jawmam, ko jeyi mbannginantaa min hoore maaɗa, ammaa a vannginantaa duuniyaaru hoore maaɗa~?
43014023	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Giɗɗo yam no tokkey voliinde am, Baaba am boo no yiɗey mo. Miin e Baabiraawo min ngarey min njooɗodoo e ma'ako.
43014024	Mo yiɗaa yam, tokkataa bolle am. Bolle ɗe nanoton boo, wanaa ɗe am, ɗum bolle Baabiraawo liloyɗo yam.
43014025	Bolle ɗe mbolvanmi on, emi volvana on ɗe ila en ngondi tawo.
43014026	Ruhu Ceniiɗo Balloowo oon, mo Baabiraawo lildoyta on nder innde am, kanko o anndiney on koo ɗume. O hiimtiney on ko ekkitinmi on fuu.
43014027	Emi ɗalana on jam, jam am kokkeymi on. Miin mi hokkirtaa on noon no duuniyaaru hokkirta. To' ɓerɗe mooɗon mettu, to' on kultor.
43014028	On nanii ko mbi'imi on, mi yahey, ɓaawo ma'ajum mi vittoyey to mooɗon. To eɗon ngiɗi yam, on naney belɗum yahadu am to Baabiraawo, gam Baabiraawo oon ɓurii yam.
43014029	Mi yeccake on ɗum jo'oni ila ɗum waraay, gam to ɗum warii, ngoonɗinon yam.
43014030	Mi ɓesdataa volididgo e mooɗon korey, gam laamiiɗo ndu'u duuniyaaru kalluɗo e wara. O walaa baawɗe fuu dow am.
43014031	Emi huwa ko Baabiraawo vi'i yam, gam duuniyaaru anndita emi yiɗi mo. Ummee ndillen ɗo'o.
43015001	— Miin woni innaboohi goongahi, Baaba am woni mo''inoowo ki.
43015002	Lisal gonngal e am dimaral fuu, o fe''ey ngal, lisal dimoowal boo, o vo''iney ngal, gam ngal ɓesda rimgo.
43015003	Jo'oni onon on vo'inaaɓe laaɓɓe, gam haala ka mbolvanmi on.
43015004	Njooɗee nder am, miin boo mi jooɗoo nder mooɗon. Noon no lisal waawrataa rimgo feere muuɗum, to ngal jooɗaaki nder inniraahi, noon onon boo, on mbaawataa rimgo to on njooɗaaki nder am.
43015005	Miin woni innaboohi, onon ngoni licce. Jooɗiiɗo nder am, miin boo emi jooɗii nder muuɗum, kanko rimata ɓikkon ɗuuɗkon. Gam on mbaawataa waɗgo koo ɗume to naa hawtaade e am.
43015006	To goɗɗo jooɗaaki nder am, no ittete feree, noon no ɗum ferdata lisal pe''aangal yo'ori. Iri ɗen ɗoon licce jo'oruɗe no kawritete peree nder yiite, ɗe ngula.
43015007	To eɗon njooɗii nder am, haala am e jooɗii nder mooɗon, ko ngiɗɗon fuu, toree Allah, on keɓey.
43015008	Ko teddinta Baaba am woni ndimon ɓikkon ɗuuɗkon. Kanjum hollata on laatii almaajiri'en am goonga'en.
43015009	Noon no Baaba am yiɗiri yam, noon miin boo ngiɗrumi on. Njooɗee nder yiɗde am.
43015010	To on ɗowtanake dookaaji am, on njooɗoto nder yiɗde am, noon no miin boo ɗowtoraniimi dookaaji Baaba am, emi jooɗii nder yiɗde ma'ako.
43015011	Mi yeccake on ɗum gam velvelo am laatoo nder mooɗon, velvelo mooɗon boo heeva.
43015012	Raa dooka am~: ngiɗngiɗtiree, noon no ngiɗrumi on.
43015013	Yiɗde fuu ɓuraay goɗɗo hokka yonki muuɗum gam higooɓe muuɗum.
43015014	Onon ngoni higooɓe am, to on kuwii ko mbi'imi on.
43015015	Mi ɓesdataa noddirgo on maccuɓe, gam maccuɗo anndaa ko jawmu wuro muuɗum huwata. Ammaa mi noddirey on higooɓe, gam ko nanmi to Baaba am fuu, mi anndinii on ɗum.
43015016	Naa onon cuɓi yam, ammaa miin suɓi on. Mi hokkii on kuugal njahon ndimoyon ɓikkon, ɓikkon mooɗon laatoo tabbitkon. Ndeen Baaba am no hokkey on koo ɗume ko toriiɗon nder innde am.
43015017	Ngiɗngiɗtiree~! Kanjum woni dooka ka kokkumi on.
43015018	— To duuniyaaru wanyii on, anndee, miin ndu aarti wanygo.
43015019	To on laatino ɓe duuniyaaru, daa ndu yiɗeyno on, gam on laatii ɓe ma'aru. Ammaa mi suɓii on, mi vurtinii on nder yimɓe duuniyaaru, on laataaki ɓe ma'aru, kanjum waɗi ndu wanyi on.
43015020	Kiimtee ko mbi'inoomi on~: maccuɗo ɓurataa jawmu wuro muuɗum manngu. To ɓe torrii yam, ɓe torrey on onon boo. To ɓe tokkii voliinde am, ɓe tokkey nde mooɗon boo.
43015021	Ammaa ɓe mbaɗaney on ɗum, ɗum fuu gam innde am, gam ɓe anndaa liloyɗo yam.
43015022	To mi waraayno mbolvanmi ɓe, daa ɓe ngalaano hakke. Ammaa jo'oni nde ngarmi mbolvanmi ɓe, ɓe ngalaa hujja fuu gam hakkeeji maɓɓe.
43015023	Ganyɗo yam wanyii Baaba am boo.
43015024	To mi huwaayno kuuɗe ɗe goɗɗo meeɗaay huugo nder maɓɓe, daa ɓe ngalaano hakke. Ammaa jo'oni ɓe ngi'ii kuuɗe ɗeen, e noon fuu ɓe nganyii yam, miin e Baaba am.
43015025	Ɓe kuurii noon gam ko vinndaa nder Tawreeta maɓɓe heeva~: «~ Ɓe nganyii yam e mehere.~»
43015026	Balloowo oon mo lildoyeymi on, ivoyeyɗo to Baaba am, waato Ruhu goonga, kanko to o warii o saaydanto yam.
43015027	Onon boo on caaydanto yam, gam eɗon ngondi e am ila arande.
43016001	— Mi yeccake on ɗum, gam to' on njoof goonɗinki mooɗon.
43016002	Ɓe mburtiney on suudu-wa'ajordu. Wakkaci no warey nde barɗo on tammotoo huwanii Allah.
43016003	Ɓe mbaɗey ɗum gam ɓe anndaa Baaba am, ɓe anndaa yam miin boo.
43016004	Mi yeccake on ɗum, gam to wakkaci ɗuum warii, kiimtooɗon mi yeccakeno on ɗum. — Mi yeccaakino on ɗum ila aran, gam emi wondi e mooɗon.
43016005	Jo'oni mi so''oto to liloyɗo yam, ammaa walaa koo moye mooɗon ƴamata yam toye pa'ami.
43016006	Jo'oni ɓerɗe mooɗon mettii korey gam haala ka mbi'imi on.
43016007	Ammaa emi vi'a on goonga~: yahadu am no ɓuraney on nafuuda. Gam to mi yahaay, Balloowo on oon warataa. Ammaa to mi yahii, mi liloyey mo to mooɗon.
43016008	To Balloowo warii, o fahaminey yimɓe duuniyaaru habaru hakke e aadilaaku e ceri'a.
43016009	O fahaminey ɓe dow hakke maɓɓe, gam ɓe ngoonɗinaay yam.
43016010	O fahaminey ɓe boofi maɓɓe dow aadilaaku, gam mi so''oto to Baaba am, on puɗɗitataa yi'igo yam.
43016011	O fahaminey ɓe dow ceri'a, gam laamiiɗo ndu'u duuniyaaru kalluɗo sernanaama.
43016012	Emi woodi haala ɗuuɗka ka ngiɗmi vi'igo on, ammaa on ngalaa semmbee jogaago ka tawo.
43016013	Ammaa to Ruhu goonga warii, o tokkiney on nder goonga fuu. Gam ko o volvanta on ivaay e hoore ma'ako, ammaa o volvaney on ko o nani fuu, o anndiney on ko warata yeeso boo.
43016014	Kanko o teddiney yam, gam o hooƴey ko o heɓi to am, o anndina on ɗum.
43016015	Ko Baaba am woodi fuu, miin jeyi ɗum. Kanjum waɗi mbi'imi o anndiney on ko o heɓi to am.
43016016	— Yeeso seɗɗa, on ngi'ataa yam, yeeso seɗɗa kadimaa, on ngi'ey yam.
43016017	Woɓɓe nder almaajiri'en ma'ako ƴamƴamtiri, ɓe mbi'i~: — Ɗume woni ma'ana bolle ma'ako nde o vi'i~: «~Yeeso seɗɗa on ngi'ataa yam, yeeso seɗɗa kadimaa, on ngi'ey yam~?~» Kadimaa o vi'i~: «~gam mi yahey to Baabiraawo.~»
43016018	Ndeen ɓe ɓesdi vi'igo~: — Ɗume o yiɗi vi'igo «~yeeso seɗɗa~»~? En pahamaay ko o vi'i.
43016019	Nde Yeesu annditi eɓe ngiɗi ƴamgo ɗum, o vi'i ɓe~: — Eɗon ngilloo fahamugo hakkunde mooɗon ma'ana bolle am~: «~Yeeso seɗɗa on ngi'ataa yam, yeeso seɗɗa kadimaa, on ngi'ey yam.~»
43016020	Emi vi'a on goonga~: onon on mboyey bojji naawɗi, ɓerɗe mooɗon no ɓalwey, duuniyaaru boo no naney belɗum. Ɓerɗe mooɗon no mettey, ammaa mettam ɓeram mooɗon no laatoto velvelo.
43016021	To debbo gaamɗo ɓadake danygo, ɓernde ma'ako no mettey, gam wakkaci danygol ma'ako warii. Ammaa to o danyii ɓinngel ngeel, o yeggitaney torraa danygol ma'ako, emo nana belɗum gam ɓinngel keccel rimaama nder duuniyaaru.
43016022	Noon onon boo, on naney mettam ɓeram jo'oni, ammaa mi ɓesdey yi'igo on, nanon belɗum ɗum walaa baawɗo te'itugo on ɗum.
43016023	Nyanndeere ndeen, on puɗɗitataa ƴamgo yam koo ɗume. Emi vi'a on goonga~: koo ɗume ko toriiɗon Baaba am nder innde am, o hokkey on ɗum.
43016024	Faa jo'oni walaa ko toriiɗon nder innde am tawo. Toree on keɓey, gam velvelo mooɗon heeva.
43016025	— Bolle ɗe mbi'imi on jo'oni, mi vi'ii on ɗe nder balndi. Wakkaci no warey nde mi volvantaa on nder balndi. Ndeen boo mi volvaney on laaɓɗum dow Baaba am.
43016026	Nyanndeere ndeen on toroto Allah nder innde am. Mi vi'aay mi toroto Baabiraawo gam mooɗon,
43016027	gam Baabiraawo e hoore muuɗum e yiɗi on. O yiɗii on gam on ngiɗii yam, on ngoonɗinii to ma'ako ivoymi.
43016028	To Baabiraawo ivoymi ngarmi nder duuniyaaru. Jo'oni mi ɗaley duuniyaaru, mi hoota to Baabiraawo.
43016029	Almaajiri'en ma'ako mbi'i mo~: — Jo'oni boo, a yeccake min laaɓɗum, walaa ko mbolvuɗaa e balndol.
43016030	Jo'oni emin anndi walaa koo ɗume ko a anndaa, ko hokka goɗɗo ƴame, a anndi ko o yiɗi ƴamgo. Kanjum waɗi min ngoonɗini a ivoyii to Allah.
43016031	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Jo'oni on ngoonɗinii naa~?
43016032	Wakkaci e wara, faa maa ɗum warii, nde on fuu cankitotooɗon. Koo moye fuu hoota wuro muuɗum, ɗalon yam miin tan. Ammaa naa ɗum miin tan, gam Baaba am e wondi e am.
43016033	Mi vi'ii on ɗum, ɗum fuu, gam keɓon jam nder am. On torroto nder ndu'u duuniyaaru, ammaa cemmbiɗinee ɓerɗe mooɗon, gam miin mi jaalake duuniyaaru.
43017001	Ɓaawo Yeesu volvii bolle ɗeen fuu, o hooynii dow, o vi'i~: — Yaa Baaba am, wakkaci waɗi, teddin Ɓiya, gam Ɓiya boo teddin ma.
43017002	A hokkii mo baawɗe dow yimɓe fuu, gam o hokka ɓeen ɓe kokkuɗaa mo fuu yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
43017003	Yonki ɗum faa abadaa woni ɓe anndu maa, aan Allah go'oto goongaajo, ɓe annda Yeesu Almasiifu mo liloyɗaa.
43017004	Mi teddinii ma nder duuniyaaru, mi heynii kuugal ngal kokkuɗaa yam mi huwa.
43017005	Jo'oni boo Baaba am, teddinam yeeso maaɗa e teddungal ngal ngoonnoomi to maaɗa ila duuniyaaru tagaaka.
43017006	Mi vannginii innde maaɗa yeeso yimɓe ɓe cuɓanɗaa yam gada nder duuniyaaru. Ndeen maa aan jeyi ɓe, a hokkii yam ɓe, ɓe ɗowtanake voliinde maaɗa.
43017007	Jo'oni ɓe anndii ko kokkuɗaa yam fuu, to maaɗa ɗum ivoyi.
43017008	Gam bolle ɗe mbiiɗaa yam, mi vi'ii ɓe ɗe, ɓe njaɓii ɗe. Ɓe tabbitinii to maaɗa ivoymi, ɓe ngoonɗinii aan liloyi yam.
43017009	Emi toro maa gam maɓɓe. Mi torataako gam duuniyaaru, ammaa emi toroo gam ɓeen ɓe kokkuɗaa yam, gam aan jeyi ɓe.
43017010	Ɓe njeymi fuu, aan jeyi ɓe, ɓe njeyɗaa fuu, miin jeyi ɓe. Mi teddinaama nder maɓɓe.
43017011	Mi neeɓataa ɗo'o nder duuniyaaru, ammaa kamɓe eɓe nder ma'aru. Emi ɗoon wara to maaɗa. Yaa Baabiraawo Ceniiɗo, reen ɓeen ɓe kokkuɗaa yam e innde maaɗa, gam ɓe laatoo go'o noon no laatoriiɗen go'o.
43017012	Nde ngondumi e maɓɓe nder duuniyaaru, mi reenrii ɓe e innde nde kokkuɗaa yam. Walaa koo go'oto nder maɓɓe halki, sey ɓii halkere, gam ko vinndaa nder Deftere heeva.
43017013	Jo'oni emi wara to maaɗa. Emi volva ɗe'e bolle ila emi darii nder duuniyaaru tawo, gam velvelo am heeva nder maɓɓe.
43017014	Mi yottinii ɓe voliinde maaɗa. Duuniyaaru wanyii ɓe, gam ɓe laataaki ɓe ma'aru, noon no miin boo mi laatoraaki mo ma'aru.
43017015	Mi toraaki ittaa ɓe nder ndu'u duuniyaaru, ammaa emi toro maa, ndeenaa ɓe gada e Kalluɗo.
43017016	Ɓe laataaki ɓe ndu'u duuniyaaru, noon no miin boo mi laatoraaki mo ma'aru.
43017017	Voliinde maaɗa woni goonga, senru ɓe e goonga kaan.
43017018	Mi lilii ɓe nder duuniyaaru, noon no lilroyɗaa yam nder ma'aru.
43017019	Emi hokka yonki am gam maɓɓe, gam kamɓe ɓe laatoo senraaɓe goonga.
43017020	Wanaa gam maɓɓe tan torotomaami. Emi toroo boo gam ɓeen goonɗineyɓe yam gada e bolle maɓɓe,
43017021	gam ɓe fuu ɓe laatoo go'o, noon no aan Baaba am laatoriɗaa nder am, miin boo emi nder maaɗa. Woor kamɓe boo ɓe laatoo nder meeɗen, gam duuniyaaru ngoonɗina aan liloyi yam.
43017022	Miin mi hokkii ɓe teddungal ngal kokkuɗaa yam, gam ɓe laatoo go'o, noon no laatoriiɗen go'o.
43017023	Miin emi nder maɓɓe, aan boo a nder am, gam ɓe laatoo go'o, faa duuniyaaru annda aan liloyi yam, ndu annda boo a yiɗi ɓe, noon no ngiɗruɗaa yam.
43017024	Baaba am, emi yiɗi ɓeen ɓe kokkuɗaa yam ngonda e am toon to ngonmi, faa ɓe ngi'a teddungal ngal kokkuɗaa yam, gam a yiɗi yam ila duuniyaaru tagaaka.
43017025	Baabiraawo goongaajo, ndu'u duuniyaaru anndaa maa, ammaa miin emi anndu maa, ɓe'e goonɗinɓe yam boo e anndi aan liloyi yam.
43017026	Mi anndinii ɓe innde maaɗa, mi ɓesdey kadimaa anndingo ɓe nde, gam yiɗde nde ngiɗɗaa yam wona nder maɓɓe, miin boo mi wona nder maɓɓe.
43018001	Nde Yeesu heyni waɗgo do'aare, o yahadi e almaajiri'en ma'ako ɓaawo maayel Kidiron. Ɓe natti nder ngesaa leɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe.
43018002	Yahuuda nyaameyɗo amaana ma'ako e anndi yaayre ndeen, gam nde ɗuuɗɗum Yeesu e almaajiri'en muuɗum e mboovi hawritgo toon.
43018003	Yahuuda aardii soojeeji e reenooɓe ivoyɓe to mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e Fariisa'en. Ɓe njahi toon, eɓe njogii docce yiite e fitilaaji e kaɓruɗumji.
43018004	Nde laatii Yeesu e anndi ko heɓata ɗum fuu, o taɓɓii ɓe, o vi'i~: — Moye ndaaroton~?
43018005	Ɓe toontii mo~: — Yeesu mo Najaratu. O vi'i ɓe~: — Miin woni mo. Yahuuda nyaameyɗo amaana ma'ako boo e darii nder maɓɓe.
43018006	Nde Yeesu vi'i~: «~Miin woni mo~», ndeen ɓe njaaɓtiri gaɗa-gaɗa faa ɓe ndo''ii e lesdi.
43018007	Yeesu ɓesdi ƴamgo ɓe~: — Moye ndaaroton~? Ɓe mbi'i~: — Yeesu mo Najaratu.
43018008	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Mi vi'ii on, miin woni mo. Kul miin ndaaroton, ngooree ɓe'e ndilla.
43018009	Ɗum wa'arii noon gam ko Yeesu vi'inoo heeva. O vi'iino~: «~Walaa koo moye mo kokkuɗaa yam halki.~»
43018010	Simon Biiturus e jogii kaafahi, o saafti ki, o fe''i nofru maccuɗo aardiiɗo diina mawɗo ndu nyaamo, faa ndu yani. Pe''aaɗo oon Malkus o vi'etee.
43018011	Ndeen Yeesu vi'i Biiturus~: — Wa'atu kaafahi maaɗa nder hoolgo muuɗum. A tammii mi yarataa torraa ka Baaba am hokki yam naa~?
43018012	Ndeen soojeeji e mawɗo mu''en e huwanooɓe mawɓe Yahuudu'en nanngi Yeesu, kaɓɓi mo.
43018013	Arande tawo ɓe njahari mo to Anas. Anas ɗum esoo Kayafas laatiiɗo aardiiɗo diina mawɗo nder hitaande ndeen.
43018014	Kayafas kam woni kokkunooɗo Yahuudu'en caawara, o vi'i ɗum ɓurii vooɗgo neɗɗo go'oto maayana yimɓe fuu.
43018015	Simon Biiturus e goɗɗo almaajiriijo Yeesu feere tokki mo. Almaajiriijo oon o anndindirɗo e aardiiɗo diina mawɗo. Kanjum waɗi o heɓi nattididgo e Yeesu wuro mawɗo oon.
43018016	Biiturus boo e darii yaasi faro dammugal. Almaajiriijo anndindirɗo e aardiiɗo diina mawɗo vurtii vi'i debbo deenoowo dammugal nattina Biiturus.
43018017	Debbo deenɗo dammugal oon ƴami Biiturus~: — Aan maa a go'oto nder almaajiri'en on ɗaa'e neɗɗo naa~? Biiturus toontii mo vi'i~: — A'aa~!
43018018	Huwooɓe e reenooɓe kuɓɓiino yiite e aytinoo gam peewol ɗum woodi. Biiturus boo wari nder maɓɓe e aytinoo.
43018019	Ndeen aardiiɗo diina mawɗo oon ƴami Yeesu dow e almaajiri'en muuɗum e ekkitinol muuɗum.
43018020	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Mi volvii e njaayri yeeso koo moye. Wakkaci fuu emi ekkitina nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi Yahuudu'en, e nder Wuro Allah Seniingo, toon to Yahuudu'en fuu kawritata. Walaa koo ɗume ko mbi'imi nder suuɗeefi.
43018021	Gam ɗume ƴamataa yam~? Ƴam ɓeen nanɓe yam, eɓe anndi ko ekkitinmi ɓe.
43018022	Nde o vi'i noon, go'oto nder reenooɓe maarii mo vi'i~: — Noon toontortoɗaa aardiiɗo diina mawɗo~?
43018023	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Kul mi vi'ii ko vooɗaa, hollam ɗum. To goonga mbi'imi, gam ɗume maariɗaa yam~?
43018024	Ndeen Anas lildi mo to Kayafas aardiiɗo diina mawɗo, o kaɓɓaaɗo.
43018025	Simon Biiturus e toon aytinoo. Sey ɓe mbi'i mo~: — Aan a go'oto nder almaajiri'en ma'ako naa~? O yeddi o vi'i~: — A'aa~!
43018026	Go'oto nder huwooɓe aardiiɗo diina mawɗo, banndu neɗɗo mo Biiturus taƴi nofru muuɗum vi'i~: — Mi yi'idaayno ma e ma'ako toon nder ngesaa leɗɗe naa~?
43018027	Biiturus kadimaa yeddi. Nder wakkaci ɗuum, njakaraari kurkiti.
43018028	Jonto ma'ajum fajiri, ɓe kooƴi Yeesu to Kayafas, ɓe njahari mo laamorde gomnaajo Roomankeejo. Ammaa yaharuɓe mo ɓeen nattaay wuro ngoon, gam dow e diina maɓɓe, kul ɓe nattuno ngo, ɓe nyiddinii ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe mbaawataa nyaamgo nyaamdu juulɗe Kuultol.
43018029	Bilaatus laamiiɗo oon, vurtii yahi to maɓɓe, vi'i ɓe~: — Ɗume ngullortooɗon o'o neɗɗo~?
43018030	Ɓe toontii mo ɓe mbi'i~: — Kul o waɗaayno ko halli, daa min ngaddataano mo to maaɗa.
43018031	Ndeen Bilaatus vi'i ɓe~: — Njaharee mo, cernanee mo deydey e ceri'a mooɗon. Yahuudu'en ɓeen mbi'i mo~: — Min ngalaa baawɗe wargo koo moye.
43018032	Noon bolle ɗe Yeesu volvi dow no maayrata ngoonɗiri.
43018033	Bilaatus so''ii nder wuro muuɗum, noddi Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Aan woni laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en naa~?
43018034	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Aan e hoore maaɗa vi'i ka, na e woɓɓe nanɗaa ka~?
43018035	Bilaatus vi'i mo~: — Miin naa mi Yahuuduujo~! Ɗume mbaɗɗaa ko yimɓe maaɗa e mawɓe aardiiɓe diina ngaddir maa to am~?
43018036	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Laamu am naa ngu ndu'u duuniyaaru. Kul ɗum ngu duuniyaaru, daa huwooɓe am no kaɓeyno gam to' mi nattu nder juuɗe Yahuudu'en. Ammaa jo'oni laamu am naa ngu ndu'u duuniyaaru.
43018037	Ndeen Bilaatus vi'i mo~: — Kul ɗum noon, a laamiiɗo naa~? Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Noon no mbiiɗaa, miin mi laamiiɗo. Kanjum waɗi ndanyaami ngarmi nder duuniyaaru, gam mi saaydina goonga. Giɗɗo goonga no yewanto voliinde am.
43018038	Bilaatus vi'i mo~: — Ɗume woni goonga~? Nde o vi'i noon, o ɓesdi vurtaago, o yahi to Yahuudu'en, o vi'i ɓe~: — Mi heɓaay feloore koo wo'ore to ma'ako.
43018039	Ammaa dow e finaatawaaji mooɗon, koo ɗeye juulɗe Kuultol emi yoofana on kaɓɓaaɗo go'oto. On ngiɗi mi yoofana on laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en naa~?
43018040	Ɓe fuu ɓe ngulli, ɓe mbi'i~: — Wanaa kanko min ngiɗi njoofanaa min. Yoofan min Barabas. Barabas boo no pasoowo.
43019001	Sey Bilaatus vi'i ɓe kooƴa Yeesu, ɓe piya mo.
43019002	Soojeeji mba'ali looci gi'e, ɓe ngiifi mo ɗi, ɓe ɓorni mo toggoore vo'ojiteynde.
43019003	Ɓe ɓaditii mo, eɓe mbi'a~: — Allah sabbinane laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en~! Eɓe menngoo mo.
43019004	Bilaatus ɓesdi vurtaago vi'i Yahuudu'en ɓeen~: — Mi vurtinoyey mo, gam anndon mi heɓaay feloore koo wo'ore e ma'ako.
43019005	Noon Yeesu vurtiniraa e yiifii giifol gi'e, e ɓornii ngapaleewol bo'ojungol. Bilaatus vi'i ɓe~: — Raa neɗɗo oon~!
43019006	Nde mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e reenooɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe ngulli, ɓe mbi'i~: — Ɓil mo dow gaafagal~! Ɓil mo dow gaafagal~! Bilaatus vi'i ɓe~: — Nanngee mo onon, ɓilon mo, gam miin mi heɓaay feloore e ma'ako.
43019007	Yahuudu'en toontii mo mbi'i~: — Dow e ceri'a amin e haani o waree, gam o laatinii hoore ma'ako Ɓiɗɗo Allah.
43019008	Nde Bilaatus nani bolle ɗeen, o ɓesdi hulgo.
43019009	O natti wuro ngoon kadimaa, o vi'i Yeesu~: — Aan toye ivoyɗaa~? Yeesu toontaaki mo koo ɗume.
43019010	Ndeen Bilaatus vi'i mo~: — A volvantaa yam naa~? A anndaa emi woodi baawɗe yoofgo ma, emi woodi baawɗe ɓilgo ma naa~?
43019011	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Kul Allah hokkaay ma baawɗe, a waawataa waɗango yam koo ɗume. Gam ma'ajum kokkuɗo yam e junngo maaɗa, oon ɓurii ma hakke.
43019012	Gada wakkaci ma'ajum Bilaatus raari yoofgo mo, ammaa Yahuudu'en ngulli mbi'i~: — Kul a yoofii mo, naa a higoo Kaysar. Neɗɗo fuu laatinɗo hoore muuɗum laamiiɗo, o ganyo laamiiɗo Rooma.
43019013	Nde Bilaatus nani bolle ɗeen, o vurtini Yeesu, o jooɗii dow jooɗorgal ceri'a, yaayre vi'eteende Gabbata nder ibraaninkoore, waato kaaƴe takkindiraaɗe.
43019014	Nyanndeere ndeen ɗum nyannde siryaago juulɗe Kuultol, caka nyalawma. Bilaatus vi'i Yahuudu'en~: — Raa laamiiɗo mooɗon~!
43019015	Ɓe ngulli~: — Yaharu mo~! Yaharu mo~! Ɓil mo dow gaafagal~! Bilaatus vi'i ɓe~: — Mi ɓila laamiiɗo mooɗon naa~? Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina mbi'i~: — Min ngalaa laamiiɗo to naa laamiiɗo Rooma.
43019016	Ndeen o hokki ɓe Yeesu, gam ɓe ɓiloya mo. Ɓe kooƴi Yeesu, ɓe njahari mo.
43019017	Yeesu vurtoyii si'ire e vakkii gaafruki muuɗum, faa o yottii yaayre vi'eteende Golgota nder ibraaninkoore, waato Gumbal Hoore.
43019018	Toon ɓe ɓildi mo e woɓɓe ɗiɗo~: go'oto e nyaamo, go'oto e nano, Yeesu e hakkunde.
43019019	Bilaatus vi'i ɓe mbinnda dow alluwaawal, ɓe takka ngal dow hoore gaafagal to Yeesu ɓilaa. Raa ko vinndaa dow ma'agal~: «~Yeesu mo Najaratu, laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.~»
43019020	Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe njanngi binndol ngool, gam toon to Yeesu ɓilaa woɗɗidaa e si'ire. Binndol ngool vinndaama nder ibraaninkoore e helenankoore e roomankoore.
43019021	Sey mawɓe aardiiɓe diina mbi'i Bilaatus~: — Ta'a vinndu~: «~Laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en~», ammaa vinndu~: «~O vi'ii kanko woni laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.~»
43019022	Bilaatus toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Ko mbinndumi vinndake.
43019023	Nde soojeeji keyni ɓilgo Yeesu, ɓe cenndi kolte ma'ako nde nayi. Koo moye hooƴi geɗal muuɗum. Kadimaa ɓe kooƴi heennaare ma'ako. Ɗum heennaare sanyaande nde walaa nyo'otol koo go'otol.
43019024	Soojeeji mbi'i~: — To' en cees toggoore ndeen. Mbaɗemma cuɓol, ngi'en moye heɓata nde. Ɓe mbaɗii noon, gam ko Deftere vi'i heeva~: «~Ɓe cenndii kolte am hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe mbaɗii cuɓol dow toggoore am.~» Noon soojeeji mbaɗi.
43019025	Inna Yeesu e takkol gaafagal ngal Yeesu ɓilaa e muuɗum. Emo darodii e dimdaaɗo ma'ako debbo, e Maryaama koree Kilopas e Maryaama mo Magadaaliya.
43019026	Yeesu yi'i inna muuɗum e almaajiriijo muuɗum giɗaaɗo e ndarodii. O vi'i inna ma'ako~: — Inna, raa ɓiya ɗoon~!
43019027	Ndeen o vi'i almaajiriijo oon~: — Raa inna maaɗa. Ila wakkaci ɗuum almaajiriijo oon yahari Maryaama wuro muuɗum.
43019028	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, Yeesu e anndi ku'uje fuu timmi. Gam ko Deftere vi'i heeva, o vi'i~: — Mi ɗomɗi.
43019029	E woodi tuuluure heeɓnde innaboojam lammuɗam toon. Ɓe cuuvi sooso nder innaboojam ɗaam, ɓe kaɓɓi ko e loosol, ɓe takki ko e honnduko ma'ako.
43019030	Nde Yeesu vooɓi innaboojam ɗaam, o vi'i~: — Ɗum heƴi~! O tuurnii hoore ma'ako, o hokkiti yonki ma'ako.
43019031	Nyannaan ɗum nyannde siryaago juulɗe. Yahuudu'en ngiɗaa ɓalli ɓilaaɓe ngooree dow leɗɗe gaafaaɗe nyannde-fooftiinde, gam nyannde ndeen no mawnde yeeso maɓɓe. Gam ma'ajum ɓe torii Bilaatus woora kosɗe ɓilaaɓe njevee, ɓe kooƴee.
43019032	Sey soojeeji ngari njevi kosɗe worɓe ɗiɗo ɓildaaɓe e Yeesu.
43019033	Ammaa nde ɓe ngari to Yeesu, ɓe tawi o maayii. Gam ma'ajum, ɓe njevaay kosɗe ma'ako.
43019034	Ammaa go'oto nder soojeeji yuwri Yeesu labbo e fulkuru. Ƴiiƴam e ndiyam mbaɗi ga rufgo.
43019035	Miin binnduɗo nde'e deftere yi'i ɗum, saaydii ɗum. Caaydaaku am boo no goonga. Miin biiɗo ɗum, emi anndi goonga caaydinmi, gam onon boo ngoonɗinon.
43019036	Ɗum laatake noon, gam ko vinndaa nder Deftere heeva~: «~Walaa koo go'otal nder ƴi'e ma'ako yevetee.~»
43019037	Nde vi'ii boo~: «~Ɓe ndaarey mo ɓe njuwi.~»
43019038	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, Yusufu mo si'ire Aramaatiya torii Bilaatus, gam o hooƴa ɓanndu Yeesu. Bilaatus jaɓi o hooƴa ɓanndu nduun. Yusufu no goonɗinɗo Yeesu nder suuɗeefi, gam emo hula Yahuudu'en.
43019039	Nikodiimu jahanooɗo to Yeesu jemma boo yahadi e ma'ako. O waddi alawordi mbi'eteendi miir e alo, o jillindiri ɗum. Teddirka ma'ajum waɗii faro kilooji talaatiin (30).
43019040	Sey ɓe kooƴi ɓanndu Yeesu ɓe molmani ndu alawordi ɗiin, ɓe taari mo nder wudere, noon no Yahuudu'en mboovi waɗgo, ko hokka ɓe uva maayɗo.
43019041	Faro yaayre to Yeesu ɓilaa e woodi ngesaa leɗɗe. Nder ma'aka e woodi yenaande hesre nde koo moye meeɗaay wallineego nder muuɗum.
43019042	Toon ɓe ndesi Yeesu, gam ɗum nyannde-fooftiinde Yahuudu'en, yenaande ndeen boo no ɓadiinde.
43020001	Too, nyannde alat go'o yontitannde, Maryaama mo Magadaaliya davi ila fajiri, o yahi yenaande. O yi'i kaaƴa omndiranoonga yenaande ndeen tallitaama.
43020002	Debbo oon nyaari yahi to Simon Biiturus e almaajiriijo mo Yeesu yiɗi, o vi'i ɓe~: — Ɓe kooƴii ɓanndu Jawmiraawo nder yenaande, min anndaa toye ɓe mbaɗi ndu.
43020003	Biiturus e almaajiriijo oon mburtii njahi to yenaande.
43020004	Ɓe nyaari ɓe fuu ɗiɗo. Almaajiriijo oon ɗaɗi Biiturus, aartii mo e yenaande ndeen.
43020005	O yuurnii o yi'i wudere e resi, ammaa o nattaay.
43020006	Simon Biiturus boo yottii natti, yi'i wudere e resi.
43020007	Lefol ngol ɓe taarnoo e hoore Yeesu waldaa e wudere, ngol tawaa engol tamii feere ma'agol.
43020008	Ndeen almaajiriijo aartunooɗo wargo, kanyum boo natti yi'i, goonɗini.
43020009	Gam faa wakkaci ɗuum ɓe keɓtaay ko Deftere vi'i, Yeesu no ummitoto.
43020010	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, almaajiri'en ɗiɗo ɓeen kooti.
43020011	Maryaama e darii vuttudu yenaande e voya. O turii o yuurnii yenaande ndeen.
43020012	O yi'i malaa'ika'en ɗiɗo ɓe kolte daneeje e njooɗii vuttudu to Yeesu resano, go'oto e hoore, go'oto e kosɗe.
43020013	Malaa'ika'en ɓeen mbi'i mo~: — Banndam debbo, ko jeyi mboyataa~? O toontii ɓe o vi'i~: — Ɓe cottinii Jawmam, mi anndaa toye ɓe ndesi mo.
43020014	Nde o vi'i bolle ɗeen, o yeeƴii o yi'i Yeesu, ammaa o annditaay ɗum.
43020015	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Banndam debbo, ko jeyi mboyataa~? Moye ndaarataa~? Ammaa o tammii ɗum kuwoowo ngesaa volidata e ma'ako, o vi'i mo~: — Moodibbo, kul aan sottini mo, yeccam toye ndesɗaa mo, gam mi hooƴa mo.
43020016	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Maryaama~! O yeeƴii o vi'i nder ibraaninkoore~: — Rabbooni~! Waato~: «~Moodibbo~».
43020017	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Ta'a jogam, gam mi ƴeentaay to Baaba am tawo. Yah to banndiraaɓe am, mbi'aa ɓe mi ƴeentey to Baaba am, Baaba mooɗon boo, Allah am, Allah mooɗon boo.
43020018	Maryaama mo Magadaaliya yeccii almaajiri'en, o vi'i ɓe~: — Mi yi'ii Jawmiraawo meeɗen. O yeccii ɓe ko Yeesu vi'i mo fuu.
43020019	Nyannde alat nde futuro waɗi, almaajiri'en Yeesu kawriti wuro mu''en. Ɓe omndi dammuɗe gam kulol Yahuudu'en. Ndeen Yeesu wari vanngi hakkunde maɓɓe, hinni ɓe vi'i~: — Jam wondu e mooɗon~!
43020020	Nde o hinni ɓe, o holli ɓe juuɗe ma'ako e fulkuru ma'ako. Almaajiri'en nani belɗum yi'igo mo.
43020021	Ndeen Yeesu ɓesdi vi'igo ɓe~: — Jam wondu e mooɗon~! Noon no Baabiraawo lilroyi yam, noon onon boo, lilreymi on.
43020022	Nde o vi'i bolle ɗeen, o fuufi dow maɓɓe, o vi'i~: — Njaɓee Ruhu Ceniiɗo~!
43020023	Mo nja'afaniiɗon hakkeeji muuɗum, ɗi nja'afaama, mo on nja'afanaaki hakkeeji muuɗum boo, ɗi nja'afaaka.
43020024	Ammaa Tooma bi'eteeɗo Ciwtaaɗo, go'oto nder sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, walaa ɗoon wakkaci ko Yeesu vanngunoo hakkunde maɓɓe.
43020025	Almaajiri'en mbi'i mo~: — Min ngi'ii Jawmiraawo meeɗen~! O toontii ɓe o vi'i~: — Kul mi yi'aay to o fiyanaa kuusaaje nder juuɗe ma'ako, meemmi e hohondu am, mbaɗmi junngo am e fulkuru ma'ako to o yuppaa, mi goonɗintaa sam.
43020026	Balɗe joveetati ɓaawo ma'ajum almaajiri'en puɗɗiti hawritgo. Tooma e wondi e maɓɓe. Dammuɗe fuu e omndi. Sey Yeesu vanngi hakkunde maɓɓe vi'i~: — Jam wondu e mooɗon~!
43020027	O vi'i Tooma~: — Raar juuɗe am, waɗ hohondu maaɗa ɗo'o, waɗ junngo maaɗa e fulkuru am. Ta'a laato mo goonɗinaay, ammaa goonɗin.
43020028	Tooma toontii mo vi'i~: — Jawmiraawo am, Allah am.
43020029	Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Gam a yi'ii yam ngoonɗinɗaa naa~? Barkaa laatanto ɓeen goonɗinɓe ngi'aay yam.
43020030	Yeesu waɗii goɗɗi alaamaaji kaayniiɗi ɗuuɗɗi ɗi mbinndaaka nder nde'e deftere.
43020031	Ammaa ɗiin binndaaɗi mbinndaama, gam ngoonɗinon Yeesu woni Almasiifu Ɓiɗɗo Allah, faa keɓron yonki nder innde ma'ako gada e goonɗingo mo.
43021001	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, Yeesu ɓesdi vanngango almaajiri'en muuɗum faro maayo Tiberiyas. Raa no o vanngirani ɓe~:
43021002	Simon Biiturus e Tooma bi'eteeɗo Ciwtaaɗo e Natanayel mo si'ire Kaana nder lesdi Gaaliili e ɓiɓɓe Jabadi, e woɓɓe almaajiri'en ɗiɗo, ɓe fuu eɓe ngondi.
43021003	Simon Biiturus vi'i ɓe~: — Mi yahey nanngoygo liƴƴi. Ɓe mbi'i mo~: — Minon maa min njahadey e maaɗa. Ɓe mburtii ɓe natti akali ndiyam. Ammaa jemmaare ndeen fuu ɓe keɓaay koo ngo'otu.
43021004	Ila fajiri Yeesu wari darii dow fonngo maayo, ammaa almaajiri'en annditaay mo.
43021005	O vi'i ɓe~: — Higooɓe am, eɗon ngoodi liƴƴi~? Ɓe mbi'i~: — Min ngalaa~!
43021006	O vi'i ɓe~: — Peree nanngirɗum mooɗon vuttudu akali nyaamru, on keɓey. Nde ɓe peri ɗum, ɓe nanngi liƴƴi ɗuuɗɗi, faa ɓe caloraa fooɗgo ɗi.
43021007	Almaajiriijo mo Yeesu yiɗi vi'i Simon Biiturus~: — Ɗum Jawmiraawo meeɗen~! Nde Simon Biiturus nani ɗum Jawmiraawo mu''en, o ɓornii kolte ma'ako, gam o ɓortakeno ɗe, o diwi nder ndiyam.
43021008	Almaajiri'en horiiɓe ngardi e akali, eɓe ndasi nanngirɗum keeɓɗum liƴƴi. Ɓe ngoɗɗidaa e fonngo, ɗum ɓuraay meetirji hemre (100).
43021009	Nde ɓe njottii ɓe tawi liƴƴi e ndesii dow ƴulɓe yiite, ɓe tawi buroodi.
43021010	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Ngaddee goɗɗi liƴƴi ɗi nannguɗon jo'oni.
43021011	Simon Biiturus natti akali fooɗi nanngirɗum liƴƴi, o waddi ɗum daddake ndiyam. E ɗum heevi liƴƴi mawɗi. Liƴƴi ɗiin mbaɗii hemre e hamsiin e tati (153). Koo nde ɗi ɗuuɗi, nanngirɗum seekaay.
43021012	Yeesu vi'i ɓe~: — Ngaree ngevon kooƴe~! Walaa koo go'oto nder maɓɓe ƴami mo~: «~Aan a moye~?~» Ɓe fuu ɓe annditii ɗum Jawmiraawo.
43021013	Sey Yeesu wari hooƴi buroodi e liƴƴi hokki ɓe.
43021014	Kanjum woni wakkaci tataɓum ko Yeesu vanngani almaajiri'en muuɗum ɓaawo ummitaaki ma'ako.
43021015	Nde ɓe keyni nyaamgo, Yeesu vi'i Simon Biiturus~: — Simon ɓii Yahayya, koo a ɓurii ɓe'e yiɗgo yam naa~? O toontii mo~: — Ee Jawmiraawo, eɗa anndi emi yiɗ maa. Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Dur ɓiɓɓe baali am~!
43021016	Yeesu ɓesdi ƴamgo mo ɗiɗaɓre~: — Simon ɓii Yahayya, a yiɗi yam naa~? O toontii mo~: — Ee Jawmiraawo, eɗa anndi emi yiɗ maa~! Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Reen baali am~!
43021017	O ɓesdi ƴamgo mo tataɓre~: — Simon ɓii Yahayya, a yiɗi yam naa~? Ɓernde Biiturus metti nde Yeesu ƴami mo tataɓre vi'i~: «~A yiɗi yam naa~?~» Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Jawmiraawo, eɗa anndi koo ɗume, eɗa anndi emi yiɗ maa. Yeesu vi'i mo~: — Dur baali am~!
43021018	Emi vi'i maa goonga, nder mbilkaaku maaɗa a ɓornoto kolte maaɗa, a yahey to ngiɗɗaa fuu. Ammaa to a naywii, a hokkey goɗɗo juuɗe maaɗa, o ɓornete, o yaharu maa to a yiɗaa.
43021019	E bolle ɗeen Yeesu tindiniri no Biiturus teddinirta Allah nder maayde muuɗum. Ndeen o vi'i mo~: — Tokkam~!
43021020	Biiturus yeeƴii yi'i almaajiriijo mo Yeesu yiɗi e tokki ɓaawo mu''en. Kanko woni lelinooɗo faro wabaare Yeesu nde ɓe kiirtotono, biiɗo~: «~Jawmam, moye nyaamata amaana maaɗa~?~»
43021021	Nde Biiturus yi'i mo, o vi'i Yeesu~: — Jawmiraawo, e o'o fa, ɗume laatantoo ɗum yeeso~?
43021022	Yeesu toontii mo vi'i~: — Kul mi yiɗii o foofa faa nde mbittoymi, ko waannu maa~? Aan kam, tokkam tan.
43021023	Haala kaan sankitii nder banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe fuu, almaajiriijo oon maayataa. Ammaa Yeesu vi'aay o maayataa, o vi'i mo~: «~To emi yiɗi o foofa faa nde mbittoymi, ko waannu maa~?~»
43021024	Almaajiriijo oon saaydini kuuɗe ɗeen, o vinndi ɗe, eɗen anndi boo caaydaaku ma'ako ɗum goonga.
43021025	Yeesu waɗii goɗɗi alaamaaji kaayniiɗi ɗuuɗɗi. To ɗi mbinndano go'otel-go'otel, emi tammii ndu'u duuniyaaru waawataa jogaago defte ɗeen.
44001001	Tiyofilus, nder deftere am arande, mi vinndiino dow ko Yeesu fuɗɗi huugo e ekkitingo fuu,
44001002	faa nyannde o ƴeenti dow. Ko hokka o ƴeenta dow, o ekkitinii lilaaɓe ɓe o suɓi nder baawɗe Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
44001003	Ɓaawo o torraama o waraama, sey o ummitii o vannginani ɓe hoore ma'ako. Kadimaa gada e alaamaaji ɗuuɗɗi o holli ɓe emo foofa. O waɗi balɗe arba'iin (40) emo vanngana ɓe, emo ekkitina ɓe dow laamu Allah.
44001004	Wakkaci o nyaamdata e maɓɓe o vi'i ɓe~: — To' on ngoɗɗo Urusaliima, ammaa ndeentee faa Baabiraawo hebbina alkawal hokkugo on Ruhu Ceniiɗo ngal o waɗani on, ngal ngecciimi on habaru muuɗum.
44001005	Yahayya waɗanii yimɓe baptisma e ndiyam, ammaa nder balɗe seɗɗa onon on mba'arante baptisma e Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
44001006	Sey ɓe fuu ɓe kawriti, ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i~: — Jawmiraawo, jo'oni ngartirtaa laamu Isiraa'iila naa~?
44001007	Yeesu toontii ɓe vi'i~: — On mbaawataa anndugo jaamanuuji e wakkaciiji ɗi Baabiraawo siryii nder baawɗe muuɗum.
44001008	Ammaa to Ruhu Ceniiɗo oon jippoyake dow mooɗon, on keɓey baawɗe, on laatoto caaydu'en am nder Urusaliima e nder lesdi Yahuuda fuu, e lesdi Samaariya, faa keerol duuniyaaru fuu.
44001009	Nde o vi'i noon, o ƴeftiraama dow. Eɓe kooynoo ndaara mo faa duule cuddi mo.
44001010	Wakkaci nde eɓe nder tijjaago dow, emo nder ƴeentineeki, sey worɓe ɗiɗo ɓe kolte daneeje ngari ndarii faro maɓɓe,
44001011	mbi'i ɓe~: — Onon yimɓe Gaaliili, ko jeyi ndariiɗon ɗo'o, eɗon kooynoo dow~? Yeesu kooƴaaɗo nder mooɗon, ƴeentinaa dow. Kanko e hoore ma'ako o wartey. Noon no ngi'iruɗon ƴeentineeki ma'ako, noon ngi'iroton co''oyaaki ma'ako boo.
44001012	Sey ɓe njippii vaamnde vi'eteende Jaytun, ɓe kooti Urusaliima. Hakkunde ma'ajum e Urusaliima ɗum ɓuraay kiloomeetir go'otum.
44001013	Nde ɓe njottii, ɓe ƴeenti wuro dow ngo ɓe mboovi hawritgo nder muuɗum. Lilaaɓe ɓeen ngoni~: Biiturus e Yahayya e Yaakuubu e Anndaraawus e Filibus e Tooma e Bartalamaawus e Matta e Yaakuubu ɓii Alfayus e Simon daarɗo rimɗingo Yahuudu'en e Yahuuda ɓii Yaakuubu.
44001014	Ɓe fuu eɓe ti'inii waɗgo do'aare e ɓernde wo'ore, kamɓe e Maryaama inna Yeesu e minyiraaɓe Yeesu e woɓɓe rewɓe.
44001015	Nder balɗe ɗeen goonɗinɓe njaharii kama yimɓe hemre e aciriin (120). Ndeen Biiturus ummii, darii yeeso maɓɓe vi'i~:
44001016	— Banndiraaɓe, Ruhu Ceniiɗo volvii gada e honnduko Dawda dow Yahuuda kolluɗo nannguɓe Yeesu laawol. E haani voliinde Allah ndeen heeva.
44001017	Yahuuda limaanooma nder meeɗen, o heɓi geɗal kuugal ma'ako nder lilaaɓe.
44001018	(E ceede ɗe o biyaa gam kuugal ma'ako ngal nyaamre amaana, o soodi ngesaa, o yahi o do''ii nder ma'aka. Reedu ma'ako seeki, tekekki ma'ako fuu ndufi e lesdi.
44001019	Yimɓe Urusaliima fuu nanii ɗum. Kanjum waɗi ɓe tokani ngesaa kaan Akeldaama. Nder ɗemngal maɓɓe ma'ana innde ndeen woni «~Ngesaa Ƴiiƴam.~»)
44001020	Gam ɗum vinndaama nder Jabuura~: «~Wuro ma'ako no laatoto vinnde, to' koo moye jooɗo nder ma'ago.~» Kadimaa ɗum vinndaama~: «~Sey goɗɗo feere hooƴa kuugal ma'ako.~»
44001021	-
44001022	E haani cuɓen go'oto gada nder wondunooɓe e meeɗen wakkaci Yeesu Jawmiraawo jooɗodinoo e meeɗen. Cuɓen goɗɗo gondunooɗo e meeɗen ila wakkaci ko Yahayya waɗani yimɓe baptisma, faa nyannde Yeesu hooƴaa nder meeɗen, gam o laatoo caaydodiiɗo e meeɗen ummitineeki Yeesu.
44001023	Ɓe ndarni worɓe ɗiɗo~: Yusufu bi'eteeɗo Barsabas ɓii Yustus, kanyum e Maatiyas.
44001024	Ɓe ndo'ii ɓe mbi'i~: — Jawmiraawo, aan annduɗo ɓerɗe yimɓe fuu, anndin min mo cuɓɗaa gada nder ɓe'e ɗiɗo,
44001025	gam o hooƴa geɗal kuugal lilaaɗo ngal Yahuuda ɗali, nde o yahi yaayre to haanani mo.
44001026	Ɓe mbaɗi cuɓol hakkunde maɓɓe. Cuɓol yani dow Maatiyas. O limaa nder lilaaɓe sappo e go'o.
44002001	Nde juulɗe bi'eteeɗe Pentekos ngari, goonɗinɓe fuu kawriti yaayre wo'ore.
44002002	Ɗoon e ɗoon ɓe nani iido kama henndu mawndu ivoyndu gada dow, ndu heevi wuro to ɓe njooɗii fuu.
44002003	Goɗɗum nannduɗum e ɗemɗe yiite vanngi. Ɗe cankitii ɗe koɗi dow hoore koo moye maɓɓe.
44002004	Sey ɓe fuu ɓe keevi Ruhu Ceniiɗo, ɓe puɗɗi volvugo nder ɗemɗe feere-feere noon no Ruhu hokkiri ɓe baawɗe volvugo.
44002005	Nder si'ire Urusaliima e woodi Yahuudu'en hulɓe Allah ivoyɓe gada koo ɗeye lesɗe duuniyaaru fuu.
44002006	Nde ɓe nani iido, yimɓe fuu kawriti. Hakkiilo maɓɓe ummii nde ɓe nani lilaaɓe e mbolva nder ɗemngal koo moye maɓɓe.
44002007	Ɗum haaynii ɓe korey, ɓe ƴamƴamtiri~: — Ɓe'e volvooɓe fuu wanaa no Gaaliilankoo'en naa~?
44002008	Ndeen noye ɗum waɗi koo moye meeɗen fuu e nana ko ɓe mbi'ata nder ɗemngal muuɗum~?
44002009	Rah nder meeɗen e woodi Partiyankoo'en e Madiyankoo'en e Elaamiyankoo'en, e woodi jooɗiiɓe Mesopotaamiya, woɓɓe gada nder lesɗe Yahuuda e Kapadookiya e Pontus e Aasiya
44002010	e Firiigiya e Pamfiliya e Misira e jaaje lesdi Libiya faro Sireene.
44002011	Woɓɓe meeɗen ivoyii Rooma, e woodi Yahuudu'en e tokkuɓe diina Yahuudu'en. Kadimaa woɓɓe meeɗen ivoyii Kereeta, woɓɓe no Laarabankoo'en. Ammaa en fuu en nana eɓe mbolva nder ɗemɗe meeɗen dow kuuɗe mawɗe ɗe Allah waɗi~!
44002012	Ɓe fuu ɗum haaynii ɓe, ɓe njiɓii, ɓe ƴamƴamtiri~: — Ɗume woni ma'ana ma'ajum~?
44002013	Ammaa woɓɓe njaltiniri goonɗinɓe, ɓe mbi'i~: — Innaboojam ɓe njari, ɓe ngiilti~!
44002014	Sey Biiturus ummii kanko e lilaaɓe sappo e go'o, ɓe ndarii o towni voliinde o vi'i hawriinde ndeen~: — Onon Yahuudu'en e jooɗiiɓe nder Urusaliima fuu, ngewanee yam gam pahamon habaru ɗu'um ko laatii.
44002015	Ɓe'e yimɓe wanaa ɓe yiiltiiɓe kama ko tammiiɗon, gam jo'oni ɗum njamndi joveenayi ndi bimbi tawo, hakko neɗɗo yara goɗɗum.
44002016	Kanjum woni ko annabi Jowel vi'inoo~:
44002017	«~Allah vi'i~: Nder balɗe cakitotooɗe, mi rufoyey Ruhu am dow ɓiɓɓe-aadama fuu. Ɓiɓɓe mooɗon worɓe e rewɓe, no mbaɗey annabaaku. Kaye'en mooɗon no kollete ko warata yeeso, ndotti'en mooɗon boo no koyɗey koyɗi.
44002018	Mi rufoyey Ruhu dow maccuɓe am e horɓe am nder balɗe ɗeen, ɓe mbaɗey annabaaku.
44002019	Mi holley ku'uje kaayniiɗe toon dow asama, dow lesdi boo, mi waɗey alaamaaji, ɗi laatoo ƴiiƴam e yiite e cuurga.
44002020	Ko hokka nyalaande Jawmiraawo mawnde teddunde wara, naange no niɓɓey, lewru boo no vo'ojey kama ƴiiƴam.
44002021	Ndeen nodduɗo innde Jawmiraawo fuu no hisnete.~»
44002022	Kadimaa Biiturus vi'i~: — Onon Isiraa'iila'en, ngewanee ɗe'e bolle~: Yeesu mo Najaratu ɗum neɗɗo mo Allah holli jaɓi. O hollirii noon gada e hokkugo mo baawɗe waɗgo kuuɗe mawɗe e kaayniiɗumji e alaamaaji ɗi o huwi nder mooɗon. Onon e ko'e mooɗon eɗon anndi ɗum.
44002023	On kokkitirii neɗɗo oon nder juuɗe halluɓe. On ɓilii mo dow gaafagal, on mbarii mo, noon no Allah aarti siryori ɗum.
44002024	Ammaa Allah ummitinii mo, vurtinii mo naawɗum maayde, sabu maayde waawataa jogaago mo.
44002025	Gam annabi Dawda volvii dow ma'ako vi'i~: «~Wakkaci fuu emi ɗoon yi'a Jawmiraawo, walaa ko dimmbata yam, sabu emo ɗoon e junngo am nyaamo.
44002026	Gam ma'ajum ɓernde am e nana belɗum, emi velvelta korey, koo nde laatii mi neɗɗo maayoowo, ɓernde am no waaltoto gam tammunde ko warata,
44002027	gam a ɗalataa yonki am nder Laahira, a woorataa Ceniiɗo maaɗa nyola.
44002028	A holley yam laabi jahareyɗi yam e yonki, wondugo e maaɗa no hebbiney yam velvelo.~»
44002029	Biiturus ɓesdi vi'igo~: — Banndiraaɓe, emi vi'a on goonga dow maama meeɗen Dawda~: O maayi, o uvaama, yenaande ma'ako e ɗoon to meeɗen faa hannde.
44002030	O annabiijo, emo anndi Allah waɗanii mo alkawal goɗɗo gada nder taaniraaɓe ma'ako no roney laamu ma'ako.
44002031	O haynake ko waroyta yeeso, o volvi dow ummitineeki Almasiifu. Kanko woni mo yonki muuɗum woorataake nder Laahira, ɓanndu ma'ako boo nyolataa.
44002032	Kanko woni Yeesu mo Allah ummitini, min fuu emin caaydii ɗum.
44002033	Allah teddinii mo, jo''inii mo e junngo muuɗum nyaamo. Allah hokki mo Ruhu Ceniiɗo kama no o waɗani mo alkawal. Kanko boo o rufoyi ɗum dow amin. Kanjum woni ko ngi'oton e ko nanoton jo'oni.
44002034	Gam Dawda heɓaay ƴeentugo dow, ammaa o vi'i~: «~Jawmiraawo vi'ii Jawmam~: Jooɗa e junngo am nyaamo,
44002035	faa mi waɗa wanywanyɓe maaɗa laatoo jaaɓruɗum kosɗe maaɗa.~»
44002036	Gam ma'ajum e haani yimɓe Isiraa'iila fuu tabbitina Allah waɗii Yeesu mo mbarɗon dow gaafagal, o laatoo Jawmiraawo e Almasiifu.
44002037	Nde ɓe nani bolle ɗeen, ɗe tufi ɓerɗe maɓɓe korey, ɓe mbi'i Biiturus e lilaaɓe horiiɓe~: — Banndiraaɓe, noye haani min mbaɗa~?
44002038	Biiturus toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Sey koo moye mooɗon tuuba, waɗanee baptisma e innde Yeesu Almasiifu, gam keɓon ya'afuye hakkeeji mooɗon. Ndeen on kokkete Ruhu Ceniiɗo caahu.
44002039	Gam Allah waɗanii on alkawal muuɗum, onon e ɓiɓɓe mooɗon, faa e yimɓe woɗɗuɓe e koo ɓeye ɓe Jawmiraawo Allah meeɗen noddi ngara to muuɗum.
44002040	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o vaggini ɓe e bolle ɗuuɗɗe, emo toroo ɓe, emo vi'a~: — Cenndee ko'e mooɗon e yimɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru oonyiindu~!
44002041	Nde ɓe nani wa'aji Biiturus, sey ɗuuɗɓe njaɓi mbaɗanaa baptisma. Nyanndeere ndeen faro yimɓe dubuuje tato (3~000) ɓesdii nder ikiliisiya.
44002042	Eɓe ti'inii tokkugo ekkitinol lilaaɓe, eɓe sumpootira nder kawtal maɓɓe, eɓe nyaamda, eɓe mbaɗa do'aare.
44002043	Kulol nanngi ɓernde koo moye, gam Allah e waɗa alaamaaji kaayniiɗi ɗuuɗɗi gada e juuɗe lilaaɓe.
44002044	Goonɗinɓe fuu kawriti, kadimaa ɓe kawti ko ɓe ngoodi fuu.
44002045	Ɓe coorri jawdi maɓɓe, ɓe cenndani koo moye maɓɓe fuu ko haani gam muuɗum.
44002046	Nyanndeere fuu eɓe kawrita nder Wuro Allah Seniingo e nyumo wo'oto. Eɓe nyaamda nder gure maɓɓe e ɓerɗe laaɓɗe e velvelo manngo,
44002047	eɓe ngetta Allah. Yimɓe fuu e ngiɗi ɓe. Nyanndeere fuu Jawmiraawo e ɓesdana kawtal maɓɓe hisneteeɓe.
44003001	Nyannde go'o Biiturus e Yahayya e njaha Wuro Allah Seniingo, ɗum wakkaci do'aare faro njamndi tati ndi alaasara.
44003002	E woodi neɗɗo dimaaɗo no boosɗo, jooɗiiɗo e dammugal Wuro Seniingo bi'eteengal Dammugal Booɗngal. Nyanndeere fuu emo yaharee toon gam o toroo sadaka gada e nattooɓe Wuro Seniingo.
44003003	Nde o yi'i Biiturus e Yahayya e natta, o torii ɓe sadaka.
44003004	Ɓe cutii mo, Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Raar min~!
44003005	O raari ɓe gam emo tammii heɓgo goɗɗum to maɓɓe.
44003006	Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Mi walaa ajurfaari koo jiinaariya, ammaa mi hokkete ko ngoonmi~: nder innde Yeesu Almasiifu mo Najaratu, ummaa ruugaa~!
44003007	Biiturus nanngi junngo ma'ako nyaamo darni mo. Ɗoon e ɗoon kosɗe ma'ako cemmbiɗi.
44003008	O ummii jaawɗum o fuɗɗi yahadu. O nattidi e maɓɓe nder Wuro Allah Seniingo. Emo yaha, emo diwa, emo yetta Allah.
44003009	Yimɓe fuu ngi'i mo, emo yiiloo, emo yetta Allah.
44003010	Ɓe annditi kanko woni jooɗinooɗo e Dammugal Booɗngal e toroo yimɓe sadaka. Sey ɓe kaayɗini korey dow ko laatanii mo.
44003011	Ila boosɗo oon e jogotiri e Biiturus e Yahayya, sey yimɓe fuu nyaaroyi kawriti to maɓɓe toon rumpaaru mawndu vi'eteendu rumpaaru Suleymaanu, gam kaayniiɗum ɗum ɓe ngi'i.
44003012	Nde Biiturus yi'i yimɓe kawriti, sey o vi'i ɓe~: — Onon Isiraa'iila'en, gam ɗume kaayɗinton~? Gam ɗume ndaaroton min~? On tammii gada e baawɗe amin, koo e ti'inaare amin dow tokkugo Allah min njamɗitiniri o'o boosɗo naa~?
44003013	Allah mo Ibraahim, Allah mo Iciyaaku, Allah mo Yaakuubu, Allah mo maamiraaɓe meeɗen, kam teddini maccuɗo muuɗum Yeesu. Ammaa onon on kokkitirii mo gam o waree, koo nde laatii Bilaatus e yiɗi yoofgo mo, ammaa on calake o yoofa mo.
44003014	On calake Ceniiɗo goongaajo oon, on torake yoofaneego baɗɗo war-hoore.
44003015	On mbarii puɗɗuɗo yonki, ammaa Allah ummitinii mo. Minon boo min caaydu'en ma'ajum.
44003016	Gada e baawɗe innde Yeesu, o'o neɗɗo mo ngi'oton, mo annduɗon heɓii semmbee. Goonɗinki ma'ako e Yeesu waɗi o heɓi jamɗitineeki keeɓki yeeso mooɗon on fuu.
44003017	Jo'oni banndiraaɓe, emi anndi ko mbaɗanɗon Yeesu, onon e mawɓe mooɗon, on mbaɗii ɗum nder ciya anndal.
44003018	Noon Allah hebbiniri ko annabo'en muuɗum fuu mbi'i, ɓe mbi'i Almasiifu no torrete.
44003019	Gam ma'ajum tuubee, ngaylitee to Allah, faa o mooyta hakkeeji mooɗon,
44003020	o waddana on wakkaciiji fooftiinde, o lildoya on Yeesu Almasiifu mo o waɗannoo on alkawal.
44003021	Doole o jooɗo toon dow faa nde Allah hesɗitini ku'uje fuu, kama ko Allah volvunoo gada e konnduɗe annabo'en muuɗum seniiɓe ila ndeenno.
44003022	Gam Muusa vi'i~: «~Jawmiraawo Allah mooɗon no lildoyey on annabiijo kama am, banndii on. Njaɓee koo ɗume ko o vi'ata on.
44003023	Neɗɗo fuu mo jaɓaay annabiijo oon, no vurtinte nder yimɓe Allah o halkee.~»
44003024	Annabo'en, gada Samaa'iila faa e annabo'en goonɗinɓe ɓaawo ma'ako, ɓe fuu ɓe mbolvii dow ɗe'e balɗe.
44003025	Annabaakuuji ɗi annabo'en mbaɗi, ɗum gam mooɗon. Onon ngoni ronooɓe alkawal ngal Allah waɗani maamiraaɓe meeɗen nde o vi'i Ibraahim~: «~Gada e danygol maaɗa leƴƴi duuniyaaru fuu no keɓey barkaa.~»
44003026	Nde Allah suɓi Yeesu maccuɗo muuɗum, o aartii liloygo mo to mooɗon gam o barkiɗina on, faa o waylitoya koo moye mooɗon fuu woora kuugal muuɗum kallungal.
44004001	Wakkaci Biiturus e Yahayya mbolidata e yimɓe, sey aardiiɓe diina Yahuudu'en e mawɗo reenooɓe Wuro Seniingo e Saduuki'en ngari to maɓɓe.
44004002	Ɓe kuunƴi, gam Biiturus e Yahayya e ekkitina yimɓe maayɓe no ummitinte e yonki, sabu Yeesu ummitake.
44004003	Gam ma'ajum ɓe nanngi ɓe, ɓe omndi ɓe nder kaso faa fina, gam hiirii ko ɓe nanngi ɓe.
44004004	Ɗuuɗɓe nder nanɓe wa'aji maɓɓe ngoonɗinii, faa ɗuuɗal maɓɓe laatii yimɓe dubuuje njovo (5~000).
44004005	Nde fini, arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en e darvooɓe e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta kawriti Urusaliima,
44004006	kamɓe e Anas, aardiiɗo diina mawɗo, e Kayafas e Yahayya e Aleksandir e woɓɓe nder banndiraaɓe Anas.
44004007	Ɓe ndarni Biiturus e Yahayya yeeso maɓɓe, ɓe ƴami ɓe e ɗeye baawɗe, koo nder innde moye ɓe njamɗitiniri boosɗo oon.
44004008	Ndeen Biiturus keeɓɗo Ruhu Ceniiɗo vi'i ɓe~: — Onon mawɓe e darvooɓe,
44004009	on ƴamii min hannde dow e booɗɗum ɗum min mbaɗani boosɗo e no o yamɗitiri.
44004010	Too, anndee onon e Isiraa'iila'en fuu~: gam daliila innde Yeesu Almasiifu mo Najaratu o'o gorko dariiɗo yeeso mooɗon yamɗitiri. Yeesu oon woni mo mbarɗon dow gaafagal, mo Allah ummitini nder maayde.
44004011	Kanko woni mo Allah vi'i nder Deftere~: «~Haayre nde mahooɓe kibini, kayre laatii haayre ɓurnde jogaago mahadi.~»
44004012	Gada e ma'ako tan keɓruɗen kisndam, gam walaa woɗnde innde feere nder duuniyaaru nde Allah hokki gam kisren e muuɗum, sey Yeesu tan.
44004013	Ɗum haaynii sernooɓe diina Yahuudu'en nde ɓe ngi'i Biiturus e Yahayya kulaay sam, hakko maa nde ɓe nani ɓe ladde'en, ɓe njanngaay boo. Ndeen ɓe annditi eɓe ngondunoo e Yeesu.
44004014	Ammaa nde ɓe ngi'i neɗɗo jamɗitinaaɗo oon e darodii e maɓɓe, walaa fuu ko ɓe mbaawi vi'igo.
44004015	Ɓe mbi'i Biiturus e Yahayya mburtinee yaasi hawriinde gam ɓe mbaɗa caawara.
44004016	Eɓe mbi'a~: — Noye mbaɗanten ɓe'e worɓe~? Daahir jooɗiiɓe Urusaliima fuu nanii ɓe mbaɗii alaama kaayniiɗum, kadimaa boo en mbaawataa yeddugo ɗum.
44004017	Ammaa gam haɗgo haala kaan sankitaago nder yimɓe, sey mbagginen ɓe to' ɓe mbolvan koo moye nder innde Yeesu.
44004018	Ndeen ɓe nodditi ɓe kadimaa, ɓe mbaggini ɓe to' ɓe mbolvu, to' ɓe ekkitin nder innde Yeesu.
44004019	Ammaa Biiturus e Yahayya toontii ɓe mbi'i~: — Onon e ko'e mooɗon ndaaree, ɗume ɓuri vooɗgo yeeso Allah~: ɗowtanaago on, na ɗowtanaago Allah~?
44004020	Minon kam, doole min caaydina ko min ngi'i e gite amin, e ko min nani e noppi amin.
44004021	Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e darvooɓe ɓesdi vaggingo lilaaɓe. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, ɓe njoofi ɓe, ɓe keɓaay laawol no ɓe cerniranta ɓe, sabu yimɓe fuu e ngetta Allah dow ko waɗi.
44004022	Gam oon jamɗitinaaɗo e kaayniiɗum ɗuum, duuɓi ma'ako ɓurii arba'iin (40).
44004023	Nde ɓe njoofaa, Biiturus e Yahayya co''ii to yimɓe mu''en, ngeccii ɓe ko mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e darvooɓe mbi'i ɓe fuu.
44004024	Nde ɓeen nani ɗum, ɓe fuu ɓe maalti Allah e ɓernde wo'ore, ɓe mbi'i~: — Yaa Allah, tagɗo dow e lees e maayo e ko woni nder ma'ajum fuu,
44004025	aan volvi e honnduko maama amin Dawda maccuɗo maaɗa gada e Ruhu Ceniiɗo biiɗo~: «~Gam ɗume leƴƴi ɗi laataaki Yahuudu'en monna~? Gam ɗume yimɓe nyumi nyumooji mehereeji~?
44004026	Laamiiɓe lesɗe ciryanake haɓre, aardiiɓe kawritii e kaɓa e Jawmiraawo e Almasiifu muuɗum.~»
44004027	— Goonga, nder nde'e si'ire Hiruudus e Bilaatus kawtii ko'e mu''en e yimɓe Isiraa'iila e goɗɗi leƴƴi, faa ɓe kaɓa e Yeesu maccuɗo maaɗa ceniiɗo mo cuɓɗaa,
44004028	sabu ɓe kuwii ko aartuɗaa ciryiɗaa e baawɗe maaɗa e nyumo maaɗa fuu.
44004029	Jo'oni Jawmiraawo, nan bolle maɓɓe kalluɗe, hokku maccuɓe maaɗa baawɗe saaydingo bolle maaɗa fuu e semmbee,
44004030	vanngin baawɗe maaɗa, yamɗitin ɓe njamɗaa, waɗ alaamaaji e kuuɗe kaayniiɗe nder innde Yeesu maccuɗo maaɗa ceniiɗo.
44004031	Nde ɓe keyni toraago Allah, yaayre ɗoon to ɓe kawriti dimmbi. Ɓe fuu ɓe kebbinaa Ruhu Ceniiɗo, ɓe nga'ajini bolle Allah naa e kulol.
44004032	Jama'aare goonɗinɓe ɓeen fuu no ɓernde wo'ore, hakkiilo wo'oto. Ɓe kawriti ko ɓe ngoodi fuu. Nder maɓɓe walaa biiɗo kanyum tan jeyi jawdi muuɗum.
44004033	E baawɗe ɗuuɗɗe lilaaɓe caaydiniri ummitineeki Yeesu Jawmiraawo, kadimaa boo Allah barkiɗini koo moye maɓɓe e barkaa ɗuuɗka.
44004034	-
44004035	Walaa koo moye nder maɓɓe heppi goɗɗum, sabu woonɓe gese e gure fuu coorrii ɗe, kokkii ceede ɗeen nder juuɗe lilaaɓe, gam ɓe nje'eda koo moye maɓɓe fuu ko haani gam muuɗum.
44004036	E woodi goɗɗo Lewinkeejo, neɗɗo lesdi Kiparus bi'eteeɗo Yusufu, mo lilaaɓe tokani Barnabas (ma'ana innde ndeen woni cemmbiɗinoowo ɓerɗe).
44004037	Kanko boo o soorri ngesaa ma'ako, o waddi ceede ma'aka o hokki ɗe lilaaɓe.
44005001	Ammaa e woodi goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Anaaniyas e debbo muuɗum Safiira. Kanko boo o soorri ngesaa ma'ako.
44005002	O senndi ceede dow anndaangal debbo ma'ako. O suuɗi goɗɗe, ndeen o yahari koriiɗe o hokki lilaaɓe.
44005003	Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Anaaniyas, ko jeyi ngoorɗaa Ceyɗaan natti ɓernde maaɗa, faa pevanɗaa Ruhu Ceniiɗo, cuuɗɗaa goɗɗe ceede coggu ngesaa maaɗa~?
44005004	Ila a soorraay ka, wanaa ka maaɗa~? Nde coorruɗaa ka, aan jogii ceede ma'aka naa~? Ko jeyi mbaɗanɗaa noon~? Wanaa yimɓe pevanɗaa, Allah pevanɗaa.
44005005	Nde Anaaniyas nani bolle ɗeen, o do''ii o maayi. Kulol manngol nanngi nanɓe ɗum fuu.
44005006	Kaye'en ummii taari mo, ƴefti mo mburtini mo yaasi, uvoyi mo.
44005007	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, kama awaaji tati, sey raa debbo ma'ako wari nattoyi. O anndaa ko laatii.
44005008	Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Yeccam, koo ɗum ɗe'e ceede tan coorruɗon ngesaa mooɗon kaan naa~? O toontii Biiturus o vi'i~: — Ee ɗum noon min coorri ka.
44005009	Ndeen Biiturus vi'i mo~: — Ko jeyi aan e koree maaɗa kawtuɗon hoore gam godaago Ruhu Jawmiraawo~? Raa uvoyɓe gorko maaɗa ɗoon ngara, aan boo ɓe njaharete~!
44005010	Ɗoon e ɗoon kanko maa o do''ii faro kosɗe Biiturus, o maayi. Kaye'en natti, tawi o maayɗo, ɓe ƴefti mo, ɓe mburtini mo, ɓe uvoyi mo takkol gorko ma'ako.
44005011	Kulol manngol nanngi ikiliisiya e nanɓe ɗum fuu.
44005012	Lilaaɓe mbaɗii alaamaaji e kuuɗe kaayniiɗe ɗuuɗɗe nder yimɓe. Goonɗinɓe Yeesu fuu e kawrita nder rumpaaru Suleymaanu, ɓe fuu ɓe nyumo wo'oto.
44005013	Nder yimɓe horiiɓe fuu walaa kawritɗo e maɓɓe gam kulol, ammaa e noon fuu yimɓe e teddina ɓe.
44005014	Koo ɗume wakkaci yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe worɓe e rewɓe, e ɓesdoo nder goonɗinɓe Jawmiraawo,
44005015	faa yimɓe e ƴefta ɓe njamɗaa, e mburtina ɓe yaasi dow laabi, e mballina ɓe dow leece e daage, gam to Biiturus wari, koo mbeelu muuɗum meema woɓɓe maɓɓe.
44005016	Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ivoyɓe ci'e piliiɗe Urusaliima ngaddi ɓe njamɗaa e woonɓe ginnaaji. Ɓe fuu ɓe keɓi yamɗitineego.
44005017	Ndeen nalwiiru lilaaɓe heevi ɓerɗe aardiiɗo diina mawɗo Yahuudu'en e wonduɓe e ma'ako, waato goonɗinɓe ekkitinol Saduuki'en.
44005018	Ɓe nanngii lilaaɓe, ɓe omndi ɓe nder kaso.
44005019	Ammaa nder jemmaare ndeen, malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo omtani ɓe dammuɗe kaso, vurtinii ɓe, vi'i ɓe~:
44005020	— Njahee ndaree nder Wuro Allah Seniingo, ngeccee yimɓe fuu habaru yonki kesum.
44005021	Nde ɓe nani ka, ɓe nattoyii nder Wuro Allah Seniingo ila bimbi, eɓe ekkitina yimɓe. Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo e wonduɓe e ma'ako noddoyi Kawtal Sernooɓe Diina Yahuudu'en e darvooɓe Isiraa'iila fuu. Ɓe mbi'i lilaaɓe mburtinoyee gada nder kaso, ngaddee.
44005022	Ammaa nde reenooɓe njahi, ɓe tawaay lilaaɓe nder kaso. Ɓe co''ii, ɓe mbi'i Kawtal Sernooɓe Diina Yahuudu'en~:
44005023	— Min tawii kaso e omndii korey, reenooɓe e ndarii faro dammuɗe, ammaa nde min omti, min tawaay koo go'oto nder.
44005024	Nde mawɗo reenooɓe Wuro Seniingo e aardiiɓe diina nani ɗum, ɗum waanni ɓe. Ɓe anndaa ko laatotoo dow ma'ajum.
44005025	Ndeen goɗɗo wari, yeccii ɓe vi'i~: — Raa worɓe ɓe omndunooɗon nder kaso toon nder Wuro Allah Seniingo nga'ajina~!
44005026	Ndeen mawɗo reenooɓe oon yahadi e reenooɓe, ɓe ngaddi lilaaɓe. Ammaa ɓe ngaddiraay ɓe e semmbee, gam eɓe kula to' yimɓe perdu ɓe kaaƴe.
44005027	Nde ɓe ngaddi ɓe, ɓe ndarni ɓe yeeso Kawtal Sernooɓe Yahuudu'en. Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo feli ɓe
44005028	vi'i~: — Min kaɗii on ekkitingo nder nde'e innde, ammaa onon on cankitii wa'aji mooɗon nder Urusaliima fuu. Kadimaa eɗon ngiɗi yowango min hakke maayde neɗɗo oon.
44005029	Biiturus e lilaaɓe toontii ɓe mbi'i~: — Doole min ɗowtanoo Allah dow e yimɓe.
44005030	Allah mo maamiraaɓe meeɗen ummitinii Yeesu mo mbarɗon gada e ɓilgo mo dow gaafagal.
44005031	Kanko Allah teddinii mo, jo''inii mo e junngo muuɗum nyaamo, o waɗii mo laamiiɗo e kisnoowo, gam yimɓe Isiraa'iila tuuba, ɓe keɓa ya'afuye hakkeeji maɓɓe.
44005032	Minon ngoni caaydu'en habaru ɗuum. Ruhu Ceniiɗo mo Allah hokki ɓeen ɗowtantooɓe mo boo, e saaydii ɗum.
44005033	Nde mawɓe ɓeen nani ɗum, ɓe monnaa korey, ɓe ngiɗi wargo lilaaɓe.
44005034	Ammaa goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Gamaaliyel ummii darii hakkunde Kawtal Sernooɓe Yahuudu'en. Kanko o Fariisaajo, moodibbo Tawreeta Muusa, mawɗo nder yimɓe fuu. O vi'i lilaaɓe mburtinee seɗɗa.
44005035	Ɓaawo ɓe mburtinaama, o vi'i kawtal ngaal~: — Onon Isiraa'iila'en, ndeenee ko'e mooɗon e ɓe'e yimɓe, e ko ngiɗɗon waɗango ɓe.
44005036	Neeɓaay ko goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Tewdas vanngi. O hooƴii hoore ma'ako kama o mawɗo. Faro yimɓe keme nayo (400) tokki mo. O waraama, tokkunooɓe mo fuu cankitake, walaa koo go'oto dariiɗo.
44005037	Ɓaawo ma'ako, Yahuuda Gaaliilankeejo wari wakkaci limgal, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe tokki mo. Kanko boo o waraa, tokkunooɓe mo fuu cankitii.
44005038	Jo'oni, emi vi'a on~: ngoɗɗee e yimɓe ɓeen, ngooree ɓe. Gam kul nyumooji maɓɓe e kuugal maɓɓe to yimɓe ivi, ɗum majjey.
44005039	Ammaa to ɗum ivoyii to Allah, ndeen kam on mbaawataa majjingo ɗum. Kakkilee, to' on kaɓ e Allah~!
44005040	Kawtal Sernooɓe Yahuudu'en jaɓi ko o vi'i. Sey ɓe nodditi lilaaɓe ɓe piyi ɓe, ɓe mbi'i ɓe to' ɓe ɓesdu volvugo nder innde Yeesu. Ndeen ɓe njoofi ɓe.
44005041	Lilaaɓe mburtoyii nder Kawtal Sernooɓe Yahuudu'en e velvelo sabu Allah mawninii ɓe faa fotnii ɓe torreego e semtineego gam Yeesu.
44005042	Koo ndeye nyanndeere eɓe nga'ajina Habaru Yeesu Almasiifu Belɗum, eɓe ekkitina nder Wuro Allah Seniingo e nder gure fuu.
44006001	Nder balɗe ɗeen, goonɗinɓe Yeesu e ɓesdoo ɗuuɗgo. Sey Yahuudu'en volvooɓe helenankoore pe'ii Yahuudu'en volvooɓe ibraaninkoore, gam rewɓe mu''en gowro'en cenndantaake nyaamdu ko horiiɓe fuu cenndantee.
44006002	Lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo noddi hawriinde goonɗinɓe fuu, ɓe mbi'i~: — Minon ɗum haanaay min ngoora wa'ajaago voliinde Allah gam senndugo nyaamdu.
44006003	Banndiraaɓe, cuɓee worɓe njoveeɗiɗo nder mooɗon hoolaaɓe, heeɓɓe Ruhu Ceniiɗo e hakkiilo, gam min kokka ɓe kuugal ngaal.
44006004	Ammaa minon, ngooree min ti'ino waɗgo do'aare e wa'ajingo voliinde Allah.
44006005	Haala kaan boo velii goonɗinɓe fuu. Ndeen ɓe cuɓii Istefaanus, neɗɗo goonɗinɗo Allah, keeɓɗo Ruhu Ceniiɗo, e Filibus e Porokorus e Nikanor e Timon e Parmenas e Nikolas ivoyɗo Antaakiya nattuɗo diina Yahuudu'en.
44006006	Ɓe ndarni ɓe yeeso lilaaɓe. Lilaaɓe njowani ɓe juuɗe mu''en, mbaɗani ɓe do'aare.
44006007	Voliinde Allah ɓesdi sankitaago, goonɗinɓe Yeesu boo e ɓesdoo ɗuuɗgo nder si'ire Urusaliima korey, faa aardiiɓe diina Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe ngoonɗini Yeesu.
44006008	Istefaanus keeɓɗo barkaaji e baawɗe Allah, waɗii kuuɗe kaayniiɗe e alaamaaji mawɗi yeeso yimɓe.
44006009	Ammaa e woodi woɓɓe nder suudu wa'ajordu vi'eteendu wa'ajordu rimɗinaaɓe, e woɓɓe ivoyɓe si'ire Sireene e si'ire Aleksandiri e lesdi Siliikiya e lesdi Aasiya ɓe ummanii mo, eɓe njeddootira e ma'ako.
44006010	Ammaa ɓe tampi yeddugo mo, gam bolle anndal ɗe o volvanta ɓe ivoyɗe e Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
44006011	Ndeen ɓe kokki woɓɓe ceede gam mbi'a nanii emo huɗa innde Muusa e Allah.
44006012	Noon ɓe umminiri ɓerɗe yimɓe e darvooɓe e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta. Ɓe nanngi Istefaanus ɓe njahari mo yeeso Kawtal Sernooɓe Yahuudu'en
44006013	ɓe ngaddi saaydooɓe fevooɓe, ɓeen mbi'i~: — O'o neɗɗo woorataa huɗgo Wuro Allah Seniingo e Tawreeta Muusa.
44006014	Min nanii emo vi'a Yeesu mo Najaratu no yibbiney Wuro Allah Seniingo, o waylitey ndonuuji ɗi Muusa hokkunoo en.
44006015	Sey sernooɓe Yahuudu'en jooɗiiɓe toon fuu ndaari Istefaanus, ɓe ngi'i yeeso ma'ako e nanndi e yeeso malaa'ikaajo.
44007001	Ndeen aardiiɗo diina mawɗo ƴami Istefaanus~: — Ko ɓe mbi'i dow maaɗa ɗum goonga naa~?
44007002	Istefaanus toontii mo vi'i~: — Banndiraaɓe e baabaaji, ngewanee yam~! Allah mawɗo vannganii maama meeɗen Ibraahim nde o wonnoo lesdi Mesopotaamiya, ko hokka o jooɗoo lesdi Haaran.
44007003	O vi'i mo~: «~Vurta lesdi maaɗa e lenyol maaɗa, njahaa lesdi ndi kolleymaami.~»
44007004	Ndeen Ibraahim vurtii lesdi Kaldiya, o yahi o jooɗii nder lesdi Haaran. Ɓaawo maayde baaba ma'ako, Allah wooncini mo, waddi mo nder lesdi ndi njooɗiiɗon jo'oni.
44007005	Allah hokkaay mo ndonu lesdi ndiin, koo yaaɓande wo'ore, ammaa o waɗanii mo alkawal hokkugo mo ndi, ndi laatoo halal ma'ako, kanko e danygol ma'ako, koo nde laatii o walaa ɓiɗɗo e wakkaci ɗuum tawo.
44007006	Allah vi'i mo~: «~Danygol maaɗa no jooɗoto nder lesdi njanandi, ɓe laatoto maccuɓe, ɓe torrete duuɓi keme nayi (400).
44007007	Ammaa mi sernaney lenyol macciɗinngol ɓe. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, ɓe mburtoto ɓe njagganoo yam nder nde'e yaayre.~»
44007008	Ndeen Allah waɗani Ibraahim alkawal. Naadeeki laatii alaama alkawal ngaal. Nde Ibraahim rimi Iciyaaku, o naadii mo nyannde joveetataɓre. Noon Iciyaaku boo naadiri Yaakuubu. Yaakuubu boo naadi ɓiɓɓe muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo, kamɓe ngoni maamiraaɓe meeɗen.
44007009	Maamiraaɓe meeɗen nanii nalwiiru Yusufu, ɓe coorri mo, o laatii maccuɗo nder lesdi Misira. Ammaa Allah e wondi e ma'ako,
44007010	o hisni mo e torraaji ma'ako fuu. Allah hokki mo togu e hakkiilo yeeso Fira'awna, laamiiɗo Misira. Oon waɗii mo mawɗo lesdi Misira faa e wuro muuɗum fuu.
44007011	Sey veelo waɗi nder lesdi Misira, faa nder lesdi Kana'aana fuu. Ngo torri yimɓe korey, faa maamiraaɓe meeɗen keɓaay ko nyaami.
44007012	Nde Yaakuubu nani e woodi nyaamdu nder lesdi Misira, o lili maamiraaɓe meeɗen toon jahal aranal. Ɓe ngarti, ɓe co''ii kadimaa.
44007013	Nder jahaangal maɓɓe ɗiɗaɓal Yusufu annditini hoore muuɗum e rimdaaɓe muuɗum. Fira'awna boo anndi yimɓe Yusufu.
44007014	Ndeen Yusufu liloyi ɓe, ɓe ngadda baaba muuɗum Yaakuubu e wuro muuɗum fuu. Ɗuuɗal maɓɓe waɗi yimɓe saba'iin e njovo (75).
44007015	Noon Yaakuubu yahari lesdi Misira. O maayi toon, kanko e maamiraaɓe meeɗen.
44007016	Ɓe njaharaa Cekem, ɓe uvaa toon nder yenaande nde Ibraahim soodi e ɓiɓɓe Hamor e ceede ajurfaari.
44007017	Nde alkawal ngal Allah waɗannoo Ibraahim ɓadii heeɓgo, yimɓe Ibraaninkoo'en ɗuuɗii nder lesdi Misira.
44007018	E wakkaci ɗuum goɗɗo laamiiɗo mo anndaa Yusufu laamii dow lesdi Misira.
44007019	Laamiiɗo oon ƴoyni lenyol meeɗen, o torri maamiraaɓe meeɗen, faa o dooli ɓe ɓe kibina ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe, maaya.
44007020	Nder wakkaci ɗuum Muusa danyaa, o velii Allah korey. O reenaa nder wuro baaba ma'ako lebbi tati.
44007021	Nde o hibinaa, ɓii Fira'awna debbo hooƴi mo, laatini mo ɓiyum.
44007022	Noon Muusa jannginiraa anndal Misira'en fuu, o laatii baawɗo haala e kuuɗe fuu.
44007023	Nde Muusa waɗi duuɓi arba'iin (40), o nyumii vallugo banndiraaɓe ma'ako Isiraa'iila'en.
44007024	Nde o yi'i Misirankeejo e torra go'oto nder maɓɓe, o jinngani neɗɗo ma'ako torreteeɗo, o fiyi Misirankeejo, o wari ɗum.
44007025	Emo tammii banndiraaɓe ma'ako no annditey Allah no hisnirey ɓe gada e ma'ako, ammaa ɓe annditaay.
44007026	Jonto ma'ajum o tawi ɗiɗo maɓɓe e kaɓa. O yiɗi henndugo ɓe, o vi'i~: «~Higooɓe am, onon on banndiraaɓe~! Ko jeyi njokkirton~?~»
44007027	Sey torreyɗo banndum oon tuurii Muusa vuttudu, vi'i mo~: «~Moye waɗ maa aardiiɗo e cernanoowo min~?
44007028	Miin maa a yiɗi wargo yam, noon no mbarduɗaa Misirankeejo mo keenya naa~?~»
44007029	Nde Muusa nani bolle ɗeen o doggi, o laatii jananno nder lesdi Madiyan. Toon o danyanaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe ɗiɗo.
44007030	Ɓaawo o waɗii duuɓi arba'iin (40) toon, malaa'ikaajo vanngani mo nder ɗemɗe yiite huɓɓunge nder vaafre toon nder ladde, faro vaamnde Sinaay.
44007031	Nde Muusa yi'i nge, nge haaynii ɗum, o ɓattii nge gam o raara, sey o nani voliinde Jawmiraawo e vi'a~:
44007032	«~Miin woni Allah mo maamiraaɓe maaɗa, Allah mo Ibraahim, Allah mo Iciyaaku, Allah mo Yaakuubu. Muusa darii e diwna, hulii raargo.~»
44007033	«~Jawmiraawo vi'i mo~: Faɗɗita paɗe maaɗa, gam yaayre to ndariɗaa no seniinde.
44007034	Mi yi'ii torraa yimɓe am wonɓe lesdi Misira, mi nanii bojji maɓɓe, mi jippoyake gam hisnugo ɓe. Jo'oni, war mi lil maa lesdi Misira.~»
44007035	Muusa oon woni mo ɓiɓɓe Isiraa'iila calinoo ɓe mbi'i~: «~Moye waɗ maa aardiiɗo e cernanoowo min~?~» Kanko woni mo Allah liloyi, waɗi mo aardiiɗo e kisnoowo gada e baawɗe malaa'ikaajo banngannooɗo mo nder vaafre huɓɓunoonde.
44007036	Kanko aardii ɓe, ɓe mburtii lesdi Misira. O waɗii kuuɗe kaayniiɗe e alaamaaji nder lesdi Misira e nder Maayo Voɗeewo e nder ladde duuɓi arba'iin (40).
44007037	Muusa oon vi'ii ɓiɓɓe Isiraa'iila~: «~Allah no lildoyey on annabiijo kama am, iveyɗo nder banndiraaɓe mooɗon.~»
44007038	Muusa e wondi e maamiraaɓe meeɗen nder ladde. Emo wondi e malaa'ikaajo bolidiɗɗo e ma'ako dow vaamnde Sinaay. Sey Allah hokki mo habaru kokkeyɗum yonki faa o hokka en ɗum.
44007039	Ammaa maamiraaɓe meeɗen njaɓaay ɗowtanaago mo. Ɓe calake mo, nyumooji maɓɓe mbittii lesdi Misira.
44007040	Ɓe mbi'i Haruuna~: «~Waɗan en allaaji aardotooɗi en, gam en anndaa ko laatanii Muusa burtinoyɗo en lesdi Misira.~»
44007041	Nder balɗe ɗeen ɓe mbayli gagel, ɓe laatini ngel allah maɓɓe, ɓe mbaɗani ngel sadaka, ɓe nani belɗum ko ɓe mbayli.
44007042	Allah hokkiti ɓe ɓaawo, woori ɓe ɓe tokka koode dow, kama ko vinndaa nder defte annabo'en~: «~Onon yimɓe Isiraa'iila~: miin mbaɗanɗon sadakaaji e kirseteeɗi duuɓi arba'iin (40) ɗi mbaɗɗon nder ladde naa~?
44007043	A'aa, on mbaɗanaay yam. On ndoondake suudu gumki mooɗon Molok, e gumki hoodere mooɗon Refan, gumkiiji ɗi mbaɗɗon gam cujjidanon ɗi~! Gam ma'ajum mi laggey on, mi yahara on toon lesdi Babiila.~»
44007044	Istefaanus ɓesdi vi'igo~: — Maamiraaɓe meeɗen e ngondunoo e Suudu Fottirde nder ladde. Suudu nduun wa'araama noon no Allah tindiniri Muusa.
44007045	Maamiraaɓe meeɗen ndoni suudu nduun. Ɓe ndillidi e ma'aru wakkaci nde Jocuwa aardii ɓe. Ɓe nattini ndu lesdi ndi ɓe te'eti gada e leƴƴi ɗi Allah laggi. Suudu nduun boo e ɗoon faa wargo wakkaci Dawda.
44007046	Dawda heɓii togu yeeso Allah. O torii nyiɓgo suudu gam teddingo Allah mo Yaakuubu, ammaa o heɓaay nyiɓgo ndu.
44007047	Suleymaanu kam nyiɓi suudu nduun.
44007048	Ammaa Allah no Mawɗo, o jooɗataako nder cuuɗi ɗi yimɓe nyiɓi, kama no annabiijo vi'i~:
44007049	«~Jawmiraawo vi'i~: Dow woni jooɗorgal laamu am, lesdi woni jaaɓruɗum kosɗe am. Iri nduye suudu nyiɓanton yam~? Ndeye yaayre poofteymi~?
44007050	Wanaa miin tagi ɗen ɗoon ku'uje fuu e baawɗe am naa~?~»
44007051	Istefaanus ɓesdi vi'igo~: — Onon yo'ora-ko'e'en, ɓe ɓerɗe keefeere, ɓe noppi caliiɗi nango haala Allah. Dum eɗon kaɓa e Ruhu Ceniiɗo kama no maamiraaɓe mooɗon kaɓruno.
44007052	Annabiijo moye woni maamiraaɓe mooɗon torraay~? Faa ɓe mbari volvunooɓe habaru garol goongaajo oon ila o waraay. Jo'oni kanko, onon e ko'e mooɗon nyaami amaana ma'ako, mbari mo.
44007053	Onon on keɓii Tawreeta Muusa gada e juuɗe malaa'ika'en, ammaa on tokkaay ka.
44007054	Nde sernooɓe diina Yahuudu'en nani bolle ɗeen, ɓe kuunƴani mo korey, faa ɓe ndarii eɓe nyerƴindira nyiiƴe.
44007055	Ammaa kanko, keeɓɗo Ruhu Ceniiɗo, o tiggii dow o yi'i teddungal Allah, o yi'i Yeesu e darii e junngo Allah nyaamo.
44007056	O vi'i~: — Rah~! Emi ɗoon yi'a dow e omtii, Ɓii-Neɗɗo e darii e junngo Allah nyaamo.
44007057	Ɓe fuu ɓe ngulli e semmbee, ɓe cumɓi noppi maɓɓe, ɓe makkii e ma'ako jaawɗum,
44007058	ɓe mburtini mo si'ire, ɓe perdi mo kaaƴe. Caaydu'en boo ndesi kolte mu''en faro kosɗe kayeejo bi'eteeɗo Saawulu.
44007059	Eɓe perda Istefaanus kaaƴe, kanyum boo e waɗa do'aare e vi'a~: — Yaa Yeesu Jawmiraawo, jaɓ yonki am~!
44007060	Ndeen o tuggi koppi ma'ako, o wulli e semmbee, o vi'i~: — Yaa Jawmiraawo, ta'a yowan ɓe ɗu'um hakke~! Nde o vi'i noon, o maayi.
44008001	Saawulu boo jaɓii bareeki Istefaanus. Ɓaawo nyanndeere ndeen, torraa makka warani ikiliisiya ngonka Urusaliima. Goonɗinɓe fuu cankitii nder lesɗe Yahuudiya e Samaariya, lilaaɓe tan korii toon Urusaliima.
44008002	Woɓɓe hulooɓe Allah uvi Istefaanus, ɓe mboyi maayde ma'ako korey.
44008003	Ammaa Saawulu raari halkugo ikiliisiya. Emo natta wuro-wuro, emo nannga goonɗinɓe worɓe e rewɓe, emo dasa ɓe, emo omnda ɓe nder kaso.
44008004	Ndeen sankitaaɓe ɓeen mbaɗi ga yiilaago e nga'ajina Habaru Belɗum.
44008005	Filibus yahi woɗnde si'ire nder lesdi Samaariya, emo wa'ajina habaru Almasiifu.
44008006	Yimɓe fuu ngewii ko Filibus wa'ajoto, nde ɓe ngi'i alaamaaji kaayniiɗi ɗi o waɗi.
