44024021	to naa haala ngo'ota tan ka mbi'imi nde ndariimi yeeso maɓɓe, townumi voliinde mbi'imi~: «~Gam ummitineeki maayɓe cernanɗon yam hannde~!~»
44024022	Nde Felikus nani ka, o laggi ɓe, gam emo anndi diina kaan. O vi'i~: — To Lisiyas mawɗo soojeeji warii, mi sernaney on.
44024023	O vi'i aardiiɗo soojeeji reena Bulus, ammaa to' o torru mo, to' o haɗ higooɓe ma'ako ngara to ma'ako, koo kuwana mo.
44024024	Balɗe seɗɗa ɓaawo ma'ajum Felikus wardi e debbo muuɗum Yahuuduujo bi'eteeɗo Durusila. O vi'i Bulus noddoyee, o yewanii bolle muuɗum dow habaru goonɗingo Yeesu Almasiifu.
44024025	Ammaa nde Bulus volvi dow aadilaaku e nantugo hoore e ceri'a nyannde-jahango, sey Felikus huli vi'i~: — Jo'oni ɗum heƴi, yah~! To mi heɓii wakkaci, mi nodditete.
44024026	Emo tammii Bulus no hokkey mo ceede. Kanjum waɗi emo nodda mo wakkaci fuu gam ɓe mbolida.
44024027	Ammaa ɓaawo duuɓi ɗiɗi, Porsiyus Festus roni laamu Felikus, laatii laamiiɗo. Felikus woori Bulus nder kaso, gam emo yiɗi velgo Yahuudu'en.
44025001	Balɗe tati ɓaawo Festus warii nder lesdi ndiin gam fuɗɗugo kuugal laamu muuɗum, o ummii Kaysaariya o yahi Urusaliima.
44025002	Toon mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en ngaddi wullaandu Bulus to ma'ako. Ɓe torii yerduye ma'ako
44025003	o waddana ɓe Bulus Urusaliima, gam ɓe mbaɗii dabaree wargo mo dow laawol.
44025004	Festus toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Bulus e toon omndii nder kaso Kaysaariya. Miin e hoore am mi so''oto toon jaawɗum.
44025005	Gam ma'ajum, sey mawɓe mooɗon ngara njahada e am Kaysaariya, ɓe ngulloo neɗɗo oon toon, kul e woodi halleende nde o waɗi.
44025006	Festus jooɗii to maɓɓe faro balɗe joveetati koo sappo. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o so''ii si'ire Kaysaariya. Jonto ma'ajum o jooɗii yaayre ceri'a o vi'i Bulus waddee.
44025007	Nde Bulus wari, Yahuudu'en ivoyɓe Urusaliima tummbi mo, ɓe ngullorii mo gullaali ɗuuɗɗi naawɗi, ɗi ɓe mbaawaay tabbitingo.
44025008	Ndeen Bulus toontii ɓe vi'i~: — Mi waɗaay layfi, koo dow ceri'a Yahuudu'en, koo e Wuro Allah Seniingo, koo e laamiiɗo Roomankoo'en mawɗo boo.
44025009	Festus e yiɗi velgo Yahuudu'en, gam ma'ajum o ƴami Bulus o vi'i~: — Eɗa jaɓa yahago Urusaliima gam miin e hoore am mi sernan maa toon dow gullaali ɗiin naa~?
44025010	Bulus toontii mo vi'i~: — Emi ɗo'o darii yeeso sernirde laamiiɗo Roomankoo'en mawɗo, ɗo'o haani mi sernanee. Mi waɗanaay Yahuudu'en layfi. Aan e hoore maaɗa eɗa anndi ɗum.
44025011	Kul mi waɗii layfi ko foti wargo yam, mi salataako wareego. Ammaa kul ko ɓe ngullorii yam wanaa ɗum goonga, walaa baawɗo waɗgo yam nder juuɗe maɓɓe. Emi toroo mi sernanee yeeso Kaysar~!
44025012	Ɓaawo Festus volidii e hokkooɓe ɗum caawara, o toontii Bulus o vi'i~: — Nde a torake ceri'a maaɗa yaharee to Kaysar, a yahey faa to ma'ako~!
44025013	Balɗe seɗɗa ɓaawo ma'ajum laamiiɗo Agaripa e mawnum debbo bi'eteeɗo Bernis ngari si'ire Kaysaariya gam hinnugo Festus.
44025014	Nde ɓe mbaali balɗe seɗɗa toon, Festus yeccii laamiiɗo oon habaru Bulus o vi'i~: — E woodi goɗɗo neɗɗo mo laamiiɗo Felikus woori ɗo'o nder kaso.
44025015	Nde njahami Urusaliima, mawɓe aardiiɓe diina e arɗuɓe Yahuudu'en ngeccake yam habaru ma'ako, ɓe torii yam mi taƴana mo ceri'a bareeki.
44025016	Toontiimi mbi'imi ɓe, Roomankoo'en mboovaay sernango goɗɗo kul jooɗodaaki e wulliiɓe ɗum, o toontoo ko ɓe ngullorii mo.
44025017	Nde ngardumi e maɓɓe ɗo'o, miin boo mi neeɓtinaay koo seɗɗa. Jonto ma'ajum njooɗiimi dow jooɗorgal ceri'a, mbi'imi neɗɗo oon waddee.
44025018	Nde wulliiɓe mo ndarii faro ma'ako, ɓe ngullaaki mo koo wullaandu wo'oru kama ko tamminoomi.
44025019	Geddi tan ɓe mba'adi e ma'ako dow habaru diina maɓɓe, e goɗɗo maayɗo bi'eteeɗo Yeesu mo Bulus vi'i e foofa.
44025020	Miin boo nde laatii mi anndaa no liinyireymi haala kaan, ƴammoomi kul o jaɓii sernaneego toon Urusaliima.
44025021	Ammaa nde laatii o torake yam o waɗee e juuɗe Kaysar, mbi'imi o reenee toon faa mi heɓa lildugo mo to laamiiɗo Roomankoo'en mawɗo oon.
44025022	Ndeen Agaripa vi'i Festus~: — Miin e hoore am emi yiɗi yewanaago neɗɗo oon. Festus vi'i mo~: — A yewanto mo jahango.
44025023	Jonto ma'ajum Agaripa e Bernis ngari e teddungal manngal, ɓe natti nder suudu ceri'a mawndu, kamɓe e mawɓe soojeeji e aardiiɓe si'ire ndeen fuu. Ndeen Festus vi'i Bulus waddee.
44025024	Festus vi'i~: — Aan Agaripa laamiiɗo e jama'aare hawritɓe ɗo'o, on ngi'ii o'o neɗɗo. Yahuudu'en fuu ngullake mo to am nder Urusaliima faa ɗo'o, eɓe mbi'a o haanaa woordeego e yonki.
44025025	Miin e hoore am, mi tawii o waɗaay koo ɗume ko haani wargo mo. Ammaa nde laatii kanko e hoore ma'ako torii ceri'a ma'ako wutinee yaharee to Kaysar laamiiɗo, mi siryake dabaree lildugo mo toon.
44025026	Ammaa mi walaa haala ndariika dow ma'ako ka haani mi vinndana laamiiɗo oon. Kanjum waɗi ndarnumoomi yeeso mooɗon on fuu, gam ɗum liinyee yeeso maaɗa aan laamiiɗo Agaripa, gam to en ngewanake voliinde ma'ako mi heɓa ko mbinndumi.
44025027	Gam miin e giiɗe am, lildugo nanngaaɗo to laamiiɗo mawɗo, ɗum yeccaaki ko o nanngiraa, ɗum vemmbere.
44026001	Agaripa vi'i Bulus~: — A hokkaama voliinde, volvu haala maaɗa. Sey Bulus ƴefti junngo toontii mo vi'i~:
44026002	Aan laamiiɗo Agaripa, mi nanii belɗum heɓgo laawol volvugo yeeso maaɗa hannde dow ko Yahuudu'en ngullorii yam fuu,
44026003	gam a anndi finaatawaaji Yahuudu'en e geddi mu''en fuu. Gam ma'ajum emi toro ma, munyaa ngewanoɗaa yam.
44026004	Yahuudu'en fuu e anndi jo'onde am ila mi ɓinngel pamarel. Eɓe anndi no njooɗoriimi nder lesdi am e nder Urusaliima fuu.
44026005	Kamɓe e ko'e maɓɓe, kul ɓe njaɓii saaydingo, eɓe anndi ila arande emi tokki laawol diina amin ɓurngol saɗgo ngol Fariisa'en.
44026006	Jo'oni emi darii ɗo'o yeeso mooɗon, emi sernanee gam tammunde am dow keeɓki alkawal ngal Allah waɗani maamiraaɓe amin.
44026007	Leƴƴi amin sappo e ɗiɗi fuu e ɗoon ndeenti tammunde keeɓki alkawal ngaal, kanjum waɗi eɓe kuwana Allah jemma e nyalawma. Aan laamiiɗo, gam daliila tammunde ndeen Yahuudu'en ngullii yam~!
44026008	Gam ɗume tammiiɗon Allah waawataa ummitingo maayɓe~?
44026009	Miin e hoore am, mi yillakeno bonnugo innde Yeesu mo Najaratu oon, gada e koo ngole laawol.
44026010	Mi waɗii ɗum nder Urusaliima. Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina kokkii yam baawɗe mi omnda goonɗinɓe Yeesu ɗuuɗɓe nder kaso. Nde ɓe cernanaa ceri'a wareego, miin boo mi jaɓii ɗum.
44026011	Mi torrii ɓe nde ɗuuɗɗum nder cuuɗi-ga'ajorɗi fuu. Mi doolii ɓe yeddugo goonɗinki maɓɓe. Mi monnaama ɓe korey, faa emi yilloyoo ɓe nder ci'e jananne, emi torra ɓe.
44026012	Nde mawɓe aardiiɓe diina kokki yam baawɗe nanngugo goonɗinɓe si'ire Dimaska, sey ndillirmi toon.
44026013	Laamiiɗo, emi ɗoon dow laawol caka nyalawma, sey ngi'imi jayngol ivoyngol gada dow, ngol yaynanii yam, miin e yahadiɗɗaaɓe am fuu. Jayngol ngool ɓurii jayngol naange.
44026014	Min fuu min ndo''ii e lesdi, sey nanmi voliinde e vi'a yam nder ibraaninkoore~: «~Saawulu, Saawulu, ko jeyi torrataa yam~? A ɗoon nawnira hoore maaɗa e gaaba ka ngaabiɗaa yam.~»
44026015	Toontiimi mbi'imi~: «~Aan a moye Jawmiraawo~?~» O vi'i yam~: «~Miin woni Yeesu mo torrata.
44026016	Umma dara. Mi vannganii ma, gam mi suɓii ma laatoɗaa maccuɗo am, caaydinaa ko ngiiɗaa dow e am jo'oni, e ko mbannginaneymaami ɗo'o yeeso.
44026017	Mi hisnete e juuɗe Yahuudu'en e yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, ɓe lileymaami to mu''en,
44026018	gam mbumtinaa ɓe, ɓe mburtoyoo nder niɓre, ɓe ngarta nder jayngol, ɓe mburtoyoo nder baawɗe Ceyɗaan, ɓe ngarta nder baawɗe Allah. Kama noon ɓe keɓrata ya'afaneego hakkeeji maɓɓe, ɓe keɓa geɗal ndonu maɓɓe nder senaaɓe am, gada e goonɗinki ki ɓe ngoonɗini yam.~»
44026019	Laamiiɗo Agaripa, kanjum waɗi mi salaaki ɗowtanaago ko ngi'imi, ivonoyɗum yam gada dow.
44026020	Mi aartii wa'ajingo yimɓe Dimaska, ndeen yimɓe Urusaliima e lesdi Yahuudiya fuu. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, tokkumi nder yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, mbi'imi ɓe ɓe tuuba, ɓe ngaylitoyoo to Allah, ɓe kuwa kuuɗe kolleyɗe ɓe tuubii.
44026021	Kanjum waɗi Yahuudu'en nanngi yam nder Wuro Allah Seniingo, ɓe ndaari wargo yam.
44026022	Ammaa Allah vallii yam faa hannde. Emi ɗoon darii hokka caaydaaku am yeeso mawɓe e famarɓe fuu. Mi vi'aay koo ɗume sey ko annabo'en e Muusa mbi'i no laatoto,
44026023	waato Almasiifu no torrete, o aartey ummitaago nder maayɓe. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o wa'ajiney habaru jayngol. Wanaa Yahuudu'en tan o wa'ajinta, ammaa faa e yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en.
44026024	Bulus e nder bolle, sey Festus towni voliinde vi'i~: — Bulus, hoore maaɗa waylitake~! Ɗuuɗal anndal maaɗa haanyii ma~!
44026025	Bulus toontii mo vi'i~: — Yaa Festus mawɗo, mi haaŋaaka. Ko mbi'imi ɗum bolle goongaaje ɗe ma'ana.
44026026	Laamiiɗo Agaripa boo e anndi ku'uje ɗeen fuu. Kanjum waɗi mi hulaay vi'igo ɗum yeeso ma'ako. Gam mi tabbitinii ɗe'e ku'uje cuuɗanaaki mo, sabu ɗe mbaɗaaka nder suuɗeefi.
44026027	Laamiiɗo Agaripa~! A goonɗinii annabo'en naa~? Emi anndi a goonɗinii~!
44026028	Agaripa vi'i Bulus~: — Nder wakkaci seɗɗa eɗa yilloo laatingo yam goonɗinɗo Almasiifu naa~?
44026029	Bulus toontii mo vi'i~: — Koo e jaawɗum, koo naa e jaawɗum, emi toroo Allah gam aan e nanɓe yam hannde fuu laatooɗon kama no laatiimi, ammaa naa e ɗi'i sarkaaji.
44026030	Ndeen Agaripa e Festus e Bernis e jooɗodinooɓe e mu''en fuu ummii ndilli.
44026031	Nde ɓe mburtii wuro ngoon, ɓe mbi'i hakkunde maɓɓe~: — O'o gorko waɗaay ko foti wargo mo, koo omndugo mo nder kaso.
44026032	Ndeen Agaripa vi'i Festus~: — O'o gorko o yoofeteno kul o ƴamaayno ceri'a ma'ako yaharee to laamiiɗo Roomankoo'en mawɗo.
44027001	Nde ɓe tabbitini min njahey lesdi Itaaliya nder akali ndiyam, Bulus e woɓɓe nanngaaɓe mbaɗaama nder junngo mawɗo soojeeji bi'eteeɗo Juliyus. Kanko woni aardiiɗo soojeeji hemre nder yeɓre soojeeji vi'eteende soojeeji Kaysar.
44027002	Min natti akali ndiyam ivoyki Adaramitiyum jaheyki ci'e gonɗe fonngo maayo nder lesdi Aasiya, min ndilli. Emin ngondi e Aristarkus neɗɗo lesdi Makedooniya ivoyɗo si'ire Tesaloonika.
44027003	Jonto ma'ajum min ngari si'ire Sidon. Juliyus holli Bulus enɗam, o jaɓii Bulus yaha to higooɓe muuɗum gam ɓe mballa ɗum.
44027004	Nde min ummii ɗoon, min tokki fu'una lesdi Kiparus ngonndi nder maayo, gam henndu semmbiɗiraa toon.
44027005	Min kuulti maayo wonngo faro Siliikiya e Pamfiliya, min njottii Mira nder lesdi Lisiya.
44027006	Toon aardiiɗo soojeeji oon heɓani min akali ivoyki Aleksandiri pa'aki Itaaliya, o nattini min ki.
44027007	Balɗe ɗuuɗɗe akali amin waɗi e yahara se'ese-se'ese. Da bone min njottorii faro si'ire Kinidus. Nde henndu haɗi min yahago yeeso, sey min tokki foombina faa min njahari Kereeta, lesdi ngonndi nder maayo. Nde min ngutii yaayre Salmoone, min tokkiri fonngo Kereeta, toon to henndu semmbiɗiraa.
44027008	Da bone min kuultiri fonngo, min njottii yaayre vi'eteende Jipporde Vooɗnde, takkol si'ire Lasiya.
44027009	Nde laatii min mbonnii wakkaci ɗuuɗɗum faa juulɗe ittugo hakkeeji ngutii. Nder wakkaci ma'ajum jahaangal nder akali ndiyam e saɗi korey. Gam ma'ajum Bulus hokki ɓe caawara
44027010	o vi'i~: — Banndiraaɓe, mi yi'ii nga'al jahaangal no saɗey. Ɗum sooyey akali e siri ma'aki fuu. Naa kanjum tan, ammaa faa e enen en nder haɗari sooygo yonkiiji meeɗen.
44027011	Ammaa mawɗo soojeeji ɓurii jaɓgo haala jawmu akali e pooɗoowo ki dow e haala Bulus.
44027012	Nde laatii jipporde akale ndiyam to ɓe ngoni vooɗaa nder dabbunde, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe wonɓe nder akali ɓurii yiɗgo ɓe njaha Feniika, gam ɓe ndabba toon, to ɗum heɓoto. Feniika woni jipporde akale ndiyam nder lesdi Kereeta, hu'ucunde hiirna ba woyla e hiirna ba foombina.
44027013	Nde kenel foombina fuɗɗi visgo, huwooɓe akali tammii ɓe mbaawey yahago to ɓe ngiɗi. Ɓe itti paddorɗum akali, min tokki faro fonngo Kereeta min ndilli.
44027014	Ammaa ɓaawo ma'ajum seɗɗa, henndu semmbiɗndu vi'eteendu henndu woyla ba fu'una ummoyii gada runnde Kereeta.
44027015	Henndu nduun taɓɓii akali, faa min mbaawaay luhurugo e ma'aru. Gam ma'ajum min ngoori ndu laggi ki.
44027016	Nde min ngari e iifi dunngel pamarel bi'eteengel Kawda, ngel ustani min henndu. Da bone min nanngiri akalel pamarel gam to' ngel halku,
44027017	min nattini ngel nder akali makki. Ndeen ɓe njippini ɓoggi lees akali ɓe kaɓɓi ki, gam to' ki fecco. Ɓe kuli to' ki nuf nder jaarengol nder ndiyam faro Sirtus. Gam ma'ajum ɓe njippini gude jahareyɗe akali, ɓe ngoori henndu laggi ki.
44027018	Henndu nduun waɗi ga visgo e semmbee. Gam ma'ajum jonto ɓe puɗɗi hibingo dowle akali nder maayo.
44027019	Nder nyalaande tataɓre, kamɓe e ko'e maɓɓe ɓe kibini kuuruɗum akali kiin.
44027020	Balɗe ɗuuɗɗe min ngi'aay naange e koode, gam henndu nduun tokkii visgo e semmbee, faa min itti tammunde hisgo.
44027021	Nde min mbaɗi balɗe min nyaamaay, sey Bulus darii yeeso maɓɓe vi'i~: — Kul on njaɓno haala am, on dilloytaano Kereeta, daa ɗi'i torraaji e boneeji keɓataano en.
44027022	Ammaa jo'oni emi toroo on~: cemmbiɗinee ɓerɗe mooɗon, gam koo go'oto mooɗon yonki muuɗum halkataa, sey ki'i akali tan.
44027023	Allah Jawmiraawo mo tokkumi liloyii malaa'ikaajo muuɗum to am hanki.
44027024	O vi'i yam~: «~Bulus, ta'a hul, a daroto yeeso laamiiɗo Roomankoo'en mawɗo. Kadimaa Allah no hokkete barkaa muuɗum gada e hisnugo yonkiiji yimɓe wonduɓe e maaɗa fuu.~»
44027025	Gam ma'ajum cemmbiɗinee ɓerɗe mooɗon, gam mi goonɗinii ko Allah vi'i yam ɗum laatoto daahir.
44027026	Ammaa doole henndu yahara en goɗngel ƴoolel gonngel nder ndiyam.
44027027	Nder jemmaare sappo e nayaɓre, nde henndu woni e laggi min nder maayo Adiriyaatik, caka jemma huwooɓe akali e tammii min ɓadake lesdi.
44027028	Ɓe njurii ɓoggol kaɓɓanaangol njamndi teddundi, ɓe tawi luggeenga maayo faro piyanɗe arba'iin (40). Ɓe njahi yeeso seɗɗa, ɓe peri kadimaa, ɓe tawi luggeenga ma'ago faro piyanɗe talaatiin (30).
44027029	Ɓe kuli to' henndu yaharu akali nder kaaƴe, gam ma'ajum ɓe njippini jamɗe paddorɗe nayi ɓaawo ma'aki, ɓe ndari, eɓe kaaɓi bimbi veeta.
44027030	Nde laatii huwooɓe akali e ngiɗi vurtaago ndilla, sey ɓe njippini akalel pamarel nder ndiyam, ɓe mbaɗi kama ɓe njippiney paddorɗe yeeso akali.
44027031	Sey Bulus vi'i soojeeji e mawɗo mu''en~: — Kul huwooɓe ɓeen ndaraaki nder akali on kisataa.
44027032	Ndeen soojeeji ɗiin taƴi ɓoggi jogiiɗi akalel pamarel, ɓe ngoori ngel, ngel tokki ndiyam.
44027033	Nde ɓadii veetgo, Bulus torii ɓe ɓe fuu, ɓe nyaama. O vi'i~: — Hannde woni nyalaande sappo e nayaɓre eɗon munyi, on nyaamaay koo ɗume.
44027034	Gam ma'ajum emi toroo on, nyaamon gam kison. Gam koo laasol hoore go'oto mooɗon halkataa.
44027035	Nde o vi'i noon, o hooƴi buroodi o yetti Allah yeeso maɓɓe ɓe fuu, o yevi ɗum o fuɗɗi nyaamgo.
44027036	Ndeen ɓe fuu hakkiilooji maɓɓe nde''iti. Kamɓe maa ɓe kooƴi ɓe nyaami.
44027037	Minon wonɓe nder akali min mbaɗii yimɓe keme ɗiɗo e saba'iin e njoveego'o (276).
44027038	Nde ɓe nyaami faa ɓe kaari, ɓe kooƴi buhuuji alkamaari gonɗi nder akali kiin ɓe peri ɗi nder maayo, gam ɓe ustana ki tedduɗum.
44027039	Nde veeti huwooɓe akali annditaay lesdi to ɓe ngari. Ɓe ngi'ii yaayre to woodi njaareendi. Eɓe ngiɗi yaharugo akali kiin toon, kul ɓe mbaawi.
44027040	Ɓe taƴi ɓoggi jamɗe paddorɗe akali, ɓe ngoori ɗe nder ndiyam, ɓe piɓti ɓoggi kaɓɓirɗi leltirɗe ma'aki. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, ɓe ƴefti wudere woɗnde e hoore ma'aki, gam henndu laggira ki yeeso, yahara ki e lesdi.
44027041	Ammaa akali warii to ndiyam luggiraa, hoore ma'aki tiggi, ki nufi e tudubaare njaareendi nder ndiyam, faa ki dimmbataako sam. Ɓoggi ndiyam boo piyii ɓaawo ma'aki, faa ki feccii.
44027042	Soojeeji boo ngiɗi wargo ɓe kaso, gam to' goɗɗo nder maɓɓe yinoo nder ndiyam daɗa.
44027043	Ammaa nde aardiiɗo soojeeji oon e yiɗi hisnugo Bulus, sey o haɗi ɓe waɗgo ko ɓe ngiɗi, o vi'i waawɓe ndiyam aarta nattugo nder ma'ajam kuulta,
44027044	ndeen horiiɓe mbaɗɗii kaatakooje e guditale leɗɗe akali jeɓɗe. Noon min fuu min mbaɗi min njottii lesdi jam.
44028001	Nde min kisi, min nanii runnde ndeen Malta vi'etee.
44028002	Yimɓe lesdi ndiin njaɓɓorii min e yiɗde mawnde. Ɓe njaɓɓii min, ɓe kuɓɓani min yiite, gam ndiyam e toɓa, peewol boo e woodi.
44028003	Bulus hawriti leɗɗe emo waɗa ɗe nder yiite ngeen, sey gulɗum yiite vurtini mbo'odi nder ma'aje, ndi taarii e junngo ma'ako, ndi fe''i mo.
44028004	Nde yimɓe ɓeen ngi'i mbo'odi ndiin e taari e junngo Bulus, ɓe mbi'i hakkunde maɓɓe~: — Goonga, o'o neɗɗo o baɗoowo war-hoore. Koo nde o hisi gada e maayo, ammaa e noon fuu ceri'a Allah woordataa mo e yonki.
44028005	Ammaa Bulus fi'itini mbo'odi ndiin nder yiite, o nanaay naawɗum koo seɗɗa.
44028006	Eɓe tammii junngo ma'ako no ɓuutey, koo o do''oo ɗoon e ɗoon o maaya. Ammaa nde yaawtii ɓe ngi'i walaa ko yani mo, nyumooji maɓɓe ngaylitii dow ma'ako ɓe mbi'i o allah feere.
44028007	Faro yaayre ndeen e woodi gese mawɗo lesdi ndiin bi'eteeɗo Pubiliyus. O jaɓɓii min booɗɗum, o veerni min to ma'ako balɗe tati.
44028008	Baaba Pubiliyus e ɗoon waalii no jontaaɗo, emo riiwoo ƴiiƴam. Bulus yahi to ma'ako, yowi juuɗe muuɗum dow ma'ako, waɗani mo do'aare, o yamɗiti.
44028009	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, ɓe njamɗaa wonɓe nder lesdi ndiin ngari to Bulus, o yamɗitini ɓe.
44028010	Ɓe teddini min korey. Nde min ngari dillugo, ɓe kokki min ko min ngiɗi fuu gam jahaangal.
44028011	Ɓaawo lebbi tati, min natti nder akali ivoyki Aleksandiri noddirteeki Siwtaaɓe Worɓe, dabbunooki nder lesdi Malta, min ndilli.
44028012	Min njottii si'ire vi'eteende Sirakus, min mbaɗi balɗe tati toon.
44028013	Ndeen min natti akali, min tokki fonngo maayo faa min njahari si'ire Regiyum. Jonto ma'ajum henndu foombina fuɗɗi visgo. Nder balɗe ɗiɗi min ngari si'ire Putiyooli.
44028014	Min tawi banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe toon. Ɓe torii min, min njooɗoo to maɓɓe asaveere wo'ore. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, min njottoyii Rooma.
44028015	Nde banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe wonɓe Rooma nani habaru garol amin, ɓe njahi luumo Apiyus e yaayre vi'eteende Jipporɗe Tati, gam taɓɓaago min. Nde Bulus yi'i ɓe o yetti Allah, ɓernde ma'ako boo semmbiɗi.
44028016	Nde min ngari si'ire Rooma, Bulus wooraa jippoo nder wuro haya feere muuɗum, kanko e soojeeru reeneyndu mo.
44028017	Balɗe tati ɓaawo garki amin, Bulus noddi mawɓe Yahuudu'en. Nde ɓe kawriti o vi'i ɓe~: — Banndiraaɓe~! Mi waɗaay layfi fuu dow yimɓe meeɗen koo e finaatawaaji maamiraaɓe meeɗen, ammaa mi nanngaama Urusaliima mi waɗaama nder juuɗe Roomankoo'en.
44028018	Ɓe ƴami yam ko mbaɗmi. Ɓe ngiɗii yoofgo yam, gam ɓe tawii mi waɗaay goɗɗum ko foti wargo yam.
44028019	Ammaa nde laatii Yahuudu'en njaɓaay mi yoofee, doole mi toroo ceri'a am waddee to laamiiɗo Rooma mawɗo, koo nde laatii mi walaa wullaandu fuu dow lenyol am.
44028020	Kanjum waɗi noddumi on gam mi yi'a on, mi volida e mooɗon. Gam daliila tammunde Isiraa'iila'en kaɓɓiraami ɗi'i sarkaaji.
44028021	Yahuudu'en mbi'i mo~: — Min keɓaay ɗereewol ivoyngol lesdi Yahuudiya anndineyngol min habaru maaɗa. Kadimaa walaa koo go'oto nder banndiraaɓe amin garɗo yeccii min habaru ko vooɗaa dow maaɗa.
44028022	Ammaa emin ngiɗi ngeccoɗaa min nyumo maaɗa, gam emin anndi yimɓe koo toye e njedda diina ka tokkuɗaa.
44028023	Ɓe ndesi nyalaande nde ɓe co''oytoo to ma'ako. Nde nyanndeere ndeen wari, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngari kawriti veerdude Bulus. Ila bimbi faa alaasara emo wa'ajina ɓe, emo yeccoo ɓe habaru laamu Allah. Emo holla ɓe habaru Yeesu nder Tawreeta Muusa e nder defte annabo'en.
44028024	Woɓɓe nder maɓɓe njaɓi ko o vi'i, woɓɓe boo njaɓaay.
44028025	Ila ɓe cankitaaki, ɓe ngeddootiri hakkunde maɓɓe. Ndeen Bulus ɓesdi vi'igo ɓe voliinde wo'ore, o vi'i~: — Ruhu Ceniiɗo vi'ii goonga, nde o volvani maamiraaɓe mooɗon gada e honnduko annabi Ecaaya o vi'i~:
44028026	«~Yah to ɓe'e yimɓe, mbi'aa ɓe~: On naney, ammaa on pahamataa, on ndaarey, ammaa on ngi'ataa.
44028027	Gam ɓerɗe ngo'ol lenyol njo'orii. Ɓe cumɓii noppi maɓɓe, ɓe muuɓnii gite maɓɓe, gam to' gite maɓɓe ngi', to' noppi maɓɓe nan, to' ɓerɗe maɓɓe pahamu, faa ɓe mbittoya to am, mi yamɗitina ɓe.~»
44028028	Bulus ɓesdii vi'igo~: — Anndee, Allah lildii kisndam muuɗum to yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en. Kamɓe ɓe ngewotoo~! [
44028029	Nde Bulus vi'i bolle ɗeen, Yahuudu'en mburtii e njeddindira e semmbee hakkunde mu''en.]
44028030	Bulus waɗi duuɓi ɗiɗi nder wuro haya ngoon. Emo jaɓɓoo koo moye garɗo to ma'ako,
44028031	emo wa'ajina ɓe habaru laamu Allah, emo ekkitina ɓe habaru Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo e semmbee, walaa kaɗɗo mo.
45001001	Miin Bulus maccuɗo Yeesu Almasiifu vinndi ngo'ol ɗereewol. Allah noddii yam mi laatoo lilaaɗo, o suɓii yam mi wa'ajina Habaru ma'ako Belɗum.
45001002	Habaru Belɗum ɗuum, o waɗiino alkawal ma'ajum nder Deftere Seniinde ilaa, gada e annabo'en ma'ako.
45001003	Habaru ɗuum haala Ɓiyiiko volvata, iɓɗo e lenyol Dawda dow e ɓanndu,
45001004	ammaa e baawɗe mawɗe Allah holliri Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen no Ɓiyiiko, nde o ummitini mo nder maayde barkaa Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
45001005	Gada e ma'ako keɓmi barkaa laataago lilaaɗo, gam faa mi nodda leƴƴi duuniyaaru fuu ngoonɗina mo, ɗowtanoo mo.
45001006	Onon maa, on nder yimɓe ɓeen ɓe Allah noddi, gam laatooɗon ɓe Yeesu Almasiifu.
45001007	Emi hinna on, on fuu wonɓe si'ire Rooma, ɓe Allah yiɗi noddi gam laatoo seniiɓe. Barkaa e jam Allah Baaba meeɗen e Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo wondu e mooɗon.
45001008	Aran, emi yetta Allah am barkaa Yeesu Almasiifu gam mooɗon on fuu, sabu habaru goonɗinki mooɗon e volvee nder duuniyaaru fuu.
45001009	Allah mo njaggantoomi e ɓernde wo'ore gada e wa'ajingo habaru Ɓiyiiko woni caayduujo am, wakkaci mbaɗeymi do'aare fuu, emi nyumta on.
45001010	Koo ndeye nde mbaɗeymi do'aare emi toroo Allah omtana yam laawol wargo to mooɗon, to o jaɓii.
45001011	Emi yiɗi yi'igo on korey, gam mi waddana on kokkal ngal Ruhu Allah hokki yam, faa ɗum semmbiɗina on.
45001012	Ko ngiɗmi vi'igo woni cemmbiɗindiren. Mi semmbiɗinira on goonɗinki am, onon maa cemmbiɗiniron yam ki mooɗon.
45001013	Banndiraaɓe, emi yiɗi anndon, mi waɗii anniya wargo to mooɗon nde ɗuuɗɗum, ammaa ɗum heɓaaki faa jo'oni. Emi yiɗi heɓgo goonɗinɓe Yeesu nder mooɗon, noon no ngiɗrumi heɓrugo ɓe nder goɗɗi leƴƴi.
45001014	Doole mi yaha to yimɓe fuu, jooɗiiɓe si'ire e jooɗiiɓe ladde, jannguɓe e ɓe njanngaay.
45001015	Kanjum waɗi emi haaɓi wa'ajingo on Habaru Belɗum, onon maa jooɗiiɓe si'ire Rooma.
45001016	Mi nanataa cemtuɗum wa'ajingo Habaru Belɗum, gam ɗum baawɗe Allah baaweyɗe hisnugo koo moye goonɗinɗo mo, aran Yahuudu'en, ɓaawo ɗoon yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en.
45001017	Habaru Belɗum ɗuum e holla aadilaaku Allah keɓeteeɗum gada e goonɗingo Yeesu tan. Kama ko vinndaa nder Deftere~: «~Aadaliijo no foofrey e goonɗinki.~»
45001018	Allah e holla huunƴere muuɗum gada asama, dow yimɓe ɓe kulataa mo e dow kuuɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe ɗe ɓe nyo'irta goonga.
45001019	Gam ko neɗɗo waawi anndugo dow Allah fuu e laaɓani ɓe, sabu Allah hollii ɓe ɗum.
45001020	Gam gada tageeki duuniyaaru, ko yi'ataake e Allah, waato baawɗe ma'ako ɗe nde'ataa e allaaku ma'ako, e ɗum fahamee nder ko o tagi. Gam ma'ajum yimɓe ngalaa hujja sam.
45001021	Koo nde eɓe anndi Allah, ɓe teddinaay mo, ɓe ngettaay mo, noon no haani Allah waɗanee, ammaa nyumooji maɓɓe majjii, fahamu vurtii ɓerɗe maɓɓe, niɓre natti.
45001022	Eɓe ɗoon manto, eɓe tammii ɓe ƴoyɓe, ammaa ɓe vemmbuɓe.
45001023	Ɓe mbattindirii teddungal Allah tabbitɗo e ngal gumkiiji baɗaaɗi nder nanndi neɗɗo maayoowo, e nder nanndi colli e bisaaji e ko dasotoo.
45001024	Gam ma'ajum Allah yoofi ɓe ɓe tokka suunooji ɓerɗe maɓɓe nefniiɗi, ɓe nyiddindira ɓalli maɓɓe e kuuɗe cemtiniiɗe.
45001025	Ɓe mbattindirii goonga Allah e fewre, ɓe cujjidanii ko tagaa, ɓe njagganii ɗum mbattudi Allah tagoowo, kaanɗo maalteego faa abadaa~! Aamiin.
45001026	Gam ma'ajum Allah yoofi ɓe ɓe tokka suunooji maɓɓe cemtiniiɗi. Rewɓe maɓɓe kibinii baaldal tawaangal, mbittii e mbaalda hakkunde mu''en.
45001027	Noon boo worɓe ngoorii waaldugo e rewɓe, suuno waaldugo e worɓe nanngii ɓe. Ɓe mba'adii ko semtinii hakkunde maɓɓe. Noon ɓe pooɗrani ko'e maɓɓe laada majjere maɓɓe.
45001028	Nde laatii ɓe njaɓaay anndugo Allah, kam waɗi Allah yoofi ɓe ɓe tokka nyumooji maɓɓe leliiɗi, ɓe mbaɗa ko haanaa waɗeego.
45001029	Eɓe keevi koo iri kaye ciya goonga e halleende e koɗey e gikku kallungu. Eɓe keevi nalwiiru e war-hoore, e kaɓe e ƴoynugo yimɓe e ɓerɗe ɓaleeje. Ɓe nyo''ooɓe,
45001030	e hallinooɓe woɓɓe, ɓe wanywanyɓe Allah, ɓe toonoro. Ɓe mawnitiiɓe, manooɓe ko'e mu''en, figginooɓe laabi halleende dum. Ɓe ɗowtantaako danyooɓe mu''en.
45001031	Ɓe ngalaa hakkiilo, ɓe ngalaa alkawal, ɓe ngalaa yiɗde, ɓe ngalaa yurmeende.
45001032	Koo to eɓe anndi dooka Allah vi'ii waɗooɓe iri kuuɗe ɗeen e kaani mbaree, e noon fuu naa ɓe kuwey ɗe tan, faa maa eɓe mana waɗooɓe kuuɗe ɗeen.
45002001	Gam ma'ajum, aan cappotooɗo layfi ɗum goɗɗo waɗi, koo a moye, a accitantaake. Gam nde cappiɗaa layfi goɗɗo fuu, hoore maaɗa cernanta, sabu layfi ɗum capportoɗaa goɗɗo, aan maa a waɗa ɗum.
45002002	Eɗen anndi ceri'a ka Allah taƴanta waɗooɓe iri kuuɗe ɗeen, ɗum goonga o serniranta ɓe.
45002003	Kadi aan baɗeyɗo layfi ɗum sapportoo woɓɓe, a tammii a hisey ceri'a Allah naa~?
45002004	Nakay a yavii caahu Allah ɗuuɗngu e munyal ma'ako~? A anndaa caahu Allah nguun, kam yaharey maa to tuubataa naa~?
45002005	Ammaa a yo'orinii hoore maaɗa, ɓernde maaɗa salake tuubgo. Gam ma'ajum eɗa mooɓtana hoore maaɗa huunƴere Allah reentunde ma nyannde nde Allah vannginta huunƴere muuɗum e ceri'a muuɗum ngoongaha.
45002006	Nyannde ndeen o biyotoo koo moye deydey e kuuɗe muuɗum.
45002007	Yonki ɗum faa abadaa no jippanto ti'iniiɓe yillaago manoore Allah e darajja e ko tabotoo gada e waɗgo ko vooɗi.
45002008	Ammaa elto Allah e huunƴere muuɗum no yooftanto yiɗanɓe ko'e mu''en, lati goonga tokki ciya goonga.
45002009	Bone e jiɓayeere no yooftanto koo moye baɗeyɗo ko halli, aran Yahuudu'en, ndeen yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en.
45002010	Ammaa darajja e manoore e jam no laatanto waɗeyɓe ko vooɗi fuu, aran Yahuudu'en, ndeen yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en,
45002011	sabu Allah ɓurdindirtaa yimɓe.
45002012	Baɗɗo hakke dow e ciya anndugo Tawreeta no halkey, koo to serniranaaka Tawreeta. Ammaa annduɗo Tawreeta, to waɗii hakke, no sernirante Tawreeta.
45002013	Gam wanaa nanooɓe ko Tawreeta vi'i, Allah raarata aadali'en yeeso muuɗum, ammaa huwooɓe ko ka vi'i.
45002014	Yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en ngalaa Tawreeta. Ammaa to ɓe kuwii ko Tawreeta vi'i e yiɗde maɓɓe, ɓe kollii eɓe anndi ko haani waɗee, koo to ɓe ngalaa Tawreeta.
45002015	Ɓe kollii ko Tawreeta vi'i e vinndii nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe. Nyumo ɓerɗe maɓɓe boo e holla ɓe ɗum, gam to go'o nyumooji ɓerɗe maɓɓe e pela ɓe, to go'o maa eɗi kokka ɓe goonga.
45002016	Ɗum fuu ɗum vanngey nyannde nde Allah sernanta nyumooji yimɓe cuuɗiiɗi, gada e Yeesu Almasiifu. Kanjum Habaru Belɗum ɗum nga'ajineymi vi'ii.
45002017	Aan biiɗo no Yahuuduujo, ɓaariiɗo Tawreeta, mantortooɗo anndugo Allah,
45002018	a vi'ii a anndi ko Allah yiɗi, Tawreeta ekkitinii ma suɓgo ko ɓuri vooɗgo,
45002019	a hoolii eɗa waawi ɗowgo bumɗo, a jayngol gam wonɓe nder niɓre,
45002020	a eltoowo ɓe ngalaa anndal, a jannginoowo bilki'en, ɗum fuu a vi'i ɗum gam Tawreeta hokkii ma goonga e anndal keeɓɗum.
45002021	Ee aan ekkitinoowo woɓɓe, a ekkitintaa hoore maaɗa naa~? Aan ga'ajotooɗo to' ɗum wujju, a wujjataa naa~?
45002022	Aan bi'eyɗo to' ɗum waɗ njeenu, a waɗataa njeenu naa~? Aan nefoowo gumkiiji, a wujjataa ko woni nder suudu ma'aji naa~?
45002023	Aan mantortooɗo Tawreeta, a yavortaako Allah gada e huultugo Tawreeta ma'ako naa~?
45002024	Noon no ɗum vinndiraa nder Deftere~: «~Gam daliila mooɗon, onon Yahuudu'en, yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en e kallina innde Allah.~»
45002025	E goonga naadeeki maaɗa e woodi botee, to a ɗowtanii ko Tawreeta vi'i. Ammaa to a ɗowtanaaki ko Tawreeta vi'i, aan e mo naadaaka fuu on go'o.
45002026	Kadi, to mo naadaaka ɗowtanake ko Tawreeta vi'i, Allah raarataa mo kama naadaaɗo naa~?
45002027	Mo naadaaka, to ɗowtanake Tawreeta, no do''ete ceri'a, aan naadaaɗo goonɗo binndi Tawreeta fuu, ammaa ɗowtanaaki ka.
45002028	Gam wanaa ko yi'etee e ɓanndu laatinta neɗɗo Yahuuduujo, wanaa boo tayki nguru ɓanndu woni naadeeki goongahi.
45002029	Yahuuduujo gada nder ɓernde, kam woni Yahuuduujo goongaajo, kadimaa naadeeki ki Ruhu waɗata nder ɓernde, kanki woni goongahi, naa baɗeteeki gada e ɗowtanaago ko vinndaa nder Tawreeta. Manoore iri o'o neɗɗo to Allah ivoyta, wanaa to yimɓe.
45003001	To noon, ɗume Yahuudu'en ɓurdi ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en~? Ɗume woni botee naadeeki~?
45003002	Botee ma'ajum e ɗuuɗi nder koo ngole laawol. Aran fuu, Yahuudu'en kokkaa bolle Allah.
45003003	E goonga, woɓɓe maɓɓe laataaki hoolaaɓe. Koo ciya hooleego maɓɓe e waawi haɗgo Allah laatoo koolniiɗo naa~?
45003004	Ɗum waawataa sam~! Koo to yimɓe fuu no fevooɓe, doole koo moye jaɓa Allah o goonga. Noon no ɗum vinndiraa nder Deftere~: «~Sey koo moye tabbitina haala maaɗa e woodi goonga, a jaaloto wullotooɓe ma dum.~»
45003005	Ammaa to ciya aadilaaku meeɗen e ɓesda hollugo aadilaaku Allah, noye mbi'eten~? Ndeen en mbaawi vi'igo Allah walaa aadilaaku to o jippinii huunƴere ma'ako dow meeɗen naa~? (Ɗo'o emi volva kama no neɗɗo mo anndaa Allah volvirta.)
45003006	Ɗum waɗataako sam~! Kul Allah walaa aadilaaku, ndeen noye o sernironoyta duuniyaaru~?
45003007	To ciya goonga am vallii yimɓe yi'igo goonga Allah e njaayri, faa eɓe mawnina mo, ndeen gam ɗume o sernantammi kama mo hakke faa jo'oni~?
45003008	To neɗɗo nyumrii noon, o vi'ey~: «~En mbaɗ ko halli gam ko vooɗi vurtoo nder ma'ajum.~» Woɓɓe e mbi'a miin vi'i noon, ammaa naa ɗum goonga. Kamɓe ɓe cernante deydey e bolle maɓɓe.
45003009	Too, noye mbi'eten~? Minon Yahuudu'en min ɓurii yimɓe horiiɓe naa~? Min ɓuraay ɓe sam~! Mi aartii mi hollii Yahuuduujo e mo laataaki Yahuuduujo fuu, lees baawɗe hakke ɓe ngoni.
45003010	Kama ko vinndaa nder Deftere~: «~Walaa aadaliijo, walaa koo go'oto,
45003011	walaa goonɗo fahamu, walaa gillotooɗo Allah.
45003012	Ɓe fuu ɓe celii laawol goonga, ɓe laatake mehere'en. Walaa kuweyɗo ko vooɗi, walaa koo go'oto.
45003013	Konnduɗe maɓɓe e laatii kama genaale omtiiɗe. Eɓe ƴoynira yimɓe ɗemɗe maɓɓe. Bolle maɓɓe e keevi tooke poosooje.
45003014	Konnduɗe maɓɓe e keevi ja'alooje e bolle mettuɗe.
45003015	Eɓe njawɗanoo rufgo ƴiiƴam.
45003016	To ɓe njahi fuu, sey to vonnere e bone waɗi.
45003017	Ɓe anndaa laawol waddugo jam.
45003018	Kulol Allah walaa nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.~»
45003019	Jo'oni en anndi ko Tawreeta vi'i fuu, eka vi'a ɗum wonɓe lees ma'aka, gam to' koo moye heɓ hujja, kadimaa yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu annda e lees ceri'a Allah.
45003020	Walaa keɓreyɗo aadilaaku yeeso Allah gada e ɗowtanaago Tawreeta. Gam ko ka waɗata woni, ka anndina neɗɗo hakke muuɗum.
45003021	Ammaa jo'oni Allah vannginii laawol ngol yimɓe tokkata laatoo aadali'en yeeso ma'ako. Laawol ngool heɓortaako e tokkugo Tawreeta. Kanjum Tawreeta e defte annabo'en mbi'ii dow ma'agol.
45003022	Laawol ngool woni goonɗingo Yeesu Almasiifu. Goonɗinɗo Yeesu fuu, Allah no laatiney mo aadaliijo yeeso muuɗum, gam kanko o feerɗindirtaa yimɓe,
45003023	gam ɓe fuu ɓe mbaɗii hakke, ɓe potaay heɓgo teddungal Allah.
45003024	Ammaa Allah enɗii ɓe, o laatinii ɓe aadali'en caahu. O waɗanii ɓe ɗum barkaa Yeesu Almasiifu coottiiɗo ɓe,
45003025	-
45003026	mo Allah laatini cakkiri, gam ittugo hakkeeji goonɗinɓe ƴiiƴam ma'ako fuu. Noon o holliri aadilaaku ma'ako. Ndeenno o sernanaay hakkeeji ɗi yimɓe mbaɗi gam munyal ma'ako, ammaa nder wakkaci ɗum ngonɗen jo'oni, o hollii o aadaliijo nde o laatini goonɗinɗo Yeesu fuu aadaliijo.
45003027	Kadi, e woodi ko mantortooɗen naa~? Ɗum walaa. Gam ɗume~? Gam en laataaki aadali'en gada e kuuɗe meeɗen, sey nii gada e goonɗingo Yeesu tan.
45003028	Gam en anndi gada e goonɗinki tan neɗɗo laatortoo aadaliijo yeeso Allah, naa e tokkugo ko Tawreeta vi'i.
45003029	Nakay Allah o Allah Yahuudu'en tan~? Asee, naa o Allah faa e leƴƴi ɗi laataaki Yahuudu'en~? Goonga, o Allah leƴƴi fuu.
45003030	Allah o go'oto, kanko laatinta naadaaɓe aadali'en gada e goonɗinki mu''en, ɓe naadaaka boo to ngoonɗinii o laatiney ɓe aadali'en.
45003031	To noon, en meheriɗiney Tawreeta gam en ngoonɗinii Yeesu naa~? Naa noon sam~! To goonga kam, en ɓesdanii ka darajja.
45004001	Too, noye mbi'eten dow Ibraahim maama amin, minon Yahuudu'en~? Ɗume o heɓi~?
45004002	Kul Ibraahim no laatorino aadaliijo gada e kuuɗe muuɗum, daa o heɓiino ko o mantorto. Ammaa yeeso Allah naa ɗum noon.
45004003	Raa ko Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Ibraahim goonɗinii Allah. Allah boo raarii mo aadaliijo.~»
45004004	Kuwoowo saahorantaake biya muuɗum, gam e haani o biyee kuugal ma'ako.
45004005	Ammaa mo huwaay koo ngale, to goonɗinii Allah laatinoowo ɓe hakke aadali'en, goonɗinɗo oon no raarete aadaliijo caahu.
45004006	Dawda maa volvii dow ma'ajum, nde o volvi dow barkaa neɗɗo mo Allah raari aadaliijo, naa gada e kuuɗe muuɗum. Raa no o vi'i~:
45004007	«~Barkaa laatanto yimɓe ɓe ɗum ya'afanii halleende mu''en, ɓe hakkeeji mu''en mooytaa.
45004008	Barkaa laatanto neɗɗo mo Jawmiraawo limaay hakke muuɗum.~»
45004009	Barkaa kaan e laatii gam Yahuudu'en tan, nakay faa e yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en~? En mbi'ii~: Ibraahim goonɗinii Allah, gam ma'ajum Allah raari mo o aadaliijo.
45004010	Ɗume wakkaci Allah raari Ibraahim aadaliijo~? Ko hokka o naadee, na ɓaawo naadeeki ma'ako~? Daahir ɗum waɗii ila o naadaaka, wanaa ɓaawo naadeeki ma'ako.
45004011	Naadeeki ki o waɗanaa e laatii alaama kolluɗum Allah raarii mo o aadaliijo, gam o goonɗinii Allah ko hokka o naadee. Gam ma'ajum Ibraahim laatake baaba goonɗinɓe fuu ɓe Allah raari aadali'en, koo to ɓe naadaaka.
45004012	Kanko boo laatii baaba naadaaɓe, ammaa wanaa naadaaɓe fuu, sey ɓeen tokkuɓe misaalu goonɗinki ma'ako ila o naadaakano.
45004013	Alkawal rongo duuniyaaru ngal Allah waɗani Ibraahim e asngol muuɗum, o waɗaay ngal gam Ibraahim tokkii ko Tawreeta vi'i, ammaa ɗum gam aadilaaku ngu o heɓri gada e goonɗingo Allah.
45004014	Kul tokkooɓe Tawreeta laatinoo ronooɓe duuniyaaru, daa goonɗinki laatake mehere, alkawal Allah boo walaa nafuuda fuu.
45004015	Tawreeta, huunƴere Allah tan waddata, ammaa to dooka walaa, huultugo ka boo walaa.
45004016	Gam ma'ajum alkawal Allah dow goonɗinki tan dari, gam faa ngal laatoo caahu, ngal tabbita dow asngol Ibraahim fuu. Ngal laataaki gam tokkooɓe ko Tawreeta vi'i tan, ammaa faa e gam goonɗinirɓe Allah noon no Ibraahim goonɗiniri mo. Ibraahim oon woni baaba meeɗen, en fuu.
45004017	Noon no ɗum vinndiraa nder Deftere~: «~Mi waɗii ma baaba leƴƴi ɗuuɗɗi.~» Kanko woni Baaba meeɗen yeeso Allah, mo o goonɗini, Allah kokkoowo maayɓe yonki, noddoowo ko walaa ɗum wara.
45004018	Ibraahim goonɗinii Allah, o waɗii tammunde heɓgo ɓinngel, koo nde daliila tammunde walaa. Kanjum waɗi o laatii baaba leƴƴi ɗuuɗɗi. Kadimaa Allah vi'ii mo~: «~Asngol maaɗa no ɗuuɗrey ba koode.~»
45004019	Ibraahim wooraay goonɗingo Allah, koo nde o yi'i ɓanndu ma'ako tampi, gam o yaharii faro duuɓi hemre, Saaratu koree ma'ako boo naywii rugum, waawataa saawgo.
45004020	Ibraahim waɗaay cekka dow alkawal ngal Allah waɗani mo, ammaa goonɗinki ma'ako semmbiɗinii mo, o maalti Allah.
45004021	O tabbitinii Allah e woodi baawɗe hebbingo alkawal muuɗum.
45004022	Kanjum waɗi~: «~Allah boo raari mo o aadaliijo.~»
45004023	Bolle ɗeen, wanaa gam ma'ako tan ɗe mbinndaa.
45004024	Ɗe mbinndaama gam meeɗen boo, enen ɓe Allah laatinta aadali'en, enen goonɗinɓe o ummitinii Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu nder maayde.
45004025	Yeesu oon waraama gam hakkeeji meeɗen, o ummitinaama nder maayde boo gam keɓen laataago aadali'en yeeso Allah.
45005001	Gam ma'ajum, jo'oni nde keɓɗen laataago aadali'en sabu goonɗinki, en ngoodi hooluye hakkunde meeɗen e Allah, barkaa Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu.
45005002	Kanko hokki en laawol heɓgo caahu Allah ngu ngonɗen nder muuɗum jo'oni. Kadimaa en ɗoon mbelmbelta, gam en ngoodi tammunde wondugo e teddungal Allah.
45005003	Naa kanjum tan, faa maa en ɗoon mbelmbelta koo nder torraaji ɗi njareten, gam en anndi ɗi ndimaney en munyal,
45005004	munyal no rimey ngorjaaku, ngorjaaku boo no rimey tabbitinki.
45005005	Tabbitinki kiin woorataa mbuusteeɗen sam, gam Allah loovii yiɗde muuɗum nder ɓerɗe meeɗen, gada e hokkugo en Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
45005006	Wakkaci nde tampuɗen waɗgo ko vooɗi, Almasiifu maayii gam meeɗen, enen waɗooɓe hakke. O maayii nder wakkaciire nde Allah taƴi.
45005007	Eɗum saɗi goɗɗo jaɓa maaygo mbattudi neɗɗo aadaliijo. Ɗum baɗoojum o heɓa ngorgu maaygo mbattudi neɗɗo geeto korey.
45005008	Ammaa Almasiifu maayii gam meeɗen wakkaci ngonnooɗen nder hakke. Noon Allah holliri no yiɗiri en.
45005009	Nde laatii jo'oni en keɓii aadilaaku gada e ƴiiƴam Almasiifu ndufaaɗam gam meeɗen, ndeen kam en tabbitinii o hisney en huunƴere Allah wareynde.
45005010	Koo ndeenno nde laatinooɗen wanywanyɓe Allah, o siryootirii en e hoore ma'ako, barkaa maayde Ɓiyiiko, hakko jo'oni nde ciryootirɗen e ma'ako, en tabbitinii Almasiifu no hisney en gam emo foofa.
45005011	Naa kanjum tan, ammaa en ɗoon mantoroo Allah barkaa Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu, ciryootirɗo en e Allah.
45005012	Gada e neɗɗo go'oto hakke nattiri duuniyaaru. Hakke ɗuum waddi maayde. Noon yimɓe fuu laatorii maayeyɓe, gam ɓe fuu ɓe mbaɗii hakke.
45005013	Goonga, hakke e ɗoon nder duuniyaaru ila Tawreeta waraay, ammaa Allah limataa ɗe to dooka walaa.
45005014	E noon fuu, gada jaamaniiru Aadamu faa wargo jaamaniiru Muusa, maayde laamake dow yimɓe fuu, faa e dow ɓeen ɓe mbaɗaay hakke iri ɗum Aadamu waɗi, kuultuɗo dooka Allah. Aadamu oon woni misaalu goɗɗo gareyɗo.
45005015	Ammaa caahu ngu Allah hokkata, fotnataake e hakke Aadamu. Daahir maayde warii dow yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, gam daliila hakke neɗɗo go'oto, ammaa enɗam e caahu ko Allah hokkata warii dow yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe gada e neɗɗo go'oto, waato Yeesu Almasiifu. Kanjum ɓuri koo ɗume fuu mawnugo.
45005016	Noon boo ko caahu Allah waddi e feerootiri e ko hakke neɗɗo go'oto waddi. Ceri'a Allah tokkoyka ɓaawo hakke go'otum waddii halkere, ammaa caahu Allah tokkoyngu ɓaawo hakkeeji ɗuuɗɗi, laatinii yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe aadali'en.
45005017	Maayde laamii dow daande koo moye gada e hakke neɗɗo go'oto, ammaa keɓɗo ɗuuɗal caahu Allah e kokkal laataago aadaliijo no laamoto nder yonki, gada e neɗɗo go'oto, waato Yeesu Almasiifu.
45005018	Noon no hakke neɗɗo go'oto waddirani yimɓe fuu ceri'a halkere, noon boo kuugal aadilaaku neɗɗo go'oto laatiniri yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe aadali'en hokki ɓe yonki.
45005019	Ciya ɗowtaare neɗɗo go'oto waɗi yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe laatake waɗooɓe hakke. Noon boo yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe no laatoto aadali'en gam neɗɗo go'oto ɗowtanake Allah.
45005020	Tawreeta waddaama gam ɓesdango boofi semmbee. Ammaa ɗoon to hakke ɓesdii fuu, ɗoon enɗam Allah maa ɓurata ɓesdaago.
45005021	Noon no hakke laamorii gada e maayde, noon boo enɗam Allah laamortoo gada e aadilaaku, gam yaharugo en nder yonki ɗum faa abadaa, gada e Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen.
45006001	Too, noye mbi'eten~? En njahey yeeso e waɗgo hakke gam enɗam Allah ɓesdoo naa~?
45006002	Ɗum waɗataako sam~! Gam to hakke, en maayɓe, noye kadimaa njahareten nder hakke~?
45006003	Eɗon anndi laaɓɗum baptisma ɗum mbaɗanaaɗen hawtii en e Yeesu Almasiifu, ɗum hawtii en boo e maayde ma'ako.
45006004	Nde mbaɗanaaɗen baptisma, ɗum nanndii kama en maaydii e Yeesu, en uɓdaama e ma'ako. Noon no Almasiifu ummitiniraa nder maayɓe gada e baawɗe Baabiraawo kaayniiɗe, noon enen boo poofreten foofaango heso.
45006005	Gam to en kawtii e ma'ako nder maayde nanndunde e nde ma'ako, ndeen kam en ummitoto nder maayde, noon no o ummitorii.
45006006	Eɗen anndi gikku meeɗen ngu ndeenno tiggidaama e Almasiifu dow gaafagal. Ɗum waɗii gam faa ɓanndu meeɗen woonndu hakke halka, to' en ɓesdu laataago maccuɓe hakke.
45006007	Sabu to neɗɗo maayii, hakke walaa baawɗe dow ma'ako kadin.
45006008	To en maaydii e Almasiifu, en tabbitinii en poofdey e ma'ako.
45006009	En anndi Almasiifu ummitiiɗo nder maayɓe, o ɓesdataa maaygo. Maayde hornaay heɓgo baawɗe dow ma'ako.
45006010	Wakkaci Almasiifu maayii, o maayii nde wo'ore gam o yeva baawɗe hakke faa abadaa. Foofaango ngo o foofata jo'oni, gam Allah o foofata.
45006011	Noon onon boo, ndaaree ko'e mooɗon kama maayɓe to hakke, ammaa foofeyɓe to Allah, gada e kawtal mooɗon e Yeesu Almasiifu.
45006012	Gam ma'ajum, to' on ngoor hakke laamoo dow ɓalli mooɗon maayeyɗi, faa tokkon ko ɗi ngiɗi.
45006013	To' on ngoor hakke huutinira ɓalli mooɗon gam waɗgo ko halli. Ammaa kokkee Allah ko'e mooɗon kama te'etaaɓe e junngo maayde, kokkaa yonki. Kokkee Allah ɓalli mooɗon fuu, gam o laatina ɗi kuutinirdi aadilaaku.
45006014	Hakke ɓesdataa laamaago dow mooɗon, gam naa lees Tawreeta ngonɗon, ammaa lees caahu Allah.
45006015	Noye mbi'eten~? En njahey yeeso e waɗgo hakke gam en lees caahu Allah, wanaa lees Tawreeta naa~? Naa noon sam~!
45006016	On pahamaay naa~? To on mbaɗii ko'e mooɗon e huwango goɗɗo faa ɗowtanooɗon ɗum, ndeen on laatake maccuɓe oon mo ɗowtantooɗon. To on ɗowtanake hakke on maayey, to on ɗowtanake Allah on laatotoo aadali'en.
45006017	Ammaa yettoore laatanoo Allah, gam ndeenno on maccuɓe hakke, ammaa jo'oni on ɗowtanake ekkitinol ngol ɗum ekkitini on e ɓerɗe mooɗon fuu.
45006018	On ndimɗinaama e hakke, on laatake maccuɓe aadilaaku.
45006019	Ɗo'o mi huutinirii misaalu maccungaaku gam fahamu mooɗon walaa semmbee. Ndeenno on mbaɗii ko'e mooɗon maccuɓe kuuɗe nefniiɗe e kalluɗe faa halleende ɓesdoo. Jo'oni laatinee ko'e mooɗon maccuɓe aadilaaku, gam faa njahon yeeso nder senaare.
45006020	Nde laatinooɗon maccuɓe hakke, walaa ko yaali on e kuuɗe aadilaaku.
45006021	Ɗume keɓnooɗon e kuuɗe mooɗon ɗe cemtirton jo'oni~? Gam timmoode kuuɗe ɗeen ɗum maayde~!
45006022	Ammaa jo'oni nde ndimɗinaaɗon e hakke, on laatake maccuɓe Allah. Ko ɗum rimata woni yahago yeeso nder senaare. Timmoode ma'ajum boo ɗum yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
45006023	To goonga kam, biya hakke ɗum maayde, ammaa Allah saahanake en yonki ɗum faa abadaa nder kawtal e Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen.
45007001	Banndiraaɓe, on fuu on pahamey ko ngiɗmi vi'igo, gam on anndi Tawreeta. On anndi Tawreeta e darvana neɗɗo wakkaci emo foofa.
45007002	Kama debbo koobgal, dooka haɓɓii mo e koree ma'ako to nii faa koree ma'ako e foofa. Ammaa to koree maayi, debbo oon fiɓtake gada e dooka kaɓɓindirka ɗum e koree muuɗum.
45007003	Gam ma'ajum, to o yahii to gorko feere ila koree ma'ako e foofa, o noddirtee jeenoowo. Ammaa to koree ma'ako maayii, o yoofake e dooka koobgal ngaal, ndeen to o yahanii gorko feere, o waɗaay njeenu.
45007004	Noon onon boo banndiraaɓe, maayde Almasiifu dow gaafagal waɗi onon maa laatiiɗon maayɓe to Tawreeta. Jo'oni on laatii maccuɓe goɗɗo feere, kanko woni Almasiifu ummitiiɗo nder maayde, gam faa laatooɗen nafooɓe Allah.
45007005	Wakkaci ko tokkunooɗen suunooji ɓalli meeɗen kalluɗi, Tawreeta semmbiɗini suunooji ɗiin, faa kuwen ko rimanta en maayde.
45007006	Ammaa jo'oni en ndimɗinaama e dookaaji Tawreeta macciɗinka en, gam en maaydii e Almasiifu. Jo'oni en mbaawi huwango Allah nder laawol kesol ngol Ruhu ma'ako, naa nder laawol kihingol ngol dookaaji binndaaɗi.
45007007	To noon, noye mbi'eten~? Tawreeta no hakke naa~? Naa noon sam~! Gam kul Tawreeta walaano, daa mi anndataa ɗume woni hakke. Kul Tawreeta vi'aayno~: «~Ta'a waɗ koɗey~», daa mi anndataa koɗey vooɗaa.
45007008	Naa kanjum tan, ammaa Tawreeta kaan hokki hakke laawol ummingo koo iri ngoye suuno koɗey nder ɓernde am. Gam to Tawreeta walaa, hakke walaa, ɗum maayi.
45007009	Ndeenno nde mi anndaano ko dooka haɗi, emi tammii mi walaa hakke. Ammaa nde anndumi ka, sey pahamumi mi huultii ka, mi baɗoowo hakke, mi maayɗo yeeso Allah.
45007010	Tawreeta kaanka hollugo laawol yonki ɗum faa abadaa, kanka fooɗani yam maayde.
45007011	Hakke heɓii laawol huutinirgo Tawreeta, ɗum ƴoyni yam, ɗum wari yam.
45007012	To Allah Tawreeta ivoyi, dookaaji ma'aka boo e laatii ceniiɗi, goongaaji, booɗɗi.
45007013	To noon, kan ɗoon Tawreeta mbooɗka kam fooɗani yam maayde naa~? Naa noon sam~! Hakke kam huutiniri ko vooɗi, fooɗani yam maayde, gam faa holla no hakke kat. Gada e laawol Tawreeta hakke holliri no hu'unde kalluɗum korey naa seɗɗa.
45007014	Eɗen anndi Tawreeta to Ruhu Ceniiɗo ivoyi, ammaa enen, e duuniyaaru iɓɗen, en maccuɓe hakke.
45007015	E goonga mi fahamataa ko mbaɗeymi. Gam naa ko ngiɗmi waɗgo mbaɗeymi, ammaa ko nganymi mbaɗeymi.
45007016	To mi waɗii ɗuum ko mi yiɗaa waɗgo, ndeen e ɗum holla mi jaɓii Tawreeta e vooɗi.
45007017	To noon, naa ɗum miin waɗata nde'e hu'unde, ammaa ɗum hakke gonɗe nder am.
45007018	Gam emi anndi goɗɗum booɗɗum walaa nder am, waato nder gikku am ngu hakke. Yiɗde waɗgo ko vooɗi e nder ɓernde am, ammaa mi waawataa waɗgo ɗum.
45007019	Mi waɗataa booɗɗum ɗum ngiɗmi waɗgo, sey kalluɗum ɗum mi yiɗaa mbaɗeymi.
45007020	To mi waɗii ko mi yiɗaa, ɗum hollii naa ɗum miin waɗata ɗum, ammaa ɗum hakke jooɗiiɗum nder ɓernde am.
45007021	Raa ko ngi'imi e waɗa nder am~: nde ngiɗmi waɗgo ko vooɗi fuu, sey mi yi'a halleende e takkii e am.
45007022	Toon nder ɓernde am, emi nana belɗum dooka ivoyka to Allah,
45007023	ammaa emi yi'a dooka feere nder am e hona dooka ka ɓernde am jaɓi. Dooka kaan laatinii yam maccuɗo hakke gonɗum nder am.
45007024	Kayco~! Mi jurminiiɗo~! Moye hisnata yam e ndu'u ɓanndu dasreyndu yam to maayde~?
45007025	Yettoore e Allah gam o hisnii yam barkaa Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen~! Nder ɓernde am, mi maccuɗo dooka Allah, ammaa nder ɓanndu am mi maccuɗo dooka hakke.
45008001	Gam ma'ajum, kawtuɗo e Yeesu Almasiifu fuu Allah taƴantaa mo ceri'a maayde.
45008002	Sabu dooka Ruhu Allah kokkoowo en yonki barkaa kawtal meeɗen e Yeesu, rimɗinii en e dooka ngaddeyka hakke e maayde.
45008003	Ɗuum ko Tawreeta waawaay waɗgo, gam gikku hakke ɗum neɗɗo woodi, kanjum Allah waɗii. O lilii Ɓiyiiko nder nanndi ɓanndu neɗɗo mo hakke, gam faa o itta hakkeeji meeɗen. Noon o sankitiri baawɗe hakkeeji kuweyɗi nder ɓalli meeɗen, o taƴani ɗi ceri'a maayde.
45008004	Allah waɗii ɗum gam mbaawen hebbingo aadilaaku ngu Tawreeta ƴami en, enen ɗowtantooɓe ko Ruhu Allah vi'i, naa giɗaaɗi ɓalli meeɗen.
45008005	Tokkuɗo giɗaaɗi ɓanndu muuɗum, giɗaaɗi ɗiin ndarvanta hakkiilo ma'ako. Ammaa tokkuɗo ko Ruhu Allah yiɗi, Ruhu kam darvanta hakkiilo ma'ako.
45008006	Tokkuɗo giɗaaɗi ɓanndu muuɗum no maayey, ammaa tokkuɗo ko Ruhu Allah yiɗi no heɓey yonki e jam.
45008007	Tokkuɗo giɗaaɗi ɓanndu no ganyo Allah. O ɗowtantaako dooka Allah, o waawataa ɗum sam.
45008008	Waɗooɓe ko ɓalli mu''en ngiɗi mbaawataa velgo Allah.
45008009	Ammaa onon, on tokkaay giɗaaɗi ɓalli mooɗon, Ruhu Allah tokkuɗon, to nii goonga kanko jooɗii nder ɓerɗe mooɗon. Neɗɗo fuu mo walaa Ruhu Almasiifu, Almasiifu jeyaa mo.
45008010	To Almasiifu e jooɗii nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, koo to ɓalli mooɗon no maayey gam hakke, e noon fuu Ruhu Allah no hokkey on yonki, gam o laatinii on aadali'en.
45008011	To Ruhu Allah ummitinɗo Yeesu nder maayde e jooɗii nder mooɗon, ndeen oon ummitinɗo Almasiifu no hokkey ɓalli mooɗon maayeyɗi yonki. O waɗii ɗum gada e Ruhu ma'ako jooɗiiɗo nder mooɗon.
45008012	Gam ma'ajum banndiraaɓe, en ngoodi goɗɗum ko laatanii en doole mbaɗen, ammaa naa ɗum tokkugo giɗaaɗi ɓalli meeɗen.
45008013	Gam kul on tokkii giɗaaɗi ɓalli mooɗon, on maayey. Ammaa to on ngoorii Ruhu Allah wara giɗaaɗi ɓalli mooɗon, ndeen on keɓey yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
45008014	Gam ɓe Ruhu Allah ɗowi fuu, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Allah.
45008015	Ruhu mo Allah hokki on laatinaay on maccuɓe hakke, hakko ɓesdon jooɗaago nder kulol maayde, ammaa o hokkii on Ruhu laatineyɗo on ɓiɓɓe ma'ako. Gada e Ruhu oon en mbaawi noddirgo Allah «~Abba~! Baaba meeɗen~!~»
45008016	Ruhu Allah, kam e ruhuuji meeɗen e tabbitinana en en ɓiɓɓe Allah.
45008017	To nii en laatii ɓiɓɓe ma'ako, en ndoney ku'uje booɗɗe ɗe o resani yimɓe ma'ako. To en njardii torraa e Almasiifu, en ndondey kuuɗe booɗɗe e ma'ako, en teddidinte e ma'ako boo.
45008018	Mi tabbitinii torraaji ɗi njareten jo'oni ɗi potnataake e teddungal ngal Allah teddinta en ɗo'o yeeso.
45008019	Ko tagaa fuu e haaɓi yi'a wakkaciire nde Allah vannginta ɓiɓɓe muuɗum.
45008020	Gam hakke laatinii ko tagaa fuu mehere yeeso Allah, naa dow e yiɗde ma'ajum, ammaa noon Allah yiɗi ɗum laatoroo. E noon fuu, tammunde e woodi,
45008021	gam ko tagaa fuu no rimɗinte e maccungaaku nyolngu, ɗum rimɗinee, ɗum teddidinee e ɓiɓɓe Allah.
45008022	En anndi ko tagaa fuu e ɗoon otta faa jo'oni, kama debbo mo ŋatawre nanngi.
45008023	Ammaa naa ko tagaa tan ottata, faa e enen ɓe Allah hokki Ruhu muuɗum, kama kokkal aranal nder ko o hokkata en. En ɗoon ottira nder, gam en kaaɓi Allah laatina en ɓiɓɓe muuɗum, o rimɗina ɓalli meeɗen.
45008024	Goonga en kisii, ammaa ɗum nder tammunde tawo. Gam kul en ngi'a ko tammotooɗen heɓgo, to noon wanaa ɗum tammunde. Moye tammotoo ɗuum ko aarti heɓi~?
45008025	Ammaa to en tammoo heɓgo ko en ngi'aay tawo, ndeen en ndeentey ɗum e munyal.
45008026	En anndaa no haani mba'aren do'aare, ammaa Ruhu Allah e hoore muuɗum e valla en nder tampere meeɗen. Emo toroo Allah gam meeɗen e ottaali ɗi neɗɗo waawataa volvugo.
45008027	Allah annduɗo ko woni nder ɓerɗe yimɓe, e anndi nyumooji Ruhu, gam Ruhu e toranoo seniiɓe, noon no Allah yiɗiri.
45008028	En anndi boo, ko Allah waɗata fuu, emo waɗa ɗum gam jam yiɗɓe mo, ɓeen ɓe o suɓri noon no o yiɗiri.
45008029	Allah e anndi ɓe suɓi ila duuniyaaru tagaaka. O suɓii ɓe boo faa ɓe laatoo nannduɓe e Ɓiyiiko. Noon Ɓiɗɗo oon laatortoo afo nder banndiraaɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
45008030	Ɓeen ɓe o suɓi ila fuɗɗam, kamɓe o noddi, o laatini ɓe aadali'en, o teddini ɓe.
45008031	Ɓaawo ɗu'um fuu, noye mbi'eten~? To Allah e wondi e meeɗen, moye waawi hongo en~?
45008032	Allah mo haɗaay Ɓiyum yargo torraa, o hokkitiri mo gam meeɗen en fuu. To noon, o hokkataa en koo ɗume fuu caahu hawtaade e ma'ako naa~?
45008033	Moye waawi wullaago suɓaaɓe Allah~? Allah e hoore muuɗum laatini ɓe aadali'en.
45008034	Moye waawi do''ugo ɓe ceri'a~? Walaa~! Yeesu Almasiifu maayii gam maɓɓe. Ko ɓuri ɗum, o ummitake nder maayde, emo jooɗii e junngo Allah nyaamo, emo toranoo en Allah.
45008035	Ɗume waawi senndugo en e yiɗde nde Almasiifu yiɗi en~? Ɗum bone naa, na jiɓayeere, na torraa ka yimɓe torrata en, na veelo, na kolndam, na jootee, na maayde~?
45008036	Kama ko vinndaa nder Deftere~: «~Gam daliila maaɗa emin nder jootee maayde dum, ɗum hooƴii min kama baali kirseteeɗi.~»
45008037	Ammaa nder ku'uje ɗeen fuu en keɓii jaalorgal kuuɓtungal barkaa Almasiifu giɗɗo en.
45008038	Mi tabbitinii walaa ko waawi senndugo en e yiɗde nde Almasiifu yiɗi en, koo ɗum maayde, koo foofaango, koo malaa'ika'en, koo ginnaaji, koo jo'onijum, koo ko waroyta, koo baawɗe,
45008039	koo baawɗeeji gonɗi dow, koo gonɗi lees. Kay~! Nder ko tagaa fuu walaa ko waawi senndugo en e yiɗde nde Allah holli en barkaa Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen.
45009001	Ko mbi'eymi ɗum goonga. Mi fevataa gam Almasiifu jeyi yam. Nyumo ɓernde am vooɗngo ngo Ruhu Ceniiɗo laamanii e saaydanii yam ko mbi'eymi naa ɗum fewre.
45009002	Ɓernde am e metti korey, nde woorataa naawgo gam banndiraaɓe am Yahuudu'en.
45009003	Mi yiɗiino vi'ee miin e hoore am mi laatoo la'anaaɗo, mi senndee e Almasiifu to ɗum nafeyno banndiraaɓe am siibiiru wo'oru.
45009004	Kamɓe ngoni Isiraa'iila'en, heɓɓe laatineego ɓiɓɓe Allah, vannginanaaɓe teddungal ma'ako, waɗanaaɓe alkawalji ɗuuɗɗi, hokkaaɓe Tawreeta, hollaaɓe no cujjidiranta mo cujjidanki goongahi, vi'aaɓe no mbaɗante ku'uje ɗuuɗɗe,
45009005	laatiiɓe asngol maamiraaɓe amin mawɓe, ɓe Almasiifu ivi e lenyol mu''en nder ɓanndu, kanko gonɗo dow koo ɗume fuu, Allah maalteteeɗo faa abadaa~! Aamiin.
45009006	Mi yiɗaay vi'igo Allah waawaay hebbingo alkawal muuɗum, gam wanaa iɓɓe e Isiraa'iila fuu ngoni Isiraa'iila'en goonga'en.
45009007	Kadimaa wanaa iɓɓe e Ibraahim fuu ngoni ɓiɓɓe ma'ako goonga'en. Gam Allah vi'ii Ibraahim~: «~Gada e Iciyaaku keɓrataa ɓiɓɓe ɓe mbaɗanmaami alkawal.~»
45009008	Ko ɗum yiɗi vi'igo woni~: wanaa rimraaɓe noon no ɗum rimrata koo moye ngoni ɓiɓɓe Allah. Ammaa ɓiɓɓe ɓe Ibraahim rimanaa gada e alkawal Allah, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe ma'ako goonga'en.
45009009	Gam Allah waɗanii mo alkawal vi'i~: «~Ngaru ba hannde mi so''oyto, mi tawa Saaratu danyii ɓiɗɗo gorko.~»
45009010	Wanaa kanjum tan. Ndaaree ɓiɓɓe Rebeka siwtaaɓe, baaba maɓɓe no go'oto, waato maama meeɗen Iciyaaku.
45009011	-
45009012	Ammaa ila siwtaaɓe ɓeen ndimaaka, hakko ɓe mbaɗa ko vooɗi koo ko halli, Allah vi'ii Rebeka~: «~Mawniraawo no jagganto minyiraawo.~» Kanjum e ɗum holla cuɓol Allah daraaki dow kuuɗe ɗe yimɓe kuwi, sey dow no o yiɗi tan.
45009013	Gam Deftere vi'i~: «~Yaakuubu cuɓmi, caliimi Isuwa.~»
45009014	To noon, noye mbi'eten~? En mbi'ey Allah waɗaay deydey naa~? Naa noon sam~!
45009015	Gam o vi'ii Muusa~: «~Mi enɗey mo ngiɗmi enɗugo, mi yurmoto mo ngiɗmi yurmaago.~»
45009016	To noon, cuɓol Allah daraaki dow yiɗde neɗɗo, koo ti'inaare muuɗum, ammaa ɗum dow caahu ma'ako tan.
45009017	Nder Deftere, Allah vi'ii Fira'awna~: «~Mi waɗii ma laamiiɗo faa mi hollira baawɗe am e maaɗa, gam innde am nananee koo toye nder duuniyaaru.~»
45009018	To noon, Allah e yurminana mo o yiɗi yurminango, o yo'orina hoore mo o yiɗi yo'orinango hoore.
45009019	To noon, goɗɗo e waawi vi'igo yam~: «~To ɗum noon Allah waɗata, gam ɗume o felata en~? Moye waawi salaago ko Allah yiɗi~?~»
45009020	Aan neɗɗo a moye, faa a yeddindira e Allah~? Gaheere loɓokke fotii vi'igo mahoowo ɗum~: «~Ko jeyi maharuɗaa yam nihinii~?~»
45009021	Mahoowo gaheeje e waawi wa'arugo loɓokke ɗeen ko o yiɗi fuu. E loɓoyre wo'ore emo waawi mahago gaheeje ɗiɗi, wo'ore gam wa'arugo hu'unde ɗum darajja, wo'ore boo gam wa'arugo ko walaa darajja.
45009022	Noon kuuɗe Allah maa mba'i. Koo to o yiɗiino o holla huunƴere ma'ako, o vanngina baawɗe ma'ako, e noon fuu o munyanii ɓeen haanɓe halkeego munyal ɗuuɗngal.
45009023	O waɗii noon, gam o vannginana yimɓe ɓe o nani jurumɗum mu''en ɗuuɗal teddungal ma'ako. Kamɓe ngoni ɓe o siryii keɓa teddungal ma'ako ila aran.
45009024	Yimɓe ɓeen ɗum enen, enen ɓe Allah noddi, wanaa nder Yahuudu'en tan, ammaa faa e nder yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en.
45009025	Kama ko Allah vi'i nder deftere Hooseya~: «~Yimɓe ɓe mi jeyaa, mi noddirey ɓe~: yimɓe am, lenyol ngol yiɗaaka, mi noddirey ngol~: lenyol giɗaangol.
45009026	Ɗoon to ɗum vi'eynoo ɓe~: naa on yimɓe am, ɗoon ɗum noddirta ɓe~: ɓiɓɓe Allah mo yonki.~»
45009027	Annabi Ecaaya boo volvii e semmbee dow Isiraa'iila'en o vi'i~: «~Koo to ɓiɓɓe Isiraa'iila ɗuuɗrii ba njaareendi regorde maayo, e noon fuu nder maɓɓe seɗɗa tan kisata,
45009028	gam Allah no tabbitiney voliinde muuɗum dow duuniyaaru, o hebbiney nde ko yaawi.~»
45009029	Kadimaa Ecaaya vi'ii ilaa~: «~Kul Allah jawmu baawɗe fuu hornanaayno en iriiri, daa en laatakeno kama si'ire Sodoma, daa en nanndiino e si'ire Gomora.~»
45009030	Too, noye mbi'eten~? En mbaawi vi'igo yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en keɓii aadilaaku ngu ɓe ngillaaki, waato aadilaaku keɓeteengu gada e goonɗingo Almasiifu.
45009031	Ammaa Isiraa'iila'en yillotooɓe laataago aadali'en gada e tokkugo Tawreeta, ɓe keɓaay ɗum.
45009032	Gam ɗume~? Gam ɓe ngilloraaki laataago aadali'en gada e goonɗinki, ammaa ɓe ngillorake ɗum gada e waɗgo kuuɗe booɗɗe. Ɓe pergake «~haayre fergoore~»,
45009033	kama no Deftere vi'i~: «~Rah, mi resii haayre fergoore nder Siyoona, haayre do''oore yimɓe. Ammaa goonɗinɗo nde fuu semtintaake.~»
45010001	Banndiraaɓe, ko ngiɗmi nder ɓernde am, e ko torotoomi Allah woni Isiraa'iila'en kisnee.
45010002	Mi caayduujo maɓɓe eɓe ngoodi ti'inaare ɗowtanaago Allah korey naa seɗɗa, ammaa ti'inaare maɓɓe daraaki dow anndal goongawal.
45010003	Ɓe pahamaay no Allah laatinirta yimɓe aadali'en, ɓe mbaɗanii ko'e maɓɓe laawol heɓgo aadilaaku. Noon ɓe calorii laawol ngol Allah laatinirta yimɓe aadali'en.
45010004	Almasiifu woni timmoode baawɗe Tawreeta, gam faa goonɗinɗo mo fuu laatoo aadaliijo.
45010005	Raa ko Muusa vinndi dow aadilaaku iɓngu gada e tokkugo Tawreeta~: «~Koo moye tokki ko Tawreeta vi'i, no heɓey yonki gada e tokkugo ka.~»
45010006	Ammaa raa ko Deftere Seniinde vi'i dow aadilaaku keɓreteengu e goonɗingo Almasiifu, nde vi'i~: «~Ta'a vi' nder ɓernde maaɗa~: Moye ƴeeŋata toon dow~? (waato gam jippinoygo Almasiifu nder duuniyaaru),~»
45010007	koo kay~: «~Moye nattata ngaska lugguka, (waato gam ummitinoygo Almasiifu nder maayɓe).~»
45010008	Ammaa Deftere vi'i~: «~Voliinde Allah e ha'ade maaɗa, ende ɗoon nder honnduko maaɗa e ɓernde maaɗa.~» Voliinde ndeen woni habaru goonɗinki ki min nga'ajinta.
45010009	Gam to a vi'ii e honnduko maaɗa~: Yeesu no Jawmiraawo, to a goonɗinii e ɓernde maaɗa Allah ummitinii mo nder maayde, a hisey.
45010010	Gam e ɓernde neɗɗo goonɗinirta, Allah laatina mo aadaliijo, e honnduko boo neɗɗo saaydinirta, Allah hisna mo.
45010011	Kama ko Deftere vi'i~: «~Goonɗinɗo mo fuu semtintaake.~»
45010012	Jo'oni peerootiral walaa hakkunde Yahuudu'en e ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en. Ɓe fuu Jawmiraawo go'oto ɓe ngoodi. Emo saahanoo noddooɓe mo fuu.
45010013	Gam Deftere vi'i~: «~Nodduɗo innde Jawmiraawo fuu no hisey.~»
45010014	Ammaa noye yimɓe noddirta mo, to ɓe ngoonɗinaay mo~? Noye ɓe ngoonɗinirta mo, to ɓe meeɗaay nango habaru ma'ako~? Noye ɓe nanrata habaru ma'ako, to goɗɗo wa'ajinaay ɓe~?
45010015	Ee noye yimɓe nga'ajinirta, to ɓe lilaaka~? Kama ko vinndaa nder Deftere~: «~Ɗume vooɗri ba jottaaki waddooɓe Habaru Belɗum.~»
45010016	Ammaa wanaa yimɓe fuu njaɓi Habaru Belɗum, noon no annabi Ecaaya vi'i~: «~Jawmiraawo, moye goonɗini bolle amin~?~»
45010017	To noon, goonɗinki e iva e nango wa'aji, wa'aji boo e iva e voliinde Almasiifu.
45010018	Ammaa emi ƴama, koo ɗum goonga Yahuudu'en nanaay habaru ɗuum naa~? Goonga, ɓe nanii ɗum, gam Deftere vi'i~: «~Wa'aji maɓɓe yahii koo toye nder duuniyaaru, bolle maɓɓe njottake faa keerol duuniyaaru.~»
45010019	Kadimaa mi ƴamey, yimɓe Isiraa'iila pahamaay naa~? Ila aran Muusa yeccake ko Allah vi'i yimɓe Isiraa'iila~: «~Mi waɗey mbaɗon nalwiiru yimɓe ɓe ndesɗon naa no goɗɗum. Mi waɗey yimɓe ɓe anndaa koo ɗume monnina on.~»
45010020	Annabi Ecaaya boo hulaay vi'igo ko Allah vi'i~: «Yimɓe ɓe ngillaaki yam mooɓii yam, mi vannganii yimɓe ɓe ƴamanaay yam.»
45010021	Ammaa dow e Isiraa'iila, Allah vi'i~: «~Dum emi veeɗi juuɗe am gam mi jaɓɓoo yimɓe am ɓe ngalaa ɗowtaare, ɓe ko'e jo'orɗe.~»
45011001	Emi ƴama, Allah hibinii yimɓe muuɗum naa~? A'aa, o hibinaay ɓe. Wanaa miin e hoore am mi Isiraa'iilankeejo, taan Ibraahim mo lenyol Bennyamin~?
45011002	Allah hibinaay yimɓe muuɗum ɓe o suɓani hoore ma'ako ila fuɗɗoode duuniyaaru. Kiimtee ko Deftere vi'i dow Iliya, nde o wullii Isiraa'iila'en to Allah.
45011003	O vi'i~: «~Jawmiraawo, ɓe mbarii annabo'en maaɗa, ɓe pusii cakkirle maaɗa. Miin tan hori, ammaa eɓe ndaara wargo yam.~»
45011004	Noye Allah toontorii mo~? Allah vi'ii~: «~E horanii yam worɓe dubuuje njoveeɗiɗo (6~000) ɓe meeɗaay sujjidango gumki bi'eteeki Ba'al.~»
45011005	Noon boo ɗum va'i nder ndu'u jaamaniiru, e horii yimɓe seɗɗa ɓe Allah suɓri enɗam muuɗum.
45011006	To enɗam ma'ako o suɓri ɓe, ndeen en anndi o suɓraay ɓe kuuɗe maɓɓe. Gam kul emo suɓra yimɓe kuuɗe mu''en, ndeen enɗam ma'ako laatataako enɗam kadi.
45011007	To noon, ɗume laatii~? Isiraa'iila'en keɓaay ko ngilloto. Sey ɓe Allah suɓi nder maɓɓe tan keɓi ɗum, ammaa horiiɓe, ko'e mu''en njo'orinaama.
45011008	Noon no Deftere vi'i~: «~Allah warii ɓerɗe maɓɓe. O vumnii gite maɓɓe, o fahaɗinii noppi maɓɓe. Noon ɗum laatii faa hannde.~»
45011009	Dawda boo vi'i~: «~Woor nyaamduuji maɓɓe laatanoo ɓe teppinirgol e fergere, ɗum laatanoo ɓe do''ere, e riiba kuuɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe.
45011010	Gite maɓɓe mbuma ɓe keppa yi'igo, torraa naawka laatanoo ɓe donngal faa abadaa.~»
45011011	To noon mi ƴamey, do''ere nde Yahuudu'en ndo''ii ɓe ummitataako naa~? Naa noon sam~! Ammaa do''ere maɓɓe waɗi yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en keɓi kisndam, gam faa nalwiiru Yahuudu'en umminee.
45011012	To boofi ɗi Yahuudu'en mbaɗi mbarkiɗinii yimɓe duuniyaaru, do''ere maɓɓe boo barkiɗinii yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, ndeen to Yahuudu'en ɓeen fuu tuubi, ay ndeen barkaa kaan no ɓurey noon to woɗɗi.
45011013	Jo'oni emi volida e mooɗon, onon yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en. Nde laatii mi lilaaɗo to mooɗon, mi mantorto kuugal am,
45011014	gam mi ummina nalwiiru banndiraaɓe am Yahuudu'en, faa mi hisna woɓɓe maɓɓe to ɗum heɓoto.
45011015	To kibineeki maɓɓe waddii ciryootiral Allah e duuniyaaru, ndeen noye ɗum laatotoo to o jaɓtake ɓe~? Ɗum laatoto kama maayɗo fintii.
45011016	To rottaande arande sakkaama Allah, ndeen dottaale koriiɗe fuu laatake cenaaɗe. To ɗum hokkii Allah ɗaɗi lekki, ndeen licce ma'aki maa ɗe ma'ako.
45011017	Yahuudu'en e nanndi e jaytunhi aawaaki, ki Allah saltii goɗɗe licce muuɗum, o jaaɓni goɗɗe licce ɗe jaytunhi ladde dow ma'aki, gam ɗe keɓa barkaa ma'aki. Onon yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, onon ngoni licce ɗeen ɗe jaytunhi ladde.
45011018	Gam ma'ajum to' on manto, mbi'on on ɓurii ɗen toon licce caltaaɗe. To maa on mantake, to' on njeggit naa onon njogii ɗaɗi, ammaa ɗaɗi ɗiin njogii on.
45011019	Ɗum baɗoojum mbi'on~: «~Licce ɗeen caltaama gam ɗum jaaɓna min ɗoon to ɗe ngonno.~»
45011020	Ɗum goonga, ɓe caltaama e lekki kiin gam ɓe ngoonɗinaay, ammaa aan a jaaɓnaama e ma'aki gam a goonɗinii. Gam ma'ajum ta'a mawnin hoore maaɗa, ammaa hul Allah.
45011021	Gam to Allah accitanaay Yahuudu'en laatiiɓe licce dime, aan a tammii o accitante naa~?
45011022	Nder ma'ajum, en ngi'ii enɗam Allah e kittal ma'ako. O kittuɗo to ɓeen saliiɓe tokkugo mo, ammaa o enɗuɗo to maaɗa, aan goonɗinɗo mo, to a ti'inake goonɗingo kanko enɗoowo. To naa noon, aan boo a saltete e lekki kiin.
45011023	Yahuudu'en boo, to njoofii ciya goonɗinki mu''en, Allah no jaaɓnitoto ɓe e lekki kiin, gam emo woodi baawɗe jaaɓnitaago ɓe.
45011024	To aan mo asuli jaytunhi ladde, a jaaɓnaama e jaytunhi ki a hawtaa asuli, to noon, naa ɗum caɗɗum e Allah, o ɓesda jaaɓnitaago licce caltanooɗe e jaytunhi dimi laatiiki asuli ma'aki.
45011025	Banndiraaɓe, emi yiɗi anndingo on ɗu'um sirri, gam to' on ndes ko'e mooɗon on annduɓe koo ɗume. Sirri ɗuum woni~: ɗuuɗɓe nder Isiraa'iila'en no laatoto yo'ora ɓerɗe'en, faa nde ɗuuɗal hisneteeɓe nder yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en heevii.
45011026	Noon Isiraa'iila'en fuu kisnirtee. Kama ko vinndaa nder Deftere~: «~Kisnoowo no ivey Siyoona, o ittey ciya kulol Allah fuu nder ɓerɗe lenyol Yaakuubu.
45011027	Kanjum woni alkawal am e maɓɓe wakkaci nde nja'afotoomi hakkeeji maɓɓe.~»
45011028	Calaaki ki Yahuudu'en calii Habaru Belɗum laatinii ɓe wanywanyɓe Allah, ammaa ɗum laatanake on barkaa. E noon fuu ɓe suɓaaɓe Allah, faa jo'oni emo yiɗi ɓe sabu maamiraaɓe maɓɓe.
45011029	Ɗum noon, gam Allah joobataako mo o barkiɗini, o hibintaa boo mo o suɓi.
45011030	Ndeenno, onon yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, on calake ɗowtanaago Allah, ammaa jo'oni o nanii jurumɗum mooɗon, sabu Yahuudu'en calake ɗowtanaago mo.
45011031	Kama noon kamɓe maa jo'oni ɓe calake ɗowtanaago Allah, gam kamɓe maa o holla ɓe yurmeende, noon no o holliri on.
45011032	Allah laatinii yimɓe fuu omndaaɓe, sabu ciya ɗowtaare maɓɓe, gam o yurminana koo moye.
45011033	Goonga, yiɗde Allah e ɗuuɗi~! Fahamu ma'ako e anndal ma'ako e luggi. Walaa baawɗo anndugo anniyaaji ma'ako. Ko o waɗata ɓurii semmbee fahamu neɗɗo.
45011034	Gam Deftere vi'i~: «~Moye anndi nyumo Jawmiraawo~? Moye meeɗi hokkugo mo caawara~?
45011035	Moye meeɗi hokkugo mo, hakko o hokkita ɗum~?~»
45011036	Gam koo ɗume fuu ivii to ma'ako, e ɗum woni gam ma'ako, to ma'ako boo ɗum vittata. Teddungal tabbitana mo faa abadaa~! Aamiin.
45012001	Banndiraaɓe, emi toroo on gam yurmeende nde Allah holli en, cakkee ko'e mooɗon, laatooɗon cakkiri ndi yonki, ceniindi, mbeleyndi Allah. Noon kaanɗon sujjidirango Allah.
45012002	To' on ngoor yimɓe duuniyaaru cappina on laawol ngol tokkoton, ammaa ngooree Allah waylita ɓerɗe mooɗon, faa heɓa hakkiilooji mooɗon kesɗitaa. Ndeen on anndey ko Allah yiɗi, waato ko vooɗi e ko velata mo e ko laatii keeɓɗum.
45012003	Emi vi'a koo moye mooɗon sabu caahu ngu Allah hokki yam~: to' res hoore muuɗum to yottaaki. Ammaa o raara hoore ma'ako e hakkiilo, deydey e goonɗinki ki Allah etani mo.
45012004	Koo moye meeɗen e woodi jokkule ɗuuɗɗe nder ɓanndu muuɗum, ammaa koo ngoye jokko e kuugal muuɗum.
45012005	Noon enen boo, no ɗuuɗruɗen fuu, en laatii ɓanndu wo'oru nder kawtal meeɗen e Almasiifu. En fuu en njokkindiri, noon no jokkule ɓanndu njokkootiri.
45012006	Koo moye meeɗen saahanaama kokkal feere. Keɓɗo kokkal yeccaago haala Allah, sey o yeccoroo ka deydey e goonɗinki.
45012007	Keɓɗo kokkal vallugo, sey o valla. Keɓɗo kokkal ekkitingo, sey o ekkitina.
45012008	Keɓɗo kokkal semmbiɗingo tampuɓe, sey o semmbiɗina ɓe. Keɓɗo kokkal saahanaago banndum, sey o saahanoo mo e ɓernde wo'ore. Keɓɗo kokkal aardaago, sey aardoroo e ti'inaare. Keɓɗo kokkal yurminango torreteeɓe, sey o yurminana ɓe e velvelo.
45012009	Kollee yimɓe yiɗde nde walaa munaafukaare. Nganyee halleende, njogee ko vooɗi e semmbee.
45012010	Njogootiree, ngiɗngiɗtiree yiɗde mbanndiraagu. Sey koo moye ti'inoo teddingo banndum faa ɓurna mo hoore muuɗum.
45012011	To' on ngoor ti'inaare mooɗon feewa, kuwanee Jawmiraawo e ɓernde wo'ore.
45012012	Nanee belɗum sabu tammunde nde ngoonɗon, munyee nder torraaji ɗi njaroton, mbaɗetee do'aare dum.
45012013	Cenndee ko ngoonɗon e yimɓe Allah woonɓe bukaata valleego, njaɓɓee hoɗɓe.
45012014	Mbarkiɗinee torreyɓe on, mbarkiɗinee ɓe, to' on la'anu ɓe.
45012015	Nandee belɗum e nanooɓe belɗum, mboydee e voyooɓe.
45012016	Njooɗee jam hakkunde mooɗon. To' on mawnin ko'e mooɗon, ammaa kawtee ko'e mooɗon e yimɓe ɓe ɗum resi naa no goɗɗum. To' on ndes ko'e mooɗon on ɓurii yimɓe horiiɓe anndal.
45012017	To' on mba'atoro halleende e halleende, ammaa ti'inee mbaɗon ko vooɗi yeeso yimɓe fuu.
45012018	To ɗum heɓoto, mbaɗee no mbaawɗon fuu njooɗodooɗon jam e koo moye.
45012019	Yiɗaaɓe am, to' on mba'atano ko'e mooɗon, ammaa ngooree Allah wa'atoranoo on huunƴere muuɗum. Gam ɗum vinndaama~: «~Jawmiraawo vi'i~: Miin woni ba'atotooɗo, miin wa'atotoo ɓe.~»
45012020	Woɗnde aayaare boo vi'i~: «~To ganyo maaɗa veelaama, hokku mo nyaamdu, to o ɗomɗii, hokku mo ndiyam. Gam to a waɗii noon, ɗum laatoto kama a joovanii mo docce yiite dow hoore.~»
45012021	Ta'a woor halleende jaalo maa, ammaa jaalora halleende gada e waɗgo ko vooɗi.
45013001	Sey koo moye ɗowtanoo laamiiɓe, gam laamu walaa ngu ivaay to Allah. Laamiiɓe ɓe ngoonɗen fuu, Allah resi ɓe dow laamu nguun.
45013002	Gam ma'ajum, caliiɗo ɗowtanaago laamiiɗo fuu, salake ko Allah waɗi. Baɗɗo noon fuu, fooɗanii hoore muuɗum ceri'a Allah.
45013003	Waɗooɓe ko vooɗi kulataa laamu, sey waɗooɓe ko halli. A yiɗaa hulgo laamu naa~? Too, waɗ ko haani, ndeen laamu no manete,
45013004	sabu laamiiɗo oon no kuwanoowo Allah gam nafuuda maaɗa. Ammaa to a waɗii ko vooɗaa hul, gam naa e mehere o vakkii kaafahi ma'ako. O kuwanoowo Allah gam o tabbitina huunƴere muuɗum dow waɗooɓe ko halli.
45013005	Gam ma'ajum, doole ɗowtanoɗaa laamu, wanaa gam kisaa huunƴere Allah tan, ammaa ɗum gam ko nyumo maaɗa vi'i maa mbaɗaa.
45013006	Kanjum waɗi eɗon mbiyoo ceede janngal, gam laamiiɓe ɓeen no huwanooɓe Allah, hokkuɓe wakkaci mu''en fuu gam waɗgo kuugal ngaal.
45013007	Mbiyee koo moye ko haanani ɗum~: kaanɗo biyeego janngal, mbiyee ɗum, kaanɗo biyeego acanngam, mbiyee ɗum, kaanɗo huleego, kulee ɗum, kaanɗo teddineego, teddinee ɗum.
45013008	To' goɗɗo hokkii on nyamaande, mbiyee mo. Yiɗde tan haani laatanoo on nyamaande nde on mbaawataa biyaago. Gam giɗɗo gondiɗɗaawo muuɗum fuu hebbinii ko Tawreeta vi'i.
45013009	Gam Tawreeta vi'ii~: «~Ta'a waɗ njeenu, ta'a waɗ war-hoore, ta'a wujju, ta'a waɗ koɗey.~» Ɗi'i dookaaji e koriiɗi fuu ɗi kawtaama nder voliinde vi'inde~: «~Yiɗ ko'odiɗɗaawo maaɗa, noon no ngiɗruɗaa hoore maaɗa.~»
45013010	Giɗɗo ko'odiɗɗaawo muuɗum waɗantaa mo ko halli. To noon, yiɗde kam hebbinta Tawreeta.
45013011	E haani mbaɗon ɗum, gam on anndi iri jaamaniiru ndu ngonɗen nder muuɗum. Wakkaci waɗii nde haani pinon, gam kisndam meeɗen ɓurii ɓadaago jo'oni dow e nde ngoonɗinnooɗen.
45013012	Jemma eesi, bimbi ɓadake veetgo. Gam ma'ajum, kibinemma kuuɗe niɓre, ɓornooɗen kaɓruɗum jayngol gam njaalooɗen niɓre.
45013013	Poofremma no haani kama wonɓe nder jayngol nyalawma. To' en laato nyaamtarɓe e yarooɓe yare-yareeji, to' en laato waɗooɓe njeenu e waɗooɓe ko semtini, to' en njokkir e woɓɓe, to' en mbaɗ nalwiiru maɓɓe.
45013014	Ammaa ɓornee gikku Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu noon no ɗum ɓornortoo kolte. Kadimaa to' on ngoor giɗaaɗi ɓalli mooɗon ɗowa on gam waɗgo ko ɗi ngiɗi.
45014001	Njaɓee goonɗinɗo mo goonɗinki muuɗum semmbiɗaa, to' on pel mo dow ko o nyumata.
45014002	Kiila, goɗɗo goonɗinki muuɗum hokkii ɗum nyaamgo koo ɗume, ammaa mo goonɗinki ki semmbiɗaa, naa koo nduye nyaamdu nyaamataa.
45014003	Nyaamoowo koo nduye nyaamdu, to' yavo mo nyaamataa koo nduye nyaamdu. Kadimaa mo nyaamataa koo nduye nyaamdu, to' sernan nyaamoowo koo nduye nyaamdu, gam kanko maa Allah jaɓii mo.
45014004	Aan a moye faa cernanaa kuwanoowo goɗɗo~? Ay jawmiiko tan waawi vi'igo kuugal ma'ako vooɗii koo vooɗaay. O do''ataako, gam Jawmiraawo e woodi baawɗe jogaago mo o daroo.
45014005	Goɗɗo hooƴii woɗnde nyalnde e ɓuri woɗnde darajja, goɗɗo boo hooƴii nyalɗe fuu e poti. Sey koo moye fuu daroo dow anndal muuɗum.
45014006	Kooyɗo woɗnde nyalnde e ɓuri woɗnde, o waɗii ɗum gam teddingo Jawmiraawo. Nyaameyɗo koo nduye nyaamdu, waɗii ɗum gam teddingo Jawmiraawo, emo yetta Allah. Mo nyaamataa koo nduye nyaamdu boo waɗii ɗum gam teddingo Jawmiraawo emo yetta Allah, kanko maa.
45014007	Sabu nder meeɗen walaa poofeyɗo gam hoore muuɗum tan, noon boo walaa maayeyɗo gam hoore muuɗum.
45014008	To faa nii en poofa, eɗen poofa gam Jawmiraawo. To en maayii boo, gam Jawmiraawo maayɗen. Gam ma'ajum, koo poofɗen, koo maayɗen, Jawmiraawo jeyi en.
45014009	Kanjum waɗi Yeesu maayi ummitii, gam faa o laatoo Jawmiraawo maayɓe e foofeyɓe.
45014010	To noon, ko jeyi aan pelantaa bannda goonɗinɗo~? Koo kay, ko jeyi njavortoɗaa mo~? Wanaa en fuu en ndaroto yeeso Allah, o sernana en naa~?
45014011	Gam ɗum vinndaama~: «~Jawmiraawo vi'i~: Mi hunorake hoore am, koo moye no diccoto yeeso am, koo moye no saaydiney miin woni Allah.~»
45014012	Noon koo moye meeɗen toontorantoo hoore muuɗum yeeso Allah.
45014013	Gam ma'ajum, en ngoor felfeltirgo hakkunde meeɗen. Ko ɓuri fuu, en kooy anniya nder ɓerɗe meeɗen en kuwataa ko fergata banndiraaɓe meeɗen, ɓe ndo''o.
45014014	Nder kawtal am e Yeesu Jawmiraawo, mi tabbitinii walaa nyaamdu harmundu yeeso Allah. Ammaa to goɗɗo nyumii woɗndu nyaamdu no harmundu, kanko ndu harmani.
45014015	To ko nyaamataa mettinii ɓernde bannda goonɗinɗo, ndeen a tokkaay laawol yiɗde. Ta'a woor ko nyaamataa laatoo daliila halkere bannda mo Almasiifu maayi gam muuɗum.
45014016	Ta'a woor goɗɗo hallina ko laatii booɗɗum e maaɗa.
45014017	Gam laamu Allah naa ɗum haala nyaam e yar, ammaa ɗum haala aadilaaku e jam e velvelo ko Ruhu Ceniiɗo hokkata.
45014018	Kuuranoowo Almasiifu e iri ngu'u gikku no veley Allah, yimɓe boo no teddiney mo.
45014019	Gam ma'ajum, en ti'ino yillaaago ko waddata jam hakkunde meeɗen, e ko semmbiɗinta goonɗinki koo moye meeɗen.
45014020	Ta'a bonnu kuugal Allah gam nyaamdu. E goonga, koo nduye nyaamdu e halalti, ammaa ɗum vooɗaa nyaamaa nyaamdu waɗeyndu bannda goonɗinɗo yana nder hakke.
45014021	Ɗum ɓurii vooɗgo ta'a nyaam kusel, ta'a yar innaboojam, e koo ɗume ko do''ata bannda nder hakke.
45014022	Woor ko nyumataa dow fii ɗuum fuu laatoo hakkunde maaɗa e Allah. Barkaa laatanoo mo nyumo muuɗum felaay ɗum dow ko resi no booɗɗum.
45014023	Ammaa baɗɗo cekkaa dow ko nyaamata, to o nyaamii ɗum, Allah no sernaney mo, gam o nyaamraay ɗum e goonɗinki. Koo ɗume ko waɗaaka e goonɗinki no hakke.
45015001	Enen ɓe goonɗinki mu''en semmbiɗi, e haani mballen ɓe goonɗinki mu''en semmbiɗaa. To' en laato ɓe yiɗde hoore.
45015002	Sey koo moye meeɗen yilloo waɗgo ko velata ɓernde banndum, faa nafa mo, semmbiɗina goonɗinki ma'ako.
45015003	Gam koo Almasiifu yillaaki ko velata ɗum, ammaa kama no ɗum vinndiraa~: «~Kuɗdi huɗɓe ma, yanii dow am.~»
45015004	Koo ɗume ko vinndanoo nder Deftere Seniinde ndeenno, ɗum vinndaama gam ekkitingo en. Kanjum hokkata en munyal e ɓerɗe de'uɗe faa keɓen tammunde.
45015005	Allah jawmu munyal e de'ere ɓerɗe hokka on laataago ɓe nyumo wo'oto hakkunde mooɗon nder tokkugo misaalu Yeesu Almasiifu.
45015006	Noon teddinirton Allah Baaba Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu e honnduko wo'oto e nyumo wo'oto.
45015007	Gam ma'ajum, njaɓnjaɓtiree hakkunde mooɗon, noon no Almasiifu jaɓri on, gam faa Allah mawninee.
45015008	Emi vi'a on~: Almasiifu laatake maccuɗo Yahuudu'en gam o holla ɓe Allah no koolniiɗo, nder hebbingo alkawalji ɗi o waɗannoo maamiraaɓe maɓɓe aramɓe.
45015009	O warii boo gam yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en teddina Allah, sabu enɗam muuɗum. Kama ko Deftere vi'i~: «~Gam ma'ajum, mi yettete nder yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, mi yimey gimi maaltugo innde maaɗa.~»
45015010	Kadimaa woɗnde aayaare vi'i~: «~Onon leƴƴi, nandee belɗum e yimɓe Allah.~»
45015011	Nde ɓesdii boo vi'igo~: «~Ngettee Jawmiraawo, onon leƴƴi fuu, maaltee mo, onon yimɓe duuniyaaru.~»
45015012	Annabi Ecaaya boo vi'i~: «~Goɗɗo iɓɗo e lenyol Jesse no warey, o warey gam o laamanoo leƴƴi duuniyaaru, dow ma'ako ɓe ndesata tammunde maɓɓe.~»
45015013	Emi toroo Allah kokkoowo tammunde hebbina on velvelo, o hokka on jam barkaa goonɗinki ki ngoonɗinɗon mo, faa tammunde mooɗon yaha yeeso e ɓesdaago gada e baawɗe Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
45015014	Banndiraaɓe am, mi tabbitinii on ngoodi gikku mbooɗngu, on heeɓɓe anndal, koo moye mooɗon e waawi ekkitingo banndum.
45015015	Ammaa bannye nder ngo'ol ɗereewol mi hulaay vinndango on goɗɗi haalaaji caɗɗi, sabu caahu ngu Allah hokki yam, gam faa mi hiimtina on ko annduɗon.
45015016	Caahu nguun laatini yam kuwanoowo Yeesu Almasiifu nder yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en. Noon kuureymi kuugal aardiiɗo diina gada e wa'ajingo Habaru Allah Belɗum, gam faa yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en laatoo cakkiri mbelndi Allah, ndi Ruhu ma'ako seni.
45015017	Gam daliila kawtal am e Yeesu Almasiifu, emi waawi mantoraago kuugal ngal kuwaneymi Allah.
45015018	Mi walaa semmbee volvugo ngoɗka feere, sey dow kuugal ngal Almasiifu huwi gada e am, gam waddugo yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en e ɗowtanaago Allah. O huwii ɗum gada e bolle am e kuuɗe am
45015019	e alaamaaji e kuuɗe kaayniiɗe ɗe kuurumi baawɗe Ruhu Allah. Noon nga'ajinirmi Habaru Almasiifu Belɗum nder jaaje ɗeen fuu, gada Urusaliima faa yahago Ilirikum.
45015020	Ko ngiɗmi nder ɓernde am woni mi wa'ajina Habaru Belɗum to yimɓe ɓe meeɗaay nango habaru Almasiifu, gam to' mi mah dow to goɗɗo fuɗɗi mahago.
45015021	Kama no Deftere vi'ii~: «~Yimɓe ɓe meeɗaay yecceego habaru ma'ako no anndey mo, ɓe meeɗaay nango habaru ma'ako no pahamey.~»
45015022	Kuugal ngaal waɗi nde ɗuuɗɗum mi heɓaay laawol wargo to mooɗon,
45015023	ammaa jo'oni mi heynii kuugal am nder ɗe'e jaaje, kadimaa duuɓi ɗuuɗɗi emi haaɓi yi'igo on.
45015024	Emi yiɗi mi yaala to mooɗon wakkaci njaheymi Espaaniya. To mi warii yahago toon, emi yiɗi njooɓnon yam, ɓaawo mi nanii belɗum jooɗodaago e mooɗon balɗe seɗɗa.
45015025	Ammaa jo'oni mi yahey Urusaliima, gam mi yaharana yimɓe Allah ballal.
45015026	Sabu goonɗinɓe wonɓe Makedooniya e Aakaya anniyake hawritgo ballal gam vallugo sooyɓe nder yimɓe Allah wonɓe Urusaliima.
45015027	Kamɓe e ko'e maɓɓe mbaɗi anniya kaan, koo to waɗgo ɗum e laatii biyaago nyamaande to maɓɓe. Gam to Yahuudu'en goonɗinɓe cenndii barkaaji Ruhu e goonɗinɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, ndeen e haani goonɗinɓe ɓeen mballira Yahuudu'en jawdi maɓɓe.
45015028	To mi heynii kuugal ngaal, waato mi hokkii ɓe ballal ngal ɗum hawritani ɓe, mi yahey lesdi Espaaniya, ammaa sey to mi yaalii to mooɗon.
45015029	Emi anndi, to mi warii to mooɗon, mi wardey e barkaaji Almasiifu fuu.
45015030	Banndiraaɓe, gam Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu e yiɗde nde Ruhu Allah hokkata en, emi toroo on mballee yam toraago Allah.
45015031	Toree Allah hisna yam e juuɗe saliiɓe goonɗingo Yeesu wonɓe lesdi Yahuudiya. Kadimaa toree mo o waɗa yimɓe Allah wonɓe Urusaliima njaɓa ballal ngal njaharaneymi ɓe.
45015032	To Allah jaɓii, mi warey to mooɗon nder velvelo, mi fooftida e mooɗon balɗe seɗɗa.
45015033	Allah kokkoowo jam wondu e mooɗon on fuu. Aamiin.
45016001	Emi yiɗi teddinon banndii'en debbo bi'eteeɗo Fiibi, go'oto nder aardiiɓe ikiliisiya ngonka Kenkereya.
45016002	Njaɓɓee mo nder innde Jawmiraawo, noon no haani ɗum jaɓɓoroo yimɓe Allah. Kokkee mo ballal ngal o woodi bukaata muuɗum fuu to mooɗon, gam o vallii yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, miin e hoore am o vallii yam.
45016003	Kinnee Piriisiila e Akiilas, ɓe kuudeymi kuugal Yeesu Almasiifu.
45016004	Ɓe kokkii yonki maɓɓe gam hisnugo ki am. Mi yettii ɓe, wanaa miin tan yettata ɓe, faa e ikiliisiyaaji yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en e ngetta ɓe.
45016005	Kinnee boo ikiliisiya kawritooha nder wuro maɓɓe. Kinnee higoo am mo ngiɗmi bi'eteeɗo Epaynetus, goonɗinɗo Almasiifu arano nder lesdi Aasiya fuu.
45016006	Kinnanee yam Maryaama kuwanɗo on e semmbee muuɗum fuu.
45016007	Kinnanee yam Anndaroonikus e Yuniyas, banndiraaɓe am Yahuudu'en ɓe omndidanoomi nder kaso. Ɓe lilaaɓe teddinaaɓe, kadimaa ɓe aartii yam goonɗingo Almasiifu.
45016008	Emi hinna Ampiliyatus higoo am mo ngiɗmi sabu Jawmiraawo.
45016009	Kinnanee yam Urbaanus, mo kuudeten nder kuugal Almasiifu, e higoo am Istaakis mo ngiɗmi.
45016010	Kinnanee yam Apeles, mo ɗum tabbitini e tokki Almasiifu e goonga. Kinnanee yam Aristobil e wuro muuɗum fuu.
45016011	Kinnanee yam Herodiyon banndam Yahuuduujo. Kinnanee yam yimɓe Jawmiraawo wonɓe nder wuro Narsisi.
45016012	Kinnanee yam Tiriifena e Tiriifosa, rewɓe huwanooɓe Jawmiraawo. Kinnanee yam boo Persis debbo giɗaaɗo kokkuɗo hoore muuɗum fuu gam kuugal Jawmiraawo.
45016013	Kinnanee yam Rufus kuwanoowo Jawmiraawo cuɓaaɗo, e inna ma'ako jogiiɗo yam kama ɓiyum.
45016014	Kinnanee yam Asinkiritus e Felegon e Hermes e Patorobas e Hermas e banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe wonduɓe e maɓɓe.
45016015	Kinnanee yam Filologus e Juuliya e Nereyus e banndum debbo e Olimpas e seniiɓe fuu wonduɓe e maɓɓe.
45016016	Kinnindiree e hinnoore higaaku. Ikiliisiyaaji fuu e kinna on.
45016017	Banndiraaɓe, emi toroo on, kakkilanee waddooɓe ceedal hakkunde mooɗon, e majjina on gada e fe''aago ekkitinol ngol keɓɗon. Ngoɗɗee ɓe,
45016018	gam iri ɓen ɗoon yimɓe wanaa Jawmiraawo meeɗen Almasiifu ɓe kuwanta, ammaa deedi maɓɓe ɓe kuwanta. E bolle belɗe e manooje fewre ɓe majjinirta yimɓe ɓe ngalaa ƴoyre.
45016019	Koo moye nanii no tokkirɗon Yeesu, kanjum mbeloriiɗon yam. Ammaa emi yiɗi laatooɗon ƴoƴanɓe ko vooɗi, ɓe ngalaa feloore dow ko vooɗaa.
45016020	Allah kokkoowo jam no namey baawɗe Ceyɗaan, o yowa on dow ma'ako naa ko neeɓi. Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu barkiɗina on.
45016021	Timote mo kuudeymi e hinna on. Noon boo Lusiyus e Jaason e Sosipater banndiraaɓe am Yahuudu'en e kinna on.
45016022	Miin Tertiyus balluɗo Bulus vinndango on ngo'ol ɗereewol, emi hinna on sabu kawtal meeɗen e Jawmiraawo.
45016023	Gaayus beernuɗo yam nder wuro muuɗum, mo ikiliisiya hawritata nder wuro muuɗum, e hinna on. Erastus desoowo ceede si'ire e banndii en Kartus boo e kinna on. [
45016024	]
45016025	Maaltooje laatanoo Allah, baawɗo semmbiɗingo on gada e Habaru Belɗum ɗum nga'ajineymi dow Yeesu Almasiifu. Habaru Belɗum ɗuum, ɗum sirri cuuɗanooɗum ila jaamanuuji ɗuuɗɗi ƴaɓɓiiɗi.
45016026	Ammaa jo'oni ɗum vannginanaama leƴƴi duuniyaaru fuu e njaayri, gada e defte annabo'en fodde ko Allah tabbitɗo vi'i, gam faa ɗi ngoonɗina mo, ɗi ɗowtanoo mo.
45016027	Allah kam tan woni annduɗo koo ɗume. Teddungal laatanoo mo faa abadaa, barkaa Yeesu Almasiifu~! Aamiin.
46001001	Miin Bulus noddaaɗo laatii lilaaɗo Yeesu Almasiifu gada e nyumo Allah, e Sostenes banndii en mbinndani on ngo'ol ɗereewol.
46001002	Emin kinna ikiliisiya Allah ngonka nder si'ire Korontu, ɓe Allah noddi laatoo yimɓe muuɗum seniiɓe. Allah senii on gada e kawtal mooɗon e Yeesu Almasiifu, onon e noddooɓe innde ma'ako wonɓe koo toye fuu. Kanko woni Jawmiraawo meeɗen, enen e maɓɓe fuu.
46001003	Allah Baaba meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu kokku on jam e barkaa.
46001004	Wakkaci fuu emi yetta Allah gam mooɗon dow caahu ngu o hokki on gada e Yeesu Almasiifu.
46001005	Waato nder kawtal e Almasiifu keɓruɗon ko vooɗi fuu, on keɓii baawal bolle e anndal.
46001006	Kama no habaru Almasiifu ɗum min caaydini jooɗorii nder ɓerɗe mooɗon,
46001007	noon keɓruɗon kokke Allah fuu. Nder deentuki nyalaande bannguki Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen, on keppaay koo go'otal.
46001008	Allah semmbiɗinta on faa timmoode, gam laatooɗon ɓe ngalaa feloore nyannde bittoyki Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu.
46001009	Kanko nodduɗo on nattuɗon nder kawtal e Ɓiyiiko Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen, o koolniiɗo.
46001010	Banndiraaɓe, emi toroo on nder innde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu~: to' jokkirgol laato nder mooɗon, ammaa potee, laatee ɓe hakkiilo wo'oto e nyumo wo'oto.
46001011	Banndiraaɓe am, yimɓe wuro Kolowe mbi'ii yam e woodi jokkirgol hakkunde mooɗon.
46001012	Mi nanii woɓɓe mooɗon e mbi'a~: «~Miin, Bulus tokkumi~», woɓɓe boo e mbi'a «~Miin, Apolos tokkumi~», woɓɓe e mbi'a «~Miin, Biiturus tokkumi~», kadimaa woɓɓe e mbi'a «~Miin, Almasiifu tokkumi~».
