46001013	Koo Almasiifu sennditake geɓe feere-feere naa~? Nakay Bulus maayani on dow gaafagal, na e innde Bulus mba'aranaaɗon baptisma~?
46001014	Mi yettii Allah gam mi waɗanaay koo go'oto mooɗon baptisma, to naa Kirispus e Gaayus.
46001015	Noon boo, walaa koo go'oto mooɗon waawi vi'igo e innde am wa'aranaa baptisma.
46001016	(Kay, mi hiimtake, asee mi waɗanii Istefaanus e wuro muuɗum baptisma. Ammaa ɓaawo maɓɓe, mi anndaa koo mi waɗanii goɗɗo feere baptisma.)
46001017	Almasiifu lilaay yam gam mi waɗana yimɓe baptisma, ammaa o lilii yam gam mi wa'ajina yimɓe Habaru Belɗum, naa e huutinirgo anndal yimɓe, gam to' mi meheriɗin habaru maayde ma'ako dow gaafagal.
46001018	Habaru maayde Yeesu dow gaafagal e laatanii ɓeen halketeeɓe vemmbere, ammaa enen hisnaaɓe, eɗen ndaari ɗum baawɗe Allah.
46001019	Ɗum vinndaama nder Deftere Seniinde~: «~Mi bonney anndal ɓeen tammiiɓe e ngoodi anndal, mi majjiney fahamu ɓeen tammiiɓe no ƴoyɓe.~»
46001020	Ndeen annduɓe e moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e ɓeen tammiiɓe no annduɓe nder ndu'u jaamaniiru wakkaci maɓɓe re'i, gam Allah waylitii anndal duuniyaaru laatoo vemmbere.
46001021	Yimɓe e anndal mu''en fuu, mbaawaay yi'igo Allah toon to o vanngini anndal ma'ako. Gam ma'ajum Allah siryii hisnirgo goonɗinɓe gada e ko min nga'ajinta, ko yimɓe ndaari kama vemmbere.
46001022	Yahuudu'en e ngiɗi yi'igo alaamaaji kaayniiɗi, Helenankoo'en boo e ndaara anndal.
46001023	Ammaa minon, emin nga'ajina habaru Almasiifu ɓilanooɗo dow gaafagal. Habaru ɗuum e laatii daliila fergere to Yahuudu'en. Leƴƴi ɗi laataaki Yahuudu'en boo, e ɗum laatanii ɓe kama vemmbere.
46001024	Ammaa noddaaɓe Allah, koo ɓe Yahuudu'en, koo ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, Almasiifu e laatii baawɗe Allah e anndal muuɗum.
46001025	Gam kuugal Allah ngal yimɓe ndaari kama vemmbere, e ɓuri anndal yimɓe. Ko ɓe ndaari kama ciya semmbee Allah boo, e ɓuri semmbee neɗɗo.
46001026	Banndiraaɓe am, kiimtee no laatinooɗon ko Allah noddi on. Dow e giiɗe neɗɗo kam, woonɓe ƴoyre e woonɓe baawɗe e ɓiɓɓe laamu ɗuuɗaa nder mooɗon.
46001027	Ammaa Allah suɓii ko yimɓe mbi'ata ciya anndal, gam o semtina annduɓe duuniyaaru. O suɓii ko yimɓe mbi'ata semmbiɗaa boo, gam o semtina semmbiɗɓe.
46001028	O suɓii ko famɗi e ko yamni e ku'uje pamare laatiiɗe mehere yeeso yimɓe, gam o meheriɗina ko duuniyaaru raari mawɗum.
46001029	O waɗii ɗum, gam to' koo moye mawnin hoore muuɗum yeeso ma'ako.
46001030	O waɗii on nder kawtal e Yeesu Almasiifu. Yeesu laatanake en anndal ivoyngal to Allah. Gada e ma'ako keɓruɗen yerduye Allah e laɓɓineeki e cootteeki,
46001031	kama ko Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Mantotooɗo fuu, sey mantoroo kuugal Jawmiraawo.~»
46002001	Banndiraaɓe am, miin kam nde ngarmi to mooɗon gam mi wa'ajina on goonga Allah cuuɗiika, mi yeccoraaki on ka e anndal duuniyaaru, koo boo e anndal ɓurngal fahamu mooɗon.
46002002	Nde ngondunoomi e mooɗon, mi jaɓaay wa'ajingo on goɗɗum feere, to naa Yeesu Almasiifu e maayde muuɗum dow gaafagal.
46002003	Ko ngarnoomi to mooɗon mi walaa semmbee, emi diwna korey gam kulol.
46002004	Ekkitinol am e wa'aji am daraaki dow baawal bolle am, koo dow anndal yimɓe. Eɗum darii dow kuuɗe kolleyɗe baawɗe Ruhu Allah,
46002005	gam to' goonɗinki mooɗon daro dow anndal yimɓe, ammaa ki daroo dow baawɗe Allah.
46002006	E noon fuu, emin ɗoon nga'ajina anndal luggungal nder goonɗinɓe semmbiɗɓe nder goonɗinki, ammaa wanaa anndal duuniyaaru min nga'ajinta, koo anndal laamiiɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru halketeeɓe.
46002007	Ammaa emin nga'ajina anndal Allah cuuɗaninoongal yimɓe, ngal Allah siryii teddinirgo en ila duuniyaaru tagaaka.
46002008	Laamiiɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru pahamaay anndal ngaal, gam kul ɓe pahamuno ngal, daa ɓe ɓilataano Jawmiraawo jawmu teddungal dow gaafagal.
46002009	Ammaa ɗum laatake kama ko Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Ko neɗɗo meeɗaay yi'igo, meeɗaay nango, e ko neɗɗo meeɗaay nyumgo abadaa, kanjum Allah siryanii yiɗɓe ɗum.~»
46002010	Ammaa enen, Allah anndinii en sirri muuɗum gada e Ruhu Allah. Ruhu oon liinyata koo ɗume fuu, faa e nyumooji Allah lugguɗi.
46002011	Walaa annduɗo nyumo neɗɗo, to naa ruhu ma'ako. Noon boo, walaa annduɗo nyumooji Allah, sey Ruhu Allah tan.
46002012	Kanko oon njaɓɗen. En njaɓaay ruhu duuniyaaru, ammaa en njaɓii Ruhu ivoyɗo to Allah. Gam ma'ajum en mbaawi fahamugo caahu ngu Allah waɗani en.
46002013	Min mbolvanaay on bolle ma'ajum e anndal ngal min ekkitii gada e ɓiɓɓe-aadama. Ammaa emin mbolvana on bolle ɗe min ekkitii gada e Ruhu Allah, faa min pahamina ku'uje ruhu e ɓeen woonɓe Ruhu.
46002014	Neɗɗo mo walaa Ruhu Allah waawataa jaɓgo ku'uje Ruhu, gam e ɗum laatanii mo kama vemmbere. O waawataa fahamugo ɗum sam, gam sey gada e ballal Ruhu tan ɗum fahamirtee.
46002015	Neɗɗo goonɗo Ruhu Allah e waawi senndindirgo koo ɗume fuu, ammaa kanko walaa baawɗo fahamugo mo.
46002016	Ɗum vinndaama nder Deftere Seniinde~: «~Moye anndi nyumo Jawmiraawo~? Moye waawi hokkugo mo caawara~?~» Ammaa enen, nyumooji Almasiifu ngoonɗen.
46003001	Banndiraaɓe am, mi waawaay volvirango on kama no mboliraneymi heeɓɓe Ruhu Ceniiɗo. Ammaa mi volviranii on kama yimɓe tokkuɓe duuniyaaru, kama ɓikkon keccon nder goonɗinki Almasiifu.
46003002	Ɓiraaɗam njarnumi on, naa nyaamdu tekkundu, gam on potaay nyaamgo ndu. Faa jo'oni boo, on potaay nyaamgo ndu,
46003003	gam faa hannde on ngoodi gikku yimɓe duuniyaaru nder ɓerɗe mooɗon. On ngoodi nawta e jokkirgol. Kanjum hollata eɗon nder duuniyaaru, on ɗoon kuwa kuuɗe yimɓe duuniyaaru.
46003004	To goɗɗo mooɗon vi'ii Bulus tokki, goɗɗo feere boo vi'ii Apolos tokki, naa e ɗum holla eɗon tokki kuuɗe duuniyaaru naa~?
46003005	Apolos no moye~? Bulus boo no moye~? Min fuu min huwanooɓe Allah tan, ɓe ngoonɗinɗon Allah gada e mu''en. Koo moye amin fuu e huwa ko Jawmiraawo hokki ɗum.
46003006	Miin Bulus mi aawi, Apolos yarni, ammaa Allah woni puɗnoowo aawdi ndiin.
46003007	To noon, aawɗo e jarnuɗo fuu laataaki koo ɗume, sey Allah puɗnoowo aawdi ndiin tan jeyi teddungal.
46003008	Aawɗo e jarnuɗo fuu e pota, koo moye maɓɓe fuu no heɓey biya deydey e kuugal muuɗum.
46003009	Gam minon min huudooɓe e Allah, onon ngoni ngesaa Allah e nyiɓdi ma'ako.
46003010	Dow e caahu ngu Allah waɗani yam, mba'arumi fuɗɗoode nyiɓki noon no baawɗo nyiɓki fuɗɗirta, goɗɗo e maha dow ma'are. Ammaa sey koo moye mahoowo dow fuɗɗoode ndeen hakkila no maharata.
46003011	Gam walaa baawɗo waɗgo fuɗɗoode nyiɓki feere, to wanaa fuɗɗoode arande ndeen, waato Yeesu Almasiifu.
46003012	Woɓɓe e ɗoon mahara dow ma'are e jiinaariya e ajurfaari e kaaƴe dime, woɓɓe boo e ɗoon mahara e leɗɗe e ƴommbe e geene.
46003013	Kuugal koo moye fuu no vanngey nyannde-darngal, gam ngal godorte yiite. Yiite no holley koo moye kuugal ngal huwi.
46003014	Mo mahadi muuɗum wulaay dow fuɗɗoode ndeen fuu, no heɓey biya.
46003015	Mo yiite ngeen wuli mahadi muuɗum fuu heɓataa biya. Kanko o hisey, ammaa o nandey kama punngitɗo nder yiite.
46003016	Faa jo'oni on anndaa onon ngoni Suudu Allah naa~? Ruhu Allah boo e ɗoon jooɗii nder mooɗon.
46003017	Bonnuɗo Suudu Allah fuu, Allah no halkey mo. Gam Suudu Allah no seniindu. Ay onon ngoni suudu nduun.
46003018	To' on ƴoynu ko'e mooɗon. To goɗɗo mooɗon nyumii e woodi anndal iri ngal yimɓe ndu'u duuniyaaru, sey o laatina hoore ma'ako bemmbo tawo, gam o heɓa anndal goongawal.
46003019	Gam anndal ndu'u duuniyaaru e laatii vemmbere yeeso Allah. Ɗum vinndaama nder Deftere Seniinde~: «~Allah no nanngirey annduɓe ƴoyre mu''en.~»
46003020	Kadimaa nde vi'i~: «~Jawmiraawo e anndi nyumooji vi'eteeɓe annduɓe no mehereeji.~»
46003021	Gam ma'ajum, to' goɗɗo mantoro neɗɗo. Gam onon njeyi koo ɗume fuu~:
46003022	koo Bulus, koo Apolos, koo Biiturus, koo duuniyaaru, koo yonki, koo maayde, koo hanndejum, koo ko warata yeeso fuu, onon njeyi ɗum.
46003023	Ammaa onon Almasiifu jeyi on, Almasiifu boo Allah jeyi ɗum.
46004001	Ndaaree min huwanooɓe Almasiifu, halfinaaɓe sirriiji Allah.
46004002	Dow ma'ajum boo, ko ɗum yiɗi e halfinaaɓe woni ɓe laatoo hoolaaɓe.
46004003	Miin kam, koo onon, koo sernanooɓe yimɓe duuniyaaru cernani yam, ɗum waannataa yam. Koo miin boo, mi sernantaa hoore am.
46004004	Ɓernde am feldaay yam layfi, ammaa e noon fuu ɗum laatintaa yam gerdaaɗo. Jawmiraawo kam sernanta yam.
46004005	Gam ma'ajum, to' on cernan yimɓe ila wakkaci ceri'a waraay. Ndeentee faa Jawmiraawo vittoya. O suuɗtey ko suuɗii nder niɓre, o wadda ɗum nder jayngol, o vannginey anniyaaji yimɓe. Nyannde ndeen, koo moye fuu no heɓey manoore Allah deydey ko haani heɓgo.
46004006	Banndiraaɓe, bolle ɗe mbi'imi on fuu, mi volvaay ɗe gam min mana ko'e amin, miin e Apolos, ammaa gam min laatanoo on misaalu, faa pahamon ɗe'e bolle~: To' on kuultu ko vinndaa, to' on mantoro jannginoowo mooɗon, njavooɗon mo woɓɓe.
46004007	Moye tammiɗaa a laatii~? Wanaa ko ngoonɗaa fuu Allah hokku maa ɗum naa~? To Allah hokku maa ɗum caahu, ko jeyi mantortoɗaa ɗum~?
46004008	Ay onon on haarɓe, riskuɓe, faa ngu heƴii on. On laatake laamiiɓe, naa e ballal amin~! Kul on laatino laamiiɓe e goonga, daa min laamodake e mooɗon~!
46004009	Ammaa minon lilaaɓe, emi tammii Allah laatinii min ɓaawo'en, kama taƴanaaɓe ceri'a maayde, wareteeɓe yeeso koo moye. Min laatake jaltinirɓe yeeso malaa'ika'en e yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu.
46004010	Minon emin laatii vemmbuɓe gam Almasiifu, ammaa onon on hakkilɓe nder kawtal mooɗon e Almasiifu. Minon min ngalaa semmbee, onon on semmbiɗɓe. Minon min yavaaɓe, onon on mawninaaɓe.
46004011	Faa hannde min veelaaɓe, min ɗomɗuɓe, min holɓe, emin piyee, min ngalaa gure,
46004012	min kuurii juuɗe amin faa min tampi, gam min nyaamna ko'e amin. To yimɓe la'anii min, min mbarkiɗiney ɓe, to ɓe torrii min, min munyaney ɓe,
46004013	to yimɓe njaasnii min, min toontorto ɓe haala mbelka. Faa hannde emin ndaaree kama mbuubri duuniyaaru, e tuhundi ndi yimɓe ndufoyta.
46004014	Mi vinndanaay on ɗum gam mi semtina on, ammaa gam mi vaggina on, onon ɓiɓɓe am yiɗaaɓe.
46004015	Koo to on keɓii jannginooɓe dubuuje-dubuuje ekkitineyɓe on tokkugo Almasiifu, anndee baaba go'oto tan ngoonɗon. Gam nder kawtal mooɗon e Almasiifu kam, miin woni baaba mooɗon gada e Habaru Belɗum ɗum nga'ajinmi on.
46004016	Gam ma'ajum emi toroo on, ngemminee yam.
46004017	Kanjum waɗi lildoymi on Timote ɓiyam giɗaaɗo, koolaaɗo nder kawtal e Jawmiraawo. O hiimtiney on no tokkirmi Yeesu Almasiifu, e ko ekkitinmi koo toye nder ikiliisiyaaji.
46004018	Woɓɓe mooɗon e mawnitoo, gam ɓe nyumii mi warataa to mooɗon.
46004019	Ammaa to Jawmiraawo jaɓii, mi warey to mooɗon jaawɗum, mi yi'a baawɗe mawnitiiɓe ɓeen, naa bolle maɓɓe tan.
46004020	Gam laamu Allah naa ɗum e bolle woni, ammaa e kuuɗe kuuraaɗe e baawɗe Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
46004021	Ɗume ngiɗɗon mi warda to mooɗon, sawru, na yiɗde e ne'aare~?
46005001	Mi nanii e woodi waɗooɓe njeenu nder mooɗon. Iri njeenu nguun meeɗaay waɗeego koo nder heeferɓe, faa goɗɗo nder mooɗon laatinii debbo baaba muuɗum kama koree muuɗum~!
46005002	Faa on ɗoon mantoroo ɗum~! Ko haani ɓerɗe mooɗon metta dow ma'ajum, mburtinon baɗeyɗo iri kuugal ngaal nder mooɗon.
46005003	Miin kam, koo to mi waldaa e mooɗon nder ɓanndu, emi wondi e mooɗon nder ruhu. Gam ma'ajum mi aartii mi sernanii kuuɗo iri kuugal ngaal nder innde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu.
46005004	Nde kawritɗon fuu, ruhu am e baawɗe Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu e ngondi e mooɗon,
46005005	kokkee iri neɗɗo oon nder junngo Ceyɗaan, gam suunooji ɓanndu ma'ako kalkee, ammaa yonki ma'ako hisnee nyannde bittoyki Jawmiraawo.
46005006	Ko mantortooɗon ɗuum vooɗaa~! On anndaa ƴuufnirɗum seɗɗa ƴuufnata conndi buroodi faa ndi heeva naa~?
46005007	Laɓɓinee ko'e mooɗon, ittee hakkeeji nannduɗi e ƴuufnirɗum kihiɗum gonɗi nder mooɗon, gam laatooɗon conndi kesri njiiɓaandi ndi walaa ƴuufnirɗum. Kayri laatiiɗon boo, gam lahiyaari meeɗen ndi juulɗe Kuultol hirsaama, waato Almasiifu.
46005008	Gam ma'ajum, mbaɗemma juulɗe Kuultol ɗeen, naa e buroodi ɗum ƴuufnirɗum kihiɗum, waato nganyaandi e halleende, ammaa mba'aremma ɗe e buroodi ɗum walaa ƴuufnirɗum, waato senaare e goonga.
46005009	Nder ɗereewol ngol mbinndannoomi on, mi vi'ii on to' on kawtu e waɗooɓe njeenu.
46005010	Mi vi'aay ɗum dow waɗooɓe njeenu e ɓe koɗey e wuyɓe e sujjidanooɓe gumkiiji wonɓe nder duuniyaaru. To ɗum noonno, daa doole mburtooɗon duuniyaaru.
46005011	Ammaa jo'oni raa ko ngiɗmi vi'igo on~: to' on kawtu e yimɓe vi'ooɓe no goonɗinɓe, ammaa ɓe waɗooɓe njeenu, koo sujjidanooɓe gumkiiji, koo ɓe koɗey, koo huɗooɓe yimɓe, koo yarooɓe, koo wuyɓe. To' on nyaamdu e iri yimɓe ɓeen.
46005012	-
46005013	Ɗume waanni yam e sernango yimɓe ɓe ngalaa nder ikiliisiya~? Allah sernanta yimɓe ɓeen. Ammaa onon njowanaa sernango goonɗinɓe. Gam Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Ittee neɗɗo kalluɗo nder mooɗon.~»
46006001	To goɗɗo mooɗon e yiɗi wullaago banndum, ko jeyi o semtaay wullaago mo to yimɓe ɓe laataaki yimɓe Allah~? E haani o wulloyoo mo to yimɓe Allah.
46006002	On anndaa yimɓe Alah cernanoyta ndu'u duuniyaaru naa~? To onon cernanoyta ndu'u duuniyaaru, ndeen on mbaawi sernango fii pamarum.
46006003	Anndee, enen cernanoyta faa e malaa'ika'en, hakko fii duuniyaaru.
46006004	To on luhurii hakkunde mooɗon dow fii duuniyaaru, gam ɗume ngullootirton to yimɓe ɓe laataaki goɗɗum yeeso ikiliisiya~?
46006005	Mi vi'ii on ɗum gam cemton. Asee, on ngalaa neɗɗo koo go'oto mo hakkiilo baawɗo sernugo hakkunde banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe naa~?
46006006	Ko jeyi goonɗinɗo yaharata banndum goonɗinɗo yeeso yimɓe ɓe ngoonɗinaay, gam ɓe cernana mo~?
46006007	Gullootirki mooɗon e holla on ŋakki. Ko jeyi on mbaawaay munyango baɗanɗo on layfi e gujjuɗo on~?
46006008	Ammaa onon e ko'e mooɗon on ɗoon mbaɗa ko halli, on ɗoon njammboo faa e banndiraaɓe mooɗon yimɓe Allah.
46006009	On anndi daahir waɗooɓe ko halli nattataa laamu Allah. To' on ƴoynee, gam halluɓe, e sujjidanooɓe gumkiiji, e waɗooɓe njeenu, e worɓe waaldeyɓe e worɓe,
46006010	e wuyɓe, e ɓe koɗey, e yarooɓe, e huɗooɓe yimɓe, e te'etooɓe, koo go'oto nder yimɓe ɓeen nattataa laamu Allah.
46006011	Noon woɓɓe mooɗon laatino, ammaa jo'oni on lootaama, on laɓɓinaama, on laatinaama yimɓe Allah gada e baawɗe innde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu, kam e Ruhu Allah meeɗen.
46006012	Woɓɓe mooɗon e mbi'a~: «~Emi waawi waɗgo ko veli yam fuu.~» Ee, ammaa wanaa ɗum fuu nafata. Ɗum goonga, emi waawi waɗgo koo ɗume fuu, ammaa mi jaɓataa laataago maccuɗo koo ɗume.
46006013	Kadimaa eɗon mbi'a~: «~Nyaamdu e laatii gam reedu, reedu e laatii gam nyaamdu~», ammaa Allah no halkey ɗum, ɗum fuu ɗiɗum. Ɓanndu neɗɗo tagaaka gam waɗgo njeenu, ammaa ndu tagaama gam teddingo Jawmiraawo, kanko jeyi ɓalli meeɗen.
46006014	Noon no Allah ummitiniri Jawmiraawo meeɗen nder maayde, noon o ummitinirta ɓalli meeɗen enen boo, gada e baawɗe ma'ako.
46006015	On anndaa ɓalli mooɗon ngoni jokkule ɓanndu Almasiifu naa~? Kadin mi hooƴa jokkule ɓanndu Almasiifu mi yahara ɗe to furdu naa~? Ɗum waɗataako sam~!
46006016	On anndaa baalduɗo e furdu laatake ɓanndu wo'oru e ma'ako naa~? Ɗum vinndaama nder Deftere Seniinde~: «~Ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe laatoto ɓanndu wo'oru.~»
46006017	Ammaa kawtuɗo e Jawmiraawo laatake ruhu go'oto e ma'ako.
46006018	Nyaaree njeenu. Hakke ɗum neɗɗo waɗi fuu, ɗum nyiddintaa ɓanndu muuɗum, ammaa baɗɗo njeenu fuu nyiddinii ɓanndu muuɗum.
46006019	Koo on anndaa ɓalli mooɗon laatii suudu Ruhu Ceniiɗo gonɗo nder mooɗon mo Allah hokki on naa~? To noon, on njeyaa ko'e mooɗon,
46006020	Allah soottorake on e fii caɗɗum. Gam ma'ajum teddiniree Allah ɓalli mooɗon.
46007001	Jo'oni kam mi toontoto on ƴamɗe ɗe mbinndonoyɗon yam, waato~: «~To gorko jooɗake hoovaaki ɗum booɗɗum, na ɗum vooɗaa~?~»
46007002	Ɗum booɗɗum, ammaa gam hulgo njeenu, ɗum ɓurii vooɗgo gorko hoovoo, debbo boo hoovee.
46007003	Sey gorko jooɗodoo e koree muuɗum noon no haani, noon boo debbo jooɗodoo e koree muuɗum noon no haani.
46007004	Gam debbo jeyaa ɓanndu muuɗum, gorko jeyi ndu. Gorko boo jeyaa ɓanndu muuɗum, debbo jeyi ndu.
46007005	To' on calootir waaldugo, to naa on narrii dow ma'ajum gam wakkaci seɗɗa, faa keɓon de''ere gam waɗgo do'aare. Ammaa ɓaawo ma'ajum ɓesdee hawtugo, gam to' Ceyɗaan heɓ laawol jarrabaago on gada e dullere waawtugo suunooji mooɗon.
46007006	Ko mbi'imi on naa ɗum doole, ammaa ɗum caawara.
46007007	Emi yiɗnoo yimɓe fuu laatoo ɓe koovaaki kama no laatiimi. Ammaa koo moye fuu e kokkal ngal Allah hokki ɗum, o'o e ngal muuɗum, on ɗaa'e e ngal muuɗum.
46007008	Emi vi'a rewɓe e worɓe ɓe koovaaki, e ɓe koreeji mu''en maayi, ɗum ɓurii vooɗgo ɓe njooɗoo ɓe koovaaki kama am.
46007009	Ammaa to ɓe mbaawataa reengo ko'e maɓɓe, e haani ɓe koovoo, gam to' suunooji koobgal waannu ɓe.
46007010	Onon hoovotirɓe, emi hokka on dooka, ammaa naa to am ka ivi, to Jawmiraawo ka ivoyi. Kanka woni, to' debbo seed e koree muuɗum.
46007011	Ammaa to o seedii e koree ma'ako, sey o jooɗoo o gowroojo, koo boo o fota e koree ma'ako. Gorko boo to' seer koree muuɗum.
46007012	Ammaa dow e horiiɓe, miin e hoore am volidata e mu''en, wanaa Jawmiraawo. To goonɗinɗo Yeesu e woodi debbo mo goonɗinaay, to debbo jaɓii jooɗodaago e ma'ako, to o seer mo.
46007013	To debbo goonɗinɗo e wondi e gorko mo goonɗinaay, to gorko jaɓii jooɗodaago e ma'ako, to' o seed e ma'ako.
46007014	Gam gorko mo goonɗinaay e seniree kawtal e koree muuɗum goonɗinɗo, debbo mo goonɗinaay boo e seniree kawtal e koree muuɗum goonɗinɗo. To naa ɗum noon, daa ɓiɓɓe mooɗon cenaaki, ammaa jo'oni ɓe laatake senaaɓe.
46007015	Ammaa to mo goonɗinaay e yiɗi seedgo e goonɗinɗo, o yoofee. Goonɗinɗo debbo koo gorko, naa ɗum doole jooɗodoo e mo goonɗinaay. Gam Allah noddii on njooɗooɗon jam.
46007016	Aan debbo goonɗinɗo, a tammii a waawi hisnugo koree maaɗa naa~? Aan boo gorko goonɗinɗo, a tammii a waawi hisnugo koree maaɗa naa~? Daahir on anndaa.
46007017	E haani koo moye fuu jooɗoroo noon no Jawmiraawo hokkiri ɗum, e noon no laatinoo ko Allah noddi ɗum. Kanjum mbagginirmi ikiliisiyaaji fuu.
46007018	To neɗɗo no naadaaɗo wakkaci ko Allah noddi mo, to' o yillo laataago kama mo naadaaka. Neɗɗo mo naadaaka boo to Allah noddii mo, to' o yillo naadeego.
46007019	Naadeego e ciya naadeego fuu nafataa koo ɗume, sey tokkugo dookaaji Allah tan nafata.
46007020	Sey koo moye jooɗoroo noon no wontirnoo wakkaci ko Allah noddi ɗum.
46007021	To a maccuɗo ko Allah noddu ma, to' ɗum waannee. Ammaa to a heɓii laawol rimɗingo hoore maaɗa, sey naftoroɗaa ngol.
46007022	Gam laatinooɗo maccuɗo ko Jawmiraawo noddi ɗum, laatake dimɗinaaɗo Jawmiraawo. Noon boo, laatinooɗo dimo ko Jawmiraawo noddi ɗum, laatake maccuɗo Almasiifu.
46007023	Jawmiraawo soottorake on e fii caɗɗum, gam ma'ajum to' on laatin ko'e mooɗon maccuɓe yimɓe.
46007024	Banndiraaɓe am, sey koo moye fuu njooɗoo yeeso Allah noon no laatinoo ko o noddi ɗum.
46007025	Dow yimɓe ɓe koovaaki, mi walaa dooka gada Jawmiraawo gam maɓɓe. Ammaa mi yeccoto ko nyummi, sabu Jawmiraawo laatinii yam koolaaɗo nder yurmeende muuɗum.
46007026	Gam torraaji goonɗi hannde, mi nyumii ɗum ɓurii vooɗgo neɗɗo jooɗoroo noon no woni.
46007027	To gorko e woodi koree, to' o raar seergo mo. To o walaa koree boo, to' o yillo koobgal.
46007028	To a hoovake, a waɗaay hakke. To debbo boo hoovaama, waɗaay hakke. Ammaa torraaji no ngarey dow hooviiɓe e hoovaaɓe. Kanji ngiɗmi hisnugo on.
46007029	Banndiraaɓe, raa ko ngiɗmi vi'igo on, wakkaci rammiti. Gada jo'oni, sey hooviiɓe laatoo kama ɓe ngalaa koobgal,
46007030	voyooɓe to' mettam ɓeram jaalo ɓe, nanooɓe belɗum boo to' velvelo jaalo ɓe, waɗooɓe luumaaku laatoo kama ɓe njeyaa ngu,
46007031	naftortooɓe ko woni nder ndu'u duuniyaaru, to' ɓe ngoonɗin ɗum nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe. Gam fii duuniyaaru e no ndu va'i fuu no buutoto.
46007032	Emi yiɗi ngooron waannaago. Mo hoovaaki no hu'ucey e kuugal Jawmiraawo. Ko velata Jawmiraawo tan o yilloto.
46007033	Ammaa kooviiɗo e waannoo dow fii duuniyaaru, ko velata koree ma'ako tan o yilloto,
46007034	to noon, hakkiilo ma'ako senndake nde ɗiɗi. Debbo koovaaɗo boo e waannoo dow fii duuniyaaru, emo yilloo velgo koree ma'ako. Ammaa debbo mo walaa koobgal, koo debbo mo meeɗaay waaldugo e gorko, e waannii dow kuugal Jawmiraawo, gam o laatoo laaɓɗo nder ɓanndu e ruhu fuu.
46007035	Emi vi'a on ɗum gam ɗum nafa on, naa gam mi ƴoyna on. Ammaa emi yiɗi kuwon ko haani, tokkon Jawmiraawo e ɓernde wo'ore.
46007036	To goɗɗo e nder kayaaku muuɗum, ɗaɓɓii debbo hoovaaki mo tawo, ammaa e hula semtingo mo kul hoovaaki mo, sey o hoovoo mo. To o waɗii noon, o waɗaay hakke.
46007037	Ammaa to gorko oon waɗii anniya nder ɓernde muuɗum hoovataako, wanaa ɗum doole o hoovoo ɗaɓɓaaɗo ma'ako, to faa emo waawti ɓernde ma'ako, ndeen o waɗii ko vooɗi.
46007038	Gam ma'ajum, kooviiɗo ɗaɓɓaaɗo muuɗum waɗii ko vooɗi, ammaa mo hoovaaki mo ɓurii waɗgo ko vooɗi.
46007039	Debbo koovaaɗo laatake kaɓɓaaɗo, to faa koree ma'ako e foofa. Ammaa to koree ma'ako sooytii, emo waawi hoovaago mo o yiɗi fuu, ammaa sey o hoovoo tokkuɗo laawol Jawmiraawo.
46007040	Ammaa to o jooɗake o walaa koree, jo'onde ma'ako no ɓurey velgo. Kanjum woni nyumo am, kadimaa emi nyuma miin boo emi woodi Ruhu Allah.
46008001	Dow haala teewu cakkanaangu gumkiiji, en anndi en fuu «~en ngoodi anndal.~» Ammaa anndal no waddey mawnitaare, yiɗde tan semmbiɗinta ikiliisiya.
46008002	Neɗɗo tammiiɗo e anndi goɗɗum, o walaa anndal goongawal tawo.
46008003	Ammaa giɗɗo Allah fuu, Allah e anndi mo.
46008004	Dow e nyaamki teewu cakkanaangu gumkiiji, eɗen anndi «~gumkiiji nder duuniyaaru fuu no mehereeji~». Eɗen anndi boo «~Allah o go'oto, goɗɗo feere walaa.~»
46008005	E woodi ko yimɓe noddirta allaaji gonɗi dow e gonɗi nder duuniyaaru. Daahir e woodi ko noddirtee «~allaaji~» e «~jawmiraaɓe~» ɗuuɗɓe,
46008006	ammaa enen kam, en anndi Allah no go'oto, Baabiraawo Tagɗo koo ɗume mo poofeten gam muuɗum. Kadimaa Jawmiraawo no go'oto, kanko woni Yeesu Almasiifu, mo hu'unde fuu ivoyi to muuɗum, gada e ma'ako boo keɓruɗen yonki.
46008007	Ammaa wanaa yimɓe fuu ngoodi anndal ngaal. Woɓɓe vooɓnooɓe tokkugo gumkiiji, to eɓe nyaama ko sakkanaa gumkiiji, faa jo'oni eɓe tammii teewu nguun gumki jeyi ngu. Eɓe kula nyiddingo ko'e maɓɓe gada e nyumooji ɓerɗe maɓɓe peleyɗi ɓe.
46008008	Goonga, nyaamdu ɓattintaa en Allah. Nyaamki ɓesdataa en, ciya nyaamki boo ustataa en.
46008009	Ammaa kakkilee to' ndimkaaku mooɗon laato ko fergata woɓɓe, ɓe goonɗinki mu''en famɗi.
46008010	Gam aan annduɗo goonga, to goɗɗo mo goonɗinki muuɗum famɗi yi'ii ma eɗa nyaama nder suudu gumki, naa nyumo ɓernde ma'ako no semmbiɗiney mo, faa kanko boo o nyaama teewu cakkanaangu gumkiiji naa~?
46008011	Noon boo, anndal maaɗa no laatoto daliila do''ere bannda tampuɗo, mo Almasiifu maayi gam muuɗum.
46008012	Gada e waɗgo noon, on mbaɗii hakke dow banndiraaɓe mooɗon ɓe mbaawataa senndindirgo ko vooɗi e ko vooɗaa. Waɗgo hakke dow maɓɓe ɗum waɗgo hakke dow Almasiifu e hoore muuɗum.
46008013	Gam ma'ajum to nyaamdu e do''a banndam mo goonɗinki muuɗum famɗi, ndeen mi ɓesdataa nyaamgo teewu kadin sam, gam to' mi do''u banndam.
46009001	Naa mi dimo naa~? Naa mi lilaaɗo naa~? Naa mi yi'ii Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu naa~? Naa onon laatii nafuuda kuugal am gam Jawmiraawo naa~?
46009002	Koo to woɓɓe njaɓaay mi lilaaɗo, dow mooɗon onon kam mi lilaaɗo. Gam goonɗinki mooɗon kam hollata daahir Jawmiraawo liloyi yam.
46009003	Raa ko toontortoomi felooɓe yam~:
46009004	wanaa emin kaani heɓgo yar e nyaam nder kuugal amin naa~?
46009005	Wanaa emin kaani yahadugo e rewɓe amin goonɗinɓe kama no minyiraaɓe Jawmiraawo e Biiturus e lilaaɓe horiiɓe fuu mbaɗata naa~?
46009006	Koo miin e Barnabas tan laatii lilaaɓe haanɓe huugo gam keɓa ko nyaami naa~?
46009007	Moye nder mooɗon meeɗi yi'igo soojeeru nyaamneyndu hoore muuɗum~? Moye remata, mo nyaamataa ko taƴi nder ngesaa muuɗum~? Moye durata mo yarataa kosam sefre muuɗum~?
46009008	Ko mbi'imi daraaki dow nyumooji yimɓe tan, ammaa faa e Tawreeta volvii dow ma'ajum.
46009009	Gam ɗum vinndaama nder Tawreeta Muusa~: «~Ta'a suum honnduko ngaari corɓirdi gawri.~» Wanaa gam Allah e waannaa, e ga'i tan o vi'i ka.
46009010	Naa ɗum dow amin o volvi bolle ɗeen naa~? Daahir, dow amin o volvi bolle ɗeen, sey demoowo e corɓoowo gawri fuu kuwa dow tammunde heɓgo geɗal mu''en nder ma'ari.
46009011	Min aawii barkaaji ruhunkeeji nder mooɗon. Kadin ɗum goɗɗum mawɗum to min taƴii fii duuniyaaru nder mooɗon naa~?
46009012	To woɓɓe e kaani heɓgo nyaamdu e juuɗe mooɗon, minon min ɓuraay ɓe naa~? Ammaa minon, min kuutiniraay baawɗe amin. Min munyanii koo ɗume fuu, gam to' koo ɗume haɗ Habaru Almasiifu Belɗum yahago yeeso.
46009013	Eɗon anndi laaɓɗum, huwooɓe nder Wuro Allah Seniingo e keɓa nyaamdu mu''en nder ko yimɓe ngaddata gam wuro ngoon. Noon boo sakkooɓe sadakaaji dow sakkirde e keɓa geɗal mu''en gada nder sadakaaji ɗiin.
46009014	Noon Jawmiraawo vi'i~: sey wa'ajinooɓe Habaru Belɗum nyaamra e kuugal Habaru Belɗum ɗuum.
46009015	Ammaa miin mi meeɗaay huutinirgo baawɗe ɗeen, kadimaa mi vinndaay ɗum gam mi heɓa ɗum. Mi ɓurii yiɗgo mi maaya dow e goɗɗo haɗammi mantoraago salaago jaɓgo biya gam kuugal am.
46009016	Mi mantortaako wa'ajingo Habaru Belɗum, gam e ɗum laatanii yam doole mi wa'ajina ɗum. Kayco am kul mi wa'ajinaay Habaru Belɗum ɗuum~!
46009017	To miin e hoore am suɓnoo huugo kuugal ngaal, daa mi heɓeyno biya. Ammaa naa ɗum kuugal ngal cuɓmi, emi huwa kuugal ngal kalfinaami.
46009018	To noon, ɗume woni biya am~? Biya am woni wa'ajingo Habaru Belɗum caahu, mi yillataako heɓgo ko haani mi heɓa gam kuugal ngaal.
46009019	Miin mi dimo, mi laataaki maccuɗo goɗɗo, ammaa mi waɗii hoore am maccuɗo yimɓe fuu, faa mi waddoya yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe to Almasiifu.
46009020	Nder Yahuudu'en, mi laatinii hoore am Yahuuduujo, gam mi fooɗoya ɓe. Koo nde laatii miin e hoore am mi laataaki maccuɗo Tawreeta. Nder tokkuɓe Tawreeta Muusa, mi laatiney hoore am tokkuɗo Tawreeta, gam mi fooɗoya ɓe.
46009021	To emi nder ɓe anndaa Tawreeta Muusa boo, mi laatiney hoore am kama mo anndaa Tawreeta, gam mi fooɗoya ɓe. Kanjum ɗum hollataa mi tokkaay dookaaji Allah, gam emi tokki dookaaji Almasiifu.
46009022	To emi wondi e tampuɓe nder goonɗinki boo, mi waɗey hoore am tampuɗo, gam mi fooɗoya ɓe. Walaa no mi laatinaay hoore am, gam no ɗum waɗi fuu woɓɓe keɓa kisndam.
46009023	Ko mbaɗeymi fuu, mi waɗey ɗum gam Habaru Belɗum, faa mi heɓa geɗal am nder barkaaji wa'ajingo Habaru Belɗum ɗuum.
46009024	Eɗon anndi ɗuuɗɓe e nyaara nder daɗootiro, ammaa go'oto tan daɗata, heɓa biya daɗki. Gam ma'ajum, nyaaree faa keɓon biya kaan.
46009025	Daɗootirooɓe e elta ɓalli mu''en elto naawngo. Eɓe mbaɗa noon, gam ɓe keɓa biya nde'ooha jaawɗum, ammaa enen en keɓey biya tabbiteyka.
46009026	Gam ma'ajum nyaardu am laataaki mehere, mi laatake kama lukkoowo mo voofataa ko lukkataa.
46009027	Ammaa miin emi fooroo ɓanndu am e semmbee, faa mi darvana ndu, gam miin ga'ajinɗo woɓɓe, to' mi vurtinee.
46010001	Banndiraaɓe, emi yiɗi pahamon ko laataninoo maamiraaɓe meeɗen jaamaniiru Muusa. Ɓe fuu ɓe nduugake lees ɗowdi ruuldere, ɓe kuultii maayo jam.
46010002	Nder kawtal maɓɓe e Muusa, ɓe fuu ɓe keɓii waɗaneego baptisma nder ruuldere e maayo ngoon.
46010003	Kadimaa ɓe fuu ɓe nyaamii nyaamdu wo'oru ivoyndu to Allah,
46010004	ɓe fuu ɓe njarii ndiyam ngo'otam iɓɗam asama, ɓe njarii ɗam e haayre ruhunkeere yahadunde e maɓɓe, haayre ndeen woni Almasiifu.
46010005	Ammaa e noon fuu, Allah nanaay belɗum ɗuuɗɓe maɓɓe, kanjum waɗi ɓe maayi nder ladde hawgaare.
46010006	Ku'uje ɗeen fuu laatanake en misaalu, gam to' en tokku giɗaaɗi yonki kalluɗi kama maɓɓe.
46010007	To' en laato tokkooɓe gumkiiji noon no woɓɓe maɓɓe mbaɗi, kama no ɗum vinndiraa~: «~Yimɓe njooɗii nyaami njari, ndeen ɓe ummii gam ɓe ngama.~»
46010008	To' en mbaɗ njeenu kama no woɓɓe maɓɓe mbaɗi, faa yimɓe dubuuje aciriin e tato (23~000) maayi nyalaande wo'ore.
46010009	To' en ngodo Almasiifu kama no woɓɓe maɓɓe mbaɗi, faa bo'ole mbari ɓe.
46010010	To' on mboyto kama no woɓɓe maɓɓe mbaɗi, faa malaa'ikaajo maayde halki ɓe.
46010011	Ku'uje ko heɓi ɓe fuu laatake misaalu, ɗum vinndaama gam ɗum vaggina en, enen wonɓe timmoode jaamaniiru.
46010012	Gam ma'ajum tammiiɗo e darii fuu, waɗa hakkiilo gam to' do''o.
46010013	Walaa jarrabeeji keɓɗi on ɗi meeɗaay heɓgo yimɓe. Allah no koolniiɗo, o woorataa jarrabeeji ɓurɗi semmbee mooɗon keɓa on. Ammaa nder jarrabeeji ɗiin fuu, o hokkey on laawol no mburtortooɗon ɗi, e semmbee munyango ɗi.
46010014	Gam ma'ajum yiɗaaɓe am, ngoɗɗee sujjidango gumkiiji.
46010015	Mi vi'ii on ɗum gam on yimɓe ɓe hakkiilo, onon e ko'e mooɗon nyumee dow ko mbi'imi on.
46010016	Horde kiirtaari ceniindi nde ngetteten Allah gam muuɗum, to en njardii nde, wanaa ende hawta en e ƴiiƴam Almasiifu naa~? Buroodi ndi cenndeten, to en nyaamii ndi, wanaa endi hawta en e ɓanndu Almasiifu naa~?
46010017	E woodi buroodiiwol go'otol tan, no ɗuuɗruɗen fuu en ɓanndu wo'oru, gam eɗen cennda buroodiiwol go'otol.
46010018	Ndaaree boo habaru lenyol Isiraa'iila~: yimɓe maɓɓe nyaamooɓe teewu cakkaangu e ngoodi kawtal e Allah gada e sakkirde seniinde.
46010019	Koo emi yiɗi vi'igo teewu cakkanaangu gumkiiji no goɗɗum naa~? Nakay gumki e hoore muuɗum no goɗɗum~?
46010020	Naa noon sam~! Ko ngiɗmi vi'igo on woni, ko heeferɓe kirsata, eɓe kirsana ginnaaji, wanaa Allah ɓe kirsanta. Mi yiɗaa kawton e ginnaaji ɗiin.
46010021	On mbaawataa yardugo horde Jawmiraawo, ndeen njardon horde ginnaaji. On mbaawataa nyaamgo e le'al Jawmiraawo, ndeen nyaamon e le'al ginnaaji.
46010022	Nakay en ngiɗi ummingo huunƴere Jawmiraawo~? Nakay en tammii en ɓurii mo semmbee~?
46010023	Woɓɓe e mbi'a~: «~Fii fuu no dagiiɗum.~» Ee, ammaa naa ɗum fuu nafata. Goonga, koo ɗume fuu no dagiiɗum, ammaa naa ɗum fuu semmbiɗinta goonɗinɓe.
46010024	To' on ngillo ko nafata on tan, ammaa ngillee faa e ko nafata woɓɓe.
46010025	Nyaamee teewu coodaangu e luumo, naa e ƴamgo to ngu ivoyi, gam to' nyumooji ɓerɗe mooɗon pel on.
46010026	Ɗum vinndaama nder Deftere Seniinde~: «~Lesdi e ko woni dow ma'ari fuu, Jawmiraawo jeyi ɗum.~»
46010027	To neɗɗo mo goonɗinaay noddii on nyaamdon e muuɗum, to on njaɓii yahago, nyaamee ko o hokki on fuu, naa e ƴamgo to ɗum ivoyi, gam to' nyumooji ɓerɗe mooɗon pel on.
46010028	Ammaa to goɗɗo vi'i on~: «~Teewu nguun sakkanaama gumkiiji~», ndeen to' on nyaam ngu, gam oon anndinɗo on e gam nyumooji ɓernde ma'ako.
46010029	Mi vi'aay ka dow nyumooji ɓerɗe mooɗon, ammaa ɗum dow nyumooji ɓernde oon biiɗo on ka. Ammaa noye nyumooji ɓernde goɗɗo cerniranta ndimaaku am~?
46010030	To emi yetta Allah dow nyaamdu am, ko jeyi goɗɗo felantanmi dow nyaamdu ndu ngettumi Allah gam muuɗum~?
46010031	Gam ma'ajum, to on ɗoon nyaama, koo on ɗoon njara, e ko mbaɗoton fuu, mbaɗee ɗum gam teddingo Allah.
46010032	To' on laato daliila fergere Yahuudu'en, koo yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, koo ikiliisiya Allah.
46010033	Mbaɗee noon no mbaɗnoomi, gam emi yilloo velgo yimɓe nder koo ɗume fuu. Mi raarataa ko nafata yam miin tan, ammaa faa e ko nafata yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, gam ɓe keɓa kisndam.
46011001	Njemminee yam, noon no njemminirmi Almasiifu.
46011002	Emi mana on gam on kiimtoo yam nder koo ɗume fuu, eɗon tokki ekkitinol ngol ekkitinmi on.
46011003	Ammaa e woodi ko ngiɗmi pahamon~: Almasiifu woni hooreejo gorko fuu, gorko kam woni hooreejo koree muuɗum, Allah boo kam woni hooreejo Almasiifu.
46011004	To gorko huufnake wakkaci o waɗata do'aare koo annabaaku, ndeen o semtinii Almasiifu hooreejo ma'ako.
46011005	Ammaa to debbo e waɗa do'aare koo annabaaku huuraaki, ndeen o semtinii hooreejo ma'ako, o laatake kama pemmbuɗo hoore muuɗum.
46011006	Kul debbo huuraay hoore muuɗum, sey o femmba gaasa ma'ako. Ammaa ɗum cemtuɗum debbo femmba hoore muuɗum, gam ma'ajum sey o huura hoore ma'ako.
46011007	Gorko haanaay huura hoore muuɗum, gam emo holla nanndi Allah e darajja muuɗum. Ammaa debbo e holla darajja gorko.
46011008	Gam naa gorko ivi e debbo, ammaa debbo ivi e gorko.
46011009	Daahir, gorko tagaaka gam debbo, ammaa debbo tagaama gam gorko.
46011010	Gam daliila malaa'ika'en, debbo e haani huura hoore muuɗum kama alaama baawɗe ma'ako.
46011011	Ammaa nder kawtal meeɗen e Jawmiraawo, debbo e takkii e gorko, gorko boo e takkii e debbo.
46011012	Kama no debbo iɓri e gorko, noon boo gorko danyaama gada e debbo. Ammaa ɗum fuu to Allah ɗum ivi.
46011013	Nyumee e ko'e mooɗon~: koo ɗum booɗɗum debbo waɗa do'aare, o huuraaki~?
46011014	Koo finaatawaaji e kolla on to gorko yoofii gaasa muuɗum faa ka juuti, ay ɗum cemtuɗum.
46011015	Ammaa to debbo e woodi gaasa njuutka, ɗum darajja muuɗum. Sabu o hokkaama gaasa njuutka kaan, gam ka sudda hoore ma'ako.
46011016	To goɗɗo e yiɗi yeddugo ka'a haala, sey o annda minon e ikiliisiyaaji Allah fuu, min ngalaa finaatawaa feere.
46011017	E woodi ko ngiɗmi vi'igo on dow haala hawriinde mooɗon. Mi manataa on, gam hawriinde mooɗon yaharataa on yeeso, sey to halli tan.
46011018	Aran fuu, mi nanii to on kawritii e woodi ceedal hakkunde mooɗon, faa maa mi jaɓii ngoɗka muuɗum.
46011019	Doole cennditooɗon, gam dariiɓe e goonga wonɓe nder mooɗon mbannga.
46011020	Nde kawritɗon fuu, wanaa gam nyaamgo kiirtaari Jawmiraawo kawritoton.
46011021	Gam koo moye mooɗon fuu e nyaama kiirtaari muuɗum, woɓɓe ngoordee e veelo, woɓɓe boo njarii faa ngiiltake.
46011022	Koo on ngalaa gure to haani nyaamon njaron naa~? Nakay on yaviiɓe ikiliisiya Allah~? Na on ngiɗi semtingo sooyɓe~? Ɗume ngiɗɗon mi vi'a on~? Mi mana on naa~? Mi waawataa mango on dow ma'ajum sam.
46011023	Gam ko nanmi e Jawmiraawo ngecciimi on~: nder jemmaare nde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu hokkitiranoo, o hooƴi buroodi,
46011024	o yetti Allah, o fecci ndi, o vi'i~: «~Ɗu'um woni ɓanndu am hokkaandu gam mooɗon. Mbaɗee ɗum gam hiimtaago yam.~»
46011025	Ɓaawo ɓe nyaamii kiirtaari boo, o hooƴi jardugel innaboojam, o vi'i~: «~Nge'el jardugel woni alkawal kesal tabbitiniraangal e ƴiiƴam am. Nde njaroton e jardugel ngeel fuu, kiimtee yam.~»
46011026	Nde nyaamɗon buroodi ɗuum fuu, njarɗon e jardugel innaboojam ɗaam boo, eɗon nga'ajina habaru maayde Jawmiraawo faa o vittoya.
46011027	Gam ma'ajum, nyaamɗo buroodi Jawmiraawo, yardi jardugel ma'ako, kul yardaay ɗum no haani, o waɗii hakke dow ɓanndu Jawmiraawo e ƴiiƴam muuɗum.
46011028	Sey koo moye fuu liinya hoore muuɗum ko hokka nyaama buroodi, yara e jardugel ngeel.
46011029	Gam neɗɗo nyaamɗo buroodi ɗuum, yari e jardugel ngeel, to faa o fahamaay teddungal ɓanndu Jawmiraawo, o nyaamanii hoore ma'ako ceri'a.
46011030	Kanjum tampini ɗuuɗɓe mooɗon, woɓɓe nyawi, woɓɓe boo maayi.
46011031	Kul en liinyii ko'e meeɗen, Allah sernantaa en.
46011032	Ammaa Jawmiraawo no sernaney en, o elta en, gam to' o sernidan en e duuniyaaru.
46011033	Gam ma'ajum banndiraaɓe am, to on kawritii gam nyaamgo kiirtaari Jawmiraawo, ndeenndeentiree.
46011034	To e woodi dolɗo nder mooɗon, sey o aarta o nyaama e wuro ma'ako tawo, gam to' hawriinde mooɗon fooɗonoy on ceri'a Allah. Ammaa dow haalaaji koriiɗi, to mi warii mi fahaminey on ɗi.
46012001	Jo'oni banndiraaɓe, emi yiɗi volvango on haala kokke ɗe Ruhu Ceniiɗo hokkata, gam emi yiɗi pahamon ɗe booɗɗum.
46012002	Nde laatinooɗon heeferɓe, ɓerɗe mooɗon e pooɗeynoo on tokkon gumkiiji ɗi mbolvataa.
46012003	Gam ma'ajum emi yiɗi pahamon~: walaa baawɗo vi'igo «~Yeesu no la'anaaɗo~», to Ruhu Ceniiɗo e nder ma'ako. Kadimaa walaa baawɗo vi'igo «~Yeesu no Jawmiraawo~», to Ruhu Ceniiɗo walaa nder ma'ako.
46012004	E woodi kokke feere-feere, ammaa Ruhu go'oto hokkata ɗe.
46012005	E woodi kuuɗe feere-feere, ammaa Jawmiraawo go'oto huwantee ɗe.
46012006	E woodi laabi huwango Jawmiraawo feere-feere, ammaa Allah go'oto hokkata koo moye baawɗe huurugo ɗi.
46012007	Koo moye fuu hokkaama kokkal banngineyngal Ruhu Ceniiɗo nder muuɗum, gam ɗum nafa goonɗinɓe.
46012008	Ruhu go'oto oon hokkata goɗɗo kokkal ekkitingo e anndal. O hokka goɗɗo boo anndal bolle.
46012009	Ruhu go'oto oon hokkata goɗɗo goonɗinki cemmbiɗki, goɗɗo boo kokkal yamɗitingo ɓe njamɗaa.
46012010	O hokka goɗɗo waɗgo kaayniiɗumji, goɗɗo boo waɗgo annabaaku, goɗɗo feere kokkal senndindirgo ruhuuji kalluɗi e Ruhu goonga, goɗɗo feere volvugo nder ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, goɗɗo boo baawal fassaraago ɗe.
46012011	Ruhu go'oto tan huwata ɗum, ɗum fuu, kanko senndanta koo moye fuu kokkal muuɗum noon no o yiɗiri.
46012012	Noon no ɓanndu woorri jokkule ɗuuɗɗe, noon boo jokkule ɗuuɗɗe e laatii ɓanndu wo'oru. Noon boo Almasiifu laatii.
46012013	Yahuudu'en e leƴƴi ɗi laataaki Yahuudu'en e maccuɓe e rimɓe, en fuu en mbaɗanaama baptisma, gam laatooɗen ɓanndu wo'oru gada e Ruhu go'oto. En fuu en njarnaama Ruhu go'oto.
46012014	Ɓanndu laataaki jokko wo'oto, ammaa ndu jokkule ɗuuɗɗe.
46012015	To kosngal vi'i~: «~Gam mi laataaki junngo, mi walaa nder ɓanndu~», ɗum senndataa ngal e ɓanndu.
46012016	Koo boo to nofru vi'i~: «~Gam mi laataaki yitere, mi walaa nder ɓanndu~», ɗum senndataa ndu e ɓanndu.
46012017	To ɓanndu fuu laatake yitere, noye ɓanndu nduun nanrata~? Koo boo to ndu fuu ndu laatake nofru, noye ɓanndu nduun luuɓtirta~?
46012018	Allah e huutinira jokkule ɗeen fuu nder ɓanndu wo'oru noon no o yiɗiri.
46012019	To ɓanndu fuu laatake jokko wo'oto, naa ɗum ɓanndu.
46012020	Ammaa e woodi jokkule ɗuuɗɗe nder ɓanndu wo'oru.
46012021	Yitere fotaay vi'igo junngo nafataa ɗum. Hoore boo fotaay vi'igo kosɗe nafataa ɗum.
46012022	Ammaa jokkule ɓanndu ɗe ndaareten kama ɗe ngalaa semmbee, kanje ngoni ɓurɗe nafgo.
46012023	Jokkule ɓanndu ɗe nyumeten ngalaa teddungal, kanje ɓureten teddingo. Ɗe ɓurɗen semtirgo boo, kanje ɓureten reengo.
46012024	Jokkule meeɗen booɗɗe ngalaa bukaata reeneego. Ammaa Allah hawtii jokkule ɓanndu fuu gada e mawningo jokkule ɓurɗe famɗugo,
46012025	sabu to' luhural nattu nder ɓanndu, ammaa gam ɗe fuu ɗe mballindira.
46012026	To jokko wo'oto naawii, koriiɗe fuu no naawdey e ma'ago, to jokko wo'oto teddinaama, koriiɗe fuu no nandey belɗum e ma'ago.
46012027	Onon on laatii ɓanndu Almasiifu, koo moye mooɗon fuu no jokko ɓanndu nduun.
46012028	Noon Allah darniri ikiliisiya~: aran o jo''ini lilaaɓe, ndeen o tokkini annabo'en, o tokkini ekkitinooɓe. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, waɗooɓe kaayniiɗumji, e yamɗitinooɓe nyawɓe, e vallooɓe, e aardotooɓe goonɗinɓe, e volvooɓe ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka.
46012029	Wanaa ɓe fuu ngoni lilaaɓe, koo annabo'en, koo ekkitinooɓe, koo waɗooɓe kaayniiɗumji.
46012030	Wanaa yimɓe fuu kokkaa yamɗitingo ɓe njamɗaa, koo volvugo ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, koo fassaraago ɗemɗe ɗeen.
46012031	E noon fuu, ti'inee yillaago kokke ɓurɗe manngu. Jo'oni mi holley on laawol ɓurngol vooɗgo.
46013001	To mi volvii ɗemɗe yimɓe e malaa'ika'en fuu, kul mi walaa yiɗde, mi laatake kama lennguru senƴooru e mehere, koo mbaggu iidoowu e mehere.
46013002	To emi waɗa annabaaku, emi anndi sirriiji Allah, to emi woodi anndal fuu, koo emi woodi goonɗinki cemmbiɗki, faa emi waawi sottingo baamle, ammaa kul mi walaa yiɗde, mi laatake mehere.
46013003	To mi hokkii sooyɓe ko ngoonmi fuu, faa e yonki am, ammaa kul mi walaa yiɗde, ɗum nafataa yam koo ɗume.
46013004	Goonɗo yiɗde e woodi munyal e yehere. O walaa nalwiiru, o mantataako, o walaa mawnitaare.
46013005	Goonɗo yiɗde waɗataa ko semtini, o yillataako ko nafata mo kanko tan, o huunƴilawta, o jogitataako layfi goɗɗo boo.
46013006	Goonɗo yiɗde nanataa belɗum halleende, ammaa emo nana belɗum goonga.
46013007	Goonɗo yiɗde no munyaney koo ɗume fuu, goonɗinki ma'ako e tammunde ma'ako e munyal ma'ako tampataa sam.
46013008	Yiɗde re'ataa faa abadaa. Annabaaku no timmey, volvugo ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka no majjey, anndal boo no majjey.
46013009	Gam anndal meeɗen e annabaaku meeɗen ŋakki,
46013010	ammaa to keeɓɗum wari, ko ŋakki ɗuum no majjey.
46013011	Nde laatinoomi ɓinngel, mi volvirii kama no ɓinngel volvirta, mi nyumrii kama no ɓinngel nyumrata, hakkiilo am laatake kama ngo ɓinngel. Ammaa nde mawnumi, mi woorii gikku mbilkaaku.
46013012	Ko ngi'eten jo'oni laaɓaay, kama daartiiɗo daarorgal kefiingal. Ammaa wakkaci no warey nde ngi'eten Allah gite e gite. Jo'oni anndal am e ma'ako no pamaral, ammaa wakkaci no warey nde anndeymoomi booɗɗum, noon no o anndiri yam.
46013013	Jo'oni e woodi ku'uje tati tabbitooje~: goonɗinki e tammunde e yiɗde. Ammaa ɗe fuu tati, yiɗde ɓurii ɗe manngu.
46014001	Ti'inee yillaago yiɗde, ngillee boo kokke Ruhu Ceniiɗo, ko ɓuri ɗum fuu woni waɗgo annabaaku.
46014002	Gam bolvoowo ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, Allah volidata, wanaa yimɓe. Walaa pahameyɗo ko o vi'ata, gam emo volva bolle sirriije nder baawɗe Ruhu.
46014003	Ammaa baɗoowo annabaaku e volida e yimɓe, gam o yahara ɓe yeeso nder goonɗinki, o semmbiɗina ɓe, o waaltina ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
46014004	Bolvoowo ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, hoore muuɗum tan nafata, ammaa baɗoowo annabaaku e nafa ikiliisiya fuu.
46014005	Emi yiɗi on fuu mbolvon ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, ammaa ko ɓurani yam woni mbaɗon annabaaku. Gam baɗoowo annabaaku ɓurii bolveyɗo ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, to naa e woodi baawɗo fassaraago ɗe, gam ɗum nafa ikiliisiya.
46014006	To noon banndiraaɓe, to mi warii to mooɗon emi volvirana on ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, ɗume ɗum nafata on~? Walaa ko ɗum nafata on kul mi fahaminaay on ko Allah vannginani yam~: koo anndal, koo annabaaku, koo ekkitinol haala Allah.
46014007	Ndaaremma misaalu ku'uje gimi kama duudaandu koo moolooru. To ɗi piyaaka laaɓɗum, noye anndirten gimol ngol duudaandu koo moolooru nduun vi'ata~?
46014008	Koo boo to puufoowo luwal konu fuufaay ngal booɗɗum, moye siryantoo konu nguun~?
46014009	Noon boo ɗum laatii e mooɗon, to on mbolvii ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, walaa pahamuɗo ko mbi'oton, on mbolvii e mehere~!
46014010	E woodi ɗemɗe feere-feere nder duuniyaaru, koo ngale fuu e woodi ma'ana muuɗum.
46014011	Ammaa to neɗɗo volvanii yam e ɗemngal ngal mi nanataa, mi laatanake mo jananno, kanko boo o laatanake yam jananno.
46014012	Noon boo, nde laatii on ngiɗi heɓgo kokke Ruhu, ti'inee yillaago kokke cemmbiɗineyɗe ikiliisiya.
46014013	Gam ma'ajum, bolvoowo ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka fuu, sey toroo Allah baawal fassaraago ɗe.
46014014	Gam to emi waɗa do'aare nder ɗemngal ngal anndaaka, ruhu am waɗata do'aare, hakkiilo am nafataa koo ɗume.
46014015	To noon noye mbaɗeymi~? Mi waɗey do'aare e ruhu am e hakkiilo am fuu. Mi yimey gimi yettoore e ruhu am e hakkiilo am fuu.
46014016	To naa noon, to a maaltii Allah e ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, noye gewaniiɗo ma mo fahamaay vi'irata «~Aamiin~» e maaltoore maaɗa ndeen~? Sabu o nanaay ko mbiiɗaa.
46014017	Koo to do'aare maaɗa ndeen e vooɗi korey, nde nafataa neɗɗo oon sam.
46014018	Emi yetta Allah, sabu mi ɓurii on, on fuu volvugo ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka.
46014019	Ammaa nder ikiliisiya, mi ɓurii yiɗgo mi volva bolle jovi pahameteeɗe, gam ɗe ekkitina yimɓe, dow e volvugo bolle dubuuje sappo ɗe pahamataake.
46014020	Banndiraaɓe, to' nyumooji mooɗon laato kama ɗi bilki'en. Nder halleende, laatee ɓe ngalaa semmbee kama bilki'en, ammaa nder hakkiilooji mooɗon laatooɗon mawɓe.
46014021	Raa ko vinndaa nder Deftere~: «~Mi volidey e yimɓe am nder ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, gada e konnduɗe jananɓe. Ammaa e noon fuu, ɓe ngewantaako yam.~» Noon Jawmiraawo vi'i.
46014022	Noon boo, kokkal volvugo ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, ɗum alaama gam ɓe ngoonɗinaay, naa ɗum gam goonɗinɓe. Waɗgo annabaaku boo, ɗum alaama gam goonɗinɓe, wanaa ɗum gam ɓe ngoonɗinaay.
46014023	Gam ma'ajum, to yimɓe goonɗinɓe fuu kawritii, koo moye e volva ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, to yimɓe ɓe ngoonɗinaay ngarii to kawritɗon, ɓe mbi'ataa on haaŋaaɓe naa~?
46014024	Ammaa to goɗɗo mo goonɗinaay warii, tawii goonɗinɓe fuu e mbaɗa annabaaku, bolle maɓɓe no pahaminey mo hakkeeji ma'ako. Bolle ɗeen no cernaney mo,
46014025	nyumooji ɓernde ma'ako cuuɗiiɗi fuu no mbanngintee, faa o diccoo o sujjidana Allah, o vi'a~: «~Goonga, Allah e nder mooɗon.~»
46014026	Too banndiraaɓe, noye mbaɗoton~? To on kawritii gam sujjidango Allah, kokkaaɗo gimol, e kokkaaɗo ekkitinki, e kokkaaɗo waɗgo annabaaku, e kokkaaɗo volvugo ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, e kokkaaɗo fassaraago ɗe, sey ɗum fuu ɗum waɗee gam semmbiɗingo goonɗinɓe.
46014027	To' volvooɓe ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka ɓur ɗiɗo koo tato, ɓe mbolva e tokkindirki. Goɗɗo boo fassaroo ko ɓe mbi'i.
46014028	Ammaa to passarotooɗo walaa, sey o de''a nder hawriinde, o volida e Allah nder ɓernde ma'ako.
46014029	Waɗooɓe annabaaku boo, sey ɗiɗo koo tato mbolva, ndeen yewiiɓe boo liinya bolle maɓɓe.
46014030	To e woodi ko Allah vannginani goɗɗo nder jooɗiiɓe, sey bolvoowo arano de''a.
46014031	On fuu on mbaawi waɗgo annabaaku go'oto-go'oto, gam koo moye fuu heɓa anndal e semmbee goonɗinki.
46014032	Waɗooɓe annabaaku e kaani mbaawta ko'e mu''en,
46014033	gam Allah naa o Allah gaddoowo jiɓayeere, ammaa o Allah gaddoowo jam. Noon no ɗum laatii nder kawtal seniiɓe fuu,
46014034	e haani rewɓe nde''a nder hawriinde goonɗinɓe, gam ɓe ngalaa laawol volvugo ɗoon. Ɓe laatoo ɗowtiiɓe noon no Tawreeta Muusa vi'i.
46014035	To e woodi ko ɓe ngiɗi fahamugo, sey ɓe ngoora faa ɓe koota, ndeen ɓe ƴama worɓe maɓɓe. Gam ɗum cemtuɗum debbo volva nder ikiliisiya.
46014036	Nakay on tammii voliinde Allah ndeen to mooɗon nde fuɗɗiri~? Na onon tan keɓi nde~?
46014037	To goɗɗo e tammii o annabiijo, koo emo tammii o keɓɗo kokkal Ruhu Ceniiɗo, sey o annda dooka ka mbinndanmi on, to Jawmiraawo ka ivoyi.
46014038	Ammaa mo jaɓaay ka fuu, Allah jaɓataa ɗum.
46014039	Gam ma'ajum banndiraaɓe am, ngillee waɗgo annabaaku, to' on kaɗ yimɓe volvugo ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka.
46014040	Ammaa sey koo ɗume fuu wa'aree noon no haani e laawol booɗngol.
46015001	Banndiraaɓe, emi yiɗi hiimtingo on Habaru Belɗum ɗum ngaddanmi on, njaɓɗon, tokkuɗon.
46015002	Gam e Habaru ɗuum kisnirteeɗon, to on njogorake ɗum noon no nga'ajinirmi on ɗum. To naa noon, goonɗinki mooɗon laatake mehere.
46015003	Mi waddanii on habaru ɓurduɗum fuu ɗum keɓmi, binndaaɗum nder Deftere Seniinde, waato~: Almasiifu maayii gam hakkeeji meeɗen,
46015004	o waɗaama nder yenaande, o ummitake nyannde tataɓre noon no Deftere Seniinde vi'inoo.
46015005	O vannganii Biiturus. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o vanngani almaajiri'en sappo e ɗiɗo.
46015006	Ɓaawo ɗoon o vanngani ko ɓuri banndiraaɓe keme njovo (500) wakkaci go'otum. Ɗuuɗɓe maɓɓe e poofa faa jo'oni, ammaa woɓɓe maɓɓe cooytii.
46015007	Ɓaawo ɗoon kadimaa o vanngani Yaakuubu e lilaaɓe fuu.
46015008	Faa timmoode, o vannganii yam miin laatiiɗo kama ɓinngel ngel hebbidinaaka.
46015009	Gam miin ɓuri lilaaɓe fuu famɗugo, mi fotaay noddireego koo lilaaɗo, gam mi torriino goonɗinɓe Allah.
46015010	Ammaa gam yiɗde Allah laatoriimi no laatiimi. Yiɗde nde o waɗani yam laataaki mehere, gam mi ɓurii lilaaɓe horiiɓe fuu kuugal. To goonga kam, naa miin huwata, ammaa yiɗde Allah wonnde nder am huwata.
46015011	Ammaa koo miin, koo kamɓe, ko min nga'ajini on no go'otum, noon boo njaɓruɗon ɗum.
46015012	To emin nga'ajina on ummitineeki Almasiifu nder maayde, noye woɓɓe mooɗon mbi'irata maayɓe ummitataako~?
46015013	Kul ummitaaki maayɓe walaa, ndeen Almasiifu e hoore muuɗum ummitinaaka.
46015014	To nii Almasiifu ummitinaaka, wa'aji amin laatake mehere, goonɗinki mooɗon boo laatake mehere.
46015015	Ko ɓuri ɗum fuu, ndeen min laatake caaydu'en feɓnooɓe Allah, gam min mbi'ii Allah ummitinii Almasiifu, ammaa kul ɗum laatino goonga maayɓe ummitataako, ndeen Allah ummitinaay mo.
46015016	Gam kul maayɓe ummitataakono, Almasiifu e hoore muuɗum ummitaaki.
46015017	Kul Almasiifu ummitaakino, goonɗinki mooɗon laatake mehere, faa jo'oni eɗon ngondi e hakkeeji mooɗon.
46015018	To ɗum noon, maayɓe nder goonɗinki Yeesu ɓeen kalkii.
46015019	To tammunde meeɗen e Almasiifu e laatinoo nafuuda foofaango meeɗen jo'oniwo tan, daa en ɓurii yimɓe fuu yurminaago.
46015020	Ammaa daahir Almasiifu ummitinaama nder maayɓe, o laatake arano nder ɓeen ummitoytooɓe.
46015021	Noon no neɗɗo go'oto waddiri maayde, noon kadimaa neɗɗo go'oto waddiri ummitineeki maayɓe.
46015022	Noon no yimɓe fuu maayrata gada e hawtugo e Aadamu, noon kadimaa yimɓe fuu keɓrata yonki gada e hawtugo e Almasiifu.
46015023	Ammaa koo moye fuu no ummitinte e tokkindirki. Almasiifu woni arano e ummitineego, ndeen laatiiɓe ɓe ma'ako ummitinee nyannde bittoyki ma'ako.
46015024	Ndeen timmoode duuniyaare wara, Almasiifu no halkey laamuuji e baawɗeeji niɓre e semmbeeji fuu, o hokkita Allah Baabiraawo laamu.
46015025	Gam doole Almasiifu laamoo, faa Allah waɗa o yaaɓa wanywanyɓe ma'ako fuu.
46015026	Ganyo cakitotooɗo halkeego oon ɗum maayde.
46015027	Ɗum vinndaama nder Deftere~: «~Allah waɗii koo ɗume fuu lees laamu ma'ako.~» Ammaa to vi'aama noon, ɗum laaɓɗum Allah baɗɗo koo ɗume fuu lees laamu ma'ako walaa nder.
46015028	Nde laatii koo ɗume fuu heedii lees Ɓiɗɗo, sey Ɓiɗɗo e hoore muuɗum heeda lees Allah baɗɗo koo ɗume lees ma'ako, gam Allah laamoo dow koo ɗume e koo moye.
46015029	En nyumtu dow waɗanteeɓe baptisma gam maayɓe. To maayɓe ummitataako, ɗume woni nafuuda waɗaneego baptisma gam maayɓe~?
46015030	Minon e ko'e amin, ko jeyi min njahanta nder jootee wakkaci fuu~?
46015031	Goonga mbi'eymi on banndiraaɓe, nyalaande fuu emi nder jootee maayde. Ammaa e noon fuu, emi mantoroo on nder kawtal mooɗon e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu.
46015032	Nde kaɓnoomi e yimɓe nannduɓe e diiwe ladde nder si'ire Efesu, ɗume ɗum nafi yam kul maayɓe ummitataako~? To maayɓe ummitataako, ndeen mbaɗemma ko vi'ano~: «~Nyaamen, njaren, gam jahango en maayey.~»
46015033	To' on ƴoynee~: «~Yahadugo e kalluɗo no bonney gikku mbooɗngu.~»
46015034	Ngartiree hakkiilooji mooɗon dow nyumooji kaanduɗi, ngooree waɗgo hakke. Woɓɓe mooɗon anndaa Allah. Mi vi'ii on ka gam cemton.
46015035	Ammaa woɓɓe no ƴamey~: «~Noye maayɓe ummitortoo~? Noye ɓalli maɓɓe mba'ata~?~»
46015036	Aan mo ƴoƴaa~! Aawdi ndi aawɗaa, to naa ndi waati, ndi fuɗata.
46015037	Aawdi ndi aawɗaa fuu, koo gawri koo alkamaari koo aawdi feere, ndi nanndaa e ko fuɗata.
46015038	Allah e hokka aawdi fuu siifa ma'ari noon no o yiɗiri, koo ndiye aawdi e no va'i.
46015039	Wanaa ɓalli fuu no nannduɗi~: yimɓe e ɓalli mu''en, bisaaji e ɓalli mu''en, colli e ɓalli mu''en, liƴƴi boo e ɓalli mu''en.
46015040	E woodi ɓalli asamankeeji e ɓalli lesdinkeeji. Asamankeeji e ŋari mu''en, lesdinkeeji boo e ŋari mu''en.
46015041	Naange e ɗelkol muuɗum, lewru e ɗelkol muuɗum, koode boo e ɗelkol mu''en, hoodere fuu e ɗelkol muuɗum.
46015042	Noon ummitineeki maayɓe wontiri. Ko uvaa no nyoley, ko ummitotoo nyolataa.
46015043	Ko uvaa walaa teddungal, ko ummitotoo e woodi teddungal, ko uvaa walaa semmbee, ko ummitotoo e woodi semmbee.
46015044	Ko uvaa no ɓanndu lesdinkeeru, ko ummitotoo no ɓanndu ruhunkeeru. E woodi ɓalli lesdinkeeji, e woodi ɓalli ruhunkeeji.
46015045	Ɗum vinndaama nder Deftere~: «~Aadamu arandeejo laatake mo yonki.~» Aadamu cakitiiɗo boo, no Ruhu kokkoowo yonki.
46015046	Wanaa ruhunkeejo aarti wargo, ammaa lesdinkeejo aarti wargo, ɓaawo ɗoon ruhunkeejo wari.
46015047	Neɗɗo arano oon e lesdi ivoyi, gam e mbulmbuldi o tagiraa. Neɗɗo ɗiɗaɓo boo, dow ivoyi.
46015048	Noon no ivoyɗo e mbulmbuldi va'i, noon ivoyɓe e mbulmbuldi mba'i. Noon no ivoyɗo asama va'i, noon ivoyɓe asama mba'i.
46015049	Noon no nanndirɗen e ivoyɗo e lesdi, noon boo nanndirten e ivoyɗo asama.
46015050	Banndiraaɓe, raa ko ngiɗmi vi'igo on~: ɓe ɓanndu ndu teewu e ƴiiƴam mbaawataa rongo laamu Allah, kadimaa nyoleyɗo waawataa rongo ko nyolataa.
46015051	Ngewee mi vannginana on ko suuɗi~: wanaa en fuu maayata, ammaa en fuu en ngaylitetee
46015052	wakkaci go'otum kama maƴƴannde yitere, to luwal timmoode jaamaniiru fuufaama. To ngal fuufaama, maaynooɓe no ummodoto e ɓalli ɗi nyolataa, ndeen enen boo ngayliteeɗen.
46015053	Gam doole ɓalli nyolooji ɓornoo ɓalli ɗi nyolataa, ɓalli maayooji boo ɓornoo ɓalli ɗi maayataa.
46015054	To ɓalli nyolooji ɓornake ɗi nyolataa, maayooji ɓornake ɗi maayataa, ndeen ko vinndaa nder Deftere Seniinde no goonɗey~: «~Jaalorgal moɗii maayde.~»
46015055	«~Maayde, toye jaalorgal maaɗa woni~? Maayde, toye semmbee tooke maaɗa woni~?~»
46015056	Baawɗe maayde ivii e hakke, baawɗe hakke boo ivii e Tawreeta.
46015057	Ammaa yettoore laatanoo Allah kokkuɗo en jaalorgal gada e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu.
46015058	Gam ma'ajum banndiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, laatee dariiɓe ɓe ndimmbataako, ti'inee yahago yeeso nyalaande fuu nder kuugal Jawmiraawo, sabu on anndi ko kuwoton nder kawtal mooɗon e Jawmiraawo laataaki mehere.
46016001	Jo'oni emi yiɗi toontaago on dow haala hawritgo ceede gam yimɓe Allah wonɓe Urusaliima. Mbaɗee noon no mbi'inoomi ikiliisiyaaji gonɗi lesdi Galaatiya.
46016002	Nyannde alat fuu, koo moye mooɗon no hawrit ko waawi, to' on ndeentu faa mi wara, ndeen kawriton ballal ngaal.
46016003	To mi warii, mi liley ɓeen ɓe cuɓoton e ɗereeji anndinooji, ɓe njahara ballal mooɗon Urusaliima.
46016004	To e haani miin boo mi yaha, mi yahadey e maɓɓe.
46016005	To mi yaaloyii lesdi Makedooniya mi warey to mooɗon, gam mi anniyake yaaldoygo toon.
46016006	Kiila mi jooɗoo to mooɗon wakkaci seɗɗa, koo maa mi dabba to mooɗon, gam mballon yam nder jahaangal am to njaheymi fuu.
46016007	To mi warii to mooɗon mi yiɗaa dillugo jaawɗum. Emi yiɗi jooɗaago to mooɗon wakkaci seɗɗa, to Jawmiraawo jaɓii.
46016008	Ammaa mi jooɗoto si'ire Efesu faa juulɗe Pentekos ngara,
46016009	gam mi heɓii laawol huugo kuugal nafoowal, koo nde laatii wanywanyɓe ɗuuɗanii yam.
46016010	To Timote warii to mooɗon, njaɓɓee mo booɗɗum, faa o veddito, gam kanko boo o kuwanoowo Jawmiraawo kama am.
46016011	To' koo go'oto mooɗon yavo mo. Ammaa mballee mo nder jahaangal ma'ako, faa o vittoya to am jam, gam miin e banndiraaɓe emin ndeenti garol ma'ako.
46016012	Dow e banndii en Apolos, mi torake mo korey o yahada e banndiraaɓe to mooɗon, ammaa o jaɓaay wargo jo'oni, yeeso seɗɗa o warey to mooɗon to o heɓii laawol.
46016013	Ti'inee semmbiɗingo goonɗinki mooɗon, cemmbiɗinee ɓerɗe mooɗon, laatee worɓe.
46016014	Ko mbaɗoton fuu, mba'aree ɗum e yiɗde.
46016015	Eɗon anndi Istefaanus e wuro muuɗum aartii laataago goonɗinɓe nder lesdi Aakaya fuu, eɓe ti'inii boo huwango goonɗinɓe.
46016016	Emi toroo on~: ɗowtanee iri yimɓe ɓeen e huudiɗɗaaɓe maɓɓe ti'iniiɓe.
46016017	Mi nanii belɗum garki Istefaanus e Fortunaatus e Akaykus. Ɓe mbaɗanii yam ko onon on mbaawaay waɗango yam, gam on ngalaa ɗo'o.
46016018	Ɓe mbaaltinii ɓernde am e ɓerɗe mooɗon fuu. Gam ma'ajum, mawninee iri yimɓe ɓeen.
46016019	Ikiliisiyaaji gonɗi lesdi Aasiya fuu e kinna on. Akiilas e Piriisiila e goonɗinɓe hawrooɓe wuro maɓɓe e kinna on korey nder innde Jawmiraawo.
46016020	Banndiraaɓe fuu e kinna on. Onon boo kinnindiree e hinnoore yiɗde.
46016021	Miin Bulus vinndi nde'e hinnoore e junngo am.
46016022	Mo yiɗaa Jawmiraawo fuu, la'anoore e dow muuɗum~! War, aan Jawmiraawo amin Yeesu~!
46016023	Yiɗde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu wondu e mooɗon~!
46016024	Emi yiɗi on, on fuu, nder kawtal meeɗen e Yeesu Almasiifu.
47001001	Miin Bulus lilaaɗo Yeesu Almasiifu gada e nyumo Allah, e banndii en Timote mbinndani on ngo'ol ɗereewol. Emin kinna ikiliisiya Allah ngonka Korontu e seniiɓe wonɓe nder lesdi Aakaya fuu.
47001002	Allah Baaba meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu mbarkiɗin on, kokka on jam nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
47001003	Maaltemma Allah Baaba Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu. Kanko woni Baabiraawo keeɓɗo yurmeende, Allah de''itinoowo ɓerɗe dum.
47001004	Kanko semmbiɗinta ɓerɗe meeɗen nder torraaji meeɗen fuu, gam enen boo mbaawen semmbiɗingo ɓerɗe wonɓe nder torraaji feere-feere, noon no Allah semmbiɗiniri ɓerɗe meeɗen.
47001005	Noon no min njardi torraaji ɗuuɗɗi iri ɗi Almasiifu yari, noon boo Almasiifu de''itinirta ɓerɗe amin ɗuuɗɗum.
47001006	To min torraama minon, ɗum gam ɓerɗe mooɗon nde''itinee kisneeɗon. To Allah de''itinii ɓerɗe amin minon, ɗum laatoto gam ɓerɗe mooɗon cemmbiɗa, mbaawon munyango torraaji iri ɗi min njarata.
47001007	Emin koolii on korey, gam emin anndi noon no kawtirɗon e amin nder torraaji, noon kadimaa kawtirton e amin nder de''itineeki ki min keɓi.
47001008	Banndiraaɓe, emin ngiɗi anndingo on torraaji ɗi min njari nder lesdi Aasiya. Torraaji ɗiin teddanii min korey, ɗi ɓadake ɓurgo semmbee amin, faa min ittii tammunde yonkiiji amin.
47001009	Min nanii nder ɓerɗe amin kama min taƴanaaɓe ceri'a maayde. Kanjum ɗum laatake gam min ekkitoo hoolaago Allah ummitinoowo maayɓe, naa hoolaago baawɗe ko'e amin.
47001010	Min ngoonɗinii kanko kisnuɗo min nde'e maayde hulniinde, o hisney min ɗo'o yeeso boo. Goonga, emin ngoonɗini o ɓesdey hisnugo min.
47001011	Onon, do'aaje mooɗon e mballa min. Noon boo yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe e ndo''oo gam amin. Allah boo no jaɓey do'aaje maɓɓe. Ndeen yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe no ngettey Allah sabu barkaaji ɗi min keɓi gada e toontol do'aaje ɗeen.
47001012	Raa ko min mantorto~: nyumooji ɓerɗe amin boo e caaydanoo min, jo'onde amin nder duuniyaaru, ɓurna muuɗum nder mooɗon, e nde laatii laaɓnde, goongaare iɓnde to Allah. Min tokkaay anndal yimɓe duuniyaaru, ammaa yiɗde Allah tan ɗowi min.
47001013	-
47001014	Nder ɗereeji amin min mbinndantaa on goɗɗum, to naa ko mbaawɗon janngugo e fahamugo. Jo'oni eɗon pahama ɗum seɗɗa tan, ammaa yeeso ɗo'o emi yiɗi pahamon ɗum booɗɗum. Ndeen on mbaawey mantoraago min, noon no minon boo min mantortoo on nyannde bittoyki Yeesu Jawmiraawo meeɗen.
47001015	Mi tabbitinii dow ma'ajum, kanjum waɗi ngiɗnoomi wargo to mooɗon, gam keɓon barkaa nde ɗiɗi.
47001016	Emi yiɗnoo yaalgo to mooɗon, ndeen mi wutoroo lesdi Makedooniya. To mi vittoyii gada Makedooniya boo, mi yaalta to mooɗon, gam mballon yam nder jahaangal am yahago lesdi Yahuudiya.
47001017	Nde mbi'inoomi mi warey to mooɗon, on tammii ɓerɗe ɗiɗi mbi'irumi ka naa~? Nakay on tammii mi vi'a «~ee~», ndeen kadimaa mi vi'a «~a'aa~», kama baɗoowo ko yiɗi~?
47001018	Daahir Allah saaydanii min, ko min mbi'i on laataaki «~ee~» e «~a'aa~» fuu nde wo'ore.
47001019	Gam Yeesu Almasiifu Ɓiɗɗo Allah, mo miin e Siilas e Timote min nga'ajini on habaru muuɗum, naa ɗum mo «~ee~» e «~a'aa~». «~Ee~» tan woni nder ma'ako dum.
47001020	Daahir alkawalji Allah fuu laatake «~ee~» nder Yeesu Almasiifu. Kanjum waɗi enen boo mbi'ireten «~Aamiin~», faa Allah teddinee.
47001021	Kanko tabbitini en nder kawtal e Almasiifu, minon e mooɗon fuu. Kanko boo suɓi en.
47001022	O waɗanii en lammba, gam hollugo enen ɗum ɓe ma'ako. O waɗii Ruhu ma'ako nder ɓerɗe meeɗen kama nannguru ko o siryii hokkugo en ɗo'o yeeso.
47001023	Allah woni caayduujo am, mi maaya to mi fevii. Mi yiɗaa mettinango on ɓerɗe, kanjum haɗi yam so''oyaago Korontu.
47001024	Wanaa darvango goonɗinki mooɗon min ngiɗi, gam on ɗoon tabbiti nder ma'aki. Ammaa emin ngiɗi huudugo e mooɗon gam velvelo mooɗon ɓesdoo.
47002001	Mi yiɗaa mettinango on ɓerɗe, kanjum waɗi paasitiimi wargo to mooɗon tawo.
47002002	To mi mettinanii on ɓerɗe, moye velnantammi ɓernde, to naa onon ɓe mettinammi ɓerɗe~?
47002003	Raa ko waɗi mbinndirmi no mbinndirannoomi on. Mi yiɗaa wargo to yimɓe haanɓe velnugo ɓernde am, ndeen kamɓe ɓe mettina ɓernde am. Mi tabbitinii to mi nanii belɗum, on fuu on naney belɗum.
47002004	Goonga, nder torraa e mettam ɓeram e gonɗi ɗuuɗɗi mbinndannoomi on. Mi yiɗaay mettingo ɓerɗe mooɗon, ammaa emi yiɗi anndingo on no ngiɗrumi on korey.
47002005	To goɗɗo nder mooɗon laatake daliila mettam ɓeram, wanaa miin tan ɗum mettata, ammaa on fuu. Mi vi'aay ka gam mi waanna on.
47002006	Ceri'a ka ɗuuɗɓe mooɗon taƴani neɗɗo oon ka heƴi.
47002007	Jo'oni ko ɓuri vooɗgo woni nja'afanooɗon mo, cemmbiɗinon mo, gam to' mettam ɓeram jaalo mo.
47002008	Gam ma'ajum, emi toroo on, kollee on ngiɗi mo.
47002009	Mi vinndaniino on gam mi liinya on, mi yi'a to on kuutinira ko mbi'imi on fuu.
47002010	Mo nja'afaniiɗon, miin boo mi ya'afanto mo. To mi ya'afake mo, kul maa e woodi ko haani mi ya'afanoo mo, mi ya'afake mo yeeso Almasiifu gam daliila mooɗon,
47002011	sabu to' Ceyɗaan jammbo en, gam en anndi dabareeji ma'ako.
47002012	Nde njottinoomi si'ire Toorowas gam mi wa'ajina Habaru Almasiifu Belɗum, Jawmiraawo omtanii yam laawol waɗgo kuugal ngaal.
47002013	Ammaa ɓernde am waaltaaki, gam mi tawaay banndam Tiitus toon. Kanjum waɗi accootirmi e maɓɓe, ndillirmi lesdi Makedooniya.
47002014	Ammaa yettoore laatanoo Allah kokkeyɗo en jaalorgal dum nder kawtal meeɗen e Almasiifu. Allah huutinirii min gam sankitgo habaru Almasiifu koo toye, kama urdi ndi uureengol muuɗum sankitotoo koo toye fuu.
47002015	Goonga, emin laatii kama urdi mbelndi ndi Almasiifu hokkata Allah, urdi ndiin uureengol ma'ari yottake hisneteeɓe e halkooɓe fuu.
47002016	To hisneteeɓe, ɗum uureengol yonki kokkeyngol ɓe yonki. To halkooɓe boo, ɗum kacceengol maayde bareyngol ɓe. Moye foti sankitgo habaru ɗuum~?
47002017	Minon kam, min luumortaako voliinde Allah, noon no woɓɓe mbaɗata. Ammaa minon emin mbolva yeeso Allah e ɓerɗe laaɓɗe, gam min yimɓe Almasiifu ɓe Allah lili.
47003001	Asee, minon ngeccotoo koo min ɓeye~? Na e haani min ndaara ɗereeji caaydineyɗi ko min laatii, noon no woɓɓe mbaɗata~? Nakay min njaɓey ɗereeji iri ma'aji to mooɗon, gam ɗi kolla woɓɓe min ɓeye~?
47003002	Ay, onon e ko'e mooɗon ngoni ɗereewol amin binndaangol nder ɓerɗe amin, ngol yimɓe fuu mbaawi anndugo e janngugo.
47003003	Ɗum laaɓɗum, onon ngoni ɗereewol ngol Almasiifu vinndi hokki min. Ɗereewol ngool vinndiraaka binndirgel, ammaa ngol vinndiraama Ruhu Allah mo yonki. Ngol vinndaaka dow alluwaaje kaaƴe, ammaa dow alluwaaje ɓerɗe yimɓe.
47003004	Min mbi'ii noon, gam min ngoonɗinii Allah gada e Almasiifu.
47003005	Minon e ko'e amin min ngalaa baawɗe huugo nga'al kuugal sam, ammaa baawɗe amin to Allah ivoyii.
47003006	Kanko hokki min baawɗe laataago huwanooɓe alkawal kesal. Alkawal ngaal daraaki dow dooka mbinndaaka, ammaa ɗum dow Ruhu Ceniiɗo. Gam dooka mbinndaaka e yahara e maayde, ammaa Ruhu e yahara e yonki.
47003007	Dookaaji mbinndaama dow alluwaaje kaaƴe. Wakkaci ma'ajum teddungal Allah yaynake dow yeeso Muusa korey. Koo nde jayngol ngool no buutotoongol, e noon fuu Isiraa'iila'en mbaawaay du'umbaago yeeso ma'ako. Kul dooka ngaddeyka maayde vanngirii e iri nga'al teddungal manngal,
47003008	ndeen kam kuugal Ruhu Ceniiɗo kokkeyngal yonki no vanngirey e teddungal ɓurngal manngu to woɗɗi~!
47003009	To kuugal jahareyngal nder maayde heɓii iri nga'al teddungal, ndeen kuugal jahareyngal nder aadilaaku Allah no ɓurey heɓgo teddungal to woɗɗi.
47003010	Goonga, alkawal aranal walaa darajja, to ngal fotnaama e teddungal alkawal kesal ɓurngal darajja.
47003011	To alkawal aranal buutotoongal wardii e teddungal, ndeen kam alkawal kesal tabbiteyngal faa abadaa no ɓurey teddungal to woɗɗi.
47003012	Gam min ndesi tammunde amin dow ɗe'e ku'uje, waɗi min mbolvata e ngorgu yeeso koo moye.
47003013	Min mbaɗataa kama no Muusa waɗi, cuddunooɗo yeeso muuɗum gudel, gam to' Isiraa'iila'en ngi' no ɗelkitaaki yeeso ma'ako ustortoo.
47003014	Ammaa ɓerɗe maɓɓe mbumi, gam faa hannde eɓe nanndi e huuriiɓe gudel ngeel wakkaci ɓe njanngata alkawal neeɓngal. Ngel huurtaaka, gam sey nder kawtal e Almasiifu tan ngel huurtetee.
47003015	Faa hannde, nde defte Muusa njanngetee fuu, gudel ngeel e ɗoon sudda ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
47003016	Ammaa to neɗɗo tuubii tokkii Jawmiraawo, gudel cuddungel ɓernde muuɗum no sudditetee, noon no Deftere Seniinde vi'i.
47003017	Bi'eteeɗo Jawmiraawo ɗo'o ɗum Ruhu. To Ruhu Jawmiraawo woni fuu, toon rimɗineego woni.
47003018	Enen ɓe geese mu''en cudditaa fuu, darajja Jawmiraawo e yi'itoo nder meeɗen kama daarorgal. Jawmiraawo waylitii en faa nannden e muuɗum, darajja ma'ako ɓesdoo nder meeɗen. Kanjum woni kuugal Jawmiraawo laatiiɗo Ruhu.
47004001	Allah hokkii min nga'al kuugal, sabu o enɗii min. Gam ma'ajum min ittataa tammunde amin.
47004002	Emin caloo kuuɗe cuuɗiiɗe cemtiniiɗe. Min ƴoynataa yimɓe, min ngaylataa haala Allah boo, ammaa emin mbolva goonga ma'aka e njaayri, faa koo moye fuu saaydoo laaɓal nyumooji ɓerɗe amin yeeso Allah nder ɓernde muuɗum.
47004003	To Habaru Belɗum ɗum min nga'ajinta laatake ko suuɗii maa, halkooɓe tan ɗum suuɗani.
47004004	Ɓe ngoonɗinaay, gam Ceyɗaan laamiiɗo ndu'u duuniyaaru vumnii ɓerɗe maɓɓe. O haɗii ɓe yi'igo jayngol ivoyngol to Habaru Belɗum, waato habaru teddungal Almasiifu. Nder Almasiifu boo Allah e hoore muuɗum vanngata.
47004005	Wanaa haala ko'e amin min nga'ajinta, ammaa emin nga'ajina haala Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen. Minon min maccuɓe mooɗon sabu Yeesu.
47004006	Gam Allah biiɗo~: «~Jayngol yaynoo nder niɓre~», kanko oon yaynii jayngol ma'ako nder ɓerɗe meeɗen, faa njaynooɗen gada e anndugo teddungal ma'ako. Teddungal ngaal e yaynoo dow yeeso Almasiifu.
47004007	Ammaa minon heɓɓe risku ruhunkeewu nguun, emin nanndi e gaheeje loɓokke. Kanjum hollata baawɗe mawɗe ɗeen to Allah ɗe ivoyi, wanaa to amin.
47004008	Min torraama torraaji feere-feere, ammaa min njaalaaka. Nyumooji amin njiiɓake korey, ammaa min ittaay tammunde.
47004009	Nde ɗuuɗɗum yimɓe e torra min, ammaa Allah wooraay min. Eɓe ndo''a min e lesdi, ammaa min maayaay.
47004010	Dum emin ndoondii maayde Yeesu dow ɓalli amin, gam faa foofaango ma'ako vannga nder ma'aji.
47004011	To faa emin poofa fuu, nder jootee maayde min ngoni, gam daliila Yeesu. E noon fuu foofaango Yeesu no vanngey nder ɓalli amin maayooji.
47004012	To noon, maayde e huwa nder amin, gam yonki huwa nder mooɗon.
47004013	Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Mi goonɗinii, kanjum waɗi mbolvumi.~» Minon boo emin ngoodi iri goonɗinki kiin, kanjum waɗi min ngoorataa wa'ajingo Habaru Belɗum.
47004014	Emin anndi boo Allah ummitinɗo Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu nder maayde, o ummitiney min minon boo, o darna min, minon e mooɗon fuu yeeso ma'ako.
47004015	Ɗum ɗoon fuu laatake sabu mooɗon, gam faa caahu Allah ɓesda yottaago to yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe. Noon yettooɓe Allah boo ɓesdorto, ɓe teddina mo.
47004016	Gam ma'ajum en ittataa tammunde. Koo nde laatii ɓalli meeɗen e ustoo, ammaa yonki ɗum Allah hokki en e ɗoon hesɗita nyannde fuu.
47004017	Daahir torraaji ɗi torreteeɗen jo'oni ɗi pamari, ɗi neeɓataa, ammaa ɗi njaharey en e teddungal manngal tabbitoowal, ɓurngal koo ɗume fuu.
47004018	En tasaaki dow ko yi'etee, ammaa en ɗoon tasii dow ko yi'ataake. Ko yi'etee neeɓataa, ammaa ko yi'ataake ɗuum kam tabbitata faa abadaa.
47005001	Eɗen anndi suudu laral ndu ngonɗen nder muuɗum jo'oni no sissitoto, waato ɓalli meeɗen. To suudu nduun sissitaama, Allah no hokkey en suudu toon asama ndu yimɓe nyiɓaay, tabbiteyndu faa abadaa.
47005002	Jo'oni en ɗoon uuma, gam en kaaɓii nattugo cuuɗi meeɗen assamaaji, ɗi ɓornotooɗen kama koltal.
47005003	Gam to en ɓornaama ɗi, en laatataako ɓe cuhuraaki yeeso Allah.
47005004	Nde ngonnooɗen nder suudu laral lesdiiru, en ɗoon otta gam tedduɗum. Naa gam en ngiɗi ɓortaago ndu, ammaa en ngiɗi ɓornaago ɓanndu asama dow ma'aru, gam faa yonki jaaloo maayde.
47005005	Allah e hoore muuɗum e huwa nder meeɗen, gam faa keɓen ɗum. O hokkii en Ruhu ma'ako kama nannguru barkaaji ɗi o hokkata en ɗo'o yeeso.
47005006	Kanjum waɗi ɓerɗe meeɗen e tiiɗi wakkaci fuu. En anndi boo to faa en njooɗii nder ɗi'i ɓalli meeɗen, en ngoɗɗi e suudu meeɗen wondu to Jawmiraawo.
47005007	Foofaango meeɗen e yahada e goonɗinki, naa e ko ngi'eten e gite.
47005008	Gam ma'ajum en keevi ngorgu manngu. Ko ɓurɗen yiɗgo woni ceeden e ɗi'i ɓalli, kooten njooɗodooɗen e Jawmiraawo.
47005009	Koo en ɗo'o nder duuniyaaru, koo en toon dow asama, ko ɓurɗen yiɗgo woni mbaɗen ko velata mo.
47005010	Sabu doole en fuu ndaroyooɗen yeeso Almasiifu, gam o sernana en, koo moye fuu heɓa biya kuugal muuɗum ngal huwi nder duuniyaaru, koo booɗngal koo ngal vooɗaa.
47005011	Nde laatii emin anndi ko woni ɗowtanaago Jawmiraawo, gam ma'ajum emin ndaara nanngugo hakkiilooji yimɓe dow ma'ajum. Allah e anndi min booɗɗum, emi tammii onon boo on anndi min nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
47005012	Min ngiɗaa mango ko'e amin yeeso mooɗon, ammaa emin ngiɗi hokkugo on laawol mantoraago min, gam keɓon toontaago mantortooɓe ko yi'etee e gite tan, wanaa ko woni nder ɓerɗe.
47005013	To yimɓe mbi'ii min haaŋaaɓe maa, ɗum gam Allah min laatii haaŋaaɓe. To min laatake ɓe hakkiilo boo, ɗum gam ɗum nafa on.
47005014	Ko mbaɗeten fuu, gada e yiɗde Almasiifu ɗum ivi. En tabbitinii to go'oto maayanii yimɓe fuu, ndeen yimɓe fuu laatake maayɓe.
47005015	Almasiifu maayanii yimɓe fuu, gam ma'ajum ɓeen heɓɓe yonki kesum njeyaa foofaango mu''en, ammaa ɓe poofey gam oon maayɗo ummitinaa gam maɓɓe.
47005016	Gam ma'ajum, gada jo'oni min ɓesdataa raargo goɗɗo noon no yimɓe ndaardata. Koo to minon min meeɗiino raardugo Almasiifu e daarɗe ɗeen, jo'oni min ɓesdataa raardugo mo noon.
47005017	To neɗɗo hawtii e Almasiifu o laatake tagitaaɗo keso. Ko o laatinoo fuu buutake, o hesɗitinaama.
47005018	Ɗum fuu ɗum kuugal Allah liloyɗo Almasiifu, gam narrina en e ma'ako. O hokkii en boo kuugal narringo woɓɓe e ma'ako.
47005019	Gada e Almasiifu, Allah narrini hoore muuɗum e yimɓe duuniyaaru, o limaay hakkeeji maɓɓe. O hokkii min boo wa'ajingo habaru narral ngaal.
47005020	Gam ma'ajum emin laatii wakiili'en Almasiifu. E ɗum nanndi kama Allah e hoore muuɗum volvanta on gada e konnduɗe amin. Emin toroo on nder innde Almasiifu~: narree e Allah~!
47005021	Almasiifu meeɗaay waɗgo hakke sam, ammaa Allah yowii hakkeeji meeɗen fuu dow ma'ako, gam laatooɗen goonga'en yeeso Allah, sabu kawtal meeɗen e Almasiifu.
47006001	Minon min huudiɗɗaaɓe Allah, gam ma'ajum emin toroo on to' on meheriɗin caahu Allah ngu keɓɗon.
47006002	Gam Allah vi'i~: «~Nder wakkaci kaanduɗum, mi jaɓii tornde mooɗon, nyalaande kisndam mi vallii on.~» Rah, jo'oni woni wakkaci kaanduɗum, hannde woni nyalaande kisndam.
47006003	Min ngiɗaa waɗgo ko fergata yimɓe, gam to' goɗɗo heɓ laawol felgo kuugal amin.
47006004	Ammaa nder koo ɗume fuu emin ngiɗi hollugo min huwanooɓe Allah, emin ti'inii munyango torraaji e caɗeele e daamayeeje.
47006005	Min piyaama, min omndaama nder kaso, ɗum umminii fitina dow amin, min kuwii faa min tampi, nde ɗuuɗɗum min ɗaanaaki, min ndoli.
47006006	Min kollii min huwanooɓe Allah gada e ɓerɗe laaɓɗe e anndal e munyal e mbooɗeenga e Ruhu Ceniiɗo e yiɗde goongaare,
47006007	gada e volvugo goonga e jogaago baawɗe Allah. Goongaaku e laatanii min kaɓruɗum ɗum min njogii gam fiigo wanywanyɓe amin, e gam reengo ko'e amin.
47006008	Woɓɓe e njaltinira min, woɓɓe e teddina min. Woɓɓe e kuɗa min, woɓɓe e mana min, woɓɓe e ndaara min fevooɓe, koo to goonga min mbi'ata.
47006009	Emin ndaaree kama ɓe anndaaka, ammaa koo moye e anndi min. Emin ndaaree kama maayɓe, ammaa rah, emin poofa. Emin piyee, ammaa min mbaraaka.
47006010	Eɓe mettina ɓerɗe amin, ammaa dum emin nana belɗum. Emin ndaaree min sooyɓe, ammaa emin ndiskina yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe. Emin ndaaree kama min ngalaa koo ɗume, ammaa emin ngoodi hu'unde fuu.
47006011	Onon Korontu'en, min cuuɗaay on koo ɗume, min omtanii on ɓerɗe amin fuu.
47006012	Minon, min njaajinanii on ɓerɗe amin, ammaa onon on paaɗnanii min ɗe mooɗon.
47006013	Emi volvana on kama ɓikkon am~: onon boo omtanee min ɓerɗe mooɗon~!
47006014	To' on kawtu ko'e e ɓe ngoonɗinaay. Noye aadilaaku hawtirta e halleende~? Na noye jayngol hawtirta e niɓre~?
47006015	Almasiifu e Ceyɗaan mbaawataa narrugo. To noon kam, noye goonɗinɗo narrata e mo goonɗinaay~?
47006016	Ɗume hawti Wuro Allah Seniingo e gumkiiji~? Anndee, enen ngoni Wuro Allah mo yonki. Gam Allah vi'i~: «~Mi jooɗodoto e maɓɓe, mi wondey e maɓɓe, mi laatoto Allah maɓɓe, kamɓe boo ɓe laatoto yimɓe am.~»
47006017	Kanjum waɗi Jawmiraawo vi'i ɓe~: «~Mburtee nder ɓe ngoonɗinaay~! Ceedee e maɓɓe~! To' on meem ko nyiddi~! Ndeen mi jaɓey on.~»
47006018	«~Mi laatanto on baaba, onon boo on laatanto yam ɓiɓɓe worɓe e rewɓe.~» Noon Jawmiraawo mo baawɗe vi'i.
47007001	Yiɗaaɓe am, ɗi'i alkawalji fuu e laatii ɗi meeɗen. Gam ma'ajum, sey laaɓnen ko'e meeɗen gada e ko nyiddinta ɓalli meeɗen, e ruhuuji meeɗen fuu, tabbitinen senaare meeɗen e kulol Allah.
47007002	Omtanee min ɓerɗe mooɗon. Walaa mo min mbaɗani layfi, walaa mo min majjini, walaa mo min njammbii boo.
47007003	Mi vi'aay ɗum gam mi sernana on. Mi aartii mi vi'ii on~: emin ngiɗi on korey. Walaa ko senndata en~: koo nder maayde koo nder foofaango.
47007004	Emi hoolii on booɗɗum, emi mantoroo on korey. Koo nder torraaji am fuu, mi heevii velvelo e semmbee ɓernde.
47007005	Nde min njottii lesdi Makedooniya, min keɓaay fooftiinde, min pottii e torraaji feere-feere. Jokkirli yimɓe tummbii min, kulol nanngii ɓerɗe amin.
47007006	Ammaa Allah cemmbiɗinoowo ɓerɗe torraaɓe, semmbiɗinirii ɓerɗe amin gada e garol Tiitus.
47007007	Wanaa garol ma'ako tan semmbiɗini ɓerɗe amin, ammaa faa e nango no cemmbiɗinirɗon ɓernde ma'ako. O yeccake yam no ngeewnirɗon yam, e no ngoorruɗon mettam ɓeram gam am, e no ti'inoriiɗon jinngango yam. Kanjum ɗuum ɓuri velgo yam.
47007008	Daahir ɗereewol ngol mbinndannoomi on mettiniino ɓerɗe mooɗon. Nde nanmi ɗum, mi voytii vinndugo ngol wakkaci seɗɗa.
47007009	Ammaa jo'oni emi nana belɗum, wanaa gam mi mettinii ɓerɗe mooɗon, ammaa gam mettam ɓeram mooɗon yaharii on e tuubu. Mettam ɓeram mooɗon ɗaam ɗum fodde nyumo Allah, to noon, min mbaɗanaay on layfi.
47007010	Gam mettam ɓeram fodde nyumo Allah e waɗa neɗɗo tuuba, tuubu boo no waddey kisndam. Iri ɗa'am mettam ɓeram voytaandu walaa. Ammaa mettam ɓeram fodde gikku duuniyaaru no yaharey nder maayde.
47007011	Mettam ɓeram mooɗon velii Allah. Raa ko ɗam waddani on~: ɗam hokkii on ti'inaare e yiɗde laaɓnugo ko'e mooɗon gada e hakke. Ɗam findinii ɓerɗe mooɗon, ɗam hulnii on. On ti'inake fooraago baɗɗo hakke, on ngeewnii yi'igo yam boo. E ma'ajum fuu, on kollii on laaɓɓe.
47007012	Nde mbinndannoomi on ɗereewol, mi vinndaay ngol gam baɗɗo layfi, koo gam baɗanaaɗo layfi, ammaa mi vinndanii on gam faa yiɗde nde ngiɗɗon min vannga yeeso Allah.
47007013	Kanjum semmbiɗini ɓerɗe amin. Belɗum ɗum Tiitus nani, kam ɓuri semmbiɗingo min, gam on fuu on cemmbiɗinii ɓernde ma'ako.
47007014	Daahir, mi mantorake on yeeso Tiitus, onon boo on cemtinaay yam. Ko min mbi'ani on fuu ɗum goonga. Manoore nde min mani on yeeso Tiitus boo laatake goonga.
47007015	Nde Tiitus hiimtii no njaɓɓoriiɗon mo e kulol e diwngol, e no tokkirɗon bolle ma'ako fuu, yiɗde nde o yiɗi on e ɓesdoo.
47007016	Emi nana belɗum sabu emi waawi hoolaago on nder koo ɗume fuu.
47008001	Banndiraaɓe, emin ngiɗi anndingo on ko caahu Allah huwi nder ikiliisiyaaji gonɗi lesdi Makedooniya.
47008002	Ɓe njarii torraaji ɗuuɗɗi, ammaa ɓe nanii belɗum korey, faa ɓe mballirii banndiraaɓe maɓɓe e caahuuji ɗuuɗɗi, koo nde laatii eɓe nder cooyndam naawɗam.
47008003	Emi saaydii ɓe kokkii ko ɓe mbaawi fuu, faa maa e ko ɓuri noon. Ɓe kokkirii ɗum boo e yiɗde maɓɓe naa e doole.
47008004	Ɓe torake min korey gam min kokka ɓe laawol waɗgo juuɗe maɓɓe nder vallooɓe goonɗinɓe wonɓe Urusaliima.
47008005	Ɓe mbaɗii ko ɓuri ko min tammi, gam ɓe aartii ɓe kokkii ko'e maɓɓe Jawmiraawo, ndeen ɓe kokkirii min ko'e maɓɓe minon boo, fodde nyumo Allah.
47008006	Kanjum waɗi min torii Tiitus valla on yottingo ballal ngaal, noon no puɗɗirɗon ngal e caahu.
47008007	On riskuɓe e koo ɗume fuu, on keevii goonɗinki e bolle anndal e ti'inaare e yiɗde nde ngiɗɗon min. Nde laatii on keɓii ɗum ɗoon fuu, emin ngiɗi kuwon kuugal caahaaki kiin e ɓerɗe mooɗon fuu.
47008008	Wanaa ɗum doole mbaɗeymi on, ammaa emi yiɗi mi hokka on habaru ti'inaare woɓɓe, gam faa ɗum hokka on laawol hollugo yiɗde mooɗon no goongaare.
47008009	Gam eɗon anndi yiɗde nde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu waɗani en. Kanko jawmu risku fuu, o laatinii hoore ma'ako cooyɗo, gam o laatina on riskuɓe gada e cooyndam ma'ako.
47008010	Mi yeccoto on ko nyummi dow e vallugo goonɗinɓe wonɓe Urusaliima, gam ɗum nafey on. Rowani onon ngoni aramɓe e nyumgo vallugo ɓe, on puɗɗii ɗum boo.
47008011	Jo'oni sey njottiniron kuugal ngaal e iri ti'inaare nde anniyoriiɗon. Ti'inee huugo ɗum fodde baawɗe mooɗon.
47008012	Gam to on ti'inake hokkugo, Allah no jaɓey kokkal mooɗon. O ƴamataa on ko on ngalaa, sey ko ngoonɗon.
47008013	Mi vi'aay cooynon ko'e mooɗon, gam ndiskinon woɓɓe, ammaa emi yiɗi poton.
47008014	Jo'oni on ngoodi ɗuuɗɗum ko mbaawoton vallirgo wonɓe nder ciya. Kamɓe boo, ɗo'o yeeso, to ɓe keɓii ɗuuɗɗum, ɓe mballey on to on keppi. Noon potal laatorto.
47008015	Ɗum laatoto kama ko vinndaa nder Deftere Seniinde~: «~Mooɓtuɗo ɗuuɗɗum ɓurnaay, mooɓtuɗo seɗɗa boo ɗum ŋakkiraay ɗum.~»
47008016	Yettoore laatanoo Allah baɗɗo ti'inaare iri nde amin nder ɓernde Tiitus gam vallugo on.
47008017	O jaɓii tornde amin. Wanaa kanjum tan, ammaa gam daliila ti'inaare ma'ako, o anniyake wargo to mooɗon kanko e hoore ma'ako.
47008018	Min liley mo, gam o ga'ajinoowo Habaru Belɗum e goonga, kanko e banndii'en mo ikiliisiyaaji fuu manata.
47008019	Wanaa kanjum tan, ammaa ikiliisiyaaji cuɓii mo, gam o ɗofta min wakkaci min njaharata caahu nguun. Min kokkaama ngu, gam teddingo Jawmiraawo e hollugo ti'inaare amin, minon boo.
47008020	Min mbaɗey ko min mbaawi fuu, gam to' goɗɗo fel kuugal amin dow e kokkal ceede ɗuuɗɗe ɗe min kokkaa.
47008021	Emin ngiɗi huugo kuugal booɗngal, naa yeeso Jawmiraawo tan, ammaa faa e yeeso yimɓe.
47008022	Min liloyey goɗɗo banndii'en boo yahada e maɓɓe. Min ngodake mo nde ɗuuɗɗum, min tawii o ti'iniiɗo. Ammaa jo'oni ti'inaare ma'ako ɓesdake, gam emo hoolii on korey.
47008023	Tiitus boo e laatii kuudiɗɗaawo am. Miin e ma'ako emin kuuda gam vallugo on. Banndiraaɓe meeɗen wonduɓe e ma'ako boo no lilaaɓe ikiliisiyaaji, huwooɓe gam teddingo Almasiifu.
47008024	Gam ma'ajum, kollee ɓe yiɗde, ndeen ikiliisiyaaji fuu no anndey daahir, min mantoraaki on e mehere.
47009001	Ɗum laataaki doole mi vinndana on dow vallugo seniiɓe wonɓe Urusaliima,
47009002	gam emi anndi on ngoodi anniya vallugo ɓe korey. Mi mantorake on yeeso yimɓe lesdi Makedooniya. Mi vi'ii ɓe onon yimɓe lesdi Aakaya on ciryake hokkugo ballal mooɗon ila rowani. Ti'inaare mooɗon umminii ɗuuɗma maɓɓe, faa ɓe mballa.
47009003	Ammaa mi liloyey banndiraaɓe ɓeen to mooɗon, gam to' ko min mantortoo on laato mehere, ammaa tawee on ciryii vallugo, noon no mbi'inoomi.
47009004	To naa noon, to mi wardii e yimɓe Makedooniya, min tawii on ciryaaaki hawritgo ballal, ndeen mi semtey dow ɗuum ko mbi'inoomi. Wanaa miin tan semtata, ammaa faa e onon on cemtey.
47009005	Kanjum waɗi nyummi ɗum kaanduɗum mi toroo banndiraaɓe ɓeen aartammi yahago to mooɗon, gam ɓe kawrita kokkal ngal mbaɗɗon alkawal muuɗum. Ndeen to mi warii, mi tawey ɗum hawritaama. Kanjum hollata on kokkii e ɓerɗe laaɓɗe, naa e doole.
47009006	Kiimtee ɗu'um~: aawɗo seɗɗa no taƴey seɗɗa, aawɗo ɗuuɗɗum boo no taƴey ɗuuɗɗum.
47009007	Koo moye fuu no hokku ko ɓernde muuɗum waawi, naa nder mettam ɓeram, naa e doole boo, gam Allah e yiɗi kokkiroowo e velvelo.
47009008	Allah e waawi hebbingo on barkaaji feere-feere, gam keɓon ko heƴata on dum, faa tawee on mbaawi senndango woɓɓe.
47009009	Kama ko Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Emo ye'eda caahuuji ma'ako nder sooyɓe, mbooɗeenga ma'ako e tabbiti faa abadaa.~»
47009010	Allah kokkoowo demoowo aawdi e nyaamdu, no hokkey on onon boo aawdi deydey e bukaata mooɗon. O fuɗna ndi ndi mawna, gam faa caahu mooɗon waɗa nafri ɗuuɗndi.
47009011	O riskiney on nder koo ɗume, gam laatooɗon saahiiɓe dum. Ndeen yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe no ngettey mo, sabu ballal ngal lildoton ɓe gada e juuɗe amin.
47009012	Ballal ngaal laataaki gam biyaago bukaata seniiɓe tan, ammaa e ngal ɓesdana Allah boo yetteego.
47009013	Kokkal ngaal no vannginey goonɗinki mooɗon. Gam ma'ajum yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe no teddiney Allah, gam on ɗowtanake Habaru Almasiifu Belɗum ɗum ngoonɗinɗon. Kadimaa ɓe ngettey mo gam on cenndii risku mooɗon e maɓɓe, faa e woɓɓe boo.
47009014	Eɓe ngeewni on nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, eɓe mbaɗa do'aare gam mooɗon, sabu barkaa makka ka Allah waɗani on.
47009015	Yettoore laatanoo Allah, sabu caahu muuɗum ngu tindintaaku~!
47010001	Woɓɓe e mbi'a miin Bulus mi leestinɗo hoore to emi wondi e mooɗon, ammaa mi ca'atuɗo to mi waldaa e mooɗon. Emi tororoo on e munyal e mbooɗeenga Almasiifu~:
47010002	to' on ndoolam hollugo semmbee am to mi warii to mooɗon. Emi siryii hollugo semmbee am dow ɓeen vi'ooɓe emi huwa gam heɓgo fii duuniyaaru.
47010003	Goonga, min ɓiɓɓe-aadama, ammaa min kaɓrataa noon no ɓiɓɓe-aadama kaɓrata.
47010004	Nder haɓre amin, min kaɓrataa e kaɓruɗum duuniyaaru, sey kaɓruɗum ɗum semmbee muuɗum ivoyi to Allah. E ma'ajum min njaalortoo wanywanyɓe Allah, min kalka nyumooji leliiɗi.
47010005	Emin kalka nyumooji mawnitaare kaɗeyɗi yimɓe anndugo Allah. Emin kawrita nyumooji fuu, min laatina ɗi ɗowtaniiɗi Almasiifu.
47010006	To on kollii ɗowtaare timmunde, ndeen emin ciryii eltugo neɗɗo fuu mo ɗowtaaki.
47010007	Njaɓee ko woni yeeso mooɗon. Nder mooɗon to e woodi tammiiɗo no neɗɗo Almasiifu, sey o fahama minon boo emin laatii yimɓe Almasiifu kama ma'ako.
47010008	Koo to mi mantake ɗuuɗɗum, mi semtirtaa ɗum. Jawmiraawo meeɗen hokkii min baawɗe, faa min njahara on yeeso, naa gam min tampina on.
47010009	Mi yiɗaa tammooɗon emi yiɗi hulnirgo on ɗereeji am.
47010010	Gam woɓɓe e mbi'a ɗereeji am no ca'atuɗi, cemmbiɗɗi. Ammaa to emi wondi e mooɗon, mi ɗelemɗo, bolle am boo no jamniiɗe.
47010011	Bi'eyɗo noon fuu, sey annda~: ko min mbinndata to min ngaldaa e mooɗon, kanjum boo min mbaɗata to emin ngondi e mooɗon.
47010012	Min potaay fotnugo ko'e amin e ɓeen mantortooɓe ko'e mu''en, min nanndaa e maɓɓe boo. Kamɓe eɓe potna ko'e maɓɓe e no ɓe poti, ɓe potnataa ko'e maɓɓe e woɓɓe. Eɗum holla ɓe ƴoƴaa~!
47010013	Ammaa minon min mantortaako noon, min ƴaɓɓataako keerol to Allah darni min. O yottinii min e waddugo Habaru Belɗum to mooɗon. Kanjum woni ko min mantorto.
