47010014	Kul min njahaayno to mooɗon, daa min ƴaɓɓake keerol to Allah darni min, min mbaɗaay ko o yiɗi. Ammaa min ƴaɓɓaaki keerol ngool, gam minon ngoni aramɓe e waddango on Habaru Almasiifu Belɗum.
47010015	Min mantortaako kuugal woɓɓe ngal walanaa min. Emin tammii to goonɗinki mooɗon ɓesdake, kuugal amin boo no ɓesdoto nder mooɗon. Ammaa min ngiɗaa ƴaɓɓaago keerol to Allah darni min.
47010016	Noon min keɓrata laawol yaharugo Habaru Belɗum nder goɗɗe lesɗe ɓurɗe woɗɗugo, to yimɓe ɓe meeɗaay nango Habaru Belɗum. E noon fuu, min mantortaako kuugal ngal woɓɓe aarti kuwi nder gese mu''en.
47010017	Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Mantotooɗo fuu, sey mantoroo kuugal Jawmiraawo.~»
47010018	Wanaa maneyɗo hoore muuɗum woni gerdaaɗo, gerdaaɗo woni mo Jawmiraawo mani.
47011001	Koo to mi laatake kama kaaŋaaɗo, emi yiɗi munyanon yam seɗɗa. Emi toroo on munyanee yam.
47011002	Emi ha'aja on e ka'ajal ivoyngal to Allah, gam on laatii ɓe ɗaɓɓanmi gorko go'oto, waato Almasiifu. Emi yiɗi yaharugo on to ma'ako kama surbaajo laaɓɗo mo anndaa gorko.
47011003	On anndi no mbo'odi ƴoyniri Hawwa e ƴoyre ma'ari. Emi hula onon boo, nyumooji mooɗon mbonnoroo kama noon, faa ngooron tokkugo Almasiifu e ɓernde wo'ore laaɓnde.
47011004	Mi hulii ɗum, gam to goɗɗo warii wa'ajinii on habaru Yeesu feere ɗum min nga'ajinaay on, on munyana mo e koyɗum. On njaɓey ruhu feere e Habaru Belɗum feere ɗum on nanaayno to amin.
47011005	Mi tammaaki ɓeen ɓe ndaaroton no «~lilaaɓe mawɓe~» ɓurii yam.
47011006	Ɗum baɗoojum mi laataaki vela ɗemngaljo kama maɓɓe, ammaa miin boo mi dullaay anndal. Mi vannginanii on ngal laaɓɗum nder koo ɗume.
47011007	Mi wa'ajinii on Habaru Allah Belɗum e caahu. Mi leestinii hoore am gam laatooɗon mawɓe. To noon, kanjum mba'aranmi on layfi naa~?
47011008	Nde kuweynoomi nder mooɗon, mi jaɓii ceede to ikiliisiyaaji feere, gam mi huwana on.
47011009	Nde ngondunoomi e mooɗon, ɓillaare ceede heɓii yam, ammaa e noon fuu mi laatanaaki goɗɗo mooɗon donngal. Banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe ivoyɓe Makedooniya ngaddanii yam ko ŋakkiri yam. Wakkaci ma'ajum mi yowanaay on donngal ngaal. Koo yeeso ɗo'o boo mi yiɗaa yowango on ngal.
47011010	Gada e goonga Almasiifu ngonka nder am waɗi mbi'eymi on ɗu'um~: nder lesdi Aakaya fuu walaa koo moye baawɗo haɗgo yam mantoraago ɗum.
47011011	Gam ɗume mi yiɗaa laatanaago on donngal~? Gam mi yiɗaa on naa~? A'aa, Allah e anndi emi yiɗi on~!
47011012	Mi yahey yeeso e huugo noon no kuureynoomi, gam to' mi hokku vi'eteeɓe «~lilaaɓe mawɓe~» laawol mantaago, eɓe mbi'a eɓe kuwa deydey e kuugal amin.
47011013	Yimɓe ɓeen, ɓe laataaki lilaaɓe goonga'en, ɓe fevooɓe. Ɓe laatinii ko'e maɓɓe kama lilaaɓe Almasiifu.
47011014	Ɗum ɗoon haaynaaki, gam koo Ceyɗaan e laatina hoore muuɗum malaa'ikaajo jayngol.
47011015	Gam ma'ajum, ɗum haaynaaki to huwooɓe ma'ako laatinii ko'e mu''en huwooɓe goonga. Ammaa ɓe keɓey laada deydey e kuuɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe.
47011016	Ko mbi'imi on naane, mi ɓesdey vi'igo on ɗum~: to' goɗɗo nyum mi kaaŋaaɗo. Ammaa to o nyumii noon, ndeen kam njaɓee yam kama kaaŋaaɗo, gam faa mi heɓa mantaago seɗɗa.
47011017	Ko mbolvumi jo'oni naa ɗum ko Jawmiraawo yiɗi, gam to mi mantake, mi volvey kama kaaŋaaɗo, ammaa emi woodi ko mantortoomi.
47011018	Nde laatii ɗuuɗɓe e mantoroo fii duuniyaaru, to noon miin boo mi mantoto.
47011019	Onon tammiiɓe no hakkilɓe, eɗon nana belɗum munyango haaŋaaɓe.
47011020	Lilaaɓe fevooɓe ɓeen e laatina on kama maccuɓe, eɓe nyaama jawdi mooɗon, eɓe ƴoyna on, eɓe njavii on, eɓe maaroo on, e noon fuu eɗon munyana ɓe.
47011021	Emi semta vi'igo minon min tampuɓe nde min mbaɗaay iri ɗen ɗoon ku'uje. Jo'oni kam, to goɗɗo e woodi ngorgu mantoraago goɗɗum, miin boo emi woodi ngorgu mantoraago ɗum, koo to emi volva kama kaaŋaaɗo.
47011022	To ɓe Yahuudu'en, miin boo mi Yahuuduujo. To ɓe Isiraa'iila'en, miin boo mi Isiraa'iilankeejo. To ɓe lenyol Ibraahim, miin boo mi lenyol Ibraahim.
47011023	Jo'oni kam, mi volvey kama kaaŋaaɗo. To ɓe huwanooɓe Almasiifu, miin mi ɓurii ɓe. Mi ɓurii ɓe ti'inaare, e omndeego nder kaso, e fiyeego piiɗe ɗuuɗɗe, e nattugo nder jootee maayde.
47011024	Nde jovi Yahuudu'en piyi yam buulaalaaji talaatiin e joveenayi (39).
47011025	Nde tati Roomankoo'en piiri yam cabbi. Mi ferdaama kaaƴe nde wo'ore. Nde tati emi natta akale ndiyam, eɗe njoolodoo e am nder maayo. Mi waɗii jemmaare wo'ore e nyalawmaare wo'ore nder maayo manngo.
47011026	Nder jahaale am mi fottii e torraaji ɗuuɗɗi~: torraaji nder maayo, wuyɓe torrii yam, lenyol am torrii yam, ɓe laataaki lenyol am boo torrii yam. Mi nattii torraa nder si'ire, e nder ladde hawgaare, e nder maayo manngo. Banndiraaɓe fewre'en boo torrii yam.
47011027	Mi huwii faa mi tampi, nde ɗuuɗɗum mi ɗaanaaki. Mi nanii veelo e ɗomka, mi suumake nde ɗuuɗɗum. Kolndam e peewol torrii yam.
47011028	E woodi ko mi limtaay. Nder ma'ajum fuu, ko ɓuri waannugo yam koo ndeye woni nyumgo dow ikiliisiyaaji.
47011029	To goɗɗo tampii nder laawol Jawmiraawo, ɗum laatanto yam kama miin tampi. To ɗum waɗii goɗɗo do''ake nder hakke boo, eɗum wula ɓernde am korey.
47011030	To ɗum doole mi manto, sey mi mantoroo ko hollata tampere am.
47011031	Allah Baaba Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu e anndi mi fevaay. Maaltoore laatanoo mo faa abadaa.
47011032	Nde ngonnoomi Dimaska, kaliifaajo laamiiɗo bi'eteeɗo Areetas reenni yimɓe dammuɗe si'ire, gam ɓe nannga yam.
47011033	Ammaa goonɗinɓe mbaɗi yam nder sompoore, ɓe mburtiniri yam nder taagayel katanngaawol piltoyiingol si'ire. Noon kisrumi junngo kaliifaajo oon.
47012001	Doole mi manto, koo to ɗum nafataa. E noon fuu, mi volvey ko Jawmiraawo holli yam e ko o vannginani yam.
47012002	Emi anndi goɗɗo neɗɗo gonɗo nder kawtal e Almasiifu. O ƴeentinaama asama ɓurɗum towgo, ko waɗi duuɓi sappo e nayi, ndeen o warti. Koo o ƴeentinaama nder ɓanndu, koo naa nder ɓanndu, mi anndaa. Allah tan anndi.
47012003	-
47012004	Emi anndi neɗɗo oon o nattinaama nder aljanna. Koo e ɓanndu o nattidina, koo naa e ɓanndu, mi anndaa, Allah tan anndi. Toon o nani bolle sirriije ɗe neɗɗo fotaay volvugo.
47012005	Kanko oon mantortoomi. Mi mantortaako hoore am, to naa tampere am tan.
47012006	Kul mi yiɗii mantaago, mi laatataako kaaŋaaɗo, gam ko mbi'eymi ɗum goonga. Ammaa mi mantataako, gam to' yimɓe ɓurnam dow ko ɓe ngi'i emi huwa, e ko ɓe nani e bolle am.
47012007	Allah hollii yam kaayniiɗumji ɗi tindintaake. Ammaa gam to' mi mantoro ɗi, o waɗanii yam ko naawatammi nder ɓanndu kama gi'al. Eɗum laatanii yam kama lilaaɗo Ceyɗaan piyeyɗo yam, gam haɗa yam mantaago.
47012008	Nde tati toriimi Jawmiraawo faa o ittanam mi ɗum.
47012009	Ammaa o toontii yam, o vi'i~: «~Yiɗde am heƴii ma. Nder tampere maaɗa baawɗe am ɓurata huugo.~» Gam ma'ajum, mantoraago tampere am no ɓuraney yam, faa baawɗe Almasiifu njooɗoo nder am.
47012010	Kanjum waɗi naneymi belɗum tampere am. Mi naney belɗum huɗeego e ɓilleego e torreego e hulneego gam daliila Almasiifu, gam nde tampumi fuu, ndeen ɓesdeymi heɓgo semmbee.
47012011	Mi volvii kama bemmbo. Ammaa onon haannooɓe jinngango yam ndooli yam volvirgo noon. Gam koo to mi laataaki goɗɗum, e noon fuu ɗum yiɗaay vi'igo ɓe mbi'oton «~lilaaɓe mawɓe~» ɓurii yam.
47012012	Nde ngondunoomi e mooɗon, mi huurii munyal. Allah boo hokkii yam waɗgo alaamaaji kaayniiɗi feere-feere nder mooɗon. Kaayniiɗumji ɗiin e kolla mi lilaaɗo goongaajo.
47012013	E woodi ko kuumi nder goɗɗi ikiliisiyaaji ko mi huwaay nder mooɗon naa~? E woodi fii go'otum ko mi huwaay nder mooɗon, mi toraaki on nyaamnon yam. Nja'afanee yam ɗuum ko mbaɗmi~!
47012014	Jo'oni, emi siryii wargo to mooɗon garki tataɓi. To mi warii, mi yiɗaa laatanaago on donngal. Onon ngiɗmi, naa ceede mooɗon. Wanaa ɓiɓɓe nyaamnata danyooɓe mu''en, ammaa danyooɓe nyaamnata ɓiɓɓe mu''en.
47012015	Miin kam, mi naney belɗum hokkugo on ko ngoonmi fuu, faa e yonki am, gam vallugo on. Kadi, onon on ustey yiɗgo yam, gam mi ɓesdii yiɗgo on naa~?
47012016	On njaɓii mi teddanaay on naa~? Ee, on njaɓi, ammaa kiila woɓɓe no mbi'ey mi ƴoynii on, mi nanngirii on dabaree.
47012017	Mi lilaay lilaaɓe am to mooɗon gam ɓe nyaama jawdi mooɗon.
47012018	Mi torake Tiitus, kam e goɗɗo banndiraawo goonɗinɗo mo annduɗon njaha to mooɗon. Tiitus nyaami jawdi mooɗon naa~? A'aa, miin e Tiitus emin tokki laawol go'otol e nyumo wo'oto.
47012019	Ɗum baɗoojum on nyumii emin ndaara laɓɓingo ko'e amin yeeso mooɗon, ammaa wanaa ɗum noon. Emin mbolva goonga yeeso Allah, noon no Almasiifu yiɗiri. Banndiraaɓe yiɗaaɓe, ko min mbi'i fuu, min mbi'ii ɗum gam min cemmbiɗina goonɗinki mooɗon.
47012020	Emi hula, to mi warii to mooɗon, mi tawrataa on no ngiɗmi. Onon boo, on tawrataa yam no ngiɗɗon. Emi hula mi tawa jokkirgol e nalwiiru e huunƴere e nganyaandi e kuɗdi e nyo'ore e mawnitaare e fitina nder mooɗon.
47012021	Emi hula, to mi so''ake to mooɗon, Allah semtina yam dow ko mbaɗɗon, mi voya gam ɗuuɗɓe waɗooɓe hakke ɓe tuubaay, ɓe ngooraay waɗgo kuuɗe cemtiniiɗe ɗe ɓe mbaɗeynoo ilaa, njeenu e goɗɗe kuuɗe mehereeje.
47013001	Jo'oni mi warey to mooɗon garki tataɓi. «~Sey wullaandu fuu tabbitinee dow caaydaaku yimɓe ɗiɗo koo tato~», kama ko vinndaa nder Deftere Seniinde.
47013002	Mi vagginiino waɗnooɓe hakke nde ngarnoomi to mooɗon garki ɗiɗaɓi. Jo'oni nde mi waldaa e mooɗon, emi ɓesda vi'igo ɓe, kamɓe e horiiɓe fuu~: to mi so''oyake, daahir mi yurmataako koo go'oto maɓɓe.
47013003	Onon eɗon ngiɗi yi'igo alaama Almasiifu e volva gada e honnduko am naa~? Too, on ngi'ey ɗum laaɓɗum. Almasiifu tampaay nder mooɗon, ammaa emo holla baawɗe ma'ako.
47013004	Daahir, wakkaci Almasiifu ɓilaa dow gaafagal, o laatake tampuɗo. Ammaa jo'oni emo foofa gada e baawɗe Allah. Nder kawtal amin e ma'ako, minon boo, min tampuɓe. Ammaa min kolley on emin poofda e ma'ako gada e baawɗe Allah.
47013005	Liinyee ko'e mooɗon ngi'on, koo foofango mooɗon e nanndi e ngo goonɗinɓe. Ngodee ko'e mooɗon. On anndaa Almasiifu e nder mooɗon naa~? Goonga, emo nder mooɗon. To naa noon, on potaay laataago goonɗinɓe mo.
47013006	Ammaa emi yiɗi anndon, minon min fotɓe.
47013007	Emin toroo Allah gam mooɗon, tawee on mbaɗaay ko halli. Naa gam emin ngiɗi hollugo min goonga'en, ammaa gam onon kuwon ko vooɗi, koo to minon emin ndaaree kama ɓe potaay.
47013008	Gam min mbaawataa yeddugo goonga. Ko min mbaawi woni huutinirgo ka.
47013009	To on ngoodi semmbee dow laawol Allah, koo to minon min tampuɓe, ɗum veley min. Emin toroo Allah valla on gam laatooɗon timmuɓe.
47013010	Raa ko waɗi mbinndanmi on ila mi waraay tawo. Gam to mi warii, mi yiɗaa sa'atango on e baawɗe ɗe Jawmiraawo hokki yam. O hokkii yam baawɗe ɗeen gam mi semmbiɗina on, naa gam mi tampina on.
47013011	Jo'oni kam banndiraaɓe, mi accootirey e mooɗon. Ti'inee laatooɗon timmuɓe, njaɓee bolle am, laatee ɓe nyumo wo'oto, njooɗodee jam. Ndeen kam Allah mo yiɗde e jam no wondey e mooɗon.
47013012	Kinnindiree e hinnoore yiɗde. Goonɗinɓe wonɓe ɗo'o fuu e kinna on.
47013013	Barkaa Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu, e yiɗde Allah, e kawtal Ruhu Ceniiɗo, ngondu e mooɗon on fuu~!
48001001	Ngo'ol ɗereewol ivii to am, miin Bulus lilaaɗo Yeesu Almasiifu. Mi laataaki lilaaɗo gada e baawɗe yimɓe, koo gada e neɗɗo, ammaa gada e Yeesu Almasiifu e Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen ummitinɗo mo nder maayde.
48001002	Miin e banndiraaɓe wonduɓe e am fuu emin kinna on, onon ikiliisiyaaji gonɗi lesdi Galaatiya.
48001003	Allah Baaba meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu kokku on barkaa e jam.
48001004	Almasiifu hokkii hoore muuɗum sabu hakkeeji meeɗen, gam faa o hisna en gada e ndu'u jaamaniiru hallundu. Noon o huuri ko Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen yiɗi.
48001005	Teddungal laatanoo Allah faa abadaa abadin. Aamiin.
48001006	Ɗum haaynake yam no njawɗinirɗon hokkitgo Allah ɓaawo, kanko nodduɗo on gada e caahu Almasiifu, ndeen tokkuɗon Habaru Belɗum feere.
48001007	Pahamee~: Habaru Belɗum feere walaa~! Ammaa e woodi woɓɓe yimɓe giɓeyɓe on, eɓe ngiɗi waylitgo Habaru Almasiifu Belɗum.
48001008	To goɗɗo, koo ɗum minon e ko'e amin, koo malaa'ikaajo ivoyɗo gada dow wa'ajinii on habaru feere ɗum yahadaay e ko min nga'ajini on, ndeen kam Allah la'ana mo.
48001009	Emin ɓesda vi'igo on ko min mbi'inoo on~: to goɗɗo wa'ajinii on Habaru Belɗum feere ɗum yahadaay e ɗum njaɓnooɗon, Allah la'ana mo.
48001010	Jo'oni yerduye yimɓe njillotoomi naa~? A'aa, naa noon, yerduye Allah njillotoomi. Koo faa jo'oni emi yilloo waɗgo ko velata yimɓe~? Kul mi yillake waɗgo ko velata yimɓe, ndeen mi laatataako maccuɗo Almasiifu.
48001011	Banndiraaɓe am, emi yiɗi pahamon~: Habaru Belɗum ɗum nga'ajineymi ivaay to neɗɗo.
48001012	Wanaa to neɗɗo keɓmi ɗum, walaa jannginɗo yam ɗum, ammaa Yeesu Almasiifu vannginani yam ɗum.
48001013	On nanii no njooɗorinoomi nder diina Yahuudu'en ndeenno. Mi torriino ikiliisiya Allah korey, mi yillake halkugo ka.
48001014	Nder lenyol am, mi ɓuriino baalɗe am ɗuuɗɓe tokkugo diina Yahuudu'en e haɓango finaatawaaji maamiraaɓe amin.
48001015	Ammaa Allah suɓii yam ila mi rimaaka, o noddii yam sabu yiɗde ma'ako.
48001016	Ɗoon to o vannginani yam Ɓiyiiko gam mi wa'ajina Habaru muuɗum Belɗum nder yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, mi volidaay e ɓii-aadama,
48001017	mi yahaay boo Urusaliima to aartuɓe yam laataago lilaaɓe. Ammaa jaawɗum njahami lesdi Arabiya, ndeen co''oyiimi si'ire Dimaska.
48001018	Ɓaawo duuɓi tati njahami Urusaliima gam mi anndindira e Biiturus. Min njooɗodii jontitanɗe ɗiɗi.
48001019	Mi yi'aay woɓɓe lilaaɓe sam, to naa Yaakuubu dimdaaɗo e Jawmiraawo.
48001020	Allah e saaydii ɗuum ko mbinndaneymi on ɗo'o ɗum goonga, naa ɗum fewre.
48001021	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, mi yahii lesdi Siiriya e Siliikiya.
48001022	Wakkaci ɗuum, ikiliisiyaaji gonɗi lesdi Yahuudiya meeɗaay yi'igo yam e gite mu''en.
48001023	Ammaa ɓe naney tan e ɗum vi'a~: «~Neɗɗo torreynooɗo en, jo'oni e ɗoon wa'ajina habaru goonɗinki ki o yiɗnoo halkugo.~»
48001024	Ɓe maalti Allah gam ko o waɗani yam.
48002001	Ɓaawo duuɓi sappo e nayi mi vittii Urusaliima miin e Barnabas. Min njahadi e Tiitus.
48002002	Mi yahii Urusaliima gam Allah hollii yam mi yaha. Nde njahami mi hawtii aardiiɓe ikiliisiya toon, miin tan e maɓɓe. Mi volvanii ɓe dow e Habaru Belɗum ɗum nga'ajinmi yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en. Mi waɗii noon gam mi yiɗaa kuugal am gutiingal e jo'oniwal laatoo mehere.
48002003	Raa o'o jahadidɗaawo am Tiitus, o Helenankeejo, ammaa o doolaaka naadeego,
48002004	koo nde laatii banndiraaɓe fewre'en e ngiɗnoo o naadee. Banndiraaɓe fewre'en ɓeen nattii ikiliisiya nder suuɗeefi, gam ɓe liinya dimɗineeki ki keɓɗen nder kawtal meeɗen e Yeesu Almasiifu, sabu ɓe laatina en maccuɓe Tawreeta.
48002005	Ammaa gam ɗum reenana on goonga Habaru Belɗum, min njaɓaay ko banndiraaɓe fewre'en ɓeen mbi'i koo seɗɗa.
48002006	Aardiiɓe resaaɓe no mawɓe nder ikiliisiya ɓeen, koo to ɗume ɓe laatii, walaa ko waanni yam, gam Allah ɓurdindirtaa yimɓe. Aardiiɓe ɓeen boo, ɓe njowanaay yam ɓesdugo goɗɗum.
48002007	Ɓe pahamii Allah hokkii yam wa'ajingo Habaru Belɗum yahago e yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, kama noon no o hokkiri Biiturus wa'ajingo Yahuudu'en,
48002008	gam Allah laatinɗo Biiturus lilaaɗo nder Yahuudu'en, kanko laatini yam lilaaɗo nder yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en.
48002009	Yaakuubu e Biiturus e Yahayya, laatiiɓe kama danngalle nder ikiliisiya, nde ɓe ngi'i no Allah barkiɗiniri kuugal amin, ɓe njaɓrii min juuɗe ɗiɗi. Ɓe njaɓii, miin e Barnabas, min nga'ajina nder yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, kamɓe boo ɓe nga'ajina nder Yahuudu'en.
48002010	Fii go'otum tan ɓe torii min, to' min njeggitan sooyɓe wonɓe nder maɓɓe. Ndeen maa ɗum ko ti'iniimi waɗgo.
48002011	Ammaa nde Biiturus wari si'ire Antaakiya, mi felii mo yeeso yimɓe gam o voofii.
48002012	Aran emo nyaamdeynoo e goonɗinɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en. Ammaa nde woɓɓe lilaaɓe Yaakuubu ngari, o woorii nyaamdugo e maɓɓe, gam o hulii ɓeen dooleyɓe yimɓe naadeego.
48002013	Woɓɓe Yahuudu'en goonɗinɓe Yeesu nder Antaakiya mbaɗii kama no o waɗi, faa ɓe mbaɗii Barnabas tokkii munaafukaare maɓɓe.
48002014	Nde ngi'imi ɓe tokkaay goonga Habaru Belɗum, sey mbi'imi Biiturus yeeso yimɓe fuu~: «~Aan a Yahuuduujo, ammaa ɗo'o a waɗa jo'onde iri nde ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en. Jo'oni a yiɗi doolgo yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en mbaɗa jo'onde iri nde Yahuudu'en naa~?~»
48002015	Enen, en lenyol Yahuudu'en gaɗa e yeeso, en laataaki kama leƴƴi koriiɗi baɗooji hakke.
48002016	En anndi neɗɗo heɓataa yerduye Allah gada e tokkugo Tawreeta, sey gada e goonɗingo Yeesu Almasiifu. Kanjum waɗi enen ngoonɗinɗen Yeesu Almasiifu faa keɓen yerduye Allah gada e goonɗinki kiin, naa gada e tokkugo Tawreeta. Gam walaa keɓeyɗo yerduye Allah gada e tokkugo Tawreeta.
48002017	Enen Yahuudu'en yillotooɓe heɓgo yerduye Allah gada e kawtal meeɗen e Almasiifu, to tawaama en waɗooɓe hakke kama yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, ndeen kam Almasiifu waɗi en e waɗgo hakke naa~? A'aa, naa noon sam~!
48002018	Gam to mi nyiɓtake Tawreeta ka njibbinnoomi, ndeen kam mi hollii mi kuultoowo Tawreeta.
48002019	Ammaa dow e Tawreeta mi maayɗo, gam kanka waɗi ɗum, heɓa mi foofa gam Allah. Mi maaydii e Almasiifu dow gaafagal.
48002020	Jo'oni wanaa miin e hoore am foofataa, Almasiifu kam foofata nder am. Foofaango ngo poofeymi jo'oni, emi foofa ngo gada e goonɗingo Ɓiɗɗo Allah giɗɗo yam, meheriɗinɗo yonki muuɗum gam am.
48002021	Miin mi salataako yiɗde Allah. Gam kul tokkugo Tawreeta e hokka neɗɗo yerduye Allah, ndeen kam ɗume maayde Almasiifu nafata~?
48003001	Onon Galaatiya'en vemmbuɓe~! Moye ƴoyni on~? On ngeccaama laaɓɗum no Yeesu Almasiifu maayri dow gaafagal.
48003002	Emi yiɗi mi ƴama on fii go'otum~: on keɓii Ruhu Ceniiɗo gada e tokkugo ko Tawreeta vi'i, nakay gada e nango Habaru Belɗum e goonɗingo ɗum~?
48003003	To hakkiilo mooɗon yahii~? Onon fuɗɗirɓe e semmbee Ruhu Allah, jo'oni on ngiɗi timminirgo e semmbee mooɗon naa~?
48003004	To noon, ko laatanii on ɗuum no mehere naa~? A'aa, ku'uje kama ɗe'e laatataako mehere.
48003005	Allah hokkii on Ruhu muuɗum, emo huwa kuuɗe kaayniiɗe nder mooɗon. O hokkii on mo gam on tokkii ko Tawreeta vi'i, nakay gam on nanii Habaru Belɗum on ngoonɗinii ɗum~?
48003006	Kiimtee ko Deftere Seniinde vi'i dow Ibraahim. Nde vi'i~: «~Ibraahim goonɗinii Allah, gam ma'ajum Allah raari mo aadaliijo.~»
48003007	To noon, on ngi'i yimɓe goonɗinɓe Allah kam'en ngoni ɓiɓɓe Ibraahim goonga'en.
48003008	Gam ilaa Deftere Seniinde vi'iino, Allah no laatiney yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en yerdaaɓe ma'ako gada e goonɗinki maɓɓe. Noon boo Deftere anndiniri Ibraahim Habaru Belɗum ila ɗum waraay, nde vi'i~: «~Gada e maaɗa leƴƴi yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu keɓrata barkaa.~»
48003009	Gam ma'ajum, goonɗinɓe Allah kama no Ibraahim goonɗiniri fuu no keɓey barkaa kama no Ibraahim heɓri ka.
48003010	Ammaa resɓe tammunde mu''en dow tokkugo ko Tawreeta vi'i fuu, no la'anaaɓe, gam aayaare vi'i~: «~Mo tokkaay ɗuum ko vinndaa nder Tawreeta fuu, no la'anaaɗo.~»
48003011	Jo'oni en pahamii walaa keɓreyɗo aadilaaku yeeso Allah gada e tokkugo ko Tawreeta vi'i, gam aayaare feere vi'i~: «~Aadaliijo no foofrey e goonɗinki.~»
48003012	Tokkugo Tawreeta e feerootiri e goonɗingo Allah, gam aayaare feere vi'i~: «~Koo moye tokki ko Tawreeta vi'i no heɓey yonki gada e tokkugo ka.~»
48003013	Almasiifu soottake en gada e la'anoore nde Tawreeta waddani en. O laatake la'anaaɗo mbattudi meeɗen, gam aayaare vi'i~: «~La'anoore laatanto ɓilaaɗo dow gaafagal.~»
48003014	Ye esu waɗii ɗum gam faa yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en keɓa barkaa ka Allah waɗani Ibraahim alkawal, gam enen goonɗinɓe Yeesu Almasiifu keɓen Ruhu mo Allah waɗi alkawal hokkugo.
48003015	Banndiraaɓe, emi yiɗi mi holla on ko annduɗon dow alkawal~: to yimɓe ɗiɗo potii mba'adii alkawal tabbitinii ngal, walaa baawɗo fiirtugo ngal koo ɓesdugo goɗɗum dow ma'agal.
48003016	Allah waɗanii Ibraahim e lenyol muuɗum alkawal. Deftere vi'aay~: «~taaniraaɓe~» kama yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, ammaa nde vi'i~: «~taaniraawo maaɗa~», waato neɗɗo go'oto tan, kanko woni Almasiifu.
48003017	Ko ngiɗmi vi'igo woni~: Allah waɗanii Ibraahim alkawal, o tabbitinii ngal ila ɗum waraay. Ndeen kam Tawreeta ngarka ɓaawo duuɓi keme nayi e talaatiin (430) waawataa fiirtugo ngal, wartira ngal mehere.
48003018	Gam kul ndonu ngu Allah waɗani Ibraahim alkawal, ɗum gada e tokkugo Tawreeta, daa ngu ivoyaay e alkawal. Ammaa Allah barkiɗinii Ibraahim gam alkawal ngal o waɗani mo.
48003019	To noon, ɗume Tawreeta wari waɗgo~? Ka waddaama gam ka vanngina boofi yimɓe, faa wakkaci nde ivoyɗo e Ibraahim wari, mo Allah waɗi alkawal muuɗum. Malaa'ika'en ngaddi Tawreeta, ɓe kokki ka Muusa hakkundeejo yimɓe e Allah.
48003020	Ammaa hakkundeejo waɗgo alkawal yillataake to ɗum neɗɗo go'oto tan. Allah boo o go'oto.
48003021	To noon, Tawreeta e luudotira e alkawal Allah naa~? Naa noon sam~! Gam kul Tawreeta e waawnoo hokkugo yonki, daa koo moye e waawi heɓgo yerduye Allah to tokkii ka.
48003022	Ammaa ɓeen goonɗinɓe Yeesu Almasiifu no keɓey alkawal ngaal gada e goonɗinki mu''en, gam Deftere vi'i, hakke laamanake yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu.
48003023	Ko hokka wakkaci goonɗingo Yeesu wara, en laatinoo haɓɓaaɓe lees baawɗe Tawreeta, faa nde Allah vannginani en laawol goonɗinki.
48003024	Noon Tawreeta laatorii eltoowo en, faa garki Yeesu Almasiifu, gam faa keɓen yerduye Allah gada e goonɗingo mo.
48003025	Jo'oni nde wakkaci goonɗingo Almasiifu wari, en ndimɗii e elto Tawreeta.
48003026	On fuu, on laatake ɓiɓɓe Allah gada e goonɗingo Yeesu Almasiifu.
48003027	On fuu on mbaɗanaama baptisma gam hollugo Almasiifu jeyi on, on ɓornake gikku ma'ako.
48003028	Gam ma'ajum, walaa peerootiral hakkunde Yahuudu'en e ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, koo maccuɓe e rimɓe, koo worɓe e rewɓe. On fuu on go'o gam daliila kawtal mooɗon e Yeesu Almasiifu.
48003029	Nde laatii on laatake yimɓe Almasiifu, ndeen kam on taaniraaɓe Ibraahim, on ndoney alkawal ngal Allah waɗani mo.
48004001	Ko ngiɗmi vi'igo on nanndii e ɗu'um~: to ɓiɗɗo donoowo jawdi baaba muuɗum e laatii pamaro tawo, walaa ko senndi mo e maccuɗo, koo nde laatii kanko jeyi jawdi ndiin.
48004002	Ammaa o ɗowtanto reenooɓe mo e darvanooɓe jawdi ndi o ronata, faa wakkaci ɗum baaba ma'ako resi yottoo.
48004003	Noon enen boo, wakkaci ko laatinooɗen kama bilki'en, en laatake maccuɓe baawɗeeji laamaniiɗi duuniyaaru.
48004004	Ammaa nde wakkaci ɗum Allah resi heevi, o liloyii Ɓiyiiko. Ɓiɗɗo oon danyaama e debbo, o jooɗii lees Tawreeta,
48004005	gam o rimɗina ɓeen wonɓe lees baawɗe Tawreeta, o laatina en ɓiɓɓe Allah.
48004006	Daahir en ɓiɓɓe Allah, kanjum waɗi o liloyi Ruhu Ɓiyiiko nder ɓerɗe meeɗen. Ruhu oon gonɗo nder meeɗen e noddira Allah «~Baaba~».
48004007	Gam ma'ajum, jo'oni naa on maccuɓe, on ɓiɓɓe. Nde laatii on ɓiɓɓe, on ndoney ko Allah ronnata ɓiɓɓe muuɗum.
48004008	Ndeenno, nde on anndaano Allah, on ɗowtanake allaaji feere ɗi laataaki goonga.
48004009	Ammaa jo'oni nde annduɗon Allah, koo boo mi vi'a Allah e anndi on, noye co''ortooɗon lees baawɗeeji laamaniiɗi duuniyaaru tampuɗi, mehereeji~? Na on ngiɗi so''itaago lees maccungaaku ma'aji kadimaa~?
48004010	Eɗon teddina goɗɗe nyalɗe e goɗɗi lebbi e wakkaciiji goɗɗi e goɗɗi duuɓi.
48004011	Emi hula to' kuugal ngal kuumi hakkunde mooɗon laato mehere.
48004012	Banndiraaɓe am, emi toroo on~: tokkee laawol ngol tokkumi, gam miin boo emi tokki laawol ngol tokkuɗon. On mbaɗaayno yam layfi fuu.
48004013	Kiimtee, nyawu ngu nyawmi kam hokkii yam laawol wa'ajingo on Habaru Belɗum arande.
48004014	Nyawu am godake munyal mooɗon korey, ammaa e noon fuu on njavaaki yam, on nefaay yam boo. Ammaa on njaɓii yam kama malaa'ikaajo Allah, e kama no njaɓruɗon Yeesu Almasiifu.
48004015	To noon, toye velvelo ngo nannooɗon woni jo'oni~? Mi tabbitinii kul ɗum waɗotono, daa on ittiino gite mooɗon, on kokkii yam.
48004016	Jo'oni mi laatake ganyo mooɗon gam goonga ka mbi'imi on naa~?
48004017	Ɓen ɗoon yimɓe ɓe mbaɗii hakkiilooji maɓɓe fuu dow mooɗon gam ɓe mbaɗa tokkon ɓe. Ammaa ko ɓe ngiɗi waɗgo vooɗaa, eɓe ngiɗi senndugo on e am gam hakkiilo mooɗon leloroo to maɓɓe.
48004018	Waɗgo ko nafata e ti'inaare dum no booɗɗum. E haani mbaɗon noon koo ndeye, naa sey to emi wondi e mooɗon tan.
48004019	Onon ɓikkon am, emi ɗoon ɓesda yargo torraa gam mooɗon, kama no debbo torrortoo wakkaci ŋatawre, gam faa gikku Almasiifu tabbita nder mooɗon.
48004020	Daahir emi yiɗi tawee hannde emi wondi e mooɗon, gam mi annda no mboliraneymi on, sabu mi majjii no mba'adeymi e mooɗon.
48004021	Onon yiɗɓe tokkugo Tawreeta, ngeccee yam~: on nanaay ko Tawreeta kaan vi'i naa~?
48004022	Ka vi'i~: Ibraahim e woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe ɗiɗo. Go'oto o rimdii ɗum e korɗo ma'ako Hajara, go'oto boo e Saaratu dimo.
48004023	Ɓii korɗo danyaama kama no koo moye danyiraa, ammaa ɓii dimo oon danyaama fodde alkawal Allah.
48004024	Ɗu'um ɗum misaalu. Rewɓe ɗiɗo ɓeen e kolla alkawalji ɗiɗi. Go'otal ngal Hajara, kangal woni alkawal vaamnde Sinaay, e ngal rima maccuɓe.
48004025	Hajara ɗum misaalu vaamnde Sinaay wonnde lesdi Arabiya. Emo nanndi e si'ire Urusaliima jo'oniire, gam emo nder maccungaaku, kanko e ɓiɓɓe ma'ako.
48004026	Ammaa Urusaliima wonde toon dow asama no rimre, kayre woni inna meeɗen.
48004027	Gam Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Velveltu, aan dimaro mo meeɗaay danygo~! Wullu wullaandu velvelo, aan mo meeɗaay nango naawɗum ŋatawre, gam ɓikkon boora no ɓurey ɓikkon giɗaaɗo ɗuuɗgo.~»
48004028	Ammaa onon banndiraaɓe am, on ɓiɓɓe alkawal Allah kama Iciyaaku.
48004029	Noon no danyaaɗo no koo moye danyiraa torrirnoo danyiraaɗo gada e Ruhu Allah ndeenno, kama noon boo ɗum laatorii faa hannde.
48004030	Ammaa ɗume Deftere vi'i~? Nde vi'i~: «~Laggu korɗo oon e ɓiyum, gam ɓii korɗo rondataa e ɓii dimo sam.~»
48004031	To noon banndiraaɓe, enen naa en ɓiɓɓe korɗo, ammaa en ɓiɓɓe dimo.
48005001	Almasiifu rimɗinii en faa laatooɗen rimɓe e goonga. Gam ma'ajum, ndaree e semmbee to' on co''o nder maccungaaku.
48005002	Ngewee~! Miin Bulus, emi vi'a on~: to on njaɓii naadeego, ndeen kam ko Almasiifu waɗani on nafataa on sam.
48005003	Emi ɓesda vi'igo on~: neɗɗo fuu jaɓi tokkugo dooka naadeego, ndeen ɗum laatake doole o tokka ko Tawreeta vi'i fuu.
48005004	Onon yillotooɓe heɓgo yerduye Allah gada e tokkugo ko Tawreeta vi'i, on ceedii e Almasiifu, on mburtake alkawal caahu Allah boo.
48005005	Ammaa enen, eɗen ndeenti keɓen yerduye Allah gada e goonɗinki. Kanjum ndeentuɗen, en tabbitinii boo en keɓey ɗum gada e baawɗe Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
48005006	Gam to goɗɗo hawtii e Yeesu Almasiifu, naadeeki koo ciya ma'aki nafataa. Ko nafata woni goonɗinki kuudeyki e yiɗde.
48005007	On puɗɗirii no vooɗi. Moye haɗi on tokkugo goonga~?
48005008	Ko wayliti hakkiilooji mooɗon ɗuum, ivaay to Allah nodduɗo on.
48005009	E vi'ee~: «~Ƴuufnirɗum seɗɗa ƴuufnata conndi fuu.~»
48005010	Gam daliila Jawmiraawo emi goonɗini on, mi tabbitinii nyumooji mooɗon mbittaay bannye feere. Ammaa majjineyɗo on oon, koo o moye, Allah no sernaney mo.
48005011	Banndiraaɓe am, to haala naadeeki nga'ajineymi faa jo'oni, kama no woɓɓe mbi'ata, ndeen gam ɗume torrirteemi~? Kul ɗum goonga kanka nga'ajineymi, daa habaru maayde Yeesu dow gaafagal laatantaako goɗɗo fergere.
48005012	Vi'eeno maa, ɓen ɗoon jiiɓreyɓe on haala naadeeki, no naadino faa ɓe taƴi lees maɓɓe~!
48005013	Onon banndiraaɓe, on noddaama gam laatooɗon rimɗinaaɓe. Ammaa to' on kuutinir ndimaaku mooɗon laatanoo on laawol waɗgo giɗaaɗi ɓalli, sey nii mballindiron e yiɗde.
48005014	Gam Tawreeta fuu hawti nder nde'e voliinde wo'ore~: «~Yiɗ ko'odiɗɗaawo maaɗa noon no ngiɗruɗaa hoore maaɗa.~»
48005015	Ammaa to eɗon ŋatŋattira, on nyaamnyaamtira kama diiwe ladde, ndeen kakkilee to' on moɗmoɗtir.
48005016	Raa ko ngiɗmi vi'igo on~: Ngooree Ruhu Ceniiɗo ɗowa foofaango mooɗon, ndeen on tokkataa giɗaaɗi ɓalli mooɗon.
48005017	Gam giɗaaɗi ɓanndu e luhuri e ko Ruhu yiɗi, ko Ruhu yiɗi boo e luhuri e ɓanndu. Gam daliila haɓre ma'ajum waɗi, on mbaawataa huugo booɗɗum ko ngiɗɗon huugo.
48005018	Ammaa to Ruhu Allah ɗowata on, ndeen Tawreeta walaa baawɗe dow mooɗon.
48005019	Ko giɗaaɗi ɓanndu mbannginta woni njeenu e kuuɗe nefniiɗe e cemtiniiɗe,
48005020	e teddingo gumkiiji e maayta e nganyaandi e jokkirgol e koɗey e huunƴere e yiɗde hoore e luhural e ciya potal,
48005021	e nalwiiru e jarɗe giya faa yiilto e nyaamtarci e kuuɗe ko nanndi e ma'ajum fuu. Emi vi'a on kadimaa, kama ko mbi'inoomi on ilaa~: huweyɓe iri ɗe'e kuuɗe fuu nattataa laamu Allah sam.
48005022	Ammaa Ruhu Ceniiɗo e rima yiɗde e velvelo e jam e munyal e gikku mbooɗngu e yurmeende e goonɗinki
48005023	e leestinki hoore e reengo hoore. Walaa dooka nganyeyka ɗe'e kuuɗe.
48005024	Koo moye laatii mo Yeesu Almasiifu, giɗaaɗi ɓanndu e suunooji ma'ako kalluɗi laatanake mo mehere.
48005025	Nde laatii Ruhu Allah hokkii en yonki, sey njooɗorooɗen no Ruhu oon yiɗiri.
48005026	To' en laato mawnitiiɓe, koo ummindirooɓe hakkiilo, koo hollindirooɓe nalwiiru.
48006001	Banndiraaɓe, to on ngi'ii goɗɗo e waɗa layfi, onon woonɓe Ruhu Allah mbittinee mo dow laawol booɗngol e hakkiilo. Ammaa onon boo, kakkilanee ko'e mooɗon gam to' on njan nder jarrabeeji.
48006002	Mballindiree roondaago dowle mooɗon. To on mbaɗii noon, ndeen on kebbinii ko dooka Almasiifu vi'i.
48006003	To neɗɗo nyumii e laatii goɗɗum, ammaa o laataaki noon, o ƴoynii hoore ma'ako.
48006004	Sey koo moye fuu eta kuugal muuɗum yi'a to e ngal vooɗi. Ndeen o mantoro hoore ma'ako e ko o waɗi, naa sey to o fotnii hoore ma'ako e goɗɗo.
48006005	Gam nyanndeere e wara nde koo moye fuu roondotoo donngal kuuɗe muuɗum.
48006006	Jannginteeɗo habaru Allah e haani hokka janngineyɗo ɗum gada nder jawdi muuɗum fuu.
48006007	To' on ƴoynu ko'e mooɗon, gam Allah jammbataake. Ko neɗɗo aawi fuu, kanjum taƴata.
48006008	Aawɗo ko velata giɗaaɗi ɓanndu muuɗum, no taƴey ko giɗaaɗi ɓanndu rimata, waato maayde. Ammaa aawɗo ko velata Ruhu Ceniiɗo no taƴey yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
48006009	To' en com huugo ko vooɗi, gam kul en tampaay en taƴey ko vooɗi to wakkaci ɗuum warii.
48006010	Gam ma'ajum, nde keɓɗen laawol fuu en kuwan yimɓe ko vooɗi, ɓurna muuɗum banndiraaɓe meeɗen goonɗinɓe.
48006011	On ngi'ii ɗi'i binndi mawɗi, miin vinndonoyi on ɗi e junngo am.
48006012	Yillotooɓe doolgo on naadeego ɓeen e ndaara manoore yimɓe, eɓe mbaɗa noon, gam to' ɓe torre sabu habaru maayde Almasiifu dow gaafagal.
48006013	Gam koo kamɓe naadaaɓe, ɓe tokkataa ko Tawreeta vi'i. Ammaa eɓe ngiɗi naadeeɗon, gam ɓe mantoroo ɗum.
48006014	Miin kam, mi mantortaako goɗɗum, to naa maayde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu dow gaafagal. Barkaa maayde ma'ako dow gaafagal, ko woni nder duuniyaaru fuu laatanii yam mehere, miin boo laataniimi ndu mehere.
48006015	Gam naadeego e ciya naadeego fuu walaa nafuuda. Ko nafata woni, Allah laatina neɗɗo tagitaaɗo keso.
48006016	Allah hokku ɓeen tokkuɓe ekkitinooje ɗeen fuu jam e enɗam, gam kamɓe ngoni Isiraa'iila'en goonga'en ɓe Allah.
48006017	Gada hannde, to' goɗɗo ɓesdu torrugo yam. Nawnanɗe ɓanndu am e kolla mi maccuɗo Yeesu.
48006018	Banndiraaɓe am, barkaa Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu wondu e mooɗon~! Aamiin.
49001001	Miin Bulus, mo Allah suɓi laatoo lilaaɗo Yeesu Almasiifu, vinndi ngo'ol ɗereewol. Emi hinna yimɓe Allah wonɓe nder si'ire Efesu, goonɗinɓe Yeesu Almasiifu e ɓernde wo'ore.
49001002	Allah Baaba meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu kokku on barkaa e jam.
49001003	Maaltoore laatanoo Allah Baaba Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu, kokkuɗo en koo iri ɗiye barkaaji gonɗi dow asama sabu kawtal meeɗen e Almasiifu.
49001004	Barkaa Almasiifu, o suɓii en ila duuniyaaru tagaaka, gam laatooɗen seniiɓe, ɓe ngalaa feloore yeeso ma'ako.
49001005	Nder yiɗde ma'ako o anniyake laatooɗen ɓiɓɓe ma'ako gada e Yeesu Almasiifu. Kanjum woni ko o yiɗi ko waɗani mo.
49001006	En maaltu Allah gam caahu yiɗde ma'ako mawnde nde walaa keerol, nde o waɗani en gada e Ɓiyiiko giɗaaɗo.
49001007	Gam gada e ƴiiƴam Ɓiyiiko oon, keɓɗen ndimkaaku e ya'afuye hakkeeji meeɗen. Noon Allah vannginirani en manngu yiɗde muuɗum.
49001008	O hebbinii en barkaaji ma'ako, o hokkii en anndal e fahamu keeɓɗum.
49001009	O anndinii en anniya ma'ako sirriha ka o siryinoo waɗgo. Ila aran o anniyorii tabbitinirgo ka e Almasiifu.
49001010	To wakkaci waɗi, Allah no hebbiney ɗuum ko siryinoo waɗgo, o hawtey tagle gonɗe dow e lees, o waɗa ɗe lees laamu Almasiifu.
49001011	Nder kawtal meeɗen e Almasiifu, Allah suɓii en gam laatooɗen yimɓe ma'ako. O siryake ɗum ila duuniyaaru tagaaka, gam kanko woni baɗoowo koo ɗume ko o siryii noon no o yiɗiri.
49001012	O waɗii ɗum gam faa enen aartuɓe resgo tammunde mu''en dow Almasiifu maalten teddungal ma'ako.
49001013	Onon maa on laatake yimɓe Allah wakkaci ɗum nanɗon voliinde goonga, waato Habaru Belɗum gaddanɗum on kisndam. Nde ngoonɗinɗon Almasiifu, Allah jelii on, jelgol ngool woni Ruhu Ceniiɗo mo o waɗnoo alkawal hokkugo.
49001014	Ruhu Ceniiɗo oon kam woni jingina barkaaji ɗi Allah waɗi alkawal hokkugo en. En keɓey ɗi to wakkaci nde Allah rimɗinta en, enen jeyaaɓe ma'ako, heevi. To noon, sey maalten teddungal Allah~!
49001015	Gam ma'ajum, ila wakkaci nde nanmi habaru no ngoonɗinirɗon Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu, e no ngiɗruɗon yimɓe Allah,
49001016	mi wooraay yettugo Allah gam mooɗon, emi waɗana on do'aare koo ndeye.
49001017	Emi toroo Allah mo Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen, Baabiraawo jawmu teddungal, hokka on Ruhu muuɗum, Ruhu oon fahamina on, vannginana on Allah, faa anndon mo booɗɗum.
49001018	Kadimaa emi toroo Allah omta gite ɓerɗe mooɗon, faa anndon tammunde nde o noddiri on, e darajja barkaaji ɗi o waɗani yimɓe ma'ako alkawal,
49001019	pahamon boo baawɗe ma'ako mawɗe ɗe ngalaa ko potnirte, kuweyɗe nder meeɗen, enen goonɗinɓe Yeesu. Baawɗe cemmbiɗɗe ɗeen,
49001020	Allah huutiniri wakkaci o ummitini Almasiifu nder maayde, o jo'ini ɗum dow jooɗorgal laamu toon dow, e junngo ma'ako nyaamo.
49001021	Toon Almasiifu woni e laamanii jawmiraaɓe baawɗe e semmbee e koo ɗiye laamuuji gonɗi dow e lees, e inɗe mawɗe inneteeɗe fuu, wanaa nder ndu'u jaamaniiru tan, ammaa faa e jaamaniiru wareyndu.
49001022	Allah waɗii koo ɗume lees laamu ma'ako, o laatinii mo jawmiraawo dow koo ɗume fuu e aardiiɗo ikiliisiya.
49001023	Ikiliisiya kaan woni ɓanndu Almasiifu, eka hebbita mo, kanko kebbinoowo koo ɗume e koo toye.
49002001	Onon on laatinoo maayɓe sabu boofi mooɗon e hakkeeji mooɗon.
49002002	E wakkaci ɗuum on tokkiino laabi duuniyaaru kalluɗi, on tokkiino Ceyɗaan laamiiɗo ginnaaji. Kanko oon huwata faa hannde nder ɓerɗe yimɓe saliiɓe tokkugo ko Allah vi'i.
49002003	En fuu en laatinoo kama maɓɓe, en tokkiino ko ngiɗen, en mbaɗii ko ɓalli meeɗen e ɓerɗe meeɗen ngiɗi. Gam sabu tabiya meeɗen kalluka kaan, en kaandunoo e huunƴere Allah kama yimɓe horiiɓe.
49002004	Ammaa Allah o keeɓɗo yurmeende. Yiɗde nde o yiɗi en boo e mawnii,
49002005	gam ma'ajum o foofnirii en e Almasiifu, enen maaynooɓe sabu hakkeeji meeɗen. Gada e yiɗde ma'ako tan kisniraaɗon.
49002006	Allah fintidinii en e Yeesu Almasiifu, o jo'idinii en e ma'ako toon dow asama.
49002007	Gada e mbooɗirka ma'ako ka o waɗani en nder Yeesu Almasiifu o yiɗi hollirgo jaamanuuji gareyɗi fuu ɗuuɗal yiɗde ma'ako.
49002008	Daahir kisndam mooɗon e darii dow yiɗde Allah tan, naa ɗum kuugal mooɗon, ɗum caahu ma'ako ngu njaɓruɗon e goonɗinki.
49002009	Ɗam ivaay e kuuɗe mooɗon, gam to' koo go'oto mantoro hoore muuɗum.
49002010	Allah waɗi en no laatiiɗen jo'oni. Nder kawtal meeɗen e Yeesu Almasiifu o tagitii en, faa kuwen kuuɗe booɗɗe ɗe o siryanii en ila duuniyaaru tagaaka.
49002011	Gam ma'ajum, kiimtee ko laatinooɗon ndeenno. Onon on ndanyaaka nder lenyol Yahuudu'en. Yahuudu'en e noddira on «~ɓe naadaaka~», kamɓe boo eɓe noddira ko'e maɓɓe «~naadaaɓe~». Naadeeki kiin boo, e ɓanndu tan ki waɗete, kadimaa e juuɗe ki wa'aretee.
49002012	Kiimtee e ɗum toon wakkaci on anndaano Almasiifu, on jananɓeno, on kawtaano e lenyol Isiraa'iila ngol Allah suɓi, on ngalaa nder alkawalji ɗi Allah waɗannoo suɓaaɓe muuɗum, on poofeynoo nder duuniyaaru on ngalaa tammunde, on ngalaa Allah boo.
49002013	Ammaa jo'oni nder kawtal mooɗon e Yeesu Almasiifu, onon woɗɗunooɓe on ɓattiniraama e ƴiiƴam ma'ako ndufaaɗam.
49002014	Gam Almasiifu e hoore muuɗum woni narrinoowo meeɗen. O narrinii Yahuudu'en e yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, o laatinii ɓe lenyol go'otol. Gada e hokkugo yonki ma'ako o yibbiniri mahagol nganyaandi cenndungol ɓe.
49002015	O ittii Tawreeta e dookaaji muuɗum, gam faa o waɗa leƴƴi ɗiɗi ɗiin laatoo lenyol go'otol kesol nder kawtal e ma'ako. Noon o wa'ari narral hakkunde maɓɓe.
49002016	E maayde ma'ako dow gaafagal o ittiri nganyaandi ngonndi hakkunde Yahuudu'en e ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, o hawti ɓe, ɓe laatii ɓanndu wo'oru, o narrini ɓe e Allah.
49002017	Onon yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en woɗɗinooɓe Allah, e Yahuudu'en ɓadinooɓe mo, Almasiifu warii wa'ajinii on habaru narral.
49002018	Gam gada e Almasiifu en fuu en mbaawi ɓaditaago Allah Baabiraawo, sabu ballal Ruhu go'oto.
49002019	Gam ma'ajum, onon yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en, naa on jananɓe koo hoɗɓe, ammaa jo'oni on kawtaama e yimɓe Allah, on ɓiɓɓe wuro ma'ako.
49002020	Eɗon nanndi e mahadi ndi fuɗɗoode muuɗum laatii lilaaɓe e annabo'en. Yeesu Almasiifu e hoore muuɗum woni haayre jogiinde mahadi ndiin.
49002021	Gada e ma'ako mahadi ndiin fuu jogotiri, e ndi towa faa ndi laatoo wuro Jawmiraawo seniingo.
49002022	Nder kawtal mooɗon e ma'ako, onon maa on mahadaama e goonɗinɓe horiiɓe, faa laatooɗon mahadi to Ruhu Allah jooɗoto.
49003001	Kanjum waɗi emi toroo Allah, miin Bulus omndaaɗo nder kaso gam kuugal Yeesu Almasiifu ngal kuweymi nder mooɗon, onon yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en.
49003002	Daahir on nanii habaru kuugal ngal Allah hokki yam nder yiɗde muuɗum, gam vallugo on.
49003003	Allah vannginanii yam anniya muuɗum sirriha, kama ko aartumi vinndango on e bolle seɗɗa.
49003004	To on janngii ko mbinndumi, on keɓtey no pahamirmi sirri dow Almasiifu.
49003005	Sirri ɗuum anndinaaka ɓiɓɓe-aadama nder jaamanuuji gutiiɗi. Ammaa jo'oni, gada e Ruhu Ceniiɗo, Allah vannginanii ɗum lilaaɓe muuɗum seniiɓe e annabo'en.
49003006	Sirri ɗuum woni~: gada e Habaru Belɗum yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en no keɓey geɗal barkaaji deydey e ko Allah hokkata Yahuudu'en, ɓe kawtii ɓanndu wo'oru e maɓɓe. Nder kawtal maɓɓe e Yeesu Almasiifu, ɓe keɓey ko Allah waɗi alkawal hokkugo Yahuudu'en.
49003007	Barkaa yiɗde Allah e baawɗe muuɗum, o hokkii yam kuugal wa'ajingo Habaru Belɗum ɗuum.
49003008	Miin ɓuri goonɗinɓe fuu famɗugo, ammaa e noon fuu Allah enɗii yam, hokkii yam wa'ajingo yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en barkaaji Almasiifu ɗi pahamataako.
49003009	Mi hokkaama boo fahamingo yimɓe fuu no Allah tagɗo koo ɗume hebbinirta sirri muuɗum cuuɗinooɗum ila fil ajal.
49003010	O waɗii noon gam jo'oni, gada e ikiliisiya Yeesu, laamuuji e baawɗeeji gonɗi dow pahama anndalji Allah feere-feere.
49003011	Ɗum fuu Allah wa'arii ɗum noon no siryorii wa'arugo ɗum ila fil ajal, o hebbinirii ɗum gada e Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen.
49003012	En nder Almasiifu, en ngoonɗinii mo, gam ma'ajum en mbaawi ɓaditaago Allah naa e kulol, en tabbitinii boo o jaɓey en.
49003013	Gam ma'ajum emi toroo on, to' ɓerɗe mooɗon mettu sabu torraaji ɗi njareymi gam mooɗon, sabu kanji ngoni mantorɗum mooɗon.
49003014	Kanjum waɗi ndiccotoomi yeeso Allah Baabiraawo,
49003015	kokkuɗo leƴƴi gonɗi dow e lees fuu inɗe.
49003016	Emi toroo mo, kanko jawmu teddungal manngal, o semmbiɗina ɓerɗe mooɗon gada e baawɗe Ruhu ma'ako Ceniiɗo,
49003017	o jo''ina Almasiifu nder ɓerɗe mooɗon gada e goonɗingo mo. Emi toroo mo boo, o waɗa yiɗde lugga semmbiɗa nder ɓerɗe mooɗon,
49003018	gam faa keɓon fahamugo, onon e yimɓe Allah horiiɓe, no yiɗde Almasiifu yaajiri e no juutiri e no towri e no luggiri,
49003019	anndon yiɗde Almasiifu ndeen, koo to walaa baawɗo fahamugo nde. Emi toroo mo ɗum, ɗum fuu, gam faa laatooɗon heeɓɓe gikku Allah.
49003020	Allah kuwoowo nder meeɗen e baawɗe muuɗum mawɗe, e waawi waɗgo ko ɓuri ko torotooɗen mo e ko nyumeten.
49003021	Teddungal laatanoo mo nder ikiliisiya gada e Yeesu Almasiifu nder jaamanuuji fuu faa abadaa abadin~! Aamiin.
49004001	Gam ma'ajum, miin omndaaɗo gam huwango Jawmiraawo, emi toroo on mbaɗee jo'onde yahadunde e noddaango ngo Allah noddi on.
49004002	Laatee ɓe hakkiilo koo ndeye, leestinɓe ko'e mu''en, ɓe munyal. Munymunytiree e yiɗde.
49004003	Ti'inee jogaago ngo'otaaku ngu Ruhu Allah hokki on, gada e jo'onde jam hawtunde on.
49004004	En ɓanndu wo'oru, en ngoodi Ruhu go'oto e tammunde wo'ore nde Allah noddiri en.
49004005	E woodi Jawmiraawo go'oto e goonɗinki go'oti e baptisma go'otum.
49004006	E woodi Allah go'oto Baaba yimɓe fuu, emo laamanoo yimɓe fuu, emo huutira yimɓe fuu, emo jooɗii nder yimɓe fuu.
49004007	Koo moye meeɗen fuu heɓii kokkal caahu Allah, deydey e no Almasiifu ye'ediri ɗum.
49004008	Gam Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Nde o ƴeenti dow, o yaharii nanngaaɓe konu, o hokkii yimɓe kokke.~»
49004009	Ɗume woni ma'ana «~o ƴeentii dow~»~? Ma'ana ma'ajum woni Almasiifu aartii jippake nder duuniyaaru.
49004010	Jippinooɗo oon, kanko woni ƴeentuɗo toon dow, gam o hebbina duuniyaaru fuu.
49004011	Kanko hokki woɓɓe kokkal laataago lilaaɓe, woɓɓe annabo'en, woɓɓe wa'ajinooɓe, woɓɓe boo pasto'en e ekkitinooɓe jama'aare.
49004012	O waɗii ɗum gam o siryoo yimɓe Allah faa ɓe mbaawa huwango mo, ɓe cemmbiɗina ɓanndu Almasiifu, waato ikiliisiya.
49004013	Noon laatortooɗen go'o nder goonɗinki e anndugo Ɓiɗɗo Allah, mawnen nder goonɗinki kiin, faa laatooɗen heeɓɓe kama Almasiifu.
49004014	Ndeen kadi en laatataako bilki'en difreteeɓe koo toye, kama no ɓoggi ndiyam e henndu ndifrata akalel ndiyam. Ekkitinooɓe fevooɓe boo majjinirtaa en e ƴoyre mu''en.
49004015	Ammaa to eɗen mbi'a goonga nder yiɗde, en mawney nder koo ɗume fuu, faa njottooɗen darnde Almasiifu, laatiiɗo hoore meeɗen.
49004016	Gada e ma'ako jokkule ɓanndu fuu njogootiri. To jokkule ɓanndu nduun fuu e kuura no haani, ɓanndu nduun no mawney, semmbiɗa nder yiɗde.
49004017	Gam ma'ajum emi toroo on nder innde Jawmiraawo~: to' on ɓesdu waɗgo jo'onde iri nde heeferɓe, ɓe nyumooji mehereeji.
49004018	Hakkiilooji maɓɓe niɓɓi, ɓe ngalaa geɗal yonki ɗum Allah hokkata, gam ɓe anndaa Allah, ko'e maɓɓe boo njo'orii.
49004019	Ɓe ngalaa cemtuɗum, ɓe mbaɗii ko'e maɓɓe tokkuɓe giɗaaɗi ɓalli mu''en, ɓe comataa huugo koo iri ɗeye kuuɗe nefniiɗe.
49004020	Onon kam, on ekkitaaki iri kuuɗe ɗeen nder ekkitinol Almasiifu~!
49004021	Mi tabbitinii on nanii habaru Yeesu, on ekkitinaama goonga ngonka nder ma'ako.
49004022	Ɓortee gikku ngu ngoonnooɗon ndeenno, ngu suunooji duuniyaaru mbonni, majjini.
49004023	Ngooree yonkiiji mooɗon e hakkiilooji mooɗon kesɗitinee.
49004024	Ɓornee gikku kesu ngu Allah tagi nder nanndi muuɗum. Gikku nguun e vanngina aadilaaku e senaare ivoyɗum e goonga.
49004025	Gam ma'ajum ngooree fewre~! Sey koo moye mooɗon vi'a banndum goonga, gam en fuu en laatii jokkule ɓanndu wo'oru.
49004026	To on kuunƴii, to' on njaɓ huunƴere ndeen waɗa on e waɗgo hakke. To' mutki naange tawdu on e huunƴere.
49004027	To' on kokku Ceyɗaan lovel nder mooɗon koo seɗɗa.
49004028	Laatinooɗo gujjo woora nguyka, ammaa o huwa kuugal booɗngal e juuɗe ma'ako, gam o heɓa ko o foofri e ko o valliri ɓe ngalaa.
49004029	To' on ngoor bolle naawɗe mburtoo e konnduɗe mooɗon, ammaa mbolvee bolle nafooje, cemmbiɗineyɗe goonɗinki woɓɓe, gam yewantooɓe on nana ko nafata ɗum'en.
49004030	To' on mettinan Ruhu Ceniiɗo ɓernde, gam Ruhu Ceniiɗo oon woni jelgol ngol Allah waɗani on, gam hollugo onon ɗum ɓe ma'ako, faa yahago nyalaande nde o rimɗinta on.
49004031	Ittee mettam ɓeram e nganyaandi e huunƴere e huɗhuɗtirgo e haɓre, kam e koo iri ndeye halleende nder mooɗon.
49004032	Ngiɗngiɗtiree, njurmindiree hakkunde mooɗon, nja'afootiree noon no Allah ya'aforanii on, sabu kawtal mooɗon e Almasiifu.
49005001	Jo'oni, onon on ɓiɓɓe Allah yiɗaaɓe, gam ma'ajum ngemminee gikku ma'ako nder jo'onde mooɗon.
49005002	Mbaɗee jo'onde yiɗde, noon no Almasiifu yiɗiri en, hokki yonki muuɗum gam meeɗen, o laatanii en cakkiri ndi Allah nani belɗum muuɗum kama urdi mbelndi.
49005003	Nde laatii onon on yimɓe Allah, haanaa haala njeenu e kuuɗe nefniiɗe e koɗey volvee nder mooɗon.
49005004	Noon boo, to' bolle kalluɗe e bolle bemmbe e njoolka nanee hakkunde mooɗon, gam ɗum haanaa. Igga ngettiron Allah e ɗemɗe mooɗon.
49005005	Pahamee booɗɗum~: baɗoowo njeenu e baɗoowo kuuɗe nefniiɗe e biiro ɓe ngalaa geɗal nder laamu Almasiifu e Allah. Gam biiranci e tokkugo gumki no go'o.
49005006	To' on njaɓ koo moye ƴoynira on e haalaaji mehereeji, gam iri ba ma'aji waddata huunƴere Allah dow ɓeen saliiɓe ɗowtanaago mo.
49005007	Gam ma'ajum to' on kawtu ko'e mooɗon e maɓɓe.
49005008	Ndeenno nder niɓre ngonnooɗon, ammaa jo'oni nder kawtal mooɗon e Jawmiraawo, on nattii nder jayngol. Gam ma'ajum mbaɗee jo'onde ɓiɓɓe jayngol.
49005009	Mi vi'ii noon gam jayngol kam rimata gikku mbooɗngu e aadilaaku e goonga fuu.
49005010	Ti'inee ekkitooɗon ko velata Jawmiraawo.
49005011	To' on mbaɗ juuɗe mooɗon nder kuuɗe mehereeje, kuweteeɗe nder niɓre, ammaa cuuɗtee ɗe.
49005012	Gam ko yimɓe ɓeen mbaɗata nder suuɗeefi, koo volvugo ɗum maa no cemtuɗum.
49005013	Ammaa ko suuɗtaa fuu, jayngol no holley no ɗum va'i,
49005014	gam ko waddaa to jayngol fuu no laatoto jayngol. Kanjum waɗi ɗum vi'i~: «~Fin, aan ɗaaniiɗo, Umma nder maayɓe, Almasiifu boo no yaynante.~»
49005015	Gam ma'ajum kakkilanee jo'onde mooɗon. To' on mbaɗ jo'onde vemmbuɓe, ammaa mbaɗee jo'onde yimɓe ɓe hakkiilo.
49005016	Nde keɓɗon wakkaci waɗgo ko vooɗi fuu, mbaɗee ɗum, gam yimɓe ndu'u jaamaniiru no halluɓe.
49005017	Gam ma'ajum, to' on laato vemmbuɓe, ammaa ngillee anndugo ko Jawmiraawo yiɗi mbaɗon.
49005018	To' on ɗuɗɗin yare-yare ko sottinta hakkiilo, gam ɗum ittey cemtuɗum. Ammaa keevee Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
49005019	Cemmbiɗindiree e gimi jabuura e gimi maaltooje e gimi ɗi Ruhu hokkata on. Ngimanee Jawmiraawo, maalton mo e ɓerɗe mooɗon fuu.
49005020	Ngettee Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen koo ndeye nder koo ɗume e innde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu.
49005021	Koo moye mooɗon ɗowtanoo banndum, gam mawninki ki mawninton Almasiifu.
49005022	Onon rewɓe, ɗowtanee worɓe mooɗon, noon no ɗowtorantooɗon Jawmiraawo.
49005023	Gam gorko kam woni hoore debbo muuɗum, noon no Almasiifu laatorii hoore ikiliisiya. Kanko woni kisnoowo ikiliisiya laatiika ɓanndu ma'ako.
49005024	Noon no ikiliisiya teddinirta Yeesu, noon haani debbo teddinira gorko muuɗum nder koo ɗume fuu.
49005025	Onon worɓe, ngiɗee rewɓe mooɗon noon no Almasiifu yiɗiri ikiliisiya. O hokki yonki ma'ako gam ma'aka,
49005026	faa o laatina ka ceniika, ɓaawo o lootirii ka ndiyam e voliinde ma'ako.
49005027	O waɗii ɗum, ɗum fuu, gam faa o darna ikiliisiya kaan yeeso ma'ako, eka heevi darajja, ka walaa tuhundi, koo ko nefni, ammaa ka laatoo ceniika ka walaa feloore.
49005028	Noon boo, sey worɓe ngiɗa rewɓe mu''en, noon no ngiɗiri ɓalli mu''en. Giɗɗo debbo muuɗum fuu yiɗii hoore muuɗum.
49005029	Gam walaa meeɗɗo wanygo ɓanndu muuɗum, ammaa o nyaamney ndu, o reena ndu, noon no Almasiifu reenrata ikiliisiya,
49005030	laatiika ɓanndu ma'ako, ndu enen maa laatiiɗen jokkule muuɗum.
49005031	Deftere vi'i~: «~Neɗɗo no seedey e baaba muuɗum e inna muuɗum takkootira e debbo muuɗum, ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe laatoo ɓanndu wo'oru.~»
49005032	Nde'e aayaare e suuɗi goonga makka. E am kam, ende volva dow Almasiifu e ikiliisiya.
49005033	E noon fuu, sey koo moye mooɗon yiɗa debbo muuɗum, noon no yiɗiri hoore muuɗum, debbo boo mawnina gorko muuɗum.
49006001	Onon ɓiɓɓe, ɗowtanee danyooɓe mooɗon sabu kawtal mooɗon e Jawmiraawo, gam kanjum woni booɗɗum.
49006002	«~Teddin baaba maaɗa e inna maaɗa.~» Kanjum woni dooka arana ngoonka alkawal nder dookaaji Allah sappo.
49006003	Alkawal ngaal woni~: «~A heɓey barkaa, balɗe maaɗa boo njuuta nder duuniyaaru.~»
49006004	Onon danyooɓe, to' on kuunƴin ɓiɓɓe mooɗon, ammaa ekkitinee ɓe gikku mbooɗngu, elton ɓe, ɓe mawna nder laawol Jawmiraawo.
49006005	Onon maccuɓe, ɗowtanee jawmiraaɓe mooɗon nder ndu'u duuniyaaru, mawninee ɓe nder kulol e diwngol. Mbaɗee ɗum e ɓernde wo'ore kama on mbaɗana Almasiifu.
49006006	Ɗowtanee ɓe, wanaa yeeso gite maɓɓe tan, gam velnango ɓe ɓerɗe, ammaa ɗowtanee ɓe gam on maccuɓe Almasiifu waɗooɓe ko Allah yiɗi e ɓernde wo'ore.
49006007	Kuwanee ɓe e velvelo kama huwanooɓe Jawmiraawo wanaa yimɓe.
49006008	On anndi Jawmiraawo no biyoto koo moye kuuɗo kuuɗe booɗɗe, koo o maccuɗo koo o dimo.
49006009	Onon boo jawmiraaɓe, njogoree maccuɓe mooɗon no haani. To' on nyaaɗan ɓe, gam on anndi onon e maɓɓe on ngoodi Jawmiraawo go'oto gonɗo toon dow asama, mo ɓurdindirtaa yimɓe.
49006010	Raa ko timminireymi vi'igo on~: cemmbiɗee nder kawtal mooɗon e Jawmiraawo. Ngooree baawɗe ma'ako mawɗe cemmbiɗina on.
49006011	Ɓornee konruɗumji ɗi Allah hokkata on fuu, gam faa mbaawon dartanaago dabareeji Ceyɗaan.
49006012	Gam wanaa yimɓe konkontirten, ammaa en konkontira e ginnaaji kalluɗi gonɗi hakkunde dow e lees, goonɗi baawɗe e semmbee, laamaniiɗi ndu'u duuniyaaru ndu niɓre.
49006013	Gam ma'ajum, kooƴee konruɗumji Allah fuu, gam to nyalaande hallunde warii mbaawon dartanaago dabareeji Ceyɗaan. Ɓaawo on njottini koo ɗume, ɗum tawa on ndari.
49006014	To noon, ummee ndaree. Taadee goonga kama taadorde, ɓornee aadilaaku kama toggoore njamndi nde konu.
49006015	Siri wa'ajingo Habaru Belɗum ɗum jam laatanoo on paɗe.
49006016	Wakkaci fuu njogee goonɗinki kama vavaade. E ma'aki nyifroton cenye ɗe yiite ɗe Kalluɗo fiɗroyta on.
49006017	Kuufnee kisndam kama huufneere njamndi nde konu. Kooƴee voliinde Allah kama kaafahi ki Ruhu Ceniiɗo hokkata on.
49006018	Wakkaci fuu mbaɗee do'aaje e torɗe noon no Ruhu Ceniiɗo hollirta on. Kakkilee to' on com waɗango yimɓe Allah fuu do'aare dum.
49006019	Miin boo, mbaɗanee yam do'aare gam Allah hokka yam ka mbi'eymi, mi anndina yimɓe sirri Habaru Belɗum naa e kulol.
49006020	Koo nde laatii jo'oni emi nder kaso, e noon fuu mi wakiliijo Habaru Belɗum ɗuum. Mbaɗee do'aare gam mi waɗa ga wa'ajingo Habaru ɗuum noon no haani, naa e kulol.
49006021	Tikikus banndii en giɗaaɗo, kuwoowo koolaaɗo nder kuugal Jawmiraawo, no yeccoto on njamu am e ko kuweymi fuu.
49006022	Mi liloyey mo to mooɗon, gam o yeccoo on no koo moye amin wontiri, o semmbiɗina ɓerɗe mooɗon boo.
49006023	Banndiraaɓe, Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu kokka on jo'onde jam e yiɗde e goonɗinki.
49006024	Allah barkiɗina koo moye giɗɗo Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu e yiɗde nde re'ataa.
50001001	Miin Bulus e Timote maccuɓe Yeesu Almasiifu emin kinna on, onon seniiɓe wonɓe si'ire Filipi hawtuɓe e Yeesu Almasiifu, e darvanooɓe ikiliisiya e vallooɓe wonɓe nder mooɗon.
50001002	Allah Baaba meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu kokku on barkaa e jam.
50001003	Nde kiimtiimi on fuu, emi yetta Allah am gam mooɗon.
50001004	Nde torotoomi Allah gam mooɗon fuu, ɓernde am e nana belɗum dum,
50001005	gam on mballii yam wa'ajingo Habaru Belɗum ila fuɗɗam faa wargo hannde.
50001006	Mi tabbitinii Allah puɗɗuɗo kuugal booɗngal nder mooɗon, o yahey yeeso e huugo ngal, faa ngal heeva nyanndeere nde Yeesu Almasiifu vittoyta.
50001007	Ɗum booɗɗum mi nyumra on noon on fuu, gam mi waɗii on nder ɓernde am. On fuu on kawtii e am nder barkaa ka Allah hokki yam, koo nde kaɓɓaami nder kaso, koo nde noddaami gam heedango Habaru Belɗum e tabbitingo ɗum.
50001008	Allah e saaydii mi yeewnii on, emi yiɗi on, on fuu, noon no Yeesu Almasiifu yiɗiri on.
50001009	Raa ko torantoomi on Allah~: yiɗde mooɗon ɓesdoo yeeso-yeeso nder anndal e fahamu senndindirgo goonga e fewre,
50001010	gam mbaawon anndugo ko vooɗi. Ndeen on laatoto ɓe ɓerɗe laaɓɗe, ɓe ngalaa feloore nyannde bittoyki Almasiifu,
50001011	faa ɓerɗe mooɗon kebbinee ɓiɓɓe aadilaaku iɓɗum e Yeesu Almasiifu, gam Allah teddinee, maaltee.
50001012	Banndiraaɓe, emi yiɗi anndon torraa keɓka yam yaharii kuugal Habaru Belɗum yeeso.
50001013	Gam faa e reenooɓe laamorde e yimɓe horiiɓe fuu e anndi laaɓɗum gam Almasiifu kaɓɓaami.
50001014	Gam daliila kaɓɓeeki am, banndiraaɓe ɗuuɗɓe nder Jawmiraawo keɓii semmbee volvugo habaru Allah, naa e kulol.
50001015	Goonga, e woodi wa'ajotooɓe habaru Almasiifu gam nalwiiru e pooɗpooɗtiral, ammaa e woodi wa'ajotooɓe e nyumooji booɗɗi.
50001016	Ɓeen wa'ajortooɓe e nyumooji booɗɗi e kuwa nder yiɗde, eɓe anndi Allah suɓii yam gam heedango Habaru Belɗum.
50001017	Ammaa horiiɓe e nga'ajina habaru Almasiifu gam yillanaago ko'e mu''en manngu, nyumooji maɓɓe mbooɗaa. Kadimaa eɓe ngiɗi ɓesdugo torraa am nder kaɓɓorgol.
50001018	Koo to ɓe nga'ajinii e nyumooji kalluɗi, koo e nyumooji booɗɗi, ɗum waannataa yam. Ammaa emi nana belɗum gam habaru Almasiifu wa'ajinaama. Kadimaa mi ɓesdey nango belɗum,
50001019	gam emi anndi sabu do'aaje mooɗon e ballal Ruhu Yeesu Almasiifu, re'erde torraa am no laatanto yam kisndam.
50001020	Ko ngiɗmi e ko woni nder ɓernde am fuu woni, to' mi semtu nder kuugal Jawmiraawo koo seɗɗa. Emi yiɗi boo Almasiifu teddinee sabu ko heɓi yam, gada jo'oni faa abadaa, koo poofmi koo maaymi.
50001021	Gam miin kam, Almasiifu woni yonki am, maayde am boo ɗum ɓesdaari.
50001022	Kul emi foofa nder duuniyaaru, mi yahey yeeso e huugo ko nafata. Ammaa mi anndaa ko cuɓeymi.
50001023	Hakkiilo am senndake nde ɗiɗi. Ko ɓurmi yiɗgo mi yaha mi jooɗodoo e Almasiifu, gam ɗum ɓuranii yam vooɗgo,
50001024	ammaa foofaango am nder duuniyaaru ɓurii nafgo on.
50001025	Gam ma'ajum emi anndi mi daroto nder duuniyaaru mi wonda e mooɗon on fuu, gam njahon yeeso e velveltugo nder goonɗinki mooɗon.
50001026	Noon boo to mi wartii to mooɗon, on ɓesdey mantoraago kawtal mooɗon e Yeesu Almasiifu gam am.
50001027	Sey jo'onde mooɗon laatoo haandunde e Habaru Almasiifu Belɗum, gam koo ngarmi yi'igo on, koo mi waraay, mi nana vi'ee eɗon kawti e semmbee, on ngoodi hakkiilo wo'oto, eɗon kuuda e ɓernde wo'ore sabu goonɗinki mooɗon ivoyki e Habaru Belɗum.
50001028	To' on kul wanywanyɓe mooɗon koo seɗɗa. Gam kanjum laatantoo ɓe alaama halkere, ammaa onon ɗum alaama kisndam mooɗon gada to Allah.
50001029	Allah hokkaay on caahu muuɗum gam ngoonɗinon Almasiifu tan, ammaa faa e torreego gam ma'ako.
50001030	On kawtii e am nder haɓre nde ngi'inooɗon mi haɓaama, nde nanɗon kadimaa emi haɓee faa jo'oni.
50002001	To kawtal mooɗon e Almasiifu e semmbiɗina on, to yiɗde ma'ako e waaltina ɓerɗe mooɗon, to on kawtii nder Ruhu Ceniiɗo, to on ngoodi yiɗde e yurmeende hakkunde mooɗon,
50002002	to ɗum noon, ndeen kam kebbinee velvelo am, laatooɗon ɓe nyumo wo'oto e yiɗde wo'ore e ɓernde wo'ore e anniya ngo'ota.
50002003	To' on mbaɗ koo ɗume nder yiɗde hoore koo mawnitaare, ammaa leestinee ko'e mooɗon, sey ndaaron woɓɓe kama ɓe ɓurii on.
50002004	To' koo moye mooɗon yillo ko nafata hoore muuɗum tan, ammaa o yilloo ko nafata woɓɓe boo.
50002005	Ngooree gikku Yeesu Almasiifu tawee nder mooɗon~:
50002006	Kanko laatiiɗo Allah, o raaraay fotgo e Allah kama fii jogeteeɗum e semmbee,
50002007	ammaa o leestinii hoore ma'ako, o jaɓii laataago maccuɗo, o rimaama kama neɗɗo. O vanngii kama neɗɗo,
50002008	o leestinii hoore ma'ako, o ɗowtanii Allah faa o maayi, maayde dow gaafagal.
50002009	Gam ma'ajum Allah teddini mo korey, o hokki mo innde ɓurnde inɗe fuu,
50002010	gam to innde Yeesu noddaama, koo moye no diccoto yeeso ma'ako, ko woni toon dow e ko woni dow lesdi e ko woni lees lesdi fuu.
50002011	Kadimaa ɗemɗe fuu no mbi'ey Yeesu Almasiifu woni Jawmiraawo, gam Allah Baabiraawo teddinee.
50002012	Gam ma'ajum higooɓe am ɓe ngiɗmi, noon no ɗowtorinooɗon wakkaci fuu, sey koo moye huura kisndam muuɗum e kulol Allah. Naa nde ngondumi e mooɗon tan, ammaa ɓuree jo'oni nde ngoɗɗiimi on.
50002013	Gam Allah e huwa nder mooɗon, faa ngiɗon waɗgo ko veli mo.
50002014	Nder ko kuwoton fuu, to' on mboyto, to' on njokkir,
50002015	gam laatooɗon seniiɓe ɓe ngalaa feloore, laatooɗon ɓiɓɓe Allah laaɓɓe, wonɓe nder jaamaniiru selndu bonndu. Laatee yaynotooɓe nder duuniyaaru kama jayngol koode,
50002016	hollooɓe voliinde yonki kesum. Laatee daliila ko mantortoomi nyannde bittoyki Almasiifu, gam mi tabbitina kuugal am e torra am laataaki mehere.
50002017	Goonɗinki mooɗon laatake kama kokkal gam Allah. Koo nde laatii ƴiiƴam am rufaama dow sakkirde mooɗon, emi nana belɗum e daneewol ɓernde hawtaade e mooɗon.
50002018	Noon boo nanee belɗum, mbelmbeltidee e am.
50002019	To Yeesu Jawmiraawo jaɓii, emi nyuma liloygo Timote to mooɗon yeeso seɗɗa, gam to mi nanii habaru mooɗon, ɗum semmbiɗiney ɓernde am.
50002020	Gam mi walaa goɗɗo potɗo e ma'ako, mo hakkiilo muuɗum woni to mooɗon, sey kanko tan.
50002021	Horiiɓe fuu ko'e mu''en tan nyumata, naa Yeesu Almasiifu.
50002022	Ammaa on anndi no Timote holliri no koolaaɗo. O huudii e am nder kuugal Habaru Belɗum noon no ɓiɗɗo huudirta e baaba muuɗum.
50002023	Kanko ngiɗmi liloygo to mooɗon jaawɗum nde anndumi ko laatantoo yam.
50002024	Kadimaa mi goonɗini miin e hoore am mi warey to mooɗon yeeso seɗɗa.
50002025	Ammaa mi yi'ii e haani mi liloya Epaforoditus to mooɗon. Kanko woni banndam kuudoowo e am, o vallii yam haɓango Habaru Belɗum. On liloyii mo gam o valla yam, o huwana yam nder ciya am.
50002026	O yeewnii on, on fuu. Kadimaa o waannake korey nde nanɗon habaru ciya njamu ma'ako.
50002027	Goonga, o waɗii ciya njamu faa o ɓadii maaygo. Ammaa Allah nanii jurumɗum ma'ako, naa kanko tan, faa e miin Allah yurmake yam, gam to' mettuɗum ɗuuɗanam.
50002028	Kanjum waɗi ɓurmi yiɗgo liloygo mo to mooɗon, gam nanon belɗum yi'igo mo, kadimaa miin e hoore am ɓernde am waalto.
50002029	Gam ma'ajum njaɓɓoree mo nder innde Jawmiraawo, nanee belɗum ɗuuɗɗum. Teddinee yimɓe va'aɓe noon,
50002030	gam o ɓadake maaygo sabu kuugal Almasiifu. O hokkii yonki ma'ako gam hebbitgo ko on mbaawaay vallugo yam huugo, gam en ngaldaa.
50003001	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, banndiraaɓe am, nanee belɗum nder kawtal mooɗon e Jawmiraawo. Ɓesdugo vinndango on ɗen ɗoon bolle naa ɗum fii caɗɗum e am, ɗum ɓuranii on boo, gam ɗum reeney ɓerɗe mooɗon.
50003002	Kakkilee e halluɓe laatiiɓe kama caafaali, waɗooɓe ko boni, vi'ooɓe doole neɗɗo fuu naadee ko hokka o laatoo neɗɗo Allah. Ɗum fewre~!
50003003	Gam enen ngoni naadaaɓe goonga'en, enen huwanooɓe Allah gada e Ruhu ma'ako, mawninooɓe Yeesu Almasiifu, ɓe koolaaki kuuɗe ɓalli mu''en.
50003004	Koo nde laatii miin e hoore am emi waawi hoolaago kuuɗe ɓanndu am. To woɓɓe e tammii e mbaawi hoolaago kuuɗe ɓalli mu''en, miin mi ɓurii ɓe.
50003005	Mi naadaama balɗe joveetati ɓaawo danyeeki, mi Isiraa'iilankeejo ivoyɗo e lenyol Bennyamin, Ibraninkeejo ɓii Ibraninkeejo. Dow e tokkugo Tawreeta boo mi Fariisaajo.
50003006	Dow e ti'inaare mi torriino goonɗinɓe Yeesu. Dow e aadilaaku tokkugo Tawreeta mi walaa feloore.
50003007	Ɗe'e ku'uje fuu mi nyumiino ɗum geetum, ammaa jo'oni ɗum fuu mi yi'ii ɗum mehere gam Almasiifu.
50003008	Goonga, mi yi'ii ko mbaɗnoomi fuu ɗum mehere, gam ko ɓuri teddugo fuu woni anndugo Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo am. Gam ma'ako mi waɗii asaara koo ɗume fuu, ɗum laatanii yam mbuubri mehereeri, gam mi heɓa mi laatoo mo Almasiifu.
50003009	Ko ngiɗmi woni mi tawee e ma'ako, naa gam aadilaaku am ivoyngu e tokkugo Tawreeta, ammaa gam aadilaaku ivoyngu to Allah, kanjum woni goonɗingo Almasiifu.
50003010	Ko ngiɗmi woni anndugo Yeesu Almasiifu e baawɗe ummitineeki muuɗum, kadimaa mi heɓa geɗal torraa ma'ako, gam mi nannda e ma'ako nder maayde,
50003011	gam no ɗum waɗi fuu, miin boo mi heɓa yottaago ummitineeki maayɓe.
50003012	Mi vi'aay mi heɓii ɗum jo'oni, mi laataaki keeɓɗo tawo. Ammaa emi waɗa ga nyaargo yeeso-yeeso, noon no yimɓe ndaɗootirta faa mi nannga keɓal jaalorgal, sabu Yeesu Almasiifu nanngii yam gam daliila ma'ajum.
50003013	Banndiraaɓe, miin e hoore am mi vi'aay mi aartii mi nanngii ɗum. Fii go'otum tan mbaɗeymi~: emi yeggitana ko wutii, emi raara ko woni yeeso.
50003014	Emi nyaara faa mi yottoo keerol daɗki, gam mi heɓa biya ka Allah noddiri en keɓen nder kawtal e Yeesu Almasiifu.
50003015	Gam ma'ajum enen ɓennduɓe nder tokkugo Yeesu, sey nyumen kama noon. Kadimaa to goɗɗo e woodi nyumo feere, Allah no vannginaney mo ɗum.
50003016	Ammaa sey ti'inooɗen tokkugo laawol goongawol.
50003017	Banndiraaɓe, kawtee e ɓeen tokkuɓe misaalu jo'onde am, ndaaree jooɗoriiɓe kama noon.
50003018	Gam jo'onde ɗuuɗɓe e holla ɓe laatake wanywanyɓe habaru maayde Almasiifu dow gaafagal. Mi vi'ii on ɗum nde ɗuuɗɗum, kadimaa emi ɓesda vi'igo on ɗum jo'oni, faa e bojji.
50003019	Timmoode maɓɓe ɗum halkere, deedi maɓɓe laatii allah maɓɓe, ciya cemtuɗum ɓe mantorto, eɓe ndaara ko woni nder duuniyaaru tan.
50003020	Ammaa enen ngoni ɓiɓɓe laamu dow. Jo'oni boo en ndeenti bittoyki Kisnoowo en ivoyeyɗo gada dow, Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu.
50003021	Kanko waylitata ɓalli meeɗen leestuɗi, o laatina ɗi tedduɗi kama ndu ma'ako, gada e baawɗe ma'ako ɗe o laamorantoo koo ɗume fuu.
50004001	Gam ma'ajum banndiraaɓe am ɓe ngiɗmi, ɓe ngeewnumi korey, onon ngoni velvelo am e teddungal am. Onon higooɓe am ɓe ngiɗmi, ndaree e semmbee nder Jawmiraawo.
50004002	Emi toroo Ewoodiya e Sintike ɓerɗe maɓɓe laatoo wo'ore nder Jawmiraawo.
50004003	Aan kuudoowo e am goongaajo, emi toro maa mballitoɗaa rewɓe ɓeen haɓduɓe e am nder kuugal Habaru Belɗum, e Keleman e huudooɓe e am horiiɓe, ɓe inɗe mu''en mbinndaa nder deftere yonki.
50004004	Wakkaci fuu nanee belɗum gam kawtal mooɗon e Jawmiraawo. Emi ɓesda vi'igo on ɗum kadimaa, nanee belɗum~!
50004005	Ngooree booɗal gikku mooɗon yi'oo yeeso yimɓe fuu. Bittoyki Jawmiraawo ɓadake.
50004006	To' on ngaanno dow koo ɗume, ammaa nder koo ɗume toree Allah, ngeccooɗon mo tornde mooɗon e yettoore.
50004007	Ndeen Allah kokkoowo jam ɓurɗum fahamu neɗɗo fuu no reeney ɓerɗe mooɗon e nyumooji mooɗon gada e Yeesu Almasiifu.
50004008	Banndiraaɓe, raa ko kornumi vi'igo on~: mbaɗee nyumooji mooɗon dow ko woni goonga, e ko foti teddineego, e aadilaaku, e ko laaɓi, e ko heƴi yiɗeego, e ko woni belɗum. Nyumee dow ko ɓuri vooɗgo e ko foti mawnineego.
50004009	Ko ekkitinmi on, ko njaɓɗon, ko nanɗon e ko ngiiɗon e am fuu, kuwee ɗum. Allah kokkoowo jam boo no wondey e mooɗon.
50004010	Emi nana belɗum nder Jawmiraawo korey, gam jo'oni on ɓesdii waanneego dow am. Goonga, koo ndeenno on nyumeynoo yam, ammaa on keɓaay daama vallugo yam.
50004011	Mi yeccake on ɗum, naa gam emi yiɗi goɗɗum to mooɗon, gam mi ekkitake jooɗaago e ɓernde waaltiinde nder ko tawi yam fuu.
50004012	Emi anndi jooɗaago nder cooyndam e risku. Koo ndeye e koo toye fuu, mi ekkitake haargo e dolgo, e wongo nder ɗuuɗɗum e wongo nder ciya.
50004013	Emi waawi jaɓɓaago ko tawi yam fuu, sabu Almasiifu cemmbiɗinoowo yam.
50004014	Ammaa on mbaɗii booɗɗum nde mballuɗon yam nder torraa am.
50004015	Onon Filipi'en eɗon anndi ila wakkaci nde ɗalmi lesdi Makedooniya, nde Habaru Belɗum fuɗɗi sankitaago, walaa ikiliisiya hawti e am nder hokkugo e jaɓgo, sey onon tan.
50004016	Nde ngonnoomi si'ire Tesaloonika, on lildoyii yam valliiru nder bukaata am naa nde wo'ore, naa nde ɗiɗi.
50004017	Wanaa kokkal mooɗon ndaareymi, ammaa emi raara riiba goonɗinki mooɗon ɓesdoo faa ɗuuɗa.
50004018	Ko lildoyɗon yam e junngo Epaforoditus ɗuum heƴi, ɗum biyake bukaata am, faa ɗum ɓurii. Kokkal mooɗon ngaal nanndii e uureengol sakkirde belngol, ngol Allah nani belɗum muuɗum jaɓi.
50004019	Allah am nder ɗuuɗal risku muuɗum no hebbiney bukaataaji mooɗon fuu, sabu kawtal mooɗon e Yeesu Almasiifu.
50004020	Teddungal laatanoo Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen faa abadaa~! Aamiin.
50004021	Kinnanee yam seniiɓe hawtuɓe e Yeesu Almasiifu fuu. Banndiraaɓe wonduɓe e am boo e kinna on.
50004022	Seniiɓe wonɓe ɗo'o fuu e kinna on, ɓurna muuɗum huwooɓe nder wuro laamiiɗo Roomankoo'en.
50004023	Barkaa Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo wondu e mooɗon on fuu~!
51001001	Miin Bulus mo Allah suɓi laatoo lilaaɗo Yeesu Almasiifu, hawtaade e banndi en Timote mbinndi ngo'ol ɗereewol.
51001002	Emin kinna on, onon yimɓe Allah wonɓe si'ire Koloosi, banndiraaɓe amin hoolaaɓe sabu kawtal mu''en e Almasiifu. Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen hokka on barkaa e jam.
51001003	Koo ndeye nde min mbaɗata do'aare gam mooɗon, emin njetta Allah Baaba Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu.
51001004	Min nanii no ngoonɗinirɗon Yeesu Almasiifu e no ngiɗruɗon yimɓe Allah fuu.
51001005	On kollii nde gam tammunde nde ngoonɗon dow ko Allah resani on toon dow. Tammunde mooɗon ndeen ivii e nanki ki nanɗon voliinde goonga, waato Habaru Belɗum.
51001006	Habaru Belɗum ɗuum e sankitoo koo toye nder duuniyaaru e ɗum rima. Noon ɗum waɗi nder mooɗon onon boo, nyannde nde aartuɗon nango haala yiɗde Allah, pahamuɗon no nde va'i e goonga.
51001007	Epafaras kuudiɗɗaawo amin giɗaaɗo, kam waddani on habaru yiɗde Allah ndeen. O kuwanoowo Almasiifu koolaaɗo nder mooɗon.
51001008	Kanko yeccii min habaru yiɗde mooɗon nde Ruhu Ceniiɗo hokki on.
51001009	Gam ma'ajum minon boo, gada nyannde nde min nani habaru ɗuum, min ngooraay waɗango on do'aare. Emin toroo Allah hebbina on anndal e fahamu ɗum Ruhu ma'ako hokkata, faa anndon ko woni nyumo ma'ako.
51001010	Noon mbaawroton waɗgo foofaango haandanngo goonɗinɓe Jawmiraawo, laatooɗon velooɓe mo nder koo ɗume. Foofaango mooɗon holla koo iri ɗeye kuuɗe booɗɗe. Noon ɓesdirton anndugo Allah.
51001011	Emin toroo mo boo o semmbiɗina on e semmbee ma'ako e baawɗe ma'ako mawɗe, gam mbaawon munyango koo ɗume ko tawi on.
51001012	Ngettee Baabiraawo e velvelo, gam o waɗii on fotɓe heɓgo geɗal barkaaji gonɗi nder laamu jayngol, desanaaɗi senaaɓe ma'ako.
51001013	O vurtinii en nder baawɗe niɓre, o nattinii en nder laamu Ɓiyiiko giɗaaɗo.
51001014	Ɓiɗɗo oon soottii en, ya'afanii en hakkeeji meeɗen.
51001015	Almasiifu woni nanndi Allah mo yi'ataake. Kanko woni afo, ɓurɗo koo ɗume ko tagaa.
51001016	E ma'ako Allah tagiri koo ɗume, ko woni dow e lees, ko yi'etee e ko yi'ataake, malaa'ika'en e koo ɗume ko jogii laamu e baawɗe. Gada e ma'ako ɗum fuu ɗum tagiraa, gam ma'ako boo ɗum tagaa.
51001017	Emo woodi ila walaa ko tagaa. Gada e ma'ako koo ɗume fuu jogootiri.
51001018	Kanko woni hoore ikiliisiya, laatiika ɓanndu ma'ako. Kanko hokkata ɓanndu nduun yonki, kanko woni arano e ummitaago nder maayɓe, gam faa o laatoo arano dow koo ɗume fuu.
51001019	Gam Allah suɓii jo''ina gikku e baawɗe muuɗum fuu nder Ɓiɗɗo muuɗum.
51001020	Gada e ma'ako Allah narrini hoore muuɗum e koo ɗume ko woni dow e lees. Gada e ƴiiƴam Ɓiɗɗo oon ndufaaɗam dow gaafagal, o waddiri jam hakkunde ma'ako e ɓiɓɓe-aadama.
51001021	Ndeenno Allah suɓaay on, on nganyii mo nder nyumooji mooɗon e kuuɗe mooɗon kalluɗe.
51001022	Ammaa jo'oni Almasiifu laatiiɗo neɗɗo maayi. Gada e maayde Almasiifu oon, Allah narriniri on e hoore muuɗum. O waɗii ɗum gam o darna on yeeso ma'ako on seniiɓe, ɓe ngalaa layfi e feloore.
51001023	On laatoto noon to nii on njahii yeeso nder goonɗinki mooɗon, on cemmbiɗii, on ndarake booɗɗum, on ngoɗɗaaki tammunde nde mbaɗɗon wakkaci ɗum nanɗon Habaru Belɗum. Ko woni nder duuniyaaru fuu wa'ajinaama habaru ɗuum. Miin Bulus, mi maccuɗo ma'ajum.
51001024	Jo'oni emi nana belɗum torraaji ɗi njareymi gam mooɗon. Gam torraa am kaan e hebbita ko ŋakki nder torraaji Almasiifu, sabu ɗum nafa ɓanndu ma'ako, waato ikiliisiya.
51001025	Allah suɓii yam mi laatoo kuwaneyɗo ikiliisiya kaan. O hokkii yam kuugal ngaal gam mooɗon, faa mi wa'ajina haala ma'ako fuu.
51001026	Haala kaan woni sirri ɗum o suuɗnoo yimɓe ila jaamanuuji ɗuuɗɗi, ammaa jo'oni o vannginanii ɗum senaaɓe ma'ako.
51001027	Allah anniyake anndingo suɓaaɓe muuɗum risku manngu ngu darajja ngonngu nder sirri ɗum o siryanii yimɓe ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en. Kanjum woni~: Almasiifu e ɗoon nder mooɗon. Kanko hokkata on tammunde heɓgo geɗal nder teddungal Allah.
51001028	Habaru Almasiifu oon min nga'ajinta, emin mbaggina yimɓe, emin ekkitinira ɓe e anndal ngal Allah hokki min fuu, gam faa min ndarna koo moye maɓɓe yeeso Allah, tawee o keeɓɗo nder kawtal ma'ako e Almasiifu.
51001029	Kanjum waɗi emi huwa, emi durvira e baawɗe Yeesu Almasiifu kuwooje e semmbee nder am.
51002001	Emi yiɗi anndon haɓre mawnde nde kaɓeymi gam mooɗon, onon e yimɓe si'ire Lawdikiya, faa e yimɓe fuu ɓe meeɗaay yi'igo yam e gite mu''en.
51002002	Emi yiɗi mi semmbiɗina ɓerɗe mooɗon, yiɗde hawta on, laatooɗon go'o, keevon barkaaji ivoyɗi nder anndal goongawal, gam faa mbaawon anndugo sirri Allah, waato Almasiifu e hoore muuɗum.
51002003	Nder ma'ako risku Allah fuu suuɗii. Kangu woni hikima e anndal.
51002004	Mi vi'ii on ka, gam to' goɗɗo majjinir on haalaaji belɗi.
51002005	Gam koo to emi woɗɗodii e mooɗon nder ɓanndu, e noon fuu ɓernde am e wondi e mooɗon dum. Emi nana belɗum yi'igo potal gonngal hakkunde mooɗon, e no ndaroriiɗon e semmbee nder goonɗingo Almasiifu.
51002006	Jo'oni nde njaɓɗon Yeesu Almasiifu laatoo Jawmiraawo mooɗon, tokkee mo.
51002007	Ɗisee e ma'ako, noon no ɗaɗi lekki ɗisortoo e lesdi. Mahee yonkiiji mooɗon e ma'ako, cemmbiɗee nder goonɗinki mooɗon, noon no ɗum ekkitiniri on. Ngettee Allah wakkaci fuu.
51002008	Kakkilee, to' goɗɗo estir on anndal ndu'u duuniyaaru, waɗa on celon laawol goonga. Iri anndal ngaal no meherewal, ngal majjiney on tan. Anndal ngaal ivii e finaatawaaji ɓiɓɓe-aadama e ginnaaji jogiiɗi baawɗe nder duuniyaaru. Ngal ivaay to Almasiifu.
51002009	Gam nder ɓanndu Almasiifu, gikku Allah e baawɗe muuɗum fuu tawetee.
51002010	Onon on keɓii koo ɗume sabu kawtal mooɗon e Almasiifu, kanko hooreejo koo nguye laamu e baawɗe fuu.
51002011	Kawtal mooɗon e Almasiifu hokki on naadeeki. Naadeeki kiin naa ɗum iri ki yimɓe mbaɗata, ammaa ɗum iri ki Almasiifu waɗata, waato o ɓortii gikku mooɗon ngiɗngu waɗgo hakke.
51002012	Nde mbaɗanaaɗon baptisma, ɗum nanndii kama on uɓdaama e Almasiifu, on ummitidinaama e ma'ako nder maayde, gam on ngoonɗinii baawɗe Allah ummitinɗo mo.
51002013	On laatinoo maayɓe sabu boofi mooɗon, e gam on laataakino yimɓe Allah. Ammaa jo'oni o hokkii on yonki sabu kawtal mooɗon e Almasiifu, o ya'afanake en hakkeeji meeɗen fuu.
51002014	O seekii ɗereewol nyamaande hakkeeji meeɗen ɗi o nanngiri en. O ittanii en ngol wakkaci ɗum Almasiifu ɓilaa dow gaafagal.
51002015	O te'etii laamuuji e baawɗeeji konruɗum mu''en, o semtinii ɗi yeeso yimɓe fuu, nde o jaalorii ɗi gaafagal Almasiifu.
51002016	Gam ma'ajum, to' on ngoor goɗɗo felda on ko nyaamoton e ko njaroton, koo gam on mbaɗaay juulɗe diina e juulɗe darorɗe lewru e nyannde-fooftiinde.
51002017	Ku'uje ɗeen fuu ɗum nanndi ko warata ɗo'o yeeso tan, ammaa goonga ma'aje woni Almasiifu.
51002018	To' on ngoor sujjidanooɓe malaa'ika'en vi'ooɓe no leestinɓe ko'e mu''en njavoo on. Iri yimɓe ɓeen e mantoroo ko ngi'i nder koyɗi. E mehere ɓe ɓottini, gam nyumooji maɓɓe ɗum ɗi duuniyaaru.
51002019	Ɓe ceedii e Almasiifu laatiiɗo hoore ɓanndu muuɗum, waato ikiliisiya. Kanko hokkata ɓanndu nduun fuu ko ndu woodi bukaata. Kanko waɗi jokkule e ɗaɗi ɓanndu nduun fuu e kawti, endu mawnira noon no Allah yiɗiri.
51002020	On maaydii e Almasiifu, on mburtinaama lees laamu ginnaaji laamaniiɗi duuniyaaru. To noon, gam ɗume faa jo'oni mbaɗoton foofaango iri ngo yimɓe duuniyaaru~? Ko jeyi tokkoton mboɗaaji duuniyaaru biiɗi~:
51002021	«~Ta'a meem ɗu'um.~» «~Ta'a mettu ɗum ɗaa'e.~» «~Ta'a jogo ɗu'um~»~?
51002022	Ku'uje ɗe mboɗaaji ɗiin mbolvata dow muuɗum fuu ɗe nyoley. Mboɗaaji ɗiin fuu ɗum nyumooji yimɓe e ekkitinol mu''en tan.
51002023	Goonga, mboɗaaji ɗiin e nanndi e ko woodi ma'ana, gam eɗi ekkitina yimɓe tokka diina e semmbee mu''en fuu, ɓe leestina ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe torra ɓalli maɓɓe. Ammaa mboɗaaji ɗiin fuu mballataa ɓe, ɓe njaaloo giɗaaɗi maɓɓe.
51003001	On ummidinaama e Almasiifu nder maayde. Gam ma'ajum ndesee ɓerɗe mooɗon dow ku'uje gonɗe dow, toon to Almasiifu jooɗii e junngo Allah nyaamo.
51003002	Kohoree hakkiilooji mooɗon dow ko woni toon dow, naa dow ku'uje duuniyaaru,
51003003	gam on maayii, yonkiiji mooɗon kesi e ɗoon cuuɗodii e Almasiifu to Allah.
51003004	Almasiifu woni yonki mooɗon. To o vanngii, onon boo on mbanngidey e ma'ako, on teddidinte e ma'ako.
51003005	Gam ma'ajum kibinee suunooji duuniyaaru gonɗi nder mooɗon, waato njeenu e kuuɗe nefniiɗe e tokkugo giɗaaɗi ɓanndu e suunooji kalluɗi e yiɗgo ko jeyaa, gam yiɗgo ko jeyaa e sujjidango gumki no go'o.
51003006	Gam iri kuuɗe ɗeen njippinta huunƴere Allah dow saliiɓe ɗowtanaago mo.
51003007	Onon boo on kuwiino kuuɗe ɗeen ndeenno, nde poofeynooɗon nder ma'aje.
51003008	Ammaa jo'oni, kibinee iri ɗe'e kuuɗe~: huunƴere e nganyaandi e halleende e kuɗle. To' haalaaji kalluɗi mburto nder konnduɗe mooɗon.
51003009	To' on peɓpeɓtir, gam on ɓortake gikku mooɗon ngu ndeenno e kuuɗe muuɗum.
51003010	Jo'oni on ɓornake gikku kesu. Allah tagɗo gikku kesu nguun, woorataa hesɗitingo ngu, faa ngu nannda e ngu ma'ako, anndon mo booɗɗum.
51003011	To noon, peerootiral walaa hakkunde Yahuuduujo e mo laataaki Yahuuduujo, koo naadaaɗo e mo naadaaka, walaa koɗo, walaa laddeejo, walaa maccuɗo, walaa dimo. Gam Almasiifu woni koo ɗume, emo nder mooɗon on fuu.
51003012	Nde laatii Allah suɓii on, laatinii on yimɓe muuɗum yiɗaaɓe, gam ma'ajum laatee ɓe yurmeende e yiɗde, leestinɓe ko'e mu''en, moƴƴuɓe, ɓe munyal.
51003013	Munymunytiree. To goɗɗo voofanii on, nja'afootiree. Nja'afootiree noon no Jawmiraawo ya'aforanii on.
51003014	Ko ɓuri ɗum fuu ngiɗngiɗtiree, gam yiɗde kam haɓɓindirta kawtal, ngal laatoo booɗngal.
51003015	Ngooree jam Almasiifu laamanoo ɓerɗe mooɗon, gam kanjum ɗuum Allah noddiri on, faa laatooɗon ɓanndu wo'oru. Ngettee Allah dum.
51003016	Ngooree haala Almasiifu jooɗoo nder ɓerɗe mooɗon. Ekkitindiree, ngaaytindiree e anndal e hakkiilo fuu. Maaltee Allah e ɓerɗe mooɗon fuu. Maaltiree mo e jabuura e gettooje e gimi ɗi o hokkata on.
51003017	Ko mbolvoton e ko mbaɗoton fuu, mbaɗee ɗum e innde Yeesu Jawmiraawo. Ngettiree Allah Baabiraawo e innde ma'ako.
51003018	Onon rewɓe, ɗowtanee worɓe mooɗon, noon no haani rewɓe goonɗinɓe Jawmiraawo mbaɗa.
51003019	Onon worɓe, ngiɗee rewɓe mooɗon. To' on ca'atan ɓe.
51003020	Onon ɓiɓɓe, ɗowtanee danyooɓe mooɗon nder koo ɗume, gam kanjum velata Jawmiraawo.
51003021	Onon danyooɓe, to' on monnin ɓiɓɓe mooɗon, gam to' ɓe tampu e ti'inaare maɓɓe.
51003022	Onon maccuɓe, ɗowtanee jawmiraaɓe mooɗon nder koo ɗume, wanaa yeeso gite maɓɓe tan, koo gam ɓe mana on. Ammaa ɗowtanee ɓe e ɓernde wo'ore e kulol Jawmiraawo.
51003023	Ko mbaɗoton fuu, mbaɗee ɗum e ɓernde wo'ore, kama huwanooɓe Jawmiraawo, wanaa yimɓe.
51003024	Anndee, Jawmiraawo no biyoto on, o hokkey on barkaaji ɗi o resani yimɓe ma'ako. Sabu jawmiraawo mo kuwanton oon ɗum Almasiifu.
51003025	Baɗɗo ko halli fuu no heɓey biya halleende muuɗum, sabu Allah ɓurdindirtaa yimɓe.
51004001	Onon jawmiraaɓe, njogee maccuɓe mooɗon booɗɗum, kokkee ɓe ko haani ɓe keɓa, gam on anndi onon maa on ngoodi Jawmiraawo toon dow.
51004002	Ti'inee e waɗgo do'aare, kohoree hakkiilo mooɗon dow do'aare ndeen, eɗon ngetta Allah.
51004003	Mbaɗanee min do'aare minon boo, gam faa Allah omtana min laawol wa'ajingo sirri muuɗum, waato habaru Almasiifu. Sabu daliila Habaru Belɗum ɗuum omndaami nder kaso.
51004004	Toranee yam Allah gam mi wa'ajina sirri ɗuum laaɓɗum, noon no haani mi waɗa.
51004005	Kakkilanee gondal mooɗon e yimɓe ɓe ngoonɗinaay Yeesu. Naftoree wakkaci ɗum Allah hokki on.
51004006	Haala mooɗon laatoo mbelka e nafooha, faa pahamon no haani toontorooɗon koo moye ƴamɗo on.
51004007	Tikikus no hokkey on habaru am fuu. O banndii en giɗaaɗo, kuudiɗɗaawo am koolaaɗo nder kuugal Jawmiraawo.
51004008	Kanjum waɗi liloymoomi to mooɗon, gam o hokka on habaru no min ngontiri, o waaltina ɓerɗe mooɗon.
51004009	O wardey e Onesimus banndii en giɗaaɗo, koolaaɗo, ɓii lesdi mooɗon. Ɓe kokkey on habaru koo ɗume ko waɗata ɗo'o.
51004010	Aristarkus mo omndidaami nder kaso e Markus, banndu Barnabas, e kinna on. Mi aartii mi vi'ii on~: njaɓɓooɗon Markus booɗɗum to o warii to mooɗon.
51004011	Yeesu bi'eteeɗo Justus, kanyum maa e hinna on. Kamɓe tan tato ngoni Yahuudu'en huudooɓe e am dow habaru laamu Allah. Ɓe mbaaltinii ɓernde am korey.
51004012	Epafaras hinnii on, kanko maa o ɓii lesdi mooɗon, kuwanoowo Yeesu Almasiifu. Koo ndeye emo ti'inii toraago Allah semmbiɗina on, laatooɗon heeɓɓe, waɗooɓe ko Allah yiɗi naa e cekka.
51004013	Emi saaydanii mo o huwii korey gam mooɗon, onon e yimɓe ci'e Lawdikiya e Hirapolis.
51004014	Luka likitaajo meeɗen giɗaaɗo e Demas e kinna on.
51004015	Kinnanee min banndiraaɓe wonɓe Lawdikiya e debbo bi'eteeɗo Nimfa e goonɗinɓe hawriteyɓe nder wuro ma'ako.
51004016	Ɓaawo on njanngii ngo'ol ɗereewol, sey lildon ngol goonɗinɓe wonɓe Lawdikiya, ɓe njannganee ngol. Onon maa njanngee ɗereewol ngol ɓe lildoyta on.
51004017	Mbi'ee Arkibus ti'inoo huwa kuugal ngal Jawmiraawo hokki ɗum.
51004018	Miin Bulus vinndi nde'e hinnoore e junngo am. To' on njeggit nder kaso ngonmi. Allah barkiɗin on.
52001001	Miin Bulus e Siilas e Timote emin kinna ikiliisiya gonka Tesaloonika, laatiika ka Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu. Jam e barkaa Allah wonda e mooɗon.
52001002	Emin nyuma dow mooɗon nder do'aaje amin. Wakkaci fuu emin njetta Allah gam mooɗon.
52001003	Emin kiimtoo on wakkaci fuu yeeso Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen. Emin kiimtoo on gam kuuɗe ɗe kuuɗon sabu goonɗinki, e ti'inaare nde ti'iniiɗon nder yiɗde, e munyal gam tammunde mooɗon nder Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen.
52001004	Banndiraaɓe amin ɓe Allah yiɗi, emin anndi Allah suɓii on,
52001005	sabu Habaru Belɗum ɗum min ngaddani on ɗuum laataaki bolle tan, ammaa ɗum wardii e baawɗe Allah e Ruhu Ceniiɗo fuu. Kadimaa boo on tabbitinii habaru ɗuum ɗum goonga. Nde min ngondunoo e mooɗon, kuuɗe e gikku amin kollii daahir ɗum laataaki fewre.
52001006	On ngemminii min, on ngemminii Yeesu Jawmiraawo meeɗen boo. Nde njaɓɗon bolle Yeesu on torraama korey, ammaa e noon fuu torraa kaan senndaay on e velvelo ngo Ruhu Ceniiɗo hokki on.
52001007	Gam ma'ajum on laatake misaalu to goonɗinɓe Yeesu nder lesɗe Makedooniya e Aakaya fuu.
52001008	Gada to mooɗon haala Yeesu Jawmiraawo meeɗen sankiti, naa nder lesɗe Makedooniya e Aakaya tan, ammaa habaru goonɗinki mooɗon e Allah nanaama nder lesɗe fuu. Gam ma'ajum naa doole min ɓesda yeccaago ɓe ɗum.
52001009	Gam kamɓe e ko'e maɓɓe ɓe ngeccake min no njaɓruɗon min nde min ngarnoo to mooɗon. Eɓe caaydoo no kibinirɗon gumkiiji mooɗon ngaylitiiɗon laatiiɗon maccuɓe Allah goongaajo mo yonki.
52001010	Eɗon ndeenti bittoyki Ɓiyiiko ivoyeyɗo gada dow. Kanko woni Yeesu mo Allah fintini nder maayde laatini mo mo yonki, kisneyɗo en gada e huunƴere Allah wareynde.
52002001	Banndiraaɓe amin, onon e ko'e mooɗon eɗon anndi garki amin to mooɗon laataaki mehere.
52002002	Eɗon anndi ila min ngaraay to mooɗon min torraama, min kuɗaama nder si'ire Filipi. Ammaa e noon fuu Allah meeɗen hokkii min ngorgu waddango on Habaru Belɗum ivoyɗum to ma'ako.
52002003	Gam wa'aji amin ivoyaay e boofi, koo e nyumooji kalluɗi. Min ndaarataa ƴoynugo on boo.
52002004	Ammaa Allah godake min, goonɗinii min, tamndinii min Habaru muuɗum Belɗum, noon no min mbolvirta ɗum. Gam ma'ajum min ndaaraay velgo yimɓe. Allah godotooɗo ɓerɗe meeɗen tan min ndaarata velgo.
52002005	Eɗon anndi min meeɗaay volvango on bolle belɗe tan. Min cuuɗaay koɗey nder ɓerɗe amin, Allah e saaydanii min ɗum.
52002006	Min ndaaraay teddungal gada to yimɓe, koo to mooɗon, koo to woɓɓe feere.
52002007	Emin mbaawnoo hollugo on teddungal amin, gam min lilaaɓe Almasiifu, ammaa nde min ngondunoo e mooɗon, min ndeenii on noon no inna reenrata ɓinngel muuɗum.
52002008	Emin ngiɗi on korey, faa ɗum velii min waddango on Habaru Allah Belɗum. Naa habaru tan, ammaa emin ngiɗnoo hokkugo on faa e yonkiiji amin, sabu on laatake yiɗaaɓe amin korey.
52002009	Banndiraaɓe, on njeggitaay nde min nga'ajotonoo on Habaru Belɗum ivoyɗum to Allah, min kuwii korey, min tampii korey. Min kuwii jemma e nyalawma fuu gam min nyaamna ko'e amin, sabu to' min laatano on donngal.
52002010	Onon on caaydu'en amin, Allah boo e saaydanii min, no min njooɗorii nder mooɗon e laaɓal, min kuwii ko foti, min ngalaa ko peldoton min.
52002011	Eɗon anndi no min mbagginiri go'oto-go'oto mooɗon noon no baaba vagginirta ɓiyum.
52002012	Min cemmbiɗinii on, min tiɗɗinii on, min torake on, mbaɗon jo'onde haandannde Allah nodduɗo on, gam natton nder laamu ma'ako, ngi'on teddungal ma'ako.
52002013	Kadimaa e woodi ko waɗi min e yettugo Allah wakkaci fuu, nde nanɗon bolle Allah e konnduɗe amin, on njaɓraay ɗe kama bolle ɓii-aadama, ammaa kama bolle Allah. Goonga, ɗum bolle Allah, eɗe kuwa nder ɓerɗe mooɗon onon goonɗinɓe.
52002014	Banndiraaɓe, on laatake kama ikiliisiyaaji gonɗi nder lesdi Yahuudiya. Goonga, on munyanii torraaji iri ɗi maɓɓe, on njarii bone e juuɗe lenyol mooɗon, noon no kamɓe maa ɓe njardi bone e juuɗe Yahuudu'en.
52002015	Yahuudu'en ɓeen mbarnoo Yeesu Jawmiraawo e annabo'en. Kadimaa ɓe torrii min. Eɓe kuwa ko velataa Allah, ɓe laatake wanywanyɓe yimɓe fuu.
52002016	Eɓe ngiɗi haɗgo min wa'ajingo leƴƴi ɗi laataaki Yahuudu'en, gam to' ɗi keɓ kisndam. Noon ɓe kebbinirta eterde hakkeeji maɓɓe wakkaci fuu. Ammaa jo'oni huunƴere Allah jippake dow maɓɓe.
52002017	Minon boo, banndiraaɓe amin, min ngeewnii on korey. Min ceedii e mooɗon wakkaci seɗɗa, ammaa ceedal ngaal naa ɗum ceedal ɓernde, ɗum ceedal ɓanndu tan. Emin kaaɓi yi'igo on korey.
52002018	Gam ma'ajum min mbaɗii anniya yi'igo on. Gam miin Bulus, nde ɗuuɗɗum ndaarmi wargo to mooɗon, ammaa Ceyɗaan haɗii yam.
