52002019	Ɗume woni daliila tammunde amin e velvelo amin~? Wanaa onon ngoni giifol laamu ngol min mantorto yeeso Yeesu Jawmiraawo meeɗen to o vittoyii naa~?
52002020	Goonga, onon ngoni teddungal amin e velvelo amin~!
52003001	Gam ma'ajum, nde min mbaawaay munygo, emin tammii ɗum ɓurii vooɗgo min njooɗoo nder si'ire Ateena minon tan.
52003002	Min lilii Timote to mooɗon. O banndiraawo amin kuwanoowo Allah e kuudoowo e amin gam wa'ajingo Habaru Almasiifu Belɗum. Min lilii mo to mooɗon gam o semmbiɗina on, o tiɗɗina on nder goonɗinki mooɗon.
52003003	Gam to' koo go'oto mooɗon vittu ɓaawo nder goonɗinki muuɗum, sabu torraaji keɓeyɗi ɗum. Eɗon anndi kanjum woni geɗal meeɗen nder ko Allah yiɗi.
52003004	Ila nde min ngondunoo e mooɗon, min ngeccake on en njarey torraa. Eɗon anndi boo noon ɗum laatii.
52003005	Gam ma'ajum, nde mi waawaay ɓesdugo munygo, mi liloyii Timote gam mi nana to eɗon ndarii nder goonɗinki mooɗon. Mi hulii to' Ceyɗaan jarrabo on, o meheriɗina kuugal ngal min kuwi.
52003006	Ammaa jo'oni Timote wartii to amin. O wartiranii min habaru belɗum dow goonɗinki mooɗon e yiɗde mooɗon. O vi'ii min, faa hannde eɗon nyuma dow amin nder yiɗde. Noon no min ngeewniri on, noon onon boo ngeewnirɗon min.
52003007	Gam ma'ajum banndiraaɓe, koo to torraa e ɓillaare nanngii min, ɓerɗe amin cemmbiɗii, gam min nanii habaru goonɗinki mooɗon.
52003008	Jo'oni yomkiiji amin mbittoyii, sabu noon no ndaroriiɗon nder Jawmiraawo.
52003009	Iri ndeye yettoore min ngettata Allah, sabu belɗum ɗum min nani yeeso ma'ako gam daliila mooɗon~?
52003010	Jemma e nyalawma fuu emin toroo mo korey o hokka min laawol yi'igo on gite e gite, gam min kebbita ko horii nder goonɗinki mooɗon.
52003011	Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen e Yeesu Jawmiraawo meeɗen kokku min laawol wargo to mooɗon.
52003012	Jawmiraawo ɓesdana on yiɗyiɗtirgo, ɗuɗɗina yiɗde mooɗon to yimɓe fuu, nde laatoo noon no min ngiɗiri on.
52003013	Allah semmbiɗina ɓerɗe mooɗon, gam laatooɗon seniiɓe, ɓe ngalaa feloore yeeso Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen, faa nyannde nde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu jippodoytoo e seniiɓe muuɗum.
52004001	Ɓaawo ma'ajum banndiraaɓe, min ekkitinii on no haani njooɗorooɗon jo'onde veleynde Allah, eɗon mbaɗa ɗum boo. Ammaa jo'oni, emin toroo on nder kawtal mooɗon e Yeesu Jawmiraawo, ti'inee yahago yeeso-yeeso.
52004002	Eɗon anndi ekkitinooje ɗe min ekkitini on nder baawɗe Yeesu Jawmiraawo meeɗen.
52004003	Ko Allah yiɗi woni laatooɗon seniiɓe, to' on mbaɗ njeenu.
52004004	Sey koo moye nder mooɗon fuu ekkitoo no reenrata ɓanndu muuɗum nder senaare e teddungal.
52004005	To' on tokku ko velata ɓalli mooɗon noon no heeferɓe ɓe anndaa Allah mbaɗata.
52004006	Dow ma'ajum fuu, to' koo moye mooɗon selnu banndum, to' o ƴoynu banndiiko, gam Jawmiraawo no eltey baɗeyɗo iri ɗi'i hakkeeji kalluɗi fuu. Min mbi'ii on ɗum, ɗum fuu ilaa, min mbagginii on dow ma'ajum booɗɗum.
52004007	Allah noddaay en gam laatooɗen nyidduɓe, ammaa gam laatooɗen seniiɓe.
52004008	Gam ma'ajum caliiɗo ekkitinol amin naa neɗɗo o salii, ammaa Allah kokkuɗo on Ruhu muuɗum Ceniiɗo o salii.
52004009	Dow e yiɗde hakkunde banndiraaɓe boo, naa doole min mbinndana on ɗum, gam onon e ko'e mooɗon Allah ekkitinii on yiɗyiɗtirgo.
52004010	Emin anndi no ngiɗruɗon banndiraaɓe mooɗon wonɓe nder lesdi Makedooniya fuu. Ammaa banndiraaɓe, emin toroo on, ɓesdon yiɗde mooɗon yeeso-yeeso.
52004011	Ti'inee jooɗaago nder jam. Sey koo moye huwa kuugal e juuɗe muuɗum, heɓa ko marorto. Kanjum min ngeccii on ilaa.
52004012	Ndeen kam jo'onde mooɗon no laatoto haandunde yeeso yimɓe ɓe ngoonɗinaay Allah. Onon boo, on teddantaa koo moye.
52004013	Banndiraaɓe, emin ngiɗi pahamon habaru maayɓe, gam to' ɓerɗe mooɗon mettu kama yimɓe ɓe ngalaa tammunde.
52004014	Enen kam, en tabbitinii Yeesu maayii fintii. Gam ma'ajum en tabbitinii maayɓe goonɗinɓe no mbittidoyey e Yeesu.
52004015	Ko min ngeccotoo on, ɗum bolle Jawmiraawo, enen horiiɓe woonɓe yonki nyannde nde Jawmiraawo vittoyta, en aartataa maaynooɓe sam.
52004016	Gam to Jawmiraawo e hoore muuɗum e ɗoon jippoo gada dow, noddaango semmbiɗngo e voliinde mawɗo malaa'ika'en no nanetee, luwal Allah boo no fuufetee. Ndeen maayɓe goonɗinooɓe Almasiifu no aartey fintugo.
52004017	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, enen horiiɓe woonɓe yonki nyanndeere ndeen, en ƴeftete kawritoyen e maɓɓe nder duule, gam potten e Jawmiraawo toon dow, ngonden e ma'ako faa abadaa.
52004018	Gam ma'ajum, sey koo moye mooɗon semmbiɗina ɓernde banndum e ɗe'e bolle.
52005001	Banndiraaɓe, wanaa doole min mbinndana on dow wakkaciiji e nyalɗe gareyɗe.
52005002	Gam onon eɗon anndi booɗɗum nyannde nde Jawmiraawo warata, nde warey kama no gujjo wardata nder jemma.
52005003	Wakkaci nde yimɓe mbi'ata~: «~Jam tan woodi, torraa fuu walaa.~» E wakkaci ɗuum bone yooftoto dow maɓɓe, kama no ŋatawre wardanta debbo caawɗo. Ɓe mbaawataa hisgo bone ɗuum.
52005004	Ammaa onon banndiraaɓe on ngalaa nder niɓre hakko nyannde ndeen ruddoo on, kama no gujjo ruddorto.
52005005	On fuu on ɓiɓɓe jayngol, on yimɓe nyalawma. Enen naa en ɓiɓɓe niɓre koo jemma.
52005006	Gam ma'ajum to' en ɗaano noon no yimɓe horiiɓe ɗaanori. Pinemma, ndeenen ko'e meeɗen.
52005007	Gam ɗaanotooɓe nder jemma ɗaanoto, yarooɓe boo nder jemma njarata.
52005008	Ammaa enen en yimɓe nyalawma, sey ndeenen ko'e meeɗen. Ɓornooɗen goonɗinki e yiɗde Allah kama toggoore njamndi. Tammunde heɓgo kisndam boo laatanoo en huufneere njamndi.
52005009	Allah suɓaay en gam huunƴana en, ammaa gam keɓen kisndam gada to Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen.
52005010	O maayii gam meeɗen faa poofden e ma'ako, koo to en ngoodi yonki, koo to en maayɓe.
52005011	Gam ma'ajum sey cemmbiɗindiron, mballindiron nder goonɗinki mooɗon, noon no mbaɗoton jo'oni.
52005012	Banndiraaɓe, emin toroo on, teddinee huwooɓe hakkunde mooɗon, laatiiɓe aardiiɓe on e vagginooɓe on nder laawol Jawmiraawo.
52005013	Teddinee ɓe korey, ngiɗee ɓe gam kuuɗe maɓɓe. Njooɗee jam hakkunde mooɗon.
52005014	Emin toroo on banndiraaɓe, mbagginee yamniiɓe, cemmbiɗinee hulooɓe, mballitee ɓe ngalaa semmbee, munyanee yimɓe fuu.
52005015	Kakkilee, to' goɗɗo mooɗon wa'ato baɗanɗo ɗum layfi, ammaa wakkaci fuu ndaaree waɗgo kuuɗe booɗɗe hakkunde mooɗon, onon e yimɓe fuu.
52005016	Mbelmbeltee wakkaci fuu.
52005017	To' on ngoor waɗgo do'aare.
52005018	Ngettee Allah nder ko tawi on fuu, gam kanjum woni ko Allah yiɗi nder kawtal mooɗon e Yeesu Almasiifu.
52005019	To' on kaɗ Ruhu Ceniiɗo huwa nder mooɗon.
52005020	To' on njavo annabaaku,
52005021	ammaa ngodee koo ɗume fuu, njogooɗon ko vooɗi nder ma'ajum.
52005022	Ngoɗɗee koo iri ndeye halleende.
52005023	Allah kokkoowo en jam e hoore muuɗum, sena on, reena laaɓal ɓerɗe e yonki e ɓalli mooɗon fuu, gam laatooɗon ɓe ngalaa feloore faa nyannde bittoyki Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu.
52005024	Allah nodduɗo on o koolniiɗo, o waɗaney on ɗum.
52005025	Banndiraaɓe, ndo'anee min minon boo.
52005026	Kinnanee min banndiraaɓe fuu e yiɗde mawnde.
52005027	Emi toroo on nder innde Jawmiraawo meeɗen, njannganon banndiraaɓe meeɗen fuu ngo'ol ɗereewol.
52005028	Barkaa Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu wondu e mooɗon.
53001001	Ngo'ol ɗereewol ivii to am miin Bulus, e Siilas e Timote. Emin kinna ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Tesaloonika ka Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu.
53001002	Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu kokka on barkaa e jam.
53001003	Banndiraaɓe, e haani min njetta Allah wakkaci fuu gam mooɗon. Eɗum haandi gam goonɗinki mooɗon e yaha yeeso-yeeso, yiɗde nde ngiɗngiɗtirɗon boo e ɓesdoo dum.
53001004	Kanjum waɗi emin mantoroo on nder ikiliisiyaaji fuu. Emin ngeccoo ɓe no njogoriiɗon goonɗinki mooɗon e no munyranɗon torraaji e caɗeele keɓɗe on fuu.
53001005	Gada e torraaji ɗi torrotooɗon gam laamu Allah, o laatiney on fotɓe nattugo laamu ma'ako. Torraaji ɗiin e kolla ceri'a ma'ako no goonga.
53001006	Gam Allah o goongaajo, o biyorto torruɓe on ɓeen e torraa.
53001007	Ammaa onon torriiɓe jo'oni, o fooftidiney on e amin. Ɗum laatoto nder wakkaciire nde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu vanngata gada dow, kanko e malaa'ika'en ma'ako ɓe baawɗe.
53001008	O vanngey nder ɗemɗe yiite, gam o halka ɓe anndaa Allah, saliiɓe Habaru ma'ako Belɗum.
53001009	Ɓe kalkete halkere nde faa abadaa, to woɗɗi e Jawmiraawo e darajja baawɗe muuɗum.
53001010	Ɗum fuu ɗum laatoto nder nyalaande nde Jawmiraawo vittoyta. O vittoyey gam o teddinee nder seniiɓe ma'ako, goonɗinɓe mo fuu kaayɗina mo. Onon boo on ngondey e maɓɓe, gam on njaɓii caaydaaku amin.
53001011	Gam ma'ajum emin toroo Allah wakkaci fuu gam mooɗon, faa o waɗa laatooɗon fotɓe heɓgo yonki ɗum o noddiri on. Emin toroo mo o vallira on baawɗe ma'ako, faa njottinon kuuɗe booɗɗe ɗe ngiɗɗon huugo fuu ivoyɗe e goonɗinki.
53001012	Kama noon innde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu teddinirtee nder mooɗon. Onon boo teddineeɗon gam ma'ako, gada e barkaa ma'ako, kanko Allah meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu.
53002001	Banndiraaɓe, emin ngiɗi yeccaago on habaru bittoyki Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu, e no kawritiroyten e ma'ako. Emin toroo on~:
53002002	to' hakkiilooji mooɗon njaaw jiɓaago, to' on kul boo to woɓɓe mbi'ii on nyalaande bittoyki Jawmiraawo warii. Koo to annabiijo vi'i ka, koo to on nanii ɗum e wa'ajotooɓe, koo boo to on mbi'aama minon mbinndi ɗum, to' on njaɓ.
53002003	To' on njaɓ goɗɗo ƴoynira on e koo noye. Gam nyanndeere ndeen warataa sey to ɗum turtanii Allah turtol manngol, Neɗɗo Kalluɗo ɓii halkere boo vanngi.
53002004	Kalluɗo oon no yeddey ko vi'etee allah e ko sujjidantee fuu, o ɓurney hoore ma'ako dow koo ɗume, faa o jooɗoo nder Wuro Allah Seniingo, o vi'a kanko woni Allah.
53002005	Kiimtee, nde ngondunoomi e mooɗon, mi vi'iino on ɗum, ɗum fuu.
53002006	On anndi ko faddii Neɗɗo Kalluɗo oon jo'oni, ammaa to wakkaci ma'ako yottake, o vanngey.
53002007	Gam baawɗe turtango Allah e ɗoon kuwa e suuɗeefi nder duuniyaaru ila jo'oni, ammaa paddiiɗo ɗe oon e ɗoon tawo. Sey to o sottinaama,
53002008	ndeen neɗɗo Kalluɗo oon vannga. Ammaa Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu no wardey mo poofɗe honnduko muuɗum, halkira mo teddungal garol muuɗum.
53002009	Neɗɗo Kalluɗo oon no wardey e baawɗe Ceyɗaan. O huwey kuuɗe mawɗe kaayniiɗe e alaamaaji majjinooji
53002010	e koo iri ndeye ƴoyre hallunde, faa o ƴoyna halketeeɓe, gam ɓe njaɓaay yiɗgo goonga kisnooha ɓe.
53002011	Kanjum waɗi Allah lildi ɓe baawɗe esto, faa ɓe ngoonɗina fewre.
53002012	Gam ma'ajum Allah no sernaney koo ɓeye saliiɓe jaɓgo goonga, nanɓe belɗum huugo kuuɗe kalluɗe.
53002013	Banndiraaɓe amin ɓe Jawmiraawo yiɗi, e haani min njetta Allah wakkaci fuu gam mooɗon. Ila fuɗɗam Allah suɓii on gam kison, barkaa Ruhu Ceniiɗo, laatinɗo on seniiɓe, e barkaa goonɗingo goonga.
53002014	Kanjum o noddiri on gada e Habaru Belɗum ɗum min nga'ajini on, faa keɓon geɗal nder teddungal Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu.
53002015	Gam ma'ajum banndiraaɓe, ndaree e semmbee, njogee ko min ekkitini on gada e bolle amin e ɗereewol amin.
53002016	Emi toroo Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu e Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen giɗɗo en, gada e barkaa ma'ako o hokka en semmbee ɓerɗe ɗum re'ataa e tammunde vooɗnde,
53002017	o de''itina ɓerɗe mooɗon, o hokka on semmbee huugo e volvugo ko vooɗi fuu.
53003001	Banndiraaɓe, ko sakitii woni, mbaɗanee min do'aare, gam faa voliinde Jawmiraawo sankitoo jaawɗum, kadimaa nde heɓa teddineego koo toye, noon no nde teddiniraa nder mooɗon.
53003002	Toranee min boo, Allah hisna min e juuɗe yimɓe oonyiiɓe, halluɓe, gam wanaa yimɓe fuu ngoonɗini.
53003003	Ammaa Jawmiraawo no koolniiɗo, o semmbiɗiney on, o reena on e Kalluɗo oon.
53003004	Jawmiraawo waɗi min koolii on, gam on tokkii ko min mbi'inoo on fuu, kadimaa on njahey yeeso e tokkugo ɗum.
53003005	Jawmiraawo meeɗen hokku on fahamugo yiɗde nde Allah yiɗi en, o hebbina on ti'inaare iri nde Almasiifu~!
53003006	Banndiraaɓe amin, emin ndoola on nder innde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu, ngoɗɗee koo moye goonɗinɗo, jamniiɗo, mo ɗowtanaaki ko min ekkitini on.
53003007	Onon e ko'e mooɗon, eɗon anndi e haani ngemminon min, gam nde min ngondunoo e mooɗon min kollaay on yamnaare.
53003008	Walaa mo min nyaami nyaamdu muuɗum e mehere. Min kuwii jemma e nyalawma fuu gam to' min laatano on donngal.
53003009	Daahir min potiino jaɓgo nyaamdu to mooɗon, ammaa min mbaɗaay noon, sabu emin ngiɗi laatanaago on misaalu ɗum tokkoton.
53003010	Gam nde min ngondunoo e mooɗon min ndoolii on vi'igo~: Caliiɗo huugo fuu, to' o nyaam.
53003011	Min mbi'ii noon, gam min nanii woɓɓe mooɗon no yamniiɓe, ɓe kuwataa koo ngale, to naa nattugo ko walanaa ɗum'en.
53003012	Emin toroo iri yimɓe ɓeen, emin ndoola ɓe boo nder innde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu, sey ɓe nde''a ɓe kuwa gam ɓe nyaamna ko'e maɓɓe.
53003013	Onon boo banndiraaɓe amin, to' on com huugo ko vooɗi.
53003014	Kul e woodi caliiɗo tokkugo ko min mbi'i nder ngo'ol ɗereewol, ma'andee mo, nyaaree mo gam o semta.
53003015	Ammaa to' on ndaar mo ganyo mooɗon, sey nii pelon mo kama banndii on.
53003016	Jawmiraawo jawmu jam, hokku on jam koo ndeye e koo noye. Jawmiraawo wondu e mooɗon, on fuu.
53003017	Miin Bulus vinndi nde'e hinnoore e junngo am. Emi vinnda ɗu'um nder ɗereeji ɗi mbinndumi fuu gam ɗum holla miin vinndi ɗi. Noon mbinndireymi.
53003018	Barkaa Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu wondu e mooɗon, on fuu~!
54001001	Ngo'ol ɗereewol ivii to am, miin Bulus laatiiɗo lilaaɗo Yeesu Almasiifu gada e dooka Allah kisnoowo en, e Yeesu Almasiifu laatiiɗo daliila tammunde meeɗen.
54001002	Mi vinndii yahago to maaɗa, aan Timote, ɓiyam goongaajo nder goonɗinki. Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu kokke barkaa e yurmeende e jam.
54001003	Emi yiɗi njooɗoɗaa si'ire Efesu noon no mbi'inomaami wakkaci njaheynoomi Makedooniya, gam mbagginaa woɓɓe ekkitinooɓe ekkitinol fewre, mbi'aa ɓe ɓe ngoora.
54001004	Yecca ɓe to' ɓe mbaɗ hakkiilooji maɓɓe dow habaruuji peve e liinygo defte asuli ɗe ngalaa keerol. Geddi tan ɗum umminta, ɗum nafataa hebbingo nyumo Allah ngo annduɗen gada e goonɗinki.
54001005	Nafuuda vagginoore ndeen woni ɓesdugo yiɗde iɓnde e nyumo ɓernde laaɓngo ngo walaa feloore, e goonɗinki ki walaa munaafukaare.
54001006	Woɓɓe celii laawol goonga, ɓe majjii, eɓe ɗoon tokka bolle mehereeje.
54001007	Eɓe njilloo laataago moodiɓɓe Tawreeta, eɓe mbolva haalaaji ɗi ngalaa ma'ana, eɓe tabbitina ko ɓe anndaa.
54001008	En anndi Tawreeta no booɗɗum, to ka huutiniraama no haani.
54001009	Kiimtee boo, Tawreeta waɗaaka gam goonga'en, ammaa ka waɗaama gam waɗooɓe ko halli, e saliiɓe tokkugo dooka Allah e dooka lesdi, e waɗooɓe hakke, e yimɓe yaviiɓe Allah e tagle muuɗum, e ɓe teddinaay mo, e warooɓe danyooɓe mu''en, e waɗooɓe war-hoore,
54001010	e waɗooɓe njeenu, e worɓe waaldooɓe e worɓe, e soorrooɓe maccuɓe, e fevooɓe, e saaydotooɓe fewre, e koo ɗume ko tokkaay ekkitinol goonga.
54001011	Ekkitinol ngool e hawti e Habaru Belɗum ɗum kokkaami, kolleyɗum teddungal Allah maalteteeɗo.
54001012	Mi yettii Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu, kokkuɗo yam semmbee huugo kuugal muuɗum. Mi yettii mo boo, gam o raarii yam koolaaɗo, o nattinii yam nder kuugal ma'ako.
54001013	Koo nde laatii ndeenno mi huɗii mo, mi torriino yimɓe ma'ako, mi jaltinirii mo boo. Ammaa Jawmiraawo meeɗen nanii jurumɗum am, gam mi waɗiino ɗum nder ciya goonɗinki e anndugo ko kuweymi.
54001014	Jawmiraawo meeɗen waɗanii yam yurmeende ɗuuɗnde. O hokkii yam goonɗinki e yiɗde ivoynde e kawtal meeɗen e Yeesu Almasiifu.
54001015	Raa haala koolniika, ka haani yimɓe fuu njaɓa~: Yeesu Almasiifu warii nder duuniyaaru gam o hisna waɗooɓe hakke. Nder maɓɓe boo miin ɓuri waɗgo hakke.
54001016	Ammaa Allah enɗii yam, miin ɓurɗo koo moye hakke. Yeesu Almasiifu laatinii yam misaalu munyal muuɗum ɗuuɗngal, gam faa goonɗineyɓe mo ɗo'o yeeso keɓa yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
54001017	Allah woni laamiiɗo tabbitoowo, mo maayataa, mo yi'ataake, kanko tan woni Allah. Teddungal e manngu laatanoo mo faa abadaa. Aamiin~!
54001018	Aan ɓiyam Timote, mi tamndinii ma ekkitinol laatiingol fodde bolle annabaakuuji bolvanooɗi dow maaɗa ilaa. Bolle maɓɓe ɗeen laatano maa kaɓruɗum ɗum kaɓrataa haɓre vooɗnde.
54001019	Joga goonɗinki e nyumo ɓernde laaɓngo. Woɓɓe ngoorii yewanaago nyumooji ɓerɗe mu''en laaɓɗi. Gam ma'ajum goonɗinki maɓɓe majji kama akali ndiyam nuciiki.
54001020	Nder maɓɓe e woodi Himeniyus e Aleksandir. Mi hokkii ɓe nder junngo Ceyɗaan, faa ɓe annda haanaa ɓe mbonna innde Allah.
54002001	Raa ko aarteymi vi'igo ikiliisiya~: mbaɗee do'aaje e torɗe gam yimɓe fuu, ngettee Allah gam maɓɓe.
54002002	Ndo'anee laamiiɓe e aardiiɓe fuu, gam njooɗooɗen nder jam e de''ere e neɗɗaaku e tokkugo Allah e ɓernde wo'ore.
54002003	Kanjum woni booɗɗum, ko velata Allah kisnoowo en,
54002004	giɗɗo yimɓe fuu kisa, keɓa anndugo goonga.
54002005	Allah o go'oto. E woodi boo go'oto hakkundeejo ma'ako e yimɓe, kanko woni Yeesu Almasiifu laatiiɗo neɗɗo,
54002006	kokkuɗo hoore muuɗum, gam soottoo yimɓe, kebbinɗo anniya Allah nder wakkaci ɗum Allah taƴi.
54002007	Gam ma'ajum Allah laatinii yam lilaaɗo e ga'ajotooɗo leƴƴi ɗi laataaki Yahuudu'en. O hokkii yam anndingo ɓe ko laatii goonɗinki e ko woni goonga. Ko mbi'imi ɗum goonga, mi fevataa.
54002008	Emi yiɗi to worɓe kawriti gam waɗgo do'aare fuu, ƴefta juuɗe mu''en yeeso Allah e ɓerɗe laaɓɗe, naa e huunƴere koo geddi.
54002009	Emi yiɗi rewɓe boo ɓornoroo kolte deydey no haani, ɓe laatoo semtooɓe, leestinɓe ko'e mu''en. To' ɓe cinngitoro doorɗi e jiinaariya e co'ole caɗɗe, koo ɓornaago kolte caɗɗe.
54002010	Ammaa kuuɗe booɗɗe laatoo sinnga maɓɓe, gam noon haani rewɓe vi'ooɓe no teddinooɓe Allah mbaɗa.
54002011	Sey rewɓe njaɓa ekkitinol nder de''ere e ɗowtaare.
54002012	Mi jaɓaay rewɓe ekkitina worɓe koo ndarvana ɓe. Sey ɓe nde''a,
54002013	gam Aadamu aartii Hawwa tageego.
54002014	Wanaa Aadamu Ceyɗaan ƴoyni, ammaa debbo o ƴoyni waɗi hakke.
54002015	Ammaa rewɓe no kisnete barkaa danygol mu''en, to ɓe tabbitii nder goonɗinki e yiɗde e foofaango seniingo, ɓe laatake semtooɓe boo.
54003001	Raa haala koolniika~: Gilliiɗo laataago aardiiɗo ikiliisiya fuu, o yillake kuugal booɗngal.
54003002	Sey aardiiɗo laatoo neɗɗo mo walaa feloore, mo debbo go'oto, mo walaa koɗey, kakkilɗo, ne'iiɗo, jaɓɓotooɗo hoɗɓe, baawɗo ekkitinol.
54003003	To' o laato jaroowo koo kaɓeteeɗo, ammaa o laatoo moƴƴuɗo, giɗɗo jo'onde jam, mo walaa koɗey ceede.
54003004	Sey o laatoo darvanɗo wuro ma'ako booɗɗum. O elta ɓiɓɓe ma'ako, faa ɓe ɗowtanoo mo, ɓe teddina mo.
54003005	Gam to neɗɗo waawaay darvango wuro muuɗum, noye o waawrata darvirango ikiliisiya Allah~?
54003006	To' o laato goonɗinɗo keso, gam ɗum baɗoojum kul o keso nder goonɗinki o mawnito, Allah sernana mo noon no sernirani Ceyɗaan.
54003007	Sey o laatoo mo innde vooɗnde, koo nder yimɓe ɓe ngoonɗinaay, gam to' ɓe keɓ ko ɓe njaɓrani mo, o do''oo nder teppinirgol Ceyɗaan.
54003008	Vallooɓe nder ikiliisiya boo, e haani laatoo vooɗa gikku'en. To' ɓe laato ɓe konnduɗe ɗiɗi, koo yarooɓe, koo suunaaɓe riiba kalluka.
54003009	To' ɓe ngoɗɗo goonga ka ɓe njaɓnoo, ka Allah vannginani ɓe, ammaa ɓe njogoo ka e nyumooji ɓerɗe ɗi ngalaa feloore.
54003010	Kamɓe boo sey ikiliisiya aarta liinya ɓe, kul ɓe ngalaa feloore, ndeen kam eɓe mbaawi nattugo kuugal vallugo goonɗinɓe.
54003011	Rewɓe vallooɓe boo sey laatoo ɓe gikku mbooɗngu. To' ɓe laato nyo'ooɓe yimɓe, ammaa ɓe laatoo reenɓe ko'e mu''en, hoolniiɓe nder koo ɗume fuu.
54003012	Balloowo nder ikiliisiya sey laatoo mo debbo go'oto, darvanɗo ɓiɓɓe muuɗum e wuro muuɗum fuu booɗɗum.
54003013	To ɓe kuwii kuugal maɓɓe booɗɗum, ndeen ɓe keɓaney ko'e maɓɓe innde vooɗnde. Noon ɓe keɓrata volvugo e ngorgu dow goonɗinki maɓɓe e Yeesu Almasiifu.
54003014	Koo nde laatii emi nyuma wargo to maaɗa jaawɗum, mi vinndanii ma haalaaji ɗiin tawo.
54003015	Ammaa to mi waraay jaawɗum, ɗereewol ngool no anndinte no haani ɓiɓɓe Wuro Allah poofra, waato ikiliisiya Allah mo yonki, laatiika danngaral njogiingal goonga.
54003016	Daahir sirri diina meeɗen no mawɗum~: Mo vannginaama e siifa neɗɗo, Ruhu hollii o goongaajo, malaa'ika'en ngi'ii mo, habaru ma'ako ma'atinaama nder leƴƴi, yimɓe duuniyaaru ngoonɗinii mo, Allah ƴeentinii mo, hokkii mo teddungal manngal.
54004001	Ruhu Ceniiɗo vi'ii laaɓɗum~: nder balɗe timmoode duuniyaaru, woɓɓe yimɓe no ngoorey goonɗinki mu''en, ɓe tokka ekkitinooje fewre ivoyɗe to ginnaaji.
54004002	Ɓe tokkey munaafukaare fevooɓe ɓe nyumooji ɓerɗe mu''en mbaati, kama ɓerɗe cumraaɗe njamndi ngulndi jaw.
54004003	Iri yimɓe ɓeen e kaɗa koobgal e nyaamgo goɗɗe ku'uje feere-feere. Ammaa Allah tagii ku'uje ɗeen gam faa goonɗinɓe Almasiifu annduɓe goonga njaɓa ɗe e yettoore.
54004004	Ko Allah tagi fuu ɗum booɗɗum, walaa ko harmi, to ɗum jaɓraama e yettoore,
54004005	gam voliinde Allah e do'aare no seney ɗum.
54004006	To a ekkitinii goonɗinɓe ku'uje ɗeen, a laatoto kuwanoowo Yeesu Almasiifu booɗɗo, gam a nyaamnaama bolle goonɗinki, e ekkitinol booɗngol ngol tokkuɗaa.
54004007	Ammaa woɗɗa tahaleeji peve mehereeji, ɗi potaay e goonɗinki. Eltu hoore maaɗa dow kulol Allah.
54004008	Gam eltugo ɓanndu no nafey seɗɗa, ammaa hulgo Allah e wadda nafuuda ɗuuɗka. E ma'ajum tabbitinirten dow foofaango meeɗen ngo jo'oni e wareyngo.
54004009	Haala kaan ka tabbitka, potka jaɓeego e ɓernde wo'ore.
54004010	Eɗen kuwa, eɗen kaɓda, gam en ndesii tammunde meeɗen e Allah geeto kisnoowo yimɓe fuu, ɓurna muuɗum goonɗinɓe mo.
54004011	Yecca goonɗinɓe ku'uje ɗeen, ekkitin ɓe ɗe.
54004012	To' goɗɗo yave gam a ndottiɗaay, ammaa laatana goonɗinɓe fuu misaalu nder bolle e foofaango e yiɗde e goonɗinki e senaare.
54004013	Ti'ina janngango yimɓe Deftere Seniinde, semmbiɗin ɓe, ekkitinaa ɓe ko ngarmi.
54004014	Ta'a yeebo kokkal Ruhu Ceniiɗo ngal kokkeɗaa nde annabo'en mbolvi dow maaɗa, darvooɓe ikiliisiya boo njowan maa juuɗe mu''en.
54004015	Ti'ina huugo ku'uje ɗeen, gam yimɓe fuu ngi'a eɗa yaha yeeso-yeeso.
54004016	Reen hoore maaɗa, reen ekkitinol maaɗa boo, semmbiɗ dow ma'ajum. Gam kul a waɗii noon, a hisey, aan e yewaniiɓe ma fuu.
54005001	Ta'a nyaaɗan ndottiijo, ammaa to a yiɗi felgo mo, volvan mo kama o baaba maaɗa. Kaye'en boo, volvan ɓe kama minyiraaɓe maaɗa.
54005002	Raar yayri'en naye'en kama danyooɓe maaɗa. Raar surba'en boo e ɓernde laaɓnde, kama minyiraaɓe maaɗa rewɓe.
54005003	Teddin rewɓe ɓe worɓe mu''en maayi, vallu ɓe kul ɓe ngalaa vallooɓe.
54005004	Ammaa to debbo mo gorko muuɗum maayi e woodi ɓikkon koo taaniraaɓe, sey ɓe ekkitoo huwango danyooɓe maɓɓe kuuɗe diina, waato ɓe mballa ɓe. Noon ɓe mbiyortoo ko ɓe keɓnoo e danyooɓe maɓɓe koo maamiraaɓe maɓɓe, gam kanjum velata Allah.
54005005	Debbo mo gorko muuɗum maayi, ɗalaaɗo kanyum tan, mo walaa balloowo, e ɗoon resa tammunde muuɗum e Allah, emo toroo mo ballal jemma e nyalawma fuu.
54005006	Ammaa debbo mo gorko muuɗum maayi, daareyɗo ko velata ɗum tan, o laatake kama maayɗo, koo to emo foofa.
54005007	Kanjum haani ngeccoɗaa rewɓe goonɗinɓe ɓe worɓe mu''en maayi, gam to' goɗɗo heɓ felgo ɓe.
54005008	To goɗɗo vallaay banndiraaɓe muuɗum, ɓurna muuɗum ɓe hawti wuro, ndeen kam o yeddii ko o goonɗini, o ɓurii mo goonɗinaay hallugo.
54005009	To' ɗum vinndu innde debbo mo gorko muuɗum maayi nder limgal inɗe rewɓe ɓe worɓe mu''en maayi, to naa o waɗi duuɓi settiin (60), o koovanooɗo boo nde wo'ore tan.
54005010	Sey o laatoo anndiraaɗo waɗgo kuuɗe booɗɗe, waato o ekkitinii ɓiɓɓe ma'ako booɗɗum, o jaɓɓake hoɗɓe, o lootii kosɗe goonɗinɓe, o vallii ɓilliiɓe, o huwii kuuɗe booɗɗe feere-feere.
54005011	Ammaa ta'a vinndu inɗe haɓɓe-rewɓe nder limgal inɗe rewɓe ɓe worɓe mu''en maayi. Gam kul suuno koobgal ummanake ɓe, ngo woɗɗiney ɓe e Almasiifu, ɓe ndaara hooveego.
54005012	Noon ɓe pooɗranta ko'e maɓɓe ceri'a, gam ɓe piɓtii alkawal maɓɓe aranal ngal ɓe mbaɗnoo.
54005013	Dow ma'ajum, ɓe laatoto yamniiɓe, nattooɓe suudu yahago suudu. Ammaa ko ɓuri hallugo fuu, ɓe laatoto ɗuuɗa-haala'en, nyo'ooɓe, nattooɓe haala ka walanaa ɗum'en.
54005014	Gam ma'ajum mi ɓurii yiɗgo haɓɓe-rewɓe ɓe worɓe mu''en maayi koovee, ɓe ndanya ɓikkon, ɓe ndeena gure maɓɓe, gam to' wanywanyɓe meeɗen keɓ laawol hallingo en.
54005015	Woɓɓe maɓɓe aartii celii laawol goonga, tokki Ceyɗaan.
54005016	To debbo goonɗinɗo e woodi banndiraaɓe rewɓe ɓe worɓe mu''en maayi nder wuro muuɗum, sey o valla ɓe. To' o yowan ikiliisiya donngal, gam faa ka waawa vallugo rewɓe ɓe worɓe mu''en maayi, ɓe ngalaa vallooɓe.
54005017	To darvooɓe nder ikiliisiya mbaɗii aardungal booɗngal, eɓe kaandi heɓgo biya maɓɓe covi ɗiɗi, ɓurna muuɗum ti'iniiɓe wa'ajingo e ekkitingo.
54005018	Gam Deftere vi'i~: «~Ta'a suum honnduko ngaari corɓirdi gawri.~» Nde vi'i boo~: «~Kuwoowo e haani hokkeego biya muuɗum.~»
54005019	Ta'a jaɓ waddaneego wullaandu dow ko darvanoowo ikiliisiya waɗi, to naa keɓɗaa caaydu'en ɗiɗo koo tato.
54005020	Fel waɗooɓe hakke yeeso yimɓe fuu, gam horiiɓe kula.
54005021	Emi toro maa yeeso Allah e Yeesu Almasiifu e yeeso malaa'ika'en suɓaaɓe~: ɗowtana ɗi'i haalaaji, naa e jinngango yimɓe koo ɓurdindirgo ɓe.
54005022	Ta'a yawɗo yowango koo moye juuɗe maaɗa gam hokkugo mo kuugal nder ikiliisiya. Ta'a waɗ hoore maaɗa nder hakkeeji woɓɓe, ammaa waɗ jo'onde laaɓnde.
54005023	Ta'a yar ndiyam ɓaleejam tan, ammaa yar innaboojam seɗɗa, gam waaltingo nyawu reedu ummantoongu ma.
54005024	Hakkeeji woɓɓe yimɓe e njaayri ngoni, ko hokka ɗum sernana ɓe. Ammaa hakkeeji woɓɓe sey ɓaawo ɗoon ɗi mbannga.
54005025	Noon boo kuuɗe booɗɗe e njaayri ngoni. Koo to eɗe cuuɗii wakkaci seɗɗa, ɗe mbanngey.
54006001	Goonɗinɗo Yeesu laatiiɗo maccuɗo mo goonɗinaay e haani o raara jawmiiko potɗo teddineego, gam to' ɗum hallin innde Allah e ekkitinol meeɗen.
54006002	Kul jawmiiko no goonɗinɗo, to' o raar mo kama mo haanaay teddineego, gam ɓe kawtii diina. Ammaa sey o ɓura huwango mo e ti'inaare, gam jawmiiko mo o huwanta no goonɗinɗo Yeesu, giɗaaɗo Allah. Fahamin ɓe ɗe'e ku'uje, nga'ajinaa ɓe ɗe.
54006003	To goɗɗo wa'ajinii ekkitinol feere ngol tokkaay bolle Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu goongaaje, o jaɓaay ekkitinol diina meeɗen boo,
54006004	neɗɗo oon o mawnitiiɗo, o anndaa koo ɗume. Walaa ko o anndi to naa geddi e jokkirgol dow bolle. Iri ma'ajum e wadda nalwiiru e jokkirgol e haalaaji kalluɗi e haadgo yimɓe
54006005	e geddi ɗi nde'ataa nder yimɓe ɓe hakkiilooji mu''en majji. Yimɓe ɓeen celii goonga, eɓe tammii goonɗingo Allah ɗum laawol heɓgo risku.
54006006	Daahir e woodi risku manngu nder goonɗingo Allah, kul neɗɗo yavaay ko woodi.
54006007	En ngardaay e koo ɗume nder duuniyaaru, noon boo co''ortooɗen.
54006008	Gam ma'ajum, to en ngoodi nyaamdu e kolte, ɗum heƴii en.
54006009	Ammaa yillotooɓe risku, estooji no ngaraney ɓe, ɓe ndo''oo nder teppinirgol suunooji mehereeji kalluɗi, jahareyɗi yimɓe nder do''ere e halkere.
54006010	Gam yiɗde ceede woni ɗaɗol koo iri ndeye halleende. Yiɗde ma'aje waɗi woɓɓe ngoori goonɗinki mu''en, ɓe pooɗani ko'e maɓɓe torraaji mettuɗi ɗuuɗɗi.
54006011	Aan neɗɗo Allah, woɗɗa ɗe'e ku'uje fuu, yillaa waɗgo ko vooɗi e ɗowtanaago Allah nder goonɗinki e yiɗde e munyal e de''ere ɓernde.
54006012	Haɓ haɓre goonɗinki booɗki gam keɓanaa hoore maaɗa yonki ɗum faa abadaa. Allah noddii ma keɓaa yonki ɗuum, wakkaci caaydinɗaa goonɗinki maaɗa yeeso caaydu'en ɗuuɗɓe.
54006013	Emi toro maa yeeso Allah kokkoowo koo ɗume yonki, e yeeso Yeesu Almasiifu baɗɗo caaydaaku booɗɗum yeeso Bilaatus gomnaajo~:
54006014	ɗowtana ko mbi'imaami e laaɓal, naa e feloore, faa nyannde nde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu vanngata.
54006015	O vanngey nder wakkaci ɗum Allah suɓi. Kanko go'oto, barkiɗinaaɗo, mo baawɗe, Laamiiɗo laamiiɓe, Jawmiraawo jawmiraaɓe.
54006016	Kanko tan woni tabbitoowo, jooɗiiɗo nder jayngol ngol walaa baawɗo ɓadaago ɗum. Walaa meeɗɗo yi'igo mo, walaa baawɗo yi'igo mo boo. Teddungal e baawɗe ɗe nde'ataa laatanoo mo. Aamiin.
54006017	Vaggin riskuɓe nder duuniyaaru, to' ɓe mawnito, to' ɓe ndes tammunde maɓɓe dow jawdi ndi neeɓataa, ammaa ɓe ndesa goonɗinki maɓɓe e Allah kokkeyɗo en koo iri nguye caahu, gam nanen belɗum.
54006018	Vi' ɓe, ɓe kuwa ko vooɗi, kuuɗe booɗɗe laatoo risku maɓɓe, ɓe laatoo saahiiɓe, ɓe mballira woɓɓe e jawdi maɓɓe.
54006019	To ɓe mbaɗii noon, ɓe ndesanii ko'e maɓɓe risku tabbiteyngu, gam faa ɓe keɓa yonki goongajum.
54006020	Timote, ta'a yeebo ko kokkeɗaa. Woɗɗa haalaaji mehereeji e geddi luhuruɗi e goonɗinki, ɗi woɓɓe mbi'ata «~anndal~», ammaa naa ɗum goonga.
54006021	Woɓɓe e mantoroo anndal ngaal, gam ma'ajum ɓe celii goonɗinki maɓɓe. Yiɗde Allah wondu e mooɗon.
55001001	Miin Bulus lilaaɗo Yeesu Almasiifu gada e nyumo Allah vinndi ngo'ol ɗereewol. O hokkii yam anndingo yimɓe habaru yonki. Allah resanii en ɗum gada e Yeesu Almasiifu.
55001002	Emi vinndan maa, aan Timote ɓiyam giɗaaɗo. Allah Baabiraawo e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu kokke barkaa e yurmeende e jam.
55001003	Emi yetta Allah mo kuwammi e nyumo ɓernde laaɓngo, noon no maamiraaɓe am kuurani mo. Jemma e nyalawma fuu emi hiimto maa nder do'aaje am.
55001004	Emi hiimtoo gonɗi maaɗa. Mi yeewnii yi'igo ma korey, gam faa mi nana belɗum ɗuuɗɗum.
55001005	Emi hiimtoo goonɗinki ki ngoonɗinɗaa Allah e ɓernde laaɓnde nde walaa munaafukaare, goonɗinki iri ki maama maaɗa debbo bi'eteeɗo Looyis, e inna maaɗa Enis ngoodi. Mi tabbitinii aan boo noon ngoonɗinirɗaa mo.
55001006	Gam ma'ajum emi hiimtin ma~: ɓesdaa huutinirgo kokkal ngal Allah hokku maa wakkaci nde njowanmaami juuɗe am.
55001007	Allah hokkaay en Ruhu gam kulen yimɓe, ammaa gam keɓen semmbee e yiɗde e nantaare.
55001008	Gam ma'ajum ta'a hul yeccaago yimɓe habaru Jawmiraawo meeɗen, ta'a semtiram miin boo omndaaɗo nder kaso gam ma'ako. Ammaa jaɓ torrodaago e am nder saaydingo Habaru Belɗum gada e baawɗe Allah.
55001009	Allah hisnii en, o noddii en laatooɗen yimɓe ma'ako seniiɓe. Wanaa gam en mbaɗii kuuɗe booɗɗe o hisni en, ammaa ɗum gam caahu ma'ako e nyumo ma'ako. O hokkii en caahu nguun gada e kawtal meeɗen e Yeesu Almasiifu ila duuniyaaru tagaaka.
55001010	Ammaa jo'oni caahu nguun vannganii en gada e garki Yeesu Almasiifu kisnoowo en. Kanko o halkii baawɗe maayde. O vannginanii en yonki ɗum re'ataa, gada e Habaru Belɗum.
55001011	Allah laatinii yam ga'ajotooɗo e lilaaɗo e ekkitinoowo Habaru Belɗum ɗuum.
55001012	Gam ma'ajum njareymi ɗi'i torraaji, ammaa mi semtaay, gam emi anndi mo ngoonɗinmi. Mi tabbitinii emo waawi reengo ko o hokki yam faa nyannde-jahango.
55001013	Tokku ekkitinooje goongaaje ɗe ekkitinmaami. Joga ɗe booɗɗum faa ɗe nafa goonɗinki e yiɗde meeɗen nde keɓɗen gada e kawtal meeɗen e Yeesu Almasiifu.
55001014	Reen ekkitinol booɗngol ngol kokkeɗaa gada e ballal Ruhu Ceniiɗo gonɗo nder meeɗen.
55001015	A anndi yimɓe wonɓe lesdi Aasiya fuu kibinii yam. Nder maɓɓe e woodi Fayjelus e Hermojenes.
55001016	Onesifoor boo, Jawmiraawo yurmoo wuro ma'ako, gam o de''itinii ɓernde am nde ɗuuɗɗum. O semtiraay boo kaɓɓeeki am nder kaso.
55001017	Nde o yottii Rooma, o yillake yam korey, faa o mooɓi yam.
55001018	Jawmiraawo yurmoo mo nyannde-jahango. A anndi booɗɗum no o vallirnoo yam nder si'ire Efesu.
55002001	Ammaa aan ɓiyam Timote, semmbiɗ nder barkaa ka keɓɗen nder kawtal meeɗen e Yeesu Almasiifu.
55002002	Ko nanɗaa mi ekkitinii yeeso caaydu'en ɗuuɗɓe, tamndin ɗum yimɓe hoolaaɓe, waawɓe ekkitingo ɗum woɓɓe.
55002003	Munyan geɗal torraaji maaɗa, kama soojeeru Yeesu Almasiifu goongaaru.
55002004	Soojeeru yiɗndu velgo ɓernde mawɗo muuɗum waannataake e fii duuniyaaru.
55002005	Walaa keɓeyɗo laada fijo, kul o tokkaay dookaaji fijo ngoon.
55002006	Noon boo, demoowo kuuɗo faa tampi, kam haani aarta heɓgo laada ko taƴaa nder ngesaa.
55002007	Nyum dow ko mbi'imaami. Jawmiraawo no hokkete fahamu nder koo ɗume fuu.
55002008	Hiimta Yeesu Almasiifu mo lenyol Dawda, ummitinaaɗo nder maayde, fodde Habaru Belɗum ɗum nga'ajineymi.
55002009	Gam daliila Habaru Belɗum ɗuum torrotoomi, kaɓɓiraami sarkaaji kama gujjo calorɗo, ammaa voliinde Allah haɓɓaaka.
55002010	Gam ma'ajum emi munyana koo ɗume fuu, gam faa suɓaaɓe Allah boo keɓa kisndam ivoyɗam to Yeesu Almasiifu e teddungal ma'ako ngal faa abadaa.
55002011	Raa haala koolniika~: To en maaydii e Yeesu, en poofdey e ma'ako.
55002012	To en munyanii torraaji, en laamodoto e ma'ako. To en mbi'ii en anndaa mo, kanko boo o vi'ey o anndaa en.
55002013	To en laatanaaki mo hoolniiɓe, kanko o tabbitey o koolniiɗo, gam o waawataa yeddugo hoore ma'ako.
55002014	Kanjum haani kiimtinaa goonɗinɓe. Vaggin ɓe yeeso Allah, to' ɓe pooɗpooɗtir dow bolle. Ɗum nafataa koo ɗume, to naa bonnugo nanooɓe tan.
55002015	Ti'ina ndaroɗaa yeeso Allah a koolaaɗo. Laatoɗaa kuwoowo mo semtintaake nder kuugal muuɗum, ekkitinoowo voliinde holleynde goonga, noon no haani.
55002016	Woɗɗa haalaaji mehereeji ɗi tokkaay laawol Allah, gam eɗi ɓesda woɗɗingo yimɓe e Allah.
55002017	Haalaaji fooɗfooɗtirooɓe ɓeen e laya kama jonnde nyaameynde laral ɓanndu. Nder maɓɓe boo, e woodi Himeniyus e Filetus.
55002018	Ɓe ngoorii tokkugo goonga, eɓe mbi'a ummitineeki maayɓe aartii wutake, noon ɓe mbonniri goonɗinki woɓɓe.
55002019	Ammaa caɓɓawal ngal Allah waɗi no tabbitngal. Raa ko vinndaa dow ma'agal~: «~Jawmiraawo e anndi yimɓe muuɗum.~» Ɗum vinndaama boo~: «~Biiɗo e tokki Jawmiraawo fuu, sey woɗɗoo halleende.~»
55002020	Nder wuro diskuɗo e woodi gaheeje e taasaaje feere-feere. Wanaa ɗe fuu laatii ɗe ajurfaari e jiinaariya. E woodi boo ɗe leɗɗe e loɓokke. Ɗeen ɗe ajurfaari e jiinaariya e kuutiniree nyannde juulɗe tan. Ɗe leɗɗe e loɓokke boo e kuutiniree dum.
55002021	To neɗɗo laaɓnii hoore muuɗum gada e kuuɗe kalluɗe ɗe mbi'imi, o laatoto kuutinirdi cuɓaandi cenaandi, nafoowo jawmum, ciryiiɗo gam huwa koo iri ngale kuugal booɗngal.
55002022	Nyaar suunooji mbilkaaku kalluɗi. Yilla aadilaaku e goonɗinki e yiɗde e jam, aan e noddirooɓe innde Jawmiraawo e ɓerɗe laaɓɗe fuu.
55002023	Ta'a nattin hoore maaɗa nder geddi majjere ɗi nafataa. A anndi haɓre tan ɗi ngaddata.
55002024	To' kuwanoowo Jawmiraawo laato jokkirteeɗo, ammaa o laatoo kersoowo yimɓe fuu. O laatoo baawɗo ekkitingo, mo munyal.
55002025	O laatoo pahaminoowo yeddooɓe ekkitinol ma'ako e leestinki hoore. Ɗum baɗoojum Allah hokka ɓe laawol tuubgo, ɓe annda goonga.
55002026	Ndeen ɓe keɓtey hakkiilooji maɓɓe, ɓe kisa e teppinirgol Ceyɗaan nannguɗo ɓe, laatini ɓe waɗooɓe ko o yiɗi.
55003001	Anndu, nder timmoode jaamaniiji, caɗeele no ngarey.
55003002	Yimɓe no laatoto yiɗɓe ko'e mu''en e yiɗɓe ceede, mantotooɓe, mawnitiiɓe, bonnooɓe innde Allah, ɓe teddintaa danyooɓe mu''en, ɓe ngettataa, yaviiɓe ko seni,
55003003	yo'ora ɓerɗe'en, ɓe ngalaa yurmeende, nyo'ooɓe, ɓe ngalaa nantaare, halluɓe, wanyɓe ko vooɗi fuu,
55003004	jammbotooɓe, ɓe nyumataa ko ɓe mbaɗata, ƴuufeyɓe mawnitaare, ɓurɓe yiɗgo belɗum dow e Allah.
55003005	Ɓe nanndiney ko'e maɓɓe e ɗowtantooɓe Allah, ammaa ɓe ngeddey baawɗe ma'ako. Woɗɗa iri yimɓe ɓeen~!
55003006	Nder maɓɓe e woodi nattooɓe nder gure e ƴoyna rewɓe ɓe ngalaa ƴoyre, ɓe hakke nyo'i, ɓe suunooji laamani.
55003007	Rewɓe ɓeen e ndaara ekkitaago dum, ammaa ɓe mbaawataa anndugo goonga sam.
55003008	Noon no Jeenis e Jammberes ngeddirnoo Muusa, noon worɓe ɓeen ngeddirta goonga. Nyumooji maɓɓe no leliiɗi, goonɗinki maɓɓe boo e laatii mehere.
55003009	Ammaa ɓe njahataa yeeso, gam yimɓe fuu no annditey vemmbere maɓɓe, noon no ɗum annditiri nde Jeenis e Jammberes.
55003010	Ammaa aan Timote, a tokkii ekkitinol am e gikku am e anniya am e goonɗinki am e munyal am e yiɗde am e ti'inaare am.
55003011	A yi'ii boneeji am e torraaji am. A yi'ii boo ko heɓi yam nder lesɗe Antaakiya e Ikooniya e Listira, e no munyrammi torraaji ca'atuɗi keɓɗi yam. Ammaa Jawmiraawo hisnii yam ɗi, ɗi fuu.
55003012	Goonga, kawtuɗo e Yeesu Almasiifu giɗɗo jooɗaago jo'onde iri nde Allah yiɗi fuu, o torrete.
55003013	Ammaa yimɓe halluɓe e ƴoynooɓe woɓɓe no njahey yeeso-yeeso e waɗgo halleende mu''en. Eɓe ƴoyna woɓɓe, kamɓe e ko'e maɓɓe boo ɓe ƴoyneteeɓe.
55003014	Ammaa aan yah yeeso e jogaago ko ekkitiɗaa, ko ngoonɗinɗaa e ɓernde wo'ore, gam a anndi jannginɓe maa.
55003015	Ila a ɓinngel pamarel a anndi defte ceniiɗe. Kanje mbaawi fahamingo maa laawol kisndam keɓotooɗam gada e goonɗingo Yeesu Almasiifu.
55003016	Ko vinndaa nder Deftere Seniinde fuu e laatii ko fuufaa gada Allah. Nafuuda ma'are woni ekkitingo goonga, e felgo yimɓe, e vo''ingo boofi maɓɓe, e ekkitingo jo'onde nde Allah yiɗi.
55003017	Ɗum fuu ɗum laatake gam kuwanoowo Allah laatoo timmuɗo, ciryiiɗo gam huugo koo iri ngale kuugal booɗngal.
55004001	Emi toro maa yeeso Allah e Yeesu Almasiifu cernaneyɗo ɓe yonki e maayɓe fuu, emi toroo boo gam bittoyki ma'ako e Laamu ma'ako~:
55004002	wa'ajin yimɓe voliinde Allah, koo ɗum veli, koo ɗum metti, tindin ɓe, fel ɓe, semmbiɗin ɓerɗe maɓɓe, ekkitin ɓe e munyal.
55004003	Wakkaci no warey nde yimɓe calotoo yewanaago ekkitinol goonga, ɓe tokka suunooji maɓɓe, ɓe cuɓana ko'e maɓɓe ekkitineyɓe ɓe ko noppi maɓɓe ngiɗi nango.
55004004	Ɓe ngoorey yewanaago goonga, ɓe ngewanoo tahaleeji.
55004005	Ammaa aan, nantu hoore maaɗa nder koo ɗume, munyan torraa, ti'inaa wa'ajingo Habaru Belɗum, timmin kuugal ngal Allah hokku maa booɗɗum.
55004006	Miin kam, ƴiiƴam am ɓadake laataago kama sadaka ndufeteeka, waato wakkaci waɗii nde ɗaleymi duuniyaaru.
55004007	Mi haɓii haɓre vooɗnde nder kuugal ngal Yeesu hokki yam, mi heynii ngal, mi yoofaay goonɗinki am.
55004008	Ila jo'oni laada daɗki e ɗoon reenti yam, waato giifol jaalorgal ngol ɗum hokkata waɗɓe jo'onde laaɓnde. Jawmiraawo cerniroowo goonga no hokkey yam laada kaan nyannde-darngal. Wanaa miin tan o hokkata ka, ammaa o hokkey ka faa e reentirɓe bittoyki ma'ako e yiɗde.
55004009	Yawɗa war to am jaawɗum.
55004010	Gam Demas ɗalii yam sabu yiɗde fii duuniyaaru, o dillirii Tesaloonika. Kiresnas yahii Galaatiya, Tiitus boo dillirii Dalmaatiya.
55004011	Luka tan wondi e am. Hooƴoy Markus ngardon, gam o valley yam korey nder kuugal Jawmiraawo.
55004012	Mi lilii Tikikus si'ire Efesu.
55004013	Nde ngarɗaa wargo fuu, waddanam burnus am ɗum ɗalmi e junngo Karbus toon Toorowas. Waddanam boo defte, ɓurna muuɗum defte lare taggaaɗe.
55004014	Aleksandir bayillo waɗanii yam halleende ɗuuɗnde. Jawmiraawo boo, no wa'atoto mo deydey e kuugal ma'ako kallungal.
55004015	Aan boo hakkil e ma'ako, gam o yeddii bolle meeɗen korey.
55004016	Nyannde arande nde ndariimi yeeso cernoowo gam mi toontanoo hoore am, walaa balluɗo yam, ɓe fuu ɓe kibinii yam. Yala to' Allah sutoro ɓe ɗum~!
55004017	Ammaa Jawmiraawo vallii yam, o hokkii yam semmbee, gam mi wa'ajina haala ma'ako nder leƴƴi ɗi laataaki Yahuudu'en. Noon o hisniri yam e honnduko mawndu.
55004018	Jawmiraawo no vurtiney yam kalluɗum fuu, o hisney yam faa mi natta nder laamu ma'ako. Teddungal laatanoo mo faa abadaa abadin. Aamiin~!
55004019	Hinnanam Piriisiila e Akiilas, e Onesifoor e wuro muuɗum.
55004020	Erastus darake Korontu, Torofimus boo mi ɗalii ɗum si'ire Miletus, gam o yamɗaa.
55004021	Yawɗa ngaraa ila dabbunde waraay. Ewbulus e Puden e Laynus e Kalawdiya e banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe fuu e kinnu maa.
55004022	Jawmiraawo wondu e maaɗa~! Caahu ma'ako boo wondu e maaɗa, aan e ɓe ngonduɗaa fuu.
56001001	Miin Bulus maccuɗo Allah e lilaaɗo Yeesu Almasiifu vinndi ngo'ol ɗereewol. Allah suɓii yam gam mi semmbiɗina yimɓe ma'ako suɓaaɓe dow goonɗingo Yeesu, mi anndina ɓe goonga ngonka e kulol Allah,
56001002	gam faa tammunde maɓɓe daroo dow heɓgo yonki ɗum faa abadaa. Allah mo fevataa waɗanii en alkawal yonki ɗuum ila duuniyaaru tagaaka.
56001003	Nde wakkaci ɗum o resnoo yottii, kanko Allah kisnoowo en, o vannginirii voliinde ma'ako gada e wa'aju ɗum o hokki yam, o dooli yam wa'ajingo.
56001004	Emi hinnu maa aan Tiitus laatiiɗo ɓiyam goongaajo gada e goonɗinki kawtuki en. Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen e Yeesu Almasiifu kisnoowo en mbarkiɗin maa, kokku maa jam~!
56001005	Mi ɗalii ma runnde Kereeta gam kebbitaa kuugal koriingal, kadimaa nder si'ire fuu cuɓaa darvanooɓe ikiliisiya, noon no mbi'imaami.
56001006	E haani darvanoowo ikiliisiya laatoo mo walaa feloore, mo debbo go'oto, mo ɓiɓɓe muuɗum laatii goonɗinɓe Yeesu, ɓe peldataake gikku kallungu koo ciya ɗowtaare.
56001007	Nde laatii Allah hokki darvanoowo ikiliisiya kuugal ngaal, e haani o tawee mo walaa feloore. To' o laato mawnitiiɗo, koo kuunƴi lawoowo, koo jaroowo, koo gillotooɗo haɓre, koo mo suuno ceede.
56001008	Ammaa e haani o laatoo beernoowo hoɗɓe, giɗɗo waɗgo ko vooɗi, kakkilɗo, goongaajo, laaɓɗo, nantiiɗo.
56001009	O laatoo ti'iniiɗo jogaago voliinde Allah hoolniinde, noon no nde ekkitinirano, gam faa o waawa semmbiɗingo ɓerɗe woɓɓe fodde ekkitinol goongawol, kadi boo o do''a yeddooɓe ekkitinol ma'ako.
56001010	Gam e woodi yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe saliiɓe tokkugo goonga, vi'ooɓe bolle mehereeje, majjinooɓe yimɓe. Ɗuuɗma nder yimɓe ɓeen ɓe Yahuudu'en goonɗinɓe Yeesu.
56001011	Doole ɗum omnda konnduɗe maɓɓe, sabu eɓe majjina gureeji ɗuuɗɗi gada e ekkitinooje ɗe kaanaa, gam ɓe keɓa ceede haram.
56001012	Goɗɗo nder Kereeta'en mo ɓe mbi'ata e woodi anndal vi'i~: «~Kereeta'en no fevooɓe dum, yamniiɓe, aardinɓe deedi, eɓe nanndi e diiwe ladde kalluɗe.~»
56001013	Ko Kereetaajo oon vi'i ɗum goonga. Gam ma'ajum fel ɓe e feloore sa'atunde, gam goonɗinki maɓɓe semmbiɗa,
56001014	ɓe ngoora yewanaago tahaleeji Yahuudu'en ɗi fewre, koo dookaaji yimɓe saliiɓe tokkugo goonga.
56001015	Koo ɗume no laaɓɗum yeeso laaɓa ɓerɗe'en. Ammaa ɓe nyumooji ɓerɗe ɗi laaɓaa, e ɓe ngalaa goonɗinki, walaa ko laatii laaɓɗum yeeso maɓɓe, gam nyumooji maɓɓe e ɓerɗe maɓɓe nyiddi.
56001016	Eɓe mbi'a eɓe anndi Allah, ammaa kuuɗe maɓɓe e kolla ɓe anndaa mo. Ɓe nefniiɓe, turtanɓe Allah, ɓe mbaawataa huugo kuugal booɗngal koo go'otal.
56002001	Ammaa aan, ekkitin ko yahadi e ekkitinol goonga.
56002002	Vi' ndotti'en naye'en laatoo hakkilɓe, hersiniiɓe, reenɓe ko'e mu''en, ɓe goonɗinki cemmbiɗki, heeɓɓe yiɗde e munyal.
56002003	Noon boo, yecca yayri'en naye'en mbaɗa jo'onde haandannde goonɗinɓe Allah. To' ɓe laato nyo'ooɓe woɓɓe koo yarooɓe, ammaa ɓe laatoo ekkitinooɓe ko vooɗi,
56002004	gam faa ɓe kolla haɓɓe rewɓe no ngiɗrata worɓe mu''en e ɓikkon mu''en,
56002005	ɓe laatoo hakkilɓe, laaɓɓe, reenɓe ko'e mu''en, e reenɓe gure mu''en, ɗowtantooɓe worɓe mu''en. Ɓe mbaɗa ɗum, ɗum fuu gam to' goɗɗo yavo voliinde Allah.
56002006	Tiɗɗin kaye'en boo, ɓe laatoo hakkilɓe nder ko ɓe mbaɗata fuu.
56002007	Aan boo, laatana ɓe misaalu nder koo ngale kuugal booɗngal. Wa'aji maaɗa daroo dow goonga, ko foti teddineego.
56002008	Bolle maaɗa laatoo goongaaje ɗe ngeddataake, ndeen wanywanyɓe meeɗen no cemtey, gam ɓe keɓataa ko ɓe kalliniri en.
56002009	Ekkitin maccuɓe boo ɗowtanoo jawmiraaɓe mu''en nder koo ɗume fuu, ɓe mbelna ɓerɗe maɓɓe, to' ɓe ngeddu ɓe,
56002010	to' ɓe ngujju ɓe boo. Ammaa ɓe kolla ɓe potii hooleego, gam faa ekkitinol Allah Kisnoowo meeɗen teddinee nder koo ɗume fuu.
56002011	Allah vannginii yiɗde muuɗum faa yimɓe fuu kisa.
56002012	Yiɗde ndeen ekkitini en no calortooɗen waɗgo keeferaaku e salaago suunooji duuniyaaru. Kayre ndeen ekkitinta en no laatortooɗen nantiiɓe, waɗooɓe ko vooɗi, ɗowtaniiɓe Allah nder ndu'u jaamaniiru.
56002013	En ndeenti nyalnde barkiɗinaande nde kaaɓanɗen, nyalnde nde teddungal Allah mawɗo e Kisnoowo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu vanngata.
56002014	Kanko e hoore ma'ako hokki yonki ma'ako, gam faa o soottoo en gada e koo ndeye halleende, o laɓɓina en, laatooɗen yimɓe ma'ako ti'iniiɓe huugo kuuɗe booɗɗe.
56002015	Kanjum ɗuum haani ekkitinaa yewaniiɓe ma, semmbiɗin ɓe, fel ɓe e baawɗe maaɗa fuu. Ta'a boo jaɓ goɗɗo yavo maa.
56003001	Hiimtin goonɗinɓe Yeesu ɓe leestana laamiiɓe e mawɓe lesdi, ɓe ɗowtanoo ɓe, ɓe ciryoo huugo koo iri ngale kuugal booɗngal.
56003002	To' ɓe laato jaasnooɓe woɓɓe koo haɓeteeɓe, ammaa ɓe laatoo moƴƴuɓe, ɓe kolla yimɓe fuu leestinki hoore.
56003003	Gam ndeenno enen boo en vemmbuɓe, en ɗowtanaakino Allah, en majjunooɓe, en laatinoo maccuɓe suunooji e koo iri ɗiye giɗaaɗi kalluɗi. En njooɗakeno nder halleende e nalwiiru, woɓɓe nganyii en, enen boo en nganyii ɓe.
56003004	Ammaa nde Allah kisnoowo en vanngini yiɗde muuɗum e enɗam muuɗum
56003005	o hisnii en. Wanaa gam kuuɗe meeɗen booɗɗe, ammaa gam yurmeende ma'ako. O hisnirii en gada e lootam danyteeki, o hesɗitinii en gada e Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
56003006	O loovanii en Ruhu ma'ako gada e Yeesu Almasiifu Kisnoowo meeɗen, faa en keevi tep.
56003007	O waɗii ɗum gam enen laaɓniraaɓe gada e yiɗde ma'ako, laatooɗen ronooɓe yonki ɗum faa abadaa ɗum ndeentuɗen.
56003008	Haala kaan ka koolniika. Emi yiɗi tabbitinaa dow ma'ajum, gam faa goonɗinɓe Allah ti'inoo huugo kuuɗe booɗɗe. Kanjum woni booɗɗum ko nafata yimɓe fuu.
56003009	Ammaa aan woɗɗa geddi mehereeji e mantoraago taariifi inɗe maamiraaɓe e yiɗde haɓre e yeddootirgo dow dookaaji Tawreeta, gam ɗum fuu ɗum mehere, walaa ko ɗum nafata.
56003010	Cenndoowo yimɓe, fel ɗum nde wo'ore koo nde ɗiɗi. Kul o jaɓaay, woɗɗa mo.
56003011	A anndi baɗoowo noon fuu selii laawol goonga, o baɗoowo hakke, gam kuuɗe kalluɗe ɗe o huwata e kolla o halkii hoore ma'ako.
56003012	To mi liloyii Artemas koo Tikikus to maaɗa, yawɗa ngaraa tawaa yam si'ire Nikopoolis, gam toon ngiɗmi dabbugo.
56003013	Ti'ina mballiraa Jenas laywaajo e Apolos ko ɓe ngoodi bukaata nder jahaangal maɓɓe fuu.
56003014	Doole yimɓe meeɗen goonɗinɓe ekkitoo huugo kuuɗe booɗɗe, gam ɓe mbaawa vallugo haanɓe valleego, gam to' goonɗinki maɓɓe laato ki walaa nafri.
56003015	Wonduɓe e am fuu e kinnu maa. Hinnan min higooɓe meeɗen goonɗinɓe wonɓe toon fuu. Barkaa Allah wondu e mooɗon, on fuu.
57001001	Ngo'ol ɗereewol ivii to am, miin Bulus omndaaɗo nder kaso gam wa'ajingo habaru Yeesu Almasiifu. Miin e banndiraawo meeɗen Timote emin kinnu maa, aan Filimon kuudiɗɗaawo amin giɗaaɗo.
57001002	Emin kinna ikiliisiya Yeesu ngonka wuro maaɗa e banndii'en debbo bi'eteeɗo Aafiya e Arkibus balluɗo yam haɓango Habaru Belɗum.
57001003	Allah Baaba meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu kokku on barkaa e jam.
57001004	Koo ndeye nde mbaɗeymi do'aare emi hiimto maa Filimon, emi yetta Allah
57001005	gam mi nanii yiɗde nde ngiɗɗaa seniiɓe e no ngoonɗinirɗaa Yeesu Jawmiraawo.
57001006	Emi toroo Allah, gam goonɗinki kawtuki en valla ma fahamugo barkaaji fuu ɗi keɓɗen nder kawtal meeɗen e Yeesu Almasiifu.
57001007	Banndiraawo am, mi nanii belɗum korey, ɓernde am waaltake gam a hollii a yiɗi goonɗinɓe, a semmbiɗinii ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
57001008	Gam ma'ajum koo nde laatii nder kawtal meeɗen e Almasiifu, emi woodi laawol vi'igo ma mbaɗaa ko haani,
57001009	ammaa gam yiɗde nde ngiɗmaami, mi ɓurii yiɗgo mi toro ma. Miin Bulus ndottiijo nayeejo, mo Yeesu lili, jo'oni boo mi omndaaɗo nder kaso gam Yeesu Almasiifu.
57001010	Emi toro maa gam Onesimus laatiiɗo ɓiyam nder goonɗinki, gam miin holli mo laawol Yeesu ɗo'o nder kaso.
57001011	Ilaano walaa ko o nafno ma, ammaa jo'oni o nafey en, miin e maaɗa fuu.
57001012	Jo'oni Onesimus mo ngiɗmi e ɓernde am fuu, mi vittiney mo to maaɗa.
57001013	Mi ɓuriino yiɗgo o jooɗodoo e am keerol wakkaci ɗum ngonmi nder kaso sabu Habaru Belɗum, gam o valla yam mbattudi maaɗa.
57001014	Ammaa mi yiɗaa waɗgo goɗɗum to naa e yerduye maaɗa, gam ta'a huu booɗɗum e doole, ammaa ɗum laatoo e yiɗde ɓernde maaɗa.
57001015	Kiila Onesimus seediino e maaɗa wakkaci seɗɗa, gam o wonda e maaɗa faa abadaa.
57001016	Jo'oni naa o maccuɗo tan, ammaa ko ɓuri maccuɗo, o laatake banndiraawo maaɗa giɗaaɗo nder goonɗinki. Miin emi yiɗi mo korey, ammaa a ɓurii yam yiɗgo mo, naa gam o maccuɗo maaɗa tan, ammaa gam o laatake bannda nder goonɗingo Jawmiraawo.
57001017	Gam ma'ajum, to a resii yam mi higoo maaɗa nder kuugal, ndeen kam jaɓɓa mo, noon no njaɓɓortoɗaa yam.
57001018	To o waɗaniino ma ko halli, koo a tokkiino mo nyamaande, yow ɗum ɗum fuu dow am.
57001019	Miin Bulus vinndan maa ɗum e junngo am, mi biyete. Naa gam emi yiɗi hiimtingo ma, aan maa emi tokku maa nyamaande, gam miin waddu maa dow laawol kisndam.
57001020	Banndiraawo am, emi yiɗi mbaɗanaa yam ɗum gam Jawmiraawo, velnanam ɓernde, sabu kawtal meeɗen e Yeesu Almasiifu.
57001021	Mi vinndanii ma ngo'ol ɗereewol, gam mi tabbitinii a waɗey ko torimaami, faa mbaɗaa ko ɓuri noon.
57001022	Kadimaa mo''inanam suudu to mbeereymi, gam emi tammii Allah no jaɓey do'aaje mooɗon, o vittina yam to mooɗon.
57001023	Epafaras mo omndidaami nder kaso gam Yeesu Almasiifu e hinnu maa.
57001024	Huudiɗɗaaɓe am boo e kinnu ma, waato Markus e Aristarkus e Demas e Luka.
57001025	Barkaa Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu wondu e mooɗon~!
58001001	Ndeenno Allah volvanii maamiraaɓe meeɗen nde ɗuuɗɗum gada e konnduɗe annabo'en e laabi feere-feere.
58001002	Ammaa nder ɗe'e balɗe cakitiiɗe, Allah volviranii en e Ɓiyum. E ma'ako o tagiri duuniyaaru, o waɗii mo boo o laatoo donoowo koo ɗume fuu.
58001003	Ɓiɗɗo oon woni jayngol kolleyngol teddungal Allah, e no Allah va'i e goonga. Emo tiigorii koo ɗume fuu e baawɗe voliinde ma'ako. Ɓaawo o hebbinii kuugal laaɓnugo yimɓe gada e hakkeeji mu''en, o jooɗake toon dow e nyaamo Allah mo Baawɗe.
58001004	Ɓiɗɗo Allah oon laatake ɓurɗo malaa'ika'en manngu, noon no innde nde Allah hokki mo ɓurdi inɗe maɓɓe.
58001005	Gam Allah meeɗaay vi'igo malaa'ikaajo koo go'oto~: «~Aan a ɓiɗɗo am, hannde mi laatake Baaba maaɗa.~» Koo boo~: «~Mi laatanto mo Baaba, O laatanto yam Ɓiɗɗo.~»
58001006	Ammaa wakkaci nde Allah siryii lilgo Ɓiɗɗo muuɗum afo nder duuniyaaru, o vi'i~: «~Sey malaa'ika'en Allah fuu cujjidana mo.~»
58001007	Raa ko Allah vi'i dow malaa'ika'en~: «~Allah waɗii malaa'ika'en muuɗum kama keni, o waɗii huwooɓe ma'ako boo kama ɗemɗe yiite.~»
58001008	Ammaa o volvii dow Ɓiyiiko o vi'i~: «~Yaa Allah, jooɗorgal laamu maaɗa no tabbitey faa abadaa abadin. Goonga woni sawru laamu maaɗa.
58001009	A yiɗi aadilaaku, a wanyi ko halli. Kanjum waɗi aan Allah, Allah maaɗa waɗ maa cuɓaaɗo, hokku maa velvelo e manngu ɓurngu ngu wonduɓe e maaɗa.~»
58001010	Kadimaa o vi'i~: Jawmiraawo, aan jo'ini duuniyaaru ila aran, asama boo ɗum kuugal juuɗe maaɗa.
58001011	Kanjum ɗum majjey, ammaa aan a tabbitey. Ɗum fuu ɗum hihiɗey kama kolte,
58001012	a taggey ɗum kama wudere, ɗum waylitete kama no ɗum waylirta kolte. Ammaa aan a waylataako, duuɓi maaɗa nde'ataa faa abadaa.
58001013	Allah meeɗaay vi'igo malaa'ikaajo koo go'oto~: «~Jooɗa e junngo am nyaamo faa mi waɗa wanywanyɓe maaɗa laatoo jaaɓruɗum kosɗe maaɗa.~»
58001014	Ɓeye ngoni malaa'ika'en~? Malaa'ika'en fuu ɓe ruhuuji kuwanooji Allah, ɗi o lilata gam mballa ɓeen heɓeyɓe kisndam.
58002001	Gam ma'ajum en kaani waɗgo hakkiilo meeɗen fuu dow ɗuum ko nanɗen, gam to' en cel laawol goonga.
58002002	Lilal Allah ngal malaa'ika'en ngaddi goonɗii. Huultuɓe ngal e saliiɓe tokkugo ngal keɓii elto haandanngo ɗum'en.
58002003	To noon, noye enen kisreten to en ngeebake ɗa'am kisndam mawɗam~? Jawmiraawo e hoore muuɗum aarti volvugo haala ma'ajam, ɓeen nanɓe mo boo tabbitinanii en haala kaan ka goonga.
58002004	Kadimaa Allah semmbiɗinii caaydaaku maɓɓe, gada e alaamaaji e kuuɗe kaayniiɗe feere-feere, o senndanii ɓe kokke Ruhu Ceniiɗo, noon no o yiɗiri.
58002005	Wanaa malaa'ika'en ɓeen, Allah hokki laamanoo duuniyaaru wareyndu, ndu mbolveten dow muuɗum.
58002006	Ammaa raa ko Deftere Seniinde saaydini dow mo o hokki laamu, nde vi'i~: «~Yaa Allah, neɗɗo no moye faa nyumataa dow muuɗum~? Ɗume ɓii-aadama laatii faa eɗa reena ɗum~?
58002007	A leestinii mo lees malaa'ika'en wakkaci seɗɗa. A yiifii mo giifol darajja e manngu,
58002008	a waɗii koo ɗume fuu lees laamu ma'ako.~» To Allah waɗii koo ɗume fuu lees laamu ma'ako, ndeen e ɗum holla walaa goɗɗum ko o laamanaaki. Ammaa to goonga kam, en ngi'aay koo ɗume fuu lees baawɗe ma'ako tawo.
58002009	Jo'oni en ngi'ii Yeesu yiifaama giifol darajja e manngu, gam torraa maayde ka o yari. O leestinaama lees malaa'ika'en wakkaci seɗɗa, gam gada e yiɗde Allah o maayana yimɓe fuu.
58002010	Allah tagɗo koo ɗume, mo koo ɗume laatii gam muuɗum, anniyake waddugo yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe nder darajja muuɗum. Gam ma'ajum, o yi'i e haani o laatina Yeesu aardiiɗo keeɓɗo, gada e yargo torraa, potɗo omtango yimɓe laawol kisndam.
58002011	Gam Yeesu cenoowo yimɓe gada e hakkeeji mu''en, oon, e ɓeen ɓe o seni fuu, ɓe siibiiru wo'oru. Kanjum waɗi o semtaay noddirgo ɓe rimdaaɓe ma'ako.
58002012	O vi'i Allah~: «~Mi yeccoto rimdaaɓe am a moye, mi maaltete nder kawtal maɓɓe.~»
58002013	Kadimaa o vi'i~: «~Mi resey goonɗinki am e Allah.~» Ndeen o ɓesdi vi'igo~: «~Rammi ɗo'o, miin e ɓiɓɓe ɓe Allah hokki yam.~»
58002014	Nde laatii ɓiɓɓe ɓeen e ngoodi teewu e ƴiiƴam, Yeesu e hoore muuɗum hawtii e maɓɓe tagaadi. O waɗii ɗum gam gada e maayde ma'ako o halka oon jogiiɗo baawɗe maayde, waato Ceyɗaan.
58002015	Noon o rimɗiniri yimɓe ɓe kulol maayde haɓɓi keerol foofaango mu''en fuu.
58002016	Ɗum laaɓɗum, wanaa malaa'ika'en o wari vallugo, ammaa o warii vallugo taaniraaɓe Ibraahim.
58002017	Gam ma'ajum o laatinaa nannduɗo e banndiraaɓe ma'ako ɓeen nder koo ɗume fuu, gam faa o laatanoo ɓe aardiiɗo diina mawɗo mo yurmeende, koolniiɗo nder kuugal Allah. O waɗii ɗum gam hakkeeji yimɓe nja'afee.
58002018	Kanko e hoore ma'ako o godoraama torraaji, gam ma'ajum emo waawi vallugo ɓeen godorteeɓe torraaji.
58003001	Onon banndiraaɓe am goonɗinɓe, ɓe Allah noddi natta laamu muuɗum, mbaɗee gite mooɗon dow Yeesu. Allah lilii mo o laatoo Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo dow goonɗinki ki caaydinten.
58003002	Yeesu o koolaaɗo dow kuugal ngal Allah cuɓɗo mo hokki mo o waɗa, noon no Muusa laatorii koolaaɗo nder Wuro Allah.
58003003	To goonga kam, nyiɓoowo ɓurii nyiɓdi muuɗum darajja, kama noon boo Yeesu ɓurdi Muusa darajja.
58003004	Koo ngoye wuro e woodi nyiɓɗo ɗum, nyiɓoowo koo ɗume oon woni Allah.
58003005	Muusa o maccuɗo Allah koolaaɗo nder kuugal vallugo yimɓe Allah. O saaydinii ko Allah vi'ata ɗo'o yeeso.
58003006	Ammaa Almasiifu o ɓiɗɗo koolaaɗo, aardinaaɗo yimɓe Allah. Enen ngoni yimɓe ɓeen, to faa en njogake goonɗinki meeɗen e semmbee, en ndarake dow tammunde nde mantortooɗen.
58003007	Gam ma'ajum kakkilee e ko Ruhu Ceniiɗo vi'i~: «~Hannde, to on nanii voliinde Allah,
58003008	to' on njo'orin ko'e mooɗon kama no maamiraaɓe mooɗon mbaɗnoo nde ɓe calii Allah, wakkaci ɓe ngodii mo nder ladde.~»
58003009	Allah vi'i~: «~Toon maamiraaɓe mooɗon ngeddi yam, koo nde laatii ɓe ngi'iino kuuɗe ɗe mbaɗmi duuɓi arba'iin (40).
58003010	Kanjum waɗi kuunƴanmi yimɓe jaamaniiru nduun, mbi'imi~: Wakkaci fuu eɓe caloo tokkugo yam, kadimaa eɓe caloo waɗgo ko mbi'imi~!
58003011	Faa mi hunake nder huunƴere am, mi vi'i~: Ɓe nattataa to pooftineymi ɓe sam~!~»
58003012	Banndiraaɓe am, kakkilee gam to' koo go'oto nder mooɗon tawre ɓernde hallunde, nde walaa goonɗinki, waɗeynde ɗum e selgo laawol Allah mo yonki.
58003013	Ammaa cemmbiɗindiree hakkunde mooɗon koo ndeye nyalaande, to faa vi'eteende «~hannde~» e ɗoon, gam to' hakke estu on, yo'orina ko'e mooɗon.
58003014	Gam en laatake hawtuɓe e Almasiifu, to en njogake goonɗinki meeɗen arani e semmbee, faa keerol balɗe meeɗen.
58003015	Raa ko Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Hannde, to on nanii voliinde Allah, to' on njo'orin ko'e mooɗon kama no maamiraaɓe mooɗon mbaɗnoo nde ɓe ngeddi ko Allah vi'i.~»
58003016	Ɗum ɓeye nannoo voliinde Allah, ammaa e noon fuu ɓe ngeddi ko o vi'i, ɓe tokki laawol maɓɓe~? Ɗum yimɓe ɓe Muusa aardii vurtini lesdi Misira fuu.
58003017	Ɗum ɓeye Allah huunƴani duuɓi arba'iin (40)~? Ɗum ɓeen waɗɓe hakke maayi nder ladde.
58003018	Dow ɓeye Allah hunii vi'i, ɓe nattataa to o fooftinta ɓe sam~? Ɗum ɓeen saliiɓe ko o vi'i.
58003019	En ngi'ii, ɓe keɓaay nattugo to o fooftinta ɓe, gam ɓe ngoonɗinaay mo.
58004001	Nde laatii alkawal nattugo fooftiinde ngal Allah waɗi e woodi faa jo'oni, sey kakkilen, gam to' goɗɗo meeɗen dullu nattugo fooftiinde ndeen.
58004002	Gam enen maa en nanii Habaru Belɗum, noon no yimɓe ɓeen narri ɗum. Ammaa ko ɓe nani ɗuum nafaay ɓe, gam ɓe njaɓraay ɗum e goonɗinki.
58004003	Ammaa enen goonɗinɓe Allah, enen ngoni nattooɓe fooftiinde ndeen. Kayre woni nde Allah volvi dow muuɗum o vi'i~: «~Nder huunƴere am mi hunake mi vi'i~: Ɓe nattataa to pooftineymi ɓe sam~!~» O hunorake noon koo nde laatii o aartii o siryake koo ɗume ko o yiɗi waɗgo dow fooftiinde ndeen ila fuɗɗam tageeki duuniyaaru.
58004004	Gam bannye nder Deftere Seniinde ɗum volvii dow nyalaande joveeɗiɗaɓre, ɗum vi'i~: «~Nder nyalaande joveeɗiɗaɓre Allah fooftii gada e kuuɗe muuɗum fuu.~»
58004005	Nde ɓesdii volvugo dow haala kaan, nde vi'i~: «~Ɓe nattataa to pooftineymi ɓe sam.~»
58004006	Eɗum holla e woodi woɓɓe heɓeyɓe nattugo fooftiinde ndeen. Ɓeen aartuɓe nango Habaru Belɗum keɓaay nattugo fooftiinde ndeen, gam ɓe calake ɗowtanaago Allah.
58004007	Gam ma'ajum ɓaawo duuɓi ɗuuɗɗi, Allah waɗii woɗnde nyalaande vi'eteende «~hannde~». O volvii e honnduko Dawda dow ma'ajum nder aayaare nde nannooɗen naane, o vi'i~: «~Hannde, to on nanii voliinde Allah, to' on njo'orin ko'e mooɗon.~»
58004008	Gam kul Jocuwa no nattinno yimɓe fooftiinde ndeen, daa Allah volvataano dow woɗnde nyalaande feere.
58004009	Kanjum hollata faa jo'oni yimɓe Allah e ndesanaa fooftiinde nanndunde e nde Allah foofti nder nyalaande joveeɗiɗaɓre.
58004010	Gam nattuɗo fooftiinde Allah fuu, no fooftey gada e kuuɗe muuɗum, noon no Allah fooftiri gada e kuuɗe muuɗum.
58004011	Gam ma'ajum, sey ti'inooɗen mbaɗen no mbaawɗen fuu, faa natten fooftiinde ndeen. Ti'inooɗen boo to' goɗɗo meeɗen dullu nde, noon no maamiraaɓe meeɗen ndulliri nde, gam ɓe ɗowtanaaki Allah.
58004012	Voliinde Allah e woodi yonki ende huwa. Nde ɓurii koo kiye kaafahi ki mbeldiiji ɗiɗi velgo. Ende fe''a ɓanndu faa nde sennda ƴi'e e mbusam, waato yonki e ruhu. Ende heɓta giɗaaɗi e nyumooji gonɗi nder ɓernde.
58004013	Nder ko tagaa fuu, walaa ko suuɗii yeeso Allah. Koo ɗume e njaayri woni, e ɗum omtii yeeso gite ma'ako. Doole boo ngeccooɗen ko mbaɗɗen fuu yeeso ma'ako.
58004014	En njogo ko mbiiɗen en ngoonɗinii e semmbee, gam en ngoodi Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo jahaɗo asama faa yeeso Allah, waato Yeesu Ɓiɗɗo Allah.
58004015	Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo meeɗen oon e waawi nango jurumɗum meeɗen nder tampe meeɗen, gam o jarrabaama e laabi feere-feere, noon no njarraboraaɗen, ammaa kanko o waɗaay hakke.
58004016	Gam ma'ajum to' en kul ɓattaago jooɗorgal laamu to yiɗde Allah woni, gam keɓen yurmeende e yiɗde balleyɗum en koo ndeye nde ngoonɗen bukaata.
58005001	Koo moye aardiiɗo diina mawɗo e suɓee nder yimɓe, o hokkee kuugal huwango Allah gam nafuuda maɓɓe, o hokka Allah cakketeeɗi e kokke gam hakkeeji maɓɓe.
58005002	Emo waawi nango jurumɗum yimɓe ɓe ngalaa anndal, selɓe laawol Allah, gam kanko e hoore ma'ako o tampuɗo nder ku'uje ɗuuɗɗe kama maɓɓe.
58005003	Sabu tampere ndeen doole o wadda sadaka ittugo hakkeeji, naa gam yimɓe ɓeen tan, ammaa faa e gam hoore ma'ako.
58005004	Walaa baaweyɗo hokkugo hoore muuɗum manngu laataago aardiiɗo diina mawɗo, to naa Allah suɓi mo, noon no o suɓri Haruuna.
58005005	Almasiifu boo wanaa kanyum hokki hoore muuɗum manngu laataago aardiiɗo diina mawɗo, ammaa Allah hokki mo kuugal ngaal, vi'i mo~: «~Aan a ɓiɗɗo am, hannde mi laatake Baaba maaɗa.~»
58005006	Bannye nder Deftere boo o vi'i~: «~A aardiiɗo diina mo faa abadaa, kama aardungal Malkisadek.~»
58005007	Nde Yeesu wonnoo nder duuniyaaru o waɗii do'aaje e bojji naawɗi e gonɗi, o torake Allah baawɗo hisnugo mo e maayde. Allah boo jaɓii do'aare ma'ako, gam o ɗowtanake ɗum e kulol.
58005008	Koo nde o Ɓiɗɗo Allah, e noon fuu o ekkitake ɗowtanaago Allah gada e torraaji ɗi o yari.
58005009	Nde o laatinaa keeɓɗo, o laatanake ɓeen ɗowtantooɓe mo ɗaɗol kisndam ɗam faa abadaa.
58005010	Allah boo waɗii mo aardiiɗo diina mawɗo kama aardungal Malkisadek.
58005011	Dow ka'a haala, emin ngoodi fii ɗuuɗɗum ko min ngiɗi vi'igo, ammaa fahamingo on ɗum e saɗi, gam on pahamilawtaa.
58005012	Wakkaci waɗii nde kaanɗon laataago ekkitinooɓe, ammaa faa jo'oni eɗon ngiɗi goɗɗo ekkitina on ku'uje ɓurɗe hoygo nder haala Allah. E haannoo tawee nyaamdu tekkundu nyaamoton, ammaa faa jo'oni on musiney.
58005013	Musinoowo fuu no baddo tawo, o waawataa senndindirgo booɗɗum e kalluɗum.
58005014	Ammaa mawɓe nyaamdu tekkundu nyaamata, gam ɓe mboobnii ko'e maɓɓe senndindirgo booɗɗum e kalluɗum.
58006001	Gam ma'ajum en ngoor ekkitinooje pamare dow anndugo Almasiifu, en njaha yeeso dow ekkitinol mawɓe. To' en tawee faa jo'oni en ƴama dow haala woorgo kuuɗe jahareyɗe e halkere, e goonɗingo Allah,
58006002	e ekkitinol dow baptisma feere-feere, e yowango yimɓe juuɗe, e ummitineeki maayɓe, e no Allah tayranta yimɓe ceri'a tabbitka.
58006003	Njahemma yeeso dow ekkitinol mawɓe~! Kanjum mbaɗeten to Allah jaɓii.
58006004	En anndi ɗum waɗataako ɓeen yoofɓe laawol Allah mbittinoyee tuuba, gam ɓe keɓiino jayngol Allah, ɓe meeɗii barkaa ma'ako, ɓe keɓii kokkal Ruhu Ceniiɗo,
58006005	ɓe anndii belɗum voliinde Allah, ɓe meeɗii baawɗe jaamaniiru wareyndu,
58006006	e noon fuu ɓe kokkitii Allah ɓaawo. Ɗum laatake kama kamɓe e ko'e maɓɓe eɓe ɓesda ɓilgo Ɓiɗɗo Allah dow gaafagal, eɓe cemtina mo yeeso yimɓe.
58006007	Lesdi njareyndi ndiyam toɓoojam dow ma'ari dum, endi fuɗna fuɗirmaaji nafooji remooɓe ndi, Allah e barkiɗina ndi.
58006008	Ammaa to ndi fuɗnii gi'e e tuppe, ɗume ndi nafi~? Ndi woɗɗaa la'aneego, ndi halkiree e yiite.
58006009	Ammaa onon banndiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, koo to min mbolirii nihini, e noon fuu min tabbitinii on dow laawol ɓurngol vooɗgo, waato laawol kisndam.
58006010	Gam Allah o goongaajo, o yeggitataa kuugal ngal mbaɗɗon, koo yiɗde nde kolluɗon mo nde mballuɗon yimɓe ma'ako e ballal ngal mballoton ɓe faa jo'oni.
58006011	Emin ngiɗi koo moye mooɗon ti'inoo yahago yeeso e waɗgo noon faa timmoode, gam keɓon ɗuum ko tammiiɗon heɓgo fuu.
58006012	Min ngiɗaa laatooɗon yamniiɓe, ammaa laatee tokkuɓe misaalu ɓeen ronɓe ko Allah waɗi alkawal hokkugo ɓe, sabu goonɗinki e munyal maɓɓe.
58006013	Nde Allah waɗani Ibraahim alkawal, o hunorake hoore ma'ako, gam walaa ɓurɗo mo manngu mo o hunorto.
58006014	O vi'i~: «~Mi hunake, mi barkiɗinte e barkaa makka, mi ɗuɗɗina lenyol maaɗa.~»
58006015	Ibraahim reentii e munyal, faa o heɓi ko Allah waɗi alkawal hokkugo mo.
58006016	En anndi, to yimɓe e kunoo, eɓe kunoroo ko ɓuri ɓe manngu. Hunayeere ndeen kam senndata geddi gonɗi hakkunde maɓɓe.
58006017	Noon boo, nde laatii Allah e yiɗi ɓeen ronooɓe alkawal muuɗum pahama booɗɗum anniya ma'ako waylitataako, kanjum waɗi o ɓesdi hunayeere dow alkawal ngaal.
58006018	E woodi ku'uje ɗiɗi ɗe ngaylitataako sam, ɗum waɗataako Allah feva dow ma'aje, waato alkawal e hunayeere. Kanjum semmbiɗinta ɓerɗe meeɗen, enen hibinɓe koo ɗume gam nanngen tammunde wonnde yeeso meeɗen.
58006019	Tammunde ndeen e laatanii en kama tiggere tabbitnde nde diɓataako, jogiinde yonkiiji meeɗen. Kayre nattata faa yottoo ɓaawo wudere viirnunde yaayre ɓurnde senaago wonnde toon dow.
58006020	Yeesu aartii en nattugo toon, o nattii toon gam meeɗen. O laatanake en aardiiɗo diina mawɗo mo faa abadaa kama aardungal Malkisadek.
58007001	Malkisadek oon wonnoo laamiiɗo si'ire Salem e aardiiɗo diina mo Allah Mawɗo suɓi. Kanko fottunoo e Ibraahim wakkaci wartata gada konu ngu heɓi jaalorgal dow woɓɓe laamiiɓe, o barkiɗini ɗum.
58007002	Kanko boo heɓi jakka gada nder koo ɗume ko Ibraahim heɓoyi nder konu nguun. Ma'ana innde Malkisadek woni «~laamiiɗo aadilaaku~». Kadimaa o laamiiɗo Salem, waato «~laamiiɗo jam~».
58007003	Walaa annduɗo baaba ma'ako koo inna ma'ako e maamiraaɓe ma'ako, gam ɗum vinndaaka. Walaa to ɗum vinndi habaru danyeeki ma'ako, koo maayde ma'ako. Noon o nanndiri e Ɓiɗɗo Allah, gam o aardiiɗo diina mo faa abadaa.
58007004	Ndaaree iri manngu ngu Malkisadek woodi, faa Ibraahim maama meeɗen hokkii mo jakka gada koo ɗume ko heɓoyi nder konu.
58007005	Tawreeta vi'ii taaniraaɓe Leewi laatiiɓe aardiiɓe diina njaɓa jakka nder jawdi Isiraa'iila'en. Waato eɓe njaɓa nder banndiraaɓe maɓɓe, koo nde laatii ɓeen e ko'e mu''en no taaniraaɓe Ibraahim.
58007006	Ammaa koo nde laatii Malkisadek ivaay e lenyol Leewi, e noon fuu o jaɓii jakka gada nder koo ɗume ko Ibraahim heɓoyi. O barkiɗini mo, kanko keɓɗo alkawal Allah.
58007007	Geddi fuu ngalaa, barkiɗinɗo ɓurii barkiɗinaaɗo manngu.
58007008	Kadimaa aardiiɓe diina ɓe ɗum hokkata jakka, ɓe yimɓe maayooɓe. Malkisadek boo jaɓii jakka to Ibraahim, ammaa kanko emo foofa, noon no Deftere saaydiniri.
58007009	To noon, en mbaawi vi'igo nde Ibraahim hokki jakka, Leewi jaɓeyɗo jakka hannde, kam boo hokkii jakka muuɗum gada e Ibraahim.
58007010	Gam wakkaci ko Ibraahim fotti e Malkisadek, Leewi rimaaka tawo, ammaa emo nder ɓanndu Ibraahim.
58007011	Wakkaci ko Allah hokki Isiraa'iila'en Tawreeta, o suɓii lenyol Leewi ɓe laatoo aardiiɓe diina. Kul aardungal diina maɓɓe laatakeno keeɓngal, daa walaa bukaata ɗum heɓa aardiiɗo diina feere. Aardiiɗo oon no ivey e aardungal Malkisadek, naa ngal Haruuna.
58007012	En anndi to aardungal diina waylitake, doole dookaaji boo ngaylitoo.
58007013	Ɗe'e ku'uje e mbolva dow Jawmiraawo meeɗen. Kanko o ivii e lenyol feere, ngol walaa meeɗɗo laataago aardiiɗo diina nder muuɗum.
58007014	Gam en anndi Jawmiraawo meeɗen oon ivii e lenyol Yahuuda, ngol Muusa meeɗaay volvugo haala muuɗum, nde o volvunoo dow aardungal diina.
58007015	Bannguki goɗɗo aardiiɗo diina nannduɗo e Malkisadek ɓesdii laɓɓingo haala kaan.
58007016	O laataaki aardiiɗo diina gam o ivii e lenyol Leewi, ammaa o laatake aardiiɗo diina gada e baawɗe yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
58007017	Gam Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Aan a aardiiɗo diina mo faa abadaa kama aardungal Malkisadek.~»
58007018	To noon dooka arana resaama vuttudu, gam ka walaa semmbee, ka nafaay.
58007019	Gam Tawreeta waɗataa koo moye laatoo keeɓɗo. Ammaa jo'oni en keɓii tammunde ɓurnde ka vooɗgo, nde ɓattortooɗen Allah.
58007020	Kadimaa Allah tabbitinirii aardungal Yeesu e hunayeere. Ammaa o hunanaaki aardiiɓe diina ɓe lenyol Leewi.
58007021	Yeesu tan laatii aardiiɗo diina dow hunayeere nde Allah hunii vi'i~: «~Miin Jawmiraawo mi hunake, mi waylitataa ko mbi'imi~: A laatoto aardiiɗo diina mo faa abadaa.~»
58007022	Gam gada e hunayeere ndeen Yeesu laatorii tabbitinanɗo en alkawal ɓurngal aranal vooɗgo.
58007023	Ngoɗka feere boo woni~: Aardiiɓe diina ɓe ndeenno no ɗuuɗɓe, gam maayde haɗii ɓe tabbitgo dow kuugal maɓɓe.
58007024	Ammaa Yeesu e laatii aardiiɗo diina mo faa abadaa, gam o maayataa.
58007025	Gam ma'ajum, emo waawi hokkugo ɓeen ɓattortooɓe Allah gada e ma'ako kisndam keeɓɗam. Emo foofa dum, gam o toranoo ɓe Allah.
58007026	Daahir kanko woni Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo kaandanɗo en. O ceniiɗo, ko nyiddi koo ko halli walaa e ma'ako. O senndaama e waɗooɓe hakke, o ƴeftaama dow ko woni toon dow asama fuu.
58007027	O nanndaa e mawɓe aardiiɓe diina horiiɓe. Gam ɓeen, nyannde fuu sey ngaddana Allah sadaka kirsum~: aran gam hakkeeji maɓɓe, ndeen gam hakkeeji yimɓe. Ammaa Yeesu walaa bukaata waɗgo noon. O hokkitirii hoore ma'ako sadaka gam ittugo hakkeeji yimɓe nde wo'ore heƴoore faa abadaa.
58007028	Tawreeta e darna yimɓe tampuɓe laatina ɓe mawɓe aardiiɓe diina. Ammaa hunayeere Allah warnde ɓaawo Tawreeta darnii Ɓiɗɗo laatinaaɗo keeɓɗo faa abadaa.
58008001	Nder ma'ajum fuu, raa ko ngiɗmi vi'igo~: daahir en ngoodi Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo jooɗiiɗo toon dow asama, e nyaamo jooɗorgal laamu Allah Mawɗo.
58008002	Emo huwa kuugal aardiiɗo diina mawɗo nder yaayre seniinde, waato nder Suudu Fottirde ndu Jawmiraawo e hoore muuɗum tiggi toon dow, wanaa yimɓe.
58008003	Koo moye mawɗo aardiiɗo diina darnaama gam o wadda sadakaaji nyaamdu e kirseteeɗi to Allah. Noon boo Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo meeɗen doole heɓa goɗɗum ko waddi.
58008004	Kul emo nder duuniyaaruno faa jo'oni, daa o laatataako aardiiɗo diina koo seɗɗa, gam e woodi aardiiɓe diina hokkooɓe Allah kokke kama no Tawreeta vi'i.
58008005	Kuugal ngal ɓen ɗoon aardiiɓe diina kuwata e laatii misaalu e mbeelu ko woni toon dow asama. Noon boo ɗum laatii e Muusa, ko hokka o fuɗɗa tiggugo Suudu Fottirde, Jawmiraawo vi'ii mo~: «~Tabbitin a waɗii koo ɗume fuu deydey e misaalu ɗum kolleɗaa dow vaamnde.~»
58008006	Ammaa jo'oni Yeesu hokkaama kuugal aardiiɗo diina ɓurngal ngal maɓɓe. Amaana ka o siryii hakkunde Allah e yimɓe ɓurii vooɗgo, gam ka darnaama dow alkawalji ɓurɗi vooɗgo.
58008007	Kul alkawal aranal walaano ko ŋakki e muuɗum, daa walaa bukaata alkawal ɗiɗaɓal.
58008008	Ammaa Allah felii yimɓe muuɗum, noon no Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Miin Jawmiraawo emi vi'a on~: balɗe e ngara ɗe kaɓɓeymi alkawal kesal e yimɓe Isiraa'iila e Yahuuda.
58008009	Ngal nanndataa e alkawal ngal kaɓɓunoomi e maamiraaɓe maɓɓe nyalaande nde nanngumi ɓe junngo mburtimmi ɓe lesdi Misira. Nde laatii ɓe njogaaki alkawal am ngaal, waɗi kokkitmi ɓe ɓaawo. Miin Jawmiraawo vi'i noon.~»
58008010	O ɓesdi vi'igo~: «~Raa alkawal ngal mba'adeymi e yimɓe Isiraa'iila nder balɗe gareyɗe~: Mi waɗey dookaaji am nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, mi vinnda ɗi nder nyumooji maɓɓe. Mi laatoto Allah maɓɓe, kamɓe boo ɓe laatoto yimɓe am.
58008011	Naa sey to goɗɗo ekkitinii mo jooɗodii, koo vi'a banndum~: Anndu Jawmiraawo, gam ɓe fuu ɓe anndey yam, gada famarɓe maɓɓe faa yahago mawɓe maɓɓe.
58008012	Gam mi ya'afanto ɓe halleende maɓɓe, mi fuɗɗitataa limgo hakkeeji ɗi ɓe mbaɗi sam.~»
58008013	Gada e volvugo haala alkawal kesal Allah hihiɗiniri alkawal aranal. To noon ko hihiɗi naywi ɓadake majjugo.
58009001	Alkawal aranal e woonnoo dookaaji e Suudu to ɗum sujjidanta Allah nder duuniyaaru.
58009002	Suudu nduun ɗum suudu laral senndaandu cuuɗi ɗiɗi. Suudu arandu e vi'ee yaayre seniinde. Nder ma'aru e woodi to ɗum resata fitila ka ɗemɗe joveeɗiɗi e danki e buroodi gonɗum dow ma'aki, cakkanaaɗum Allah.
58009003	Ɓaawo wudere senndunde cuuɗi ɗiɗi ɗiin, e woodi suudu gaɗaaru vi'eteendu yaayre ɓurnde senaago.
58009004	Nder ma'aru e woodi wuldude urdi mbelndi wa'araande jiinaariya, e woodi boo akootiiwa alkawal molmanaanga jiinaariya. Nder ma'aga e woodi gaheeyel jiinaariya, nder ma'agel e woodi nyaamdu vi'eteendu manna. Nder akootiiwa ngaan e woodi sawru Haruuna vilitndu e alluwaaje kaaƴe ɗiɗi ɗe ɗum vinndi dookaaji Allah sappo dow muuɗum.
58009005	Dow akootiiwa ngaan e woodi nanndi malaa'ika'en vi'eteeɓe keruba'en, laatiiɓe alaama teddungal Allah. Biyeeli maɓɓe e kuuri omndoode akootiiwa to ɗum rufata ƴiiƴam gam ya'afaago hakkeeji. Ammaa jo'oni en ngalaa wakkaci nde ndarotooɗen linngiten koo ɗume fuu noon no wontirnoo.
58009006	Ku'uje ɗeen fuu ciryoraama noon, gam koo ndeye nyalaande aardiiɓe diina natta suudu arandu, ɓe kuwa kuugal maɓɓe ngal ɓe kuwanta Allah.
58009007	Ammaa aardiiɗo diina mawɗo tan nattata suudu gaɗaaru, nde wo'ore nder hitaande. O nattataa boo to o jogaaki ƴiiƴam bisaaji ɗam o wa'arata sadaka, gam ya'afuye hakkeeji ma'ako e ɗi yimɓe mbaɗi nder ciya anndal mu''en.
58009008	Gada e ma'ajum Ruhu Ceniiɗo holliri, to faa suudu arandu e ɗoon dari, laawol nattugo yaayre ɓurnde senaago omtaaka tawo.
58009009	Ɗum fuu ɗum misaalu kolleyɗum ko woodi hannde, e ɗum holla hokkugo Allah sadakaaji nyaamdu e sadakaaji kirseteeɗi mbaawataa laɓɓingo nyumooji ɓernde kokkoowo ɗi, faa hakkiilo ma'ako waalto.
58009010	Dookaaji nyaamdu e jarki e loote-loote feere-feere, ɗum fuu ɗum dookaaji ko yaalani ɓanndu tan, ɗum nafey faa yottoo wakkaci nde Allah waylitata ɗum.
58009011	Ammaa jo'oni Almasiifu vanngii, o Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo dow ku'uje booɗɗe garanɗe en jo'oni. O nattii suudu laral seniindu ɓurndu manngu e darajja, ndu junngo neɗɗo tiggaay, waato ndu ivaay nder ndu'u duuniyaaru tagaandu.
58009012	Almasiifu nattii nder yaayre ɓurnde senaago nde wo'ore tan faa abadaa. Nde o natti gam sakkango Allah, o nattidaay e ƴiiƴam ilohon e nga'on, ammaa o nattidii e ƴiiƴam ma'ako. Noon o soottorii en faa abadaa.
58009013	Ƴiiƴam ilohon e nga'on e tooka viige nge ɗum wuli meccaama dow yimɓe ɓe laaɓaay fodde diina, gam ɗum laatina ɓe laaɓɓe.
58009014	To noon kam, ƴiiƴam Almasiifu no waɗey ko ɓuri noon. Gam e baawɗe Ruhu goonɗo faa abadaa, Almasiifu hokkiri Allah hoore muuɗum, o laatii cakkiri ndi walaa liddaari. Ƴiiƴam ma'ako boo no laɓɓiney nyumooji ɓerɗe meeɗen gada e kuuɗe jahareyɗe en e maayde, gam faa kuwanen Allah mo yonki.
58009015	Kanjum waɗi Almasiifu laatii hakkundeejo Allah e yimɓe nder alkawal kesal. O waɗii ɗum gam faa yimɓe ɓe Allah noddi keɓa ndonu ngu faa abadaa, ngu Allah waɗi alkawal muuɗum. Maayde ma'ako rimɗinii yimɓe gada e boofi ɗi ɓe mbaɗnoo wakkaci ɓe ngonnoo nder alkawal aranal.
58009016	To goɗɗo waɗii alkawal ronnugo, sey to ɗum saaydake baɗɗo alkawal ngaal maayi.
58009017	Gam alkawal ndonu tabbitataa, sey to baɗɗo ngal maayii, to faa baɗɗo ngal e foofa ngal huwataa.
58009018	Kanjum waɗi, faa e alkawal aranal fuɗɗaay huugo, sey nde ƴiiƴam rufaa.
58009019	Nde Muusa yeccinoo yimɓe keerol dookaaji Allah gonɗi nder Tawreeta fuu, o hooƴi ƴiiƴam ga'i e ilooji hawtaade e ndiyam, o hooƴi haako hisop e gaasa baali mbo'ojinaaka, o suuvi ɗum nder ma'ajam, o mecci ɗam dow Deftere Tawreeta e dow yimɓe fuu.
58009020	O vi'i~: «~Ɗa'am woni ƴiiƴam tabbitinoojam alkawal ngal Allah vi'i on tokkon.~»
58009021	Noon boo, o mecciri ƴiiƴam ɗaam dow Suudu Fottirde e ku'uje gonɗe nder ma'aru fuu, kuutirteeɗe gam sujjidango Allah.
58009022	Dow e Tawreeta, ko ɓuri ɗuuɗgo fuu ƴiiƴam laɓɓinirte. Gam to naa ƴiiƴam rufaa, hakkeeji nja'afataake.
58009023	To ɗe'e ku'uje laatiiɗe misaalu ku'uje goongaaje gonɗe toon dow e laaɓniree ƴiiƴam bisaaji, ndeen ku'uje gonɗe toon dow doole laaɓniree e kirseteeɗi ɓurɗi ɗin toon darajja.
58009024	Gam wanaa nder yaayre seniinde nde yimɓe nyiɓi Almasiifu natti, laatiinde nanndi yaayre goongaare wonnde toon dow. Ammaa asama e hoore muuɗum o natti. Jo'oni emo toon yeeso Allah, gam o heedana en.
58009025	Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina Yahuudu'en e nattida e ƴiiƴam bisaaji nder yaayre seniinde nde wo'ore nder koo ndeye hitaande. Ammaa Almasiifu nattaay nde ɗuuɗɗum gam o sakka hoore ma'ako kama no ɓe mbaɗata.
58009026	Kul ɗum laatakeno noon, daa Almasiifu torranooma nde ɗuuɗɗum ila fuɗɗam duuniyaaru. Ammaa jo'oni faro timmoode jaamanuuji, o vanngii nde wo'ore tan faa abadaa, gam o itta hakkeeji gada e sakkugo hoore ma'ako.
58009027	Neɗɗo fuu no maayey nde wo'ore, ɓaawo ma'ajum Allah sernana mo.
58009028	Noon boo Almasiifu sakkiri hoore muuɗum nde wo'ore, gam o itta hakkeeji yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe. O vanngey ɗiɗaɓre naa gam o itta hakkeeji, ammaa gam o hisna ɓeen reentuɓe kisndam ma'ako.
58010001	Tawreeta Muusa e laatii mbeelu ku'uje booɗɗe gareyɗe ɗo'o yeeso tan, naa ɗum ku'uje ɗeen goongaaje e hoore muuɗum. Gam ma'ajum, ka waawataa laatingo ɓattotooɓe Allah heeɓɓe, gada e waɗgo sadakaaji koo ndeye hitaande.
58010002	Kul e ka waawnoo laatingo ɓe heeɓɓe, daa ɓe ngooriino waɗgo sadakaaji. Nyumooji ɓerɗe maɓɓe boo pelataa ɓe dow hakkeeji ɗi ɓe mbaɗi, gam ɓe laɓɓinaama nde wo'ore heynde faa abadaa.
58010003	Ammaa sadakaaji ɗiin e kiimtina yimɓe hakkeeji mu''en hitan-hiti fuu.
58010004	Gam ƴiiƴam ga'i e ilooji waawataa ittugo hakkeeji yimɓe sam.
58010005	Kanjum waɗi, nde Almasiifu wari nattugo duuniyaaru, o vi'i Allah~: «~Wanaa sadakaaji e kirseteeɗi ngiɗɗaa, ammaa a waɗanii yam ɓanndu.
58010006	Wanaa kirseteeɗi guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi gam ittugo hakke mbelaney maa ɓernde.~»
58010007	Ndeen Almasiifu vi'i~: «~Yaa Allah, rammi~: Mi warii gam mi waɗa ko ngiɗɗaa, noon no ɗum vinndiraa dow am nder Tawreeta.~»
58010008	Aran o vi'i~: «~A yiɗaa sadakaaji e kirseteeɗi, a yiɗaa kirseteeɗi guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi gam ittugo hakke, a nanataa belɗum ma'ajum.~» O vi'ii ɗum, koo nde laatii sadakaaji ɗiin fuu cakkiraama noon no Tawreeta vi'i.
58010009	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o vi'i~: «~Rammi, mi warii gam mi waɗa ko ngiɗɗaa.~» Noon o ittiri kirseteeɗi arani, gam o jo''ina hoore ma'ako mbattudi ma'aji.
58010010	Nde Yeesu Almasiifu waɗi ɗuum ko Allah yiɗi, o laɓɓinii en gada e hakkeeji. O sakkii ɓanndu ma'ako gam meeɗen, o sakkii ndu nde wo'ore faa abadaa.
58010011	Koo moye aardiiɗo diina e daranii kuugal muuɗum koo ndeye nyalaande, emo sakka cakketeeɗi go'oti ɗiin dum, ammaa ɗi mbaawataa ittugo hakke.
58010012	Ammaa Almasiifu kam, nde wo'ore sakki hoore muuɗum faa abadaa, gam ittugo hakkeeji. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o jooɗii e junngo Allah nyaamo.
58010013	Ila wakkaci ɗuum, emo reenti faa Allah laatina wanywanyɓe ma'ako to o yowata kosɗe ma'ako.
58010014	E sadaka ngo'ota kaan, o laatiniri ɓeen ɓe o laɓɓinta gada e hakkeeji mu''en heeɓɓe faa abadaa.
58010015	Ruhu Allah boo e saaydina en dow ma'ajum, nde o vi'i~:
58010016	«~Allah vi'i~: raa alkawal ngal mba'adeymi e yimɓe Isiraa'iila nder balɗe gareyɗe~: Mi waɗey dookaaji am nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, mi vinnda ɗi nder nyumooji maɓɓe.~»
58010017	Ndeen o ɓesdi vi'igo~: «~Mi fuɗɗitataa limgo hakkeeji ɗi ɓe mbaɗi e kuuɗe kalluɗe ɗe ɓe kuwi.~»
58010018	Ndeen to hakke ya'afaama, walaa bukaata cakkuki feere gam ittugo hakke kadin.
58010019	Gam ma'ajum banndiraaɓe, ƴiiƴam Yeesu ndufaaɗam ɗaam hokkii en laawol nattugo nder yaayre ɓurnde senaago, e ɓerɗe baaltiiɗe.
58010020	O omtanii en laawol kesol kokkeyngol yonki, kuultirgol wudere senndunde Suudu Jawmiraawo, waato ɓanndu ma'ako.
58010021	En ngoodi aardiiɗo diina mawɗo, aardinaaɗo dow yimɓe Wuro Seniingo.
58010022	Gam ma'ajum, sey ɓaditooɗen Allah e ɓerɗe goongaaje e goonɗinki cemmbiɗki. En mbaawi waɗgo ɗum, sabu nyumooji ɓerɗe meeɗen laɓɓinaama, ɗi peldataa en ko halli, ɓalli meeɗen boo lootraama ndiyam laaɓɗam.
58010023	Tammunde nde mbolveten haala muuɗum, sey njogooɗen nde booɗɗum, gam Allah baɗanɗo en alkawal o koolniiɗo.
58010024	En ti'ino leggindirgo hakkunde meeɗen nder hollugo yiɗde e kuuɗe booɗɗe.
58010025	To' en ngoor hawritgo kama no woɓɓe ngoordi hawritgo. Ammaa enen en cemmbiɗindir, hakko maa jo'oni nde ngiiɗen nyalaande bittoyki Jawmiraawo ɓadake.
58010026	To en njahii yeeso e waɗgo hakke da gangaan, ɓaawo en anndii goonga, ndeen ngoɗka sadaka itteyka hakkeeji meeɗen walaa.
58010027	Ko horii woni reentugo ceri'a Allah kulniika, e yiite hallunge nyaamoyeynge wanyɓe Allah.
58010028	Koo moye huulti Tawreeta Muusa, o bareteeɗo dow e caaydaaku yimɓe ɗiɗo koo tato, naa e yurmeende.
58010029	To noon, javiiɗo Ɓiɗɗo Allah no heɓey ceri'a ɓurka naawgo, koo naa noon~? Gam neɗɗo oon meheriɗinii ƴiiƴam alkawal Allah laɓɓinɗam mo, huɗii Ruhu gaddoowo yiɗde.
58010030	En anndi Allah biiɗo~: «~Mba'ataari ndi am, miin wa'atotoo koo moye.~» Kadimaa o vi'ii~: «~Jawmiraawo no sernaney yimɓe muuɗum.~»
58010031	Ɗum fii kulniiɗum fa, neɗɗo yana nder junngo Allah mo yonki~!
58010032	Kiimtee no njooɗorinooɗon naane. Nder balɗe ɗeen, ɓaawo on keɓii jayngol Allah, on ndurvidii e torraaji naawɗi, ammaa on ndarake e semmbee.
58010033	Wakkaci go'o on kuɗaama, on njaltiniraama yeeso yimɓe. Wakkaci feere boo on njaɓii vallugo woɓɓe torriraaɓe kama mooɗon.
58010034	On njurminanii omndaaɓe nder kaso. Nde te'etaaɗon ko ngoonɗon, on njaɓii ɗum e velvelo, gam on anndi on ngoodi goɗɗum ko ɓuri ɗum vooɗgo, tabbiteyɗum faa abadaa.
58010035	Gam ma'ajum, to' on kibin goonɗinki mooɗon, gam eki waddana on laada makka.
58010036	On ngoodi bukaata munyal, gam faa mbaɗon ko Allah yiɗi, keɓon ko o waɗani on alkawal.
58010037	Gam Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Horii wakkaci seɗɗa kaanɗo wara oon no warey, o neeɓataa.
58010038	Aadaliijo no foofrey e goonɗinki, ammaa to o hokkitii yam ɓaawo, mi nanataa belɗum ma'ako.~»
58010039	Enen kam, en ngalaa nder hokkitooɓe ɓaawo yahago halkere, ammaa en nder goonɗinɓe Allah yahago kisndam yonkiiji meeɗen.
58011001	Goonɗinki woni tabbitingo heɓgo ko tammoto, e tabbitingo ku'uje ɗe en ngi'ataa eɗe ngoodi.
58011002	Gada e ma'aki yimɓe ndeenno laatorii yerdaaɓe Allah.
58011003	Gada e goonɗinki pahamirɗen ko woni dow e lees fuu tagiraama voliinde Allah. Ko yi'etee boo ivii gada e ko yi'ataake.
58011004	Habiila goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi o hokki Allah sadaka ɓurka ka Kaayinu. Sabu goonɗinki ma'ako Allah yerdii mo, nde e jaɓi kokkal ma'ako. Habiila maayi, ammaa goonɗinki ma'ako e volvana en faa hannde.
58011005	Enok goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi Allah ƴeentini mo dow asama, o maayaay. Walaa puɗɗitɗo yi'igo mo, gam Allah hooyrii mo dow. Ko hokka o ƴeentinee dow, Deftere Seniinde saaydinii vi'igo o velii Allah.
58011006	En anndi to neɗɗo walaa goonɗinki waawataa velgo Allah, gam giɗɗo ɓattaago Allah fuu doole goonɗina Allah e woodi, emo hokka yillotooɓe mo laada.
58011007	Nuhu goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi o jaɓi vagginoore Allah dow hu'unde ko waɗoyta ɗo'o yeeso, ɗum o yi'aay tawo. O ɗowtanii Allah, o sehi akali ndiyam gam o hisna wuro ma'ako. Noon o do''iri yimɓe duuniyaaru ceri'a. Sabu goonɗinki ma'ako Allah yerdii mo.
58011008	Ibraahim goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi o ɗowtanii Allah, nde Allah vi'i mo o yaha lesdi ndi waɗi alkawal hokkugo mo. Ibraahim dillii koo nde laatii anndaa to fa'i.
58011009	Goonɗinki ma'ako waɗi o jooɗii kama jananno nder lesdi ndi Allah waɗi alkawal hokkugo mo. O jooɗii nder cuuɗi lare, kanko e Iciyaaku e Yaakuubu ɓe o rondata alkawal ngaal.
58011010	Ibraahim waɗii ɗum, gam o haaɓii o yi'a si'ire nde caɓɓawal tabbitngal, nde Allah diidi, nyiɓi.
58011011	Gada e goonɗinki Ibraahim heɓri ɓiɗɗo, koo nde laatii o naywii rugum, Saaratu debbo ma'ako boo e laatinoo dimaro. O heɓii ɓiɗɗo oon gam o tabbitinii Allah baɗanɗo mo alkawal no koolniiɗo.
58011012	Gam ma'ajum gada e o'o neɗɗo go'oto nayeejo ɓadiiɗo maaygo, ɗum heɓi lenyol ɗuuɗngol kama koode, ngol limataako kama njaareendi regorde maayo.
