58011013	Ɓe'e yimɓe fuu maayii nder goonɗinki. Ɓe keɓaay ko Allah waɗani ɓe alkawal, ammaa ɓe teeynii ɗum to woɗɗi, ɓe njaɓɓii ɗum, ɓe mbi'i e njaayri ɓe hoɗɓe e jananɓe nder duuniyaaru.
58011014	Ko ɓe mbolvi ɗuum hollii laaɓɗum eɓe ndaara lesdi halal maɓɓe.
58011015	Kul ɓe nyumtuno dow lesdi ndi ɓe mburtoyii, daa ɓe keɓiino laawol so''aago.
58011016	Ammaa eɓe ngilloo lesdi ɓurndi vooɗgo, waato lesdi ngonndi toon dow. Gam ma'ajum Allah nanaay cemtuɗum noddireego Allah maɓɓe, o siryanake ɓe si'ire.
58011017	Ibraahim goonɗinii Allah, gam ma'ajum nde Allah godii mo, o siryii hokkugo ɓiyiiko Iciyaaku kama cakkiri. Kanko baɗanaaɗo alkawal lenyol ɗuuɗngol, emo siryii sakkango Allah ɓiyiiko bajjo,
58011018	koo nde Allah vi'iino mo~: «~Gada e Iciyaaku keɓrataa lenyol noddirteengol innde maaɗa.~»
58011019	Ibraahim nyumii Allah e woodi baawɗe ummitingo maayɗo. Gam ma'ajum o hokkitaa ɓiyiiko kama ummitinaaɗo nder maayde.
58011020	Iciyaaku goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi o barkiɗini Yaakuubu e Isuwa, gam ko warata yeeso.
58011021	Yaakuubu goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi nde o ɓadii maaygo, o barkiɗini ɓiɓɓe Yusufu. O tuggi sawru ma'ako o turii o sujjidani Allah.
58011022	Yusufu goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi nde o ɓadii maaygo, o volvi haala burtaaki yimɓe Isiraa'iila nder lesdi Misira, o yeccii ɓe no ɓe mbaɗanta ƴi'e ma'ako.
58011023	Danyooɓe Muusa ngoonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi ɓe cuuɗi mo lebbi tati ɓaawo danyeeki ma'ako, gam ɓe ngi'ii o ɓinngel booɗngel. Ɓe kulaay huultugo dooka laamiiɗo.
58011024	Muusa goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi nde o mawni, o salii noddireego ɓinngel ɓii Fira'awna debbo.
58011025	O iggitinii o yarda torraa e yimɓe Allah dow o nana belɗum nder hakke wakkaci seɗɗa.
58011026	O fahamii jaltinireego gam Almasiifu e laatii risku ɓurngu ngu lesdi Misira darajja, gam o raarii laada ka o heɓata ɗo'o yeeso.
58011027	Muusa goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi o vurtii lesdi Misira, o hulaay huunƴere laamiiɗo. O darii e semmbee kama gi'oowo Allah mo yi'ataake.
58011028	O goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi o jo'ini finaatawaa juulɗe Kuultol. O vi'i yimɓe Isiraa'iila molmana dammuɗe mu''en ƴiiƴam, gam to' kalkoowo meem ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe afɓe.
58011029	Isiraa'iila'en ngoonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi ɓe mbaawi huultugo Maayo Voɗeewo kama dow lesdi njo'orndi. Ammaa ngo nyaami Misira'en tokkoyɓe ɓaawo maɓɓe.
58011030	Isiraa'iila'en ngoonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi mahagol piliingol si'ire Jeriiko yibbi ɓaawo ɓe mbaɗii balɗe joveeɗiɗi eɓe piloo ngol.
58011031	Rahab furdu goonɗinii Allah, o jaɓɓake Isiraa'iila'en horooɓe lesdi nder jam. Kanjum waɗi o halkidaaka e ɓeen saliiɓe ɗowtanaago Allah.
58011032	Kaye ɓesdeymi vi'igo~? Wakkaci heƴataa yam mi volva dow Gidiyoon e Barak e Samson e Yefta e Dawda e Samaa'iila e annabo'en horiiɓe.
58011033	Ɓe fuu gada e goonɗinki ɓe konri lesɗe ɗuuɗɗe, ɓe njaalii ɗe, ɓe kuwi goonga, ɓe keɓi ko Allah vi'i no waɗaney ɓe, ɓe omndi konnduɗe mawɗi,
58011034	ɓe nyifi baawɗe yiite, ɓe ndaɗi mbelndi kaafahi. Ɓe ngalaa semmbee, ammaa ɓe cemmbiɗinaama. Ɓe laatii semmbiɗɓe nder konu, ɓe ndiiwi soojeeji lesɗe jananne.
58011035	Woɓɓe rewɓe keɓii maayɓe mu''en ummitinaama nder maayde. Woɓɓe boo torraama faa maayii, ɓe njaɓaay hisneego gam faa ɓe keɓa ummitineego nder foofaango ɓurngo vooɗgo.
58011036	Woɓɓe njaltiniraama, piiraama buulaalaaji, woɓɓe kaɓɓiraa geƴƴelle peraa nder kaso.
58011037	Woɓɓe perdaa kaaƴe faa maayii, woɓɓe taƴaa cende ɗiɗi, woɓɓe mbardaa kaafahi. Woɓɓe e ngiiloo koo toye e ɓornii lare baali e be'i, ɓe talkiɗi, ɓe torraama, ɓe pitinaama.
58011038	Ndu'u duuniyaaru fotanaay aadali'en ɓeen. Ɓe ngiilii nder ladde e nder baamle, ɓe njooɗii nder luurooji kaaƴe e nder gasɗe.
58011039	Yimɓe ɓeen fuu Allah manii ɓe gam goonɗinki maɓɓe, ammaa e noon fuu nder maɓɓe walaa keɓɗo ko Allah vi'i no hokkey ɓe.
58011040	Allah siryake goɗɗum ɓurɗum vooɗgo sabu meeɗen, gam to naa hawtaade e meeɗen ɓe laatataako heeɓɓe.
58012001	Caaydu'en goonɗinki ɗuuɗɓe e pilii en kama duule. Gam ma'ajum, enen maa sey kibinen koo ɗume ko teddanta jahal meeɗen, e hakke koyɗum taaraago e meeɗen. Sey nyaaren nyaardu ndu ndesanaaɗen e munyal kama daɗootirooɓe.
58012002	To' en ngoor raargo Yeesu omtanɗo en laawol goonɗingo Allah e kebbinoowo goonɗinki meeɗen. Kanko o munyanii maayde dow gaafagal, o yavii cemtuɗum ma'agal, gam o yi'ii belɗum mawɗum e reenti mo. Jo'oni emo toon jooɗii e junngo nyaamo jooɗorgal laamu Allah.
58012003	Nyumee dow ma'ako, kanko munyanɗo nganyaandi ndi waɗooɓe hakke kolli mo, gam to' on com, njoofon tammunde mooɗon.
58012004	Nder haɓre nde kaɓoton e hakke, on ndartaaki faa ƴiiƴam mooɗon rufi tawo.
58012005	Na on njeggitii bolle cemmbiɗinooje ɗe Allah volvani on kama ɓiɓɓe muuɗum~? O vi'i~: Ɓinngel am, ta'a yavo elto Jawmiraawo, to' ɓernde maaɗa mettu to o felii maa.
58012006	Gam Jawmiraawo e elta mo yiɗi, emo fiya koo moye mo o jaɓi kama ɓiyiiko.
58012007	Munyanee elto Allah ngoon, gam kango hollata Allah resii on ɓiɓɓe muuɗum. E woodi ɓiɗɗo mo baaba muuɗum eltataa ɗum naa~?
58012008	Kul on eltaaka, noon no baaba eltirta ɓiɓɓe muuɗum fuu, ndeen on laataaki ɓiɓɓe halal, on njaalu'en.
58012009	Baabiraaɓe meeɗen ɓe ɗo'o duuniyaaru e elta en, en mawnina ɓe boo. To noon, ɗume haɗata en ɓurgo jaɓgo elto Baaba meeɗen mo asama, gam poofen~?
58012010	Baabiraaɓe meeɗen e elta en wakkaci seɗɗa, kama no fotani ɓe. Ammaa Allah e elta en gam nafuuda meeɗen, faa kawten e ma'ako senaare.
58012011	Wakkaci elto, belɗum walaa, sey naawɗum. Ammaa ɓaawo ma'ajum ngo waddey jam e aadilaaku nder jo'onde eltaaɓe.
58012012	Gam ma'ajum cemmbiɗinee juuɗe mooɗon ŋooɗɗe, e koppi mooɗon ɗi ngalaa semmbee.
58012013	Tokkee laabi poortiiɗi, gam to' kosngal laƴoowal vonnito, ammaa ngal hoya.
58012014	Ngillee jam hakkunde mooɗon e yimɓe fuu, ngillooɗon senaare boo, gam to naa e ma'are walaa gi'eyɗo Jawmiraawo.
58012015	Kakkilanee ko'e mooɗon, gam to' goɗɗo vittu ɓaawo sooya barkaa Allah. To' on ngoor ɗaɗol kaaɗngol fuɗa, wadda torraa, ngol nyiddinira yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe e tooke ma'agol.
58012016	To' goɗɗo mooɗon laato baɗoowo njeenu, koo javiiɗo barkaa Allah, kama Isuwa coorruɗo darajja afaaku muuɗum, gam heɓa nyaama nde wo'ore tan.
58012017	On anndi ɓaawo ma'ajum, nde o yiɗi baaba ma'ako barkiɗina mo, o salaama. O yillake dabaree faa e gonɗi, no baaba ma'ako waylitirta nyumooji muuɗum, ammaa o waawaay.
58012018	Onon, on ngaraay to vaamnde meemeteende, kama Sinaay huɓɓunde yiite bolbolteynge, e to cuddi niɓɓundi, e niɓre, e henndu semmbiɗndu,
58012019	e duudaango luwal, e to olko voliinde woni. Nde yimɓe Isiraa'iila nani voliinde ndeen, ɓe torake to' ɗum ɓesdu volvango ɓe koo voliinde wo'ore,
58012020	gam ɓe mbaawaay munyango ko voliinde ndeen vi'i. Nde vi'i~: «~Koo to ɗum bisaa meemi vaamnde ndeen, ɗum ferdee kaaƴe faa ɗum waata.~»
58012021	Goonga, ko yi'aa ɗuum e hulnii, faa Muusa e hoore muuɗum vi'i~: «~Mi hulii korey, faa emi diwna.~»
58012022	Ammaa onon, on ngarii Vaamnde Siyoona e si'ire Allah mo yonki, waato si'ire Urusaliima nde dow, e to malaa'ika'en dubuuje dubuuje kawriti e mbelmbelta.
58012023	On ngarii to kawtal ɓiɓɓe Allah afɓe, ɓe ɗum vinndi inɗe mu''en toon dow. On ɓattake Allah cernaneyɗo yimɓe fuu, on ɓattake yonkiiji aadali'en laatinaaɓe heeɓɓe.
58012024	On ɓattake Yeesu narrinoowo yimɓe e Allah nder alkawal kesal. On ɓattake ƴiiƴam ma'ako misaaɗam mbolveyɗam haala mbooɗka ɓurka ka ƴiiƴam Habiila.
58012025	Gam ma'ajum kakkilee, to' on calo yewanaago bolvaneyɗo on. Gam to ɓeen saliiɓe yewanaago bagginɗo ɗum'en nder duuniyaaru kisaay, ndeen noye enen kisreten to en calake yewanaago baggineyɗo en gada dow~?
58012026	Wakkaci ɗuum voliinde ma'ako dimmbii lesdi, ammaa jo'oni o waɗii alkawal o vi'i~: «~Mi ɓesdey dimmbugo lesdi nde wo'ore tan. Wanaa lesdi tan ndimmbeymi, ammaa faa e dow.~»
58012027	Bolle «~nde wo'ore tan~» ɗeen, e kolla ko tagaa fuu no dimmbete, ɗum ittee, faa horoo ko dimmbataako.
58012028	Gam ma'ajum, ngettemma Allah, sabu en keɓey laamu ngu dimmbataako. En kuuran mo nder teddinki e kulol, noon no o yiɗiri,
58012029	gam Allah meeɗen o yiite nyaamooye.
58013001	Njahee yeeso e yiɗyiɗtirgo, sabu on banndiraaɓe.
58013002	To' on ngeebo dooka jaɓɓaago hoɗɓe, gam woɓɓe waɗɓe noon njaɓɓake malaa'ika'en, naa e anndugo ɓe malaa'ika'en.
58013003	To' on ngeggitan haɓɓaaɓe nder kaso, kama on kaɓɓidaama e maɓɓe. To' on ngeggitan torreteeɓe, kama on torridee e maɓɓe.
58013004	Sey koo moye fuu teddina koobgal, jogoroo alkawal ma'agal e senaare, gam Allah no sernaney lalwotooɓe e yeenooɓe fuu.
58013005	To' on ngoor yiɗde ceede aardanoo foofaango mooɗon, ammaa ndannganee dow ko ngoonɗon, gam Allah e hoore muuɗum vi'i~: «~Mi yeebataako ma, mi hibintaa ma faa abadaa.~»
58013006	Gam ma'ajum, en mbaawi vi'igo e ngorgu~: «~Jawmiraawo woni balloowo yam, mi hulataa koo ɗume~! Ɗume neɗɗo waɗanta yam.~»
58013007	Kiimtee aardiiɓe on, wa'ajinɓe on voliinde Allah. Ndaaree no foofaango maɓɓe heyniri, ngemminee goonɗinki maɓɓe.
58013008	Yeesu Almasiifu waylataako. Noon no o va'anoo keenya, noon o va'i hannde, e faa abadaa.
58013009	To' on njaɓ ekkitinooje jananne celna on laawol goonga. Gam ko ɓuri vooɗgo woni, semmbee ɓerɗe mooɗon iva e yiɗde Allah, wanaa gada e dookaaji dow nyaamdu ɗi nafaay tokkooɓe ɗi.
58013010	En ngoodi sakkirde nde huwooɓe nder Suudu Fottirde kokkaaka laawol nyaamgo ko woni dow muuɗum.
58013011	Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo Yahuudu'en e nattida yaayre ɓurnde senaago e ƴiiƴam bisaaji cakkaaɗi gam ittugo hakke, ammaa emo wula ɓalli bisaaji ɗiin yaasi koɗolle.
58013012	Kanjum waɗi Yeesu boo torraa yaasi si'ire, gam faa o laɓɓinira yimɓe gada e hakkeeji mu''en ƴiiƴam ma'ako.
58013013	Gam ma'ajum en njah to ma'ako yaasi koɗolle, nanden e ma'ako cemtuɗum ɗum o semtinaa.
58013014	Gam nder ndu'u duuniyaaru en ngalaa si'ire tabbitnde, ammaa en ngilloo si'ire wareynde.
58013015	Barkaa Yeesu en kokku Allah maaltooje meeɗen wakkaci fuu kama sadaka, waato caaydinen innde Yeesu e konnduɗe meeɗen.
58013016	To' on ngeebo waɗgo ko vooɗi e senndugo e woɓɓe ko ngoonɗon, gam iri sadakaaji ɗiin e mbeloo Allah.
58013017	Ɗowtanee aardiiɓe on, reenɓe yonkiiji mooɗon. Tokkee ko ɓe mbi'i on, gam ɓe toontoto Allah dow kuugal ngal ɓe kuwi. Ɗowtanee ɓe, gam faa ɓe kuwa kuugal maɓɓe nder velvelo, naa e mettam ɓeram, gam to ɓe kuwii nder mettam ɓeram ɗum nafataa on.
58013018	Mbaɗee do'aare gam amin. Min tabbitinii nyumooji ɓerɗe amin e laaɓi, emin ngoodi anniya waɗgo ko haani nder koo ɗume.
58013019	Ɓurna muuɗum, emi toroo on mbaɗon do'aare gam Allah hokka yam laawol so''oyaago to mooɗon jaawɗum.
58013020	Allah mo jam ummitinii Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu nder maayde. Yeesu woni gaynaako baali mawɗo, tabbitinirɗo alkawal ngal faa abadaa gada e ƴiiƴam muuɗum.
58013021	Allah oon laatina on heeɓɓe nder ko vooɗi fuu, ko ngoonɗon bukaata muuɗum, gam faa mbaɗon ko o yiɗi. O waɗa ko velata mo nder meeɗen gada e Yeesu Almasiifu. Teddungal laatanoo Yeesu faa abadaa abadin. Aamiin.
58013022	Banndiraaɓe am, emi toroo on njaɓee ɗe'e bolle cemmbiɗinooje e munyal. Seɗɗa tan mbinndanmi on.
58013023	Emi yiɗi anndingo on banndii en Timote vurtinaama nder kaso. To o warlayii to am, mi wardey e ma'ako to mooɗon.
58013024	Kinnanee min aardiiɓe on fuu, faa e seniiɓe Allah horiiɓe. Goonɗinɓe wonɓe lesdi Itaaliya e kinna on.
58013025	Barkaa Allah wondu e mooɗon on fuu~!
59001001	Miin Yaakuubu maccuɗo Allah e Jawmiraawo Yeesu Almasiifu, emi hinna on, onon leƴƴi sappo e ɗiɗi cankitiiɗi nder duuniyaaru.
59001002	Banndiraaɓe am, nanee belɗum nder torraaji feere-feere gareyɗi to mooɗon, njaɓee ɗi e velvelo manngo,
59001003	gam eɗon anndi to goonɗinki mooɗon godaama, ki rimey munyal.
59001004	Sey to munyal hebbinii kuugal muuɗum nder mooɗon, ndeen laatotooɗon heeɓɓe, ɓe ndullaay koo ɗume.
59001005	To goɗɗo nder mooɗon walaa hikima, sey o toroo Allah hokka mo ka, gam Allah o kokkoowo ko ɗuuɗɗi, mo vajataa.
59001006	Ammaa torotooɗo sey goonɗina, to' o waɗ ɓerɗe ɗiɗi, gam baɗeyɗo ɓerɗe ɗiɗi e nanndi e ɓoggi ndiyam ɗi henndu soggirta to ndu yiɗiri fuu.
59001007	Neɗɗo muuɗum, to' tammo e woodi ko heɓata to Jawmiraawo.
59001008	Nyumooji ma'ako cenndiri. Mo ɓerɗe ɗiɗi waawataa daraago e wo'ore.
59001009	Sey goonɗinɗo cooyɗo nana belɗum, to Allah mawninii ɗum.
59001010	Goonɗinɗo diskuɗo boo no nan belɗum to Allah leestinii ɗum. Gam diskuɗo nanndii e pihindi geene ndi neeɓataa.
59001011	To naange wulnge ummake, no yo'oriney geene ɗeen, pihindi ndiin ndi saamey, booɗal ma'ari fuu no halkey. Noon diskuɗo oon halkirta wakkaci o huufti kuuɗe ma'ako.
59001012	Barkaa laatanto munyanɗo torraaji, gam to o heɓii jaalorgal dow torraa kaan, Allah no hokkey mo giifol yonki ɗum faa abadaa, ngol o waɗi alkawal hokkugo yiɗaaɓe ma'ako.
59001013	To neɗɗo jarrabaama, to' o vi'~: Allah jarrabake yam. Gam Allah jarrabataake e halleende, o jarrabataako boo koo moye.
59001014	Ammaa jarrabeeji e nannga goɗɗo to suunooji ma'ako kalluɗi estii mo, nanngii mo.
59001015	To suunooji kalluɗi caawii, ɗi ndimey hakke. To hakke mawnii no rimey maayde.
59001016	Banndiraaɓe am ɓe ngiɗmi, to' on njaɓ majjineego.
59001017	Caahu mbooɗngu e kokkal geetal ko kokkaaɗen fuu, gada dow ɗum ivonoyi en, to Allah tagɗo jayli dow. Kanko o waylataako, o nanndaa e ɗowdi ngoseyndi.
59001018	E yiɗde ma'ako o danyitorii en e voliinde goongaare, gam laatooɗen afɓe tagle ma'ako.
59001019	Banndiraaɓe am ɓe ngiɗmi, pahamee ɗu'um~: sey koo moye yaawa nango, ammaa to' o yaaw volvugo, to' o yaaw huunƴugo boo.
59001020	Gam huunƴere neɗɗo huwataa aadilaaku ngu Allah yiɗi.
59001021	Gam ma'ajum, kibinee kuuɗe nyidduɗe e kalluɗe fuu. Leestinee ko'e mooɗon, njaɓon voliinde nde Allah aawi nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, waaweynde hisnugo on.
59001022	To' on estu ko'e mooɗon. Mbaɗee ko voliinde ndeen vi'i on, to' on laato nanooɓe nde tan.
59001023	Gam nanɗo voliinde Allah, ammaa waɗaay ko nde vi'i, nanndii e daarɗo yeeso muuɗum nder daarorgal,
59001024	yi'i no va'i, dilli, ɗoon e ɗoon yeggiti no va'i.
59001025	Ammaa kohoruɗo hakkiilo muuɗum dow dooka keeɓka, ndimɗineyka yimɓe, tokki ka, kanko naa o nanoowo ka tan o yeggita, ammaa emo waɗa ko ka vi'i o waɗa. Neɗɗo oon no heɓey barkaa nder kuugal ngal huwata fuu.
59001026	To goɗɗo e tammii no neɗɗo diina e goonga, ammaa o waawtaay ɗemngal ma'ako, o estii hoore ma'ako, diina ma'ako boo laatake mehere.
59001027	Diina ngoongaha laaɓka yeeso Allah Baabiraawo woni, vallugo maraaya'en e rewɓe torrotooɓe ɓe worɓe mu''en maayi, e reengo hoore muuɗum gada e tuhundi duuniyaaru.
59002001	Banndiraaɓe am, onon goonɗinɓe Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmu teddungal, to' on ɓurɗindir ɓiɓɓe-aadama.
59002002	To diskuɗo ɓorniiɗo kolte booɗɗe, mo jamngel jiinaariya e hohondu warii hawriinde mooɗon, cooyɗo ɓorniiɗo kolte ceesɗe boo warii,
59002003	to on teddinii ɓorniiɗo kolte booɗɗe, on njaɓɓake mo booɗɗum, on mbi'ii mo~: «~Jooɗa dow daago heso.~» Ammaa on mbi'ii cooyɗo~: «~Dara toon~», koo~: «~Jooɗa e lesdi.~»
59002004	To on mbaɗii noon, wanaa on ɓurdindirii yimɓe naa~? On laatake sernooɓe ɓe nyumooji kalluɗi.
59002005	Banndiraaɓe am ɓe ngiɗmi, ngewanee yam~! Wanaa sooyɓe ɓeen Allah suɓi nder duuniyaaru gam o laatina ɓe riskuɓe nder goonɗinki, ɓe ndona laamu ngu o waɗi alkawal hokkugo yiɗɓe mo naa~?
59002006	Ammaa onon, on njamnii cooyɗo oon. Wanaa ɗum riskuɓe torrata on naa~? Wanaa ɗum kamɓe njaharata on yeeso ceri'a naa~?
59002007	Wanaa kamɓe kuɗata innde Almasiifu vooɗnde nde noddirteeɗon naa~?
59002008	On mbaɗii booɗɗum to on ɗowtanake dooka laamu Allah ngonka nder Deftere mbi'ika~: «~Yiɗ ko'odiɗɗaawo maaɗa noon no ngiɗruɗaa hoore maaɗa.~»
59002009	Ammaa to on ɓurdindirii yimɓe on mbaɗii hakke, ceri'a boo nanngii on, gam on kuultii dooka.
59002010	Gam to neɗɗo ɗowtanake dooka kaan fuu, ammaa o fergake goɗɗum nder ma'aka, o laatake mo hakke dow dooka kaan fuu.
59002011	Gam Allah biiɗo~: «~Ta'a waɗ njeenu.~» Kanko boo vi'i~: «~Ta'a waɗ war-hoore.~» To a waɗaay njeenu, ammaa a waɗii war-hoore, a huultii dooka kaan fuu.
59002012	Gam ma'ajum, ngooree bolle mooɗon e kuuɗe mooɗon laatoo kama ɗe yimɓe serniranteeɓe dooka ndimɗinooha.
59002013	Gam nyannde ceri'a, Allah yurminantaa mo walaa yurmeende. Ammaa kolloowo yurmeende hulataa ceri'a.
59002014	Banndiraaɓe am, to goɗɗo vi'ii e woodi goonɗinki, ammaa kuuɗe ma'ako kollataa goonɗinki kiin, ɗume ki nafi~? Iri ki'i goonɗinki waawataa hisnugo mo.
59002015	To tawii a woodi banndiraawo goonɗinɗo gorko koo debbo kolɗo koo dolɗo,
59002016	to goɗɗo mooɗon vi'ii mo~: «~Yah jam, holtu, yar~», ammaa kul o hokkaay mo kolte koo nyaamdu, ɗume ɗum nafi mo~?
59002017	Goonɗinki e hoore muuɗum noon laatii, kul ki waldaa e kuuɗe booɗɗe ki baatki.
59002018	Goɗɗo e waawi vi'igo~: «~Aan a woodi goonɗinki, miin emi woodi kuuɗe booɗɗe.~» Mi toontoto mo~: «~Hollam goonɗinki maaɗa ki waldaa e kuuɗe booɗɗe. Miin boo mi hollu maa goonɗinki am nder kuuɗe.~»
59002019	A goonɗinii Allah no go'oto naa~? Booɗɗum~! Ginnaaji maa ngoonɗinii, faa eɗi ndiwna gam kulol~!
59002020	Aan kaaŋaaɗo~! A anndaa goonɗinki ki walaa kuuɗe no mehere naa~?
59002021	Wanaa gada e kuugal booɗngal Allah laatiniri maama meeɗen Ibraahim aadaliijo, nde o jaɓi sakkugo ɓiyiiko Iciyaaku dow sakkirde naa~?
59002022	A yi'ii, goonɗinki ma'ako e kuugal ma'ako njahadi, kadimaa kuugal ngaal hebbitii goonɗinki ma'ako.
59002023	Noon ko Deftere vi'i heeɓri, nde vi'i~: «~Ibraahim goonɗinii Allah, gam ma'ajum Allah limani mo ɗum aadilaaku, faa o noddiraa higoo Allah.~»
59002024	To noon on ngi'ii, gada e kuuɗe neɗɗo laatortoo aadaliijo, naa e goonɗinki muuɗum tan.
59002025	Noon boo Rahab furdu heɓri aadilaaku gada e kuuɗe booɗɗe ɗe o huwi, nde o jaɓɓii seewtooɓe Yahuudu'en, o valli ɓe vurtoraago laawol feere.
59002026	Noon no ɓanndu laatortoo maayndu to waldaa e poofɗe, noon boo goonɗinki laatortoo maayki to ki waldaa e kuuɗe booɗɗe.
59003001	Banndiraaɓe am, to' on ngoor ɗuuɗɓe mooɗon ndaara laataago ekkitinooɓe. Gam eɗon anndi minon ekkitinooɓe, min cernante ceri'a ɓurka ka yimɓe horiiɓe naawgo.
59003002	En fuu en mboofa nder laabi ɗuuɗɗi. To e woodi mo voofataa nder bolle muuɗum, o laatake neɗɗo keeɓɗo, baawɗo darvango ɓanndu muuɗum fuu.
59003003	Ndaaree, en mbaɗa lagambal nder honnduko puccu gam darvango ngu. Noon mbaawreten yaharugo ɓanndu ma'agu to ngiɗɗen fuu.
59003004	Kooƴemma boo misaalu akali ndiyam, no ki mawniri, e no keni cemmbiɗɗi laggirta ki fuu, e leltirgel pamarel pooɗoowo yaharirta ki to o yiɗi fuu.
59003005	Noon ɗemngal boo laatii. Ɗemngal no ku'ungel pamarel nder ɓanndu neɗɗo, ammaa engal mantoroo volvugo haalaaji mawɗi. Ndaaree ladde, no nde mawniri fuu, pe'etel yiite e waawi wulgo nde, nde fuu.
59003006	Ɗemngal boo no yiite. Engal saawi koo iri ndeye halleende, engal jooɗii nder ɓanndu neɗɗo, engal nyiddina ndu, ndu fuu. E yiite jahannama ngal huɓɓiraa, engal suma foofaango meeɗen.
59003007	Yimɓe e mbaawi darvango bisaaji feere-feere, e diiwe ladde e colli e ko dasoto e liƴƴi fuu.
59003008	Ammaa ɗemngal, walaa baawɗo darvango ɗum. Ɗemngal no kallungal. Ngal jooɗataako e wo'ore, engal heevi tooke barooje.
59003009	E ma'agal maaltirten Allah Jawmiraawo, Baaba meeɗen, e ma'agal boo kuɗreten yimɓe ɓe Allah tagi nder nanndi muuɗum.
59003010	Maaltooje e kuɗle nder honnduko wo'oto mburtoto. Banndiraaɓe am, naa noon haani.
59003011	Koo ndiyam mbelɗam e kaaɗɗam e mbaawi vurtaago ɓuldude wo'ore naa~?
59003012	Banndiraaɓe, dabinoohi rimataa jaaɓe. Barkehi boo rimataa dabiinooje. Noon boo, ɓuldude wo'ore waawataa ɓulnugo ndiyam mbelɗam e kaaɗɗam.
59003013	Moye nder mooɗon woodi hikima e fahamu~? Sey goonɗo ɗum holla ɗum nder jo'onde vooɗnde, e kuuɗe kuuraaɗe leestinki hoore e hikima.
59003014	Ammaa to e woodi nalwiiru hallundu e yiɗde hoore nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, to' on manto mbi'on on ngoodi hikima, noon ɗum feɓnugo goonga.
59003015	Iri ka'a hikima ivoyaay to Allah, ammaa to duuniyaaru e nyumooji neɗɗo e Ceyɗaan ka ivi.
59003016	Gam to nalwiiru e yiɗde hoore ngoni, ɗoon ciya potal e koo iri ɗeye kuuɗe kalluɗe tawetee.
59003017	Ammaa hikima ivoyka to Allah, aran fuu ka laaɓka. Kadimaa ka waddey jam, eka heevi moƴƴeendam, eka hawta enɗam, eka heevi yurmeende e kuuɗe booɗɗe. Iri hikima kaan ɓurdindirtaa yimɓe, munaafukaare boo walaa nder ma'aka.
59003018	Gaddoowo jam, aawi jam, no taƴey aadilaaku.
59004001	Toye kaɓe e jokkirli gonɗi nder mooɗon ivi~? Wanaa ɗi ivii e giɗaaɗi ɓalli kalluɗi kaɓooji nder ɓerɗe mooɗon naa~?
59004002	On ngiɗi heɓgo goɗɗum, on keɓataa ɗum. On mbaɗa war-hoore. On keevi koɗey, ammaa on keɓataa ko ngiɗɗon. On kaɓa, on njokkira. On keɓaay ɗum, gam on toraaki ɗum Allah.
59004003	Koo to on torake Allah on keɓataa, gam nyumooji mooɗon no kalluɗi, eɗon ngilloo ko velata ɓalli mooɗon tan.
59004004	Onon nyaamooɓe amaana~! On anndaa yiɗgo duuniyaaru ɗum wanygo Allah naa~? Giɗɗo ndu'u duuniyaaru laatinii hoore muuɗum ganyo Allah.
59004005	To' on nyum ko Deftere vi'i no mehere, nde vi'i~: «~Allah e ha'aji Ruhu mo o waɗi nder meeɗen korey.~»
59004006	Allah saahanake en caahu ɓurngu koo ɗume. Kanjum waɗi Deftere vi'i~: «~Allah e wanyi mawnitiiɓe, ammaa emo hokka leestinɓe ko'e mu''en caahu ma'ako.~»
59004007	Gam ma'ajum ɗowtanee Allah. Ndartee Ceyɗaan, ndeen o nyaarey on.
59004008	Ɓaditee Allah, kanko boo o ɓaditoto on. Laɓɓinee juuɗe mooɗon, onon ɓe hakke~! Laɓɓinee ɓerɗe mooɗon, onon ɓe ɓerɗe ɗiɗi~!
59004009	Mettinee ɓerɗe mooɗon, mboyee, pahatee. Jaleeɗe mooɗon koota bojji, velvelo mooɗon hoota mettam ɓeram.
59004010	Leestinee ko'e mooɗon yeeso Jawmiraawo, ndeen o ɓantey on.
59004011	Banndiraaɓe, to' koo moye mooɗon nyo' banndum. Nyo'ɗo banndum fuu, koo sernani mo, o nyo'ii Tawreeta, o sernanii ka. To o sernanii Tawreeta, naa o ɗowtantooɗo ka, ammaa o laatake cernanoowo ka.
59004012	Go'oto tan woni kokkoowo Tawreeta e cernoowo ka, kanko tan woodi baawɗe hisnugo e halkugo. Ammaa aan a moye, faa eɗa sernana banndaa~?
59004013	Kakkilee, onon vi'ooɓe~: Hannde koo jahango, min njahey ci'e feere, min mbaɗa hitaande toon, min mbaɗa luumaaku toon, min keɓa ceede.
59004014	On anndaa ko waɗata jahango. Noye yonki mooɗon va'i~? Yonki mooɗon e nanndi e cuurga mburtiika wakkaci seɗɗa tan, ka majja.
59004015	Raa no haani mbi'on~: To Allah jaɓii, yaharii yonki, min mbaɗey nihi e nihi.
59004016	Ammaa jo'oni eɗon mawnito, eɗon manto. Iri kan ɗoon manta ka kalluka.
59004017	To noon, annduɗo ko vooɗi fuu huwaay ɗum, o waɗii hakke.
59005001	Jo'oni ngewanee yam onon riskuɓe. Mboyee, ƴokee gam torraaji kalluɗi garaneyɗi on.
59005002	Jawdi mooɗon nyoli, kolte mooɗon mooƴi.
59005003	Jiinaariya e ajurfaari mooɗon puuni. Puunirka ma'ajum kam felata on, ka nyaama ɓalli mooɗon kama yiite. On kawritanii ko'e mooɗon jawdi nder ɗe'e balɗe ɗe duuniyaaru ɓadii timmugo.
59005004	Biya ka caliiɗon biyaago huwooɓe gese mooɗon wullake on~! Bojji taƴooɓe gese mooɗon ngarii e noppi Jawmiraawo jawmu baawɗe fuu.
59005005	On mbelnii jo'onde mooɗon nder duuniyaaru, on kaɗaay ko'e mooɗon koo ɗume. On paynii ko'e mooɗon kama jawɗi turkaaɗi gam nyannde hirseego.
59005006	On cernanii goonga'en, on mbarii ɓe, kamɓe boo ɓe ngeddaay on.
59005007	Banndiraaɓe, noon no demoowo munyrata gada iyoonde arande faa heltirde o taƴa, noon haani onon maa munyron faa Jawmiraawo vittoya.
59005008	Onon boo munyee, cemmbiɗinee ɓerɗe mooɗon, gam bittoyki Jawmiraawo ɓadake.
59005009	Banndiraaɓe, to' on mboymboytir, gam to' on cernanee. To' on njeggit Cernoowo woɗɗa, emo ɗoon darii e dammugal~!
59005010	Banndiraaɓe, kiimtee no annabo'en volvunooɓe e innde Jawmiraawo munyri nder torraaji. Onon boo, tokkee misaalu maɓɓe.
59005011	Eɗen mbi'a munyruɓe noon fuu no barkiɗinaaɓe. On nanii habaru munyal Ayyuuba, kadimaa on anndi ko Jawmiraawo hokki mo e timmoode, gam Jawmiraawo o keeɓɗo yurmeende e yiɗde.
59005012	Banndiraaɓe am, ko ɓuri fuu woni to' on kunoro dow, koo lees, koo koo ɗume. Ngooree «~ee~» mooɗon laatoo «~ee~», «~a'aa~» mooɗon laatoo «~a'aa~», gam to' ceri'a Allah nanngu on.
59005013	E woodi jareyɗo torraa nder mooɗon naa~? Too, o waɗ do'aare. E woodi naneyɗo belɗum nder mooɗon naa~? Too, o yim gimi maaltugo Allah.
59005014	E woodi mo yamɗaa nder mooɗon naa~? Too, o nodda darvanooɓe ikiliisiya, ɓe mooma mo nebbam e innde Jawmiraawo, ɓe mbaɗana mo do'aare.
59005015	Do'aare waɗaande e goonɗinki no hoyney mo yamɗaa oon, Jawmiraawo boo no umminey mo. To o waɗiino hakke maa, o ya'afetee.
59005016	Gam ma'ajum banndiraaɓe, ngeccootiree hakkeeji mooɗon, koo moye waɗana banndum do'aare, gam njamɗiton. Do'aare goongaajo e woodi baawɗe, ende huwa.
59005017	Iliya o neɗɗo kama meeɗen. Nde o waɗi do'aare e ti'inaare to' iyoonde toɓ, koo baadel yooftaaki dow lesdi, faa duuɓi tati e lebbi joveego'o.
59005018	Ɓaawo ma'ajum o ɓesdi waɗgo do'aare iyoonde toɓa, ndeen ndiyam toɓi, lesdi boo fuɗni barkaaji.
59005019	Banndiraaɓe am, to goɗɗo mooɗon selii laawol goonga, goɗɗo boo wartirii mo,
59005020	anndee gartirɗo baɗɗo hakke gada e laawol halkere, hisnii yonki ma'ako e maayde, hakkeeji ma'ako ɗuuɗɗi boo no mooytete.
60001001	Miin Biiturus lilaaɗo Yeesu Almasiifu vinndani on ngo'ol ɗereewol, onon suɓaaɓe Allah, laatiiɓe jananɓe, sankitiiɓe nder lesɗe Pontus e Galaatiya e Kapadookiya e Aasiya e Bitiniya.
60001002	Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen suɓii on dow anndaangal muuɗum. Ruhu ma'ako senii on, gam ɗowtanooɗon Yeesu Almasiifu, laaɓnireeɗon gada e ƴiiƴam ma'ako. Allah hokku on moƴƴere e jam ɗuuɗɗum~!
60001003	Maaltemma Allah, Baaba Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu gam o nanii yurmeende meeɗen korey, faa o hokki en yonki kesum gada e ummitineeki Yeesu Almasiifu nder maayɓe. Noon keɓruɗen tammunde goongaare.
60001004	En ndeenti heɓgo barkaaji ɗi Allah resani yimɓe muuɗum toon dow, to ɗi mbonataa, ɗi nyolataa, ɗi ngaylataako.
60001005	Gam on ngoonɗini Allah, o reenrey on baawɗe ma'ako, faa keɓon kisndam ɗam o siryii vannginango on nyannde-darngal.
60001006	Gam ma'ajum mbelmbeltee velvelo manngo, koo nde laatii ɗum kaanduɗum ɓerɗe mooɗon metta seɗɗa jo'oni, gam torraaji feere-feere ɗi torreteeɗon.
60001007	Torraaji ɗiin ngarii gam godaago goonɗinki mooɗon, kul no goongaahi. Koo jiinaariya, fii gutotooɗum, e yiite godortee. Goonɗinki mooɗon boo ɓurii jiinaariya teddungal piw. Sey ki godoree e torraaji ɗi torreteeɗon, gam keɓon yetteego e teddungal e manngu nyannde Yeesu Almasiifu vanngata.
60001008	Koo nde laatii on meeɗaay yi'igo Yeesu, eɗon ngiɗi mo. On ngi'ataa mo jo'oni, ammaa e noon fuu eɗon ngoonɗini mo. On keevii velvelo manngo ngo ɗiiftintaako,
60001009	gam on puɗɗii hewtugo ko ndaaroton gada e goonɗinki mooɗon, waato kisndam yonkiiji mooɗon.
60001010	Annabo'en waɗnooɓe annabaaku caahu ngu Allah waɗani on alkawal muuɗum, liinyi kisndam ɗaam, ndaarii ɗam e hakkiilo.
60001011	Ɓe ndaari heɓtugo ndeye ɗum waɗata, e noye ɗum wa'arata. Ruhu Almasiifu gonɗo nder maɓɓe anndinii ɓe, doole Yeesu Almasiifu torree ko hokka o heɓa teddungal.
60001012	Allah hollii ɓe habaru ɗuum laataaki gam ko'e maɓɓe, ammaa ɗum gam mooɗon. Jo'oni boo, wa'ajotooɓe Habaru Belɗum ngari, ngaddiranii on habaru ɗuum e baawɗe Ruhu Ceniiɗo ivoyɗo gada dow. Faa e malaa'ika'en e ko'e mu''en e ngiɗi fahamugo habaru ɗuum korey.
60001013	Gam ma'ajum, sey ciryooɗon nyumooji mooɗon gam kuugal, peeron gite mooɗon, ndeson tammunde mooɗon fuu dow barkaa ka keɓoton nyannde bannguki Yeesu Almasiifu.
60001014	Ɗowtanee Allah, to' on tokku suunooji ɗi ngonnooɗon nder muuɗum ila ko on anndaano goonga.
60001015	Noon no Allah nodduɗo on o ceniiɗo, onon boo laatee seniiɓe nder ko kuwoton fuu.
60001016	Gam ɗum vinndaama nder Deftere Seniinde~: «~Laatee seniiɓe, gam miin mi ceniiɗo.~»
60001017	Nder do'aare eɗon noddira Allah Baaba, kanko sernanta koo moye fuu deydey e kuugal muuɗum, mo senndindirtaa yimɓe. Gam ma'ajum, timminee balɗe koɗaaku koraniiɗe on nder duuniyaaru e kulol Allah.
60001018	Eɗon anndi on coottaama e finaatawaaji mehereeji ɗi tawɗon gada e maamiraaɓe mooɗon. On coottoraaka e fii de''oojum, kama ajurfaari koo jiinaariya,
60001019	ammaa Yeesu Almasiifu soottorii on e ƴiiƴam muuɗum caɗɗam, kanko nannduɗo e njawdiri laaɓndi, ndi walaa liddaari koo go'otum.
60001020	Allah siryake mo ila duuniyaaru tagaaka, ammaa o vannginii mo nder ɗe'e balɗe cakitiiɗe gam mooɗon.
60001021	Gam ma'ako ngoonɗinɗon Allah, ummitinɗo mo gada maayde, mawninii mo boo. To noon, goonɗinki mooɗon e tammunde mooɗon fuu e ɗoon resii to Allah.
60001022	Gada e tokkugo goonga cenruɗon ko'e mooɗon, faa mbaawɗon yiɗgo banndiraaɓe nder goonɗinki e yiɗde goongaare. Gam ma'ajum ngiɗngiɗtiree korey e ɓernde laaɓnde.
60001023	On ndanyaama danyeeki kesi, wanaa gada e lenyol maayoowol, ammaa gada e lenyol ngol maayata, waato voliinde Allah nde yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
60001024	Gam ma'ajum Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: Ɓiɓɓe-aadama fuu nanndi e huɗo, teddungal maɓɓe boo nanndi e pihindi. Huɗo e yo'ora, pihindi e saama,
60001025	ammaa voliinde Jawmiraawo sottataa faa abadaa. Voliinde ndeen woni Habaru Belɗum ɗum nga'ajinaaɗon.
60002001	Gam ma'ajum, kibinee koo iri ndeye halleende, e fewre, e munaafukaare, e nalwiiru, e nyo'ore fuu.
60002002	Kama no ɓikkon keccon ngiɗiri kosam ɗam walaa jillo, noon onon boo haani ngiɗron voliinde Allah laaɓnde, gam faa nde mawnina on, njottooɗon e heɓgo kisndam.
60002003	Gam Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~On meeɗii mbooɗeenga Jawmiraawo.~»
60002004	Ɓaditee Yeesu, gam kanko woni haayre nde yonki nde mahooɓe kibini, ammaa Allah suɓii nde, nde vooɗnde yeeso muuɗum.
60002005	Onon boo, laatee kama kaaƴe ɗe yonki maharuɗe Wuro Allah Seniingo, laatooɗon kawtal aardiiɓe diina seniiɓe, waɗanooɓe Allah sadakaaji ruhu, ɗi o jaɓata gada e Yeesu Almasiifu.
60002006	Gam Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Mi suɓii haayre ɓurdunde, laatiinde fuɗɗoode mahadi wuro am. Mi resey nde nder si'ire Siyoona. Goonɗinɗo haayre ndeen fuu semtintaake sam.~»
60002007	Haayre ndeen e laatii teddunde to mooɗon, onon goonɗinɓe. Ammaa ɓeen ɓe ngoonɗinaay nde, Deftere vi'ii ɓe~: «~Haayre nde mahooɓe kibini, kayre laatii haayre ɓurnde jogaago mahadi,
60002008	ɗum haayre fergoore yimɓe, e haayre do''oore ɓe.~» Yimɓe pergake nde, gam ɓe calake tokkugo bolle Allah, kanjum woni ko Allah siryaninoo ɓe.
60002009	Ammaa onon ngoni jama'aare suɓaande, kawtal aardiiɓe diina Laamiiɗo, lenyol ceniingol, yimɓe ɓe Allah suɓani hoore muuɗum. O suɓii on gam nga'ajinon habaru kuuɗe ma'ako booɗɗe, kanko nodduɗo on nder niɓre, ngarɗon nder jayngol ma'ako kaayniingol~!
60002010	Ndeenno wanaa on yimɓe Allah, ammaa jo'oni on laatake lenyol ma'ako. Ndeenno on keɓaayno yurmeende ma'ako, ammaa jo'oni on keɓii yurmeende ma'ako.
60002011	Yiɗaaɓe am, on laatii hoɗɓe e jananɓe nder ndu'u duuniyaaru. Gam ma'ajum emi toroo on ceedon e giɗaaɗi ɓerɗe mooɗon, gillotooɗi halkugo yonkiiji mooɗon dum.
60002012	Kollee gikku mbooɗngu nder yimɓe heeferɓe, gam koo to ɓe noddirii on halluɓe, e noon fuu doole ɓe ngi'a kuuɗe mooɗon booɗɗe, ɓe teddina Allah nyannde o vanngani ɓe.
60002013	Gam daliila Jawmiraawo, ɗowtanee aardiiɓe duuniyaaru~: gada laamiiɗo ɓurɗo manngu,
60002014	faa e gomna'en ɓe o liloyi, gam ɓe cernana waɗooɓe ko boni, ɓe mana waɗooɓe ko vooɗi.
60002015	Gam nyumo Allah woni cuumon konnduɗe yimɓe ɓe ngalaa ƴoyre, volvooɓe bolle mehereeje, gada e kuuɗe mooɗon booɗɗe.
60002016	Onon on rimɓe, ammaa to' on ngartir ndimaaku mooɗon laato hujja huugo halleende, sey njooɗooɗon jo'onde holleynde on maccuɓe Allah.
60002017	Teddinee yimɓe fuu, ngiɗee banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe, kulee Allah, teddinee mawɗo lesdi.
60002018	Onon maccuɓe, ɗowtanee jawmiraaɓe mooɗon, teddinee ɓe. To' on ɗowtano ɓe gikku mbooɗngu, koo moƴƴuɓe tan, ammaa faa e sa'atuɓe boo.
60002019	Jarɗo torraa wanaa gam layfi muuɗum, to o munyii gam Allah, o waɗii ko vooɗi.
60002020	To on piyaama gam on mbaɗi layfi, koo to on munyi, ɗume mantortooɗon~? Ammaa to on munyii torraaji keɓɗi on nder kuugal mooɗon booɗngal, ndeen Allah no barkiɗiney on.
60002021	Iri torraaji ɗiin Allah noddiri on, gam Almasiifu boo torraama sabu mooɗon. O ɗalanii on misaalu gam tokkon kosɗe ma'ako.
60002022	O meeɗaay waɗgo hakke, fewre boo meeɗaay vurtaago e honnduko ma'ako.
60002023	Nde ɓe kuɗi mo, o huɗtaaki ɓe, nde ɓe torri mo, o wa'ataaki ɓe. Ammaa o halfini hoore ma'ako Allah, cerniroowo goonga.
60002024	Almasiifu roondake hakkeeji meeɗen dow ɓanndu muuɗum wakkaci o ɓilaa dow gaafagal, gam ceeden e hakke, poofen nder aadilaaku. «~Gada e nawnanɗe ma'ako keɓɗon hoyneego.~»
60002025	On laatinoo kama baali kalkuɗi, ammaa jo'oni on ngartiraama to gaynaako, deeneyɗo yonkiiji mooɗon.
60003001	Onon rewɓe ɗowtanee worɓe mooɗon, gam koo to ɓe tokkaay voliinde Allah, gikku mooɗon mbooɗngu e waawi waylitoygo ɓe, koo to on mbolvanaay ɓe voliinde Allah koo wo'ore,
60003002	gam ɓe ngi'ey no kuuɗe mooɗon laaɓri e no teddinirton ɓe.
60003003	To' mbooɗndam mooɗon laato ɗam ɓanndu tan, kama mooraago, e haɓɓugo koɗi jiinaariya, e ɓornaago kolte booɗɗe,
60003004	ammaa ngooree mbooɗndam mooɗon laatoo ɗam ɓernde, waato ɓernde nde munyal e jam. Kanjam woni mbooɗndam tabbitoojam, ɓurɗam yeeso Allah.
60003005	Bana nii rewɓe seniiɓe ndeenno kolliri mbooɗndam mu''en e resgo tammunde maɓɓe e Allah, ɓe ɗowtanii worɓe maɓɓe.
60003006	Noon Saaratu ɗowtoranii koree muuɗum Ibraahim, faa o noddiri mo jawmiiko. Onon boo, on laatake ɓiɓɓe Saaratu, kul on kuwii ko vooɗi, on kulaay saaydingo goonɗinki mooɗon.
60003007	Onon worɓe boo, njooɗodee e rewɓe mooɗon noon no haani. Anndee, semmbee debbo fotaa e ɗum gorko. Teddinee ɓe, gam onon e maɓɓe fuu on keɓii barkaa ngo'ota, waato yonki ɗum faa abadaa. Mbaɗee ɗum, gam to' goɗɗum haɗ do'aaje mooɗon.
60003008	Jo'oni kam, sey nyumo mooɗon laatoo wo'oto, njurmindiree, ngiɗngiɗtiree e yiɗde mbanndiraagu, mballindiree, leestinee ko'e mooɗon.
60003009	To' on mba'atoro halleende e halleende, koo kuɗdi e kuɗdi, ammaa mba'atoree barkaa, gam ma'ajum Allah noddi on faa keɓon barkaa.
60003010	Gam Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Giɗɗo foofaango vooɗngo, e velvelo nder balɗe muuɗum, sey o woora bolle kalluɗe, o woora fewre boo.
60003011	O woora huugo ko halli, o waɗa ko vooɗi~: o yillo jam, o yilloo ɗum e ɓernde ma'ako fuu.
60003012	Gam gite Jawmiraawo e cutii goonga'en dum, emo yewanii do'aaje maɓɓe, ammaa emo wanyi waɗooɓe ko halli.~»
60003013	Moye torrata on kul on ti'inii huugo ko vooɗi~?
60003014	Ammaa on barkiɗinaaɓe to yimɓe torrii on gam huugo ko vooɗi. To' on kul yimɓe ɓeen, to' hakkiilooji mooɗon njiiɓo~!
60003015	Teddinee Almasiifu nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, gam o Jawmiraawo mooɗon. Sey wakkaci fuu ciryooɗon toontaago ƴamooɓe on daliila tammunde mooɗon.
60003016	Ammaa toontoree ɓe e leestinki hoore, mawninee ɓe, to' nyumooji ɓerɗe mooɗon pel on. Ndeen yimɓe ɓeen, hallinooɓe kuuɗe mooɗon booɗɗe ɗe kuwoton gam on tokkii laawol Almasiifu, no cemtey.
60003017	Torreego gam kuugal booɗngal, to ɗum nyumo Allah, ɓurii torreego gam kuugal kallungal.
60003018	Gam Almasiifu e hoore muuɗum torraama, faa o maayi gam hakkeeji yimɓe fuu, nde wo'ore faa abadaa. Kanko mo walaa hakke, o maayanii yimɓe ɓe hakke, gam o ɓattina on to Allah. O waraama e ɓanndu ma'ako, o ummitinaama e Ruhu.
60003019	E Ruhu oon Yeesu yahi, wa'ajiniroyi yonkiiji maayɓe omndaaɗi nder kaso.
60003020	Yonkiiji ɗiin ngoni yimɓe salinooɓe tokkugo Allah nder jaamaniiru Nuhu. Wakkaci ɗuum, Allah munyanii ɓe faa Nuhu sehi akali makki. Ammaa yimɓe seɗɗa tan natti akali kiin, waato yimɓe njoveetato, kisi ndiyam ɗaam.
60003021	Ndiyam ɗaam e laatii misaalu ko sappinta on baptisma ila ɗum waraay. Gada e ma'ajum kisɗon jo'oni. Baptisma ɗuum laataaki gam ittugo tuhundi ɓanndu, ammaa gam waɗgo alkawal tokkugo Allah e nyumo ɓernde laaɓngo. Gada e ummitineeki Yeesu Almasiifu baptisma hisnirta on.
60003022	Kanko ƴeentuɗo dow, emo jooɗii e junngo Allah nyaamo, malaa'ika'en e laamiiɓe e baawɗeeji asama fuu ɗowtanake mo.
60004001	Nde laatii Almasiifu torraama nder ɓanndu, onon boo sey ciryooɗon ɓerɗe mooɗon ndartanooɗon torraaji kama Almasiifu. Gam torriiɗo nder ɓanndu seedi e hakke.
60004002	To noon, gada jo'oni faa timmoode balɗe mooɗon nder duuniyaaru, tokkee ko Allah yiɗi, ngooree tokkugo giɗaaɗi ɓanndu.
60004003	Jo'onde nde njooɗinooɗon nder ko yimɓe heeferɓe kuwata heƴi. On njooɗakeno nder njeenu e tokkugo giɗaaɗi ɓanndu e yare-yare e pijirle kalluɗe e tokkugo gumkiiji, fii nyidduɗum.
60004004	Jo'oni ɗum haaynake ɓe korey gam on ɗalii hawtugo e maɓɓe nder kuuɗe kalluɗe, kanjum waɗi eɓe njaasna on dum.
60004005	Ammaa ɓe ndaroyto yeeso Allah, ɓe ngeccoo mo ko ɓe mbaɗi fuu, gam Allah siryake sernango maayɓe e foofooɓe fuu.
60004006	Kanjum waɗi faa e maayɓe nga'ajinaa Habaru Belɗum, koo nde laatii ɓe maayi, kama no yimɓe fuu maayrata, e noon fuu ɓe poofey noon no Allah foofrata.
60004007	Timmoode ku'uje fuu ɓadake. Gam ma'ajum, kakkilee, ndeenee ko'e mooɗon, gam mbaawon waɗgo do'aare.
60004008	Ko ɓuri manngu fuu woni, ngiɗngiɗtiron e ɓernde wo'ore, gam yiɗde e ya'afoo hakkeeji ɗuuɗɗi.
60004009	Njaɓɓee hoɗɓe nder gure mooɗon e velvelo, naa e hissa.
60004010	Allah hokkii koo moye mooɗon fuu kokkal muuɗum. Kuutiniree kokke ɗeen gam nafron ɗe woɓɓe, ndeen on laatake reennaaɓe kokke Allah vooɗɓe.
60004011	Ga'ajotooɗo, sey wa'ajina bolle Allah tan. Balloowo woɓɓe boo, sey vallira ɓe e semmbee ɗum Allah hokki ɗum. Gam Allah teddinee nder kuuɗe ɗeen fuu gada e Yeesu Almasiifu. Teddungal e baawɗe laatanoo mo faa abadaa~! Aamiin~!
60004012	Yiɗaaɓe am, to' torraa ngareyka to mooɗon gam godaago on, haayno on. Koo to ka naawri ba yiite, to' on ndaar ka kama ka haanaa heɓgo on.
60004013	Ammaa nanee belɗum to on kawtii e Yeesu Almasiifu nder torraaji, faa keevon velvelo ngo walaa keerol to teddungal ma'ako vanngi.
60004014	Barkaa laatanto on, to yimɓe njaltinirii on gam innde Yeesu Almasiifu, gam e ɗum holla Ruhu tedduɗo, waato Ruhu Allah, e wondi e mooɗon.
60004015	To' koo go'oto nder mooɗon yar torraa gam o baɗoowo war-hoore, koo gujjo, koo kuwoowo ko vooɗaa, koo nattoowo ko walanaa ɗum.
60004016	Ammaa to goɗɗo mooɗon torraama gam o tokkuɗo Yeesu, to' o nan cemtuɗum, ammaa sey o yetta Allah gam o raaraama tokkuɗo Almasiifu.
60004017	Wakkaci Allah sernanta yimɓe ɓadake, o fuɗɗirey yimɓe ma'ako tawo. To o fuɗɗirii en, enen, ndeen ɗume laatanto ɓeen saliiɓe jaɓgo Habaru Allah Belɗum~?
60004018	Gam Deftere vi'i~: «~To kisndam saɗanii goongaajo, ndeen ɗume laatantoo yimɓe ɓe ngoonɗinaay Allah e waɗooɓe hakke~?~»
60004019	Gam ma'ajum, torraaɓe dow nyumo Allah fuu, sey ɓe ti'inoo waɗgo kuuɗe booɗɗe, nder halfingo ko'e maɓɓe e Allah tagoowo, kebbinoowo alkawal muuɗum.
60005001	Miin Biiturus, emi toroo on, onon darvanooɓe goonɗinɓe, gam miin boo mi aardiiɗo goonɗinɓe, caayduujo torraaji Yeesu Almasiifu. Kadimaa boo, ɗo'o yeeso mi heɓey geɗal nder teddungal ma'ako nyannde o vittoyi. Gam ma'ajum, emi toroo on~:
60005002	ndeenee ikiliisiya ka Allah reenni on, kama no gaynaako reenrata baali muuɗum. To' on ndeenru ka doole, ammaa e ɓernde laaɓnde kama no Allah yiɗiri. To' on kuu ɗum gam heɓgo ceede e laabi leliiɗi, ammaa kuuree ɗum e ɓernde laaɓnde.
60005003	To' on kollu manngu dow yimɓe ɓe Allah hokki on, ammaa laatanee ɓe misaalu ɗum ɓe tokkata.
60005004	Ndeen to Gaynaako Mawɗo oon vanngi, on keɓey giifol manngu ngol waylataako faa abadaa.
60005005	Onon boo kaye'en, ɗowtanee mawɓe. On fuu, kollindiree leestinaare nder kuuɗe mooɗon, gam Deftere Seniinde vi'i~: «~Allah e wanyi mawnitiiɓe, ammaa emo hokka leestinɓe ko'e mu''en caahu ma'ako.~»
60005006	Gam ma'ajum leestinee ko'e mooɗon yeeso Allah Jawmu baawɗe, gam o ɓanta on nder wakkaci ɗum o suɓi.
60005007	Kokkee Allah ɓillaaje mooɗon fuu, gam emo reeni on.
60005008	Kakkilee, ndeenee ko'e mooɗon gam ganyo mooɗon Ceyɗaan e ɗoon yiiloo kama mawndu veelaandu, o ɗoon yilloo mo o nyaami.
60005009	Ndartee mo, cemmbiɗee nder goonɗinki mooɗon, gam eɗon anndi banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe nder duuniyaaru fuu e ɗoon njara torraaji iri ɗi torreteeɗon.
60005010	To on torraama wakkaci seɗɗa fuu, ndeen Allah mo yiɗde nodduɗo on, gam natton teddungal muuɗum tabbitngal nder kawtal e Yeesu Almasiifu, kanko o laatiney on timmuɓe, o semmbiɗiney on, o tabbitina on, o waɗa ndarooɗon e semmbee.
60005011	Baawɗe tabbitana mo faa abadaa~! Aamiin.
60005012	Siilas mo ndesmi no banndiraawo koolniiɗo, valli yam vinndango on ngo'ol ɗereewol damungol. Mi vinndii ngol gam mi holla on ko woni caahu Allah goongajum. Cemmbiɗee nder caahu nguun~!
60005013	Jama'aare goonɗinɓe wonɓe lesdi Babiila, ɓe Allah suɓi noon no o suɓri on, kinnii on. Markus boo laatiiɗo ɓiyam nder goonɗinki hinnii on.
60005014	Kinnindiree e hinnoore kama nde yiɗruɓe. Jam wondu e mooɗon, onon hawtuɓe e Yeesu Almasiifu~!
61001001	Ngo'ol ɗereewol ivii to am, miin Simon Biiturus, maccuɗo Yeesu Almasiifu e lilaaɗo ma'ako. Emi hinna on, onon heɓɓe goonɗinki ki darajja iri ki min keɓi. En keɓrii goonɗinki kiin gada e aadilaaku Yeesu Almasiifu, Allah meeɗen e kisnoowo en.
61001002	Anndal ngal annduɗon Allah e Yeesu Jawmiraawo meeɗen ɓesdan on barkaa e jam.
61001003	Allah hokkii en koo ɗume ko nafata en nder foofaango meeɗen iri ngo ɗowtaniiɓe mo. O hokkirii en ɗum e baawɗe ma'ako e anndugo mo, kanko nodduɗo en kawten e ma'ako teddungal e mbooɗirka.
61001004	Noon o wa'arani en alkawalji mawɗi booɗɗi. O waɗii ɗi gam laatooɗon hawtuɓe e ma'ako nder tabiya ma'ako, kison suunooji kalluɗi gonɗi nder duuniyaaru.
61001005	Gam ma'ajum, ti'inee ɓesdon mbooɗirka dow goonɗinki mooɗon, dow mbooɗirka ɓesdon anndugo Allah,
61001006	dow anndal ɓesdon reengo hoore, dow reengo hoore ɓesdon munyal, dow munyal ɓesdon ɗowtanaago Allah,
61001007	dow ɗowtanaago Allah ɓesdon yiɗgo banndiraaɓe, dow yiɗgo banndiraaɓe boo, ɓesdon yiɗde goongaare.
61001008	To faa iri ɗi'i gikkuuji e ngoodi nder mooɗon, to faa eɗi ɓesdoo nder mooɗon dum, ɗi laatiney on ti'iniiɓe, yahooɓe yeeso nder anndugo Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu.
61001009	Ammaa mo walaa iri ngun ɗoon gikku fuu, laatake bumɗo mo yi'ataa to woɗɗi. O yeggitii Allah laɓɓiniino mo gada e hakkeeji ma'ako kihiɗi.
61001010	Gam ma'ajum onon banndiraaɓe, ti'inee jogaago noddoore nde Allah noddi on, e cuɓol ngol o suɓi on. To on mbaɗii noon, on ndo''ataako sam~!
61001011	Noon keɓroton laawol nattugo laamu tabbitngu ngu Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu kisnoowo en.
61001012	Mi tokkey hiimtingo on habaru ɗuum wakkaci fuu, koo nde laatii on anndi ɗum, on tabbitii boo nder goonga ka njaɓɗon.
61001013	To faa emi foofa, mi nyumii e haani mi findina hakkiilooji mooɗon gada e hiimtingo on habaru ɗuum.
61001014	Emi anndi mi ɓadake ɗalgo duuniyaaru, kama ko Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu anndinnoo yam.
61001015	Gam ma'ajum mi waɗey ko mbaawmi fuu gam kiimtooɗon habaru ɗuum ɓaawo maayde am.
61001016	Nde min anndini on garol Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu e baawɗe muuɗum, min anndiniraay on ɗum e tahaleeji yimɓe. Ammaa min ngi'ii teddungal ma'ako e gite amin.
61001017	Daahir, Allah Baabiraawo hokkii mo teddungal e manngu. Wakkaci ɗuum Allah mo teddungal manngal vi'i~: «~O'o woni Ɓiyam giɗaaɗo mo naneymi belɗum muuɗum.~»
61001018	Minon e ko'e amin, min nanii voliinde ndeen ivoynde dow, nde min ngondunoo e ma'ako dow vaamnde seniinde.
61001019	Ɗum semmbiɗinii goonɗinki meeɗen dow ko annabo'en mbi'inoo ndeenno. E haani ngewanooɗon bolle maɓɓe, gam ɗe laatanoo on kama fitila njaynotooka nder niɓre. Tokkee ka faa veeta. Ndeen hoodere fajiri no ɗelkey nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
61001020	Emi yiɗi anndon laaɓɗum, walaa baawɗo fassaraago defte annabo'en e hoore muuɗum noon no yiɗiri.
61001021	Gam walaa annabaaku meeɗi iɓgo e nyumo neɗɗo, ammaa Ruhu Ceniiɗo, kam hokki annabo'en baawɗe volvugo ko Allah vi'i ɓe.
61002001	Noon no annabo'en fevooɓe ngardunoo nder lenyol Isiraa'iila ndeenno, noon boo ekkitinooɓe fevooɓe mbanngirta nder mooɗon. Ɓe ngaddaney on ekkitinol fewre kalkoowol, faa ɓe njedda Jawmiraawo coottiiɗo ɓe. Noon ɓe pooɗranta ko'e maɓɓe halkere yaawnde.
61002002	Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe no tokkey kuuɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe. Ɓe laatoto daliila hallingo laawol goonga.
61002003	Koɗey ceede no waɗey ɓe ekkitina on habaruuji peve gam ɓe nyaamra on riiba. Ammaa ceri'a maɓɓe taƴaama ilaa, halkere boo e ɗoon reenti ɓe.
61002004	Koo malaa'ika'en ndeenno waɗɓe hakke maa, Allah wooraay ɓe ɓe eltaaka. O ferii ɓe nder yiite jahannama. O haɓɓirii ɓe sarkaaji nder niɓre. Eɓe ndeenti nyannde ceri'a.
61002005	Koo yimɓe duuniyaaru ndeenno boo, Allah wooraay ɓe, ɓe eltaaka. Ammaa o rufii ndiyam ƴufaana dow yedduɓe Allah, o hisni Nuhu ga'ajinoowo goonga, kam e yimɓe njoveeɗiɗo tan.
61002006	Kadimaa Allah sernanii ci'e Sodoma e Gomora, halkirii ɗe yiite, ɗe laatii ndo'oka, gam halluɓe fuu ngi'a ko tammii heɓgo ɗum'en.
61002007	O hisnii Luutu neɗɗo goongaajo, gam halleende yimɓe ci'e ɗeen mettinii ɓernde Luutu korey.
61002008	Luutu goongaajo oon, jooɗake nder yimɓe halluɓe. Nyalaande fuu ɓernde ma'ako e naawa korey, gam kuuɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe ɗe o yi'ata e ɗe o nanata.
61002009	To noon, Jawmiraawo e anndi no hisnirta ɗowtaniiɓe mo e torraaji mu''en. Emo anndi boo no o jogortoo halluɓe faa nyannde ceri'a,
61002010	ɓurna muuɗum ɓeen tokkuɓe giɗaaɗi ɓalli mu''en e yaviiɓe manngu Jawmiraawo. Ɓe'e ekkitinooɓe fevooɓe, ɓe cemtataa sam, ɓe mawnitii ɓe, ɓe kulataa huɗgo koo mawɓe asama.
61002011	Koo malaa'ika'en ɓurɓe ekkitinooɓe ɓeen semmbee e baawɗe, kuɗataa mawɓe ɓeen yeeso Jawmiraawo.
61002012	Ammaa ɓe'e yimɓe, ɓe tokkii tabiya maɓɓe, ɓe ngalaa hakkiilo kama diiwe ladde dimaaɗe gam nanngee mbaree. Eɓe ɗoon kuɗa ɗuum ko ɓe pahamaay. Allah no halkey ɓe kama diiwe ladde.
61002013	Ɓe mbiyorte halleende nde ɓe kallirannoo woɓɓe. Eɓe nana belɗum waɗgo giɗaaɗi ɓalli maɓɓe kalluɗi, faa e yeeso gite yimɓe. Eɓe nyaamda e mooɗon, eɓe nana belɗum majjingo on. Jo'onde maɓɓe e laatii semtunde.
61002014	Raartugo rewɓe yeenooɓe tan woni nyumo maɓɓe dum, ɓe comataa waɗgo hakke sam. Eɓe majjina ɓe goonɗinki mu''en semmbiɗaa. Ɓerɗe maɓɓe keevii koɗey ceede. Daahir eɓe nder la'anoore Allah.
61002015	Ɓe celii laawol goonga, ɓe kalki, ɓe tokkii laawol Balaama ɓii Beyor, giɗɗo waɗgo halleende gam heɓa ceede.
61002016	Ammaa o felaama dow boofol ma'ako. Njaakiwa nga meeɗaay volvugo, volvanii mo e voliinde neɗɗo, nga haɗi mo waɗgo vemmbere ndeen.
61002017	Ɓe'e ekkitinooɓe fevooɓee nanndi e ɓulli ɗi ngalaa ndiyam, e duule ɗe henndu soggata. Allah siryake niɓre ɓaleere kurum gam maɓɓe.
61002018	Eɓe mantoroo bolle mehereeje. Eɓe ngilloo huutinirgo suunooji kalluɗi gam ɓe esta yimɓe vurtoynooɓe nder ɓe anndaa Allah ko neeɓaay.
61002019	Eɓe mbi'a, ɓe'e yimɓe no laatoto rimɓe, ammaa kamɓe e ko'e maɓɓe ɓe maccuɓe hakke, gam ko jaalii neɗɗo fuu, laatinii mo maccuɗo ma'ajum.
61002020	To goɗɗo e anndi Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu, faa o heɓii hisneego e baawɗeeji duuniyaaru kalkooji. Ndeen o vittii nder ma'aji, faa ɗi njaalii mo. Daahir timmoode ma'ako no ɓurey fuɗɗoode ma'ako hallugo.
61002021	Kul iri ɓe'e yimɓe anndaayno laawol goonga maa, daa ɗum ɓuraniino ɓe, dow e anndugo ngol, ndeen vitta ɓaawo, woora tokkugo dooka ceniika ka ɓe kokkaa.
61002022	Ko ɓe mbaɗi, fotii deydey e balndol bi'ingol~: «~Kareeru tuuti, so''ake tahii tuutam muuɗum.~» E bi'ingol kadimaa~: «~Ngaduwa lootaanga so''ake tallake nder loɓokke.~»
61003001	Yiɗaaɓe am, ngo'ol woni ɗereewol am ɗiɗaɓol ngol mbinndanmi on. Nder ɗereeji am ɗiɗi ɗiin fuu, mi raari hiimtingo on ko ekkitinooɗon, gam mi findina nyumooji mooɗon booɗɗi.
61003002	Emi yiɗi kiimtooɗon bolle ɗe annabo'en seniiɓe mbolvunoo ila ndeenno. Kiimtee boo ekkitinol Jawmiraawo meeɗen kisnoowo ngol lilaaɓe ngaddani on.
61003003	Aran fuu emi yiɗi anndon~: Nder balɗe timmoode duuniyaaru, tokkuɓe giɗaaɗi ɓalli mu''en no ngarey. Ɓe njaltinira on,
61003004	ɓe mbi'ey~: «~Yeesu waɗaniino on alkawal no wartey, ee toye mo~? Goonɗinɓe aartuɓe en maayii ilaa, ammaa fii fuu e ɗoon noon no wontiri, ila fuɗɗam duuniyaaru faa hannde.~»
61003005	Yimɓe ɓeen calake anndugo ka'a goonga~: Ndeenno, Allah tagirii dow e lees e voliinde muuɗum. O tagiri lesdi e ndiyam, o vurtini ndi e ndiyam.
61003006	Gada e ndiyam ƴufaana boo, Allah halkirnoo duuniyaaru ndeenno.
61003007	Jo'oni boo, dow e lees ko ngi'oton, voliinde Allah ndeen kam jogii ɗum tawo, faa nyannde ɗum wuletee e yiite, nyalaande nde ɗum sernanta halluɓe.
61003008	Yiɗaaɓe am, to' on njeggit ɗu'um~: to Jawmiraawo, nyalaande wo'ore e nanndani mo e duuɓi dubuu, duuɓi dubuu boo e nanndani mo e nyalaande wo'ore.
61003009	Woɓɓe e ɗoon mbi'a Jawmiraawo neeɓii hebbinaay alkawal muuɗum, ammaa naa ɗum noon. O munyanii yimɓe, gam o yiɗaa koo go'oto halka, ammaa emo yiɗi yimɓe fuu tuuba.
61003010	E noon fuu, Jawmiraawo no wartey daahir. O warey kama no gujjo wardata. Nyanndeere ndeen, assamaaji no majjey e olko semmbiɗngo. Ku'uje ko woni asama fuu no nguletee e yiite. Duuniyaaru e ko woni nder ma'aru fuu no majjey.
61003011	Nde laatii ku'uje ɗe'e fuu no kalkirey kama nii, on anndi no haani njooɗorooɗon. Sey njooɗooɗon jo'onde seniinde, tokkon Allah e goonga nder koo ɗume fuu.
61003012	Sey on laatoo reentuɓe nyalaande Allah. Ti'inee huugo ila nde waraay, gam nde wara jaawɗum. Nyalaande ndeen assamaaji no nguletee ɗi kalkee. Ko woni dow fuu no narkoto nder yiite.
61003013	Ammaa, Allah waɗanii en alkawal no hokkey en asama kesa e lesdi kesri, toon to aadilaaku woni dum. Kanjum ndeentuɗen.
61003014	Gam ma'ajum yiɗaaɓe am, nde laatii on ndeenti nyalaande bittoyki Jawmiraawo, ti'inee jooɗaago jo'onde laaɓnde, nde walaa feloore yeeso Allah, gam njooɗooɗon jam hakkunde mooɗon e ma'ako.
61003015	To' on njeggit munyal ngal Jawmiraawo meeɗen waɗani en, ngal omtanii on laawol hisgo. Bulus, banndii'en giɗaaɗo boo, vinndani on haala kaan gada e hikima ka Allah hokki mo.
61003016	Nder ɗereeji ma'ako ɗi o vinndi fuu, emo volva dow haala kaan. Ɗereeji ma'ako boo e ngoodi bolle caɗɗe heɓtaago. Yimɓe ɓe ngalaa anndal, ɓe goonɗinki mu''en cemmbiɗaa, e mbonna ma'ana ma'aje, kama noon no ɓe mboovi bonnirgo goɗɗe aayaaje Allah. Gam ma'ajum, eɓe pooɗana ko'e maɓɓe halkere.
61003017	Ammaa onon yiɗaaɓe am, nde laatii on aartii on anndinaama ku'uje ɗeen, ndeenee ko'e mooɗon gam to' saliiɓe tokkugo Allah estir on peve mu''en, ɓe cottina on to ndarinooɗon e semmbee.
61003018	Mawniree caahu e anndugo Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu kisnoowo en. Teddungal laatanoo mo gada jo'oni faa abadaa~! Aamiin~!
62001001	Emin mbinndana on habaru goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Voliinde, goonɗo ila fuɗɗam. Min nanii habaru ma'ako, min ngi'ii mo e gite amin, min ndaarii mo, min meemii mo e juuɗe amin. Kanko woni voliinde hokkoore yimɓe yonki.
62001002	Yonki kiin vannginaama. Min ngi'ii ki, min caaydii dow ma'aki. Min caaydinii on kanki woni yonki ɗum faa abadaa, gonnooki to Baabiraawo, bannginaaki e amin.
62001003	Ko min ngi'i e ko min nani, kanjum min ngeccotoo on, gam onon boo kawton e amin, minon hawtuɓe e Baabiraawo e Ɓiyum Yeesu Almasiifu.
62001004	Emin mbinndana on ɗum, gam faa velvelo meeɗen heeva.
62001005	Habaru ɗum min nani to Almasiifu, kanjum min ngeccotoo on, waato Allah o jayngol, niɓre walaa to ma'ako sam.
62001006	To en mbi'ii en kawti e ma'ako, ammaa en njooɗii nder niɓre, en pevii, en tokkaay goonga.
62001007	Ammaa to en njooɗii nder jayngol, noon no Allah e hoore muuɗum jooɗorii nder ma'agol, ndeen kam en laatoto hawtuɓe hakkunde meeɗen. Ƴiiƴam Ɓiyiiko Yeesu boo, no laɓɓiney en gada e hakkeeji meeɗen fuu.
62001008	To en mbi'ii en ngalaa hakke, en pevanii ko'e meeɗen, goonga boo walaa nder meeɗen.
62001009	Ammaa to en ngeccake Allah hakkeeji meeɗen, kanko o koolniiɗo, kebbinoowo alkawal ma'ako, o ya'afanto en, o laɓɓina en gada e koo ndeye halleende meeɗen fuu.
62001010	To en mbi'ii en mbaɗaay hakke, en laatinii Allah pevoowo, voliinde ma'ako boo walaa nder ɓerɗe meeɗen.
62002001	Ɓikkon am, mi vinndanii on ɗum gam to' on mbaɗ hakke. Ammaa to goɗɗo waɗii hakke, en ngoodi keedanoowo en yeeso Baabiraawo, waato Yeesu Almasiifu goongaajo.
62002002	Kanko sakki yonki ma'ako gam hakkeeji meeɗen nja'afee. Wanaa gam hakkeeji meeɗen tan, ammaa gam hakkeeji yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu.
62002003	To en ɗowtanake dookaaji Allah, kanjum hollata en anndi mo.
62002004	Biiɗo e anndi Allah, ammaa ɗowtanaaki dookaaji ma'ako, o pevoowo, goonga walaa nder ma'ako.
62002005	Ammaa to neɗɗo tokkii voliinde Allah, daahir yiɗde Allah heevii nder muuɗum. Noon anndirten en njooɗii nder kawtal e Allah.
62002006	Biiɗo e wondi e Allah, sey jooɗoroo noon no Almasiifu jooɗori.
62002007	Banndiraaɓe am ɓe ngiɗmi, ko mbinndanmi on wanaa ɗum dooka kesa, ammaa ɗum dooka neeɓka ka annduɗon ilaa. Dooka neeɓka kaan woni habaru ɗum nannooɗon.
62002008	Ammaa e noon fuu, dooka ka mbinndanmi on jo'oni e laatii kesa. Goonga dooka kaan vanngii nder Almasiifu, ka vannginaama nder mooɗon onon boo. Gam niɓre e dilla, jayngol goongawol fuɗɗii yaynaago.
62002009	To goɗɗo vi'ii nder jayngol woni, ammaa e wanyi banndum, ndeen kam nder niɓre o woni faa jo'oni.
62002010	Giɗɗo banndum nder jayngol jooɗii, o laatataako daliila fergere goɗɗo boo.
62002011	Ganyɗo banndum nder niɓre jooɗii, nder niɓre boo o yahata, o anndaa to o fa'i, gam niɓre vumnii mo.
62002012	Ɓikkon, mi vinndanii on gam hakkeeji mooɗon nja'afaama barkaa Almasiifu.
62002013	Baabaaji, mi vinndanii on gam eɗon anndi goonɗo ila fuɗɗam. Kaye'en, mi vinndanii on gam on njaalake Kalluɗo.
62002014	Ɓikkon, mi vinndanii on gam eɗon anndi Baabiraawo. Baabaaji, mi vinndanii on gam eɗon anndi goonɗo ila fuɗɗam. Kaye'en, mi vinndanii on gam on ngoodi semmbee, voliinde Allah e jooɗii nder mooɗon, kadimaa on njaalake Kalluɗo.
62002015	To' on ngiɗ duuniyaaru, e ko woni nder ma'aru fuu. Gam giɗɗo duuniyaaru waawataa yiɗgo Baabiraawo.
62002016	Ko woni nder duuniyaaru, waato giɗaaɗi ɓanndu e giɗaaɗi gite e mantoraago ko woodi, ɗum fuu ɗum ivoyaay to Baabiraawo, to duuniyaaru ɗum ivi.
62002017	Duuniyaaru e giɗaaɗi kalluɗi gonɗi nder ma'aru fuu no ngutoto, ammaa baɗoowo ko Allah yiɗi no tabbitey faa abadaa.
62002018	Ɓikkon am, timmoode ɓadake. On nanii ganyo Almasiifu no warey. Too, jo'oni wanywanyɓe Almasiifu ɗuuɗɓe ngari. Kanjum anndinta en timmoode ɓadake.
62002019	Wanywanyɓe Almasiifu ɓeen, nder meeɗen ɓe ivi, ndeen maa ɓe laataakino ɓe meeɗen e goonga. Gam kul ɓe laatino ɓe meeɗen e goonga, daa ɓe njooɗodotono e meeɗen, ammaa burtaaki maɓɓe hollii ɓe laataaki ɓe meeɗen.
62002020	Onon boo, Almasiifu hokkii on Ruhu Ceniiɗo, kanjum waɗi on fuu annduɗon goonga.
62002021	Wanaa gam on anndaa goonga mbinndanmi on, ammaa gam eɗon anndi ka. Kadimaa eɗon anndi fewre fuu ivataa nder goonga.
62002022	Kadi, moye woni pevoowo~? Oon caliiɗo Yeesu woni Almasiifu, kanko woni pevoowo. Caliiɗo Allah Baabiraawo e Ɓiɗɗo boo, kam woni ganyo-Almasiifu.
62002023	Koo moye salii Ɓiɗɗo waldaa e Baabiraawo, ammaa caaydinɗo Ɓiɗɗo e wondi e Baabiraawo.
62002024	Ti'inee jogaago ko nanɗon ila arande nder ɓerɗe mooɗon. To bolle ɗe nanɗon ila arande e njooɗii nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, ndeen onon boo, on njooɗoto nder kawtal e Ɓiɗɗo e Baabiraawo fuu.
62002025	Raa alkawal ngal Almasiifu waɗani en, waato yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
62002026	Ɗuum ko mbinndanmi on, mi vinndii ɗum dow majjinooɓe on.
62002027	Onon boo, Ruhu Ceniiɗo mo Almasiifu hokki on, e jooɗii nder mooɗon. Gam ma'ajum on ndaarataa ekkitinoowo feere, gam Ruhu ma'ako e ekkitina on koo ɗume. Ko o ekkitinta on boo, no goonga, naa no fewre. Sey njooɗooɗon nder kawtal e Almasiifu, noon no Ruhu ma'ako ekkitiniri on.
62002028	Jo'oni ɓikkon am, njooɗee nder kawtal e Almasiifu, ndeen en kulataa nyannde nde o vanngata, en cemtataa boo nyannde bittoyki ma'ako.
62002029	To on anndi Almasiifu no goongaajo, anndee boo kuwoowo goonga fuu laatake ɓiɗɗo Allah.
62003001	Ndaaree manngu yiɗde nde Baabiraawo yiɗi en, faa en noddaama ɓiɓɓe Allah. Noon boo laatiiɗen. Ndu'u duuniyaaru anndaa en, gam ndu anndaa Baabiraawo.
62003002	Yiɗaaɓe am, jo'oni en laatii ɓiɓɓe Allah. Ko laatoytooɗen vannginaaka tawo. Ammaa eɗen anndi to Almasiifu vanngii, en nanndey e ma'ako, gam en ngi'ey mo, noon no o va'i.
62003003	Desɗo tammunde muuɗum to ma'ako fuu, sey laaɓna ɓernde muuɗum noon no Almasiifu laaɓri.
62003004	Baɗɗo hakke fuu, voofii Dooka Allah, gam waɗgo hakke woni voofgo Dooka Allah.
62003005	Eɗon anndi Almasiifu vanngii faa itta hakkeeji meeɗen, gam kanko, hakke meemaay mo sam.
62003006	Jooɗiiɗo nder Almasiifu fuu tokkataa waɗgo hakke. Baɗoowo hakke yi'ataa mo, anndataa mo boo.
62003007	Ɓikkon am, ti'inee to' goɗɗo estu on~! Goongaajo woni kuwoowo goonga, kama no Almasiifu laatorii goongaajo.
62003008	Baɗoowo hakke fuu no ɓii Ceyɗaan, gam Ceyɗaan e waɗa hakke ila fuɗɗam. Kanjum waɗi Ɓiɗɗo Allah wari, gam halkugo kuuɗe Ceyɗaan.
62003009	Laatiiɗo ɓii Allah fuu yahataa yeeso e waɗgo hakke, gam Ruhu mo Allah waɗi nder ɓernde ma'ako oon e jooɗii nder ma'ako. O waawataa o tokka waɗgo hakke, gam emo laatii ɓii Allah.
62003010	Mo huwataa goonga, e mo yiɗaa banndum fuu laataaki ɓiɓɓe Allah, kanjum senndindirta ɓiɓɓe Allah e ɓiɓɓe Ceyɗaan.
62003011	Habaru ɗum nanɗon ila fuɗɗam woni ngiɗngiɗtiren.
62003012	To' en laato kama Kaayinu tokkuɗo Ceyɗaan, faa o wari minyiiko. Gam ɗume o wari mo~? Kaayinu warii mo gam kuuɗe muuɗum no kalluɗe, ammaa kuuɗe minyiiko no goongaaje.
62003013	Banndiraaɓe am, to duuniyaaru wanyii on, to' ɗum haayno on.
62003014	Enen kam, yiɗde nde ngiɗɗen banndiraaɓe meeɗen e holla daahir en kuultii maayde, en nattii nder yonki. Mo yiɗaa banndum fuu e nder baawɗe maayde tawo.
62003015	Ganyɗo banndum fuu waɗii war-hoore. Eɗon anndi baɗoowo war-hoore walaa yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
62003016	Raa no anndirɗen ko woni yiɗde~: Almasiifu hokkii yonki muuɗum gam meeɗen. Gam ma'ajum enen boo, e haani kokken yonkiiji meeɗen gam banndiraaɓe meeɗen.
62003017	To goɗɗo diskuɗo yi'ii banndum e nder ciya, ammaa hokkoraay mo, noye o vi'irata yiɗde Allah e nder ma'ako~?
62003018	Ɓikkon am, to' yiɗde meeɗen laato nde konnduɗe tan, ammaa ngiɗremma yiɗde goongaare vanngeynde nder kuuɗe booɗɗe.
62003019	-
62003020	Raa ko waɗata annden nder goonga ngonɗen. Koo to ɓerɗe meeɗen peldii en hakke, en kulataa daraago yeeso Allah, gam en anndi Allah ɓurii ɗe manngu. Kanko woni annduɗo koo ɗume fuu.
62003021	Yiɗaaɓe am, kul ɓerɗe meeɗen peldaay en hakke, en kulataa daraago yeeso Allah.
62003022	En keɓey ko toriiɗen mo fuu, gam en tokkii dookaaji ma'ako, eɗen kuwa ko veli mo.
62003023	Dooka ma'ako woni goonɗingo Ɓiyiiko Yeesu Almasiifu, e yiɗyiɗtirgo noon no o vi'i en.
62003024	Tokkuɗo dookaaji Allah e jooɗii nder Allah, Allah boo e jooɗii nder ma'ako. Ruhu Ceniiɗo mo o hokki en, kam hollata en Allah e jooɗii nder meeɗen.
62004001	Yiɗaaɓe am, to' on ngoonɗin koo moye biiɗo e woodi Ruhu Allah, ammaa ngodee mo, kul ɗum goonga Ruhu Allah e nder ma'ako, koo walaa nder ma'ako. Gam annabo'en fevooɓe ɗuuɗɓe cankitake nder duuniyaaru.
62004002	Biiɗo Yeesu Almasiifu warii laatake neɗɗo, oon kanyum woodi Ruhu Allah.
62004003	Ammaa mo saaydiniraay Yeesu noon fuu, Ruhu Allah walaa nder muuɗum. Ruhu gonɗo nder ma'ako ivoyii gada ganyo Almasiifu. On nanii habaru garol ganyo-Almasiifu. Jo'oni emo nder duuniyaaru.
62004004	Ɓikkon am, onon on yimɓe Allah, on njaalake fevooɓe ɓeen, gam Ruhu gonɗo nder mooɗon ɓuri ruhu gonɗo nder duuniyaaru semmbee.
62004005	Fevooɓe ɓeen, ɗum ɓe duuniyaaru. Haala maɓɓe ɗum ka duuniyaaru, gam ma'ajum, duuniyaaru e yewanoo ɓe.
62004006	Enen en yimɓe Allah, annduɗo Allah fuu no yewanto en. Mo laataaki neɗɗo Allah boo yewantaako en. Kama noon cenndindirten Ruhu goonga e ruhu fewre.
62004007	Yiɗaaɓe am, ngiɗngiɗtiremma gam yiɗde to Allah ivoyi. Goonɗo yiɗde e laatii ɓiɗɗo Allah, e anndi Allah boo.
62004008	Mo walaa yiɗde anndaa Allah, gam Allah e hoore muuɗum o yiɗde.
62004009	Raa no Allah holliri en yiɗde muuɗum~: o liloyii Ɓiyiiko Bajjo nder duuniyaaru, gam keɓren yonki gada e ma'ako.
62004010	Raa no yiɗde Allah va'i~: naa enen ngiɗi Allah, ammaa kanko yiɗi en. Nder yiɗde ma'ako o liloyii Ɓiyiiko faa hokka yonki muuɗum sadaka gam hakkeeji meeɗen nja'afee.
62004011	Yiɗaaɓe am, to noon Allah yiɗiri en, e haani enen boo ngiɗngiɗtiren kama noon.
62004012	Walaa meeɗɗo yi'igo Allah sam. To en ngiɗngiɗtirii, Allah no jooɗoto nder meeɗen, faa yiɗde ma'ako heeva nder meeɗen.
62004013	Allah hokkii en Ruhu muuɗum. Noon anndirɗen en njooɗii nder ma'ako, kanko boo emo jooɗii nder meeɗen.
62004014	Min ngi'i Baabiraawo liloyii Ɓiyum gam o hisna duuniyaaru, emin caaydina ɗum boo.
62004015	Caaydiiɗo Yeesu woni Ɓiɗɗo Allah fuu, Allah no jooɗoto nder ma'ako, kanko boo emo jooɗii nder Allah.
62004016	Enen, en anndi yiɗde nde Allah yiɗi en, en ngoonɗinii nde. Allah o yiɗde. Jooɗiiɗo nder yiɗde fuu, nder Allah o jooɗii, Allah boo e jooɗii nder ma'ako.
62004017	To yiɗde Allah heevii nder ɓerɗe meeɗen, en kulataa nyannde-darngal. Gam kama no Almasiifu jooɗorii nder duuniyaaru, noon enen boo njooɗoriiɗen nder ma'aru.
62004018	Kulol walaa nder yiɗde, gam yiɗde goongaare no laggey kulol. Kulol e hawti e ceri'a, kulɗo boo, yiɗde Allah heevaay nder muuɗum.
62004019	Enen, en ngoodi yiɗde, gam Allah aarti yiɗgo en.
62004020	To goɗɗo vi'ii e yiɗi Allah, ammaa e wanyi banndum, o pevoowo. Gam mo yiɗaay banndum mo yi'ata, waawataa yiɗgo Allah mo meeɗaay yi'igo.
62004021	Raa dooka ka keɓɗen to Almasiifu~: giɗɗo Allah fuu, sey yiɗa banndum boo.
62005001	Koo moye goonɗini Yeesu woni Almasiifu, o laatake ɓii Allah. Giɗɗo baaba fuu, no yiɗey ɓiyiiko boo.
62005002	Raa ko anndinta en en ngiɗi ɓiɓɓe Allah~: ngiɗen Allah, tokken dookaaji ma'ako.
62005003	Yiɗgo Allah woni tokkugo dookaaji ma'ako. Donngal dookaaji ma'ako boo, teddantaa en,
62005004	gam laatiiɗo ɓii Allah fuu, no jaaloto duuniyaaru. Gada e goonɗinki meeɗen njaalortooɗen duuniyaaru.
62005005	Moye jaalotoo duuniyaaru~? Sey goonɗinɗo Yeesu woni Ɓiɗɗo Allah.
62005006	Yeesu Almasiifu kam wardi e ndiyam e ƴiiƴam. Wanaa ndiyam tan o wardi, ammaa o wardii e ndiyam e ƴiiƴam fuu. Ruhu Ceniiɗo boo saaydinii ku'uje ɗeen ɗum goonga, gam Ruhu woni goonga.
62005007	Ku'uje tati e caaydina Yeesu woni Almasiifu,
62005008	kanje ngoni~: Ruhu e ndiyam e ƴiiƴam. Caaydaaku ma'aje boo no go'otum.
62005009	En ɗoon njaɓa caaydaaku yimɓe, ammaa caaydaaku Allah e ɓuri semmbee, waato caaydaaku ngu o saaydini dow Ɓiyiiko.
62005010	Goonɗinɗo Ɓiɗɗo Allah fuu heɓii caaydaaku nguun nder ɓernde muuɗum. Mo goonɗinaay Allah boo, laatinii Allah pevoowo, gam o jaɓaay caaydaaku ngu Allah saaydini dow Ɓiyum.
62005011	Raa caaydaaku nguun~: Allah hokkii en yonki ɗum faa abadaa, yonki ɗuum o hokkirii en ɗum gada e Ɓiyiiko.
62005012	Gonduɗo e Ɓiɗɗo Allah fuu e woodi yonki ɗuum. Mo waldaa e ma'ako boo, walaa yonki ɗuum.
62005013	Mi vinndanii on ɗum, onon goonɗinɓe Ɓiɗɗo Allah, gam tabbitinon on ngoodi yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
62005014	En tabbitinii o naney ko toriiɗen mo fuu, ko foti deydey e no o yiɗi.
62005015	Nde laatii emo nana do'aaje meeɗen, en tabbitinii en keɓey ko toriiɗen mo fuu.
62005016	To neɗɗo yi'ii banndum e waɗa hakke ɗum yaharataa mo e maayde, sey o toranoo mo Allah, Allah boo no hokkey mo yonki. E woodi hakke jahareyɗum e maayde. Mi vi'aay torooɗon Allah gam baɗoowo iri hakke ɗuum.
62005017	Kuuɗe kalluɗe fuu no hakke, ammaa wanaa hakke fuu yaharata neɗɗo e maayde.
62005018	Eɗen anndi laatiiɓe ɓiɓɓe Allah fuu tokkataa waɗgo hakke. Ɓiɗɗo Allah e reeni ɓe, gam to' Ceyɗaan heɓ baawɗe dow maɓɓe.
62005019	Eɗen anndi en yimɓe Allah, koo nde laatii yimɓe duuniyaaru e nder junngo Ceyɗaan.
62005020	Eɗen anndi boo, Ɓiɗɗo Allah warii hokkii en fahamu anndugo Allah goongaajo. Jo'oni en laatii hawtuɓe e Goongaajo oon gada e Ɓiyiiko Yeesu Almasiifu. Kanko woni Allah goongaajo, kanko woni yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
62005021	Ɓikkon am, ngoɗɗee gumkiiji~!
63001001	Miin ndottiijo ikiliisiya vinndi ngo'ol ɗereewol yahago to Inna wuro cuɓaaɗo Allah, e ɓiɓɓe muuɗum ɓe ngiɗmi e yiɗde goongaare. Wanaa miin tan yiɗi on, ammaa annduɓe goonga fuu e ngiɗi on,
63001002	ko waɗi wanaa miin tan yiɗi on, gam goonga e jooɗii nder ɓerɗe meeɗen, ka jooɗodoto e meeɗen boo faa abadaa.
63001003	Barkaa e yurmeende e jam ivoyɗum to Allah Baabiraawo e Ɓiyum Yeesu Almasiifu laatano en, faa njooɗooɗen nder goonga e yiɗde.
63001004	Mi nanii belɗum korey nde tawmi e woodi ɓiɓɓe maaɗa tokkuɓe goonga noon no Baabiraawo vi'i mbaɗen.
63001005	Jo'oni, Inna wuro giɗaaɗo, emi toro maa ngiɗngiɗtiree. Ko mbinndanmaami wanaa ɗum dooka kesa, ɗum dooka ka ngoonnooɗen ila arande.
63001006	Yiɗde goongaare woni tokkugo dookaaji Allah. Kanka woni dooka ka nanɗon ila arande, waato njooɗooɗon nder yiɗde.
63001007	Majjinooɓe yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe cankitake nder duuniyaaru. Ɓe calake saaydingo Yeesu Almasiifu warii laatake neɗɗo. Ekkitinirɗo noon fuu o majjinoowo, o ganyo Almasiifu.
63001008	Ndeenee ko'e mooɗon gam to' on majjin nafuuda kuugal meeɗen, faa keɓon biya mooɗon fuu.
63001009	Mo jooɗaaki nder ekkitinol Almasiifu, ammaa ɓesdi goɗɗum dow ma'agol, waldaa e Allah. Jooɗiiɗo nder ekkitinol ngool fuu e wondi e Baabiraawo e Ɓiɗɗo boo.
63001010	To goɗɗo warii e wa'ajina on ekkitinol feere, to' on njaɓɓo mo nder gure mooɗon, to' on kinnu mo boo.
63001011	Gam kinnuɗo mo fuu, hawtii e ma'ako nder kuugal ma'ako kallungal.
63001012	Emi woodi ko ngiɗmi vi'igo on ɗuuɗɗum, ammaa mi yiɗaa vinndango on ɗum e ɗereewol. Emi yiɗi wargo to mooɗon, mboliden honnduko e honnduko, gam velvelo meeɗen heeva.
63001013	Ɓiɓɓe bannda debbo mo Allah suɓi e kinnu maa.
64001001	Miin ndottiijo ikiliisiya vinndi ɗereewol ngo'ol yahago to higoo am Gaayus, mo ngiɗmi e goonga.
64001002	Giɗaaɗo am, emi waɗa do'aare gam maaɗa, faa tawee a jooɗii jam nder koo ɗume fuu, waato a jamo nder ruhu e ɓanndu.
64001003	Nde woɓɓe banndiraaɓe ngari, ngeccii yam no tokkirɗaa goonga, e no kuutinirɗaa ka, ɗum velii yam korey.
64001004	Nango ɓikkon am e tokki goonga, kam ɓuri velgo yam.
64001005	Giɗaaɗo am Gaayus, kuuɗe booɗɗe ɗe kuwanɗaa banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe, ɓe annduɗaa e ɓe a anndaa fuu, eɗe kolla a koolniiɗo.
64001006	Yimɓe ɓeen ngarii nder ikiliisiya, ɓe ngeccake yiɗde nde kolluɗaa ɓe. Yah yeeso e vallugo iri yimɓe ɓeen nder jahaale maɓɓe, fodde ko velata Allah.
64001007	Gam nde ɓe mbaɗata jahaangal maɓɓe dow wa'ajingo innde Almasiifu, ɓe ndaaraay ballal e yimɓe ɓe ngoonɗinaay.
64001008	Gam ma'ajum enen goonɗinɓe e haani njaɓɓooɗen iri yimɓe ɓeen, gam laatooɗen huudooɓe e maɓɓe nder anndingo goonga Allah.
64001009	Mi vinndanii ikiliisiya ngonka to maaɗa ɗereewol, ammaa Diyooterefes jaɓaay bolle am sam, gam emo yiɗi laataago aardiiɗo dow mooɗon.
64001010	Gam ma'ajum, to mi warii mi vannginey ko o waɗata, waato peve e bolle kalluɗe ɗe o volvi dow amin. Naa kanjum tan o waɗata~: o jaɓɓataako banndiraaɓe hoɗɓe, kadimaa yiɗɓe jaɓɓaago ɓe maa, emo haɗa ɗum'en, o vurtina ɗum'en nder ikiliisiya.
64001011	Giɗaaɗo am Gaayus, ta'a yemmin waɗgo halleende, ammaa huu ko vooɗi. Baɗoowo ko vooɗi fuu, no neɗɗo Allah, ammaa baɗoowo ko halli anndaa Allah.
64001012	Demeetiriyus hollii o neɗɗo goongaajo, goonga boo e saaydina mo. Yimɓe fuu e caaydina ko vooɗi dow ma'ako. Minon boo, emin caaydanoo mo, eɗa anndi boo caaydaaku amin no goonga.
64001013	Ko ngiɗmi vi'igo ma e ɗuuɗi, ammaa mi yiɗaa vinndugo ɗum dow ɗereewol.
64001014	Emi yiɗi yi'igo ma ko ɓadii, gam mboliden honnduko e honnduko, to ɗum heɓake.
64001015	Jam wondu e maaɗa. Yiɗaaɓe maaɗa wonɓe ɗo'o e kinnu maa. Hinnu higooɓe amin wonɓe ɗoon fuu, go'oto-go'oto maɓɓe.
65001001	Ngo'ol ɗereewol ivii to am, miin Yahuuda maccuɗo Yeesu Almasiifu, mi minyiraawo Yaakuubu. Emi hinna on, onon noddaaɓe Allah, ɓe Allah Baabiraawo meeɗen yiɗi, ɓe Yeesu Almasiifu reeni.
65001002	Allah ɗuɗɗinan on yurmeende muuɗum e jam muuɗum e yiɗde muuɗum~!
65001003	Banndiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, emi yiɗnoo vinndango on korey dow kisndam kawtuɗam en, en fuu. Jo'oni mi yi'ii ɗum doole mi vinndana on, gam mi semmbiɗina ɓerɗe mooɗon faa kaɓanon haɓre goonɗinki nde Allah halfini seniiɓe muuɗum nde wo'ore heƴeynde yimɓe jaamanuuji fuu.
65001004	Gam halluɓe nattii nder kawtal mooɗon e suuɗeefi. Eɓe ngilloo wuurgo barkaa Allah, gam ɓe keɓa laawol waɗgo halleende, ɓe calake Yeesu Almasiifu laamiiɗo meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen. Halkere halluɓe ɓeen vinndaama nder Deftere Seniinde ila ko neeɓi.
65001005	Jo'oni, emi yiɗi hiimtingo on ko annduɗon~: koo nde Jawmiraawo hisnunoo yimɓe Isiraa'iila nder lesdi Misira, ɓaawo ɗoon o halkii woɓɓe maɓɓe, gam ɓe ngoonɗinaay mo.
65001006	Kiimtee boo woɓɓe nder malaa'ika'en huultuɓe keerol baawɗe ɗe Allah hokki ɗum'en, ɓe ngoorii jo'onde maɓɓe. Gam ma'ajum Jawmiraawo haɓɓiri ɓe geƴƴelle ɗe faa abada, o omndi ɓe nder niɓre, faa yahago nyannde-darngal nde o sernanta ɓe.
65001007	Kiimtee yimɓe Sodoma e Gomora e ci'e piliiɗe ɗum'en. Kamɓe boo, ɓe mbaɗii kama no malaa'ika'en ɓeen mbaɗi, ɓe tokkii suunooji ɓalli maɓɓe, ɓe mbaɗii koo iri nguye njeenu. Ɓe kalkiraama yiite tabbitnge, gam faa ɓe laatoo misaalu halketeeɓe e yiite nge faa abadaa.
65001008	Noon boo, ekkitinooɓe fevooɓe ɓeen e ngoodi koyɗi jahareyɗi ɓe e nyiddingo ɓalli maɓɓe, eɓe njavoo baawɗe mawɓe fuu, eɓe kuɗa mawɓe asama.
65001009	Koo Miikaa'iilu mawɗo malaa'ika'en oon, huɗraay Ceyɗaan noon, nde ɓe ngeddotirnoo dow ɓanndu Muusa ɓaawo maayde ma'ako. O feldaay mo haalaaji naawɗi. Ko o vi'i mo woni~: «~Jawmiraawo sernane.~»
65001010	Ammaa yimɓe ɓeen e kuɗa ku'uje ɗe ɓe anndaa. Anndal ngal ɓe ngoodi iri ngal diiwe ladde, kam halkata ɓe.
65001011	Kayco maɓɓe~! Ɓe tokkii laawol Kaayinu barɗo minyum. Ɓe mbaɗii ko'e maɓɓe e fewre gam heɓgo ceede, kama no Balaama waɗno. Ɓe kalkey kama no Koora turtanɗo Muusa halkiri.
65001012	Gonki yimɓe ɓeen nder mooɗon e nyiddina kawtal yiɗde mooɗon wakkaci nyaamdoton. Kamɓe ɓe nyaamtarɓe, yiɗanɓe ko'e mu''en tan. Ɓe nanndii e duule ɗe ngalaa ndiyam ɗe henndu laggata, ɓe nanndii e leɗɗe ɗe ndimataa koo wakkaci dimgol ma'aje, ɗoofaaɗe, baatɗe fu-fuu.
65001013	Eɓe cankita kuuɗe maɓɓe cemtiniiɗe kama no ɓoggi ndiyam maayo meccirta guufɗe e powle ma'ago. Ɓe nanndii e koode jiilotooɗe. Allah resanii ɓe niɓre ɓurnde niɓɓugo, nde ɓe mburtataako ɗum faa abadaa.
65001014	Enok laatiiɗo nder jaamaniiru joveeɗiɗaɓru nder danygol Aadamu waɗii annabaaku maɓɓe ila ko neeɓi, o vi'i~: «~Raa Jawmiraawo ɗoon warda e malaa'ika'en muuɗum seniiɓe dubuuje dubuuje
65001015	gam o sernana yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu, o halka halluɓe gam kuuɗe mu''en kalluɗe, e haalaaji kalluɗi ɗi ɓe mbolvi dow ma'ako.~»
65001016	Yimɓe ɓeen ɓe nyaamtotooɓe, voytirooɓe woɓɓe, eɓe tokki suunooji maɓɓe kalluɗi, eɓe mantoroo ko'e maɓɓe, eɓe mana woɓɓe boo gam ɓe keɓa ko ɓe ngiɗi.
65001017	Ammaa onon banndiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, kiimtee haalaaji ɗi lilaaɓe Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu mbi'inoo on.
65001018	Ɓe mbi'i~: «~Nder wakkaci cakitotooɗum yimɓe tokkuɓe giɗaaɗi mu''en kalluɗi no ngarey, njaltinira on.~»
65001019	Kamɓe ngoni senndooɓe yimɓe, eɓe tokki nyumooji duuniyaaru tan, ɓe ngalaa Ruhu Allah.
65001020	Ammaa onon banndiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, cemmbiɗee nder goonɗinki mooɗon ceniiki, toree Allah nder baawɗe Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
65001021	Tabbitee nder yiɗde Allah, mbaɗee tammunde mooɗon dow Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu. Nder yurmeende ma'ako o hokkey on yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
65001022	Njurminanee waɗooɓe cekkaa,
65001023	mburtinee woɓɓe nder yiite, kisnee ɓe. Njurminanee woɓɓe boo, ammaa kakkilee gam to' on ndaaɓo hakke maɓɓe.
65001024	Allah e waawi reengo on gada e fergere, faa o yottina on nder teddungal ma'ako, on ngalaa feloore on keevi velvelo.
65001025	Kanko woni Allah go'oto kisnirɗo en gada e Yeesu Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen. Teddungal e manngu e laamu e baawɗe laatanoo mo, ila ndeenno e jo'oni e faa abadaa abadin. Aamiin~!
66001001	Nde'e Deftere e saawi wahayu ɗum Allah holli Yeesu Almasiifu, gam holla maccuɓe muuɗum ko ɓadii wargo. Yeesu lilii malaa'ikaajo muuɗum to maccuɗo muuɗum Yahayya, gam o yeccoo mo fii ɗuum.
66001002	Yahayya boo saaydake koo ɗume ko yi'i ɗum voliinde Allah, e goongaaji ɗi Yeesu holli mo.
66001003	Barkaa no laatanto janngeyɗo nde'e deftere annabaaku. Barkaa no laatanto nanɓe ko vinndaa nder nde'e deftere tokki ɗum. Gam wakkaci fii ɗuum vanngata ɓadake.
66001004	Miin Yahayya, emi vinndana goonɗinɓe wonɓe ci'e joveeɗiɗi gonɗe nder lesdi Aasiya. Allah gonɗo ndeenno e jo'oni e ɗo'o yeeso, e ruhuuji joveeɗiɗi gonɗi yeeso jooɗorgal laamu ma'ako,
66001005	e Yeesu Almasiifu caayduujo koolaaɗo mbarkiɗina on, kokka on jam. Yeesu o arano e ummitaago nder maayɓe, o laamiiɗo laamiiɓe duuniyaaru. Kanko yiɗi en, o rimɗini en e hakkeeji meeɗen gada e ƴiiƴam ma'ako.
66001006	O laatinii en yimɓe ma'ako e aardiiɓe diina huwanooɓe Allah Baaba ma'ako. Teddungal e baawɗe laatanoo mo faa abadaa. Aamiin.
66001007	«~Rah, emo wara nder duule, koo moye no yi'ey mo, faa maa e warɓe mo. Yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu no mboyey gam bittoyki ma'ako~!~» Goonga, ɗum waɗey. Aamiin.
66001008	Allah Jawmu baawɗe vi'i~: «~Miin woni Alfaa e Omeega, waato fuɗɗoode e timmoode.~» «~Miin woni ndeenno e jo'oni e ɗo'o yeeso.~»
66001009	Miin Yahayya banndii on, kawtuɗo e mooɗon torraaji e laamu Yeesu Almasiifu, munyduɗo e mooɗon munyal ma'ako, mi yaharaama lesdi ngonndi caka ndiyam, mbi'eteendi Patamos. Mi yaharaama toon gam mi wa'ajinii voliinde Allah, mi hokkii habaru Yeesu.
66001010	Nyannde alat, Ruhu Allah jippoyii dow am, ɓaawo am nanmi woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde, kama duudaango luwal.
66001011	Voliinde ndeen e vi'a~: — Ko ngiiɗaa, vinndu ɗum nder deftere, lildaa nde ikiliisiyaaji gonɗi nder ci'e joveeɗiɗi, waato Efesu e Samirna e Pergame e Tiyaatira e Sardis e Filadelfiya e Lawdikiya.
66001012	Sey ngaylitiimi gam mi yi'a bolvaneyɗo yam. E gaylitaaki am, sey ngi'imi fitilaaji joveeɗiɗi ɗi jiinaariya.
66001013	Caka fitilaaji ɗiin, ngi'imi goɗɗo kama Ɓii-Neɗɗo e ɓornii kolte juutɗe faa e teppe, emo taadii taadorde jiinaariya e wabaare ma'ako.
66001014	Hoore ma'ako e gaasa ma'ako e ranni tar kama hottollo, tar kama nyaalal, gite ma'ako boo kama ɗemngal yiite.
66001015	Kosɗe ma'ako e ɗelkitoo kama njamndi mboɗeeri ngoggaandi, ndi ɗum defi nder yiite vayildu, voliinde ma'ako kama iido nyaardu ndiyam ɗuuɗɗam.
66001016	Emo jogii koode joveeɗiɗi e junngo ma'ako nyaamo, kaafahi belki ki mbeldiiji ɗiɗi e vurtoyoo nder honnduko ma'ako. Yeeso ma'ako e ranni tar kama naange caka nyalawma.
66001017	Nde ngi'imoomi, sey ndo''iimi yeeso ma'ako kama maayɗo. Ammaa o yowani yam junngo ma'ako nyaamo. O vi'i~: — Ta'a hul. Miin woni arano, miin woni cakitiiɗo,
66001018	miin woni mo yonki~! Ndeenno mi maayii, ammaa jo'oni emi woodi yonki ɗum faa abadaa abadin, emi woodi baawɗe dow maayde e Laahira.
66001019	Gam ma'ajum, vinndu ko ngiiɗaa, ko waɗata jo'oni, e ko waɗata ɗo'o yeeso.
66001020	Ammaa jo'oni, raa ma'ana sirri koode joveeɗiɗi ɗe ngiiɗaa nder junngo am nyaamo, e fitilaaji jiinaariya joveeɗiɗi ɗi ngiiɗaa~: koode joveeɗiɗi ɗeen ngoni malaa'ika'en ikiliisiyaaji gonɗi ci'e joveeɗiɗi, fitilaaji joveeɗiɗi boo ɗum ikiliisiyaaji joveeɗiɗi.
66002001	— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Efesu vi'igo~: Raa lilal gada to jogiiɗo koode joveeɗiɗi e junngo muuɗum nyaamo, jahoowo caka fitilaaji jiinaariya joveeɗiɗi~:
66002002	«~Emi anndi kuuɗe maaɗa e ti'inaare maaɗa e munyal maaɗa nder torraaji. Emi anndi a munyantaa halluɓe. Kadimaa a godake vi'ooɓe ko'e mu''en no lilaaɓe, ammaa ɓe laataaki lilaaɓe, a tawii ɓe fevooɓe.
66002003	«~Emi anndi a woodi munyal, a nattii torraaji kalluɗi gam am, e noon fuu a somaay.
66002004	Ammaa raa ko peldeymaami~: a woorii yiɗde maaɗa nde ngoonnoɗaa aran.
66002005	Hiimta gada toye ndo''iɗaa. Tuub, waɗ ko mbaɗeynoɗaa ndeenno. To naa noon, mi warey, mi itta fitila maaɗa to ka resino, to nii a tuubaay.
66002006	Ammaa a woodi fii booɗɗum go'otum ɗum mbaɗataa, a wanyii kuuɗe Nikola'en, noon no nganyrumi ɗe.
66002007	«~Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji. Jaaliiɗo fuu, mi woorey ɗum nyaama ɓikkon lekki yonki gonki nder aljanna.~»
66002008	— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Samirna vi'igo~: Raa ko arano e cakitiiɗo, maaynooɗo ummitii, vi'i~:
66002009	«~Emi anndi torraa maaɗa e cooyndam maaɗa, ammaa e noon fuu a diskuɗo. Emi anndi haala kalluka ka yimɓe mbolvata dow maaɗa. Yimɓe ɓeen e mbi'a no Yahuudu'en, ammaa naa ɗum noon, ɓe yimɓe Ceyɗaan.
66002010	Ta'a hul torraa ka njarataa ɗo'o yeeso. Rah, Ibiliisa siryake waɗgo woɓɓe mooɗon nder kaso, gam ɗum jarraboo on, on mbaɗey balɗe sappo on njara torraa kalluka. Ammaa koo to ɗum warey on, njogee ko kooliiɗon. Miin boo mi hokkete yonki, ki laatanomaa giifol jaalorgal.
66002011	«~Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji. Jaaliiɗo fuu, maayde ɗiɗaɓre meemataa ɗum.~»
66002012	— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Pergame, vi'igo~: Raa ko jogiiɗo kaafahi ki mbeldiiji ɗiɗi vi'i~:
66002013	«~Emi anndi to njooɗiɗaa, eɗa jooɗii to Ceyɗaan laamoto. E noon fuu, eɗa jogii innde am, a wooraay goonɗingo yam, koo wakkaci ɗum Antipas caayduujo am koolaaɗo waraa nder maaɗa, yaayre to Ceyɗaan jooɗii.
66002014	«~Ammaa e woodi fii seɗɗa ɗum peldeymaami. Nder maaɗa e woodi woɓɓe tokkuɓe ekkitinol Balaama. Kanko ekkitini Balak no ferginirta Isiraa'iila'en, ɓe nyaama ko hirsanaa gumkiiji fewre, ɓe mbaɗa njeenu.
66002015	Noon boo a woodi woɓɓe tokkuɓe ekkitinol Nikola'en.
66002016	Jo'oni tuub~! To naa noon, mi warey to maaɗa naa ko neeɓi, mi warda ɓe e kaafahi burtoytooki honnduko am.
66002017	«~Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji. Jaaliiɗo fuu, mi hokkey ɗum nyaamdu manna suuɗiindu. Kadimaa mi hokkey mo haayre raneere nde innde hesre vinndaa dow muuɗum. Walaa annduɗo innde ndeen, sey kokkaaɗo haayre ndeen.~»
66002018	— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Tiyaatira, vi'igo~: Raa ko Ɓiɗɗo Allah mo gite muuɗum njalbirta kama ɗemngal yiite, mo kosɗe muuɗum njalbirta kama njamndi mboɗeeri ngoggaandi, vi'i~:
66002019	«~Emi anndi kuuɗe maaɗa, e yiɗde maaɗa, e hoolnaare maaɗa, e ti'inaare maaɗa, e ballal ngal mbaɗantaa woɓɓe. Emi anndi kuuɗe maaɗa ɗe jo'oni ɓurii ɗe ndeenno.
66002020	«~Ammaa raa ko peldeymaami~: eɗa munyana Jejabel, debbo bi'eyɗo hoore muuɗum no annabiijo. Emo majjina maccuɓe am, emo ekkitina ɓe waɗgo njeenu e nyaamgo teewu cakkanaangu gumkiiji.
66002021	Mi hokkii mo wakkaci gam o tuuba e njeenu ngu o waɗata, ammaa o salake tuubgo.
66002022	Gam ma'ajum mi nyawney mo nyawu kallungu. Ɓe o wa'adata njeenu boo, to ngooraay waɗgo iri kuuɗe ɗeen, mi torrey ɓe torraa kalluka.
66002023	Mi warey tokkuɓe mo. Ndeen ikiliisiyaaji fuu no anndey miin woni annduɗo nyumooji yimɓe, e etoowo ko woni nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe. Mi biyoto koo moye mooɗon deydey e kuugal muuɗum.
66002024	«~Ammaa onon goonɗinɓe horiiɓe ɓe si'ire Tiyaatira, ɓe tokkaay ekkitinol ngool, ɓe tokkaay ko woɓɓe mbi'ata~: sirri Ceyɗaan lugguɗum, emi vi'a on~: mi yowantaa on goɗngal donngal.
66002025	Njogee ko ngoonɗon booɗɗum, faa mi vittoya.
66002026	Jaaliiɗo, baɗeyɗo ko mbi'imi faa yahago timmoode, mi hokkey mo laamu dow leƴƴi duuniyaaru.
66002027	O laamoranto ɓe e sawru njamndi, o fusa ɓe kama gaheeje loɓokke.
66002028	Kadimaa mi hokkey mo hoodere fajiri.
66002029	Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji.~»
66003001	— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Sardis, vi'igo~: Raa ko jogiiɗo ruhuuji Allah joveeɗiɗi e koode joveeɗiɗi vi'ata~: «~Emi anndi kuugal maaɗa, eɗum yi'a kama a woodi yonki, ammaa a maayɗo.
66003002	Umma daraa~! Vo'in ko horani maa, sabu ɗum ɓadake waatgo, gam mi yi'ii kuuɗe maaɗa keevaay yeeso Allah am.
66003003	Gam ma'ajum, hiimta ko nanɗaa e ko ekkitineɗaa, tokku ɗum, tuub gada e hakkeeji maaɗa. Kul a ummaaki, mi vittoyey nder wakkaci ɗum a tammaaki kama gujjo. Kadimaa a anndataa wakkaci ɗum ngaraneymaami.
66003004	Ammaa faa jo'oni e woodi yimɓe maaɗa seɗɗa nder si'ire Sardis, ɓe tuninaay ko'e mu''en e waɗgo hakke. Ɓe ɓornoto kolte daneeeje, ɓe njahada e am, gam ɓe potii waɗgo noon.
66003005	«~Jaaliiɗo fuu no ɓornoto kolte daneeje, kadimaa mi molmataa innde ma'ako nder Deftere yonki. Mi vi'ey kanko ɗum mo am, yeeso Baaba am e yeeso malaa'ika'en muuɗum.
66003006	Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji.~»
66003007	— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Filadelfiya vi'igo~: Raa lilal gada to oon ceniiɗo, goongaajo, jogiiɗo omtirgel Dawda. To o omtii dammugal, walaa omndeyɗo ngal, to o omndii ngal, walaa omteyɗo ngal.
66003008	«~Emi anndi kuuɗe maaɗa. Rah, mi ɗalanii ma dammugal e omtii, walaa baaweyɗo omndugo ngal. Emi anndi a semmbiɗaa, ammaa e noon fuu a tokkii ko mbi'imi, a salaaki vi'igo a goonɗinɗo yam.
66003009	Ɓen ɗoon wonɓe nder yimɓe Ceyɗaan, vi'ooɓe no Yahuudu'en, ammaa ɓe pevey, mi waɗey ɓe ngara ɓe ndiccoo yeeso maaɗa, ndeen ɓe annda emi yiɗ maa.
66003010	Gam a yoofaay munyal ngal mbi'imi mbaɗaa e ɓernde semmbiɗnde, miin boo mi hisnete e torraa ngaraneyka duuniyaaru, gam godaago yimɓe ma'aru fuu.
66003011	Emi wara naa ko neeɓi. Joga goonɗinki maaɗa booɗɗum, gam to' goɗɗo te'ete laada jaalorgal maaɗa.
66003012	«~Jaaliiɗo fuu, mi laatiney ɗum danngaral Wuro Allah am Seniingo, o fuɗɗitataa vurtaago wuro ngoon. Mi vinndey innde Allah am dow ma'ako e innde si'ire muuɗum Urusaliima hesre jippoytoonde gada to Allah am. Kadimaa mi vinndey innde am hesre dow ma'ako.
