66003013	Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji.~»
66003014	— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Lawdikiya, vi'igo~: Raa lilal gada to oon bi'eteeɗo Aamiin, caayduujo goongaajo, koolaaɗo, mo Allah tagiri koo ɗume gada e muuɗum~:
66003015	«~Emi anndi kuuɗe maaɗa, a feewaa a wulaa. Vi'eeno a laatino peewɗo koo gulɗo~!
66003016	Ammaa gam a laatii caka-caka, a wulaa a feewaa, mi tuutete.
66003017	Eɗa vi'a~: Mi diskuɗo, emi woodi jawdi, walaa ko ndullumi. Ammaa a anndaa a tampuɗo, a jurminiiɗo, a cooyɗo, a bumɗo, a suhuraaki.
66003018	Gam ma'ajum emi hokku maa caawara~: sood jiinaariya laɓɓiniraandi yiite to am, gam ndiskaa, sood kolte daneeje cuhuroɗaa, gam cuddaa semteende maaɗa, sood nebbam molmanaa gite maaɗa, gam keɓaa ngi'a.
66003019	Ɓe ngiɗmi peleymi, kamɓe lelteymi. Gam ma'ajum, yawɗa tuub.
66003020	Rammi darii e dammugal, emi silminoo. Koo moye nani voliinde am, omti dammugal, mi nattey mi nyaamda e ma'ako, kanko boo o nyaamdey e am.
66003021	«~Jaaliiɗo fuu no laamodoto e am nder laamu am, noon no keɓrumi jaalorgal laamodiimi e Baaba am nder laamu muuɗum.
66003022	Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji~!~»
66004001	Ɓaawo ma'ajum mi raari, sey ngi'imi goɗngal dammugal e omtii toon dow. Voliinde nde nannoomi arande nanndunde e duudaango luwal vi'i~: — Ƴeentoy ɗo'o, mi hollu maa ko waɗata ɗo'o yeeso.
66004002	Ɗoon e ɗoon Ruhu Allah jippoyii dow am, sey ngi'imi jooɗorgal laamu toon dow, goɗɗo e jooɗii dow ma'agal.
66004003	Jooɗiiɗo oon e ɗelkitoo kama haayre yaspa, emo vo'oji kama haayre sardis. Timotimoongal ɗelkitotoongal kama haayre imiraadi e filii jooɗorgal ngaal.
66004004	Ha'ade jooɗorgal ngaal e woodi goɗɗe jooɗorɗe aciriin e nayi (24), eɗe pilii ngal. Woɓɓe ndotti'en aciriin e nayo (24) e njooɗii dow ma'aje, eɓe ɓornii kolte daneeje, eɓe ngiifii giifi jiinaariya.
66004005	Maƴƴe e hooloo, palmaali mbaɗi ga vurtoyaago e jooɗorgal ngaal. Kadimaa fitilaaji joveeɗiɗi e kuɓɓi yeeso ma'agal, fitilaaji ɗiin ngoni ruhuuji Allah joveeɗiɗi.
66004006	Yeeso jooɗorgal ngaal e woodi goɗɗum nannduɗum e maayo ɗelkitotoongo kama daarorgal. Kadimaa e woodi goɗɗe tagle nayi ɗe yonki, ɗe gite koo toye, ɓaawo e yeeso, eɗe pilii jooɗorgal ngaal koo nduye vuttudu.
66004007	Tagaadi arandi e nanndi e mawndu, ɗiɗaɓri e nanndi e ngaari, tataɓri e woodi yeeso kama ngo neɗɗo, nayaɓri e nanndi e dutal piirngal.
66004008	Ɗen ɗoon tagle nayi ɗe yonki, koo ndiye e woodi biyeeli joveego'o. Eɗe ngoodi gite e ɓanndu koo toye. Jemma e nyalawma ɗe ngoorataa yimgo, eɗe mbi'a~: «~Ceniiɗo, ceniiɗo, ceniiɗo, Allah Jawmiraawo Jawmu Baawɗe, kanko woni ndeenno e jo'oni e ɗo'o yeeso~!~»
66004009	Koo ndeye nde tagle ɗe yonki ngimi gimol maaltugo e teddingo e yettugo oon jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal, mo yonki faa abadaa,
66004010	sey ndotti'en aciriin e nayo (24) ɓeen ndiccoo yeeso jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal ngaal, ɓe maalta oon mo yonki faa abadaa, ɓe ndesa giifi maɓɓe yeeso jooɗorgal ngaal, eɓe mbi'a~:
66004011	«~Yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin, a fotii mawnineego, darajja e teddungal e baawɗe fuu, aan jeyi ɗum, gam aan tagii koo ɗume, e yiɗde maaɗa ɗum tagaa, ɗum jooɗii.~»
66005001	Vuttudu junngo nyaamo jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu, mi yi'ii woɗnde deftere vinndaande nder e yaasi, nde omndaa nde takkaa takkanɗe joveeɗiɗi.
66005002	Ndeen ngi'imi goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo cemmbiɗɗo, o towni voliinde o vi'i~: — Moye foti takkitgo takkanɗe nde'e deftere, omta nde~?
66005003	Ammaa ɗum heɓaay koo go'oto potɗo omtugo deftere ndeen, koo raara nder ma'are, koo toon dow, koo nder duuniyaaru, koo nder maayɓe.
66005004	Mi voyii bojji naawɗi, gam ɗum heɓaay potɗo omtugo deftere ndeen, hakko raara nder ma'are.
66005005	Sey go'oto nder ndotti'en ɓeen vi'i yam~: — Woor voygo. Raa mawndu lenyol Yahuuda asngol Dawda heɓii jaalorgal, o takkitey takkanɗe joveeɗiɗi ɗeen, o omta deftere ndeen.
66005006	Ndeen ngi'imi ngoɗndi Njawdiri e darii ha'ade jooɗorgal ngaal. Tagle nayi ɗe yonki e ndotti'en ɓeen e pilii ndi. Njawdiri ndiin kama ndi hirsanooma. Endi woodi luwe joveeɗiɗi e gite joveeɗiɗi, kanje ngoni ruhuuji Allah joveeɗiɗi lilaaɗi nder duuniyaaru fuu.
66005007	Njawdiri ndiin yahi jaɓi deftere ndeen e junngo nyaamo jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal oon.
66005008	Nde ndi jaɓi deftere ndeen, tagle nayi ɗe yonki ɗeen e ndotti'en aciriin e nayo (24) ndiccii yeeso ma'ari. Koo moye maɓɓe e jogii moolooru e tummude jiinaariya heeɓnde urdi mbelndi, kayri woni do'aaje yimɓe Allah.
66005009	Ɓe ngimi gimol kesol eɓe mbi'a~: «~A fotii hooygo Deftere ndeen takkitaa takkanɗe ma'are, gam a waranooma, gada e ƴiiƴam maaɗa coottaniɗaa Allah yimɓe gada e koo ngole lenyol, e koo ngale ɗemngal, e koo ɓeye yimɓe, e koo ndiye lesdi.
66005010	A laatinii ɓe laamiiɓe e aardiiɓe diina, gam ɓe kuwana Allah meeɗen, ɓe laamanoo duuniyaaru.~»
66005011	Ɓaawo ɗoon mi raari, mi nanii bolle malaa'ika'en ɗuuɗɓe, ɗuuɗal maɓɓe walaa keerol. Eɓe pilii jooɗorgal ngaal e tagle ɗe yonki e ndotti'en ɓeen.
66005012	Malaa'ika'en e ngima e semmbee, e mbi'a~: «~Njawdiri mbaranoondi ndiin, ndi fotii heɓgo baawɗe, e risku, e hikima, e semmbee, e teddungal, e darajja, e maalteego~!~»
66005013	Ndeen nanmi koo ɗeye tagle gonɗe toon dow, e gonɗe nder duuniyaaru, e lees lesdi, e nder ndiyam, e ko woni nder ma'ajum fuu e yima e vi'a~: «~Maaltoore, e darajja, e teddungal, e baawɗe laatanoo Jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal ngaal, kam e Njawdiri faa abadaa~!~»
66005014	Tagle nayi ɗe yonki ɗeen mbi'i~: — Aamiin~! Sey ndotti'en ɓeen ndiccii cujjidani Jawmiraawo.
66006001	Ndeen ngi'imi Njawdiri ndiin takkitii go'o nder takkanɗe joveeɗiɗi ɗeen. Sey nanmi go'o nder tagle nayi ɗe yonki ɗeen noddii e semmbee kama hoolo falmaango, vi'i~: — Waroy~!
66006002	Nde ndaarmi, sey ngi'imi puccu ndaneewu~! Gonɗo dow ma'agu e jogii bakaahi, o hokkaa giifol. O jaaliiɗo, o vurtii gam o ɓesda jaalaago.
66006003	Nde Njawdiri ndiin takkiti takkannde ɗiɗaɓre, sey nanmi tagaadi ndi yonki ɗiɗaɓri vi'i~: — Waroy~!
66006004	Sey puccu mboɗeewu coloy vurtoyii. Gonɗo dow ma'agu vi'aa itta jam nder duuniyaaru, gam yimɓe mbarmbartira. O hokkaa kaafahi makki.
66006005	Nde Njawdiri ndiin takkiti takkannde tataɓre, sey nanmi tagaadi tataɓri ndi yonki vi'i~: — Waroy~! Nde ndaarmi, sey ngi'imi puccu ɓaleewu~! Gonɗo dow ma'agu e jogii etruɗum e junngo.
66006006	Sey nanmi goɗɗum kama voliinde e vurtoyoo hakkunde tagle nayi ɗe yonki ɗeen, ende vi'a~: — Etergel alkamaari go'otel no soodete ceede kuugal nyanndeere wo'ore. Eterkon gawri taton no coodete ceede kuugal nyanndeere wo'ore. Ammaa ta'a vonnu nebbam jaytunje koo innaboojam.
66006007	Nde Njawdiri ndiin takkiti takkannde nayaɓre, mi nanii ngo'ori nder tagle nayi ɗe yonki vi'i~: — Waroy~!
66006008	Ndeen ngi'imi puccu puru. Innde gonɗo dow ma'agu Maayde, Laahira e tokkiri mo ɓaawo. Ɓe kokkaa baawɗe dow feccere wo'ore nder cende nayi ɗe duuniyaaru, gam ɓe mbarda ɓe kaafaaje e veelo hallungo e nyawuuji e diiwe ladde.
66006009	Nde Njawdiri ndiin takkiti takkannde jovaɓre, mi yi'ii yonkiiji ɓe ɗum wari gam ɗowtanaago voliinde Allah e wa'ajingo nde e goonga. Eɗi lees hirsirde.
66006010	Ɓe ƴefti voliinde e semmbee, ɓe mbi'i~: — Yaa Jawmiraawo Jawmu baawɗe, ceniiɗo, goongaajo, sey ndeye cernanaa duuniyaaru, mba'atanoɗaa min, gam barki ki ɓe mbari min~?
66006011	Sey koo moye maɓɓe hokkaa koltal daneewal, ɓe mbi'aa ɓe poofta seɗɗa, faa nde ɗum hebbiti wargo goonɗinɓe horiiɓe, higooɓe kuugal maɓɓe, ɓe ɗum wardata noon no ɗum wardi ɓe.
66006012	Nde Njawdiri ndiin takkiti takkannde joveego'oore, sey ɗum waɗi dimmbaaki lesdi makki. Naange ɓalwi kurum kama ƴulɓe. Lewru vo'oji coloy kama ƴiiƴam.
66006013	Koode boo caamoyi, noon no ɓikkon ƴibbe caamrata to henndu semmbiɗndu dimmbii ɗe.
66006014	Dow taggii noon no ɗum taggirta daago. Lesɗe gonɗe caka ndiyam e baamle fuu ɗoofaa to ngoni.
66006015	Ndeen laamiiɓe duuniyaaru e aardiiɓe e mawɓe soojeeji e riskuɓe e woonɓe baawɗe e maccuɓe e rimɓe cuuɗii nder luurooji e lees kaaƴe nder baamle.
66006016	Ɓe mbi'i baamle e kaaƴe ɗeen~: — Njanee dow amin, cuuɗon min e huunƴere jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu, kam e Njawdiri.
66006017	Gam nyannde huunƴere maɓɓe hallunde warii. Moye waawata daɗgo~?
66007001	Ɓaawo ma'ajum ngi'imi malaa'ika'en nayo e ndarii buttulli duuniyaaru nayi. Eɓe paddii keni duuniyaaru nayi, gam to' ɗi mbis dow lesdi, koo dow maayo, koo dow koo kiye lekki.
66007002	Sey kadimaa ngi'imi goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo e vurtoyoo gada fu'una, emo jogii ba'aruɗum caayda Allah mo yonki. O towni voliinde, o volvani malaa'ika'en nayo ɓeen, ɓe Allah hokki baawɗe bonnugo duuniyaaru e maayo,
66007003	o vi'i~: — To' on mbonnu duuniyaaru, koo maayo, koo leɗɗe. Ndeentee tawo faa min mbaɗana maccuɓe Allah meeɗen caayda e tihiɗe mu''en.
66007004	Sey nanmi ɗuuɗal waɗanaaɓe caayda ɓeen yaharii yimɓe dubuuje hemre e arba'iin e nayo (144~000). Ɓe fuu nder leƴƴi Isiraa'iila sappo e ɗiɗi ɓe ivi~:
66007005	lenyol Yahuuda yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12~000), lenyol Ruuben yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12~000), lenyol Gaad yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12~000),
66007006	lenyol Aaser yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12~000), lenyol Naftalim yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12~000), lenyol Manasa yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12~000),
66007007	lenyol Simiyon yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12~000), lenyol Leewi yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12~000), lenyol Isaakar yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12~000),
66007008	lenyol Jaabulon yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12~000), lenyol Yusufu yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12~000), lenyol Bennyamin yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12~000).
66007009	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, mi raari, mi yi'ii yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɓe limataako. Yimɓe ɓeen ivii gada koo ndiye lesdi, e koo ngole lenyol, e koo ɓeye yimɓe, e koo ngale ɗemngal. Ɓe fuu eɓe ndarii yeeso jooɗorgal laamu, kam e Njawdiri, eɓe ɓornii kolte daneeje tar, eɓe njogii lison dabiinooje e juuɗe maɓɓe.
66007010	Ɓe ilini e semmbee, ɓe mbi'i~: — Kisndam ivii to Allah meeɗen jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu e Njawdiri~!
66007011	Malaa'ika'en fuu e mawɓe e tagle nayi goonɗe yonki e ndarii pilii jooɗorgal laamu ngaal. Ɓe fuu ɓe ndiccii ɓe cujjidani Allah.
66007012	Ɓe mbi'i~: — Aamiin~! Maaltoore e teddungal e hikima e yettoore e manngu e baawɗe e semmbee laatanoo Allah meeɗen faa abadaa~! Aamiin.
66007013	Sey go'oto nder mawɓe ɓeen ƴami yam, vi'i~: — Ɓe'e yimɓe ɓorniiɓe kolte daneeje, ɗum ɓeye~? Toye ɓe ivi~?
66007014	Sey mbi'imoomi~: — Moodibbo, aan anndi. O vi'i yam~: — Kamɓe ngoni ivoyɓe nder torraa kalluka. Ɓe lohonirii kolte maɓɓe ƴiiƴam Njawdiri, ɗe ndanni tar.
66007015	Kanjum waɗi ɓe ndarii yeeso jooɗorgal laamu Allah. Eɓe kuwana mo jemma e nyalawma nder Wuro ma'ako. Jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu oon no reeney ɓe.
66007016	Ɓe ɓesdataa nango veelo, ɓe ɓesdataa ɗomɗugo. Naange koo gulɗum fuɗɗitataa fiigo ɓe sam.
66007017	Gam Njawdiri ngonndi vuttudu jooɗorgal laamu no laatoto gaynaako maɓɓe. Kadimaa ndi yaharey ɓe to ndiyam yonki ɓulata. Allah boo no mooytey gonɗi maɓɓe fuu.
66008001	Nde Njawdiri ndiin takkiti takkannde joveeɗiɗaɓre, sey ko woni nder asama fuu de''iti faro mintiiji talaatiin (30).
66008002	Ndeen ngi'imi malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo dariiɓe yeeso Allah kokkaama luwe joveeɗiɗi.
66008003	Goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo wari darii yeeso to ɗum wulata urdi mbelndi, emo jogii tummude jiinaariya nde ɗum wulata urdi nder muuɗum. Ɗum hokki mo urdi ɗuuɗndi, gam o hawrita ndi e do'aaje yimɓe Allah, o sakka ndi dow wuldude urdi nde jiinaariya wonnde yeeso jooɗorgal laamu.
66008004	Sey cuurga urdi ndiin ummii gada nder tummude nde o jogii, ndi hawriti e do'aaje seniiɓe, ka yahi yeeso Allah.
66008005	Malaa'ikaajo oon hooƴi tummude urdi ndeen, o hebbini nde yiite to ɗum wulata urdi mbelndi, o sankiti nge dow duuniyaaru. Ndeen palmaali palmi, hoolooji kooli, maƴƴe maƴƴi, lesdi dimmbii.
66008006	Ndeen malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo jogiiɓe luwe joveeɗiɗi ɓeen ciryii duudgo ɗe.
66008007	Malaa'ikaajo arano duudi luwal muuɗum, sey malemalleeje e yiite jillindirnge e ƴiiƴam ndufoyaa dow duuniyaaru. Yiite ngeen nyaami feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe duuniyaaru. Nge nyaami feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe leɗɗe duuniyaaru e fuɗngooji.
66008008	Nde malaa'ikaajo ɗiɗaɓo duudi luwal muuɗum, sey ɗum feri goɗɗum nder maayo nannduɗum e vaamnde mawnde, e ɗum huɓɓi yiite. Feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe maayo ngoon laatii ƴiiƴam.
66008009	Feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe diiwe maayo ngoon mbaati kadimaa feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe akale ndiyam gonɗe ɗoon kalkii.
66008010	Nde malaa'ikaajo tataɓo duudi luwal muuɗum, sey woɗnde hoodere yanoyi gada dow, ende nyaama yiite kama moorol ngol ɗum juumtorto, nde yani dow feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe celi maayo e to ndiyam ɓuldoyta.
66008011	Innde hoodere ndeen «~Kaaɗɗum~». Nde haaɗni feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe ndiyam. Ɗuuɗɓe yarɓe ndiyam ɗaam maayi, gam kaaɗɗum ma'ajam.
66008012	Nde malaa'ikaajo nayaɓo duudi luwal muuɗum, sey ɗum fiyi feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe naange e lewru e koode, faa feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe jayngol naange e lewru e koode niɓɓi. Jemma e nyalawma boo majjini feccere wo'ore nder tati nde jayngol mu''en.
66008013	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, ngi'imi dutal e fiiri toon dow, sey nanmi e ngal vi'a e semmbee~: — On mboni~! On mboni~! On mboni, onon jooɗiiɓe nder duuniyaaru to malaa'ika'en tato horiiɓe nduudii luwe mu''en.
66009001	Nde malaa'ikaajo njovaɓo duudi luwal muuɗum, sey ngi'imi hoodere ivoyii dow, nde yani nder duuniyaaru. Ɗum hokki nde omtirgel dammugal ngaska lugguka ka walaa keerol.
66009002	Nde hoodere ndeen omti ngaska kaan, sey ngoɗka cuurga ɓaleeha vurtoyii kama cuurga ngulu, ka ɓalini naange e henndu kurum.
66009003	Baɓɓatti mburtii nder cuurga kaan, ɗi cankitii nder duuniyaaru. Ɗi kokkaa baawɗe torrugo kama jahe.
66009004	Ɗum vi'i ɗi to' ɗi mbonnu geene koo leɗɗe koo goɗɗi fuɗngooji, sey nii yimɓe ɓe ngalaa caayda Allah dow tihiɗe mu''en tan.
66009005	Ɗi ngooraa ɗi torra yimɓe ɓeen torraa kalluka faa lebbi jovi, ammaa to' ɗi mbar ɓe. Naawɗum ŋatki ma'aji e laatii kama naawɗum ŋatki jahe.
66009006	Nder balɗe ɗeen, yimɓe no ngilloto maayde, ammaa ɓe keɓataa nde, ɓe ngiɗey maaygo, ammaa maayde no nyaarey ɓe.
66009007	Baɓɓatti ɗiin e nanndi e pucci ciryaniiɗi konu. Dow ko'e ma'aji e woodi goɗɗum ko nanndi e giifi jiinaariya, geese ma'aji e nanndi e ɗe yimɓe.
66009008	Gaasa ma'aji e nanndi e ka debbo, nyiiƴe ma'aji e nanndi e ɗe mawndu.
66009009	Eɗi ɓornii goɗɗum nannduɗum e toggohon njamndi e gabaaje ma'aji, sonnyo biyeeli ma'aji e nanndi e sonnyo pucci kaɓɓanaaɗi amalenke konu, eɗi nyaara ummanii konu.
66009010	Eɗi ngoodi ɓokkorɗe piɗooje kama ɗe jahe. Ɓokkorɗe ɗeen e ngoodi baawɗe nawnugo yimɓe faa lebbi jovi.
66009011	Eɗi ngoodi laamiiɗo laamantooɗo ɗi, kanko woni malaa'ikaajo ngaska lugguka ka walaa keerol. Innde ma'ako nder ibraaninkoore woni Abadon, nder helenankoore boo Apooliyon, waato Kalkoowo.
66009012	Torraaji kalluɗi arani ngutake. Horii torraaji kalluɗi ɗiɗi gareyɗi.
66009013	Nde malaa'ikaajo njoveego'oojo duudi luwal muuɗum, sey nanmi voliinde e vurtoyoo nder luwe nayi gonɗe buttuli to ɗum wulata urdi mbelndi nde jiinaariya, wonnde yeeso Allah.
66009014	Voliinde ndeen vi'i malaa'ikaajo oon~: — Yoof ɓen ɗoon malaa'ika'en nayo haɓɓaaɓe e regorde maayo Eferaatis manngo~!
66009015	Sey ɗum yoofi malaa'ika'en nayo ɓeen, ɓe ɗum siryii gam nde'e hitaande e ndu'u lewru e nde'e nyanndeere e ɗu'um wakkaci, gam ɓe mbara feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe yimɓe duuniyaaru.
66009016	Mi nanii ɗuuɗal soojeeji waɗɗiiɓe pucci waɗii miliyooji keme ɗiɗi.
66009017	Nder wahayu ɗuum mi yi'ii pucci e waɗɗiiɓe ɗi, eɓe cuddiri gabaaje maɓɓe toggohon njamndi, mbo'ojukon coloy kama yiite, mbulambulahon, nareeriihon. Koo nguye puccu e woodi hoore kama nde mawndu, kadimaa yiite e cuurga e noorngal e mburtoyoo nder konnduɗe ma'aji.
66009018	Feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe duuniyaaru mbardaa torraaji kalluɗi tati ɗiin, waato yiite e cuurga e noorngal burtoytooɗum nder konnduɗe ma'aji.
66009019	Baawɗe ma'aji nder konnduɗe e ɓokkorɗe ngoni. Ɓokkorɗe ma'aji e ngoodi ko'e kama ɗe bo'ole, e ma'aje ɗi nawnirta yimɓe.
66009020	Yimɓe horiiɓe ɓe torraaji ɗiin mbaraay, ɓe tuubaay ɓe ngooraay ko ɓe mbaɗi e juuɗe maɓɓe. Ɓe ngooraay sujjidango ginnaaji e gumkiiji ɗi ɗum wa'ari jiinaariya koo ajurfaari koo njamndi mboɗeeri koo haayre koo lekki. Ɗi fuu ɗi ngi'ataa, ɗi nanataa, ɗi njahataa.
66009021	Kadimaa ɓe ngooraay waɗgo war-hoore e raarnugo e njeenu e nguyka maɓɓe.
66010001	Ɓaawo ma'ajum, ngi'imi goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo cemmbiɗɗo e jippoyoo gada dow, emo vahanii duule. Timotimoongal e taarii dow hoore ma'ako, yeeso ma'ako e jalbitoo kama naange, kosɗe ma'ako nanndii e danngalle kuɓɓuɗe yiite.
66010002	Emo jogii goɗngel deftel omtiingel e junngo ma'ako. O yaaɓi kosngal ma'ako nyaamal dow maayo, nanal boo dow lesdi.
66010003	O volvi e semmbee kama ƴuttaango mawndu. Nde o volvi, sey palmaali joveeɗiɗi no'otii e hoolo semmbiɗngo.
66010004	Nde palmaali joveeɗiɗi ɗiin kooli, sey nesmi vinndugo, ammaa sey nanmi woɗnde voliinde gada dow, nde vi'i~: — Ta'a vinndu ko palmaali joveeɗiɗi ɗiin mbi'i, suuɗ ɗum~!
66010005	Ndeen malaa'ikaajo mo ngi'imi e darii dow lesdi e dow maayo ƴefti junngo muuɗum nyaamo dow.
66010006	O hunorii e innde Allah poofeyɗo faa abadaa, tagɗo dow e lees e maayo e ko woni nder ma'ago fuu. O vi'i~: — Wakkaci horaaki kadin~!
66010007	To malaa'ikaajo njoveeɗiɗaɓo duudii luwal muuɗum, Allah no hebbiney sirri muuɗum, noon no o vi'inoo maccuɓe ma'ako annabo'en.
66010008	Ndeen ɓesdumi nango voliinde nde nannoomi gada dow, nde ɓesdi volvango yam, nde vi'i~: — Yah, njaɓaa ngel ɗoon deftel omtiingel e junngo malaa'ikaajo dariiɗo dow maayo e lesdi.
66010009	Sey njahami to malaa'ikaajo oon, mbi'imoomi o hokka yam deftel ngeel. Sey o vi'i yam~: — Jaɓ ngel nyaam, ngel veley nder honnduko maaɗa kama njuumri, ammaa ngel haaɗey nder reedu maaɗa.
66010010	Sey njaɓmi ngel e junngo malaa'ikaajo oon nyaammi. Ngel laatii belngel nder honnduko am kama njuumri, ammaa ɓaawo mi moɗii ngel, ngel laatii kaaɗngel nder reedu am.
66010011	Sey ɗum ɓesdi vi'igo yam~: — Doole ɓesdaa waɗgo annabaaku dow yimɓe e leƴƴi e ɗemɗe feere-feere e laamiiɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
66011001	Ndeen ɗum hokki yam ƴommbal potnirgal nanndungal e sawru, ɗum vi'i yam~: — Umma, yah fotnu Wuro Allah Seniingo e to ɗum wulata urdi, limaa sujjidanooɓe Allah wonɓe nder ma'ago.
66011002	Ammaa ta'a fotnu fiiliire wuro ngoon, woor nde, gam nde yoofanaama leƴƴi ɗi laataaki Yahuudu'en. Ɓe njaaɓey si'ire seniinde e semmbee faa lebbi arba'iin e ɗiɗi (42).
66011003	Mi hokkey caaydu'en am ɗiɗo ɓorniiɓe kolte pahatu kuugal wa'ajingo voliinde am, faa balɗe dubuu e keme ɗiɗi e settiin (1~260).
66011004	Caaydu'en ɗiɗo ɓeen ngoni leɗɗe jaytunje ɗiɗi e fitilaaji ɗiɗi dariiɗum yeeso jawmu duuniyaaru.
66011005	Giɗɗo hallango ɓe fuu, yiite no vurtoyto nder konnduɗe maɓɓe nge halka wanywanyɓe maɓɓe. Noon giɗɗo hallango ɓe fuu wardete.
66011006	Eɓe ngoodi baawɗe haɗgo iyoonde toɓa nder balɗe ɗe ɓe nga'ajinta voliinde Jawmiraawo. Kadimaa eɓe ngoodi baawɗe wartirgo ndiyam ƴiiƴam. Eɓe ngoodi boo baawɗe jippinango duuniyaaru koo iri kaye torraa kalluka nde ɓe ngiɗi fuu.
66011007	Ɓaawo ɓe keynii ga'ajinki maɓɓe, ngoɗnga ndiiwa kulniinga no vurtoto nder ngaska lugguka ka walaa keerol, nga haɓa e maɓɓe, nga jaaloo ɓe, nga wara ɓe.
66011008	Ɓalli maɓɓe ngooree dow laawol si'ire mawnde to Jawmiraawo maɓɓe waraa dow gaafagal. Si'ire ndeen e soomree Sodoma e lesdi Misira.
66011009	Yimɓe gada koo ndiye lesdi e koo ɗiye leƴƴi e koo ɗeye ɗemɗe no ngarey ndaara ɓalli ɗiin, faa balɗe tati e feccere, ɓe kaɗa ɗi uveego.
66011010	Yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu no naney belɗum, ɓe mbaɗa juulɗe, ɓe kokkindira caahuuji, gam annabo'en ɗiɗo torrunooɓe duuniyaaru ɓeen maayii.
66011011	Ammaa ɓaawo balɗe tati e feccere ɗeen, sey poofɗe yonki ivoyɗe to Allah natti ɓe, ɓe ummii ɓe ndarii. Kulol manngol nanngi koo moye giiɗo ɓe.
66011012	Ndeen annabo'en ɗiɗo ɓeen nani woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde gada dow e vi'a ɓe~: — Ƴeeŋoyee ɗo'o~! Ɓe ƴeenyi asama nder ruuldere, wanywanyɓe maɓɓe e ndarii ndaara.
66011013	Ɗoon e ɗoon lesdi dimmbii e semmbee, sey feccere wo'ore nder cende sappo ɗe si'ire ndeen yibbii, yimɓe dubuuje njoveeɗiɗo kalki. Kulol manngol nanngi horiiɓe, ɓe mawnini Allah mo dow.
66011014	Halkere ɗiɗaɓre ƴaɓɓake. Halkere tataɓre e wara naa ko neeɓii.
66011015	Malaa'ikaajo njoveeɗiɗaɓo duudi luwal muuɗum, sey ɗum nani woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde gada dow e vi'a~: — Laamu duuniyaaru fuu laatake ngu Jawmiraawo meeɗen e Almasiifu muuɗum. O laamoto faa abadaa abadin.
66011016	Ndotti'en aciriin e nayo (24) jooɗiiɓe dow jooɗorɗe laamu mu''en yeeso Allah ndiccii yeeso ma'ako, ɓe cujjidani mo.
66011017	Eɓe mbi'a~: «~Yaa Allah Jawmiraawo, Jawmu baawɗe, aan woni jo'oni, aan woni ndeenno~! Min ngettii ma, gam a huutinirii baawɗe maaɗa mawɗe a jo''inii laamu maaɗa.
66011018	Leƴƴi ɗi anndaa ma kuunƴi, ammaa huunƴere maaɗa warii. Wakkaci sernango maayɓe warii, wakkaci biyaago annabo'en maccuɓe maaɗa, e seniiɓe, e hulooɓe innde maaɗa, mawɓe e famarɓe. Wakkaci waɗii nde kalkataa halkooɓe duuniyaaru.~»
66011019	Ndeen Wuro Allah Seniingo wonngo dow omtii, akootiiwa alkawal yi'aa nder ma'ago. Sey maƴƴe maƴƴi, palmaali e diggaali e dimmbaaki lesdi mbaɗi, malemalleeje mawɗe toɓi.
66012001	Goɗɗum kaayniiɗum kulniiɗum vanngi toon dow. Goɗɗo debbo e vahanii naange darii dow lewru. Emo yiifii giifol ngol koode sappo e ɗiɗi.
66012002	O gaamɗo, emo diccii o danyey, emo voya gam naawɗum ŋatawre.
66012003	Kadimaa goɗɗum kaayniiɗum kulniiɗum vanngi toon dow. Ɗum ngoɗnga mbo'oga mboɗeewa, nga ko'e joveeɗiɗi e luwe sappo, hoore fuu e giifol muuɗum.
66012004	Ɓokkorde ma'aga vuuvi feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe koode, nga rufoyi ɗe dow duuniyaaru. Nga wari nga darii yeeso on ɗoon debbo dicciiɗo danya, gam nga nyaama ɓinngel ma'ako ɗoon to o danyii ngel.
66012005	Ndeen o danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko laamorantooɗo duuniyaaru e sawru njamndi. Ammaa ɓiɗɗo oon piiftaa yaharaa to Allah e jooɗorgal laamu muuɗum.
66012006	Debbo oon nyaari, natti ladde yahi woɗnde yaayre to Allah siryanii mo. Toon o maraa faa balɗe dubuu e keme ɗiɗi e settiin (1~260).
66012007	Sey konu ummii toon dow. Miikaa'iilu e malaa'ika'en muuɗum konkontiri e mbo'oga ngaan e malaa'ika'en ma'aga.
66012008	Ammaa nga jaalaa, nga tuufoyaa gada toon dow, kanga e malaa'ika'en ma'aga.
66012009	Nga feroyaa nder duuniyaaru. Mbo'oga ngaan e woonnoo ila ndeenno, kanga vi'etee Ibiliisa koo Ceyɗaan majjinoowo duuniyaaru. Nga feraa nder duuniyaaru kanga e malaa'ika'en ma'aga fuu.
66012010	Ndeen nanmi woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde gada dow e vi'a~: «~Jo'oni kisndam, e semmbee, e laamu Allah meeɗen, e baawɗe Almasiifu ma'ako ngarii. Gam gullotooɗo banndiraaɓe meeɗen yeeso Allah jemma e nyalawma tuufaama gada dow.
66012011	Ɓe keɓi jaalorgal dow ma'ako gada e ƴiiƴam Njawdiri e haala Allah ka ɓe nga'ajini. Ɓe ngiɗaay hisnugo yonkiiji maɓɓe e maayde.
66012012	Gam ma'ajum, aan asama e jooɗiiɓe toon, nanee belɗum~! Ammaa onon wonɓe nder duuniyaaru e ko woni nder maayo, on mboni~! Gam Ceyɗaan jipponoyake on nder huunƴere kama o fusa, gam emo anndi wakkaci ma'ako ɓadake timmugo.~»
66012013	Nde mbo'oga ngaan annditi tuufaama nder duuniyaaru, sey nga fuɗɗi yillaago debbo oon danyɗo ɓiɗɗo gorko.
66012014	Ammaa debbo oon hokkaa biyeeli ɗiɗi ɗi dutal manngal, gam o fiira o yaha nder ladde yaayre nde ɗum siryanii mo. Toon ɗum marata mo faa duuɓi tati e lebbi joveego'o.
66012015	Sey mbo'oga ngaan tuuti ndiyam ɗuuɗɗam, ɗam ili ɓaawo debbo oon kama maayo, gam ɗam hooƴa mo.
66012016	Ammaa lesdi valli debbo oon, ndi omti honnduko ma'ari, ndi yardi ndiyam ɗam mbo'oga ngaan tuuti.
66012017	Sey mbo'oga ngaan huunƴani debbo oon, nga ummoyii nga hona lenyol ma'ako, waato ɓeen ɗowtaniiɓe dookaaji Allah e bolle Yeesu.
66012018	Mbo'oga ngaan darii dow njaareendi regorde maayo.
66013001	Ndeen ngi'imi ngoɗndi ndiiwri e vurtoyoo nder maayo, endi woodi ko'e joveeɗiɗi e luwe sappo. Koo ngale luwal e woodi giifol, koo ndeye hoore boo e woodi innde huɗeynde Allah.
66013002	Ndiiwri ndi ngi'imi ndiin e nanndi e kelu, endi woodi kosɗe mawɗe ɗe gaasa, e peɗeeli juutɗi kama ɗi ndiiwri ladde mbi'eteendi uurs. Honnduko ma'ari e nanndi e ko mawndu. Mbo'oga hokki ndiiwri ndiin semmbee muuɗum e jooɗorgal laamu muuɗum e baawɗe mawɗe.
66013003	Hoore wo'ore nder ko'e ndiiwri ndiin e woodi nawnannde waaweynde wargo ndi. Ammaa nawnannde ndeen hoyii. Ɗum haaynii yimɓe duuniyaaru, ɓe tokki ndi.
66013004	Ɓe cujjidani mbo'oga ngaan, gam nga hokkii ndiiwri ndiin baawɗe ma'aga. Kadimaa ɓe cujjidani ndiiwri ndiin, ɓe mbi'i~: — Moye foti e ndi'i ndiiwri~? Moye waawi haɓgo e ma'ari~?
66013005	Ndiiwri ndiin hokkaa baawɗe volvugo bolle manta, e huɗgo Jawmiraawo, ndi wooraa ndi laamoo faa lebbi arba'iin e ɗiɗi (42).
66013006	Ndi fuɗɗi huɗgo Allah e innde muuɗum, e to o jooɗotoo, e jooɗiiɓe toon dow fuu.
66013007	Ndi wooraa ndi hona yimɓe Allah, ndi heɓa jaalorgal dow maɓɓe. Ndi hokkaa baawɗe dow koo ngole lenyol, e yimɓe, e ɗemɗe, e lesɗe.
66013008	Jooɗiiɓe nder duuniyaaru fuu no cujjidaney ndi. Kamɓe ngoni ɓe inɗe mu''en mbinndaaka nder deftere yonki ila fuɗɗam duuniyaaru, nde Njawdiri mbaraandi.
66013009	Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana~!
66013010	Mo ɗum hiitii haɓɓee yaharee maccungaaku, haɓɓee yaharee, mo ɗum hiitii wardee kaafahi, o wardee ki. Gam ma'ajum, sey yimɓe Allah ti'inoo jogaago munyal e goonɗinki.
66013011	Ndeen ngi'imi ndiiwri feere e vurtoyoo nder lesdi. Endi woodi luwe ɗiɗi kama ɗe njawdiri, endi volva kama mbo'oga.
66013012	Ndi huutiri baawɗe iri ɗe ndiiwri arandi, ndi huutiniri ɗe yeeso arandi ndiin. Ndi waɗi duuniyaaru e wonɓe nder ma'aru fuu cujjidana ndiiwri arandi, ndi nawnannde muuɗum hoyi.
66013013	Ndiiwri ɗiɗaɓri ndiin waɗi alaamaaji kaayniiɗi ɗuuɗɗi, faa maa ndi waɗi yiite rufoyi nder duuniyaaru gada dow, yeeso gite koo moye.
66013014	Ndi majjinirii yimɓe duuniyaaru e kuuɗe kaayniiɗe ɗe ndi hokkaa huugo yeeso ndiiwri arandi. Ndiiwri ɗiɗaɓri ndiin vi'i yimɓe maha ngumkiwa nanndunga e ndiiwri arandi nawniranoondi kaafahi faa nesi waatgo, e noon fuu endi foofa.
66013015	Ndi hokkaa baawɗe faa ndi waɗi yonki nder ngumkiwa ngaan. Ngumkiwa ngaan fuɗɗi volvugo, nga waɗi ɗum wara caliiɗo sujjidango nga fuu.
66013016	Ndiiwri ndiin dooli yimɓe fuu, mawɗo e pamaro, diskuɗo e cooyɗo, maccuɗo e dimo, ɓe mbaɗanee caayda e junngo nyaamo, koo e tihinde.
66013017	Ndi waɗii ɗum, gam to' goɗɗo sooda koo soorra, kul walaa caayda kaan, waato innde ndiiwri arandi, koo lammba ma'ari.
66013018	Ɗo'o e yiɗi hakkiilo. Goonɗo fahamu fuu e waawi vurtingo ma'ana lammba ndiiwri ndiin, gam ɗum lammba innde neɗɗo. Lammba kaan woni keme joveego'o e settiin e joveego'o (666).
66014001	Ndeen ndaarmi ngi'imi Njawdiri e darii dow vaamnde Siyoona, endi wondi e yimɓe dubuuje hemre e arba'iin e nayo (144~000). Innde ma'ari e innde Baaba ma'ari e vinndii dow tihiɗe maɓɓe.
66014002	Sey nanmi woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde gada dow, kama iido maayo manngo, kama riggaango semmbiɗngo. Voliinde ndeen e nanndi e sunnyere piiki moolooji.
66014003	Eɓe ngima gimol kesol yeeso jooɗorgal laamu e yeeso tagle nayi ɗe yonki, e yeeso ndotti'en. Walaa baaweyɗo ekkitaago gimol ngool, to naa yimɓe dubuuje hemre e arba'iin e nayo (144~000) ɓeen tan, ɓe ɗum soottii e duuniyaaru.
66014004	Kamɓe ngoni waɗɓe jo'onde laaɓnde, gam ɓe meeɗaay waaldugo e rewɓe, eɓe tokki Njawdiri ndiin to ndi fa'i fuu. Kamɓe ngoni soottaaɓe nder yimɓe duuniyaaru, gam ɓe laatoo kokkal aranal to Allah e Njawdiri ndiin.
66014005	Fewre meeɗaay vurtaago nder konnduɗe maɓɓe, ɓe ngalaa feloore.
66014006	Ndeen ngi'imi goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo e fiira toon dow, emo jogii Habaru Belɗum tabbiteyɗum, gam o wa'ajina yimɓe duuniyaaru, e koo ngole lenyol, e koo ɓeye yimɓe, e koo ngale ɗemngal, e koo ndiye lesdi.
66014007	O towni voliinde e semmbee o vi'i~: — Kulee Allah, mawninee mo~! Gam wakkaci o sernanta duuniyaaru waɗii. Mawninee tagɗo dow e lesdi e maayo e ɓulduɗe ndiyam.
66014008	Malaa'ikaajo ɗiɗaɓo tokki arano, e vi'a~: — Si'ire Babiila yibbii~! Si'ire Babiila mawnde yibbii~! Nde yarnii leƴƴi duuniyaaru innaboojam njeenu ma'are nyaaɗɗam.
66014009	Malaa'ikaajo tataɓo tokki aramɓe ɗiɗo ɓeen, e vi'a e semmbee~: — Cujjidanɗo ndiiwri arandi e ngumkiwa nanndunga e ma'ari, jaɓi caayda ma'ari e junngo muuɗum koo e tihinde muuɗum,
66014010	no yarey innaboojam huunƴere Allah ɗam gillaaka, ɗam o waɗi nder horde huunƴere ma'ako. O torrirte yiite e ƴibiriitu yeeso malaa'ika'en seniiɓe e Njawdiri.
66014011	Cuurga yiite nge ɗum torrirta ɓe no ummoto dow faa abadaa. Ɓeen sujjidanɓe ndiiwri ndiin e ngumkiwa nanndunga e ma'ari, mbaɗanaa caayda innde ma'ari fuu, ɓe ustantaake torraa jemma e nyalawma.
66014012	Gam ma'ajum, yimɓe Allah tokkuɓe ko o vi'i, ngoonɗini Yeesu, sey mbaɗa munyal.
66014013	Ndeen ɓesdumi nango woɗnde voliinde gada dow e vi'a~: — Vinndu ɗu'um~: Gada jo'oni maayɓe e tokki Jawmiraawo no keɓey barkaa. Ruhu Allah vi'i~: — Goonga, ɓe pooftey e torraa maɓɓe, gam laada kuugal maɓɓe no tokkey ɓe.
66014014	Ndeen ngi'imi ruuldere raneere, goɗɗo kama Ɓii-Neɗɗo e jooɗii dow ma'are, emo yiifii giifol jiinaariya, emo jogii lawjeeru velndu e junngo ma'ako.
66014015	Sey goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo vurtoyii nder Wuro Allah Seniingo, o volvani oon jooɗiiɗo dow ruulde e semmbee, o vi'i~: — Foortu lawjeeru maaɗa, puɗɗaa taygo, gam wakkaci tayre waɗii. Duuniyaaru ɓenndii, ndu fotii taƴeego.
66014016	Sey jooɗiiɗo dow ruuldere oon foorti lawjeeru muuɗum, o taƴi duuniyaaru fuu.
66014017	Malaa'ikaajo feere vurtoyii nder Wuro Allah Seniingo wonngo toon dow. Kanko maa emo jogii lawjeeru velndu.
66014018	Ndeen goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo deeneyɗo yiite nge ɗum wuldata urdi mbelndi vurtoyii. O volvani malaa'ikaajo jogiiɗo lawjeeru velndu e voliinde semmbiɗnde o vi'i~: — Foortu lawjeeru maaɗa taƴaa innabooje duuniyaaru, gam ɓikkon ma'aje ɓenndii.
66014019	Malaa'ikaajo oon foorti lawjeeru muuɗum nder duuniyaaru, o taƴi ɓikkon innabooje, o feri kon nder ɓiɗɗirde huunƴere Allah.
66014020	Ɗum yaaɓi kon nder ɓiɗɗirde yaasi si'ire. Ƴiiƴam waɗi ga iloygo nder ɓiɗɗirde ndeen, faa ɗam yahari kiloomeetirji keme ɗiɗi e tasa'iin e joveego'o (296). Luggeenga ma'ajam waɗi meetir go'o e feccere.
66015001	Ɓaawo ma'ajum ngi'imi ngoɗka alaama makka kaayniika toon dow. Mi yi'ii malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo jogiiɓe torraaji joveeɗiɗi cakitiiɗi kalluɗi. Kanji ngoni timmoode huunƴere Allah.
66015002	Ndeen ngi'imi goɗɗum kama maayo daarorɗe gillindirngo e yiite. Kadimaa mi yi'ii heɓɓe jaalorgal dow ndiiwri arandi ndiin e ngumkiwa nanndunga e ma'ari e lammba innde ma'ari. Eɓe ndarii regorde maayo daarorɗe ngoon, eɓe njogii moolooji ɗi Allah hokki ɓe.
66015003	Eɓe ngima gimol Muusa maccuɗo Allah e gimol Njawdiri, eɓe mbi'a~: «~Yaa Allah Jawmiraawo, Laamiiɗo Laamlaamɓe, kuuɗe maaɗa no mawɗe, kaayniiɗe. Laabi maaɗa no aadaliiji, goongaaji~! Aan woni laamiiɗo leƴƴi.
66015004	Moye woni hulataa ma, ya Jawmiraawo~? Moye salotoo mawningo innde maaɗa~? Gam aan tan woni ceniiɗo. Yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu no ngarey cujjidan maa, gam ɓe ngi'ii no kuuɗe maaɗa laatorii aadaliije.~»
66015005	Ɓaawo ma'ajum mi yi'ii yaayre ɓurnde senaago nder Wuro Seniingo wonngo toon dow e omtii.
66015006	Malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo jogiiɓe torraaji kalluɗi ɓeen mburtoyii nder wuro ngoon, eɓe ɓornii kolte ɗelemɗe, booɗɗe, ɗelkitooɗe, eɓe taadii taadorɗe jiinaariya e gabaaje maɓɓe.
66015007	Ndeen go'otum nder tagle nayi ɗe yonki ɗeen hokki malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo ɓeen tummuɗe joveeɗiɗi ɗe jiinaariya, eɗe keevi huunƴere Allah mo yonki faa abadaa abadin.
66015008	Sey cuurga teddungal Allah e baawɗe muuɗum heevi wuro ngoon. Walaa baawɗo nattugo ngo, sey to torraaji joveeɗiɗi ɗiin ɗi malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo ɓeen timmii.
66016001	Ndeen nanmi woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde gada nder Wuro Seniingo wonngo toon dow, e vi'a malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo ɓeen~: — Njahee ndufanon duuniyaaru tummuɗe joveeɗiɗi ɗe huunƴere Allah~!
66016002	Malaa'ikaajo arano yahi rufi ko woni nder tummude muuɗum dow lesdi. Sey goɗɗe putte naawɗe kalluɗe mburtonoyii ɓeen woonɓe caayda ndiiwri arandi e sujjidanɓe ngumkiwa nanndunga e ma'ari.
66016003	Malaa'ikaajo ɗiɗaɓo maa rufi ko woni e tummude muuɗum nder maayo. Sey ndiyam maayo ngoon laatii kama ƴiiƴam maayɗo. Koo ɗume ko woodi yonki gonɗum nder maayo ngoon waati.
66016004	Sey malaa'ikaajo tataɓo rufi ko woni e tummude muuɗum nder ilaali e ɓulduɗe ndiyam, ɗum fuu ɗum laatii ƴiiƴam.
66016005	Ndeen nanmi malaa'ikaajo deeneyɗo ndiyam e vi'a~: — Yaa Ceniiɗo, aan woni ndeenno, aan woni jo'oni. Aan a aadaliijo nder ceri'a maaɗa.
66016006	A hokkii halluɓe ɓeen ƴiiƴam ɓe njara. Noon ɓe kaandi, gam ɓe ndufii ƴiiƴam yimɓe maaɗa e annabo'en maaɗa.
66016007	Sey nanmi voliinde gada to ɗum wulata urdi mbelndi, e vi'a~: — Goonga, Allah Jawmiraawo jawmu baawɗe~! A wa'ara ceri'a goonga e aadilaaku~!
66016008	Ndeen malaa'ikaajo nayaɓo rufi ko woni e tummude muuɗum dow naange. Sey nge wooraa nge sumra yimɓe e gulɗum ma'age.
66016009	Naawɗum naange hallunge ngeen sumi yimɓe, faa ɓe kuɗi innde Allah mo baawɗe sabu torraaji joveeɗiɗi ɗiin. E noon fuu ɓe tuubaay, ɓe mawninaay mo.
66016010	Malaa'ikaajo njovaɓo maa rufi ko woni e tummude muuɗum dow jooɗorgal laamu ndiiwri arandi ndiin, sey niɓre omndi koo toye to ndi laamoto. Yimɓe ŋati ɗemɗe mu''en, sabu naawɗum.
66016011	Ɓe kuɗi Allah mo dow sabu naawɗum putte kalluɗe keɓɗe ɓe. Ammaa e noon fuu ɓe tuubaay gada e kuuɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe.
66016012	Malaa'ikaajo njoveego'ojo rufi ko woni e tummude muuɗum nder maayo Eferaatis manngo. Maayo ngoon ɓeeɓi, ngo yo'ori, gam siryanaago laamiiɓe fu'una laawol.
66016013	Sey ngi'imi goɗɗi ginnaaji kalluɗi tati nannduɗi e paaɓi. Go'otol e vurtoyoo nder honnduko mbo'oga, go'otol boo e vurtoyoo nder honnduko ndiiwri ɗiɗaɓri, go'otol e vurtoyoo nder honnduko annabiijo fewre.
66016014	Kanji ngoni ginnaaji baɗooji kuuɗe kaayniiɗe, jaheyɗi to laamiiɓe duuniyaaru, ɗi kawrita ɓe, gam konu nyannde-darngal nde Allah jawmu baawɗe.
66016015	Kiimtee ko Yeesu vi'inoo, o vi'i~: — Rah, mi warey kama gujjo~! Barkaa no laatanto baalɗo e reentii, e ɓornii kolte muuɗum, gam to' o dillu o suhuraaki o semta yeeso yimɓe.
66016016	Ginnaaji ɗiin kawriti laamiiɓe ɓeen yaayre vi'eteende Armagedon nder ɗemngal ibraaninkoore.
66016017	Ndeen malaa'ikaajo njoveeɗiɗaɓo rufi ko woni e tummude muuɗum nder henndu. Sey woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde vurtoyii to jooɗorgal laamu nder Wuro Seniingo wonngo toon dow, ende vi'a~: — Ɗum heƴii~!
66016018	Sey ɗum waɗi maƴƴe e diggaali e palmaali e dimmbaaki lesdi kalluki, iri ki ɗum meeɗaay waɗgo gada yimɓe tagaa e duuniyaaru.
66016019	Si'ire Babiila mawnde senndii cende tati, ci'e duuniyaaru ngibbii. Sey Allah hiimtii si'ire Babiila mawnde, o yarni nde horde innaboojam huunƴere ma'ako hallunde.
66016020	Koo ndiye lesdi ngonndi caka ndiyam nuci, baamle mawɗe majji.
66016021	Malemalleeje teddirɗe kilooji arba'iin (40) mbaɗi ga yanoygo dow yimɓe, faa ɓe kuɗi Allah sabu torraa malemalleeje ɗeen, gam ka hallii korey.
66017001	Sey go'oto nder malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo jogiiɓe tummuɗe joveeɗiɗi ɗeen wari vi'i yam~: — War mi hollu maa no Allah halkirta on ɗoon jeenoowo inndinɗo, waato si'ire mawnde wonnde ha'ade ilaali.
66017002	Laamiiɓe duuniyaaru mba'adii e ma'ako njeenu. Njeenu ngu yimɓe duuniyaaru mba'adi e ma'ako yiiltii ɓe.
66017003	Nder wahayu ɗuum, malaa'ikaajo oon hooƴi yam yahari yam nder ladde. Toon ngi'imi goɗɗo debbo e jooɗii dow ngoɗndi ndiiwri mboɗeeri coloy, ɓanndu ma'ari fuu e heevi inɗe kuɗooje Allah, endi woodi ko'e joveeɗiɗi e luwe sappo.
66017004	Debbo oon e ɓornii kolte bo'ojiteyɗe e boɗeeje coloy, emo sinngitorii koɗi jiinaariya e koɗi ba'araaɗi kaaƴe dime feere-feere. Emo jogii horde jiinaariya e junngo ma'ako, ende heevi innaboojam karamɗam, waato njeenu ma'ako nefniingu.
66017005	E tihinde ma'ako ɗum vinndi innde nde ma'ana cuuɗiika~: «~Babiila mawnde, inna kaaruwa'en, inna koo ɗume nefniiɗum duuniyaaru.~»
66017006	Mi yi'ii debbo oon e yiiltii, sabu ƴiiƴam yimɓe Allah ɗam o yari, e ƴiiƴam waraaɓe gam jogaago bolle Yeesu. Nde ngi'imoomi mi haayɗinii korey.
66017007	Ammaa malaa'ikaajo oon ƴami yam vi'i~: — Ko jeyi kaayɗintaa~? Mi yeccete ma'ana sirri debbo oon, e sirri ndiiwri ndi o waɗɗii, ndi ko'e joveeɗiɗi e luwe sappo.
66017008	Ndiiwri ndi ngiiɗaa, ndeenno endi woodi, jo'oni ndi walaa. Ndi ɓadake vurtaago nder ngaska lugguka ka walaa keerol, ndi yaha to ndi halketee. Yimɓe jooɗiiɓe nder duuniyaaru, ɓe ɗum vinndaay inɗe mu''en nder deftere yonki ila fuɗɗam duuniyaaru, no kaayɗiney yi'igo ndiiwri ndiin. Gam ndeenno e ndi woodi, jo'oni ndi walaa, ammaa ndi vittoyey.
66017009	Ɗu'um e holla doole neɗɗo tawree hikima e fahamu. Ko'e joveeɗiɗi ɗeen ɗum ƴoole joveeɗiɗi ɗe debbo oon jooɗii dow muuɗum,
66017010	kanje boo ngoni laamiiɓe njoveeɗiɗo. Njovo maɓɓe maayi, njoveego'oojo e laamii jo'oni, njoveeɗiɗaɓo boo waraay tawo. To o warii o laamoto wakkaci seɗɗa tan.
66017011	Ndiiwri ngoonnoondi, jo'oni boo ndi walaa, kayri woni go'oto nder laamiiɓe njoveeɗiɗo. Ndi laatoto boo laamiiɗo njoveetataɓo, ammaa timmoode ma'ari ɗum halkere.
66017012	Luwe sappo ɗe ngiiɗaa ɗeen, ɗum laamiiɓe sappo ɓe puɗɗaay laamaago tawo, ammaa ɗum hokkey ɓe baawɗe laamodaago e ndiiwri ndiin wakkaci seɗɗa.
66017013	Laamiiɓe sappo ɓeen fuu, nyumo maɓɓe no wo'oto, kadimaa ɓe kokkey ndiiwri ndiin baawɗe maɓɓe e teddungal maɓɓe.
66017014	Ɓe konkontirey e Njawdiri, ammaa Njawdiri ndiin no heɓey jaalorgal dow maɓɓe, gam kayri woni Jawmiraawo Jawmiraaɓe, Laamiiɗo Laamlaamɓe. Ndi jaaloto ɓe, kayri e ɓeen noddaaɓe suɓaaɓe hoolaaɓe.
66017015	Malaa'ikaajo oon vi'i yam~: — Ɗam ɗoon ndiyam ɗam ngiiɗaa to debbo jeenoowo oon jooɗii, ɗum leƴƴi e yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe e yimɓe lesɗe feere-feere e ɗemɗe.
66017016	Ɗen ɗoon luwe sappo ɗe ngiiɗaa boo, kanje e ndiiwri ndiin ɗe nganyey debbo oon, ɗe te'eta ko o woodi fuu, ɗe ɓorta mo, ɗe nyaama teewu ma'ako, ɗe ngula mo e yiite.
66017017	Gam Allah ɗowi ɓerɗe maɓɓe, faa ɓe kuwa ko o yiɗi, ɓe laatoto ɓe nyumo wo'oto, ɓe kokka ndiiwri ndiin laamu maɓɓe, faa ɗum hebbina ko Allah vi'i.
66017018	Debbo mo ngiiɗaa oon, kanko woni si'ire mawnde laamaniinde laamiiɓe duuniyaaru.
66018001	Ɓaawo ma'ajum mi yi'ii goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo mo baawɗe mawɗe e jippoyoo gada dow. Teddungal ma'ako yaynanii duuniyaaru fuu.
66018002	O noddi e semmbee, o vi'i~: «~Nde do''ake~! Si'ire Babiila mawnde do''ake~! Nde laatake jooɗorde ginnaaji, e suuɗorde ginnaaji kalluɗi, e hawritirde koo ɗiye colli nefniiɗi karamɗi,
66018003	Gam leƴƴi duuniyaaru fuu njarii innaboojam njeenu ma'are, Laamiiɓe duuniyaaru boo mba'adii e ma'are njeenu. Waɗooɓe luumaaku nder duuniyaaru ndiskirii velvelo ma'are ƴaɓɓitiingo.~»
66018004	Ndeen nanmi woɗnde voliinde gada dow e vi'a~: «~Mburtee nder ma'are, onon yimɓe am, gam to' on kawtu e hakkeeji ma'are, to' torraa kalluka keɓeyka nde heɓ on.
66018005	Sabu hakkeeji ma'are njowndindirii faa ɗi kewtii asama. Allah yeggitaay kalluɗum ɗum nde waɗi.
66018006	Mbaɗanee nde noon no nde waɗani woɓɓe. Ko nde waɗi, mbaɗanee nde ɗum nde ɗiɗi. Kaaɗɗum ɗum nde su'utannoo woɓɓe, cu'utanee nde ɗum nde ɗiɗi nder tummude ma'are.
66018007	Torree nde, mboynee nde, deydey e no nde mawniniri hoore ma'are e nanki belɗum ɗum nde nani. Gam ende vi'a hoore ma'are~: Emi jooɗii, mi laamiiɗo Miin, naa mi debbo mo gorko muuɗum maayi. Mi nattataa waannaare sam.
66018008	Gam ma'ajum torraa kalluka no yooftanto nde nder nyanndeere wo'ore~: maayde e waannaare e veelo hallungo. Kadimaa nde wulee e yiite, gam Allah Jawmiraawo cernaneyɗo nde no cemmbiɗɗo.~»
66018009	Laamiiɓe duuniyaaru hawtuɓe e ma'are njeenu e velvelo no mbaɗey ga voygo e ngulla gam ma'are, to ɓe ngi'ii cuurga yiite nyaameynge nde.
66018010	Ɓe ndaroto to woɗɗi, gam eɓe kula to' torraa ka nde yarata hewtu ɓe. Ɓe mbi'a~: — A voni~! A voni~! Aan Babiila si'ire mawnde, semmbiɗnde~! Nder wakkaci seɗɗa, torraa kalluka yananii ma.
66018011	Waɗooɓe luumaaku nder duuniyaaru no mboyey pahatana nde, gam walaa luumoojo coodeyɗo goɗɗum to maɓɓe kadin.
66018012	Walaa coodeyɗo jiinaariya maɓɓe, e ajurfaari maɓɓe, e kaaƴe maɓɓe dime, e lu'ulu'uuji maɓɓe, e kolte ɗelemɗe laaɓɗe ɗelkitotooɗe, e kolte ɗelemɗe dime bi'eteeɗe «~siliki~», e kolte bo'ojiteyɗe, e kolte boɗeeje coloy, e koo iri ɗeye leɗɗe uurooje, e koo ɗume cehaaɗum e nyiiƴe nyiibi, e leɗɗe dime, e njamndi mboɗeeri, e ɗum jamɗe, e kaaƴe daneeje dime,
66018013	e sinamon, e conndi borkoono mbelndi, e urdi mbelndi nguleteendi, e nebbam mbi'eteeɗam «~miir~», e urdi mbelndi nguleteendi mbi'eteendi «~firankinsen~», e innaboojam, e nebbam, e conndi alkamaari, e alkamaari, e na'i, e baali, e be'i, e pucci, e mootaaji pucci, e maccuɓe, e yonkiiji mu''en.
66018014	Waɗooɓe luumo mbi'i nde~: — Ku'uje ɗe ngiɗɗaa heɓgo fuu majjorii ma, risku maaɗa e sinngaaji maaɗa fuu majjii, a fuɗɗitataa keɓaa ɗum.
66018015	Luumooɓe heɓɓe risku gam wa'adugo luumaaku e ma'are, no ndaroto to woɗɗi, gam eɓe kula to' torraa ka nde yarata hewtu ɓe. Ɓe mboyey bojji naawɗi, ɓe pahata,
66018016	eɓe mbi'a~: — A voni~! A voni~! Aan si'ire mawnde, ɓorninoonde kolte ɗelemɗe, laaɓɗe, ɗelkitotooɗe, e kolte bo'ojiteyɗe, e kolte boɗeeje coloy, sinngitoriinde e ko wa'araa jiinaariya, e kaaƴe dime, e lu'ulu'uuji~!
66018017	Ammaa nder wakkaci seɗɗa, jawdi ndiin ndi fuu ndi halkii~! Darvanooɓe akale ndiyam e nattooɓe ɗe e fooɗooɓe ɗe e waɗooɓe luumaaku dow maayo fuu, ɓe ndarii to woɗɗi.
66018018	Ɓe mboyi nde ɓe ngi'i cuurga yiite nyaameynge nde, eɓe mbi'a~: — Si'ire fotnoonde e nde'e manngu walaa~!
66018019	Ɓe mecci mbulmbuldi dow ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe mbaɗi ga voygo, eɓe ngulla eɓe mbi'a~: — A voni~! A voni~! Aan si'ire mawnde, si'ire nde ɓe akale ndiyam fuu ndiskiri e jawdi muuɗum~! Ammaa nder wakkaci seɗɗa, koo ɗume fuu halkii~!
66018020	Aan asama, nan belɗum halkere ma'are~! Onon yimɓe Allah e lilaaɓe e annabo'en nanee belɗum, gam Allah sernanii nde ko nde waɗani on~!
66018021	Sey goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo cemmbiɗɗo hooƴi woɗnde haayre mawnde kama haayre namrude, o feri nde nder maayo, emo vi'a~: — Noon ɗum ferdata Babiila si'ire mawnde e semmbee, nde ɓesdataa yi'eego faa abadaa~!
66018022	Ɗum ɓesdataa nango fiyooɓe moolooji e yimooɓe e duudooɓe duudaali e duudooɓe luwe nder ma'are. Bayloowo leɗɗe koo jamɗe koo goɗɗum feere fuɗɗitataa yi'eego nder ma'are, ɗum fuɗɗitataa nango sonnyo namarde nder ma'are~!
66018023	Fitila ɓesdataa yaynaago nder ma'are. Ɗum ɓesdataa nango gimol koobgal nder ma'are. Torraaji ɗiin fuu no tawey nde, gam waɗooɓe luumaaku nder ma'are, kam ɓurnoo duuniyaaru fuu baawɗe. Nde majjinirii boo yimɓe duuniyaaru e sihiriiji ma'are~!
66018024	Noon boo, ƴiiƴam annabo'en e ɗam yimɓe Allah e ɗam yimɓe waraaɓe nder duuniyaaru fuu tawaama nder ma'are.
66019001	Ɓaawo ma'ajum mi nanii voliinde kama nde malaa'ika'en ɗuuɗɓe toon dow, eɓe ngima e semmbee eɓe mbi'a~: «~Haaleluuya~! Allah meeɗen jeyi kisndam e teddungal e baawɗe,
66019002	gam ceri'a ma'ako e laatii goonga e aadilaaku. O halkii on ɗoon debbo jeenoowo mawɗo, bonnirɗo duuniyaaru e njeenu muuɗum. Allah biinake mo ƴiiƴam maccuɓe muuɗum ɗam o rufi.~»
66019003	Sey ɓe ɓesdi yimgo, eɓe mbi'a~: «~Haaleluuya~! Cuurga yiite nyaameynge si'ire ndeen e ummoo faa abadaa abadin.~»
66019004	Sey ndotti'en aciriin e nayo (24) e tagle nayi ɗe yonki ndiccii cujjidani Allah jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu. Eɓe mbi'a~: — Aamiin~! Haaleluuya~!
66019005	Ndeen woɗnde voliinde ivi to jooɗorgal laamu e vi'a~: — Maaltee Allah meeɗen, onon maccuɓe ma'ako, mawɗo e pamaro hulooɓe mo.
66019006	Kadimaa mi nanii goɗɗum kama olko yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, kama hoolo nyaardu ndiyamji, kama hoolo riggaango semmbiɗngo, e vi'a~: Haaleluuya~! Allah Jawmiraawo meeɗen Jawmu baawɗe e laamii~!
66019007	En mbelmbeltu, nanen belɗum, mawninen mo, gam wakkaci koobgal Njawdiri warii. Kadimaa koovaaɗo ma'ako oon siryake.
66019008	Koovaaɗo oon hokkaama koltal ɗelemngal laaɓngal ɗelkitotoongal. Koltal ngaal woni kuuɗe yimɓe Allah booɗɗe.
66019009	Sey malaa'ikaajo oon vi'i yam~: — Vinndu~: Barkaa no laatanto ma'atinaaɓe juulɗe koobgal Njawdiri. Kadimaa o vi'i yam~: — Ɗi'i haalaaji ɗum ɗi Allah, ɗi goongaaji.
66019010	Sey ndicciimi yeeso ma'ako gam mi sujjidana mo, ammaa o vi'i yam~: — Ta'a waɗ noon~! Miin maa mi maccuɗo Allah kama maaɗa, aan e banndiraaɓe maaɗa jogiiɓe goonga ka Yeesu vanngini booɗɗum. Allah tan cujjidantaa~! Gam goonga ka Yeesu vanngini, kanka waɗi yimɓe mbaawi waɗgo annabaaku.
66019011	Ɓaawo ma'ajum ngi'imi dow e omtii, sey raa puccu ndaneewu. Baɗɗiiɗo ngu e vi'ee Koolaaɗo e Goongaajo. Emo waɗa aadilaaku nder ceri'a e konu.
66019012	Gite ma'ako e kuɓɓa kama ɗemngal yiite, emo yiifii giifi ɗuuɗɗi, innde e vinndii dow ma'ako, walaa annduɗo nde sey kanko tan.
66019013	Emo ɓornii toggoore nde ɗum soofniri ƴiiƴam, innde nde o noddirtee woni voliinde Allah.
66019014	Honooɓe asama e tokki mo dow pucci, eɓe ɓornii kolte ɗelemɗe laaɓɗe ɗelkitotooɗe.
66019015	Goɗki kaafahi belki e vurtoyoo nder honnduko ma'ako. E ma'aki o fe''irta duuniyaaru, o laamoranto ɓe sawru njamndi, o yaaɓey ɓikkon innabooje nder ɓiɗɗirde huunƴere Allah Jawmu Baawɗe.
66019016	Raa innde vinndaande dow toggoore ma'ako e danngo ma'ako~: «~Laamiiɗo Laamlaamɓe, Jawmiraawo Jawmiraaɓe~».
66019017	Ndeen ngi'imi goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo e darii dow naange, o noddi colli piirooji dow fuu e voliinde semmbiɗnde, o vi'i~: — Ngaree kawriton gam juulɗe Allah mawɗe,
66019018	nyaamon teewu laamiiɓe, e ngu mawɓe soojeeji, e ngu waawɓe konu, e ngu pucci, e ngu waɗɗiiɓe pucci ɗiin, e ngu yimɓe fuu, maccuɗo e dimo, mawɗo e pamaro~!
66019019	Sey ngi'imi ndiiwri arandi e laamiiɓe duuniyaaru e soojeeji maɓɓe kawritii yaayre wo'ore, gam ɓe konkontira e gonɗo dow puccu oon e soojeeji muuɗum.
66019020	Sey ɗum nanngi ndiiwri ndiin e annabiijo fewre baɗɗo kaayniiɗum ɗuum yeeso ma'ari. E kaayniiɗum ɗuum o majjiniri ɓeen waɗanaaɓe caayda ndiiwri ndiin e sujjidanɓe gumki nannduɗum e ma'ari. Annabiijo fewre e ndiiwri ndiin perdaa e yonki nder maayo yiite ƴibiriitu hallunge.
66019021	Ɗum wardi soojeeji maɓɓe e kaafahi burtoytooki nder honnduko oon baɗɗiiɗo puccu. Colli nyaami teewu maɓɓe, faa ɗi kaari.
66020001	Ndeen ngi'imi malaa'ikaajo e jippoyoo gada dow, emo jogii omtirgel ngaska lugguka ka walaa keerol, emo jogii ɓoggol njamndi juutngol.
66020002	Sey o nanngi mbo'onga ngaan, waato mbo'onga nga ndeenno mbi'eteenga Ibiliisa koo Ceyɗaan, o haɓɓiri nga ɓoggol ngool faa duuɓi dubuu (1~000).
66020003	Malaa'ikaajo oon feri nga nder ngaska lugguka kaan, o omndi ka, o takki ka, gam to' nga ɓesdu majjingo leƴƴi, faa nde duuɓi dubuu ɗiin (1~000) keevi. Ɓaawo ɗoon doole nga yoofee wakkaci seɗɗa.
66020004	Ndeen ngi'imi jooɗorɗe laamu. Jooɗiiɓe dow ma'aje kokkaama baawɗe waɗgo ceri'a. Ndeen kadimaa ngi'imi yonkiiji ittanaaɓe ko'e gam wa'ajingo habaru Yeesu e voliinde Allah. Kamɓe ngoni ɓe cujjidanaay ndin ɗoon ndiiwri arandi koo gumki nannduɗum e ma'ari, ɓe njaɓaay ɗum waɗana ɓe caayda ma'ari dow tihiɗe maɓɓe koo e juuɗe maɓɓe. Kamɓe pinti laamodii e Almasiifu faa duuɓi dubuu.
66020005	Kanjum woni ummitaaki maayɓe arani. Maayɓe horiiɓe boo pintaay faa nde duuɓi dubuu ɗiin keevi.
66020006	Barkaa e senaare laatanto heɓɓe geɗal nder kin ɗoon ummitaaki arani. Maayde ɗiɗaɓre meemataa ɓe, ɓe laatoto huwanooɓe Allah e Almasiifu, ɓe laamodoo e ma'ako faa duuɓi dubuu.
66020007	To duuɓi dubuu ɗiin keevii, ɗum yoofey Ceyɗaan gada to haɓɓano.
66020008	O vurtoto o majjina leƴƴi gonɗi cosɓulli duuniyaaru nayi fuu, waato Gog e Magog. O hawritey ɓe gam konu. Ɓe ɗuuɗɓe kama jaarengol maayo.
66020009	Ɓe cankitii koo toye nder duuniyaaru, ɓe pilii si'ire nde Allah yiɗi, to seniiɓe muuɗum ngoni. Ammaa yiite rufoyi gada dow, nge halki ɓe.
66020010	Ceyɗaan majjinnooɗo ɓe boo feraa nder veendu yiite e ƴibiriitu, to ndiiwri e annabiijo fewre ngoni. Toon ɗum waɗata ga hokkugo ɓe bone jemma e nyalawma, faa abadaa abadin.
66020011	Ndeen ngi'imi goɗngal jooɗorgal laamu manngal daneewal. Goɗɗo e jooɗii dow ma'agal. Dow e lees nyaari ndilli yeeso ma'ako, ɗum fuɗɗitaay yi'eego.
66020012	Sey ngi'imi maayɓe mawɗo e pamaro e ndarii yeeso jooɗorgal ngaal. Ɗum omti defte. Kadimaa ɗum omti woɗnde deftere, waato deftere yonki. Ɗum sernirani maayɓe ɓeen kuuɗe mu''en binndaaɗe nder defte ɗeen, koo moye fuu deydey e kuuɗe muuɗum.
66020013	Maayo tuutoyi maayɓe wonɓe nder muuɗum. Maayde e Laahira boo tuutoyi maayɓe mu''en. Ndeen koo moye maɓɓe sernanaa deydey e ko waɗi.
66020014	Sey Maayde e Laahira peraa nder veendu yiite. Veendu yiite nduun woni maayde ɗiɗaɓre.
66020015	Koo moye mo ɗum tawaay innde muuɗum e vinndii nder deftere yonki, no ferete nder veendu yiite nduun.
66021001	Ndeen ngi'imi asama kesum e duuniyaaru hesru, gam asama aranum e duuniyaaru arandu majji, maayo boo walaa.
66021002	Ndeen ngi'imi si'ire seniinde, waato Urusaliima hesre, ende jippoyoo gada asama, gada to Allah, nde siryaama kama koovaaɗo cinngitiiɗo gam gorko muuɗum.
66021003	Kadimaa mi nanii woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde gada jooɗorgal laamu ngaal e vi'a~: — Rah, jooɗorde Allah e caka ɓiɓɓe-aadama~! O jooɗodoto e maɓɓe, ɓe laatoto lenyol ma'ako. Allah e hoore muuɗum no wondey e maɓɓe, o laatoto Allah maɓɓe.
66021004	O mooytaney ɓe gonɗi maɓɓe fuu. Maayde e mettam ɓeram e bojji e torraa puɗɗitataa waɗgo, gam koo ɗume ko woonnoo ndeenno ƴaɓɓake.
66021005	Ndeen jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu oon vi'i~: — Jo'oni emi hesɗitina koo ɗume~! Kadimaa o vi'i yam~: — Vinndu haalaaji ɗiin, gam haalaaji ɗiin ɗi koolniiɗi, ɗi goongaaji.
66021006	Ndeen o vi'i yam~: — Ɗum heƴii~! Miin woni Alfaa, miin woni Omeega, waato fuɗɗoode e timmoode. Ɗomɗuɗo fuu, mi hokkey ɗum ndiyam caahu, gada ɓuldude ndiyam yonki.
66021007	Jaaliiɗo fuu no heɓey ɗu'um fii~: mi laatoto Allah ma'ako, kanko boo o laatoto ɓiɗɗo am.
66021008	Ammaa hulɓe, e nyaamooɓe amaana, e huwooɓe kuuɗe kalluɗe, e waɗooɓe war-hoore, e waɗooɓe njeenu, e raarnooɓe, e sujjidanooɓe gumkiiji, e fevooɓe, ɓe fuu geɗal maɓɓe woni veendu yiite e ƴibiriitu. Kanjum woni maayde ɗiɗaɓre.
66021009	Sey go'oto nder malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo jogiiɓe tummuɗe joveeɗiɗi keeɓɗe torraaji cakitiiɗi wari vi'i yam~: — War mi holloy maa koovaaɗo, debbo Njawdiri.
66021010	Nder wahayu ɗuum, malaa'ikaajo oon hooƴi yam yahari yam dow woɗnde vaamnde townde korey, o holli yam Urusaliima si'ire seniinde e jippoyoo gada asama, gada to Allah.
66021011	Darajja Allah e nder ma'are, ende ɗelkitoo kama kaaƴe dime, kama haayre yaspa laaɓnde, kama daarorgal.
66021012	Mahagol towngol e howi nde, engol woodi dammuɗe sappo e ɗiɗi. Dammugal fuu e malaa'ikaajo deeneyɗo ɗum. Inɗe leƴƴi Isiraa'iila sappo e ɗiɗi e mbinndii dow dammuɗe ɗeen.
66021013	Koo nduye vuttudu e woodi dammuɗe tati, fu'una tati, hiirna tati, woyla tati, foombina tati.
66021014	Mahagol kowngol si'ire ndeen mahaama dow kaaƴe sappo e ɗiɗi. Dow ma'aje ɗum vinndi inɗe almaajiri'en Njawdiri sappo e ɗiɗo.
66021015	Malaa'ikaajo bolideyɗo e am oon e jogii sawru jiinaariya ndu o fotnirta si'ire ndeen e dammuɗe ma'are e mahagol kowngol nde.
66021016	Buttulli si'ire ndeen fuu e poti, njuutirka ma'are e njaajirka ma'are e poti. Sey malaa'ikaajo oon fotniri si'ire ndeen e sawru nduun, o yi'i nde waɗii estaadiya dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗi (12~000). Njuutirka ma'are e njaajirka ma'are fuu e poti.
66021017	Kadimaa o fotni mahol kowngol si'ire ndeen, towirka ma'agol waɗii piye hemre e arba'iin e nayi (144), potnol neɗɗo ngol malaa'ikaajo huutiri.
66021018	Mahagol ngool maharaama kaaƴe yaspa. Si'ire ndeen e jiinaariya dimum tan nde maharaa, ende ɗelkitoo kama daarorgal.
66021019	Kaaƴe caɓɓaaɗe lees mahol ngool cinngitiraama e kaaƴe dime feere-feere. Haayre arande yaspa, ɗiɗaɓre safaya, tataɓre agat, nayaɓre emeral,
66021020	jovaɓre onis, joveego'oore kaneeliyan, joveeɗiɗaɓre kirisolati, joveetataɓre beeril, joveenayaɓre topas, sappoore kirisofuras, sappo e go'oore jaasin, sappo e ɗiɗaɓre ameetis.
66021021	Dammuɗe sappo e ɗiɗi ɗeen ɗum lu'ulu'uuje sappo e ɗiɗi, koo ngale dammugal wa'araama e lu'u-lu'u go'otum. Kadimaa laawol si'ire ndeen e jiinaariya dimum ngol wa'araa, engol ɗelkitoo kama daarorgal.
66021022	Mi yi'aay Wuro Allah Seniingo nder si'ire ndeen, gam Allah Jawmiraawo jawmu baawɗe e Njawdiri ndiin ngoni wuro seniingo ma'are.
66021023	Si'ire ndeen walaa bukaata jayngol naange koo ngol lewru, gam teddungal Allah yaynantoo nde. Njawdiri ndiin boo woni fitila ma'are.
66021024	Leƴƴi duuniyaaru no njahey nder jayngol si'ire ndeen. Laamiiɓe duuniyaaru boo no ngaddaney si'ire ndeen jawdi mu''en.
66021025	Dammuɗe ma'are omndataake nyalawma faa abadaa, kadimaa jemma waɗataa nder ma'are.
66021026	Jawdi e risku leƴƴi duuniyaaru no waddete nder si'ire ndeen.
66021027	Ko senaaki fuu nattataa si'ire ndeen, koo baɗeyɗo kuuɗe nefniiɗe, koo pevoowo. Sey ni ɓe ɗum vinndi inɗe mu''en nder deftere yonki nde Njawdiri tan nattata si'ire ndeen.
66022001	Ndeen malaa'ikaajo oon holli yam maayo ndiyam yonki, engo ɗelkitoo kama daarorgal, engo iloya gada jooɗorgal laamu Allah e Njawdiri,
66022002	engo ila caka laawol si'ire ndeen. Koo nduye vuttudu maayo ngoon e woodi lekki yonki. Lekki kiin e rima ɓikkon nde sappo e ɗiɗi nder hitaande, lewru fuu eki rima nde wo'ore. Haako ma'aki e huutiniree gam yamɗitingo leƴƴi.
66022003	Ko Allah la'ani fuu tawataake nder si'ire ndeen, ammaa jooɗorgal laamu Allah e Njawdiri no woney nder ma'are. Maccuɓe ma'ako boo no mawniney mo.
66022004	Ɓe ngi'ey yeeso ma'ako, kadimaa ɗum vinndey innde ma'ako dow tihiɗe maɓɓe.
66022005	Jemma ɓesdataa waɗgo, ɓe ngalaa bukaata jayngol fitilaaji koo ngol naange, gam Allah Jawmiraawo no laatoto jayngol maɓɓe. Ɓe laamoto faa abadaa abadin.
66022006	Sey malaa'ikaajo oon vi'i yam~: — Ka'a haala ka goonga, ka tabbitka. Allah Jawmiraawo kokkuɗo annabo'en Ruhu muuɗum liloyi malaa'ikaajo muuɗum, o holla maccuɓe ma'ako ko ɓadii wargo.
66022007	Yeesu vi'i~: — Rah, emi wara naa ko neeɓi~! Barkaa no laatanto baɗeyɗo ko annabaaku nde'e deftere vi'i.
66022008	Miin Yahayya, miin nani, yi'i ɗe'e ku'uje fuu. Nde nanmi ɗe, ngi'imi ɗe, sey ndicciimi yeeso malaa'ikaajo kolluɗo yam ɗe, gam mi sujjidana mo.
66022009	Ammaa o vi'i yam~: — Ta'a waɗ noon~! Miin maa mi maccuɗo Allah kama maaɗa, aan e banndiraaɓe maaɗa e annabo'en e ɗowtaniiɓe ko nde'e deftere vi'i. Allah tan cujjidantaa~!
66022010	Ndeen o vi'i yam~: — Ta'a suuɗ haala annabaaku nde'e deftere, gam wakkaci ɓadake nde ku'uje ɗeen fuu mbaɗata.
66022011	Kuweyɗo ko halli fuu, yaha yeeso e huugo ko halli. Kuweyɗo ko nyiddi boo, yaha yeeso e huugo ko nyiddi. Kuweyɗo ko vooɗi, yaha yeeso e huugo ko vooɗi. Ceniiɗo yaha yeeso e waɗgo jo'onde muuɗum seniinde.
66022012	Yeesu vi'i~: — Rah, emi wara naa ko neeɓi~! Mi wardey e laada koo moye, deydey e kuuɗe muuɗum.
66022013	Miin woni Alfaa, miin woni Omeega, miin woni arano, miin woni cakitiiɗo, miin woni fuɗɗoode e timmoode.
66022014	Barkaa laatantoo laɓɓinɓe kolte mu''en, gam ɓe keɓey laawol nyaamgo ɓikkon lekki yonki, ɓe natta dammuɗe si'ire ndeen.
66022015	Ammaa waɗooɓe ko harmi e raarnooɓe e waɗooɓe njeenu e waɗooɓe war-hoore e sujjidanooɓe gumkiiji e fevooɓe e yiɗɓe fewre no njooɗoto yaasi si'ire ndeen.
66022016	Miin Yeesu, mi liloyii malaa'ikaajo am, gam o saaydina ɗi'i goongaaji nder ikiliisiyaaji. Miin woni ɗaɗol Dawda e asngol ma'ako, miin woni hoodere fajiri jalboore.
66022017	Ruhu Allah e Koovaaɗo e mbi'a~: — Waroy~! Nanɗo ɗe'e bolle fuu vi'a~: — Waroy~! Ɗomɗuɗo fuu wara, giɗɗo ndiyam yonki fuu jaɓa yara caahu.
66022018	Miin Yahayya, emi vaggina koo moye nanɗo bolle annabaaku nde'e deftere. To goɗɗo ɓesdii goɗɗum dow ma'ajum, Allah no ɓesdaney mo torraaji kalluɗi binndaaɗi nder nde'e deftere.
66022019	To goɗɗo boo ittii goɗɗum nder bolle annabaaku gonɗum nder nde'e deftere, Allah no ittey geɗal ma'ako nder lekki yonki e si'ire seniinde binndaaɗum nder nde'e deftere.
66022020	Oon caaydinɗo ɗe'e ku'uje fuu e vi'a~: — Goonga, emi wara naa ko neeɓi. Aamiin. Waroy Yeesu Jawmiraawo~!
66022021	Barkaa Yeesu Jawmiraawo wondu e yimɓe Allah fuu. Aamiin~!
